We spend most of our days free and easy
at the Pokémon Gym.
ch0008_00_erika_en.lsd.ch0008_00_erika/0601_0701_03_10:
I wonder what my dear Tangela and
Victreebel are up to right now...
ch0008_00_erika_en.lsd.ch0008_00_erika/0601_0702_01_10:
Whenever I leave my Gym, I can’t help
constantly worrying about the Pokémon
I left behind.
ch0008_00_erika_en.lsd.ch0008_00_erika/0601_0702_02_10:
What if my Pokémon turn the inside of the
Gym into a wild jungle while I’m gone?
ch0008_00_erika_en.lsd.ch0008_00_erika/0601_0702_03_10:
Dear... That would be so adorable of them...I
would probably just leave it that way!
ch0008_00_erika_en.lsd.ch0008_00_erika/0602_0701_01_10:
There’s nothing more adorable than a
stubborn sprout—or more charming than
a fuss-free blossom.
ch0008_00_erika_en.lsd.ch0008_00_erika/0602_0701_02_10:
Spending a relaxing, carefree day
with such lovely Pokémon.
Is there anything more heavenly?
ch0008_00_erika_en.lsd.ch0008_00_erika/0602_0701_03_10:
As a Trainer, I find my most precious moments
are the ones I spend with my Pokémon.
ch0008_00_erika_en.lsd.ch0008_00_erika/0602_0702_01_10:
My Gym is full of nothing but plants
and Pokémon.
ch0008_00_erika_en.lsd.ch0008_00_erika/0602_0702_02_10:
I can easily spend the whole day
just taking care of them, helping them
to grow strong and beautiful.
ch0008_00_erika_en.lsd.ch0008_00_erika/0602_0702_03_10:
There’s always so much work to do!
We find it hard to get everything done—
even when we divide up the labor.
ch0008_00_erika_en.lsd.ch0008_00_erika/0602_0702_04_10:
It’s a very busy job, but the delightful fun
we have makes it all worthwhile.
ch0008_00_erika_en.lsd.ch0008_00_erika/0603_0701_01_10:
The climate sure is lovely here on Pasio.
My partner Pokémon is enjoying it as well.
ch0008_00_erika_en.lsd.ch0008_00_erika/0603_0701_02_10:
As for myself, well...I tend to get very
sleepy whenever the weather is sunny.
ch0008_00_erika_en.lsd.ch0008_00_erika/0603_0701_03_10:
Dear... Sometimes I blink my eyes
and it’s already the next morning.
ch0008_00_erika_en.lsd.ch0008_00_erika/0603_0702_01_10:
My Pokémon is even stronger after it has
spent some time absorbing the warm sunshine.
ch0008_00_erika_en.lsd.ch0008_00_erika/0603_0702_02_10:
I would love to show you some
of that strength personally, but I...
ch0008_00_erika_en.lsd.ch0008_00_erika/0603_0702_03_10:
I’m afraid I’m...a little too sleepy
at the moment.
ch0008_00_erika_en.lsd.ch0008_00_erika/0604_0701_01_10:
When I’m out for a stroll through town,
I often end up taking the long way round.
ch0008_00_erika_en.lsd.ch0008_00_erika/0604_0701_02_10:
But whenever that happens, my dear Vileplume
always shows me the way back home.
ch0008_00_erika_en.lsd.ch0008_00_erika/0604_0701_03_10:
Vileplume remembers the roads much better
than I do, in fact! She really is a lovely
little Pokémon.
ch0008_00_erika_en.lsd.ch0008_00_erika/0604_0702_01_10:
My dear Vileplume has been by my side
ever since she was an Oddish.
ch0008_00_erika_en.lsd.ch0008_00_erika/0604_0702_02_10:
After all the time we’ve spent together,
we’ve gotten to know each other so well.
ch0008_00_erika_en.lsd.ch0008_00_erika/0605_0701_01_10:
[Name:PlayerNickname ], are you familiar
with flower arrangement? It’s a hobby of mine.
ch0008_00_erika_en.lsd.ch0008_00_erika/0605_0701_02_10:
You know, I’ve always thought that flower
arrangement and Pokémon battles
share something in common.
ch0008_00_erika_en.lsd.ch0008_00_erika/0605_0701_03_10:
Selecting certain flowers to arrange together
in order to create something more beautiful...
ch0008_00_erika_en.lsd.ch0008_00_erika/0605_0701_04_10:
is a lot like selecting certain Pokémon moves
and battle strategies in order to obtain victory,
wouldn’t you agree?
ch0008_00_erika_en.lsd.ch0008_00_erika/0605_0701_05_10:
The desire to cultivate something in order to
reach a certain goal is an idea that both
of them share.
ch0008_00_erika_en.lsd.ch0008_00_erika/0605_0702_01_10:
If you’d like to learn more about the art of
flower arrangement, I would be happy to
show you a little.
ch0008_00_erika_en.lsd.ch0008_00_erika/0605_0702_02_10:
It can help improve your concentration
as well as lift your spirits.
ch0008_00_erika_en.lsd.ch0008_00_erika/0605_0702_03_10:
I actually have a class where I teach flower
arranging. Feel free to come by anytime.
ch0008_00_erika_en.lsd.ch0008_00_erika/1701_0701_01_10: Oh my! I’m so glad you’re here.
ch0008_00_erika_en.lsd.ch0008_00_erika/1701_0701_02_10:
I’d like you to have this.
It’s a present from me.
ch0008_00_erika_en.lsd.ch0008_00_erika/1701_0702_01_10: Oh dear! Thank goodness I ran into you.
ch0008_00_erika_en.lsd.ch0008_00_erika/1701_0702_02_10:
I’m sure I would have forgotten to give this
to you had we not crossed paths.
ch0008_00_erika_en.lsd.ch0008_00_erika/2501_0701_01_10:
You seem to really enjoy
Pokémon battling a lot.
ch0008_00_erika_en.lsd.ch0008_00_erika/2501_0701_02_10:
When I watch other sync pairs battle,
I can see how much fun they’re having.
ch0008_00_erika_en.lsd.ch0008_00_erika/2501_0701_03_10:
And when I battle with you,
my heart dances with joy.
ch0008_00_erika_en.lsd.ch0008_00_erika/2501_0702_01_10:
I discovered something remarkable
about your Pokémon battles.
ch0008_00_erika_en.lsd.ch0008_00_erika/2501_0702_02_10:
Whether an individual wins or loses a battle,
everyone has a delightful expression
on their face.
ch0008_00_erika_en.lsd.ch0008_00_erika/2501_0702_03_10:
I think that maybe your ability to
share your fun with others is another
type of strength.
ch0008_00_erika_en.lsd.ch0008_00_erika/2511_0701_01_10:
To battle is to weave various elements together,
ultimately leading to victory or defeat.
No two Pokémon battles are exactly alike.
ch0008_00_erika_en.lsd.ch0008_00_erika/2511_0701_02_10:
I find a sort of beauty in that, which I’m
conscious of even in battle.
ch0008_00_erika_en.lsd.ch0008_00_erika/2511_0701_03_10:
One could say that I’m enjoying the
art of battling, so to speak.
ch0008_00_erika_en.lsd.ch0008_00_erika/2511_0702_01_10:
The beauty of battling is a fleeting one.
Blink and you might miss it.
ch0008_00_erika_en.lsd.ch0008_00_erika/2511_0702_02_10:
Think about it—you can never enjoy
the same battle twice.
ch0008_00_erika_en.lsd.ch0008_00_erika/2511_0702_03_10:
But it’s that fleeting, momentary joy
that brings color to each and every day...
That’s how I like to think about it.
ch0008_00_erika_en.lsd.ch0008_00_erika/3001_0701_01_10:
Good day!
The morning sunshine feels so nice.
ch0008_00_erika_en.lsd.ch0008_00_erika/3002_0701_01_10:
Good morning. Lovely weather, isn’t it?
Shall we take a stroll?
ch0008_00_erika_en.lsd.ch0008_00_erika/3003_0701_01_10:
Hello...
Oh dear... I must have dozed off.
Is it nap time?
ch0008_00_erika_en.lsd.ch0008_00_erika/3004_0701_01_10:
Hello... The warm midday sun makes me sleepy.
I’m afraid I might doze off...
ch0008_00_erika_en.lsd.ch0008_00_erika/3005_0701_01_10:
Oh dear...
Good evening. I get sleepy at night...
ch0008_00_erika_en.lsd.ch0008_00_erika/3006_0701_01_10:
Good evening. It’s dark already.
Do you have something you need to finish today?

ch0009_00_senri_en.lsd.ch0009_00_senri/0101_0701_01_10:
Hm? If it isn’t [Name:PlayerNickname ]!
It’s good to see you today.
ch0009_00_senri_en.lsd.ch0009_00_senri/0101_0701_02_10:
When I see how much you or my son has grown
and accomplished, I can’t help but think I need
to train more, too.
ch0009_00_senri_en.lsd.ch0009_00_senri/0601_0701_01_10: The Trainers of my Gym are all very powerful.
ch0009_00_senri_en.lsd.ch0009_00_senri/0601_0701_02_10:
True strength acquired from proper practice
means not running from even the most difficult
of battles.
ch0009_00_senri_en.lsd.ch0009_00_senri/0601_0701_03_10:
When you face a challenge, I want you to
answer it with all you’ve got!
ch0009_00_senri_en.lsd.ch0009_00_senri/0601_0702_01_10:
At my Gym, everyone battles each other
without ever holding back, all in the name
of growing stronger.
ch0009_00_senri_en.lsd.ch0009_00_senri/0601_0702_02_10:
I am no different. I am always thinking of new
ways to win in battle.
ch0009_00_senri_en.lsd.ch0009_00_senri/0602_0701_01_10:
Sometimes I run into my kid at the
Pokémon Center.
ch0009_00_senri_en.lsd.ch0009_00_senri/0602_0701_02_10:
The other day I saw him wearing his clothes
inside out. Honestly, he can be so careless
sometimes. It reminds me of someone...
ch0009_00_senri_en.lsd.ch0009_00_senri/0602_0701_03_10:
What? No, not me!
I’d never do something like wear my
clothes incorrectly!
ch0009_00_senri_en.lsd.ch0009_00_senri/0602_0702_02_10:
Whenever we see each other, we both look that
way, I suppose.
ch0009_00_senri_en.lsd.ch0009_00_senri/0602_0702_03_10:
Looking like that...
I feel like I should say something, but I just
end up laughing.
ch0009_00_senri_en.lsd.ch0009_00_senri/0603_0701_01_10:
Slaking is very powerful, but he will start
loafing around right away. That’s his weakness.
ch0009_00_senri_en.lsd.ch0009_00_senri/0603_0701_02_10:
I understand Slaking’s strong and weak points,
so I want to make the most of everything
he is able to do!
ch0009_00_senri_en.lsd.ch0009_00_senri/0603_0701_03_10:
If you understand the strengths and
weaknesses of Pokémon, too,
battles will become much easier for you.
ch0009_00_senri_en.lsd.ch0009_00_senri/0603_0702_01_10:
I don’t just mean your own Pokémon, either.
Knowing about all kinds of Pokémon is important.
ch0009_00_senri_en.lsd.ch0009_00_senri/0603_0702_02_10:
If you do, you’ll be ready to counter against
any Pokémon’s strengths.
ch0009_00_senri_en.lsd.ch0009_00_senri/0603_0702_03_10:
If you want to learn about Slaking’s power,
I’m ready to battle anytime!
ch0009_00_senri_en.lsd.ch0009_00_senri/0604_0701_01_10:
I’ve got a few other Pokémon besides
Slaking here, but they’re all back at home
looking after my Gym.
ch0009_00_senri_en.lsd.ch0009_00_senri/0604_0701_02_10:
I wonder how they’re doing with the Trainers...
Not slacking off, I hope!
ch0009_00_senri_en.lsd.ch0009_00_senri/0604_0701_03_10:
Blissey and Linoone are probably all right, but
Spinda’s eyes are always spinning around and it
has a tendency to wander off.
ch0009_00_senri_en.lsd.ch0009_00_senri/0604_0702_01_10: They’re all definitely training hard every day.
ch0009_00_senri_en.lsd.ch0009_00_senri/0604_0702_02_10:
That goes for people, too! It’s no different for
people or Pokémon! If you want to get stronger,
you can’t hold anything back!
ch0009_00_senri_en.lsd.ch0009_00_senri/0605_0701_01_10:
Have you ever considered the emotions that come
with a battle’s end, [Name:PlayerNickname ]?
ch0009_00_senri_en.lsd.ch0009_00_senri/0605_0701_02_10:
Happiness, sadness...
There are many different things you can feel.
ch0009_00_senri_en.lsd.ch0009_00_senri/0605_0701_03_10:
All of those feelings become the foundation of
your strength, so remember them well.
ch0009_00_senri_en.lsd.ch0009_00_senri/0605_0702_01_10:
Losing, even when you battle with all
your might, is painful—even for adults.
ch0009_00_senri_en.lsd.ch0009_00_senri/0605_0702_02_10:
What I mean is that hating to lose is a
childish thing to do.
ch0009_00_senri_en.lsd.ch0009_00_senri/1701_0701_01_10:
I’ve been looking for you!
I was thinking I wanted to give this to you.
ch0009_00_senri_en.lsd.ch0009_00_senri/1701_0701_02_10:
I think you’ll be able to put that to good use.
I’ll continue to keep supporting you.
ch0009_00_senri_en.lsd.ch0009_00_senri/1701_0702_01_10:
That gift I gave you a while ago?
You don’t have to worry about giving me
anything in return.
ch0009_00_senri_en.lsd.ch0009_00_senri/1701_0702_02_10:
I thought you could use it, so I gave it to you.
That’s all there is.
ch0009_00_senri_en.lsd.ch0009_00_senri/2501_0701_01_10:
It may be surprising, but even I get worried
about things sometimes.
ch0009_00_senri_en.lsd.ch0009_00_senri/2501_0701_02_10:
For example, when I go on a trip, I always
worry about what kind of souvenirs I should
bring back as gifts.
ch0009_00_senri_en.lsd.ch0009_00_senri/2501_0701_03_10:
What, you thought it was a more serious
kind of worry? Well to me, that is serious.
ch0009_00_senri_en.lsd.ch0009_00_senri/2501_0701_04_10:
It’s something that will travel far and be given
to someone. So I have to choose carefully.
ch0009_00_senri_en.lsd.ch0009_00_senri/2501_0702_01_10:
To find a great gift, I actually did 
a bunch of research about Pasio.
ch0009_00_senri_en.lsd.ch0009_00_senri/2501_0702_02_10:
There are just so many different things I’m sure
my family would like.
ch0009_00_senri_en.lsd.ch0009_00_senri/2501_0702_03_10:
Hmm. I can’t decide. If you see something good,
let me know.
ch0009_00_senri_en.lsd.ch0009_00_senri/2511_0701_01_10:
As a Trainer and as a Gym Leader, I’ve learned
many things.
ch0009_00_senri_en.lsd.ch0009_00_senri/2511_0701_02_10:
But even so, I still feel like I’m not giving it 
my all. That’s why I’m participating in the PML.
ch0009_00_senri_en.lsd.ch0009_00_senri/2511_0701_03_10:
Winning a battle isn’t easy. Especially since there
are so many strong Trainers like you around.
ch0009_00_senri_en.lsd.ch0009_00_senri/2511_0701_04_10:
There’s a lot to learn! My hope right now is to
learn as much as I can from everyone.
ch0009_00_senri_en.lsd.ch0009_00_senri/2511_0702_01_10:
Tactics and counter tactics are different between
regions and generations.
ch0009_00_senri_en.lsd.ch0009_00_senri/2511_0702_02_10:
However, changing to whatever others do isn’t
actual strength.
A strong Trainer has unshakable conviction.
ch0009_00_senri_en.lsd.ch0009_00_senri/2511_0702_03_10:
When I see you battle, I’m reminded of my son.
I think you two are similarly determined.
ch0009_00_senri_en.lsd.ch0009_00_senri/3001_0701_01_10:
Good morning.
Let’s give it our best effort today.
ch0009_00_senri_en.lsd.ch0009_00_senri/3002_0701_01_10:
Morning. Did you sleep well?
I’ll be counting on you today.
ch0009_00_senri_en.lsd.ch0009_00_senri/3003_0701_01_10:
Have you eaten?
You must take care of your body.
ch0009_00_senri_en.lsd.ch0009_00_senri/3004_0701_01_10:
Time sure can fly in the afternoon.
Be careful not to waste too much of it.
ch0009_00_senri_en.lsd.ch0009_00_senri/3005_0701_01_10:
Days with you sure go by fast.
Make sure to rest up for tomorrow.
ch0009_00_senri_en.lsd.ch0009_00_senri/3006_0701_01_10:
It’s already getting dark. Watch your step,
and keep an eye out for nocturnal Pokémon.

ch0010_00_maximum_en.lsd.ch0010_00_maximum/0101_0701_01_10:
I’ve been waiting, [Name:PlayerNickname ]!
Come on! The ring is calling us!
ch0010_00_maximum_en.lsd.ch0010_00_maximum/0101_0701_02_10:
All right! Time to get pumped!
Crash! Crash!
ch0010_00_maximum_en.lsd.ch0010_00_maximum/0601_0701_01_10:
My partner, Floatzel, also loves
professional wrestling!
ch0010_00_maximum_en.lsd.ch0010_00_maximum/0601_0701_02_10:
We travel throughout the Sinnoh region
and make appearances in matches together!
ch0010_00_maximum_en.lsd.ch0010_00_maximum/0601_0701_03_10:
Now that I think about it, the first time I
met Floatzel was in the ring, too!
ch0010_00_maximum_en.lsd.ch0010_00_maximum/0601_0702_01_10:
See, he interrupted one of my matches
back when he was still a Buizel!
ch0010_00_maximum_en.lsd.ch0010_00_maximum/0601_0702_02_10: We’ve been the best tag team ever since!
ch0010_00_maximum_en.lsd.ch0010_00_maximum/0601_0702_03_10:
You’ll meet your best partner in battle
someday, too. Just wait!
ch0010_00_maximum_en.lsd.ch0010_00_maximum/0601_0702_04_10: Or, what do I know. Maybe you’ve already met!
ch0010_00_maximum_en.lsd.ch0010_00_maximum/0602_0701_01_10: One of the Pokémon I’m raising is a Quagsire.
ch0010_00_maximum_en.lsd.ch0010_00_maximum/0602_0701_02_10:
Normally it seems really zoned out and it’s
difficult to tell what’s going on in its head...
ch0010_00_maximum_en.lsd.ch0010_00_maximum/0602_0701_03_10:
But once a battle starts, it overwhelms the
competition with an amazing display of power!
ch0010_00_maximum_en.lsd.ch0010_00_maximum/0602_0701_04_10:
Its cute look hides a fiery heart!
It’s amazing!
ch0010_00_maximum_en.lsd.ch0010_00_maximum/0602_0702_01_10:
It doesn’t move much, but it’s definitely what
you’d call a powerhouse!
ch0010_00_maximum_en.lsd.ch0010_00_maximum/0602_0702_02_10: I hope you can appreciate Quagsire’s talent, too!
ch0010_00_maximum_en.lsd.ch0010_00_maximum/0603_0701_01_10:
Gah hah hah! It seems like Crasher Wake
is famous even here on Pasio!
ch0010_00_maximum_en.lsd.ch0010_00_maximum/0603_0701_02_10:
But, hmmm. That means I need to be careful and
make sure I maintain my image at all times!
Don’t want to ruin the dreams of the children!
ch0010_00_maximum_en.lsd.ch0010_00_maximum/0603_0701_03_10:
I definitely need to make sure I stay healthy!
What kind of wrestler would I be if I got knocked
out by a cold, after all?!
ch0010_00_maximum_en.lsd.ch0010_00_maximum/0603_0702_01_10:
Even if you’ve got a strong body, you still need
to take care of it!
ch0010_00_maximum_en.lsd.ch0010_00_maximum/0603_0702_02_10:
Your body is your most fundamental asset,
after all!
ch0010_00_maximum_en.lsd.ch0010_00_maximum/0604_0701_01_10:
By the way, did you know I personally wrote
the theme song for Crasher Wake?!
ch0010_00_maximum_en.lsd.ch0010_00_maximum/0604_0701_02_10:
Now, let me give you a taste of my amazing
singing voice!
ch0010_00_maximum_en.lsd.ch0010_00_maximum/0604_0701_03_10:
Er-hem! Aaah aaah ahh...
The ring is my rolling sea. ♪
ch0010_00_maximum_en.lsd.ch0010_00_maximum/0604_0702_01_10:
I’ve been told that my singing can make babies
and Pokémon stop crying!
ch0010_00_maximum_en.lsd.ch0010_00_maximum/0604_0702_02_10:
Gah hah hah! My voice must be more soothing
and melodic than I thought!
ch0010_00_maximum_en.lsd.ch0010_00_maximum/0605_0701_01_10:
I’ve been surprised by a lot of things
since I came to Pasio!
ch0010_00_maximum_en.lsd.ch0010_00_maximum/0605_0701_02_10:
The first thing I noticed was the ocean!
I love the sea in the Sinnoh region, too,
but the water here is really amazing!
ch0010_00_maximum_en.lsd.ch0010_00_maximum/0605_0701_03_10:
Another thing that surprised me is you,
[Name:PlayerNickname ]! You’ve true muscle!
ch0010_00_maximum_en.lsd.ch0010_00_maximum/0605_0701_04_10:
I hope you keep training those muscles
to the max!
ch0010_00_maximum_en.lsd.ch0010_00_maximum/0605_0702_01_10:
Don’t worry—Crasher Wake has his eye on you!
I’ll watch your every step as you grow stronger!
ch0010_00_maximum_en.lsd.ch0010_00_maximum/0605_0702_02_10:
I’m already looking forward to the day you come
challenge me in my own ring in Sinnoh!
ch0010_00_maximum_en.lsd.ch0010_00_maximum/1701_0701_01_10:
Oh! There you are!
I’ve been looking for you!
ch0010_00_maximum_en.lsd.ch0010_00_maximum/1701_0701_02_10:
Here! A gift from me!
It’s all yours!
ch0010_00_maximum_en.lsd.ch0010_00_maximum/1701_0702_01_10: Gah hah hah! You love it, don’t you?
ch0010_00_maximum_en.lsd.ch0010_00_maximum/1701_0702_02_10: It’s a gift from Crasher Wake, after all!
ch0010_00_maximum_en.lsd.ch0010_00_maximum/2501_0701_01_10:
Hey, what’s up?
You need a sparring partner?
ch0010_00_maximum_en.lsd.ch0010_00_maximum/2501_0701_02_10:
You’ve certainly gotten a lot stronger than when
we first met! You’re almost a completely
different person!
ch0010_00_maximum_en.lsd.ch0010_00_maximum/2501_0701_03_10:
Your strength is proof that you’ve been able
to keep up with the Wake in your training!
ch0010_00_maximum_en.lsd.ch0010_00_maximum/2501_0702_01_10:
You’re turning out well! I’d say you’re almost
ready to say you’re a top-notch wrestler!
ch0010_00_maximum_en.lsd.ch0010_00_maximum/2501_0702_02_10:
Ahem, I mean Trainer!
This makes me want to cry tears of joy!
ch0010_00_maximum_en.lsd.ch0010_00_maximum/2501_0702_03_10:
Once the PML is over, why don’t we officially
become a tag team and take on challengers in
the ring together?
ch0010_00_maximum_en.lsd.ch0010_00_maximum/2511_0701_01_10:
I was watching your battle just now!
You did good!
ch0010_00_maximum_en.lsd.ch0010_00_maximum/2511_0701_02_10:
It’s all thanks to the time spent with yours
truly, of course!
ch0010_00_maximum_en.lsd.ch0010_00_maximum/2511_0701_03_10:
You’re definitely a proper wrestler now!
I’d have you as a main event any day!
ch0010_00_maximum_en.lsd.ch0010_00_maximum/2511_0702_01_10:
What’s that? You’d rather stay a Trainer instead
of becoming a wrestler?
ch0010_00_maximum_en.lsd.ch0010_00_maximum/2511_0702_02_10:
Oh, don’t be shy! Don’t worry—I’ll make you a
supercool mask, too!
ch0010_00_maximum_en.lsd.ch0010_00_maximum/2511_0702_03_10:
Let’s see, you’ll need a ring name, too.
Oh! How about Crasher Wake Jr.?!
ch0010_00_maximum_en.lsd.ch0010_00_maximum/3001_0701_01_10:
Haha! Such a glorious morning! I’m going
to have a great workout today—I can tell!
ch0010_00_maximum_en.lsd.ch0010_00_maximum/3002_0701_01_10:
Morning, the perfect time for a song!
Hmm hmm hmm hmm hm...
What? You’re not sticking around for my song?
ch0010_00_maximum_en.lsd.ch0010_00_maximum/3003_0701_01_10:
Hey! Hope you’re not getting tired already!
Gotta give the day all you’ve got!
ch0010_00_maximum_en.lsd.ch0010_00_maximum/3004_0701_01_10:
Hey! Great day, isn’t it?
Just keep at it with all your energy!
ch0010_00_maximum_en.lsd.ch0010_00_maximum/3005_0701_01_10:
I’m about ready to crash, but I’ve got more
training to do! Just a little bit more!
ch0010_00_maximum_en.lsd.ch0010_00_maximum/3006_0701_01_10:
Training before you sleep helps you start
tomorrow with a splash!

ch0011_00_homika_en.lsd.ch0011_00_homika/0101_0701_02_10:
If you have some time, have a battle with me!
I’m just bursting with energy!
ch0011_00_homika_en.lsd.ch0011_00_homika/0601_0701_01_10: I love Pokémon and music equally.
ch0011_00_homika_en.lsd.ch0011_00_homika/0601_0701_02_10:
I could never choose one over the other, so
that’s why I do double duty!
ch0011_00_homika_en.lsd.ch0011_00_homika/0601_0701_03_10:
I can tell you’re wondering if I’m actually
able to be any good at either.
ch0011_00_homika_en.lsd.ch0011_00_homika/0601_0701_04_10:
Of course I am!
Why wouldn’t I be?
ch0011_00_homika_en.lsd.ch0011_00_homika/0601_0702_01_10:
If there are things you’re itching to try, you
should just go for them!
ch0011_00_homika_en.lsd.ch0011_00_homika/0601_0702_02_10:
Sitting around being indecisive doesn’t get
you anywhere!
ch0011_00_homika_en.lsd.ch0011_00_homika/0602_0701_01_10:
You know, my old man has two jobs, too,
just like me.
ch0011_00_homika_en.lsd.ch0011_00_homika/0602_0701_02_10: He’s a ship’s captain and an actor!
ch0011_00_homika_en.lsd.ch0011_00_homika/0602_0701_03_10:
Although I gotta say, he gets a bit caught up
in acting sometimes and lets his ship just sit
in harbor.
ch0011_00_homika_en.lsd.ch0011_00_homika/0602_0701_04_10:
It’s not good to cause problems for
people, right?
ch0011_00_homika_en.lsd.ch0011_00_homika/0602_0702_01_10:
See, I want to support my old man’s dream of
becoming an actor.
ch0011_00_homika_en.lsd.ch0011_00_homika/0602_0702_02_10:
I mean, I went and saw the movie he was in,
and it was pretty good.
ch0011_00_homika_en.lsd.ch0011_00_homika/0603_0701_01_10:
Sometimes, when I’m out exploring,
inspiration just hits me out of nowhere!
ch0011_00_homika_en.lsd.ch0011_00_homika/0603_0701_02_10: It’s a great help to my song writing.
ch0011_00_homika_en.lsd.ch0011_00_homika/0603_0702_01_10:
Sometimes, working two jobs can show you
new things.
ch0011_00_homika_en.lsd.ch0011_00_homika/0603_0702_02_10: But you can’t slack off on either of them!
ch0011_00_homika_en.lsd.ch0011_00_homika/0604_0701_01_10:
Whirlipede normally sits pretty still and
doesn’t move much...
ch0011_00_homika_en.lsd.ch0011_00_homika/0604_0701_02_10: but if she’s attacked, she jumps into action!
ch0011_00_homika_en.lsd.ch0011_00_homika/0604_0701_03_10:
It’s like she’s letting all that stored-up
energy explode!
ch0011_00_homika_en.lsd.ch0011_00_homika/0604_0701_04_10:
She’s definitely a Pokémon that knows how to
put on an invigorating show, right?
ch0011_00_homika_en.lsd.ch0011_00_homika/0604_0702_01_10: Unleash your energy when it really counts!
ch0011_00_homika_en.lsd.ch0011_00_homika/0604_0702_02_10:
It’s what Whirlipede taught me, you know?
You can’t just be all out all the time. You need
to make your efforts really count!
ch0011_00_homika_en.lsd.ch0011_00_homika/0605_0701_02_10:
Huh? Oh, sessions are when we go
exploring together!
ch0011_00_homika_en.lsd.ch0011_00_homika/0605_0701_03_10:
Sometimes, I get this comfortable feeling, like
I’m hanging out with my band members!
ch0011_00_homika_en.lsd.ch0011_00_homika/0605_0702_01_10: I can feel my spirits rising when I’m with you!
ch0011_00_homika_en.lsd.ch0011_00_homika/0605_0702_02_10: It’s like I have even more energy than usual!
ch0011_00_homika_en.lsd.ch0011_00_homika/1701_0701_02_10:
Oh, no no, I don’t want anything back!
I just felt like giving something to you!
ch0011_00_homika_en.lsd.ch0011_00_homika/1701_0702_01_10: Make sure to use that item I gave you, OK?
ch0011_00_homika_en.lsd.ch0011_00_homika/1701_0702_02_10: A really good Trainer puts items to good use!
ch0011_00_homika_en.lsd.ch0011_00_homika/2501_0701_01_10: Hey, about you and your Pokémon!
ch0011_00_homika_en.lsd.ch0011_00_homika/2501_0701_02_10: You’re getting really strong, aren’t you!
ch0011_00_homika_en.lsd.ch0011_00_homika/2501_0701_03_10:
Not just pure strength. Your will to win is
getting stronger, too!
ch0011_00_homika_en.lsd.ch0011_00_homika/2501_0701_04_10: Watching you gets me pumped, too!
ch0011_00_homika_en.lsd.ch0011_00_homika/2501_0702_01_10:
I’ll never use my double duty with my band
as an excuse for anything!
ch0011_00_homika_en.lsd.ch0011_00_homika/2501_0702_02_10:
I don’t plan on letting you win our Pokémon
battles, either, so there!
ch0011_00_homika_en.lsd.ch0011_00_homika/2511_0701_01_10: The song I’m working on—it’s going to be great!
ch0011_00_homika_en.lsd.ch0011_00_homika/2511_0701_02_10: See, I’m making my adventures here into a song!
ch0011_00_homika_en.lsd.ch0011_00_homika/2511_0701_03_10: Oh, of course you’re gonna be in the song, too!
ch0011_00_homika_en.lsd.ch0011_00_homika/2511_0701_04_10:
There’s no way any of my adventures here
on Pasio would happen without you!
ch0011_00_homika_en.lsd.ch0011_00_homika/2511_0702_01_10: I still want more ideas for new songs, though.
ch0011_00_homika_en.lsd.ch0011_00_homika/2511_0702_02_10:
So that means you’re gonna keep exploring
with me, all right?!
ch0011_00_homika_en.lsd.ch0011_00_homika/3001_0701_01_10:
Morning! You’re looking energetic!
Keep it up, and let’s get some stuff done!
ch0011_00_homika_en.lsd.ch0011_00_homika/3002_0701_01_10:
Giving your all from the beginning of the day,
huh? Just make sure you don’t burn yourself out!
ch0011_00_homika_en.lsd.ch0011_00_homika/3003_0701_01_10:
It’s a waste if you don’t give it your all
when the sun’s out!
ch0011_00_homika_en.lsd.ch0011_00_homika/3004_0701_01_10:
Managing a band and Pokémon
means using time effectively!
ch0011_00_homika_en.lsd.ch0011_00_homika/3005_0701_01_10:
It’s all about timing—we gotta play our
hearts out, till the last chord of the night!
ch0011_00_homika_en.lsd.ch0011_00_homika/3006_0701_01_10:
I was thinking about calling it a night.
But if you’re still good to go, then so am I!

ch0012_00_corni_en.lsd.ch0012_00_corni/0101_0701_01_10:
Time for Lady Korrina’s big appearance!
And look! It’s [Name:PlayerNickname ]!
Let’s make today a fun one!
ch0012_00_corni_en.lsd.ch0012_00_corni/0101_0701_02_10:
Come on, together now!
Let’s make today a super fun day!
ch0012_00_corni_en.lsd.ch0012_00_corni/1701_0701_01_10: Hey! Lucario said he wants to give you this!
ch0012_00_corni_en.lsd.ch0012_00_corni/1701_0701_02_10:
He said he sensed an aura around it.
Here, check it out!
ch0012_00_corni_en.lsd.ch0012_00_corni/1701_0702_01_10:
Lucario and I found this for you,
so it’s bound to come in handy!
ch0012_00_corni_en.lsd.ch0012_00_corni/0601_0701_01_10:
Why the long face? If you’re bored,
why not practice some tricks with me?
ch0012_00_corni_en.lsd.ch0012_00_corni/0601_0701_02_10: And by tricks I mean awesome skating moves!
ch0012_00_corni_en.lsd.ch0012_00_corni/0601_0701_03_10:
Getting a trick just right gives me the
same thrill as winning a Pokémon battle!
ch0012_00_corni_en.lsd.ch0012_00_corni/0601_0701_04_10:
Once you get a handle on your balance, you
can do tricks during battle and call out
instructions on even the roughest turf!
ch0012_00_corni_en.lsd.ch0012_00_corni/0601_0702_01_10:
So? What do you think of my tricks?
I love doing awesome tricks during battles.
It’s what I’m best at!
ch0012_00_corni_en.lsd.ch0012_00_corni/0601_0702_02_10:
If you ever want to see more of my
magnificent tricks, just challenge me
to a battle!
ch0012_00_corni_en.lsd.ch0012_00_corni/0602_0701_01_10:
I’m practicing my kicks and punches
to deepen my bonds with my
Fighting-type Pokémon!
ch0012_00_corni_en.lsd.ch0012_00_corni/0602_0701_02_10:
This allows me to give the best possible
instructions for their powerful moves in battle.
ch0012_00_corni_en.lsd.ch0012_00_corni/0602_0701_03_10:
My Pokémon are my life, so I want
to grow stronger along with them!
ch0012_00_corni_en.lsd.ch0012_00_corni/0602_0702_01_10:
What? You want to know how strong I am?
Well then...
ch0012_00_corni_en.lsd.ch0012_00_corni/0602_0702_02_10:
take a good look at my super special move!
Rolling axe-kick!
ch0012_00_corni_en.lsd.ch0012_00_corni/0602_0702_03_10:
That should give you a pretty good idea
of how strong I am!
ch0012_00_corni_en.lsd.ch0012_00_corni/0603_0701_01_10:
You know, Lucario and I have been two peas
in a pod ever since he was a Riolu.
ch0012_00_corni_en.lsd.ch0012_00_corni/0603_0701_02_10:
We’re more than friends. We’ve been
so close for so long that you could
even call us family.
ch0012_00_corni_en.lsd.ch0012_00_corni/0603_0701_03_10:
Lucario just has to be near me and
then I can sense how he’s feeling.
ch0012_00_corni_en.lsd.ch0012_00_corni/0603_0702_01_10:
Right now, for instance, I can sense
that he’s buzzing with excitement!
ch0012_00_corni_en.lsd.ch0012_00_corni/0603_0702_02_10:
I mean, the whole city’s bustling with
activity in the wake of the PML, after all!
ch0012_00_corni_en.lsd.ch0012_00_corni/0603_0702_03_10:
Lucario has been itching to participate in
the spectacle as well!
ch0012_00_corni_en.lsd.ch0012_00_corni/0604_0701_01_10:
Pokémon are just so mysterious and
fascinating and cute, aren’t they?!
ch0012_00_corni_en.lsd.ch0012_00_corni/0604_0701_02_10:
Of all the different Pokémon types, I’ve always
loved Fighting type the most.
ch0012_00_corni_en.lsd.ch0012_00_corni/0604_0701_03_10:
We train together each and every day
to become stronger! Isn’t that awesome?!
ch0012_00_corni_en.lsd.ch0012_00_corni/0604_0702_01_10:
I’m really excited to see all of the Pokémon
that will be appearing in the PML.
ch0012_00_corni_en.lsd.ch0012_00_corni/0604_0702_02_10:
All of the amazing, cute, powerful
Pokémon and their Trainers...
ch0012_00_corni_en.lsd.ch0012_00_corni/0604_0702_03_10: But I’m excited about us the most, of course!
ch0012_00_corni_en.lsd.ch0012_00_corni/0605_0701_01_10:
You have such an amazing bond with
your Pokémon, [Name:PlayerNickname ]!
Watching you two makes me smile.
ch0012_00_corni_en.lsd.ch0012_00_corni/0605_0701_02_10:
I mean, it’s plain to see how delighted your
Pokémon are by what you do!
ch0012_00_corni_en.lsd.ch0012_00_corni/0605_0701_03_10:
I can tell you’re very considerate of each other.
You’re always moving toward the same goal.
ch0012_00_corni_en.lsd.ch0012_00_corni/0605_0701_04_10:
I know that because Lucario and I
are the same way!
ch0012_00_corni_en.lsd.ch0012_00_corni/0605_0702_01_10:
When I see a Trainer and a Pokémon
with a really tight friendship...
ch0012_00_corni_en.lsd.ch0012_00_corni/0605_0702_02_10:
it always brings a smile to my face!
It really is amazing to witness!
ch0012_00_corni_en.lsd.ch0012_00_corni/2501_0701_01_10:
You know, this time I really want to
prove to myself that I can be stronger.
ch0012_00_corni_en.lsd.ch0012_00_corni/2501_0701_02_10:
Since becoming a Gym Leader, I’ve been
challenged to Pokémon battles by a ton of
different Trainers.
ch0012_00_corni_en.lsd.ch0012_00_corni/2501_0701_03_10:
But I want to be the one who makes the
challenges again.
ch0012_00_corni_en.lsd.ch0012_00_corni/2501_0701_04_10:
I want to prove that my Pokémon and I
can be number one.
ch0012_00_corni_en.lsd.ch0012_00_corni/2501_0702_01_10:
Trainers and Gym Leaders alike come
from all over the world to test their
strength at the PML.
ch0012_00_corni_en.lsd.ch0012_00_corni/2501_0702_02_10:
That’s the reason I don’t think my
challenge was a mistake.
ch0012_00_corni_en.lsd.ch0012_00_corni/2501_0702_03_10:
No matter how old you get or what your day
job is, every Trainer wants to master their skills
and be as strong as they can be!
ch0012_00_corni_en.lsd.ch0012_00_corni/2501_0702_04_10:
That’s why everyone puts so much effort
into the competition.
ch0012_00_corni_en.lsd.ch0012_00_corni/2511_0701_01_10:
Hey, do you think it’s possible to
climb to the top of the arena?
ch0012_00_corni_en.lsd.ch0012_00_corni/2511_0701_02_10:
I was just thinking about how nice it would be
to gaze up at the sky from a spot so high up.
ch0012_00_corni_en.lsd.ch0012_00_corni/2511_0701_03_10:
When I stare up at the sky, my heart feels light
as a feather... I feel like I can do anything.
It’s a really nice feeling.
ch0012_00_corni_en.lsd.ch0012_00_corni/2511_0702_01_10:
In my hometown, there’s this big tower called the
Tower of Mastery. Once, I climbed to the very
top to remind myself to keep chasing my dreams.
ch0012_00_corni_en.lsd.ch0012_00_corni/2511_0702_02_10:
You know, so I wouldn’t forget where I started.
When I first gazed up at the arena, I felt
that same feeling inside of me.
ch0012_00_corni_en.lsd.ch0012_00_corni/3001_0701_01_10:
Good morning!
Glad to be here!
ch0012_00_corni_en.lsd.ch0012_00_corni/3002_0701_01_10:
Hi! Good morning!
Start off the day with some cheerful greetings!
ch0012_00_corni_en.lsd.ch0012_00_corni/3004_0701_01_10:
Do you smell something tasty?
Or is it just my imagination?
ch0012_00_corni_en.lsd.ch0012_00_corni/3005_0701_01_10:
Good evening!
Roads at night are dangerous, so be careful!
ch0012_00_corni_en.lsd.ch0012_00_corni/3006_0701_01_10:
It’s night already.
Maybe I’ll gaze at the moon.

ch0013_00_hapu_en.lsd.ch0013_00_hapu/0101_0701_01_10:
Oh! Been a while, [Name:PlayerNickname ]!
You look different, like you’re ready
to go all out now!
ch0013_00_hapu_en.lsd.ch0013_00_hapu/0101_0701_02_10:
I wonder what grand adventures await us today!
Come, it’s time for some fun!
ch0013_00_hapu_en.lsd.ch0013_00_hapu/0601_0701_01_10:
You know, people speak in a most peculiar
fashion in this city! I noticed that on
other islands in Alola as well.
ch0013_00_hapu_en.lsd.ch0013_00_hapu/0601_0701_02_10:
My own venerable grandfather is the only one
I had to emulate growing up, so I am not
familiar with your hip, groovy slang.
ch0013_00_hapu_en.lsd.ch0013_00_hapu/0601_0701_04_10:
Well, either way, I have gotten used
to saying them now, and that’s not
likely to change.
ch0013_00_hapu_en.lsd.ch0013_00_hapu/0601_0702_01_10:
Ho! Well met, friend! Such fine weather
we’re having today, don’t you think?
Wait, no, GROOVY weather, huh?!
ch0013_00_hapu_en.lsd.ch0013_00_hapu/0601_0702_02_10:
*sigh* This is more difficult than I thought.
Perhaps big city slang and I were not
meant to mix!
ch0013_00_hapu_en.lsd.ch0013_00_hapu/0602_0701_01_10:
The bond I share with my Mudsdale is not
merely that of Trainer and Pokémon!
ch0013_00_hapu_en.lsd.ch0013_00_hapu/0602_0701_02_10:
He lets me ride on his back, of course, and
he carries heavy cargo. He lends us his
strength to plow the fields.
ch0013_00_hapu_en.lsd.ch0013_00_hapu/0602_0701_03_10:
The farm would never survive without
Mudsdale’s help! Shoot, life on the island
just wouldn’t be the same without him!
ch0013_00_hapu_en.lsd.ch0013_00_hapu/0602_0701_04_10:
My grandfather always used to say people and
Pokémon were made to help one another—
I really feel the truth of those words now!
ch0013_00_hapu_en.lsd.ch0013_00_hapu/0602_0702_01_10:
There are some hurdles I can’t jump over alone,
but together, my Mudsdale and I can overcome
them all!
ch0013_00_hapu_en.lsd.ch0013_00_hapu/0602_0702_02_10:
And before we know it, we are covered from
head to toe in mud! Two peas in a pod, we are!
ch0013_00_hapu_en.lsd.ch0013_00_hapu/0603_0701_01_10:
There was this one time, before I
was the Island Kahuna...
ch0013_00_hapu_en.lsd.ch0013_00_hapu/0603_0701_02_10:
I was taking a stroll along the beach when I felt
an odd squishy sensation under my toes—
I had accidentally stepped on a Gastrodon!
ch0013_00_hapu_en.lsd.ch0013_00_hapu/0603_0701_03_10:
Some purple liquid was oozing out of it,
so I leaned down to see if it was hurt—and
it started healing itself right before my eyes!
ch0013_00_hapu_en.lsd.ch0013_00_hapu/0603_0702_01_10:
The heartiness of that little Gastrodon
was truly a sight to behold, I tell you!
ch0013_00_hapu_en.lsd.ch0013_00_hapu/0603_0702_02_10:
The texture of its gooey body and its cry
were so...edgy. Ahh, I’d love to
see one again.
ch0013_00_hapu_en.lsd.ch0013_00_hapu/0604_0701_01_10:
Before I was chosen to be an island kahuna,
I journeyed throughout Alola to prove my worth
to the guardian deity, Tapu Fini.
ch0013_00_hapu_en.lsd.ch0013_00_hapu/0604_0701_02_10:
And that got me thinking, what if I extend my
journey beyond the Alolan islands?
Around the world!
ch0013_00_hapu_en.lsd.ch0013_00_hapu/0604_0701_03_10:
That is how I came to participate in
the PML here on Pasio.
ch0013_00_hapu_en.lsd.ch0013_00_hapu/0604_0702_01_10:
I wonder how my grandmother and the others
are getting on back in Alola.
ch0013_00_hapu_en.lsd.ch0013_00_hapu/0604_0702_02_10:
I will have a thousand stories to share
with them when I return home!
ch0013_00_hapu_en.lsd.ch0013_00_hapu/0605_0701_01_10:
You are a truly devoted Trainer,
[Name:PlayerNickname ]! There’s never a dull
moment when you’re around.
ch0013_00_hapu_en.lsd.ch0013_00_hapu/0605_0701_02_10:
Sometimes, when we’re together, I feel as
though a hidden power deep inside
of me is awakening!
ch0013_00_hapu_en.lsd.ch0013_00_hapu/0605_0701_03_10:
Hmm! Hapu’s hidden power.
Anything could Hapun!
ch0013_00_hapu_en.lsd.ch0013_00_hapu/0605_0701_04_10:
Hmph! On second thought, forget what I
just said! It was not as punny as I thought.
ch0013_00_hapu_en.lsd.ch0013_00_hapu/0605_0701_05_10:
It’ll be our little secret! 
Promise you won’t tell a soul!
ch0013_00_hapu_en.lsd.ch0013_00_hapu/0605_0702_01_10:
Good puns have a way of sticking into
your memory like glue.
ch0013_00_hapu_en.lsd.ch0013_00_hapu/0605_0702_02_10:
If you ever come up with a good one,
do share it with me!
ch0013_00_hapu_en.lsd.ch0013_00_hapu/1701_0701_01_10:
Oh! You came at just the right time.
I was just thinking of giving you this!
ch0013_00_hapu_en.lsd.ch0013_00_hapu/1701_0701_02_10:
Whenever I go out on strolls, I tend to
pick up new ideas and occasionally
some knickknacks!
ch0013_00_hapu_en.lsd.ch0013_00_hapu/1701_0702_01_10:
Here, don’t be shy!
This is my way of saying thank you.
ch0013_00_hapu_en.lsd.ch0013_00_hapu/2501_0701_01_10:
You never fail to surprise me when it comes
to Pokémon battling.
ch0013_00_hapu_en.lsd.ch0013_00_hapu/2501_0701_02_10:
However, you are still but a rough-hewn stone.
As an island kahuna, I feel it is my duty
to guide you and polish you to greatness!
ch0013_00_hapu_en.lsd.ch0013_00_hapu/2501_0701_03_10: What? Oh, I meant no offense, friend!
ch0013_00_hapu_en.lsd.ch0013_00_hapu/2501_0701_04_10:
There is still much for me to learn
on my own journey as well!
We shall learn and grow together!
ch0013_00_hapu_en.lsd.ch0013_00_hapu/2501_0702_01_10:
There is so much that we can still learn.
The world is an open book!
ch0013_00_hapu_en.lsd.ch0013_00_hapu/2501_0702_02_10: The more you learn, the more you grow!
ch0013_00_hapu_en.lsd.ch0013_00_hapu/2511_0701_01_10:
Hmm. There is still so much I do not
know about this place.
ch0013_00_hapu_en.lsd.ch0013_00_hapu/2511_0701_02_10:
I did not come here for sightseeing,
but journeying around the world like this
is a remarkable experience, indeed!
ch0013_00_hapu_en.lsd.ch0013_00_hapu/2511_0701_03_10:
Are you familiar with this area?
It would be grand if you could show
me around sometime.
ch0013_00_hapu_en.lsd.ch0013_00_hapu/2511_0702_01_10:
I want to go back to my grandmother and
the rest of the family with plenty of
stories to tell!
ch0013_00_hapu_en.lsd.ch0013_00_hapu/2511_0702_02_10:
If you happen across any extraordinary
tidbits, be sure to let me know!
ch0013_00_hapu_en.lsd.ch0013_00_hapu/2511_0702_03_10:
My trust in your recommendations
is absolute!
ch0013_00_hapu_en.lsd.ch0013_00_hapu/3001_0701_01_10:
Ah, you’re awake!
Having to tend to the fields every morning
has made me an early riser.
ch0013_00_hapu_en.lsd.ch0013_00_hapu/3002_0701_01_10:
It is good to wake up early!
You should make the most of the time you have!
ch0013_00_hapu_en.lsd.ch0013_00_hapu/3003_0701_01_10:
Good afternoon, friend!
Now is the time to relax and take a stroll.
ch0013_00_hapu_en.lsd.ch0013_00_hapu/3004_0701_01_10:
Alola!
This is how we greet people in my hometown.
ch0013_00_hapu_en.lsd.ch0013_00_hapu/3005_0701_01_10:
On the island, things get quite sleepy
once the sun goes down. But I think I
can hold out a little longer today!
ch0013_00_hapu_en.lsd.ch0013_00_hapu/3006_0701_01_10:
Good evening! I have heard that at night
the city never sleeps! But I am sleepy!

ch0014_01_cheren_en.lsd.ch0014_01_cheren/0101_0701_01_10:
Ah, [Name:PlayerNickname ]!
Late for class again, I see. Wait, that’s not
right. Sorry, force of habit! Good to see you!
ch0014_01_cheren_en.lsd.ch0014_01_cheren/0101_0701_02_10:
I’ve been studying every day in hopes of
being able to support you better in battle.
ch0014_01_cheren_en.lsd.ch0014_01_cheren/0601_0701_01_10: My Pokémon Stoutland, Cinccino, and Watchog...
ch0014_01_cheren_en.lsd.ch0014_01_cheren/0601_0701_02_10:
are all fans of being groomed and
getting massages.
ch0014_01_cheren_en.lsd.ch0014_01_cheren/0601_0701_03_10:
They’re always happy to get a nice massage
right after a tough battle.
ch0014_01_cheren_en.lsd.ch0014_01_cheren/0601_0702_01_10:
Rewarding your hardworking Pokémon and
looking after their well-being is...
ch0014_01_cheren_en.lsd.ch0014_01_cheren/0601_0702_02_10:
one of the most important jobs we have
as Trainers.
ch0014_01_cheren_en.lsd.ch0014_01_cheren/0602_0701_01_10:
After I became a Gym Leader, the Lillipup
I’d raised as my partner evolved into
a Stoutland.
ch0014_01_cheren_en.lsd.ch0014_01_cheren/0602_0701_02_10: I haven’t been a Gym Leader for very long yet...
ch0014_01_cheren_en.lsd.ch0014_01_cheren/0602_0701_03_10:
but I will say this: the trust and friendship
that I’ve built up with Stoutland is
second to none.
ch0014_01_cheren_en.lsd.ch0014_01_cheren/0602_0701_04_10:
Stoutland is the ace of my team,
and I depend on him a lot. I’d love to
show you how strong he is sometime.
ch0014_01_cheren_en.lsd.ch0014_01_cheren/0602_0702_01_10:
The key to bringing out a Pokémon’s full
strength is getting to know it inside and out.
ch0014_01_cheren_en.lsd.ch0014_01_cheren/0602_0702_02_10:
I did a ton of studying with my Stoutland
here, at first.
ch0014_01_cheren_en.lsd.ch0014_01_cheren/0602_0702_03_10:
And not just reading books, mind you.
A lot of it was observation. It’s important to
learn what sort of personality your Pokémon has.
ch0014_01_cheren_en.lsd.ch0014_01_cheren/0603_0701_01_10:
My job at the Trainers’ School is to teach
young Trainers all about Pokémon.
ch0014_01_cheren_en.lsd.ch0014_01_cheren/0603_0701_02_10:
There are many different methods out there
for improving your strength as a Trainer...
ch0014_01_cheren_en.lsd.ch0014_01_cheren/0603_0701_03_10:
but in my experience, hands-on learning with
Pokémon through battling is a surefire way
to get stronger.
ch0014_01_cheren_en.lsd.ch0014_01_cheren/0603_0702_01_10:
I may be on the teaching end of the classroom
at the Trainers’ School, but often I’m learning
just as much as I’m teaching.
ch0014_01_cheren_en.lsd.ch0014_01_cheren/0603_0702_02_10:
Sometimes beginner Trainers who aren’t
used to being around Pokémon help me discover
things I never would have noticed otherwise.
ch0014_01_cheren_en.lsd.ch0014_01_cheren/0604_0701_01_10:
You know, I did a fair bit of research on
Pasio a while back.
ch0014_01_cheren_en.lsd.ch0014_01_cheren/0604_0701_02_10:
I suppose it should be obvious, but
photos really don’t do justice to the
scale of this place at all.
ch0014_01_cheren_en.lsd.ch0014_01_cheren/0604_0701_03_10:
It’s not enough to just read and study. You’ve
got to go out and experience the world
with your own two eyes.
ch0014_01_cheren_en.lsd.ch0014_01_cheren/0604_0702_01_10:
That reminds me—I have a friend who wants to
go do some sight-seeing. I think I might
follow along.
ch0014_01_cheren_en.lsd.ch0014_01_cheren/0604_0702_02_10:
Funny thing is, up until recently, I don’t think
I would have said that. The old me couldn’t
be bothered.
ch0014_01_cheren_en.lsd.ch0014_01_cheren/0605_0701_01_10:
Hey, [Name:PlayerNickname ].
If you ever get a chance to visit the
Unova region, you should come visit my Gym.
ch0014_01_cheren_en.lsd.ch0014_01_cheren/0605_0701_02_10:
I’d love to introduce you to the Trainers there,
as well as my students at the Trainers’ School.
ch0014_01_cheren_en.lsd.ch0014_01_cheren/0605_0701_03_10:
I’m sure they’d get a kick out of hearing
all about our adventures here on Pasio.
ch0014_01_cheren_en.lsd.ch0014_01_cheren/0605_0702_01_10:
With your skills, [Name:PlayerNickname ],
I’m sure you could make a career for yourself
as a Trainer anywhere you go.
ch0014_01_cheren_en.lsd.ch0014_01_cheren/0605_0702_02_10:
I’m not just saying that, either.
I believe it.
ch0014_01_cheren_en.lsd.ch0014_01_cheren/0605_0702_03_10:
I want to battle you out in the world—not
just with my Stoutland here but with the
Pokémon I meet along the road.
ch0014_01_cheren_en.lsd.ch0014_01_cheren/1701_0701_01_10:
Nice timing!
Could you hang on a second?
ch0014_01_cheren_en.lsd.ch0014_01_cheren/1701_0701_02_10:
I wanted to give this to you!
I thought it seemed rather useful.
Hope it comes in handy.
ch0014_01_cheren_en.lsd.ch0014_01_cheren/1701_0702_01_10:
If I come across anything else that seems
useful, I’ll make sure I pass it along to you.
ch0014_01_cheren_en.lsd.ch0014_01_cheren/2501_0701_01_10:
Hmm. I wonder what kind of battle strategies
we could utilize with your Pokémon and mine.
ch0014_01_cheren_en.lsd.ch0014_01_cheren/2501_0701_02_10:
Oops, sorry about that.
Sometimes I get lost in my thoughts.
ch0014_01_cheren_en.lsd.ch0014_01_cheren/2501_0701_03_10:
Being both a Gym Leader and a teacher,
I tend to have a lot on my mind
at any given time.
ch0014_01_cheren_en.lsd.ch0014_01_cheren/2501_0702_01_10:
You know, I’ve always preferred to pause and
give things a lot of thought.
ch0014_01_cheren_en.lsd.ch0014_01_cheren/2501_0702_02_10:
If you brainstorm your battle strategies
beforehand, you’ll be able to quickly adapt
to any obstacle you face later on.
ch0014_01_cheren_en.lsd.ch0014_01_cheren/2501_0702_03_10:
However, just because that method works for
me doesn’t necessarily mean it’s best for you.
ch0014_01_cheren_en.lsd.ch0014_01_cheren/2501_0702_04_10:
Everyone should be free to seek out
whatever battle methods work best for them.
ch0014_01_cheren_en.lsd.ch0014_01_cheren/2511_0701_01_10:
It’s exciting to think about what the future
holds for you and the Pokémon you’ll
meet on your path as a Trainer.
ch0014_01_cheren_en.lsd.ch0014_01_cheren/2511_0701_02_10:
There are so many diverse people to meet here
around every corner, each with their own
unique thoughts and feelings.
ch0014_01_cheren_en.lsd.ch0014_01_cheren/2511_0701_03_10:
I mean, I came all this way because I wanted
to have those same experiences as well.
ch0014_01_cheren_en.lsd.ch0014_01_cheren/2511_0702_01_10:
I’ve gone through a lot to get where I am today,
both good and bad.
ch0014_01_cheren_en.lsd.ch0014_01_cheren/2511_0702_02_10:
But honestly, going off on my own as a Trainer
and traveling throughout the Unova region
was the best thing that ever happened to me.
ch0014_01_cheren_en.lsd.ch0014_01_cheren/2511_0702_03_10:
I hope that one day you feel the same about
the experiences you’re having right here
and right now.
ch0014_01_cheren_en.lsd.ch0014_01_cheren/3001_0701_01_10:
Morning! Did you get plenty of rest last night?
We’re gonna need our energy today.
ch0014_01_cheren_en.lsd.ch0014_01_cheren/3002_0701_01_10:
Morning! There are only so many hours in a day.
You should set up a game plan!
ch0014_01_cheren_en.lsd.ch0014_01_cheren/3003_0701_01_10:
Afternoon! It’s the perfect time for studying.
You should take advantage of it!
ch0014_01_cheren_en.lsd.ch0014_01_cheren/3004_0701_01_10:
Afternoon! Now’s the perfect time to go out
and do something fun!
ch0014_01_cheren_en.lsd.ch0014_01_cheren/3005_0701_01_10:
Evening! Anything left on your to-do list?
The day’s almost over.
ch0014_01_cheren_en.lsd.ch0014_01_cheren/3006_0701_01_10:
Evening! It’s pretty dark outside, so we should be
careful if we’re heading out.

ch0015_00_takeshi_en.lsd.ch0015_00_takeshi/0101_0701_01_10:
There you are, [Name:PlayerNickname ].
Are you ready for a Pokémon battle?
ch0015_00_takeshi_en.lsd.ch0015_00_takeshi/0101_0701_02_10:
As long as you have the will to win,
you’ll be fine! Let’s make it another great day!
ch0015_00_takeshi_en.lsd.ch0015_00_takeshi/0601_0701_01_10:
Other than being a Gym Leader in Kanto,
I also help on fossil excavations.
ch0015_00_takeshi_en.lsd.ch0015_00_takeshi/0601_0701_02_10:
I become more familiar with all sorts of regions
by digging in the earth and mountains.
ch0015_00_takeshi_en.lsd.ch0015_00_takeshi/0601_0701_03_10:
I wonder what kind of Pokémon there were a
long time ago. What kind of geography was it?
ch0015_00_takeshi_en.lsd.ch0015_00_takeshi/0601_0701_04_10:
Whenever I think about ages that we don’t know
about, I can’t help but get really excited.
ch0015_00_takeshi_en.lsd.ch0015_00_takeshi/0601_0702_01_10:
If you ever come to Pewter City in Kanto,
come visit my Gym.
ch0015_00_takeshi_en.lsd.ch0015_00_takeshi/0601_0702_02_10:
I’ll show you around the Gym—and the museum
we have nearby, too!
ch0015_00_takeshi_en.lsd.ch0015_00_takeshi/0601_0702_03_10:
If you have any interest in old Pokémon fossils,
I can’t recommend it enough.
ch0015_00_takeshi_en.lsd.ch0015_00_takeshi/0602_0701_01_10: My Onix is my best partner.
ch0015_00_takeshi_en.lsd.ch0015_00_takeshi/0602_0701_02_10:
He specializes in withstanding any attack and
dishing out a powerful counterattack.
ch0015_00_takeshi_en.lsd.ch0015_00_takeshi/0602_0701_03_10: He just fits with how I do battles as well.
ch0015_00_takeshi_en.lsd.ch0015_00_takeshi/0602_0701_04_10:
There aren’t too many Pokémon that can stand
after getting counterattacked by Onix!
ch0015_00_takeshi_en.lsd.ch0015_00_takeshi/0602_0702_01_10: Onix can get around by digging into the ground.
ch0015_00_takeshi_en.lsd.ch0015_00_takeshi/0602_0702_02_10:
He’s big and heavy, but you’d be surprised at
how nimble he is.
ch0015_00_takeshi_en.lsd.ch0015_00_takeshi/0603_0701_01_10:
I’ve been going to the mountains 
and the ruins on Pasio.
ch0015_00_takeshi_en.lsd.ch0015_00_takeshi/0603_0701_02_10: Of course, I’m participating in the PML as well.
ch0015_00_takeshi_en.lsd.ch0015_00_takeshi/0603_0701_03_10:
But as long as I’m here, I might as well enjoy
myself, right?
ch0015_00_takeshi_en.lsd.ch0015_00_takeshi/0603_0701_04_10: Don’t get me wrong, I’m not slacking off!
ch0015_00_takeshi_en.lsd.ch0015_00_takeshi/0603_0702_01_10:
The Trainers that gathered here are 
from all over the world and know 
all sorts of geography, history, and Pokémon.
ch0015_00_takeshi_en.lsd.ch0015_00_takeshi/0603_0702_02_10:
It’s great that I not only get to battle them
but also get to talk to them.
ch0015_00_takeshi_en.lsd.ch0015_00_takeshi/0603_0702_03_10:
Not to mention, I’ll have stories to take back
to Kanto.
ch0015_00_takeshi_en.lsd.ch0015_00_takeshi/0604_0701_01_10:
Pokémon battles are the hardest 
for the Pokémon themselves.
ch0015_00_takeshi_en.lsd.ch0015_00_takeshi/0604_0701_02_10:
That’s why I train as much as my Pokémon—
so that I can empathize with their hardships.
ch0015_00_takeshi_en.lsd.ch0015_00_takeshi/0604_0701_03_10:
How tough it must be to take that kind
of damage... If I could experience it with them,
victory would be that much more satisfying.
ch0015_00_takeshi_en.lsd.ch0015_00_takeshi/0604_0702_01_10:
Pokémon support their Trainers 
by using their powers.
ch0015_00_takeshi_en.lsd.ch0015_00_takeshi/0604_0702_02_10:
That’s why I wanted to be able to support my
Pokémon as well!
ch0015_00_takeshi_en.lsd.ch0015_00_takeshi/0604_0702_03_10: And as I trained, I became a lot stronger.
ch0015_00_takeshi_en.lsd.ch0015_00_takeshi/0604_0702_04_10: Now, I can run with a Geodude on my back.
ch0015_00_takeshi_en.lsd.ch0015_00_takeshi/0605_0701_01_10:
I wonder what kind of Trainer you will become,
[Name:PlayerNickname ].
ch0015_00_takeshi_en.lsd.ch0015_00_takeshi/0605_0701_02_10:
As a Gym Leader, I’ve seen 
a lot of different Trainers.
ch0015_00_takeshi_en.lsd.ch0015_00_takeshi/0605_0701_03_10:
But all of the Trainers that were able to beat me
had a glint in their eye.
ch0015_00_takeshi_en.lsd.ch0015_00_takeshi/0605_0701_04_10:
No matter how strong you become, I want you
to remember what it was like when you began
and enjoy Pokémon battles in the same way.
ch0015_00_takeshi_en.lsd.ch0015_00_takeshi/0605_0702_01_10: Even the strongest Trainer was a beginner once.
ch0015_00_takeshi_en.lsd.ch0015_00_takeshi/0605_0702_02_10:
You don’t have to hold anything back.
Find Trainers more experienced than you,
and challenge them to Pokémon battles!
ch0015_00_takeshi_en.lsd.ch0015_00_takeshi/1701_0701_01_10:
Hey, perfect timing! There was something I
wanted to give you.
ch0015_00_takeshi_en.lsd.ch0015_00_takeshi/1701_0701_02_10:
You’re always going all over the place, so I
hope this will be useful to you.
ch0015_00_takeshi_en.lsd.ch0015_00_takeshi/1701_0702_01_10:
I find a lot of items like this when I’m taking
a walk on the mountain.
ch0015_00_takeshi_en.lsd.ch0015_00_takeshi/1701_0702_02_10:
It would be bad if it affected Pokémon, so I
end up picking it up.
ch0015_00_takeshi_en.lsd.ch0015_00_takeshi/2501_0701_01_10: I’ve fought a lot of Trainers up until now.
ch0015_00_takeshi_en.lsd.ch0015_00_takeshi/2501_0701_02_10:
So, believe me when I say that 
you are an excellent Trainer.
ch0015_00_takeshi_en.lsd.ch0015_00_takeshi/2501_0701_03_10:
You can hold your head high 
and take on more battles!
ch0015_00_takeshi_en.lsd.ch0015_00_takeshi/2501_0702_01_10:
You need a strong will for battles. 
Wanting to win, wanting to not lose—
that willpower will lead you to victory.
ch0015_00_takeshi_en.lsd.ch0015_00_takeshi/2501_0702_02_10:
So believe in yourself. Believe that you’re an
amazing Trainer.
ch0015_00_takeshi_en.lsd.ch0015_00_takeshi/2501_0702_03_10:
Believing in yourself with a rock-hard will—
that is the secret to winning!
ch0015_00_takeshi_en.lsd.ch0015_00_takeshi/2511_0701_01_10:
You’re becoming stronger than 
I could have imagined. It’s like 
I found a diamond in the rough!
ch0015_00_takeshi_en.lsd.ch0015_00_takeshi/2511_0701_02_10:
Don’t worry—that’s a compliment. I’m just saying
that it’s like finding an unexpected gem.
ch0015_00_takeshi_en.lsd.ch0015_00_takeshi/2511_0701_03_10:
In other words, it’s rare to see a Trainer as
good as you are!
ch0015_00_takeshi_en.lsd.ch0015_00_takeshi/2511_0702_01_10:
One of these days, I want to have a serious
battle with you.
ch0015_00_takeshi_en.lsd.ch0015_00_takeshi/2511_0702_02_10:
Battling a rare gem like you would probably be
a lot more intense than I can imagine!
ch0015_00_takeshi_en.lsd.ch0015_00_takeshi/2511_0702_03_10:
I can already hear the sound 
of our clashing wills!
ch0015_00_takeshi_en.lsd.ch0015_00_takeshi/3001_0701_01_10:
Morning! The day’s just begun.
Let’s plan out what we wanna do.
ch0015_00_takeshi_en.lsd.ch0015_00_takeshi/3002_0701_01_10:
Phew! I just got back from my morning
warm-up on top of a boulder.
ch0015_00_takeshi_en.lsd.ch0015_00_takeshi/3003_0701_01_10:
Hey there! The weather’s perfect for collecting
rocks, don’t you think?
ch0015_00_takeshi_en.lsd.ch0015_00_takeshi/3004_0701_01_10:
It can be tempting to loaf around in the
afternoon, but keeping your day balanced
is the key to growing stronger!
ch0015_00_takeshi_en.lsd.ch0015_00_takeshi/3005_0701_01_10:
Wait, you’re heading out this late?
Don’t overdo it, all right?
Save some energy for tomorrow!
ch0015_00_takeshi_en.lsd.ch0015_00_takeshi/3006_0701_01_10:
Evening! Do you have some stuff you still need
to get done? I’m happy to help out if I can.

ch0015_01_takeshi_en.lsd.ch0015_01_takeshi/0101_0701_01_10:
Hey there, [Name:PlayerNickname ]!
You’re in high spirits today, too, huh?
ch0015_01_takeshi_en.lsd.ch0015_01_takeshi/0101_0701_02_10: All right! I have to get stronger, too!
ch0015_01_takeshi_en.lsd.ch0015_01_takeshi/0601_0701_01_10:
Some designer gave me this outfit 
when I came here.
ch0015_01_takeshi_en.lsd.ch0015_01_takeshi/0601_0701_02_10:
I usually don’t have too much of a preference 
with clothes...
ch0015_01_takeshi_en.lsd.ch0015_01_takeshi/0601_0701_03_10:
But I feel like this outfit helps me focus and
makes it easier to battle. Maybe that’s just
proof that I like it.
ch0015_01_takeshi_en.lsd.ch0015_01_takeshi/0601_0702_01_10: This outfit will be perfect for serious battles.
ch0015_01_takeshi_en.lsd.ch0015_01_takeshi/0601_0702_02_10:
Especially if I’m going to battle 
a strong Trainer like you.
ch0015_01_takeshi_en.lsd.ch0015_01_takeshi/0602_0701_01_10:
I usually let my Tyranitar go wild in
important battles.
ch0015_01_takeshi_en.lsd.ch0015_01_takeshi/0602_0701_02_10:
He has high defense, like I prefer—and raw
strength for awesome attacks, too.
ch0015_01_takeshi_en.lsd.ch0015_01_takeshi/0602_0701_03_10: Tyranitar is the best of both worlds!
ch0015_01_takeshi_en.lsd.ch0015_01_takeshi/0602_0701_04_10:
If we ever have the chance of battling together,
I’ll show you Tyranitar’s power.
ch0015_01_takeshi_en.lsd.ch0015_01_takeshi/0602_0702_01_10:
Each Pokémon has things 
they’re good at and bad at.
ch0015_01_takeshi_en.lsd.ch0015_01_takeshi/0602_0702_02_10:
It’s the Trainer’s job to identify them and use
their strengths well.
ch0015_01_takeshi_en.lsd.ch0015_01_takeshi/0603_0701_01_10:
If you’re tired from a battle, it’s important to
take breaks.
ch0015_01_takeshi_en.lsd.ch0015_01_takeshi/0603_0701_02_10:
If you want to get stronger, it’s crucial to not
exhaust yourself.
ch0015_01_takeshi_en.lsd.ch0015_01_takeshi/0603_0701_03_10:
Good Trainers are very good at resting up.
Always keep that in mind, too.
ch0015_01_takeshi_en.lsd.ch0015_01_takeshi/0603_0702_01_10: I make sure to take ample breaks, too.
ch0015_01_takeshi_en.lsd.ch0015_01_takeshi/0603_0702_02_10:
It might be mundane, but it refreshes you
like after a good night’s sleep.
ch0015_01_takeshi_en.lsd.ch0015_01_takeshi/0604_0701_01_10:
Tyranitar and Onix have completely different
fighting styles.
ch0015_01_takeshi_en.lsd.ch0015_01_takeshi/0604_0701_02_10:
It’s still a work in progress, but I think it’s
fun to try to fine-tune your strategies with
your Pokémon.
ch0015_01_takeshi_en.lsd.ch0015_01_takeshi/0604_0701_03_10:
The more you know about your Pokémon,
the stronger you’ll be, after all.
ch0015_01_takeshi_en.lsd.ch0015_01_takeshi/0604_0702_02_10:
But when it comes to battle, I can trust that 
he’ll go berserk on the opponent.
ch0015_01_takeshi_en.lsd.ch0015_01_takeshi/0604_0702_03_10:
It makes me glad when I see him battle 
as much as he likes.
ch0015_01_takeshi_en.lsd.ch0015_01_takeshi/0605_0701_01_10:
If you ever find yourself in battle, don’t
hesitate to call me.
ch0015_01_takeshi_en.lsd.ch0015_01_takeshi/0605_0701_02_10:
I’m starved for battle right now.
I want to have one as soon as possible!
ch0015_01_takeshi_en.lsd.ch0015_01_takeshi/0605_0701_03_10:
Maybe it’s because of my new outfit, but I am
really feeling motivated.
ch0015_01_takeshi_en.lsd.ch0015_01_takeshi/0605_0702_01_10:
Don’t you ever feel more motivated when you
wear new or different clothes?
ch0015_01_takeshi_en.lsd.ch0015_01_takeshi/0605_0702_02_10: I guess it’s true that the clothes make the man.
ch0015_01_takeshi_en.lsd.ch0015_01_takeshi/1701_0701_01_10: Good timing! Here, you can have this.
ch0015_01_takeshi_en.lsd.ch0015_01_takeshi/1701_0701_02_10:
It should be handy. 
I hope you put it to good use!
ch0015_01_takeshi_en.lsd.ch0015_01_takeshi/1701_0702_01_10:
If I find anything else I can give you, 
I’ll let you know.
ch0015_01_takeshi_en.lsd.ch0015_01_takeshi/2501_0701_01_10:
Defending well means less damage 
to what you’re protecting.
ch0015_01_takeshi_en.lsd.ch0015_01_takeshi/2501_0701_02_10:
Whether it’s for yourself or your friends, good
defense is the strength needed for victory!
ch0015_01_takeshi_en.lsd.ch0015_01_takeshi/2501_0701_03_10: That’s why I pride myself on how sturdy I am.
ch0015_01_takeshi_en.lsd.ch0015_01_takeshi/2501_0702_01_10:
All the Pokémon with me are the same way.
They are proud of their sturdiness, too.
ch0015_01_takeshi_en.lsd.ch0015_01_takeshi/2501_0702_02_10:
Trainers and their Pokémon work together to
reach a goal. That’s what Pokémon battles are.
ch0015_01_takeshi_en.lsd.ch0015_01_takeshi/2511_0701_01_10:
You’ve become a lot stronger 
than when we first met.
ch0015_01_takeshi_en.lsd.ch0015_01_takeshi/2511_0701_02_10: I saw it firsthand. There’s no mistake about it.
ch0015_01_takeshi_en.lsd.ch0015_01_takeshi/2511_0701_03_10:
Get even stronger and challenge me again!
When the time comes, I’ll battle you with
everything I have!
ch0015_01_takeshi_en.lsd.ch0015_01_takeshi/2511_0702_01_10: Battle more Trainers, and gain more experience.
ch0015_01_takeshi_en.lsd.ch0015_01_takeshi/2511_0702_02_10:
There are a lot of strong Trainers here, so you
should be able to grow much stronger.
ch0015_01_takeshi_en.lsd.ch0015_01_takeshi/2511_0702_03_10: Of course, you can count on me, too.
ch0015_01_takeshi_en.lsd.ch0015_01_takeshi/3001_0701_01_10:
Good morning!
Do you have any plans for the day?
If you don’t, it’s never too late to think of some.
ch0015_01_takeshi_en.lsd.ch0015_01_takeshi/3002_0701_01_10:
Morning! I am pumped up today!
Let’s give it our best shot out there, as always!
ch0015_01_takeshi_en.lsd.ch0015_01_takeshi/3003_0701_01_10:
I was just about to find some Pokémon battles!
Get ready—you’re coming with!
ch0015_01_takeshi_en.lsd.ch0015_01_takeshi/3004_0701_01_10:
I always make sure I get a good meal or two
in during the day. If not, my body feels slow
and weak!
ch0015_01_takeshi_en.lsd.ch0015_01_takeshi/3005_0701_01_10:
You’re heading out now?
Make sure you don’t stay up too late.
ch0015_01_takeshi_en.lsd.ch0015_01_takeshi/3006_0701_01_10:
Oh, hey there. You still awake, too?
The sky is pretty gorgeous tonight.
You should go check it out!

ch0016_00_huuro_en.lsd.ch0016_00_huuro/0101_0701_01_10:
[Name:PlayerNickname ]!
I’m so happy to see you!
ch0016_00_huuro_en.lsd.ch0016_00_huuro/0101_0701_02_10:
I’m looking forward to another day of fun
with you!
ch0016_00_huuro_en.lsd.ch0016_00_huuro/0601_0701_01_10:
I asked my Swoobat and Unfezant to take care
of the Gym while I’m away.
ch0016_00_huuro_en.lsd.ch0016_00_huuro/0601_0701_02_10:
I hope they’re not getting into any trouble.
I’m a little worried about them...
ch0016_00_huuro_en.lsd.ch0016_00_huuro/0601_0701_03_10:
Hmmm, maybe I should head home for a bit
to check on them.
ch0016_00_huuro_en.lsd.ch0016_00_huuro/0601_0701_04_10:
Yeah right! There’s still so much I want to do
on Pasio—there’s no way I’m heading home yet!
ch0016_00_huuro_en.lsd.ch0016_00_huuro/0601_0702_01_10:
It’s not just Pokémon taking care of the Gym.
There are a bunch of Trainers there, too.
ch0016_00_huuro_en.lsd.ch0016_00_huuro/0601_0702_02_10: They should be fine if I’m away a while longer.
ch0016_00_huuro_en.lsd.ch0016_00_huuro/0601_0702_03_10:
Ooh, but I should make sure I check in often.
I don’t want them to miss me too much!
ch0016_00_huuro_en.lsd.ch0016_00_huuro/0602_0701_01_10:
My Swanna can really move when she battles,
so I can always count on her.
ch0016_00_huuro_en.lsd.ch0016_00_huuro/0602_0701_02_10:
She’s normally calm, though, and likes
to stay neat and looking her best.
ch0016_00_huuro_en.lsd.ch0016_00_huuro/0602_0701_03_10:
That’s why I always have to keep a brush just
for Swanna with me.
ch0016_00_huuro_en.lsd.ch0016_00_huuro/0602_0702_01_10:
Swanna really loves showing off her bright
white wings!
ch0016_00_huuro_en.lsd.ch0016_00_huuro/0602_0702_02_10:
It really brought her down when they got dirty
in battle, so I cleaned her up right away!
ch0016_00_huuro_en.lsd.ch0016_00_huuro/0603_0701_01_10:
At my Mistralton City Gym, we send Trainers
flying with cannons and fans.
ch0016_00_huuro_en.lsd.ch0016_00_huuro/0603_0701_02_10:
Doesn’t that sound like a superfun thrill? 
I thought it was a brilliant idea, 
if I do say so myself.
ch0016_00_huuro_en.lsd.ch0016_00_huuro/0603_0701_03_10:
But it seems like a lot of Trainers get worn out
before they can get all the way to me.
ch0016_00_huuro_en.lsd.ch0016_00_huuro/0603_0702_01_10:
You seem tough enough to not be bothered at all
if you were sent flying.
ch0016_00_huuro_en.lsd.ch0016_00_huuro/0603_0702_02_10:
If you’re interested, you should come 
take a shot at my Gym.
ch0016_00_huuro_en.lsd.ch0016_00_huuro/0604_0701_01_10: Isn’t my hair tie cute? I love it!
ch0016_00_huuro_en.lsd.ch0016_00_huuro/0604_0701_02_10:
It’s really well designed, too. It’s easy to gather
my hair up and keep it in place.
ch0016_00_huuro_en.lsd.ch0016_00_huuro/0604_0701_03_10:
Even when the wind is strong, it doesn’t get
blown away or come loose or anything.
ch0016_00_huuro_en.lsd.ch0016_00_huuro/0604_0702_01_10:
When you’re flying into the wind, your glasses
will fly away in a heartbeat.
ch0016_00_huuro_en.lsd.ch0016_00_huuro/0604_0702_02_10:
You have to secure all your personal items when
you go flying!
ch0016_00_huuro_en.lsd.ch0016_00_huuro/0605_0701_01_10: Some places would take forever to walk to.
ch0016_00_huuro_en.lsd.ch0016_00_huuro/0605_0701_02_10: But you can fly to them right away in a plane!
ch0016_00_huuro_en.lsd.ch0016_00_huuro/0605_0701_03_10: It feels great to fly over mountains and forests.
ch0016_00_huuro_en.lsd.ch0016_00_huuro/0605_0701_04_10:
[Name:PlayerNickname ], you should come
take a trip through the skies with me!
ch0016_00_huuro_en.lsd.ch0016_00_huuro/0605_0702_01_10:
Flying into the wind or way up above the clouds
is so much fun.
ch0016_00_huuro_en.lsd.ch0016_00_huuro/0605_0702_02_10:
And when you’ve got some Pokémon that can fly
with you, it’s even more fun!
ch0016_00_huuro_en.lsd.ch0016_00_huuro/1701_0701_01_10: Good to see you! I’ve got a present for you.
ch0016_00_huuro_en.lsd.ch0016_00_huuro/1701_0701_02_10:
I spotted it as I was flying overhead.
It’s all yours, so use it however you want!
ch0016_00_huuro_en.lsd.ch0016_00_huuro/1701_0702_01_10:
Hee-hee! No matter how far away things are,
a pilot’s eyes can see them!
ch0016_00_huuro_en.lsd.ch0016_00_huuro/1701_0702_02_10:
I’ll probably find something else nice on
another flight. I’ll let you know when I do!
ch0016_00_huuro_en.lsd.ch0016_00_huuro/2501_0701_01_10:
There are so many reasons I like flying,
it’s hard to explain them all.
ch0016_00_huuro_en.lsd.ch0016_00_huuro/2501_0701_02_10:
I guess the main thing is that my Pokémon and I
can fly anywhere we want.
ch0016_00_huuro_en.lsd.ch0016_00_huuro/2501_0701_03_10:
There are no walls or ceiling to box us in—the
freedom of it feels great.
ch0016_00_huuro_en.lsd.ch0016_00_huuro/2501_0702_01_10:
There’s more to the sky than just blue and some
nice white clouds floating by.
ch0016_00_huuro_en.lsd.ch0016_00_huuro/2501_0702_02_10:
Sometimes it rains, sometimes the winds are
strong. Some days, the sky’s just right for flight,
and some days it’s not.
ch0016_00_huuro_en.lsd.ch0016_00_huuro/2501_0702_03_10: It makes you feel like the sky is alive.
ch0016_00_huuro_en.lsd.ch0016_00_huuro/2511_0701_01_10:
Some things can be tough to do on your own,
but if you have help, you can get it done.
ch0016_00_huuro_en.lsd.ch0016_00_huuro/2511_0701_03_10:
People and Pokémon are all different,
so when we combine our efforts, our power
is on a whole different level, too!
ch0016_00_huuro_en.lsd.ch0016_00_huuro/2511_0701_04_10:
I hope I can battle with even more people
and Pokémon.
ch0016_00_huuro_en.lsd.ch0016_00_huuro/2511_0702_01_10:
Maybe the reason Pokémon battles are so fun is
because people and Pokémon get to spend some
quality time together.
ch0016_00_huuro_en.lsd.ch0016_00_huuro/2511_0702_02_10:
I mean, you can’t have a Pokémon battle
all by yourself!
ch0016_00_huuro_en.lsd.ch0016_00_huuro/2511_0702_03_10:
That’s why I always try to enjoy myself when I’m
having a Pokémon battle.
ch0016_00_huuro_en.lsd.ch0016_00_huuro/3001_0701_01_10:
Good morning! Hee hee!
Pilots are good at waking up early, you know!
ch0016_00_huuro_en.lsd.ch0016_00_huuro/3002_0701_01_10: Morning! I hope today’s full of fun!
ch0016_00_huuro_en.lsd.ch0016_00_huuro/3003_0701_01_10:
Hi there! 
The weather’s perfect for a flight today.
What do you say?
ch0016_00_huuro_en.lsd.ch0016_00_huuro/3004_0701_01_10:
Hiya! Isn’t the weather nice today? 
Maybe I should go clean my plane.
ch0016_00_huuro_en.lsd.ch0016_00_huuro/3005_0701_01_10:
Evening! You’re working pretty late, huh?
Are you staying up for something exciting?
ch0016_00_huuro_en.lsd.ch0016_00_huuro/3006_0701_01_10:
Playing outside at night always gives me
such a thrill! You have to be careful, though.
It’s kinda hard to see.

ch0018_00_chris_en.lsd.ch0018_00_chris/0101_0701_01_10:
Oh, there you are, [Name:PlayerNickname ]!
I’ve been waiting forever!
ch0018_00_chris_en.lsd.ch0018_00_chris/0101_0701_02_10:
I wonder what kind of new adventures we’ll
have today! Well, then we’re off!
ch0018_00_chris_en.lsd.ch0018_00_chris/0601_0701_01_10: I read up on Pokémon a good deal, you know?
ch0018_00_chris_en.lsd.ch0018_00_chris/0601_0701_02_10:
But just reading books doesn’t teach you
everything about Pokémon.
ch0018_00_chris_en.lsd.ch0018_00_chris/0601_0701_03_10:
That’s why you have to go out, walk with your
own legs, and see them with your own eyes.
ch0018_00_chris_en.lsd.ch0018_00_chris/0601_0701_04_10:
That way, you can see Pokémon for yourself.
The kind that aren’t just recorded as data!
ch0018_00_chris_en.lsd.ch0018_00_chris/0601_0702_01_10: I want to meet all the Pokémon in the world!
ch0018_00_chris_en.lsd.ch0018_00_chris/0601_0702_02_10: Maybe you can call that my dream.
ch0018_00_chris_en.lsd.ch0018_00_chris/0602_0701_01_10:
Understanding ecosystems and the mechanisms of
Evolution is important, too...
ch0018_00_chris_en.lsd.ch0018_00_chris/0602_0701_02_10:
But I’m more interested in the minds of
the Pokémon.
ch0018_00_chris_en.lsd.ch0018_00_chris/0602_0701_03_10:
I want to know about what they think and how
they feel.
ch0018_00_chris_en.lsd.ch0018_00_chris/0602_0701_04_10:
I want to understand their emotions so that we
can make the world more like how they want it.
ch0018_00_chris_en.lsd.ch0018_00_chris/0602_0702_01_10:
If people and Pokémon could understand each
other better, we could become even closer!
ch0018_00_chris_en.lsd.ch0018_00_chris/0602_0702_02_10:
Think about it! A world where we care for and
help each other. Wouldn’t that be great?
ch0018_00_chris_en.lsd.ch0018_00_chris/0603_0701_01_10: Totodile’s been with me the longest.
ch0018_00_chris_en.lsd.ch0018_00_chris/0603_0701_02_10:
She has a little bit of a troublemaker streak,
so I had my work cut out for me at the start.
ch0018_00_chris_en.lsd.ch0018_00_chris/0603_0701_03_10:
She would try to bite me whenever she got the
chance. It was pretty tough!
ch0018_00_chris_en.lsd.ch0018_00_chris/0603_0701_04_10: But in reality, she actually bit me only once.
ch0018_00_chris_en.lsd.ch0018_00_chris/0603_0701_05_10:
I fell in a river once and almost drowned. But
Totodile bit my hand to try and pull me out.
ch0018_00_chris_en.lsd.ch0018_00_chris/0603_0702_01_10: Seeing a river always reminds me of that day.
ch0018_00_chris_en.lsd.ch0018_00_chris/0603_0702_02_10:
And of how Totodile came swimming toward me
from the light I saw at the bottom of that river.
ch0018_00_chris_en.lsd.ch0018_00_chris/0604_0701_01_10:
It makes me sad whenever I see people showing
their Pokémon affection in the wrong way.
ch0018_00_chris_en.lsd.ch0018_00_chris/0604_0701_02_10:
They might be trying to make their
Pokémon happy...
ch0018_00_chris_en.lsd.ch0018_00_chris/0604_0701_03_10:
but ultimately, their Pokémon might not like it
or it might end up backfiring.
ch0018_00_chris_en.lsd.ch0018_00_chris/0604_0701_04_10:
This happens because people don’t have 
the right knowledge about their Pokémon.
ch0018_00_chris_en.lsd.ch0018_00_chris/0604_0701_05_10:
I hope people can educate themselves so there
can be a lot less Pokémon that suffer.
ch0018_00_chris_en.lsd.ch0018_00_chris/0604_0702_01_10:
Doing what each other wants might be
true love...maybe.
ch0018_00_chris_en.lsd.ch0018_00_chris/0604_0702_02_10:
Love is difficult, isn’t it?
But then again, what do I know. Ha ha!
ch0018_00_chris_en.lsd.ch0018_00_chris/0605_0701_01_10: Looking at you, I always get to thinking...
ch0018_00_chris_en.lsd.ch0018_00_chris/0605_0701_02_10:
that maybe you and your Pokémon are the ideal
image of how people and Pokémon should be.
ch0018_00_chris_en.lsd.ch0018_00_chris/0605_0701_03_10:
Neither of you pushes yourself to get along with
the other. You just naturally do.
ch0018_00_chris_en.lsd.ch0018_00_chris/0605_0701_05_10: It’s not just Pokémon that I observe, you know.
ch0018_00_chris_en.lsd.ch0018_00_chris/0605_0702_01_10: I might have been a Trainer longer than you...
ch0018_00_chris_en.lsd.ch0018_00_chris/0605_0702_02_10: but I have plenty I can learn from you, too!
ch0018_00_chris_en.lsd.ch0018_00_chris/1701_0701_01_10: Here, take this. A present from yours truly.
ch0018_00_chris_en.lsd.ch0018_00_chris/1701_0701_02_10:
I’m sure it’ll help you out, so it’d be nice
if you used it!
ch0018_00_chris_en.lsd.ch0018_00_chris/1701_0702_01_10: I sometimes get presents from people, too.
ch0018_00_chris_en.lsd.ch0018_00_chris/1701_0702_02_10: But this one time, I got one from a Pokémon!
ch0018_00_chris_en.lsd.ch0018_00_chris/2501_0701_01_10: Have you heard of the Legendary Pokémon?
ch0018_00_chris_en.lsd.ch0018_00_chris/2501_0701_02_10:
They’re Pokémon that rarely show themselves
in front of people, if they even ever do.
ch0018_00_chris_en.lsd.ch0018_00_chris/2501_0701_03_10:
A while back, I found a Legendary Pokémon
called Suicune and chased it.
ch0018_00_chris_en.lsd.ch0018_00_chris/2501_0701_04_10:
It was such a beautiful Pokémon. It looked pure
and pristine, like a crystal.
ch0018_00_chris_en.lsd.ch0018_00_chris/2501_0701_05_10:
If I ever run into Suicune again, I want to show
it that I’ve grown up.
ch0018_00_chris_en.lsd.ch0018_00_chris/2501_0702_01_10:
Being able to meet a Legendary Pokémon comes
with its fair share of hardships.
ch0018_00_chris_en.lsd.ch0018_00_chris/2501_0702_02_10:
Because it’s so rare to lay eyes on them, 
it’s that much more awe-inspiring when you do.
ch0018_00_chris_en.lsd.ch0018_00_chris/2511_0701_01_10:
It’s a shame, but there are people in the world
that use Pokémon for evil.
ch0018_00_chris_en.lsd.ch0018_00_chris/2511_0701_02_10: I can never forgive people like that!
ch0018_00_chris_en.lsd.ch0018_00_chris/2511_0701_03_10:
Not just because of the fact that they’re using
Pokémon to do bad things.
ch0018_00_chris_en.lsd.ch0018_00_chris/2511_0701_04_10:
But even more than that, as Trainers, they are
failing their Pokémon!
ch0018_00_chris_en.lsd.ch0018_00_chris/2511_0701_05_10:
Those Pokémon that are trusting those Trainers
are betrayed. It pains my heart to see Pokémon
going through that...
ch0018_00_chris_en.lsd.ch0018_00_chris/2511_0702_01_10:
It would be great if you could show the world
how a Trainer and their Pokémon should be.
ch0018_00_chris_en.lsd.ch0018_00_chris/2511_0702_02_10:
Not some twisted bond but a true connection
between Pokémon and their Trainer.
ch0018_00_chris_en.lsd.ch0018_00_chris/3001_0701_01_10:
It’s interesting how some Pokémon are
waking and some are going to sleep.
Their differences make them so fascinating!
ch0018_00_chris_en.lsd.ch0018_00_chris/3002_0701_01_10:
The earlier I wake up, the more chances
I have to meet cool Pokémon!
ch0018_00_chris_en.lsd.ch0018_00_chris/3003_0701_01_10:
We’re going on another adventure to
meet new Pokémon today! Hehehe!
ch0018_00_chris_en.lsd.ch0018_00_chris/3004_0701_01_10:
If I ever get info on a rare Pokémon,
I’ll be sure to let you know, OK?
ch0018_00_chris_en.lsd.ch0018_00_chris/3005_0701_01_10:
Pokémon that appear only at night 
are sure difficult to meet.
*yawn* I’m sleepy...
ch0018_00_chris_en.lsd.ch0018_00_chris/3006_0701_01_10:
Even on nights with no moonlight or stars, you
can still make out the Pokémon eyes in the dark.

ch0019_00_yuki_en.lsd.ch0019_00_yuki/0101_0701_01_10:
Oh, [Name:PlayerNickname ], I’ve been
waiting for you! Come on. Let’s get going!
ch0019_00_yuki_en.lsd.ch0019_00_yuki/0101_0701_02_10:
I think we’re gonna meet lots 
of different Pokémon today!
ch0019_00_yuki_en.lsd.ch0019_00_yuki/0601_0701_01_10:
The other day, I was wondering where my
Treecko went. Turns out, he was clinging
to the ceiling!
ch0019_00_yuki_en.lsd.ch0019_00_yuki/0601_0701_02_10:
I was looking at him, wondering what he was
up to, when he suddenly came diving down
onto my face.
ch0019_00_yuki_en.lsd.ch0019_00_yuki/0601_0701_03_10:
Seems like it’s his new hobby or something.
He surprised me, but I did get a good laugh, too!
ch0019_00_yuki_en.lsd.ch0019_00_yuki/0601_0702_01_10:
I told you about my Treecko and his new hobby
of diving onto people’s faces, right?
ch0019_00_yuki_en.lsd.ch0019_00_yuki/0601_0702_02_10:
Well, we smacked heads when he tried that last
time. Ever since then he’s become a bit more
careful before he dives.
ch0019_00_yuki_en.lsd.ch0019_00_yuki/0601_0702_03_10:
It’s really funny watching Treecko carefully
line up his jump!
ch0019_00_yuki_en.lsd.ch0019_00_yuki/0602_0701_01_10:
When I was back in the Hoenn region, my Taillow
would curl up on my head whenever it got cold.
ch0019_00_yuki_en.lsd.ch0019_00_yuki/0602_0701_02_10:
I think it liked it there ’cause my head is warm.
It was pretty much Taillow’s special spot.
ch0019_00_yuki_en.lsd.ch0019_00_yuki/0602_0701_03_10:
I don’t mind it when it’s windy, since it keeps
my hat from blowing away, but...
ch0019_00_yuki_en.lsd.ch0019_00_yuki/0602_0701_04_10:
I have to admit, Taillow gets a bit heavy when
it sits on my head for too long.
ch0019_00_yuki_en.lsd.ch0019_00_yuki/0602_0702_01_10:
I get worried sometimes that Taillow might just
go ahead and turn my hat into a full nest.
ch0019_00_yuki_en.lsd.ch0019_00_yuki/0602_0702_02_10:
In the spring, it even catches the Worm Pokémon
Wurmple and leaves them on my hat!
ch0019_00_yuki_en.lsd.ch0019_00_yuki/0602_0702_03_10: Maybe it’s too late about the nest thing, huh?
ch0019_00_yuki_en.lsd.ch0019_00_yuki/0603_0701_01_10:
My dad is actually a pretty amazing
Gym Leader.
ch0019_00_yuki_en.lsd.ch0019_00_yuki/0603_0701_02_10:
And my dream is to become a better Pokémon
Trainer than my dad!
ch0019_00_yuki_en.lsd.ch0019_00_yuki/0603_0701_03_10:
So I want to learn even more about Pokémon
and become stronger than I am now.
ch0019_00_yuki_en.lsd.ch0019_00_yuki/0603_0702_01_10:
Someday, I’d love to become a Gym Leader
with my favorite Pokémon.
ch0019_00_yuki_en.lsd.ch0019_00_yuki/0603_0702_02_10:
And be an obstacle for Trainers to overcome,
just like my dad.
ch0019_00_yuki_en.lsd.ch0019_00_yuki/0603_0702_03_10:
In order for my dream to come true, I’d better
be able to win in the PML, at least!
ch0019_00_yuki_en.lsd.ch0019_00_yuki/0604_0701_01_10:
You know, I have a friend named May.
She’s my best rival!
ch0019_00_yuki_en.lsd.ch0019_00_yuki/0604_0701_02_10:
I still remember the first time we had
a Pokémon battle, back in the Hoenn region.
ch0019_00_yuki_en.lsd.ch0019_00_yuki/0604_0701_03_10:
I’d never had a heated Pokémon battle like that,
where we both give it everything we have!
ch0019_00_yuki_en.lsd.ch0019_00_yuki/0604_0702_01_10:
May’s always cheerful and energetic, but when
she watches stars at night, she gets really quiet.
ch0019_00_yuki_en.lsd.ch0019_00_yuki/0604_0702_02_10:
We were watching shooting stars the other day,
and every time she saw one, her eyes lit up.
