ch0019_00_yuki_en.lsd.ch0019_00_yuki/0604_0702_03_10: Her eyes were really pretty, too, like stars!
ch0019_00_yuki_en.lsd.ch0019_00_yuki/0605_0701_01_10:
You need a rival for a journey, right?
Like, a friend who helps you keep going 
and challenges you to become stronger!
ch0019_00_yuki_en.lsd.ch0019_00_yuki/0605_0701_02_10:
Yeah, I’ve got May, but it’s not like we’re
always together here.
ch0019_00_yuki_en.lsd.ch0019_00_yuki/0605_0701_03_10: Besides, I can never have too many rivals.
ch0019_00_yuki_en.lsd.ch0019_00_yuki/0605_0701_04_10:
Now, I’d really like my rivals to be strong
and dependable—like a partner almost, right?
ch0019_00_yuki_en.lsd.ch0019_00_yuki/0605_0701_05_10:
You wouldn’t happen to know anyone like that,
would you, [Name:PlayerNickname ]?
ch0019_00_yuki_en.lsd.ch0019_00_yuki/0605_0702_01_10:
In case it wasn’t clear, I was thinking about you
when I was talking about all that rival stuff, OK?
ch0019_00_yuki_en.lsd.ch0019_00_yuki/0605_0702_02_10:
I might as well be direct.
You’re definitely one of my rivals now, OK?
[Name:PlayerNickname ]!
ch0019_00_yuki_en.lsd.ch0019_00_yuki/1701_0701_01_10: Oh, I was just looking for you!
ch0019_00_yuki_en.lsd.ch0019_00_yuki/1701_0701_02_10:
You can have this.
My Pokémon found it stuck in a tree.
ch0019_00_yuki_en.lsd.ch0019_00_yuki/1701_0702_01_10: It was a pretty good item, right?
ch0019_00_yuki_en.lsd.ch0019_00_yuki/1701_0702_02_10:
I personally like it a lot, so I hope it comes in
handy for you, too!
ch0019_00_yuki_en.lsd.ch0019_00_yuki/2501_0701_01_10:
Do you remember what inspired you to become
a Pokémon Trainer?
ch0019_00_yuki_en.lsd.ch0019_00_yuki/2501_0701_02_10:
For me, it was my dad. I always wanted to be
an amazing Trainer like him.
ch0019_00_yuki_en.lsd.ch0019_00_yuki/2501_0701_03_10:
I’ve become stronger so that I could catch up
to him.
ch0019_00_yuki_en.lsd.ch0019_00_yuki/2501_0702_01_10:
My dad’s a Gym Leader, and I’ve battled
him before. I won that time.
ch0019_00_yuki_en.lsd.ch0019_00_yuki/2501_0702_02_10:
I might have defeated him when he battled me
as a Gym Leader, but...
ch0019_00_yuki_en.lsd.ch0019_00_yuki/2501_0702_03_10:
I still don’t feel like I’ve really surpassed him yet.
He has more knowledge, more experience,
more everything.
ch0019_00_yuki_en.lsd.ch0019_00_yuki/2501_0702_04_10:
So someday, I want to become the better
Pokémon Trainer, in every way!
ch0019_00_yuki_en.lsd.ch0019_00_yuki/2501_0702_05_10:
That’s why I have Pokémon battles every day!
I want to really get to know all the Pokémon,
just like my dad!
ch0019_00_yuki_en.lsd.ch0019_00_yuki/2511_0701_01_10:
As I’ve watched you get stronger, I’ve started
feeling something. I think it’s anxiousness?
ch0019_00_yuki_en.lsd.ch0019_00_yuki/2511_0701_02_10:
Until now, all I really thought about was
overtaking my dad. But now, you’re on my mind.
ch0019_00_yuki_en.lsd.ch0019_00_yuki/2511_0701_03_10:
I don’t want you to leave me behind—or even
catch up to me! That’s what helps me become
even stronger.
ch0019_00_yuki_en.lsd.ch0019_00_yuki/2511_0701_04_10:
I’ve said it before and I’ll say it again:
you’re definitely my rival!
ch0019_00_yuki_en.lsd.ch0019_00_yuki/2511_0702_01_10:
I’m glad you’re my rival, you know.
It’s helped me become even stronger!
ch0019_00_yuki_en.lsd.ch0019_00_yuki/2511_0702_02_10: I guess this is what you call a healthy rivalry.
ch0019_00_yuki_en.lsd.ch0019_00_yuki/2511_0702_03_10:
Finding a worthy opponent, and competing with
them as rivals...
ch0019_00_yuki_en.lsd.ch0019_00_yuki/2511_0702_04_10:
Don’t you think it’s a good way to be?
You’d better stay sharp. You’re one of my
best rivals now!
ch0019_00_yuki_en.lsd.ch0019_00_yuki/3001_0701_01_10:
Great weather this morning!
Good thing we got up early!
ch0019_00_yuki_en.lsd.ch0019_00_yuki/3002_0701_01_10:
Hey!
I woke up to the sounds of chirping Pokémon.
Anyways, I’ll be counting on you today!
ch0019_00_yuki_en.lsd.ch0019_00_yuki/3003_0701_01_10:
It’s afternoon already?
The perfect time for Pokémon battles!
ch0019_00_yuki_en.lsd.ch0019_00_yuki/3004_0701_01_10:
There’s a lot of stuff on sale here,
so you can always find something new.
ch0019_00_yuki_en.lsd.ch0019_00_yuki/3005_0701_01_10:
I want to know more about Pokémon you
can only find at night!
ch0019_00_yuki_en.lsd.ch0019_00_yuki/3006_0701_01_10:
Wow, the stars are beautiful tonight.
Maybe we’ll see a shooting star!

ch0020_00_toya_en.lsd.ch0020_00_toya/0101_0701_01_10:
Hey, [Name:PlayerNickname ]!
I figured you’d be coming soon.
ch0020_00_toya_en.lsd.ch0020_00_toya/0101_0701_02_10:
Battles seem more fun when you’re around.
Let’s do our best today, too!
ch0020_00_toya_en.lsd.ch0020_00_toya/0601_0701_01_10:
I’ve been traveling all over the place, 
and then I was called here to Pasio.
ch0020_00_toya_en.lsd.ch0020_00_toya/0601_0701_02_10:
Traveling is good for you. You get to see new
sights and meet new people and Pokémon.
ch0020_00_toya_en.lsd.ch0020_00_toya/0601_0701_03_10:
You’re one of the new people I’ve met 
during my travels, you know? 
And I’m very happy for that!
ch0020_00_toya_en.lsd.ch0020_00_toya/0601_0702_01_10:
Don’t you think it’s kind of miraculous when
we meet new people or Pokémon?
ch0020_00_toya_en.lsd.ch0020_00_toya/0601_0702_02_10:
The world is so big, there are so many people
and Pokémon that’ll never meet each other...
ch0020_00_toya_en.lsd.ch0020_00_toya/0601_0702_03_10:
And yet we’ve met here, and now we’re
talking and becoming friends!
ch0020_00_toya_en.lsd.ch0020_00_toya/0601_0702_04_10:
I hope we can make this meeting something
really special.
ch0020_00_toya_en.lsd.ch0020_00_toya/0602_0701_01_10:
I like Pokémon battles because I really want to
experience the joy of victory, I guess.
ch0020_00_toya_en.lsd.ch0020_00_toya/0602_0701_02_10:
So much goes into winning a battle.
You have to plan your strategy, raise your
Pokémon, read your opponent’s moves...
ch0020_00_toya_en.lsd.ch0020_00_toya/0602_0701_03_10:
It just feels wonderful when you can bring
all those factors together and seize victory!
ch0020_00_toya_en.lsd.ch0020_00_toya/0602_0702_01_10:
When we win, my Pokémon get really
happy, too!
ch0020_00_toya_en.lsd.ch0020_00_toya/0602_0702_02_10:
That goes for that frustrating feeling when we
lose, too, of course.
ch0020_00_toya_en.lsd.ch0020_00_toya/0602_0702_03_10:
I think Pokémon battles are a form
of communication.
ch0020_00_toya_en.lsd.ch0020_00_toya/0603_0701_01_10:
I know my Oshawott is pretty tiny,
but he’s really good at Pokémon battles.
ch0020_00_toya_en.lsd.ch0020_00_toya/0603_0701_02_10:
He’s defeated much larger Pokémon by using his
smaller size as an advantage.
ch0020_00_toya_en.lsd.ch0020_00_toya/0603_0701_03_10: He’s the best partner I could have for my travels!
ch0020_00_toya_en.lsd.ch0020_00_toya/0603_0702_01_10:
My Oshawott is, what do you call it...
Stoic, I guess.
ch0020_00_toya_en.lsd.ch0020_00_toya/0603_0702_02_10:
He wakes up earlier than even I do and
goes out on his own to train.
ch0020_00_toya_en.lsd.ch0020_00_toya/0603_0702_03_10:
I guess he’s strong because he takes battles
so seriously...?
ch0020_00_toya_en.lsd.ch0020_00_toya/0604_0701_01_10:
Even if it’s a place you’ve been to many times
before, you can discover new things if you just
pay a little closer attention.
ch0020_00_toya_en.lsd.ch0020_00_toya/0604_0701_02_10:
I really enjoy looking for little secrets
like that, you know?
ch0020_00_toya_en.lsd.ch0020_00_toya/0604_0701_03_10:
You might discover a path you never saw before
or meet new Pokémon. It’s hard to quit exploring
once you get into it!
ch0020_00_toya_en.lsd.ch0020_00_toya/0604_0701_04_10: I’d love it if we could go exploring together, too!
ch0020_00_toya_en.lsd.ch0020_00_toya/0604_0702_01_10:
Forests and mountains are fun to explore, sure,
but cities can also be really exciting.
ch0020_00_toya_en.lsd.ch0020_00_toya/0604_0702_02_10:
My favorite thing to do is look for great
restaurants that are off the beaten path!
ch0020_00_toya_en.lsd.ch0020_00_toya/0604_0702_03_10:
Besides, if the Pokémon I meet seem like they’re
having fun, it makes me smile, too!
ch0020_00_toya_en.lsd.ch0020_00_toya/0605_0701_01_10:
I feel comfortable when I’m with you.
You’re reassuring, somehow.
ch0020_00_toya_en.lsd.ch0020_00_toya/0605_0701_02_10:
So, y’know, even if you become an
amazing Trainer...
ch0020_00_toya_en.lsd.ch0020_00_toya/0605_0701_03_10:
I hope our relationship won’t change.
I hope we’ll stay friends.
ch0020_00_toya_en.lsd.ch0020_00_toya/0605_0701_04_10:
So, uh, this is a little embarrassing, but...
Let’s stick together, [Name:PlayerNickname ]!
ch0020_00_toya_en.lsd.ch0020_00_toya/0605_0702_01_10:
When I watch your Pokémon battles,
it makes me feel...
ch0020_00_toya_en.lsd.ch0020_00_toya/0605_0702_02_10:
It’s hard to explain. Like my heart’s on fire?
It makes me want to battle, too.
ch0020_00_toya_en.lsd.ch0020_00_toya/1701_0701_01_10:
Hey, I found something good, so I figured
I’d share it with you!
ch0020_00_toya_en.lsd.ch0020_00_toya/1701_0701_02_10:
It’s best to share happiness with another
person, after all!
ch0020_00_toya_en.lsd.ch0020_00_toya/1701_0702_01_10:
I’m pretty good at finding items, since
I’ve traveled so much.
ch0020_00_toya_en.lsd.ch0020_00_toya/1701_0702_02_10: I’ll let you know if I find anything else good!
ch0020_00_toya_en.lsd.ch0020_00_toya/2501_0701_01_10:
I’m really looking forward to 
the Pokémon battles on Pasio.
ch0020_00_toya_en.lsd.ch0020_00_toya/2501_0701_02_10: Each place has its own powerful Trainers.
ch0020_00_toya_en.lsd.ch0020_00_toya/2501_0701_03_10:
So whenever I’m going to face strong Trainers, I
always wonder how far I’ll be able to go.
ch0020_00_toya_en.lsd.ch0020_00_toya/2501_0702_01_10:
Seeing you get stronger and stronger... It really
makes me feel like I can’t lag behind, either!
ch0020_00_toya_en.lsd.ch0020_00_toya/2501_0702_02_10:
In other words, you are a great inspiration
for me!
ch0020_00_toya_en.lsd.ch0020_00_toya/2511_0701_01_10:
I’m a bit of a sore loser.
I try not to let it show, since I don’t want
people thinking I’m childish.
ch0020_00_toya_en.lsd.ch0020_00_toya/2511_0701_02_10:
But that does mean I battle to win, even if
it’s against you!
ch0020_00_toya_en.lsd.ch0020_00_toya/2511_0701_03_10:
You’re my friend, and that’s why I want to go
all out in our battles!
No holding grudges, even if you lose!
ch0020_00_toya_en.lsd.ch0020_00_toya/2511_0702_01_10:
It’s like, we’re together a lot...but that’s
exactly why I don’t want to lose.
Do you have that kind of competitiveness, too?
ch0020_00_toya_en.lsd.ch0020_00_toya/2511_0702_02_10:
I guess having this kind of feeling about
each other is what you’d call a rivalry.
ch0020_00_toya_en.lsd.ch0020_00_toya/2511_0702_03_10:
Well, I hope we can stay good friends—and
good rivals!
ch0020_00_toya_en.lsd.ch0020_00_toya/3001_0701_01_10:
Morning! Did ya eat a good breakfast?
You’ll feel better if you eat.
ch0020_00_toya_en.lsd.ch0020_00_toya/3002_0701_01_10:
Morning! Sleep well? I can’t wait to have
a ton of Pokémon battles today!
ch0020_00_toya_en.lsd.ch0020_00_toya/3003_0701_01_10: Good afternoon! Eating lunch made me sleepy...
ch0020_00_toya_en.lsd.ch0020_00_toya/3004_0701_01_10:
Afternoon! Wanna go for a walk or something?
Oh, and while we’re at it,
I also want to do some Pokémon battles.
ch0020_00_toya_en.lsd.ch0020_00_toya/3005_0701_01_10:
Good evening! It’s a nice night, right?
Quiet, calm, and pleasant.
ch0020_00_toya_en.lsd.ch0020_00_toya/3006_0701_01_10:
Evening. A day goes by fast, huh.
I’m not done having fun yet!

ch0021_00_green_en.lsd.ch0021_00_green/0101_0701_02_10:
I’ll battle you, if I have time!
Not like I’d lose anyway!
ch0021_00_green_en.lsd.ch0021_00_green/0601_0701_01_10:
Have you heard about me already?
If you’ve heard I’m super strong, it’s true!
ch0021_00_green_en.lsd.ch0021_00_green/0601_0701_02_10:
I mean, your average Trainer doesn’t even
stand a chance against me!
ch0021_00_green_en.lsd.ch0021_00_green/0601_0701_04_10:
Well, Red did beat me, but the next time
we battle, things are gonna be different!
ch0021_00_green_en.lsd.ch0021_00_green/0601_0702_01_10:
It doesn’t matter what kind of event it is or
where it’s being held. I’ll always make it to
the top!
ch0021_00_green_en.lsd.ch0021_00_green/0601_0702_02_10:
That’s the type of Pokémon battle I want to
have, after all!
ch0021_00_green_en.lsd.ch0021_00_green/0602_0701_01_10:
Pidgeot’s my pride and joy. 
You should see how fast he can fly!
ch0021_00_green_en.lsd.ch0021_00_green/0602_0701_02_10: He can even carry me and fly to different towns!
ch0021_00_green_en.lsd.ch0021_00_green/0602_0701_03_10:
My hair does get completely ruined by the
time we reach our destination, though.
ch0021_00_green_en.lsd.ch0021_00_green/0602_0702_01_10: Don’t you think my hair looks great?
ch0021_00_green_en.lsd.ch0021_00_green/0602_0702_02_10:
I put a lot of effort into it so that it
doesn’t get messed up even when I’m
flying with Pidgeot.
ch0021_00_green_en.lsd.ch0021_00_green/0603_0701_01_10:
I’m a Pokémon Trainer, through and through.
I always want to battle the strongest opponents!
ch0021_00_green_en.lsd.ch0021_00_green/0603_0701_02_10:
And I’ve got a rival, Red.
We can throw everything we’ve got at
each other, holding nothing back.
ch0021_00_green_en.lsd.ch0021_00_green/0603_0701_03_10:
I hope you can find a rival like that, too.
One that will help you grow and vice versa.
ch0021_00_green_en.lsd.ch0021_00_green/0603_0702_01_10:
Red doesn’t say much, but he’s an amazing guy.
Full of love for Pokémon.
ch0021_00_green_en.lsd.ch0021_00_green/0603_0702_02_10:
Don’t tell anyone I said this, but I respect him.
There’s so much I learned after I lost to him.
ch0021_00_green_en.lsd.ch0021_00_green/0604_0701_01_10:
Y’know, my hometown is a tiny little place
out in the boonies of a faraway region.
ch0021_00_green_en.lsd.ch0021_00_green/0604_0701_02_10:
I don’t go back much, really.
I mean, I can get so much stronger!
I need to keep training!
ch0021_00_green_en.lsd.ch0021_00_green/0604_0701_03_10:
But my sis back home keeps asking when I’m
coming home, every time I talk to her.
ch0021_00_green_en.lsd.ch0021_00_green/0604_0701_04_10:
What a bother, right?
She doesn’t get that a guy’s gotta do what a
guy’s gotta do.
ch0021_00_green_en.lsd.ch0021_00_green/0604_0702_01_10:
I guess my sis really doesn’t get that I gotta
do what I gotta do.
ch0021_00_green_en.lsd.ch0021_00_green/0604_0702_02_10:
Don’t get me wrong, though. I know she’s just
looking out for me, and I’m grateful for that.
ch0021_00_green_en.lsd.ch0021_00_green/0605_0701_01_10:
You know, [Name:PlayerNickname ],
you remind me of him. Of my rival.
ch0021_00_green_en.lsd.ch0021_00_green/0605_0701_02_10:
You don’t say much, and the way you look
when you’re with Pokémon...
ch0021_00_green_en.lsd.ch0021_00_green/0605_0701_03_10:
You’re quiet, but you’ve got that burning
passion, too. Just like him.
ch0021_00_green_en.lsd.ch0021_00_green/0605_0702_01_10:
It’s hard to tell what he’s thinking sometimes,
you know.
ch0021_00_green_en.lsd.ch0021_00_green/0605_0702_02_10:
I’ve known him for a long time now, but there
are still a lot of mysteries about that guy.
ch0021_00_green_en.lsd.ch0021_00_green/1701_0701_01_10:
Here, you can have this.
It was tangled up in Pidgeot’s feathers.
ch0021_00_green_en.lsd.ch0021_00_green/1701_0701_02_10: Put it to good use, OK?
ch0021_00_green_en.lsd.ch0021_00_green/1701_0702_01_10:
Pidgeot can fly at Mach 2!
You wouldn’t stand a chance if he hit you!
ch0021_00_green_en.lsd.ch0021_00_green/1701_0702_02_10:
I remember one time, we ran into a flock of
Swanna. They got super angry, and we had a
high-speed air battle!
ch0021_00_green_en.lsd.ch0021_00_green/2501_0701_01_10:
You’re aiming to become the 
strongest Trainer too, right?
ch0021_00_green_en.lsd.ch0021_00_green/2501_0701_02_10: I’ve got a word of advice for you, then!
ch0021_00_green_en.lsd.ch0021_00_green/2501_0701_03_10:
Never forget to treat your Pokémon with
trust and love.
ch0021_00_green_en.lsd.ch0021_00_green/2501_0701_04_10:
OK, to be honest, it’s something my gramps
taught me a while ago.
ch0021_00_green_en.lsd.ch0021_00_green/2501_0701_05_10: But I try to live by those words, even today.
ch0021_00_green_en.lsd.ch0021_00_green/2501_0702_01_10:
You can’t become strong just by 
simply focusing on power.
ch0021_00_green_en.lsd.ch0021_00_green/2501_0702_02_10:
At the end of the day, it’s a trusting relationship
with your Pokémon that’ll make a difference.
ch0021_00_green_en.lsd.ch0021_00_green/2511_0701_01_10:
Do you still remember the first Pokémon you
caught, or the first opponent you battled?
ch0021_00_green_en.lsd.ch0021_00_green/2511_0701_03_10:
How could I forget? It’s the day my adventure
began, after all.
ch0021_00_green_en.lsd.ch0021_00_green/2511_0701_04_10:
And my adventure isn’t over yet.
Not until my perfect partner and I defeat Red,
and I become the most powerful Trainer ever!
ch0021_00_green_en.lsd.ch0021_00_green/2511_0701_05_10:
Shoot, I don’t even have enough time
to catch my breath!
ch0021_00_green_en.lsd.ch0021_00_green/2511_0702_01_10:
Maybe you’ll become a Trainer like Red,
too, someday.
ch0021_00_green_en.lsd.ch0021_00_green/2511_0702_02_10:
When the time comes,
I know I’ll be super pumped!
ch0021_00_green_en.lsd.ch0021_00_green/3001_0701_01_10:
Morning! All pumped up and ready for the day?
Don’t let your guard down 
just because it’s early!
ch0021_00_green_en.lsd.ch0021_00_green/3002_0701_01_10:
Good morning. How you feeling?
Me? I’m feeling great. Thanks for asking!
ch0021_00_green_en.lsd.ch0021_00_green/3003_0701_01_10:
Hey, how’s it going?
You’re not slacking off on your training, are ya?
ch0021_00_green_en.lsd.ch0021_00_green/3004_0701_01_10:
Bonjour! Off for an adventure?
That’s fine and all, but don’t forget to have
a battle with me from time to time!
ch0021_00_green_en.lsd.ch0021_00_green/3005_0701_01_10:
Fancy running into you at this hour! Taking a
break is an important part of training, you know.
ch0021_00_green_en.lsd.ch0021_00_green/3006_0701_01_10:
You’re still adventuring at this hour?
I think I’m gonna call it a day myself.
Smell ya later!

ch0022_00_urup_en.lsd.ch0022_00_urup/0101_0701_02_10: You’re glimmering like the shiniest shard of ice!
ch0022_00_urup_en.lsd.ch0022_00_urup/0101_0701_03_10:
Looking at fresh ice is always nice.
Keep up the good work, y’know?
ch0022_00_urup_en.lsd.ch0022_00_urup/0601_0701_01_10:
You’re wondering whether I get cold dressed
like this all year?
ch0022_00_urup_en.lsd.ch0022_00_urup/0601_0701_02_10:
I’m sure there are people around you that spend
the year in short sleeves, y’know?
ch0022_00_urup_en.lsd.ch0022_00_urup/0601_0701_03_10:
Those people have blazing spirits! That’s why
the cold doesn’t bother them.
ch0022_00_urup_en.lsd.ch0022_00_urup/0601_0702_01_10: I mean, I get cold, too, y’know?
ch0022_00_urup_en.lsd.ch0022_00_urup/0601_0702_02_10:
If you’re not 100 percent on your game all the
time, you have to find a way to keep warm.
ch0022_00_urup_en.lsd.ch0022_00_urup/0602_0701_01_10:
Ice is a bit of a paradox, y’know?
It’s both durable and fragile.
ch0022_00_urup_en.lsd.ch0022_00_urup/0602_0701_02_10: Fragile when warm and durable when cold.
ch0022_00_urup_en.lsd.ch0022_00_urup/0602_0701_03_10:
Power is just as fickle. 
But that is what makes it fun.
ch0022_00_urup_en.lsd.ch0022_00_urup/0602_0701_04_10:
I like to cherish the kind of power that can be
lost in a moment.
ch0022_00_urup_en.lsd.ch0022_00_urup/0602_0702_01_10:
Now, the kind of power that is unshakable, the
kind that will never change no matter what...
ch0022_00_urup_en.lsd.ch0022_00_urup/0602_0702_02_10:
I want you to have the kind of spirit that would
be able to find it.
ch0022_00_urup_en.lsd.ch0022_00_urup/0603_0701_01_10:
I always enjoy my Pokémon battles with my
trusty Avalugg.
ch0022_00_urup_en.lsd.ch0022_00_urup/0603_0701_02_10:
In any case, you can say the one who enjoys
themselves the most is the winner, y’know?
ch0022_00_urup_en.lsd.ch0022_00_urup/0603_0701_03_10:
Time is limited. We don’t have the kind of time
to think about things like winning or losing.
ch0022_00_urup_en.lsd.ch0022_00_urup/0603_0702_01_10:
I’m impressed with how you 
interact with your Pokémon.
ch0022_00_urup_en.lsd.ch0022_00_urup/0603_0702_02_10:
There are Trainers that want to become stronger
or maybe become closer to their Pokémon.
ch0022_00_urup_en.lsd.ch0022_00_urup/0603_0702_03_10:
Just like how no two people have 
the same thoughts, the same can be said 
for Pokémon as well.
ch0022_00_urup_en.lsd.ch0022_00_urup/0603_0702_04_10:
So being able to have fun alongside your
Pokémon is an incredibly precious thing.
ch0022_00_urup_en.lsd.ch0022_00_urup/0604_0701_01_10:
I may be hard as ice, but my wife 
can easily make me melt.
ch0022_00_urup_en.lsd.ch0022_00_urup/0604_0701_02_10:
She asked me about “it” the other day, y’know?
And I couldn’t answer her.
ch0022_00_urup_en.lsd.ch0022_00_urup/0604_0701_03_10:
All I could say was, “Oh yeah, that’s a few days
away, isn’t it?” She got mad at me...
ch0022_00_urup_en.lsd.ch0022_00_urup/0604_0701_04_10: I mean, what is “it” anyway, y’know?
ch0022_00_urup_en.lsd.ch0022_00_urup/0604_0701_05_10:
It must’ve been our anniversary! Yeesh! 
We all have something we’re not good at.
ch0022_00_urup_en.lsd.ch0022_00_urup/0604_0702_01_10:
I can be tough as an iceberg, hot as a furnace,
but there’s one thing that I cannot stand up to.
ch0022_00_urup_en.lsd.ch0022_00_urup/0604_0702_02_10:
My wife’s cold stare. 
It’s something I could never get used to.
ch0022_00_urup_en.lsd.ch0022_00_urup/0605_0701_01_10:
[Name:PlayerNickname ], do you know about
the Pokémon village?
ch0022_00_urup_en.lsd.ch0022_00_urup/0605_0701_02_10:
It’s a place where hurt Pokémon go to rest and
support each other.
ch0022_00_urup_en.lsd.ch0022_00_urup/0605_0701_03_10:
I hope you get the chance to go there. I’m sure
it will make you even kinder toward Pokémon.
ch0022_00_urup_en.lsd.ch0022_00_urup/0605_0702_01_10:
Unfortunately, there are bad people that
hurt Pokémon.
ch0022_00_urup_en.lsd.ch0022_00_urup/0605_0702_02_10:
If you ever find a hurt Pokémon, I hope you care
for it. You have a good heart. I’m sure you will.
ch0022_00_urup_en.lsd.ch0022_00_urup/1701_0701_01_10: I found this caught in one of Avalugg’s cracks.
ch0022_00_urup_en.lsd.ch0022_00_urup/1701_0701_02_10: Here, you can have it. Use it well.
ch0022_00_urup_en.lsd.ch0022_00_urup/1701_0702_01_10:
Avalugg has really big cracks, so if you don’t
clean them often, you’ll find a bunch of things 
caught in there!
ch0022_00_urup_en.lsd.ch0022_00_urup/1701_0702_02_10:
I once lost a present I meant to give to my kids,
but I found it in one of Avalugg’s cracks!
Ha ha! *sigh*
ch0022_00_urup_en.lsd.ch0022_00_urup/2501_0701_01_10:
I might be a Gym Leader, but I can only be one
thanks to the support I get from my family.
ch0022_00_urup_en.lsd.ch0022_00_urup/2501_0701_02_10:
My wife and kids are always there,
cheering me on.
ch0022_00_urup_en.lsd.ch0022_00_urup/2501_0701_03_10:
It’s thanks to them that I can give it my all when
I battle.
ch0022_00_urup_en.lsd.ch0022_00_urup/2501_0702_01_10:
My locket with a picture of my family is 
my most important possession, y’know?
ch0022_00_urup_en.lsd.ch0022_00_urup/2501_0702_02_10:
I never leave home without it!
It reminds me how grateful I should be to them!
ch0022_00_urup_en.lsd.ch0022_00_urup/2501_0702_03_10:
Besides, y’know... It’s nice to think 
that your family is always with you.
ch0022_00_urup_en.lsd.ch0022_00_urup/2511_0701_01_10: Spending time with you warms my heart.
ch0022_00_urup_en.lsd.ch0022_00_urup/2511_0701_02_10:
Both people and Pokémon alike have hearts.
I’m just saying that you have a warmth that
is soothing to those around you.
ch0022_00_urup_en.lsd.ch0022_00_urup/2511_0701_03_10: At the very least, Avalugg here and I like you!
ch0022_00_urup_en.lsd.ch0022_00_urup/2511_0701_04_10:
I bet the people and Pokémon that approach
you can see that you have a kind heart, too.
ch0022_00_urup_en.lsd.ch0022_00_urup/2511_0702_01_10:
One warm person can warm up 
everyone around them.
ch0022_00_urup_en.lsd.ch0022_00_urup/2511_0702_02_10:
And if there’s a frigid knucklehead around,
well, that’s where you come in, y’know?
ch0022_00_urup_en.lsd.ch0022_00_urup/3001_0701_01_10:
Hi! The morning air always fills me with vigor.
Isn’t it refreshing?
ch0022_00_urup_en.lsd.ch0022_00_urup/3002_0701_01_10:
Y’know, I woke up around five this morning.
I just can’t seem to get good shut-eye lately.
ch0022_00_urup_en.lsd.ch0022_00_urup/3003_0701_01_10:
Hey, how’re you doing?
We should have a battle one of these days.
ch0022_00_urup_en.lsd.ch0022_00_urup/3004_0701_01_10:
Hey there. Pokémon battling is always
a good way to spend the day.
ch0022_00_urup_en.lsd.ch0022_00_urup/3005_0701_01_10:
You’re out and about awfully late.
You shouldn’t overexert yourself, you know.
ch0022_00_urup_en.lsd.ch0022_00_urup/3006_0701_01_10:
Goin’ out at this time of night?
Well, just don’t stay up too late.

ch0023_00_momi_en.lsd.ch0023_00_momi/0101_0701_01_10:
Oh, hello, [Name:PlayerNickname ].
I hope you’re faring well today.
ch0023_00_momi_en.lsd.ch0023_00_momi/0101_0701_02_10:
I’m feeling quite blissful today!
The happiness of my Pokémon
tends to rub off on me.
ch0023_00_momi_en.lsd.ch0023_00_momi/0601_0701_01_10:
When you wander the land as I do,
you get the chance to chat with all
sorts of different Trainers.
ch0023_00_momi_en.lsd.ch0023_00_momi/0601_0701_02_10:
Some want to be stronger—some want to gain
a closer friendship with their Pokémon.
ch0023_00_momi_en.lsd.ch0023_00_momi/0601_0701_03_10:
What they wish to achieve with their
Pokémon varies a lot depending on the person.
ch0023_00_momi_en.lsd.ch0023_00_momi/0601_0701_04_10: But one thing they all share in common...
ch0023_00_momi_en.lsd.ch0023_00_momi/0601_0701_05_10:
is the incredibly strong bond they have
with their Pokémon.
ch0023_00_momi_en.lsd.ch0023_00_momi/0601_0702_01_10:
Blissey and I have traveled
far and wide together.
ch0023_00_momi_en.lsd.ch0023_00_momi/0601_0702_02_10:
After all this time, our sync strength
must be strong indeed.
ch0023_00_momi_en.lsd.ch0023_00_momi/0602_0701_01_10:
When I’m out on a journey, if I ever
feel close to breaking down and giving up...
ch0023_00_momi_en.lsd.ch0023_00_momi/0602_0701_02_10:
I think about you and my Pokémon
and I suddenly feel energized and
ready to press on again.
ch0023_00_momi_en.lsd.ch0023_00_momi/0602_0701_03_10:
It’s good for Trainers to remember that
our Pokémon are always by our side.
ch0023_00_momi_en.lsd.ch0023_00_momi/0602_0701_04_10:
Never forget that, all right?
The people around you are always
there to support you when you need it.
ch0023_00_momi_en.lsd.ch0023_00_momi/0602_0702_01_10:
The Old Chateau was a really frightening
place, even with my Pokémon there beside me.
ch0023_00_momi_en.lsd.ch0023_00_momi/0602_0702_02_10:
But you know, the only reason I am who I am
today is because my Pokémon was there for me.
ch0023_00_momi_en.lsd.ch0023_00_momi/0602_0702_03_10:
Trusting and believing in your Pokémon
is so, so important.
ch0023_00_momi_en.lsd.ch0023_00_momi/0603_0701_01_10:
My Blissey’s egg makes everyone smile,
no matter who they are!
ch0023_00_momi_en.lsd.ch0023_00_momi/0603_0701_02_10:
Sometimes she even lets me hold it.
Feeling its soft warmth in my arms
really puts me at ease.
ch0023_00_momi_en.lsd.ch0023_00_momi/0603_0701_03_10:
It feels like holding a little ball
of happiness!
ch0023_00_momi_en.lsd.ch0023_00_momi/0603_0701_04_10:
If you’re ever feeling worn out, you should
try borrowing Blissey’s Egg as well.
I’m sure it’ll make you feel much better.
ch0023_00_momi_en.lsd.ch0023_00_momi/0603_0702_01_10:
Did you know that my Blissey can
immediately spot when I’m feeling down?
ch0023_00_momi_en.lsd.ch0023_00_momi/0603_0702_02_10:
She has such a kind heart. Just having her by
my side makes me feel 100 percent better.
ch0023_00_momi_en.lsd.ch0023_00_momi/0604_0701_01_10:
Sometimes it’s good to loaf around and relax
with your Pokémon.
ch0023_00_momi_en.lsd.ch0023_00_momi/0604_0701_02_10:
You never know—you might discover a
new side of your Pokémon that it doesn’t
show during battles.
ch0023_00_momi_en.lsd.ch0023_00_momi/0604_0701_03_10:
For example, if Blissey cuddles me when
we’re taking a nap, I sleep like a baby!
ch0023_00_momi_en.lsd.ch0023_00_momi/0604_0702_01_10: Pokémon are all so fluffy and cute, but...
ch0023_00_momi_en.lsd.ch0023_00_momi/0604_0702_02_10:
it would take some courage to take
a nap with a Wailord.
ch0023_00_momi_en.lsd.ch0023_00_momi/0605_0701_01_10: I usually do all of my hair styling myself...
ch0023_00_momi_en.lsd.ch0023_00_momi/0605_0701_02_10:
but sometimes Blissey really wants
to do it for me.
ch0023_00_momi_en.lsd.ch0023_00_momi/0605_0701_03_10:
The results aren’t always the most polished,
but I let her do it anyway because she
looks so cute when she’s excited!
ch0023_00_momi_en.lsd.ch0023_00_momi/0605_0702_01_10:
I have really long hair, but it’s much easier
to deal with when it’s braided like this.
ch0023_00_momi_en.lsd.ch0023_00_momi/0605_0702_02_10:
Funnily enough, Pokémon are attracted to my
braid as it sways while I’m walking.
It makes them want to pounce!
ch0023_00_momi_en.lsd.ch0023_00_momi/0605_0702_03_10:
Does it make you want to
pounce, [Name:PlayerNickname ]?
ch0023_00_momi_en.lsd.ch0023_00_momi/1701_0701_01_10:
I had a dream that I was riding on a Pelipper
on an adventure through the clouds...
ch0023_00_momi_en.lsd.ch0023_00_momi/1701_0701_02_10:
and when I woke up, I was holding
this in my hand.
ch0023_00_momi_en.lsd.ch0023_00_momi/1701_0702_01_10:
Isn’t that odd? I suppose stranger things
have happened.
ch0023_00_momi_en.lsd.ch0023_00_momi/1701_0702_02_10:
Maybe I’ll find something even nicer in my hand
the next time I wake up from a nap! Tee-hee!
ch0023_00_momi_en.lsd.ch0023_00_momi/2501_0701_01_10: I’ve been having so much fun recently.
ch0023_00_momi_en.lsd.ch0023_00_momi/2501_0701_02_10:
I mean, relaxing and taking naps with my
Pokémon is great and all, but...
ch0023_00_momi_en.lsd.ch0023_00_momi/2501_0701_03_10:
going out and exploring with you recently
has been such a delight!
ch0023_00_momi_en.lsd.ch0023_00_momi/2501_0701_04_10:
Adjusting our strategies to match our opponents,
battling side by side...
It’s all just so exciting!
ch0023_00_momi_en.lsd.ch0023_00_momi/2501_0701_05_10:
I find myself thinking about our next
adventure all the time now!
ch0023_00_momi_en.lsd.ch0023_00_momi/2501_0702_01_10:
There are some opponents I would be a
little worried about battling by myself...
ch0023_00_momi_en.lsd.ch0023_00_momi/2501_0702_02_10:
but if we challenge them together, I feel
confident that things will work out somehow!
ch0023_00_momi_en.lsd.ch0023_00_momi/2511_0701_01_10:
My Pokémon aren’t just cute—they pack a
lot of punch as well! Tee-hee!
ch0023_00_momi_en.lsd.ch0023_00_momi/2511_0701_02_10:
I have a friend who’s an incredibly
talented Pokémon Trainer.
ch0023_00_momi_en.lsd.ch0023_00_momi/2511_0701_03_10:
Meeting that friend is actually what helped
me realize how much I enjoy Pokémon battling!
ch0023_00_momi_en.lsd.ch0023_00_momi/2511_0701_04_10:
Even now...I’m just itching to go out there
and find someone to battle with!
ch0023_00_momi_en.lsd.ch0023_00_momi/2511_0702_01_10:
I’d love to make more friends who enjoy
Pokémon battling like I do.
ch0023_00_momi_en.lsd.ch0023_00_momi/2511_0702_02_10:
I mean...it would be nice if
we could be friends.
ch0023_00_momi_en.lsd.ch0023_00_momi/2511_0702_03_10: Or rivals! Rivals are great, too!
ch0023_00_momi_en.lsd.ch0023_00_momi/3001_0701_01_10:
Good morning!
I hope this is a happy day for you!
ch0023_00_momi_en.lsd.ch0023_00_momi/3002_0701_01_10:
That scent in the air when you wake up early
in the morning is the scent of adventure!
ch0023_00_momi_en.lsd.ch0023_00_momi/3003_0701_01_10:
Hello there. Why don’t you take a few deep
breaths with me and enjoy a slow day?
ch0023_00_momi_en.lsd.ch0023_00_momi/3004_0701_01_10:
This is the time of day when my Pokémon
and I have the most energy!
ch0023_00_momi_en.lsd.ch0023_00_momi/3005_0701_01_10:
Good evening!
I think it’s almost bedtime.
ch0023_00_momi_en.lsd.ch0023_00_momi/3006_0701_01_10:
I know you’re working very hard,
but if you stay up too late,
you or your Pokémon could fall ill.

ch0024_00_shikimi_en.lsd.ch0024_00_shikimi/0101_0701_01_10:
“And so she stared off into the sunset, patiently
waiting for the day [Name:PlayerNickname ]
would return once more.”
ch0024_00_shikimi_en.lsd.ch0024_00_shikimi/0101_0701_02_10:
Oh, [Name:PlayerNickname ]!
Would you mind being my subject today? I’ve got
some new novel ideas that need brainstorming!
ch0024_00_shikimi_en.lsd.ch0024_00_shikimi/0601_0701_01_10:
My Chandelure and I have been the
best of friends ever since she was
a Litwick.
ch0024_00_shikimi_en.lsd.ch0024_00_shikimi/0601_0701_02_10:
I was only a small child when we first met,
long before I started writing novels.
ch0024_00_shikimi_en.lsd.ch0024_00_shikimi/0601_0701_03_10:
I often used to read stories by
the light of Litwick’s flame.
ch0024_00_shikimi_en.lsd.ch0024_00_shikimi/0601_0702_01_10:
To this day, I still often use Chandelure’s
flames to light up my work space when I’m
writing my novels.
ch0024_00_shikimi_en.lsd.ch0024_00_shikimi/0601_0702_02_10:
Under the glow of her light, I feel like
I’m able to envision the events of my
stories so much more vividly.
ch0024_00_shikimi_en.lsd.ch0024_00_shikimi/0601_0702_03_10:
Although she sometimes scolds me
if I doze off at my writing desk.
ch0024_00_shikimi_en.lsd.ch0024_00_shikimi/0602_0701_01_10:
“And so it was...that a fated meeting
with Litwick changed the course of the
young woman’s destiny!”
ch0024_00_shikimi_en.lsd.ch0024_00_shikimi/0602_0701_02_10:
She—I mean, I—became a Pokémon Trainer,
and I met my dear Litwick, and I met
countless other people...
ch0024_00_shikimi_en.lsd.ch0024_00_shikimi/0602_0701_03_10:
and I discovered that every person
and Pokémon out there has a story
to be told.
ch0024_00_shikimi_en.lsd.ch0024_00_shikimi/0602_0701_04_10:
It was then that I decided to write novels—
to tell the beautiful stories of the people
I meet and share them with the world!
ch0024_00_shikimi_en.lsd.ch0024_00_shikimi/0602_0702_01_10:
I’ve told all kinds of stories up until now
about the hearts of Trainers
and their Pokémon.
ch0024_00_shikimi_en.lsd.ch0024_00_shikimi/0602_0702_02_10:
My novels are an extension of the world
I witness with my eyes and
feel in my heart.
ch0024_00_shikimi_en.lsd.ch0024_00_shikimi/0602_0702_03_10:
As long as people and Pokémon continue
to help each other and enrich each other’s
lives, I’ll continue to write my stories.
ch0024_00_shikimi_en.lsd.ch0024_00_shikimi/0602_0702_04_10:
“At those words, the young woman’s
eyes sparkled like the shining flames
of her Chandelure.”
ch0024_00_shikimi_en.lsd.ch0024_00_shikimi/0603_0701_01_10:
Even with a wealth of vocabulary, some
feelings simply can’t be put into words.
ch0024_00_shikimi_en.lsd.ch0024_00_shikimi/0603_0701_02_10:
Perhaps that’s a topic I should challenge
myself with as a writer.
ch0024_00_shikimi_en.lsd.ch0024_00_shikimi/0603_0701_03_10:
Yes! Someday I’ll capture those
indescribable emotions with my pen
and share them with the world!
ch0024_00_shikimi_en.lsd.ch0024_00_shikimi/0603_0702_01_10:
“They walked forward on their path...
Together as one, without need for words,
believing in their bond of friendship...”
ch0024_00_shikimi_en.lsd.ch0024_00_shikimi/0603_0702_02_10:
It’s precisely because people and Pokémon
cannot communicate through words that drives
us to connect through our hearts instead.
ch0024_00_shikimi_en.lsd.ch0024_00_shikimi/0603_0702_03_10:
And if so, that means writing about those
feelings is my true destiny.
Gosh! I suddenly feel so inspired!
ch0024_00_shikimi_en.lsd.ch0024_00_shikimi/0604_0701_01_10:
“The Trainer and Pokémon faced a tall, 
tall mountain ahead of them. 
At the summit, their final rival...”
ch0024_00_shikimi_en.lsd.ch0024_00_shikimi/0604_0701_02_10:
Hmm.
No, that feels a little off, doesn’t it?
ch0024_00_shikimi_en.lsd.ch0024_00_shikimi/0604_0701_03_10:
In times like these, it’s often better to
move on to something new rather than
force your way through writer’s block.
ch0024_00_shikimi_en.lsd.ch0024_00_shikimi/0604_0702_01_10:
Wait! The second I just thought about
giving up, the most amazing idea popped
into my head!
ch0024_00_shikimi_en.lsd.ch0024_00_shikimi/0604_0702_02_10:
I feel a best seller coming on! Gosh, I’ve got
to write all of this down before I forget!
ch0024_00_shikimi_en.lsd.ch0024_00_shikimi/0605_0701_01_10:
[Name:PlayerNickname ], why do you think
people are afraid of Ghost-type Pokémon?
ch0024_00_shikimi_en.lsd.ch0024_00_shikimi/0605_0701_02_10:
I’ve always thought that all types
of Pokémon are equally adorable!
ch0024_00_shikimi_en.lsd.ch0024_00_shikimi/0605_0701_03_10:
One day, I’ll write a best seller that will
show the world just how amazing Ghost-type
Pokémon truly are!
ch0024_00_shikimi_en.lsd.ch0024_00_shikimi/0605_0702_01_10:
“Mysterious shadows of the darkness...
Form a bond with one in your heart, and even
the blackest of nights will seem brighter...”
ch0024_00_shikimi_en.lsd.ch0024_00_shikimi/0605_0702_02_10:
Yes! A tale that will make the world
fall in love with Ghost-type Pokémon!
No one could write it better than me!
ch0024_00_shikimi_en.lsd.ch0024_00_shikimi/0605_0702_03_10:
Oh! You could even be my first beta reader
once it’s finished!
ch0024_00_shikimi_en.lsd.ch0024_00_shikimi/1701_0701_01_10:
I was just taking a stroll in the forest
to mull over some story ideas when I found
this on the path.
ch0024_00_shikimi_en.lsd.ch0024_00_shikimi/1701_0702_01_10:
“The item, unbeknownst to anyone, would
soon be the catalyst that set off a remarkable
chain of events...”
ch0024_00_shikimi_en.lsd.ch0024_00_shikimi/1701_0702_02_10:
Tee-hee! Or so I’d like to think!
Though I’m sure it’s highly unlikely.
ch0024_00_shikimi_en.lsd.ch0024_00_shikimi/2501_0701_01_10:
I feel so inspired! The more I spend
time with you, the more curious I get!
ch0024_00_shikimi_en.lsd.ch0024_00_shikimi/2501_0701_02_10:
And it’s curious in a different way than
I’m usually curious about Pokémon.
This feels totally new! But why...
ch0024_00_shikimi_en.lsd.ch0024_00_shikimi/2501_0701_03_10:
I’d like to find that out. Would you let me
tag along with you awhile longer?
I need you to be my muse!
ch0024_00_shikimi_en.lsd.ch0024_00_shikimi/2501_0702_01_10:
I think I’ve found it!
The sparkling light that shines
within you as a Trainer!
ch0024_00_shikimi_en.lsd.ch0024_00_shikimi/2501_0702_02_10:
That must be what’s been drawing me
to you—what’s made me so curious!
ch0024_00_shikimi_en.lsd.ch0024_00_shikimi/2501_0702_03_10:
Now it’s up to me to investigate just how
far that shining light you possess stretches.
I’ll do my very best!
ch0024_00_shikimi_en.lsd.ch0024_00_shikimi/2501_0702_04_10:
I’ll do it for the novel I’ll inevitably write
one day! Until then, I’ll be here to
witness your story.
ch0024_00_shikimi_en.lsd.ch0024_00_shikimi/2511_0701_01_10:
I’ve come to realize that being
strong isn’t just about winning battles.
ch0024_00_shikimi_en.lsd.ch0024_00_shikimi/2511_0701_02_10:
It’s about kindness—lending a helping hand to
someone in need. Or having the courage to
stand up for other people.
ch0024_00_shikimi_en.lsd.ch0024_00_shikimi/2511_0701_03_10:
It’s all of those things together that make
someone truly strong. Tagging along with
you has helped me realize that!
ch0024_00_shikimi_en.lsd.ch0024_00_shikimi/2511_0702_01_10:
“The Trainer discovered a whole new world
the day they met their first Pokémon...
And so their story together began.”
ch0024_00_shikimi_en.lsd.ch0024_00_shikimi/2511_0702_02_10:
Someday... Someday I’ll write a
brilliant novel with you and your
Pokémon as the main characters.
ch0024_00_shikimi_en.lsd.ch0024_00_shikimi/2511_0702_03_10:
Once it’s finished, I want you to be the
first one to read it.
ch0024_00_shikimi_en.lsd.ch0024_00_shikimi/2511_0702_04_10:
I’ll write all about the kindness and
courage you’ve taught me.
Promise me you’ll read it?
ch0024_00_shikimi_en.lsd.ch0024_00_shikimi/3001_0701_01_10:
Hello... I’m not really a morning person...
*yawn*
ch0024_00_shikimi_en.lsd.ch0024_00_shikimi/3002_0701_01_10:
Is it morning already...?
I got so wrapped up in my writing,
I seem to have forgotten to sleep.
ch0024_00_shikimi_en.lsd.ch0024_00_shikimi/3003_0701_01_10:
Hello. I enjoy afternoons—it’s the perfect time
for reading. Do you have any recommendations?
ch0024_00_shikimi_en.lsd.ch0024_00_shikimi/3004_0701_01_10:
This afternoon, I’ll brainstorm for my next
book while watching my Pokémon.
ch0024_00_shikimi_en.lsd.ch0024_00_shikimi/3005_0701_01_10:
Good evening! I do most of my writing at night.
I seem to get all my good ideas around this time!
ch0024_00_shikimi_en.lsd.ch0024_00_shikimi/3006_0701_01_10:
I was up very late last night, writing.
I plan on going to bed earlier tonight.

ch0025_00_suzuna_en.lsd.ch0025_00_suzuna/0101_0701_02_10: Mine is on point, as always!
ch0025_00_suzuna_en.lsd.ch0025_00_suzuna/0601_0701_01_10:
Hey, do you have any interest in the
fashion here on Pasio?
ch0025_00_suzuna_en.lsd.ch0025_00_suzuna/0601_0701_03_10:
I’ve seen a lot of different fashion
throughout my journeys.
ch0025_00_suzuna_en.lsd.ch0025_00_suzuna/0601_0701_04_10:
Everywhere I go, I see people of
all shapes and sizes expressing
themselves through fashion!
ch0025_00_suzuna_en.lsd.ch0025_00_suzuna/0601_0701_05_10:
When it comes to being stylish,
I’m second to none!
ch0025_00_suzuna_en.lsd.ch0025_00_suzuna/0601_0701_06_10:
My personal style choices are outfits
that represent who I am as a person.
ch0025_00_suzuna_en.lsd.ch0025_00_suzuna/0601_0702_01_10:
I only wear clothes that I really love.
I put a lot of thought into my personal style!
It’s what they call individuality!
ch0025_00_suzuna_en.lsd.ch0025_00_suzuna/0602_0701_01_10:
Melt the ice with the fire in our hearts!
That’s how Candice likes to battle!
ch0025_00_suzuna_en.lsd.ch0025_00_suzuna/0602_0701_02_10:
Even Ice-type Pokémon have
a burning focus deep inside them.
ch0025_00_suzuna_en.lsd.ch0025_00_suzuna/0602_0701_03_10:
That way, even if things get a little
wild and crazy, they have their focus
to keep them on track!
ch0025_00_suzuna_en.lsd.ch0025_00_suzuna/0602_0701_04_10:
Only their moves need to be icy, after all!
A heart full of fiery passion is way cooler
than a frigid, cold one!
ch0025_00_suzuna_en.lsd.ch0025_00_suzuna/0602_0702_01_10:
I suppose I should act cool because
I’m an Ice-type Pokémon Trainer...
ch0025_00_suzuna_en.lsd.ch0025_00_suzuna/0602_0702_02_10:
but that’s just not me!
I can’t force myself to be something
I’m not—and I don’t want to!
ch0025_00_suzuna_en.lsd.ch0025_00_suzuna/0603_0701_01_10:
Did you know my Abomasnow is super cool
even when she’s playing hide-and-seek?!
ch0025_00_suzuna_en.lsd.ch0025_00_suzuna/0603_0701_02_10:
She can whip up blizzards that blanket her
surroundings with white snow, allowing her
to hide from everyone!
ch0025_00_suzuna_en.lsd.ch0025_00_suzuna/0603_0701_03_10:
Isn’t that awesome?! Although, when she’s
the seeker, sometimes she can’t
find US in her blizzard, either.
ch0025_00_suzuna_en.lsd.ch0025_00_suzuna/0603_0702_01_10:
You know, my Abomasnow has always been
pretty cool!
ch0025_00_suzuna_en.lsd.ch0025_00_suzuna/0603_0702_02_10:
She knows just when to take this burning
enthusiasm of mine down a few degrees with
her icy cool attitude. She’s the perfect partner!
ch0025_00_suzuna_en.lsd.ch0025_00_suzuna/0604_0701_01_10:
When you’re up on a snowy mountain,
you’ve got to be energized and
fully focused!
ch0025_00_suzuna_en.lsd.ch0025_00_suzuna/0604_0701_02_10:
If you aren’t, you could end up freezing over
like an icicle! You’ve got to let your
inner fire burn!
ch0025_00_suzuna_en.lsd.ch0025_00_suzuna/0604_0701_03_10:
No matter where we go, my Pokémon and I are
second to none when it comes to focus!
ch0025_00_suzuna_en.lsd.ch0025_00_suzuna/0604_0702_01_10:
My Abomasnow is such a caring partner.
Whenever I get chilly, she’s always there
to give me a nice warm hug.
ch0025_00_suzuna_en.lsd.ch0025_00_suzuna/0604_0702_02_10:
Her fur’s so fluffy and warm—I’m never worried
about the cold, even when it’s freezing outside!
ch0025_00_suzuna_en.lsd.ch0025_00_suzuna/0605_0701_01_10:
[Name:PlayerNickname ]! Anyone ever told
you your Pokémon is the spitting image of you?
ch0025_00_suzuna_en.lsd.ch0025_00_suzuna/0605_0701_02_10:
How wonderful! That just goes to show you
what a close bond you have with your Pokémon!
ch0025_00_suzuna_en.lsd.ch0025_00_suzuna/0605_0701_03_10:
The memories you share with your Pokémon
can affect it a lot as it grows, you know!
ch0025_00_suzuna_en.lsd.ch0025_00_suzuna/0605_0702_01_10:
People and Pokémon are very different from
one another... But the feelings we have
are one and the same.
ch0025_00_suzuna_en.lsd.ch0025_00_suzuna/0605_0702_02_10:
One heart, one mind, and in our case,
one razor-sharp focus!
ch0025_00_suzuna_en.lsd.ch0025_00_suzuna/1701_0701_01_10:
Abomasnow picked up something interesting
the other day.
ch0025_00_suzuna_en.lsd.ch0025_00_suzuna/1701_0701_02_10:
We thought maybe you could use it!
Here, it’s a present from us!
ch0025_00_suzuna_en.lsd.ch0025_00_suzuna/1701_0702_01_10:
Giving and receiving presents always
makes me feel nice inside!
ch0025_00_suzuna_en.lsd.ch0025_00_suzuna/1701_0702_02_10:
Even after you use them up, that warm
feeling still remains!
ch0025_00_suzuna_en.lsd.ch0025_00_suzuna/2501_0701_01_10:
Abomasnow are extremely tough,
but even they have their weaknesses.
ch0025_00_suzuna_en.lsd.ch0025_00_suzuna/2501_0701_02_10:
That’s why we often pair up and
train with Maylene!
ch0025_00_suzuna_en.lsd.ch0025_00_suzuna/2501_0701_03_10:
It’s so nice knowing you have a friend beside
you, pushing you to work hard and reach
your goals together!
ch0025_00_suzuna_en.lsd.ch0025_00_suzuna/2501_0701_04_10:
Maylene is a super hard worker. When I’m
with her, I feel even more focused and
eager than when I’m alone!
ch0025_00_suzuna_en.lsd.ch0025_00_suzuna/2501_0702_01_10:
Maylene and I are planning to train
together again soon.
ch0025_00_suzuna_en.lsd.ch0025_00_suzuna/2501_0702_02_10:
This time, we’re focusing our training
on fashion research!
ch0025_00_suzuna_en.lsd.ch0025_00_suzuna/2511_0701_01_10:
You know, sometimes people tell me that
it doesn’t really matter how focused you are.
ch0025_00_suzuna_en.lsd.ch0025_00_suzuna/2511_0701_02_10:
They tell me there are obstacles that just
can’t be overcome by mere focus and willpower.
ch0025_00_suzuna_en.lsd.ch0025_00_suzuna/2511_0701_03_10:
But to me, that just sounds like you’re giving up
before you even try! Right?
ch0025_00_suzuna_en.lsd.ch0025_00_suzuna/2511_0701_04_10:
People only feel that way because they’re
not focused enough! That’s what I think.
ch0025_00_suzuna_en.lsd.ch0025_00_suzuna/2511_0701_05_10:
When you truly believe in your partner Pokémon,
your inner focus will ignite all on its own!
ch0025_00_suzuna_en.lsd.ch0025_00_suzuna/2511_0702_01_10:
Focus is absolutely vital when it
comes to improving your skills!
ch0025_00_suzuna_en.lsd.ch0025_00_suzuna/2511_0702_02_10:
That’s why I’m always hyperfocused,
no matter where I am or what I’m doing!
ch0025_00_suzuna_en.lsd.ch0025_00_suzuna/3001_0701_01_10:
Hiya! Are you focused first thing in the morning?
I sure am!
ch0025_00_suzuna_en.lsd.ch0025_00_suzuna/3002_0701_01_10:
Good morning!
Something about telling people 
good morning makes me feel good.
ch0025_00_suzuna_en.lsd.ch0025_00_suzuna/3003_0701_01_10:
Hi!
How are you? Still plenty of day ahead of us!
ch0025_00_suzuna_en.lsd.ch0025_00_suzuna/3004_0701_01_10:
Hello there! I feel happy all day
when people say hello to me.
ch0025_00_suzuna_en.lsd.ch0025_00_suzuna/3005_0701_01_10:
Oh, hi! Ready for more?
You look pretty focused to me!
ch0025_00_suzuna_en.lsd.ch0025_00_suzuna/3006_0701_01_10:
Whew. I think I’m getting a little sleepy.
Might be time to say good night while I still can!

ch0026_00_akane_en.lsd.ch0026_00_akane/0101_0701_02_10:
I bet you’re happy, huh? After all, I’m such a
cutie! I’m lookin’ forward to more
adventures today!
ch0026_00_akane_en.lsd.ch0026_00_akane/0601_0701_01_10:
Pasio really is a nice place, ain’t it?
I sure think it is!
ch0026_00_akane_en.lsd.ch0026_00_akane/0601_0701_02_10:
I’ve never seen scenery like this back home.
The girls and the Pokémon are all so cute, too!
ch0026_00_akane_en.lsd.ch0026_00_akane/0601_0701_03_10:
Well, none of ’em are quite as cute as
yours truly, though!
ch0026_00_akane_en.lsd.ch0026_00_akane/0601_0701_05_10:
I heard there was a festival or somethin’, so I
decided to come join. I’m glad I
did—this is perfect for a vacation!
ch0026_00_akane_en.lsd.ch0026_00_akane/0601_0701_06_10:
Although festivals in Goldenrod City, where I’m
from, are even bigger and brighter than this.
ch0026_00_akane_en.lsd.ch0026_00_akane/0601_0702_01_10:
Trainers really do come from all over the place,
don’t they? I guess they’re all here for the
PML—everybody sure is givin’ it their all!
ch0026_00_akane_en.lsd.ch0026_00_akane/0601_0702_02_10:
That’s my kind of people! I love seein’ people
workin’ hard at what they love!
ch0026_00_akane_en.lsd.ch0026_00_akane/0602_0701_01_10:
I can’t help but cry when
I lose a Pokémon battle.
ch0026_00_akane_en.lsd.ch0026_00_akane/0602_0701_02_10:
I mean, how come everybody doesn’t
cry when they lose?
ch0026_00_akane_en.lsd.ch0026_00_akane/0602_0701_03_10:
It’s very serious business, after all!
Ain’t it disappointing when you lose?
ch0026_00_akane_en.lsd.ch0026_00_akane/0602_0701_04_10:
I know I get all kinds of disappointed! I feel sad
for my cute Pokémon when they lose, and that’s
why I always cry when we’re bested.
ch0026_00_akane_en.lsd.ch0026_00_akane/0602_0702_01_10:
I know it won’t change anything if I cry,
but don’t you feel better after a good cry?
ch0026_00_akane_en.lsd.ch0026_00_akane/0602_0702_02_10:
I think that’s a good enough
reason to cry for me!
ch0026_00_akane_en.lsd.ch0026_00_akane/0603_0701_01_10: Got your eye on my Miltank, do you?
ch0026_00_akane_en.lsd.ch0026_00_akane/0603_0701_02_10:
What fine taste you have! Doesn’t she just
make your heart go pitter-patter?!
ch0026_00_akane_en.lsd.ch0026_00_akane/0603_0701_03_10:
You know what’s really great about her? She’s
all kinds of cute, and she’s strong! What more
could you want?!
ch0026_00_akane_en.lsd.ch0026_00_akane/0603_0702_01_10:
Ooh, and Miltank’s Moomoo Milk is exquisite.
I mean just the best!
ch0026_00_akane_en.lsd.ch0026_00_akane/0603_0702_02_10:
I love her so much, I would never, ever
let anybody else have her!
ch0026_00_akane_en.lsd.ch0026_00_akane/0604_0701_01_10: Hey, are you a small or a medium?
ch0026_00_akane_en.lsd.ch0026_00_akane/0604_0701_02_10: Look like a medium to me...
ch0026_00_akane_en.lsd.ch0026_00_akane/0604_0701_03_10:
Kids your age grow real fast, so you should
get your clothes a little big.
ch0026_00_akane_en.lsd.ch0026_00_akane/0604_0702_02_10:
They get big and strong right before
your very eyes!
ch0026_00_akane_en.lsd.ch0026_00_akane/0605_0701_01_10:
Hey, [Name:PlayerNickname ], you got
a special someone?
ch0026_00_akane_en.lsd.ch0026_00_akane/0605_0701_02_10:
Me? I got a whole lot of special someones!
I just love everyone so much!
ch0026_00_akane_en.lsd.ch0026_00_akane/0605_0701_03_10: I sure hope everybody likes me all right, too.
ch0026_00_akane_en.lsd.ch0026_00_akane/0605_0702_01_10:
If you want somebody to like you, be they
a person or Pokémon, you gotta let ’em know
you like them, too.
ch0026_00_akane_en.lsd.ch0026_00_akane/0605_0702_02_10:
You gotta show ’em how important they are
to you with your words and your actions.
This is gettin’ kinda awkward.
ch0026_00_akane_en.lsd.ch0026_00_akane/1701_0701_01_10: I traded some of my Moomoo Milk for this.
ch0026_00_akane_en.lsd.ch0026_00_akane/1701_0701_02_10: You can have it if you want!
ch0026_00_akane_en.lsd.ch0026_00_akane/1701_0702_01_10: Oh, I’m glad it made you so happy!
ch0026_00_akane_en.lsd.ch0026_00_akane/1701_0702_02_10:
Well, if I come across any other good stuff,
I might just give it to you again!
ch0026_00_akane_en.lsd.ch0026_00_akane/2501_0701_01_10: I always knew we’d get along great.
ch0026_00_akane_en.lsd.ch0026_00_akane/2501_0701_02_10:
You’ve got some real strong bonds with your
Pokémon, don’t you.
ch0026_00_akane_en.lsd.ch0026_00_akane/2501_0701_03_10: Why, you’re almost as close as me and Miltank!
ch0026_00_akane_en.lsd.ch0026_00_akane/2501_0701_04_10: I’ve never met a Pokémon fan I didn’t like!
ch0026_00_akane_en.lsd.ch0026_00_akane/2501_0701_05_10: After the battle ends, we’re all friends.
ch0026_00_akane_en.lsd.ch0026_00_akane/2501_0702_01_10:
I’ve got more friends than just
Miltank, you know.
ch0026_00_akane_en.lsd.ch0026_00_akane/2501_0702_02_10:
If you come to my hometown, I’ll introduce
you to all of them!
ch0026_00_akane_en.lsd.ch0026_00_akane/2511_0701_01_10: Do you like being alone or around others?
ch0026_00_akane_en.lsd.ch0026_00_akane/2511_0701_02_10:
I can’t even think about passin’ time all
quiet by myself.
ch0026_00_akane_en.lsd.ch0026_00_akane/2511_0701_03_10:
There are so many things that are so much
more fun when you’ve got someone else around.
ch0026_00_akane_en.lsd.ch0026_00_akane/2511_0701_04_10:
And when times are tough, we can support
each other, right?
ch0026_00_akane_en.lsd.ch0026_00_akane/2511_0701_05_10:
If you’re in trouble, I’ll be right there to
help you out!
ch0026_00_akane_en.lsd.ch0026_00_akane/2511_0702_01_10:
I love cheerin’ people up when they’re
feelin’ down.
ch0026_00_akane_en.lsd.ch0026_00_akane/3001_0701_01_10:
Mornin’!
Happy to see ya today!
ch0026_00_akane_en.lsd.ch0026_00_akane/3002_0701_01_10:
Mornin’. Whew, I shouldn’ta stayed up all night.
I sure am sleepy now!
ch0026_00_akane_en.lsd.ch0026_00_akane/3003_0701_01_10:
Howdy!
Almost nap time for me!
ch0026_00_akane_en.lsd.ch0026_00_akane/3004_0701_01_10:
Hi! You doin’ all right?
Me? I’m fine, I s’pose.
ch0026_00_akane_en.lsd.ch0026_00_akane/3005_0701_01_10:
Hey!
I took a long nap, and now I’m wide awake!

ch0027_00_natane_en.lsd.ch0027_00_natane/0101_0701_01_10:
Ah, there you are, [Name:PlayerNickname ]!
Where are you going to explore today?
ch0027_00_natane_en.lsd.ch0027_00_natane/0101_0701_02_10:
If there’s a meadow full of flowers, I bet
that’d make Grass-type Pokémon happy!
ch0027_00_natane_en.lsd.ch0027_00_natane/0601_0701_01_10:
You know, I’m from the Sinnoh region.
We have a myth there that this whole
world was created by a Pokémon.
ch0027_00_natane_en.lsd.ch0027_00_natane/0601_0701_02_10: I think it must have been a Grass-type Pokémon!
ch0027_00_natane_en.lsd.ch0027_00_natane/0601_0701_03_10:
’Cause, y’know, 
I can believe what I want, right?
ch0027_00_natane_en.lsd.ch0027_00_natane/0601_0702_01_10:
I really enjoy pondering the world that’s
mentioned in the Sinnoh region’s myths.
ch0027_00_natane_en.lsd.ch0027_00_natane/0601_0702_02_10:
If it really was a Grass-type Pokémon that
created the world, I think that deity definitely
liked rain.
ch0027_00_natane_en.lsd.ch0027_00_natane/0601_0702_03_10:
I mean, it must have, right?
I think it also really loved rich soil,
full of nutrients.
ch0027_00_natane_en.lsd.ch0027_00_natane/0602_0701_01_10:
I wonder how they choose the plants to bring
to an artificial island.
ch0027_00_natane_en.lsd.ch0027_00_natane/0602_0701_02_10:
I guess they gather a bunch of plants from
all over and then choose which ones to plant.
ch0027_00_natane_en.lsd.ch0027_00_natane/0602_0701_03_10:
I want to see if any plants from the Sinnoh
region were chosen!
ch0027_00_natane_en.lsd.ch0027_00_natane/0602_0702_01_10:
It just occurred to me that there might be plants
from far away that we’ve never seen before.
ch0027_00_natane_en.lsd.ch0027_00_natane/0602_0702_02_10:
I’m excited about the Pokémon battles, sure,
but I’m also really looking forward to seeing
all the different plants on Pasio!
ch0027_00_natane_en.lsd.ch0027_00_natane/0603_0701_01_10:
When it comes to Grass-type Pokémon, Roserade
is really cool, but I love Turtwig, too!
ch0027_00_natane_en.lsd.ch0027_00_natane/0603_0701_02_10:
Watching its adorable little face munch down on
leaves—it just made me want to hug it and
never let go!
ch0027_00_natane_en.lsd.ch0027_00_natane/0603_0701_03_10:
I was wondering if I should actually do that
when Turtwig came to me on its own!
ch0027_00_natane_en.lsd.ch0027_00_natane/0603_0701_04_10:
Ever since then, Turtwig has been 
one of my very best friends!
ch0027_00_natane_en.lsd.ch0027_00_natane/0603_0702_01_10:
There are certain times where you meet someone
for the first time but then your feelings connect
as if a flower was blooming between you.
ch0027_00_natane_en.lsd.ch0027_00_natane/0603_0702_02_10:
Don’t worry—I know you’ll have a miraculous
moment like that, too, someday!
ch0027_00_natane_en.lsd.ch0027_00_natane/0604_0701_01_10:
My Roserade is so cute, I’d love to hug her, too,
but I can’t.
ch0027_00_natane_en.lsd.ch0027_00_natane/0604_0701_02_10:
Her thorns have poison, so I’d be in a lot
of trouble if I hugged her.
ch0027_00_natane_en.lsd.ch0027_00_natane/0604_0701_03_10:
Still, I love her so much, someday I might not
be able to resist and give her a squeeze.
ch0027_00_natane_en.lsd.ch0027_00_natane/0604_0702_01_10:
They say beautiful flowers have thorns, but
to have poison on top of that...
ch0027_00_natane_en.lsd.ch0027_00_natane/0604_0702_02_10: I think Roserade needs to be less pretty! Not!
ch0027_00_natane_en.lsd.ch0027_00_natane/0605_0701_01_10: The Pokémon I like all have really distinct aromas.
ch0027_00_natane_en.lsd.ch0027_00_natane/0605_0701_02_10:
But even then, their scent changes from day
to day. I can even tell their mood by how
they smell that day!
ch0027_00_natane_en.lsd.ch0027_00_natane/0605_0701_03_10:
It’s almost like I’m talking to them.
It makes me feel like we’re really connected,
even if they don’t understand the words I use.
ch0027_00_natane_en.lsd.ch0027_00_natane/0605_0701_04_10:
You know, I’m a little curious about your scent,
too, [Name:PlayerNickname ]. Hee hee!
ch0027_00_natane_en.lsd.ch0027_00_natane/0605_0702_01_10:
Any Pokémon will try to tell you what it’s
feeling, even if it can’t use words.
Each Pokémon has its way of communicating.
ch0027_00_natane_en.lsd.ch0027_00_natane/0605_0702_02_10:
I think a Trainer’s job is to understand how
their Pokémon communicate!
ch0027_00_natane_en.lsd.ch0027_00_natane/1701_0701_01_10:
Oh, there you are! I was looking for you!
I wanted to give you this.
ch0027_00_natane_en.lsd.ch0027_00_natane/1701_0701_02_10:
Just thought I’d share!
Hold on to it. I’m sure it’ll come in handy!
ch0027_00_natane_en.lsd.ch0027_00_natane/1701_0702_01_10:
It’s the same in nature, you know?
You receive, then you give—it’s all a cycle.
ch0027_00_natane_en.lsd.ch0027_00_natane/2501_0701_01_10:
So, I have a secret to tell.
I didn’t come here just for the adventure.
ch0027_00_natane_en.lsd.ch0027_00_natane/2501_0701_02_10:
I came because I also wanted to overcome
my fears.
ch0027_00_natane_en.lsd.ch0027_00_natane/2501_0701_03_10:
I haven’t really been able to tell my friends
that I’m a bit of a coward, but...
ch0027_00_natane_en.lsd.ch0027_00_natane/2501_0701_04_10: I felt like if I told you, you’d help me out.
ch0027_00_natane_en.lsd.ch0027_00_natane/2501_0702_01_10: You see, I’m really, really scared of...ghosts.
ch0027_00_natane_en.lsd.ch0027_00_natane/2501_0702_02_10: So, I just can’t handle Ghost-type Pokémon.
ch0027_00_natane_en.lsd.ch0027_00_natane/2511_0701_01_10:
Hey. Do you know the Pokémon Pumpkaboo
and Phantump?
ch0027_00_natane_en.lsd.ch0027_00_natane/2511_0701_02_10:
As you know, I really love Grass-type
Pokémon, but...
ch0027_00_natane_en.lsd.ch0027_00_natane/2511_0701_03_10:
These two, they’re not just Grass type.
They’re also Ghost type!
ch0027_00_natane_en.lsd.ch0027_00_natane/2511_0701_04_10:
I want to take care of them and cuddle them too,
so I can get over my fear.
ch0027_00_natane_en.lsd.ch0027_00_natane/2511_0702_01_10: See, I think they’re cute. I really do.
ch0027_00_natane_en.lsd.ch0027_00_natane/2511_0702_02_10:
But their movements and whatnot are a bit
different from normal Grass types, and they
scare me a little.
ch0027_00_natane_en.lsd.ch0027_00_natane/2511_0702_03_10:
Still, as a Grass-type Pokémon Trainer,
I can’t just stay scared!
Someday I’ll be able to cuddle them!
ch0027_00_natane_en.lsd.ch0027_00_natane/3001_0701_01_10:
Good morning! How’re you feeling?
I’m always doing great!
ch0027_00_natane_en.lsd.ch0027_00_natane/3002_0701_01_10:
Today is another day where we can give it
our all! It helps to say it out loud, you know.
ch0027_00_natane_en.lsd.ch0027_00_natane/3003_0701_01_10:
Hey there! Let’s keep having Pokémon battles
and continue getting stronger!
ch0027_00_natane_en.lsd.ch0027_00_natane/3004_0701_01_10:
We’re all set and ready to get going!
La la la la la la la!
ch0027_00_natane_en.lsd.ch0027_00_natane/3005_0701_01_10:
Good evening! Adventuring at night is fun, too.
I mean, I’m not s-scared of the dark or anything.
ch0027_00_natane_en.lsd.ch0027_00_natane/3006_0701_01_10:
*yawn*
I’m getting drowsy! I can’t help it, though—
all the plants are asleep, too!

ch0028_00_ibuki_en.lsd.ch0028_00_ibuki/0101_0701_01_10:
There you are, [Name:PlayerNickname ]!
It’s about time! I thought you’d never come.
ch0028_00_ibuki_en.lsd.ch0028_00_ibuki/0101_0701_02_10:
Heh heh, so...
Let’s get exploring!
ch0028_00_ibuki_en.lsd.ch0028_00_ibuki/0601_0701_01_10:
What are you staring at?
Don’t be so rude.
ch0028_00_ibuki_en.lsd.ch0028_00_ibuki/0601_0701_03_10:
Well, there must be more to you than meets the
eye if you understand the beauty of this style!
ch0028_00_ibuki_en.lsd.ch0028_00_ibuki/0601_0701_04_10:
This is the ultimate fashion, appropriate for
the ultimate Gym Leader!
ch0028_00_ibuki_en.lsd.ch0028_00_ibuki/0601_0701_05_10:
No, it’s not strange—and I’m not embarrassed
to be wearing it, either!
ch0028_00_ibuki_en.lsd.ch0028_00_ibuki/0601_0702_01_10: Heh, it’s not a bad feeling to have an admirer.
ch0028_00_ibuki_en.lsd.ch0028_00_ibuki/0601_0702_02_10:
Very well! You may admire me to your
heart’s content!
ch0028_00_ibuki_en.lsd.ch0028_00_ibuki/0602_0701_01_10:
Do you know the famous dragon Trainer, Lance?
He’s actually my cousin.
ch0028_00_ibuki_en.lsd.ch0028_00_ibuki/0602_0701_02_10:
But he never acknowledges my skill, even though
we’re both dragon users!
ch0028_00_ibuki_en.lsd.ch0028_00_ibuki/0602_0701_03_10:
Isn’t that just awful?
What could possibly be lacking from me?
ch0028_00_ibuki_en.lsd.ch0028_00_ibuki/0602_0701_04_10:
I wonder—is there truly something lacking
in me?
ch0028_00_ibuki_en.lsd.ch0028_00_ibuki/0602_0702_01_10:
Oh, no, it’s not that I don’t like him.
I just feel a little disgruntled is all.
ch0028_00_ibuki_en.lsd.ch0028_00_ibuki/0602_0702_02_10: Don’t you dare tell anyone I said that, though!
ch0028_00_ibuki_en.lsd.ch0028_00_ibuki/0603_0701_01_10: Kingdra is a very special being to me.
ch0028_00_ibuki_en.lsd.ch0028_00_ibuki/0603_0701_02_10:
She’s strong, beautiful, and tough.
Her regal form is truly fitting of her name!
ch0028_00_ibuki_en.lsd.ch0028_00_ibuki/0603_0701_03_10:
And sometimes, when things don’t go
the way I’d like them to, she comforts me.
ch0028_00_ibuki_en.lsd.ch0028_00_ibuki/0603_0701_04_10: Kingdra looks positively divine, I know, but...
ch0028_00_ibuki_en.lsd.ch0028_00_ibuki/0603_0701_05_10: She also has a very beautiful heart.
ch0028_00_ibuki_en.lsd.ch0028_00_ibuki/0603_0702_01_10:
Kingdra and I are like two hearts beating as one.
That’s why we’re the greatest sync pair of all.
ch0028_00_ibuki_en.lsd.ch0028_00_ibuki/0604_0701_01_10: It can be difficult to raise Dragon-type Pokémon.
ch0028_00_ibuki_en.lsd.ch0028_00_ibuki/0604_0701_02_10:
But if you don’t give up and take things slow
and steady, they’ll always come through for you.
ch0028_00_ibuki_en.lsd.ch0028_00_ibuki/0604_0701_03_10:
Unfortunately, some Trainers do just give up in
the face of the challenge.
ch0028_00_ibuki_en.lsd.ch0028_00_ibuki/0604_0701_04_10:
So one of my goals is to teach such Trainers the
proper way of raising Dragon types.
ch0028_00_ibuki_en.lsd.ch0028_00_ibuki/0604_0701_05_10:
I don’t want there to be any more unhappy
Pokémon or Trainers.
ch0028_00_ibuki_en.lsd.ch0028_00_ibuki/0604_0702_01_10:
If you want to become a Dragon-type user,
your first step should be to find a Pokémon
you really like.
ch0028_00_ibuki_en.lsd.ch0028_00_ibuki/0604_0702_02_10:
It’s always best to raise a Pokémon you like.
And then, someday, we can have a
Dragon-type showdown!
ch0028_00_ibuki_en.lsd.ch0028_00_ibuki/0605_0701_02_10:
There should be lots you can learn from me,
the world’s best Dragon-type master!
ch0028_00_ibuki_en.lsd.ch0028_00_ibuki/0605_0701_03_10:
If you insist, I wouldn’t mind personally
training you.
ch0028_00_ibuki_en.lsd.ch0028_00_ibuki/0605_0701_04_10: Hee hee, once the PML is over, come visit me.
ch0028_00_ibuki_en.lsd.ch0028_00_ibuki/0605_0701_05_10:
I’ll make you my apprentice!
Think of the honor!
ch0028_00_ibuki_en.lsd.ch0028_00_ibuki/0605_0702_01_10:
Well, that’s settled! You’ll come to me!
You promised now, so no backing out!
ch0028_00_ibuki_en.lsd.ch0028_00_ibuki/1701_0701_01_10:
Hey, one moment.
Uh, well... Here, you can have this.
I just happened to come across it.
ch0028_00_ibuki_en.lsd.ch0028_00_ibuki/1701_0701_02_10:
Take it.
If you don’t want it, you don’t have to keep it.
ch0028_00_ibuki_en.lsd.ch0028_00_ibuki/1701_0702_01_10:
Since I personally gave you a gift, you should
treat it like it’s me and treasure it.
ch0028_00_ibuki_en.lsd.ch0028_00_ibuki/1701_0702_02_10:
Oh! But no holding back, though!
Use it whenever you need it!
ch0028_00_ibuki_en.lsd.ch0028_00_ibuki/2501_0701_02_10:
You’re getting very interested in Dragon-type
Pokémon, aren’t you?
ch0028_00_ibuki_en.lsd.ch0028_00_ibuki/2501_0701_03_10:
Hmph, well, I can understand being drawn to
powerful beings!
ch0028_00_ibuki_en.lsd.ch0028_00_ibuki/2501_0701_04_10:
But Dragon-type Pokémon are proud creatures
of legend!
ch0028_00_ibuki_en.lsd.ch0028_00_ibuki/2501_0701_05_10: They won’t warm up to you so easily!
ch0028_00_ibuki_en.lsd.ch0028_00_ibuki/2501_0701_06_10:
They only lend their strength to Trainers who
are truly worthy.
ch0028_00_ibuki_en.lsd.ch0028_00_ibuki/2501_0702_01_10:
It can be difficult to truly bond with one, but a
Dragon-type Pokémon is definitely the best
Pokémon to have as a partner!
ch0028_00_ibuki_en.lsd.ch0028_00_ibuki/2501_0702_02_10: I think you will become obsessed with them, too.
ch0028_00_ibuki_en.lsd.ch0028_00_ibuki/2511_0701_01_10: To me, defeat is an impossibility.
ch0028_00_ibuki_en.lsd.ch0028_00_ibuki/2511_0701_02_10:
Victory is everything.
That’s how I’ve always battled.
ch0028_00_ibuki_en.lsd.ch0028_00_ibuki/2511_0701_03_10:
That’s the only way I can show the strength of
Kingdra and me.
ch0028_00_ibuki_en.lsd.ch0028_00_ibuki/2511_0701_04_10:
That’s why we have to win, no matter who
we’re facing.
ch0028_00_ibuki_en.lsd.ch0028_00_ibuki/2511_0701_05_10:
Yes, I’ve always felt like I didn’t want to
lose for my own sake, but from now...
ch0028_00_ibuki_en.lsd.ch0028_00_ibuki/2511_0702_01_10:
You’re someone who I’m willing to admit is
strong, OK?
ch0028_00_ibuki_en.lsd.ch0028_00_ibuki/2511_0702_02_10:
So I won’t forgive you if you lose to anyone
other than me.
ch0028_00_ibuki_en.lsd.ch0028_00_ibuki/2511_0702_03_10: Promise me you won’t lose to anyone! Promise!
ch0028_00_ibuki_en.lsd.ch0028_00_ibuki/3001_0701_01_10:
Did you wake up early just
so you could waste time?
ch0028_00_ibuki_en.lsd.ch0028_00_ibuki/3002_0701_01_10:
I have some time to talk, if you
don’t have anything else to do.
ch0028_00_ibuki_en.lsd.ch0028_00_ibuki/3003_0701_01_10:
Why don’t you get moving instead of
wasting time fooling around?
ch0028_00_ibuki_en.lsd.ch0028_00_ibuki/3004_0701_01_10:
Good weather today. I’m in a good mood,
so I suppose I can spend time with you.
ch0028_00_ibuki_en.lsd.ch0028_00_ibuki/3005_0701_01_10:
Staying up late is bad for you.
Get some rest while you can.
ch0028_00_ibuki_en.lsd.ch0028_00_ibuki/3006_0701_01_10:
You’re still awake? Well, I suppose I could
keep you company, if you insist.

ch0029_00_asuna_en.lsd.ch0029_00_asuna/0101_0701_01_10:
Hey, [Name:PlayerNickname ]!
Are you burning to battle again today?
ch0029_00_asuna_en.lsd.ch0029_00_asuna/0101_0701_02_10:
You know I’m all warmed up—touch me and
you might get burned! Well, let’s head out!
ch0029_00_asuna_en.lsd.ch0029_00_asuna/0601_0701_01_10:
In my hometown of Lavaridge, you can walk
right out the back of the Pokémon Center and
into a hot spring!
ch0029_00_asuna_en.lsd.ch0029_00_asuna/0601_0701_02_10: You can feel the heat of the earth in the water.
ch0029_00_asuna_en.lsd.ch0029_00_asuna/0601_0701_03_10:
It makes me so hot, I feel like my whole body
is made of flames!
ch0029_00_asuna_en.lsd.ch0029_00_asuna/0601_0701_04_10:
I’d love to go on a nice trip to some hot
springs with my Pokémon.
ch0029_00_asuna_en.lsd.ch0029_00_asuna/0601_0702_01_10:
Hot springs are good for Pokémon, too!
I always bring along some Pokémon
when I go for a soak.
ch0029_00_asuna_en.lsd.ch0029_00_asuna/0601_0702_02_10:
My Numel feels refreshed after a soak
in the springs, too!
ch0029_00_asuna_en.lsd.ch0029_00_asuna/0602_0701_01_10: Sometimes you just can’t get fired up.
ch0029_00_asuna_en.lsd.ch0029_00_asuna/0602_0701_02_10: And that’s when you’ve just gotta do it!
ch0029_00_asuna_en.lsd.ch0029_00_asuna/0602_0701_03_10:
Times like those are when it’s most
important to just go for it!
ch0029_00_asuna_en.lsd.ch0029_00_asuna/0602_0701_04_10:
Weak flames will get blown out easily.
You gotta go big when you light your fire!
ch0029_00_asuna_en.lsd.ch0029_00_asuna/0602_0702_01_10: When you don’t feel like you can keep going...
ch0029_00_asuna_en.lsd.ch0029_00_asuna/0602_0702_02_10:
come see me! I’ll light your fire
back up again!
ch0029_00_asuna_en.lsd.ch0029_00_asuna/0603_0701_01_10:
Some Fire-type Pokémon are so hot,
it’s tough to pet them.
ch0029_00_asuna_en.lsd.ch0029_00_asuna/0603_0701_02_10:
Slugma’s body and Torkoal’s shell
get amazingly hot!
ch0029_00_asuna_en.lsd.ch0029_00_asuna/0603_0701_03_10: Be careful not to burn yourself!
ch0029_00_asuna_en.lsd.ch0029_00_asuna/0603_0702_01_10: Pokémon like it when you show them affection.
ch0029_00_asuna_en.lsd.ch0029_00_asuna/0603_0702_02_10:
Even if they’re hot, when you give them just a
little pat, they’ll know how much you care.
ch0029_00_asuna_en.lsd.ch0029_00_asuna/0604_0701_01_10: Torkoal and I’ve been together for a long time.
ch0029_00_asuna_en.lsd.ch0029_00_asuna/0604_0701_02_10:
When you’ve been around somebody since you
were a kid, they feel like family, don’t they?
ch0029_00_asuna_en.lsd.ch0029_00_asuna/0604_0701_03_10:
Torkoal’s always been there to cheer me up
whenever I was feeling down.
ch0029_00_asuna_en.lsd.ch0029_00_asuna/0604_0701_04_10:
I want to show Torkoal how thankful I am,
and that’s why I’m so fired up to be the
best Trainer I can be!
ch0029_00_asuna_en.lsd.ch0029_00_asuna/0604_0702_01_10: Torkoal’s shell is very important to it.
ch0029_00_asuna_en.lsd.ch0029_00_asuna/0604_0702_02_10: Even when its shell gets hot, I try to polish it.
ch0029_00_asuna_en.lsd.ch0029_00_asuna/0604_0702_03_10: When I do, Torkoal gets really happy!
ch0029_00_asuna_en.lsd.ch0029_00_asuna/0605_0701_01_10:
Do you like hot springs? You should try stopping
by one when you head out on an adventure!
ch0029_00_asuna_en.lsd.ch0029_00_asuna/0605_0701_02_10:
There are all kinds of different hot springs,
and they can be really good for you.
It’s fun to travel around to different ones, too!
ch0029_00_asuna_en.lsd.ch0029_00_asuna/0605_0701_03_10:
Some hot springs let you bring your Pokémon
along, too. I bet your Pokémon would like it.
ch0029_00_asuna_en.lsd.ch0029_00_asuna/0605_0702_01_10:
Battling can be awfully tiring, so it’s important
to rest up and refresh, too.
ch0029_00_asuna_en.lsd.ch0029_00_asuna/0605_0702_02_10:
You might have some way of resting that works
even better than a soak in a hot spring for you.
ch0029_00_asuna_en.lsd.ch0029_00_asuna/1701_0701_01_10: Thanks for everything! This is all yours!
ch0029_00_asuna_en.lsd.ch0029_00_asuna/1701_0701_02_10:
I might forget I have it on me and carry it right
into the hot springs anyway. Then it’d be no
good to anybody!
ch0029_00_asuna_en.lsd.ch0029_00_asuna/1701_0702_01_10:
You get all embarrassed when
you get a present, don’t you.
ch0029_00_asuna_en.lsd.ch0029_00_asuna/1701_0702_02_10:
But I’m going to bring you another one
when I find something good!
ch0029_00_asuna_en.lsd.ch0029_00_asuna/2501_0701_01_10: Try not to push yourself too hard.
ch0029_00_asuna_en.lsd.ch0029_00_asuna/2501_0701_02_10:
I was trying too hard to be a good Gym Leader
and ended up falling into a slump.
ch0029_00_asuna_en.lsd.ch0029_00_asuna/2501_0701_03_10:
That’s when I realized that if I just relax and
do things my way, it’s more fun and I can hone
my skills more easily.
ch0029_00_asuna_en.lsd.ch0029_00_asuna/2501_0701_04_10:
I have my fellow Trainers to thank for
helping me to realize that.
ch0029_00_asuna_en.lsd.ch0029_00_asuna/2501_0702_01_10:
It can be tough to do things your own way,
but it’s not impossible.
ch0029_00_asuna_en.lsd.ch0029_00_asuna/2501_0702_02_10: There’s still so much I don’t know...
ch0029_00_asuna_en.lsd.ch0029_00_asuna/2501_0702_03_10:
but I’m here for you, through good times
and bad! That’s what friends are for!
ch0029_00_asuna_en.lsd.ch0029_00_asuna/2511_0701_01_10:
My grandfather was one of the Elite Four,
and I always looked up to him.
ch0029_00_asuna_en.lsd.ch0029_00_asuna/2511_0701_02_10:
But you know, just because you look up to
somebody doesn’t mean you have to be just
like them. I can never be my grandfather.
ch0029_00_asuna_en.lsd.ch0029_00_asuna/2511_0701_03_10:
So now I’m aiming to be the best version
of myself I can possibly be!
ch0029_00_asuna_en.lsd.ch0029_00_asuna/2511_0701_04_10:
Just watch me! With you by my side, I feel
like there’s no limit to how strong and how
fired up I can get!
ch0029_00_asuna_en.lsd.ch0029_00_asuna/2511_0702_01_10:
I think I was able to become such good
friends with you because I felt comfortable
just being myself.
ch0029_00_asuna_en.lsd.ch0029_00_asuna/2511_0702_02_10:
I hope that when I become the best version of
myself, you’ll have reached that same point, too!
ch0029_00_asuna_en.lsd.ch0029_00_asuna/3001_0701_01_10:
Good morning!
A greeting will light your fire for the whole day!
ch0029_00_asuna_en.lsd.ch0029_00_asuna/3002_0701_01_10:
Morning! Guess what!
I’m going to start my day with a cold shower!
ch0029_00_asuna_en.lsd.ch0029_00_asuna/3003_0701_01_10:
Good afternoon! The sun is shining!
I’m feeling really upbeat!
ch0029_00_asuna_en.lsd.ch0029_00_asuna/3004_0701_01_10:
Good afternoon! How are you feeling?
Me? You know I’m on fire!
ch0029_00_asuna_en.lsd.ch0029_00_asuna/3005_0701_01_10:
Good evening!
Fire shines especially bright at night.
Um, but it’s also important to rest!
ch0029_00_asuna_en.lsd.ch0029_00_asuna/3006_0701_01_10:
Good, uh...evening...
N-no, I wasn’t just dozing off!

ch0030_00_ran_en.lsd.ch0030_00_ran/0101_0701_01_10:
Hee hee hee, I’ve been waiting for you,
[Name:PlayerNickname ]!
ch0030_00_ran_en.lsd.ch0030_00_ran/0101_0701_02_10:
Come on! Each day of training counts!
You have to give it your best today, too!
ch0030_00_ran_en.lsd.ch0030_00_ran/0601_0701_01_10:
Pokémon that use Psychic-type moves tend to be
a little strange.
ch0030_00_ran_en.lsd.ch0030_00_ran/0601_0701_02_10:
Back in the Hoenn region, I met the Clay Doll
Pokémon Baltoy when I was smaller.
ch0030_00_ran_en.lsd.ch0030_00_ran/0601_0701_03_10:
It didn’t move at all, so I got curious
and decided to keep watching it.
ch0030_00_ran_en.lsd.ch0030_00_ran/0601_0701_04_10:
But then it suddenly let out a loud cry! It was 
like that was a signal or something. A whole 
bunch of Baltoy started gathering around!
ch0030_00_ran_en.lsd.ch0030_00_ran/0601_0701_05_10:
I only barely managed to run away before
I got swallowed up in the swarm.
ch0030_00_ran_en.lsd.ch0030_00_ran/0601_0702_01_10:
My Lunatone acts strange sometimes, too.
When it’s a full moon, it starts spinning around
really fast!
ch0030_00_ran_en.lsd.ch0030_00_ran/0601_0702_02_10:
I tried to get it to settle down, but it won’t
stop. I wonder what that’s all about.
ch0030_00_ran_en.lsd.ch0030_00_ran/0602_0701_01_10:
Lunatone is my friend.
It’s been with me for a long time!
ch0030_00_ran_en.lsd.ch0030_00_ran/0602_0701_02_10:
It’s really important to me—just like the
moon itself!
ch0030_00_ran_en.lsd.ch0030_00_ran/0602_0701_03_10:
It’s so big and pretty!
It’s a wonderful family member to me!
ch0030_00_ran_en.lsd.ch0030_00_ran/0602_0702_01_10:
Hee hee, Lunatone seems like it’s in a good
mood today!
ch0030_00_ran_en.lsd.ch0030_00_ran/0602_0702_02_10:
I don’t need telepathy to tell what it’s
thinking. We’re family after all!
ch0030_00_ran_en.lsd.ch0030_00_ran/0603_0701_01_10: There are lots of things I really like!
ch0030_00_ran_en.lsd.ch0030_00_ran/0603_0701_02_10:
I like Lunatone, of course, and I like you, too.
I like so many things, I can’t count them all!
ch0030_00_ran_en.lsd.ch0030_00_ran/0603_0701_03_10:
But right now, I think I really like Pasio’s
toy stores!
ch0030_00_ran_en.lsd.ch0030_00_ran/0603_0701_04_10: Time flies when I visit, even if I’m just looking!
ch0030_00_ran_en.lsd.ch0030_00_ran/0603_0702_01_10:
If I spend too long looking at toys,
sometimes Lunatone gets jealous.
ch0030_00_ran_en.lsd.ch0030_00_ran/0603_0702_02_10:
Hee hee, isn’t that silly?
Of course Lunatone is more important than
some silly toy!
ch0030_00_ran_en.lsd.ch0030_00_ran/0604_0701_01_10:
It’s a lot of fun to jump around riding Spoink,
you know?
ch0030_00_ran_en.lsd.ch0030_00_ran/0604_0701_02_10:
Spoink’s tail is like a spring, and he can use it
to jump really high!
ch0030_00_ran_en.lsd.ch0030_00_ran/0604_0701_03_10:
But I need to be careful, ’cause sometimes he
moves so quickly I get thrown off!
ch0030_00_ran_en.lsd.ch0030_00_ran/0604_0701_04_10:
You need to get the...knack?
Yeah, the knack of it.
ch0030_00_ran_en.lsd.ch0030_00_ran/0604_0702_01_10:
Jumping around with Spoink is fun, but
you can only do it when you’re a kid because
adults are too heavy.
ch0030_00_ran_en.lsd.ch0030_00_ran/0604_0702_02_10: I need to make sure I have all the fun I can!
ch0030_00_ran_en.lsd.ch0030_00_ran/0605_0701_01_10:
Hey, [Name:PlayerNickname ],
can you hear me out?
ch0030_00_ran_en.lsd.ch0030_00_ran/0605_0701_02_10:
These days, I’ve started thinking about you more.
Like, how you’re doing or...
ch0030_00_ran_en.lsd.ch0030_00_ran/0605_0701_03_10: what you’re up to... That sort of thing.
ch0030_00_ran_en.lsd.ch0030_00_ran/0605_0701_04_10:
I think that’s why our combination’s getting
better, too!
ch0030_00_ran_en.lsd.ch0030_00_ran/0605_0702_01_10:
Never mind our combination. I just plain enjoy
being around you!
ch0030_00_ran_en.lsd.ch0030_00_ran/0605_0702_02_10:
It’s exciting when I think about what adventure
we’ll have together next!
ch0030_00_ran_en.lsd.ch0030_00_ran/1701_0701_01_10:
Here’s a present for you, since you’re always
working so hard!
ch0030_00_ran_en.lsd.ch0030_00_ran/1701_0701_02_10: I think it’ll be useful to you!
ch0030_00_ran_en.lsd.ch0030_00_ran/1701_0701_03_10:
I’m your friend. Of course I can tell 
what kind of thing you want!
ch0030_00_ran_en.lsd.ch0030_00_ran/1701_0702_01_10:
I know you’ll use it well.
That gift comes from my heart, after all!
ch0030_00_ran_en.lsd.ch0030_00_ran/2501_0701_01_10:
Tate and I sometimes help out with experiments
at the Mossdeep Space Center!
ch0030_00_ran_en.lsd.ch0030_00_ran/2501_0701_02_10:
They say our psychic powers are useful for
the experiments they perform.
ch0030_00_ran_en.lsd.ch0030_00_ran/2501_0701_03_10: And so we’re always happy to help out!
ch0030_00_ran_en.lsd.ch0030_00_ran/2501_0701_05_10: they buy us toys as rewards!
ch0030_00_ran_en.lsd.ch0030_00_ran/2501_0702_01_10:
I’m not helping out with the experiments just
for the toys, OK?
ch0030_00_ran_en.lsd.ch0030_00_ran/2501_0702_02_10:
That’s just a bonus!
I really just want to help out the people
in the Space Center!
ch0030_00_ran_en.lsd.ch0030_00_ran/2511_0701_01_10: I’ve always teamed up with Tate till now, but...
ch0030_00_ran_en.lsd.ch0030_00_ran/2511_0701_02_10:
I’ve learned a lot through teaming up with
you, too!
