ch0030_00_ran_en.lsd.ch0030_00_ran/2511_0701_03_10:
I always thought that my combination with Tate
was perfect ’cause we were twins.
ch0030_00_ran_en.lsd.ch0030_00_ran/2511_0701_04_10:
But I think I realize now there were a lot of
times when Tate worked to stay in sync with me.
ch0030_00_ran_en.lsd.ch0030_00_ran/2511_0701_05_10: Just like how you try to keep in time with me!
ch0030_00_ran_en.lsd.ch0030_00_ran/2511_0702_01_10: Next time, when I team up with Tate again...
ch0030_00_ran_en.lsd.ch0030_00_ran/2511_0702_02_10:
I think we’ll be able to show an even more
powerful combination!
ch0030_00_ran_en.lsd.ch0030_00_ran/3001_0701_01_10: Good morning! Nice day, isn’t it.
ch0030_00_ran_en.lsd.ch0030_00_ran/3003_0701_01_10:
Hello!
Nice weather puts me in such a good mood!
ch0030_00_ran_en.lsd.ch0030_00_ran/3004_0701_01_10: Let’s play a lot and battle a lot!
ch0030_00_ran_en.lsd.ch0030_00_ran/3005_0701_01_10: Good evening! What a beautiful moon tonight!
ch0030_00_ran_en.lsd.ch0030_00_ran/3006_0701_01_10:
I feel the power of the moon
at this time of night.

ch0031_00_fuu_en.lsd.ch0031_00_fuu/0101_0701_01_10:
Heh heh heh, [Name:PlayerNickname ]!
I had a feeling you’d come, so I was waiting.
ch0031_00_fuu_en.lsd.ch0031_00_fuu/0101_0701_02_10: I’m always looking forward to seeing you!
ch0031_00_fuu_en.lsd.ch0031_00_fuu/0601_0701_01_10:
My Solrock has been full of energy
ever since we came here.
ch0031_00_fuu_en.lsd.ch0031_00_fuu/0601_0701_02_10:
Can you feel it?
That crackling, popping sensation?
ch0031_00_fuu_en.lsd.ch0031_00_fuu/0601_0701_03_10:
You can tell how your Pokémon is feeling,
even without any special powers!
ch0031_00_fuu_en.lsd.ch0031_00_fuu/0601_0702_01_10:
Knowing how each other feels is an
amazing power!
ch0031_00_fuu_en.lsd.ch0031_00_fuu/0601_0702_02_10:
You definitely need it to work 
hard together at something.
ch0031_00_fuu_en.lsd.ch0031_00_fuu/0602_0701_01_10:
Liza and I are totally in sync!
But well...
ch0031_00_fuu_en.lsd.ch0031_00_fuu/0602_0701_02_10:
we got into a huge fight once, when Liza lost
one of my toys.
ch0031_00_fuu_en.lsd.ch0031_00_fuu/0602_0701_03_10:
She kept quiet about it for so long!
Even though she knew she couldn’t really hide
it from me!
ch0031_00_fuu_en.lsd.ch0031_00_fuu/0602_0701_04_10:
But well, I ended up forgiving her.
She apologized to me, and besides, she’s the
only twin sister I’ve got!
ch0031_00_fuu_en.lsd.ch0031_00_fuu/0602_0702_01_10:
I’ve started a fight with Liza, too, actually.
I ate her snack without asking her.
ch0031_00_fuu_en.lsd.ch0031_00_fuu/0602_0702_02_10:
Heh!
I can tell by your look, you think Liza and I
aren’t too different, right?
ch0031_00_fuu_en.lsd.ch0031_00_fuu/0603_0701_01_10: Solrock doesn’t really change its expression.
ch0031_00_fuu_en.lsd.ch0031_00_fuu/0603_0701_02_10:
So it expresses itself using its
whole body!
ch0031_00_fuu_en.lsd.ch0031_00_fuu/0603_0701_03_10:
That’s why I want to show it how I feel using
body language, too—not just words.
ch0031_00_fuu_en.lsd.ch0031_00_fuu/0603_0702_01_10:
It’s difficult to show your feelings using your
whole body like Solrock does...
ch0031_00_fuu_en.lsd.ch0031_00_fuu/0603_0702_02_10:
But when I’m with Solrock, it’s like we’re
dancing together. It’s a lot of fun!
ch0031_00_fuu_en.lsd.ch0031_00_fuu/0604_0701_01_10:
There was a time when Liza and I swapped
clothing and hairstyles.
ch0031_00_fuu_en.lsd.ch0031_00_fuu/0604_0701_02_10:
I ended up being sent to a place where there
were only girls.
ch0031_00_fuu_en.lsd.ch0031_00_fuu/0604_0701_03_10: Liza said she had fun, but I was so embarrassed.
ch0031_00_fuu_en.lsd.ch0031_00_fuu/0604_0702_01_10:
Liza says she wants to do it again, but
I dunno.
ch0031_00_fuu_en.lsd.ch0031_00_fuu/0604_0702_02_10:
Hmmm. Well, if it’ll make Liza happy, maybe
I’ll give it a go again. Even if it means I’ll
get embarrassed again.
ch0031_00_fuu_en.lsd.ch0031_00_fuu/1701_0701_01_10:
You always keep me company, so...
Here! A present for you!
ch0031_00_fuu_en.lsd.ch0031_00_fuu/1701_0701_02_10:
Heh heh heh, I tried to pick something perfect.
I hope you like it!
ch0031_00_fuu_en.lsd.ch0031_00_fuu/1701_0702_01_10:
I didn’t ask anybody for advice, you know?
I picked it all by myself! I was a little nervous.
ch0031_00_fuu_en.lsd.ch0031_00_fuu/2501_0701_01_10: Liza and I help out at the Space Center sometimes.
ch0031_00_fuu_en.lsd.ch0031_00_fuu/2501_0701_02_10: And they bought me a cool toy as a reward!
ch0031_00_fuu_en.lsd.ch0031_00_fuu/2501_0701_03_10:
It was so cool, I carried it around everywhere,
and now I accidentally brought it here with me.
Don’t tell Liza!
ch0031_00_fuu_en.lsd.ch0031_00_fuu/2501_0702_01_10:
They told me at the Space Center that the
universe is full of mysteries.
ch0031_00_fuu_en.lsd.ch0031_00_fuu/2501_0702_02_10: I hope I can go to space someday.
ch0031_00_fuu_en.lsd.ch0031_00_fuu/2511_0701_01_10: I’m glad I was able to battle with you.
ch0031_00_fuu_en.lsd.ch0031_00_fuu/2511_0701_02_10:
I always team up with Liza, so there
are a lot of things I never realized before.
ch0031_00_fuu_en.lsd.ch0031_00_fuu/2511_0701_03_10:
I want to learn lots more and become
even stronger!
ch0031_00_fuu_en.lsd.ch0031_00_fuu/2511_0702_01_10:
Liza told me she also learned a lot by teaming
up with different people.
ch0031_00_fuu_en.lsd.ch0031_00_fuu/2511_0702_02_10:
Maybe I should challenge her to a battle?
I want to see how strong we’ve gotten!
ch0031_00_fuu_en.lsd.ch0031_00_fuu/3001_0701_01_10:
Good morning!
You look wide awake. I was just wondering
what kind of fun I could have today.
ch0031_00_fuu_en.lsd.ch0031_00_fuu/3002_0701_01_10:
Morning!
A nice early greeting really wakes me up!
ch0031_00_fuu_en.lsd.ch0031_00_fuu/3003_0701_01_10:
Hello! Nice day, isn’t it.
Perfect for a Pokémon battle!
ch0031_00_fuu_en.lsd.ch0031_00_fuu/3004_0701_01_10:
Hey! I always get hungry for
a snack around this time...
ch0031_00_fuu_en.lsd.ch0031_00_fuu/3005_0701_01_10:
Good evening!
You’re here late. Don’t work too hard.
ch0031_00_fuu_en.lsd.ch0031_00_fuu/3006_0701_01_10:
*yawn*
Oh! No, I’m not tired! I’m fine!

ch0032_00_yanagi_en.lsd.ch0032_00_yanagi/0101_0701_01_10:
Pleasure to meet you, [Name:PlayerNickname ].
Both people and Pokémon have so many
experiences in their lives.
ch0032_00_yanagi_en.lsd.ch0032_00_yanagi/0101_0701_02_10: Be sure to face the day with a strong spirit.
ch0032_00_yanagi_en.lsd.ch0032_00_yanagi/0601_0701_01_10:
I am often told I wake up earlier than anybody,
but the truth is it’s not by my own will.
ch0032_00_yanagi_en.lsd.ch0032_00_yanagi/0601_0701_02_10:
In the Johto region, there is the Swine Pokémon
known as Piloswine...
ch0032_00_yanagi_en.lsd.ch0032_00_yanagi/0601_0701_03_10:
and it always comes to wake me in the morning,
by climbing onto me.
ch0032_00_yanagi_en.lsd.ch0032_00_yanagi/0601_0701_04_10:
It’s quite heavy, and there are times when its
tusks start digging into me, too.
It can be rather dangerous.
ch0032_00_yanagi_en.lsd.ch0032_00_yanagi/0601_0702_01_10:
If you find yourself awake early, why not
go for a walk?
ch0032_00_yanagi_en.lsd.ch0032_00_yanagi/0601_0702_02_10:
I personally recommend a stroll along a beautiful
glacier. I find it very calming.
ch0032_00_yanagi_en.lsd.ch0032_00_yanagi/0602_0701_01_10:
Both people and Pokémon go through much
suffering in order to become strong.
ch0032_00_yanagi_en.lsd.ch0032_00_yanagi/0602_0701_02_10:
But that is what makes the joy of victory in a
Pokémon battle so sweet.
ch0032_00_yanagi_en.lsd.ch0032_00_yanagi/0602_0701_03_10:
Just like how the warmth of spring is so joyous
after a harsh winter.
ch0032_00_yanagi_en.lsd.ch0032_00_yanagi/0602_0702_01_10:
When you face true hardship, remember you
have friends and allies right beside you.
ch0032_00_yanagi_en.lsd.ch0032_00_yanagi/0602_0702_02_10:
Your bonds with them are sure to lend
you strength.
ch0032_00_yanagi_en.lsd.ch0032_00_yanagi/0603_0701_01_10:
A long time ago, I placed Seel in serious danger,
all because of my own inexperience.
ch0032_00_yanagi_en.lsd.ch0032_00_yanagi/0603_0701_02_10:
It was at the Seafoam Islands of the Kanto
region. Seel had collapsed. It was up to
me to save him, but...
ch0032_00_yanagi_en.lsd.ch0032_00_yanagi/0603_0701_03_10:
foolish as I was, I ended up losing
consciousness, too.
ch0032_00_yanagi_en.lsd.ch0032_00_yanagi/0603_0701_04_10:
That is why I chose to learn from my mistakes
and became a teacher of harshness.
ch0032_00_yanagi_en.lsd.ch0032_00_yanagi/0603_0702_01_10: Make sure you don’t end up like me, child.
ch0032_00_yanagi_en.lsd.ch0032_00_yanagi/0603_0702_02_10:
Become strong, so that you can protect your
precious friends and Pokémon.
ch0032_00_yanagi_en.lsd.ch0032_00_yanagi/0604_0701_01_10:
My age is catching up with me.
These days, my legs simply aren’t what they
used to be.
ch0032_00_yanagi_en.lsd.ch0032_00_yanagi/0604_0701_02_10:
But as long as I have this cane—and the
company of my Pokémon—I will be just fine.
ch0032_00_yanagi_en.lsd.ch0032_00_yanagi/0604_0701_03_10:
My Pokémon does more than just help me walk—
he bolsters my old heart as well.
ch0032_00_yanagi_en.lsd.ch0032_00_yanagi/0604_0701_04_10:
I won’t be losing to young whippersnappers
anytime soon.
ch0032_00_yanagi_en.lsd.ch0032_00_yanagi/0604_0702_03_10:
They are all my trusted allies.
I know they will support me no matter what.
ch0032_00_yanagi_en.lsd.ch0032_00_yanagi/0604_0702_04_10:
As long as I have them by my side, I know I can
hold my own against any young Trainer.
ch0032_00_yanagi_en.lsd.ch0032_00_yanagi/0605_0701_01_10:
I believe that the seasons represent a person’s life,
young [Name:PlayerNickname ].
ch0032_00_yanagi_en.lsd.ch0032_00_yanagi/0605_0701_02_10:
After a hot summer, a calm autumn arrives, and
then the harsh winter. But once winter ends...
ch0032_00_yanagi_en.lsd.ch0032_00_yanagi/0605_0701_03_10:
we are greeted by the warm spring.
We can withstand the harsh winter because we
know spring is coming.
ch0032_00_yanagi_en.lsd.ch0032_00_yanagi/0605_0702_01_10:
Even when you are faced with harsh times, you
must persevere, trusting that spring will come.
ch0032_00_yanagi_en.lsd.ch0032_00_yanagi/0605_0702_02_10:
It always does, without fail.
You must support your friends as they support
you—and wait for spring together.
ch0032_00_yanagi_en.lsd.ch0032_00_yanagi/1701_0701_01_10:
I found this on my walk this morning.
Go on. You can have it.
ch0032_00_yanagi_en.lsd.ch0032_00_yanagi/1701_0701_02_10:
It is more fitting for you to have it than I.
Keep it.
ch0032_00_yanagi_en.lsd.ch0032_00_yanagi/1701_0702_01_10: I trust you will put it to the best use.
ch0032_00_yanagi_en.lsd.ch0032_00_yanagi/1701_0702_02_10:
The way you use items is what matters.
Remember this, child...
ch0032_00_yanagi_en.lsd.ch0032_00_yanagi/1701_0702_03_10: It is sure to be useful in your life.
ch0032_00_yanagi_en.lsd.ch0032_00_yanagi/2501_0701_01_10:
[Name:PlayerNickname ], how are you doing
these days? You have a braver look than before.
ch0032_00_yanagi_en.lsd.ch0032_00_yanagi/2501_0701_02_10:
Adventures teach you both fun and harshness.
That is why it is important to press onward—but
without arrogance.
ch0032_00_yanagi_en.lsd.ch0032_00_yanagi/2501_0701_03_10:
Having all-out battles with other Trainers is
sure to give you the desire to improve.
ch0032_00_yanagi_en.lsd.ch0032_00_yanagi/2501_0702_01_10:
I see you’ve gained a fair amount of experience.
And yet you have much to learn.
ch0032_00_yanagi_en.lsd.ch0032_00_yanagi/2501_0702_02_10:
You are one of the more talented Trainers
I’ve met!
ch0032_00_yanagi_en.lsd.ch0032_00_yanagi/2501_0702_03_10:
But that is why you must have discipline as well.
Never forget winter’s harshness, young one.
ch0032_00_yanagi_en.lsd.ch0032_00_yanagi/2511_0701_01_10:
The trick to winning battles?
I wasn’t expecting such a question from you.
ch0032_00_yanagi_en.lsd.ch0032_00_yanagi/2511_0701_02_10:
Knowing your opponent is important, of course,
but knowing your own Pokémon is far more so.
ch0032_00_yanagi_en.lsd.ch0032_00_yanagi/2511_0701_03_10:
Understand your Pokémon’s characteristics, and
turn the tide of the battle.
ch0032_00_yanagi_en.lsd.ch0032_00_yanagi/2511_0701_04_10:
After that, it’s experience that decides who
wins and loses. Those who master the type
matchups master the battle.
ch0032_00_yanagi_en.lsd.ch0032_00_yanagi/2511_0702_01_10:
You’ve grown quite strong.
I think now you could survive even the harshest
of winters.
ch0032_00_yanagi_en.lsd.ch0032_00_yanagi/2511_0702_02_10:
But remember, there are still many Trainers who
are far stronger than you. If you slack off from
battling, you will lose your skill.
ch0032_00_yanagi_en.lsd.ch0032_00_yanagi/2511_0702_03_10:
I hope you become strong enough to someday
help teach others, [Name:PlayerNickname ].
ch0032_00_yanagi_en.lsd.ch0032_00_yanagi/3001_0701_01_10:
Good morning! Is that really the time?
I’ve been up since five.
ch0032_00_yanagi_en.lsd.ch0032_00_yanagi/3002_0701_01_10:
It’s the beginning of a bright new day.
Let’s continue to do the best we can.
ch0032_00_yanagi_en.lsd.ch0032_00_yanagi/3003_0701_01_10:
Hello there! Sunny days like these help to
soften the harshness of winter, they do.
ch0032_00_yanagi_en.lsd.ch0032_00_yanagi/3004_0701_01_10: How are you? Are you giving it your all?
ch0032_00_yanagi_en.lsd.ch0032_00_yanagi/3005_0701_01_10:
Good evening.
The day will soon be over. You’ve worked hard.
ch0032_00_yanagi_en.lsd.ch0032_00_yanagi/3006_0701_01_10:
And so another day passes. Be sure to treasure
the time you have tomorrow as well.

ch0033_00_yakon_en.lsd.ch0033_00_yakon/0101_0701_01_10:
Well, I’ll be! If it ain’t [Name:PlayerNickname ]!
So yer back, huh? Yer gutsy, kid. I like that!
ch0033_00_yakon_en.lsd.ch0033_00_yakon/0101_0701_02_10: Y’all better show me yer tough side today!
ch0033_00_yakon_en.lsd.ch0033_00_yakon/0601_0701_01_10:
Say, have y’ever seen a vibratin’
Palpitoad before? They’re a sight to
see, I tell ya! A real treat!
ch0033_00_yakon_en.lsd.ch0033_00_yakon/0601_0701_02_10:
They’re pretty famous back in Driftveil
City in the Unova region—where I’m from.
ch0033_00_yakon_en.lsd.ch0033_00_yakon/0601_0701_03_10:
That’s not why I brought a Palpitoad
here with me, though.
ch0033_00_yakon_en.lsd.ch0033_00_yakon/0601_0701_04_10:
It’s really on account o’ the way
they show their true grit whenever
they battle!
ch0033_00_yakon_en.lsd.ch0033_00_yakon/0601_0702_01_10:
If yer interested in seein’ 
some o’ that Palpitoad grit in action, 
you should come visit me in Unova!
ch0033_00_yakon_en.lsd.ch0033_00_yakon/0601_0702_02_10:
You’ll prolly hear their cries all
over the place there!
ch0033_00_yakon_en.lsd.ch0033_00_yakon/0602_0701_01_10:
Back in Unova, my Excadrill is
a must-have business partner when
it comes to minin’ work!
ch0033_00_yakon_en.lsd.ch0033_00_yakon/0602_0701_02_10:
At one point in my life, I reckon I had
truly hit rock bottom. Lower than low.
ch0033_00_yakon_en.lsd.ch0033_00_yakon/0602_0701_03_10:
But with Excadrill by my side, I was
slowly able to drill my way back up
the tunnel.
ch0033_00_yakon_en.lsd.ch0033_00_yakon/0602_0701_04_10:
Inch by inch, we rose right back on up
to the surface!
ch0033_00_yakon_en.lsd.ch0033_00_yakon/0602_0701_05_10:
To this day, I still dream about
all the hard work we did.
ch0033_00_yakon_en.lsd.ch0033_00_yakon/0602_0702_01_10:
No matter how tough things get,
it’ll be all right in the end if you’ve
got yer Pokémon there beside ya!
ch0033_00_yakon_en.lsd.ch0033_00_yakon/0602_0702_02_10:
So keep yer chin up, ya hear?
’Specially when the goin’ gets tough.
ch0033_00_yakon_en.lsd.ch0033_00_yakon/0603_0701_01_10:
Gettin’ plenty o’ rest is part o’
yer job! Spread yerself too thin, ’n’
you’ll surely burn out.
ch0033_00_yakon_en.lsd.ch0033_00_yakon/0603_0701_02_10:
As for me, I find that takin’ little strolls 
around town here on Pasio’s been 
a nice breath o’ fresh air.
ch0033_00_yakon_en.lsd.ch0033_00_yakon/0603_0701_03_10:
This sure is a mighty-fine place.
I could learn a thing or two here...
Improve my city back home.
ch0033_00_yakon_en.lsd.ch0033_00_yakon/0603_0702_01_10:
Lookin’ out at all them city streets
is one o’ the finest parts o’ my job,
I tell ya!
ch0033_00_yakon_en.lsd.ch0033_00_yakon/0603_0702_02_10:
When I look up at them buildings, shaped
like nothin’ I ever seen before, heh,
even this ol’ boss gets excited.
ch0033_00_yakon_en.lsd.ch0033_00_yakon/0604_0701_01_10:
Lookin’ out at the ocean reminds
me o’ Driftveil City.
ch0033_00_yakon_en.lsd.ch0033_00_yakon/0604_0701_02_10:
I wonder how all the workers
back home are holdin’ up.
ch0033_00_yakon_en.lsd.ch0033_00_yakon/0604_0701_03_10:
I’m hankerin’ to get back ’n’ see how
much all of ’em have grown since
I’ve been gone!
ch0033_00_yakon_en.lsd.ch0033_00_yakon/0604_0702_01_10:
Them Driftveil City workers sure have got
some guts, lemme tell ya.
ch0033_00_yakon_en.lsd.ch0033_00_yakon/0604_0702_02_10:
It’ll be nice to see everybody again.
Maybe I’ll buy ’em all some souvenirs
while I’m here!
ch0033_00_yakon_en.lsd.ch0033_00_yakon/0605_0701_01_10:
[Name:PlayerNickname ]! Yer finally showin’
some true grit, ain’t ya.
ch0033_00_yakon_en.lsd.ch0033_00_yakon/0605_0701_02_10:
But I reckon you’ve still got some room
to grow in those britches o’ yers.
Aim for the sky, I always say!
ch0033_00_yakon_en.lsd.ch0033_00_yakon/0605_0701_03_10:
If y’all can face yer opponent head on
’n’ win—no cheap tricks—I reckon
y’all have got some real skill!
ch0033_00_yakon_en.lsd.ch0033_00_yakon/0605_0702_01_10:
Mayhaps I said a li’l too much just then,
for an ol’ miner like me, anyway.
ch0033_00_yakon_en.lsd.ch0033_00_yakon/0605_0702_02_10:
I do commend ya on yer youth and
passion and grit—but that don’t mean
I gotta like ya!
ch0033_00_yakon_en.lsd.ch0033_00_yakon/0605_0702_03_10:
It ain’t often somebody gets a
compliment outta ol’ Clay!
ch0033_00_yakon_en.lsd.ch0033_00_yakon/1701_0701_01_10:
Hey there, kid!
Fancy meetin’ ya here!
ch0033_00_yakon_en.lsd.ch0033_00_yakon/1701_0701_02_10:
I was just fixin’ to give ya this!
Go on—use it how ya like!
ch0033_00_yakon_en.lsd.ch0033_00_yakon/1701_0702_01_10:
It’s just a trifle, kid. But I expect ya
to return the favor someday!
ch0033_00_yakon_en.lsd.ch0033_00_yakon/1701_0702_02_10:
Hrmmph! No need to get all worked up now!
That’s jus’ my way o’ sayin’ thanks.
ch0033_00_yakon_en.lsd.ch0033_00_yakon/2501_0701_01_10:
You wanna talk about work?
If yer lookin’ for idle chat,
take yer yapper elsewhere.
ch0033_00_yakon_en.lsd.ch0033_00_yakon/2501_0701_02_10:
You shouldn’t get too overly familiar
with work people, see? That’s just
business fundamentals right there.
ch0033_00_yakon_en.lsd.ch0033_00_yakon/2501_0701_03_10:
Hah, the workers back in Driftveil City
are a different story, though!
ch0033_00_yakon_en.lsd.ch0033_00_yakon/2501_0702_01_10:
You got a sharp eye, kid. And you ain’t
lackin’ much in the cool, calm, and
collected department, neither!
ch0033_00_yakon_en.lsd.ch0033_00_yakon/2501_0702_02_10:
That critical judgment o’ yers’ll come
in handy for ya someday—you’ll see.
Jus’ stay sharp, kid!
ch0033_00_yakon_en.lsd.ch0033_00_yakon/2501_0702_03_10:
When ya boil ’em down, Pokémon
battles ’n’ doin’ business
ain’t so different.
ch0033_00_yakon_en.lsd.ch0033_00_yakon/2511_0701_01_10:
So, ya fancy yerself a bona fide Trainer
now, do ya? You’re learnin’ the ropes
pretty well—I’ll give ya that!
ch0033_00_yakon_en.lsd.ch0033_00_yakon/2511_0701_02_10:
Just don’t go gettin’ all content and complacent
yet, ya hear?
ch0033_00_yakon_en.lsd.ch0033_00_yakon/2511_0701_03_10:
If yer expectin’ a bonus, ya better be willin’ to do
whatever it takes! No givin’ up halfway, got it?
ch0033_00_yakon_en.lsd.ch0033_00_yakon/2511_0702_01_10:
Work ’n’ business are all about trust.
Seems yer startin’ to understand
that pretty well!
ch0033_00_yakon_en.lsd.ch0033_00_yakon/2511_0702_02_10:
I ain’t never thought about havin’
business partners before.
ch0033_00_yakon_en.lsd.ch0033_00_yakon/2511_0702_03_10:
But you’ve got some good prospects, kid.
If—and that’s a BIG if...
ch0033_00_yakon_en.lsd.ch0033_00_yakon/2511_0702_04_10:
If ya won’t take no for an answer,
come ’n’ see me in Driftveil City!
ch0033_00_yakon_en.lsd.ch0033_00_yakon/2511_0702_05_10: I’ll hire ya on at my company!
ch0033_00_yakon_en.lsd.ch0033_00_yakon/3001_0701_01_10:
It’s still mornin’, kid.
Let’s figure out how ta put this day to good use!
ch0033_00_yakon_en.lsd.ch0033_00_yakon/3002_0701_01_10:
Lemme tell ya, wakin’ up early does a world
o’ good. Makes the whole day longer!
ch0033_00_yakon_en.lsd.ch0033_00_yakon/3003_0701_01_10:
Hope you ate a hearty lunch, kid.
We still got a whole day ahead of us!
ch0033_00_yakon_en.lsd.ch0033_00_yakon/3004_0701_01_10:
Don’t get me wrong.
I got nothin’ against a good nap now and again.
It’s all about gettin’ that shut-eye!
ch0033_00_yakon_en.lsd.ch0033_00_yakon/3005_0701_01_10:
Ah! Night.
Now, let’s see who can stay awake longer...
ch0033_00_yakon_en.lsd.ch0033_00_yakon/3006_0701_01_10:
I know nighttime’s for sleepin’, but ya know...
it’s tough to lose so much time.

ch0034_00_matsurika_en.lsd.ch0034_00_matsurika/0101_0701_02_10: I think I’m gonna start a new sketch.
ch0034_00_matsurika_en.lsd.ch0034_00_matsurika/0601_0701_05_10:
Oops! Sorry, I kinda zoned out there.
Sometimes I just get lost in my thoughts.
ch0034_00_matsurika_en.lsd.ch0034_00_matsurika/0601_0701_06_10:
Being able to focus and concentrate
helps a lot with painting, too.
ch0034_00_matsurika_en.lsd.ch0034_00_matsurika/0601_0701_07_10:
Painting is pretty much my life.
I’ve loved doing art forever.
ch0034_00_matsurika_en.lsd.ch0034_00_matsurika/0601_0701_08_10:
It’s one of the reasons I came to Pasio,
actually. I wanted to see all of the beauty
this place has to offer.
ch0034_00_matsurika_en.lsd.ch0034_00_matsurika/0601_0702_01_10:
Whenever I paint or sketch people,
I feel like I somehow get to know
them better.
ch0034_00_matsurika_en.lsd.ch0034_00_matsurika/0601_0702_02_10:
I wanna get to know everything about
you, your Pokémon, and Pasio, too!
ch0034_00_matsurika_en.lsd.ch0034_00_matsurika/0602_0701_01_10:
Back in Alola, we have this Pokémon
called Shiinotic.
ch0034_00_matsurika_en.lsd.ch0034_00_matsurika/0602_0701_02_10:
The way they move their little bodies around
is really unique—I make them the subject
of a lot of my paintings.
ch0034_00_matsurika_en.lsd.ch0034_00_matsurika/0602_0701_03_10:
Although, if you stare at them long
enough, you’ll start to get sleepy.
ch0034_00_matsurika_en.lsd.ch0034_00_matsurika/0602_0702_01_10:
Anyway, if you ever come across a Shiinotic,
take good care of it! And be careful you
don’t end up dozing off.
ch0034_00_matsurika_en.lsd.ch0034_00_matsurika/0602_0702_02_10:
Shiinotic have kind of an odd look
about them, but I promise they’re all
really nice!
ch0034_00_matsurika_en.lsd.ch0034_00_matsurika/0603_0701_01_10:
Oops. I think I got some paint on my face.
Guess that’s proof I painted something rad!
ch0034_00_matsurika_en.lsd.ch0034_00_matsurika/0603_0701_02_10:
When I get super focused on my work,
sometimes the paint flies everywhere and
I end up looking like a canvas myself!
ch0034_00_matsurika_en.lsd.ch0034_00_matsurika/0603_0701_03_10:
I’m not kidding! When the paint’s flying
around, that’s a good thing! It’s fun getting
covered in paint.
ch0034_00_matsurika_en.lsd.ch0034_00_matsurika/0603_0701_04_10:
I mean, sometimes I put paint on myself
on purpose. Helps to get me in the mood.
Kinda like a good luck charm or something.
ch0034_00_matsurika_en.lsd.ch0034_00_matsurika/0603_0702_01_10:
If you get paint on your face, do you look
in the mirror before you wash it off?
I’m always curious to see what I look like.
ch0034_00_matsurika_en.lsd.ch0034_00_matsurika/0603_0702_02_10:
I mean, getting paint on your face can be
like a piece of art on its own. You just
gotta wash it off in the end.
ch0034_00_matsurika_en.lsd.ch0034_00_matsurika/0604_0701_01_10:
My Granbull has a pretty scary-looking
mug, but underneath that, she’s really
just a big scaredy-cat.
ch0034_00_matsurika_en.lsd.ch0034_00_matsurika/0604_0701_02_10:
Once she warms up to you, she’ll
snuggle and play all day, though.
Such a cutie pie.
ch0034_00_matsurika_en.lsd.ch0034_00_matsurika/0604_0701_03_10:
When Granbull was just a little Snubbull,
she sometimes used to gnaw on
my paintings.
ch0034_00_matsurika_en.lsd.ch0034_00_matsurika/0604_0701_04_10:
It took me a while to figure it out,
but she actually did that when she
was really happy.
ch0034_00_matsurika_en.lsd.ch0034_00_matsurika/0604_0702_01_10:
I guess now I know my Granbull
loves my paintings! Heh heh.
ch0034_00_matsurika_en.lsd.ch0034_00_matsurika/0604_0702_02_10:
I’ll have to keep painting more and more
stuff if I want to keep her happy!
ch0034_00_matsurika_en.lsd.ch0034_00_matsurika/0605_0701_01_10:
Hey, do you think you could come and
find me after the PML’s over?
ch0034_00_matsurika_en.lsd.ch0034_00_matsurika/0605_0701_02_10:
It’s just, like, I think you have a really
beautiful heart, [Name:PlayerNickname ].
ch0034_00_matsurika_en.lsd.ch0034_00_matsurika/0605_0701_03_10:
It would make me really happy if I could
sketch you and your Pokémon.
If I could capture your hearts in a painting.
ch0034_00_matsurika_en.lsd.ch0034_00_matsurika/0605_0702_01_10:
I wonder what color palette would best
represent that pure heart of yours.
ch0034_00_matsurika_en.lsd.ch0034_00_matsurika/0605_0702_02_10:
Heh heh, I guess that’s for me to know
and you to find out! I’m excited to start.
ch0034_00_matsurika_en.lsd.ch0034_00_matsurika/1701_0701_01_10:
Pasio’s chock-full of interesting stuff!
I came across this a little while ago.
ch0034_00_matsurika_en.lsd.ch0034_00_matsurika/1701_0701_02_10:
I wanted to give it to you as a present.
Here, have at it!
ch0034_00_matsurika_en.lsd.ch0034_00_matsurika/1701_0702_02_10: I’m sure it’ll help you on your journey.
ch0034_00_matsurika_en.lsd.ch0034_00_matsurika/2501_0701_01_10:
Alola!
Well, well, aren’t you a ray of
sunshine today.
ch0034_00_matsurika_en.lsd.ch0034_00_matsurika/2501_0701_02_10:
Oh. That just gave me an idea for
a new painting. A nice, happy one.
ch0034_00_matsurika_en.lsd.ch0034_00_matsurika/2501_0701_03_10:
I’ll start sketching it out right now.
You’re gonna love it.
ch0034_00_matsurika_en.lsd.ch0034_00_matsurika/2501_0702_01_10:
Life’s pretty easygoing back in Alola.
Great weather, lazy days...
ch0034_00_matsurika_en.lsd.ch0034_00_matsurika/2501_0702_02_10:
Everyone’s always got a smile on
their face. The people, the Pokémon...
It’s pretty infectious.
ch0034_00_matsurika_en.lsd.ch0034_00_matsurika/2501_0702_03_10:
I’ve got my friends Ilima, Mallow...
Oh! That reminds me, I need to go
meet up with Sophocles!
ch0034_00_matsurika_en.lsd.ch0034_00_matsurika/2511_0701_01_10:
Wha—?! Wait, stop right there!
You can’t come over here right now!
ch0034_00_matsurika_en.lsd.ch0034_00_matsurika/2511_0701_02_10:
I’m finishing up a super, super
important piece over here! Sorry!
ch0034_00_matsurika_en.lsd.ch0034_00_matsurika/2511_0701_03_10:
Yeah, I know I’m always painting.
But this one’s really special, OK?!
ch0034_00_matsurika_en.lsd.ch0034_00_matsurika/2511_0701_04_10:
I don’t wanna ruin the surprise!
So no peeking, OK?! I mean it!
ch0034_00_matsurika_en.lsd.ch0034_00_matsurika/2511_0702_01_10:
Hmm... The last finishing touches
are super important, but I’m not sure
where I wanna go with it yet...
ch0034_00_matsurika_en.lsd.ch0034_00_matsurika/2511_0702_02_10:
W-wait a sec! I thought I told you
no peeking! Sheesh, all I want is to
keep my painting a secret.
ch0034_00_matsurika_en.lsd.ch0034_00_matsurika/2511_0702_03_10:
I wanna make sure I do us justice—
me and Granbull, you and your Pokémon,
our cute, smiley faces...
ch0034_00_matsurika_en.lsd.ch0034_00_matsurika/2511_0702_04_10:
Wait! That was supposed to be a secret!
You didn’t hear any of that, OK?!
ch0034_00_matsurika_en.lsd.ch0034_00_matsurika/3001_0701_01_10:
Mornin’! The breeze feels nice.
Hey, let’s go find a good spot to sketch.
ch0034_00_matsurika_en.lsd.ch0034_00_matsurika/3002_0701_01_10:
Mornin’! One thing I like about traveling
is trying out the local eats.
ch0034_00_matsurika_en.lsd.ch0034_00_matsurika/3003_0701_01_10: Nice light! Wanna go out and sketch?
ch0034_00_matsurika_en.lsd.ch0034_00_matsurika/3004_0701_01_10:
When the sun moves, so do the shadows.
Gotta be careful when you’re painting!
ch0034_00_matsurika_en.lsd.ch0034_00_matsurika/3005_0701_01_10:
I got super sucked into my drawing,
and when I looked up it was already dark!
ch0034_00_matsurika_en.lsd.ch0034_00_matsurika/3006_0701_01_10:
*yawn* I’m gettin’ kinda tired.
I think I’m gonna call it a night.

ch0035_00_matthies_en.lsd.ch0035_00_matthies/0101_0701_01_10:
Hey, [Name:PlayerNickname ]!
I’ve been waiting for you!
ch0035_00_matthies_en.lsd.ch0035_00_matthies/0101_0701_02_10:
In for another training session with me today?
Let’s see what we can make of it!
ch0035_00_matthies_en.lsd.ch0035_00_matthies/0601_0701_01_10: Pasio is so unusual and exciting!
ch0035_00_matthies_en.lsd.ch0035_00_matthies/0601_0701_02_10:
The world is beyond anything I ever
imagined, let me tell you.
ch0035_00_matthies_en.lsd.ch0035_00_matthies/0601_0701_04_10:
Compared to the size of the world,
we’re both little tykes, eh, kid?
ch0035_00_matthies_en.lsd.ch0035_00_matthies/0601_0702_01_10:
There’s got to be so many Electric-type Pokémon
in this world that I’ve never seen before!
ch0035_00_matthies_en.lsd.ch0035_00_matthies/0601_0702_02_10:
Just thinking about it makes me very, very, very,
very, very, very...
ch0035_00_matthies_en.lsd.ch0035_00_matthies/0602_0701_01_10:
Between you and me, kid, I’m a huge fan
of the Pokémon Pikachu.
ch0035_00_matthies_en.lsd.ch0035_00_matthies/0602_0701_02_10:
It’s a world-famous Pokémon, and, well,
I’m in love with it, too!
ch0035_00_matthies_en.lsd.ch0035_00_matthies/0602_0701_03_10:
Just thinking about its adorable little face...
It’s so good! ...Huh?
ch0035_00_matthies_en.lsd.ch0035_00_matthies/0602_0701_04_10:
Oh, of course I love Raichu, too!
It’s really cute—but it packs a punch, too!
It’s perfect!
ch0035_00_matthies_en.lsd.ch0035_00_matthies/0602_0702_01_10:
I’m looking forward to meeting lots of
Trainers with their Pikachu and Raichu here
on Pasio, too.
ch0035_00_matthies_en.lsd.ch0035_00_matthies/0602_0702_02_10: If you see one, report it to me—on the double!
ch0035_00_matthies_en.lsd.ch0035_00_matthies/0603_0701_01_10:
Want to hear a story from me?
Well, I used to have a Voltorb that was actually
quite a coward. Disappointing, right?
ch0035_00_matthies_en.lsd.ch0035_00_matthies/0603_0701_02_10:
You’d be surprised, though. Just because it
was easily scared didn’t make it weak.
ch0035_00_matthies_en.lsd.ch0035_00_matthies/0603_0701_03_10:
My cowardly Voltorb would always notice
even little dangers and hazards!
ch0035_00_matthies_en.lsd.ch0035_00_matthies/0603_0701_04_10:
In fact, that’s how I got my reputation as a
super-cautious electric soldier!
ch0035_00_matthies_en.lsd.ch0035_00_matthies/0603_0702_01_10:
Even things that might seem like a
disappointment can turn out to be really good.
ch0035_00_matthies_en.lsd.ch0035_00_matthies/0603_0702_02_10:
It’s all about variety—about how everyone’s
different. Trust me on that.
ch0035_00_matthies_en.lsd.ch0035_00_matthies/0603_0702_03_10:
One of the reasons why I train my Pokémon so
hard is because I want to make sure I strengthen
their good points!
ch0035_00_matthies_en.lsd.ch0035_00_matthies/0604_0701_01_10:
I have plenty of treasures—things I would
never want to lose!
ch0035_00_matthies_en.lsd.ch0035_00_matthies/0604_0701_02_10: I train hard so that I can protect my treasures!
ch0035_00_matthies_en.lsd.ch0035_00_matthies/0604_0701_03_10:
In fact, I became a Pokémon Trainer to better
protect my treasures!
It’s important to never forget your roots.
ch0035_00_matthies_en.lsd.ch0035_00_matthies/0604_0701_04_10:
I’m not afraid to set traps or install multiple
locks for my room!
It doesn’t matter if people call me a coward!
ch0035_00_matthies_en.lsd.ch0035_00_matthies/0604_0702_01_10:
Sometimes, you’ve got to ask yourself,
what is today for?
ch0035_00_matthies_en.lsd.ch0035_00_matthies/0604_0702_02_10:
It’s something you and I have to keep
asking ourselves, every day!
ch0035_00_matthies_en.lsd.ch0035_00_matthies/0605_0701_01_10:
Hey, you ain’t bad, [Name:PlayerNickname ].
You’re a good kid.
ch0035_00_matthies_en.lsd.ch0035_00_matthies/0605_0701_02_10:
I want things to turn out well for you.
Really, really well!
ch0035_00_matthies_en.lsd.ch0035_00_matthies/0605_0701_03_10:
So, a word of advice: Enjoy your time with
your Pokémon! Have lots of battles—and
most importantly, make lots of friends!
ch0035_00_matthies_en.lsd.ch0035_00_matthies/0605_0702_01_10:
I’ve come across lots of different treasures.
The variety is shocking!
ch0035_00_matthies_en.lsd.ch0035_00_matthies/0605_0702_02_10:
If you can gather a huge number of treasures—
and keep them safe—that’s proof that your
strength is the real deal!
ch0035_00_matthies_en.lsd.ch0035_00_matthies/1701_0701_01_10:
My Pokémon knocked over a trash can and...
Surprise!
ch0035_00_matthies_en.lsd.ch0035_00_matthies/1701_0701_02_10: It had a little gift—perfect for you, kid!
ch0035_00_matthies_en.lsd.ch0035_00_matthies/1701_0702_01_10:
Ha ha, I’m joking about the trash can bit, kid!
Did you take me seriously there?
ch0035_00_matthies_en.lsd.ch0035_00_matthies/1701_0702_02_10:
Sorry, sorry! I’ll give you more presents
now and then—give me a break!
ch0035_00_matthies_en.lsd.ch0035_00_matthies/2501_0701_01_10:
Your Pokémon battles are fantastic, kid!
Absolutely electrifying!
ch0035_00_matthies_en.lsd.ch0035_00_matthies/2501_0701_02_10:
It feels good when you’re doing well
and enjoying your battles.
ch0035_00_matthies_en.lsd.ch0035_00_matthies/2501_0701_03_10:
But it’s important to not let your guard down—
especially when you’re on a roll!
ch0035_00_matthies_en.lsd.ch0035_00_matthies/2501_0701_04_10:
It’s very dangerous to lose focus during
Pokémon battles!
ch0035_00_matthies_en.lsd.ch0035_00_matthies/2501_0702_01_10:
The most important thing for victory
is caution!
ch0035_00_matthies_en.lsd.ch0035_00_matthies/2501_0702_02_10:
Whether on the battlefield or in Pokémon battles,
caution will save the day!
ch0035_00_matthies_en.lsd.ch0035_00_matthies/2511_0701_01_10:
Pokémon battles are something that both adults
and children can get passionate about!
ch0035_00_matthies_en.lsd.ch0035_00_matthies/2511_0701_02_10:
No matter where I go in the world, Trainers are
always battling each other!
ch0035_00_matthies_en.lsd.ch0035_00_matthies/2511_0701_03_10:
It’s definitely a lot of fun, but you can’t do
it without love for your Pokémon!
ch0035_00_matthies_en.lsd.ch0035_00_matthies/2511_0701_04_10: Pokémon aren’t just tools for battle, after all!
ch0035_00_matthies_en.lsd.ch0035_00_matthies/2511_0702_01_10: I think you can show the world, kid!
ch0035_00_matthies_en.lsd.ch0035_00_matthies/2511_0702_02_10:
Show everyone that you can become happy by
forming a strong bond with your Pokémon!
ch0035_00_matthies_en.lsd.ch0035_00_matthies/3001_0701_01_10:
Mornin’! Good Pokémon Trainers should be up
and ready at the crack o’ dawn!
ch0035_00_matthies_en.lsd.ch0035_00_matthies/3002_0701_01_10:
Mornin’! I’m just going for my daily run.
It’s the best way to stay fit!
ch0035_00_matthies_en.lsd.ch0035_00_matthies/3003_0701_01_10:
Ten-hut! How’s your energy, kid?
I’m always fully charged!
ch0035_00_matthies_en.lsd.ch0035_00_matthies/3004_0701_01_10:
Hey! How’s it goin’, kid?
Better not be slackin’ off!
ch0035_00_matthies_en.lsd.ch0035_00_matthies/3005_0701_01_10:
I don’t care if it gets dark. My Pokémon can
light a spark anywhere, no sweat.
ch0035_00_matthies_en.lsd.ch0035_00_matthies/3006_0701_01_10:
Evenin’! I’d love to hit the rack,
but my Pokémon keep zapping me.

ch0036_00_mamane_en.lsd.ch0036_00_mamane/0101_0701_01_10:
Oh, hi, [Name:PlayerNickname ].
You heading out today?
ch0036_00_mamane_en.lsd.ch0036_00_mamane/0101_0701_02_10:
I’ve got my new invention up and running...
Maybe I’ll head out for a little bit, too.
ch0036_00_mamane_en.lsd.ch0036_00_mamane/0601_0701_01_10:
I’m not really the greatest around
other people. When people stare at me, I...
ch0036_00_mamane_en.lsd.ch0036_00_mamane/0601_0701_03_10:
You may not have noticed, but I just
fainted, like, three times...
ch0036_00_mamane_en.lsd.ch0036_00_mamane/0601_0702_01_10:
I’m trying really hard to get used to
other people looking at me.
ch0036_00_mamane_en.lsd.ch0036_00_mamane/0601_0702_02_10:
But trying your best doesn’t automatically
guarantee good results... Just like
experimenting with a hypothesis.
ch0036_00_mamane_en.lsd.ch0036_00_mamane/0602_0701_01_10:
I can use this gadget to control
a bunch of my inventions.
ch0036_00_mamane_en.lsd.ch0036_00_mamane/0602_0701_02_10:
For example...this one.
My Trainer Pinger.
ch0036_00_mamane_en.lsd.ch0036_00_mamane/0602_0701_03_10:
Using this machine will call Trainers
over to your current location...
ch0036_00_mamane_en.lsd.ch0036_00_mamane/0602_0701_04_10:
but using it requires a massive
amount of electricity.
ch0036_00_mamane_en.lsd.ch0036_00_mamane/0602_0702_01_10:
Did you know this little gadget can
actually control a bunch of the machines
I’ve invented?
ch0036_00_mamane_en.lsd.ch0036_00_mamane/0602_0702_02_10:
I may have been the one who engineered it,
but it’s the power of science that’s
REALLY amazing!
ch0036_00_mamane_en.lsd.ch0036_00_mamane/0603_0701_01_10:
You know, I was pretty surprised when I
found out that Togedemaru is thought
to have no Evolution.
ch0036_00_mamane_en.lsd.ch0036_00_mamane/0603_0701_02_10:
Just think—she was born a little
roly-poly, and she’ll always be one,
no matter how much she grows.
ch0036_00_mamane_en.lsd.ch0036_00_mamane/0603_0701_03_10:
It’s kinda cool... If people were like that,
we could get away with paying the kid’s
price for the bus and stuff forever.
ch0036_00_mamane_en.lsd.ch0036_00_mamane/0603_0702_01_10:
Some people tell me I look like
my Togedemaru.
ch0036_00_mamane_en.lsd.ch0036_00_mamane/0603_0702_02_10:
We’re really good buddies, so I guess
we could be rubbing off on each other.
ch0036_00_mamane_en.lsd.ch0036_00_mamane/0604_0701_01_10:
My Charjabug helped me a lot with
my experiments back on Ula’ula Island.
ch0036_00_mamane_en.lsd.ch0036_00_mamane/0604_0701_02_10:
They let me use some of the electricity
they have stored in their bodies.
ch0036_00_mamane_en.lsd.ch0036_00_mamane/0604_0701_03_10:
Also, their bodies are made up of right
angles, so if my creativity’s ever blocked,
I can stack them up like bricks for fun...
ch0036_00_mamane_en.lsd.ch0036_00_mamane/0604_0701_04_10:
Just kidding. I’ve gotta be nice to my
Charjabug, or their friend Vikavolt
will get mad and come flying...
ch0036_00_mamane_en.lsd.ch0036_00_mamane/0604_0702_01_10:
Vikavolt is Charjabug’s Evolution.
It gathers up energy in its jaws, then
fires it off in massive electric jolts!
ch0036_00_mamane_en.lsd.ch0036_00_mamane/0604_0702_02_10:
It’s like a cannon! It can even break
through the thickest shelters.
ch0036_00_mamane_en.lsd.ch0036_00_mamane/0605_0701_01_10:
Since coming here to Pasio, I’ve made
some good headway in my various
experiments.
ch0036_00_mamane_en.lsd.ch0036_00_mamane/0605_0701_02_10:
I mean, there’s so much interesting data!
The people and Pokémon gathered here
are way beyond my knowledge!
ch0036_00_mamane_en.lsd.ch0036_00_mamane/0605_0701_03_10:
Same goes for you, [Name:PlayerNickname ].
If this were my simulation, I’d have
beaten you a hundred times over.
ch0036_00_mamane_en.lsd.ch0036_00_mamane/0605_0701_04_10:
Although that simulation hasn’t been
very reliable lately. Even when I
was back in Alola...
ch0036_00_mamane_en.lsd.ch0036_00_mamane/0605_0702_01_10:
According to my simulation, I should
be Champion by now.
ch0036_00_mamane_en.lsd.ch0036_00_mamane/0605_0702_02_10:
Bathing in the spotlight, a role model
for all kinds of Trainers...
ch0036_00_mamane_en.lsd.ch0036_00_mamane/0605_0702_03_10:
Oh boy... I think I just fainted for a
second at the thought of that...
ch0036_00_mamane_en.lsd.ch0036_00_mamane/1701_0701_01_10:
I didn’t invent this or anything,
but it should be pretty useful.
Here, take it.
ch0036_00_mamane_en.lsd.ch0036_00_mamane/1701_0702_01_10:
Hopefully it’ll be super effective
for you in battle!
ch0036_00_mamane_en.lsd.ch0036_00_mamane/1701_0702_02_10:
I have my own inventions to help me
in battles, so I don’t need it.
ch0036_00_mamane_en.lsd.ch0036_00_mamane/2501_0701_01_10:
Wh-what are you looking at?
Hold on... Have you been bitten by the
inventor bug?
ch0036_00_mamane_en.lsd.ch0036_00_mamane/2501_0701_02_10:
If that’s the case, maybe we could
try making something basic together?
ch0036_00_mamane_en.lsd.ch0036_00_mamane/2501_0701_04_10:
(Oh no... What if you weren’t curious about
inventing and you were actually curious
about ME...)
ch0036_00_mamane_en.lsd.ch0036_00_mamane/2501_0702_01_10:
I did about 256 simulations while
pondering what it is you’d like
to invent.
ch0036_00_mamane_en.lsd.ch0036_00_mamane/2501_0702_02_10:
My conclusion: a machine that can
use the plans and blueprints in your brain
to create everything automatically.
ch0036_00_mamane_en.lsd.ch0036_00_mamane/2501_0702_03_10:
With a machine like that, you’d only
have to THINK about an invention
in order to bring it to life!
ch0036_00_mamane_en.lsd.ch0036_00_mamane/2501_0702_04_10:
What?! That sounds like something I’d
want for myself?! Well...when you put it
like that, I guess you’re not wrong...
ch0036_00_mamane_en.lsd.ch0036_00_mamane/2511_0701_01_10:
What? You’re interested in how
machines are constructed?
Why didn’t you say so sooner?
ch0036_00_mamane_en.lsd.ch0036_00_mamane/2511_0701_02_10:
Well, first you have to think about
what you want your machine to do.
That part is key!
ch0036_00_mamane_en.lsd.ch0036_00_mamane/2511_0701_03_10:
Like, if you’re scared of talking to
people, maybe a machine that makes it
easier to do that?
ch0036_00_mamane_en.lsd.ch0036_00_mamane/2511_0701_04_10:
Actually, that might just be something
I want personally...
ch0036_00_mamane_en.lsd.ch0036_00_mamane/2511_0702_01_10:
After you figure out what kind of
machine you’re making, the next step
is to draw up a blueprint.
ch0036_00_mamane_en.lsd.ch0036_00_mamane/2511_0702_02_10:
Careful, though. If you muck up the
power supply or drive systems, you’ll
get zapped like BZZZZT!
ch0036_00_mamane_en.lsd.ch0036_00_mamane/2511_0702_03_10:
But you’ll be fine as long as you keep an
eye on things as you go. I wouldn’t
worry about it too much.
ch0036_00_mamane_en.lsd.ch0036_00_mamane/2511_0702_04_10:
Failure’s a big part of inventing things.
That’s a fact! You’ve just gotta keep
adjusting things until it’s just right.
ch0036_00_mamane_en.lsd.ch0036_00_mamane/3001_0701_01_10:
Morning. I-I’m still so sleepy.
I stayed up way too late running experiments.
ch0036_00_mamane_en.lsd.ch0036_00_mamane/3002_0701_01_10:
*yawn*
My batteries are fully charged, but my motor’s
not up and running yet. I might need to reboot.
ch0036_00_mamane_en.lsd.ch0036_00_mamane/3003_0701_01_10:
Oh, hey! The sun is too bright for me.
I prefer staying in my lab.
ch0036_00_mamane_en.lsd.ch0036_00_mamane/3004_0701_01_10:
Maybe I’ll exercise this afternoon.
Gotta think about my health at least a little bit.
ch0036_00_mamane_en.lsd.ch0036_00_mamane/3005_0701_01_10:
I-I’m kinda nocturnal, so it’s about time
for me to start my experiments for the night!
ch0036_00_mamane_en.lsd.ch0036_00_mamane/3006_0701_01_10:
I conserve energy at night by using the electricity
my Electric-type Pokémon have stored up.

ch0037_00_fukuji_en.lsd.ch0037_00_fukuji/0101_0701_01_10:
Ah, so yeh’ve come back today, too, eh,
[Name:PlayerNickname ]?
ch0037_00_fukuji_en.lsd.ch0037_00_fukuji/0101_0701_02_10:
Let’s make today another beautiful
verdant day!
ch0037_00_fukuji_en.lsd.ch0037_00_fukuji/0601_0701_01_10:
What I got here with me are my trusty gardening
shears. They slice through even the thickest of
branches with ease.
ch0037_00_fukuji_en.lsd.ch0037_00_fukuji/0601_0701_02_10:
I’ve been usin’ these for over 30 years, and the
only things I trust more are my Pokémon.
ch0037_00_fukuji_en.lsd.ch0037_00_fukuji/0601_0702_01_10:
One time, I was using them at night and I was
mistaken for a Pinsir, the Stag Beetle Pokémon.
ch0037_00_fukuji_en.lsd.ch0037_00_fukuji/0601_0702_02_10:
My neighbors thought these were a Pinsir’s
pincers and went into a bit of a tizzy.
ch0037_00_fukuji_en.lsd.ch0037_00_fukuji/0601_0702_03_10: Thank goodness nobody threw a Poké Ball at me.
ch0037_00_fukuji_en.lsd.ch0037_00_fukuji/0601_0702_04_10: Those things hurt if they hit yeh in the noggin.
ch0037_00_fukuji_en.lsd.ch0037_00_fukuji/0602_0701_01_10: Reading is fertilizer for yer mind.
ch0037_00_fukuji_en.lsd.ch0037_00_fukuji/0602_0701_02_10:
Just like plants need water and nutrients,
people need excitement and surprise.
ch0037_00_fukuji_en.lsd.ch0037_00_fukuji/0602_0701_03_10:
That’ll bud yer heart and cover it in
beautiful flowers.
ch0037_00_fukuji_en.lsd.ch0037_00_fukuji/0602_0702_01_10:
As people age, their hearts are more accepting.
Very much like the grass that accepts everything.
ch0037_00_fukuji_en.lsd.ch0037_00_fukuji/0602_0702_02_10:
And it’s this acceptance that makes our land
nice and green.
ch0037_00_fukuji_en.lsd.ch0037_00_fukuji/0602_0702_03_10:
So that you don’t go skinnin’ yer knee after
a little fall.
ch0037_00_fukuji_en.lsd.ch0037_00_fukuji/0603_0701_01_10:
My Weepinbell has acid that can melt anything
down to goop.
ch0037_00_fukuji_en.lsd.ch0037_00_fukuji/0603_0701_02_10:
His razor-sharp leaves will slice anything
in half.
ch0037_00_fukuji_en.lsd.ch0037_00_fukuji/0603_0701_03_10:
I think I would have been able to be of help
had they called me to make the PML stadium.
ch0037_00_fukuji_en.lsd.ch0037_00_fukuji/0603_0702_01_10:
I’m sure Weepinbell would be a huge help at 
construction sites, too.
ch0037_00_fukuji_en.lsd.ch0037_00_fukuji/0603_0702_02_10:
He’s a big softy, but he’s as strong as
any Machamp or Conkeldurr!
ch0037_00_fukuji_en.lsd.ch0037_00_fukuji/0604_0701_01_10:
A lot of the local sprouts come to play at the
Coumarine City Gym.
ch0037_00_fukuji_en.lsd.ch0037_00_fukuji/0604_0701_02_10:
They use the ropes and nets the challengers
climb as a playground.
ch0037_00_fukuji_en.lsd.ch0037_00_fukuji/0604_0701_03_10:
This one time, though, a tyke’s Totodile chewed
through the ropes and made the gym impossible
to beat.
ch0037_00_fukuji_en.lsd.ch0037_00_fukuji/0604_0702_01_10:
The Coumarine City Gym is made to be an
obstacle course.
ch0037_00_fukuji_en.lsd.ch0037_00_fukuji/0604_0702_02_10:
I myself exercise at my Gym by hangin’ on the
ropes, too.
ch0037_00_fukuji_en.lsd.ch0037_00_fukuji/0605_0701_01_10:
Say, [Name:PlayerNickname ],
why are yeh in the PML?
ch0037_00_fukuji_en.lsd.ch0037_00_fukuji/0605_0701_02_10:
Me? Well, I’m in it for a nice hot cup of tea
after a well-fought Pokémon battle.
ch0037_00_fukuji_en.lsd.ch0037_00_fukuji/0605_0701_03_10:
Reminiscing on the battle makes that one cup of
tea exceptional.
ch0037_00_fukuji_en.lsd.ch0037_00_fukuji/0605_0702_01_10: I don’t know why yeh fight.
ch0037_00_fukuji_en.lsd.ch0037_00_fukuji/0605_0702_02_10:
But I know that these matches are something that
both yeh and yer Pokémon need.
ch0037_00_fukuji_en.lsd.ch0037_00_fukuji/1701_0701_01_10: I was takin’ care of my trees when I found this.
ch0037_00_fukuji_en.lsd.ch0037_00_fukuji/1701_0701_02_10: I’m sure yeh can find some use for it.
ch0037_00_fukuji_en.lsd.ch0037_00_fukuji/1701_0702_01_10:
The forest ain’t just chock-full of good Mother
Nature’s bounty. It’s full of things people
dropped, too.
ch0037_00_fukuji_en.lsd.ch0037_00_fukuji/1701_0702_02_10:
If I find anything else, I’ll let yeh in on it,
too, sprout.
ch0037_00_fukuji_en.lsd.ch0037_00_fukuji/2501_0701_01_10:
There are four things to remember when yer
raisin’ plants, child...
ch0037_00_fukuji_en.lsd.ch0037_00_fukuji/2501_0701_02_10:
sunlight, water, temperature, and ventilation.
Can’t give too much, can’t give too little.
ch0037_00_fukuji_en.lsd.ch0037_00_fukuji/2501_0701_03_10:
Overeatin’s bad for people, too, right?
The same can be said for plants and Pokémon.
ch0037_00_fukuji_en.lsd.ch0037_00_fukuji/2501_0701_04_10:
Just the right amount. That’s the secret to a
long life.
ch0037_00_fukuji_en.lsd.ch0037_00_fukuji/2501_0702_01_10:
Takin’ a walk is very much like life. If yeh
think about it that way, makes yeh reconsider
how yeh walk, don’t it?
ch0037_00_fukuji_en.lsd.ch0037_00_fukuji/2501_0702_02_10:
Light don’t always last. Parts of that path are
covered in shadows, too.
ch0037_00_fukuji_en.lsd.ch0037_00_fukuji/2501_0702_03_10:
Same can be said for life. There’ll be good that
happens to yeh, and there’ll be bad.
ch0037_00_fukuji_en.lsd.ch0037_00_fukuji/2501_0702_04_10:
What’s important is how yeh pick yerself up.
Yeh have to be resilient like a weed.
ch0037_00_fukuji_en.lsd.ch0037_00_fukuji/2511_0701_01_10:
There are lots of types of plants.
People and Pokémon have their individual
traits, too.
ch0037_00_fukuji_en.lsd.ch0037_00_fukuji/2511_0701_02_10:
Now, yeh ain’t gonna get along with everyone.
But just remember that yeh shouldn’t ever deny
’em, either.
ch0037_00_fukuji_en.lsd.ch0037_00_fukuji/2511_0701_03_10:
But if yeh accept ’em, they might change, too.
Just like a rose can lose its thorns.
ch0037_00_fukuji_en.lsd.ch0037_00_fukuji/2511_0701_04_10:
Let yer heart be like the swaying willow.
That’s the secret technique to an easy life.
ch0037_00_fukuji_en.lsd.ch0037_00_fukuji/2511_0702_01_10:
Interactin’ with Grass-type Pokémon is the same
as raisin’ plants.
ch0037_00_fukuji_en.lsd.ch0037_00_fukuji/2511_0702_02_10:
Don’t think of being slow as a disadvantage.
Instead, use yer Attack and Defense to
yer advantage.
ch0037_00_fukuji_en.lsd.ch0037_00_fukuji/2511_0702_03_10:
Yeh give water to strong saplin’s,
and yeh reinforce the weak ones.
ch0037_00_fukuji_en.lsd.ch0037_00_fukuji/2511_0702_04_10:
I learned how to raise my Pokémon from raisin’
plants. I’m sure there’ll be something the
plants can teach yeh, too.
ch0037_00_fukuji_en.lsd.ch0037_00_fukuji/3001_0701_01_10:
Good mornin’ to yeh. How yeh feelin’ today?
Make sure yer always lookin’ after yer health!
ch0037_00_fukuji_en.lsd.ch0037_00_fukuji/3002_0701_01_10:
Us old folk tend to get up early.
It’s the healthy thing to do.
ch0037_00_fukuji_en.lsd.ch0037_00_fukuji/3003_0701_01_10:
Good day!
Whether yer a person or a plant Pokémon,
getting sunlight is vital for yer health!
ch0037_00_fukuji_en.lsd.ch0037_00_fukuji/3004_0701_01_10:
There are a lot of Trainers out around this hour.
Go talk to ’em, battle ’em, and gain experience.
ch0037_00_fukuji_en.lsd.ch0037_00_fukuji/3005_0701_01_10:
Good evening! Yer workin’ hard.
Even the grass and trees are asleep at this hour.
ch0037_00_fukuji_en.lsd.ch0037_00_fukuji/3006_0701_01_10:
A lot of people and Pokémon
become more active at night.
But don’t stay up too late, yeh hear?

ch0038_00_hyouta_en.lsd.ch0038_00_hyouta/0101_0701_01_10:
Hey, [Name:PlayerNickname ]!
I had a feeling you’d show up, so I thought I’d 
wait for you.
ch0038_00_hyouta_en.lsd.ch0038_00_hyouta/0101_0701_02_10:
Man, I’ve been waiting so long now,
I’m practically a fossil!
Kidding, kidding...
ch0038_00_hyouta_en.lsd.ch0038_00_hyouta/0601_0701_01_10:
Both my dad and I are
Gym Leaders, you know.
ch0038_00_hyouta_en.lsd.ch0038_00_hyouta/0601_0701_02_10:
I’ve always loved Pokémon that are
tough and strong like boulders...
ch0038_00_hyouta_en.lsd.ch0038_00_hyouta/0601_0701_03_10:
but my dad favors solid, heavy,
steel-like Pokémon.
ch0038_00_hyouta_en.lsd.ch0038_00_hyouta/0601_0701_04_10:
You probably think they’re really similar,
but trust me—I’m an expert on these
things. They’re totally different.
ch0038_00_hyouta_en.lsd.ch0038_00_hyouta/0601_0701_05_10:
And I mean TOTALLY different.
I mean, a lot of rocks appear the same,
but in reality, no two are exactly alike.
ch0038_00_hyouta_en.lsd.ch0038_00_hyouta/0601_0702_01_10:
How do you tell them apart, you ask?
Well, how about you figure that out yourself?
That’s really the fastest route.
ch0038_00_hyouta_en.lsd.ch0038_00_hyouta/0601_0702_02_10:
Whether or not we share the same love
for rocks and stones, it would make me
really happy if you showed some interest.
ch0038_00_hyouta_en.lsd.ch0038_00_hyouta/0602_0701_01_10:
Back at home I work at the
Oreburgh Mine.
ch0038_00_hyouta_en.lsd.ch0038_00_hyouta/0602_0701_02_10:
I work hard to hone my drilling skills
at the mine so that someday I can
achieve my dream:
ch0038_00_hyouta_en.lsd.ch0038_00_hyouta/0602_0701_03_10:
to build a massive tunnel system
that connects the whole world!
ch0038_00_hyouta_en.lsd.ch0038_00_hyouta/0602_0701_04_10:
How about you? Are you chasing a dream?
Forging your own path and working
as hard as you can to make it happen?
ch0038_00_hyouta_en.lsd.ch0038_00_hyouta/0602_0702_01_10:
I hope maybe someday I can use my
tunnels to connect Pasio to the rest
of the world!
ch0038_00_hyouta_en.lsd.ch0038_00_hyouta/0602_0702_02_10:
I’ll have to dig pretty deep to create
an underwater tunnel...
But I’m up for the challenge!
ch0038_00_hyouta_en.lsd.ch0038_00_hyouta/0603_0701_01_10:
The island of Pasio was built on top of
a rocky ocean layer. I wonder what sort
of hidden treasures lie beneath the surface.
ch0038_00_hyouta_en.lsd.ch0038_00_hyouta/0603_0701_02_10:
If I could get permission somehow,
I’d love to do some excavating here!
ch0038_00_hyouta_en.lsd.ch0038_00_hyouta/0603_0701_04_10:
It’s settled, then! Time to come up with
a plan for our official Pasio
excavation tour!
ch0038_00_hyouta_en.lsd.ch0038_00_hyouta/0603_0702_01_10:
I wonder who we need to get permission
from. Well, time waits for no one!
We’ve got lots of planning to do!
ch0038_00_hyouta_en.lsd.ch0038_00_hyouta/0603_0702_02_10:
Wait... I’ve already got a ton of other
locations I’d like to excavate, too!
I think I need to sort out my priorities first.
ch0038_00_hyouta_en.lsd.ch0038_00_hyouta/0604_0701_01_10: My dad has a friend named Riley.
ch0038_00_hyouta_en.lsd.ch0038_00_hyouta/0604_0701_02_10:
He’s a bit of a mystery, but he’s
a real solid Pokémon Trainer.
ch0038_00_hyouta_en.lsd.ch0038_00_hyouta/0604_0701_03_10:
I wonder if he’s here on Pasio as well...
It would be awesome to meet up with him.
ch0038_00_hyouta_en.lsd.ch0038_00_hyouta/0604_0702_01_10:
You’ll know Riley when you see him!
He wears a fancy blue suit and a
nice blue hat...
ch0038_00_hyouta_en.lsd.ch0038_00_hyouta/0604_0702_02_10:
so he tends to stand out in a crowd
no matter where he is!
ch0038_00_hyouta_en.lsd.ch0038_00_hyouta/0605_0701_02_10:
The Pasio lifestyle sure has piqued my
interest so far!
ch0038_00_hyouta_en.lsd.ch0038_00_hyouta/0605_0701_03_10: There’s still so much I don’t know!
ch0038_00_hyouta_en.lsd.ch0038_00_hyouta/0605_0701_04_10:
Like what’s buried just below the
surface of the ground where we’re
standing right now. Stuff like that!
ch0038_00_hyouta_en.lsd.ch0038_00_hyouta/0605_0701_05_10:
It would really rock my world if there
were rare fossils beneath here...
ch0038_00_hyouta_en.lsd.ch0038_00_hyouta/0605_0702_01_10:
But either way, there are plenty of
ways to have fun here besides just
Pokémon battles!
ch0038_00_hyouta_en.lsd.ch0038_00_hyouta/1701_0701_01_10:
I dug up something interesting today!
What do you think? Awesome, right?
ch0038_00_hyouta_en.lsd.ch0038_00_hyouta/1701_0701_02_10: I thought I’d give it to you if you want it!
ch0038_00_hyouta_en.lsd.ch0038_00_hyouta/1701_0702_01_10: If I dig up anything else, I’ll bring it over.
ch0038_00_hyouta_en.lsd.ch0038_00_hyouta/1701_0702_02_10:
You’d be amazed by some of the things
that get unearthed when you’re excavating!
ch0038_00_hyouta_en.lsd.ch0038_00_hyouta/2501_0701_01_10:
I respect my dad a lot, and I’ve always
looked up to him, but it’s not just
because he’s my dad.
ch0038_00_hyouta_en.lsd.ch0038_00_hyouta/2501_0701_02_10:
He’s a Gym Leader just like me,
but he’s way, way stronger than I am.
ch0038_00_hyouta_en.lsd.ch0038_00_hyouta/2501_0701_03_10:
Coming from his son, I guess that might
be a little hard to believe. But trust me,
it’s the truth.
ch0038_00_hyouta_en.lsd.ch0038_00_hyouta/2501_0701_04_10: My dad’s...infinitely stronger than I am!
ch0038_00_hyouta_en.lsd.ch0038_00_hyouta/2501_0702_01_10:
I don’t think my dad’s always
been this strong.
ch0038_00_hyouta_en.lsd.ch0038_00_hyouta/2501_0702_02_10:
Over the years, he trained and trained
and trained to become as powerful
as he is now.
ch0038_00_hyouta_en.lsd.ch0038_00_hyouta/2501_0702_03_10:
That’s why I need to keep on digging!
I’ll dig and dig and dig so that someday
I’ll be that strong, too!
ch0038_00_hyouta_en.lsd.ch0038_00_hyouta/2501_0702_04_10:
One day I’ll be as strong—no,
STRONGER than my dad!
ch0038_00_hyouta_en.lsd.ch0038_00_hyouta/2511_0701_01_10:
Sometimes when I’m working down in the
coal mines, I get so caught up in digging
that I lose track of the time.
ch0038_00_hyouta_en.lsd.ch0038_00_hyouta/2511_0701_02_10:
The other day, my Pokémon came 
down the mine to give me some water 
while I was focused on my work.
ch0038_00_hyouta_en.lsd.ch0038_00_hyouta/2511_0701_03_10:
Despite my tunnel vision, I always
remember to stay hydrated, but the
kind gesture did make me happy.
ch0038_00_hyouta_en.lsd.ch0038_00_hyouta/2511_0702_01_10:
It’s nice that my Pokémon worries about me,
but while I’m on the job, all the other workers
really depend on me.
ch0038_00_hyouta_en.lsd.ch0038_00_hyouta/2511_0702_02_10:
I’m the leader down in the Oreburgh
Mine, after all!
ch0038_00_hyouta_en.lsd.ch0038_00_hyouta/2511_0702_03_10:
If you ever need a hand, you can count on me. 
I’ll show you what a huge help I can be!
ch0038_00_hyouta_en.lsd.ch0038_00_hyouta/3001_0701_01_10:
Whoa, it’s already morning?
It’s so bright up here compared to the mines.
ch0038_00_hyouta_en.lsd.ch0038_00_hyouta/3002_0701_01_10:
*yawn*
Sorry, I just got back.
I was out digging a tunnel!
ch0038_00_hyouta_en.lsd.ch0038_00_hyouta/3004_0701_01_10:
Hey there! You know it’s not good to
stay cooped up inside all the time.
Everybody needs a little sunshine!
ch0038_00_hyouta_en.lsd.ch0038_00_hyouta/3005_0701_01_10:
Hi there! It may be dark outside, but I’m still
full of energy! I’m used to being in the dark!
ch0038_00_hyouta_en.lsd.ch0038_00_hyouta/3006_0701_01_10:
Wow, it’s already dark out?
Time for me to go dig some tunnels!

ch0039_00_viola_en.lsd.ch0039_00_viola/0101_0701_01_10:
Here again today, [Name:PlayerNickname ]?
That’s fantastic! Just fantastic!
ch0039_00_viola_en.lsd.ch0039_00_viola/0101_0701_02_10:
Let’s make today a great day and fill up a whole
photo album!
ch0039_00_viola_en.lsd.ch0039_00_viola/0601_0701_01_10: My older sister, Alexa, gave me my camera.
ch0039_00_viola_en.lsd.ch0039_00_viola/0601_0701_02_10: Alexa’s a journalist for a big publishing house!
ch0039_00_viola_en.lsd.ch0039_00_viola/0601_0701_03_10:
My dream is to use this camera to take all kinds
of pictures of different Pokémon!
ch0039_00_viola_en.lsd.ch0039_00_viola/0601_0701_04_10: Of course I’m taking pictures on Pasio, too.
ch0039_00_viola_en.lsd.ch0039_00_viola/0601_0701_05_10: I feel like Pasio’s got a lot of passion!
ch0039_00_viola_en.lsd.ch0039_00_viola/0601_0702_01_10:
By the way, I’m a Gym Leader. At the
Santalune City Gym, you can see my
Pokémon pictures on display.
ch0039_00_viola_en.lsd.ch0039_00_viola/0601_0702_02_10:
I’m trying to get the word out about it here on
Pasio, too. I hope people will come to see it.
ch0039_00_viola_en.lsd.ch0039_00_viola/0601_0702_03_10: It’s really charming, so it’s pretty popular!
ch0039_00_viola_en.lsd.ch0039_00_viola/0602_0701_01_10:
Surskit is a Pokémon that walks on top of the
water with Swift Swim!
ch0039_00_viola_en.lsd.ch0039_00_viola/0602_0701_02_10:
I don’t even know how many times I’ve captured
its grace with my camera!
ch0039_00_viola_en.lsd.ch0039_00_viola/0602_0701_03_10:
Its charms are unending, no matter how many
pictures I take. I just love it!
ch0039_00_viola_en.lsd.ch0039_00_viola/0602_0702_01_10:
If you ever meet a wild Surskit, be sure to watch
it closely!
ch0039_00_viola_en.lsd.ch0039_00_viola/0602_0702_02_10:
Its tiny legs support its whole body on the
water. How can you not love it?
ch0039_00_viola_en.lsd.ch0039_00_viola/0603_0701_01_10:
I take pictures of things other than
Pokémon, too!
ch0039_00_viola_en.lsd.ch0039_00_viola/0603_0701_02_10:
Pokémon Trainers, of course. But also the scenery
in towns and natural settings!
ch0039_00_viola_en.lsd.ch0039_00_viola/0603_0701_03_10:
When I’m shooting Pokémon, of course Bug-type
Pokémon are my favorites! They’re just so cute!
ch0039_00_viola_en.lsd.ch0039_00_viola/0603_0701_04_10:
The Evolution of Bug-type Pokémon is a lot
faster and more mysterious than other Pokémon!
ch0039_00_viola_en.lsd.ch0039_00_viola/0603_0702_01_10:
I’ll never get tired of taking pictures of
Pokémon, no matter how many I take.
ch0039_00_viola_en.lsd.ch0039_00_viola/0603_0702_02_10:
Focusing on something I love and clicking
the shutter is the best feeling in the world!
ch0039_00_viola_en.lsd.ch0039_00_viola/0604_0701_01_10:
There’s a Pokémon from the Kalos region called
Vivillon. It’s a fantastic Pokémon!
ch0039_00_viola_en.lsd.ch0039_00_viola/0604_0701_02_10:
Even though they’re the same species, many
Vivillon have different wing patterns!
ch0039_00_viola_en.lsd.ch0039_00_viola/0604_0701_03_10:
That’s why there are lots of people around the
world who collect different Vivillon!
ch0039_00_viola_en.lsd.ch0039_00_viola/0604_0701_04_10:
I’m one of those people! Even here on Pasio, 
I plan to look for people with rare Vivillon!
ch0039_00_viola_en.lsd.ch0039_00_viola/0604_0702_01_10:
I want to make an album with photos of every
kind of Vivillon someday!
ch0039_00_viola_en.lsd.ch0039_00_viola/0604_0702_02_10:
You’ll help me with that, right? I’m really
looking forward to it!
ch0039_00_viola_en.lsd.ch0039_00_viola/0605_0701_01_10: I think it’s really great that I came to Pasio!
ch0039_00_viola_en.lsd.ch0039_00_viola/0605_0701_02_10:
I’ve met a lot of Pokémon, and I met you, too,
[Name:PlayerNickname ]!
ch0039_00_viola_en.lsd.ch0039_00_viola/0605_0701_03_10: To me, you’re a fantastic photo subject!
ch0039_00_viola_en.lsd.ch0039_00_viola/0605_0702_01_10:
But not just as a model, of course. I really enjoy
Pokémon battles together with you, too!
ch0039_00_viola_en.lsd.ch0039_00_viola/0605_0702_02_10:
Let’s keep on doing our best,
[Name:PlayerNickname ]!
ch0039_00_viola_en.lsd.ch0039_00_viola/1701_0701_01_10:
I found this while I was wandering around town
with my camera!
ch0039_00_viola_en.lsd.ch0039_00_viola/1701_0701_02_10: Here’s a present to celebrate your strength!
ch0039_00_viola_en.lsd.ch0039_00_viola/1701_0702_01_10:
There are things you can only see 
through a viewfinder!
ch0039_00_viola_en.lsd.ch0039_00_viola/1701_0702_02_10:
If I find anything again, I’ll be sure to give
it to you!
ch0039_00_viola_en.lsd.ch0039_00_viola/2501_0701_01_10:
Oh! Look at that Pokémon’s nimble walk! 
What a photo op!
ch0039_00_viola_en.lsd.ch0039_00_viola/2501_0701_02_10:
Wha—?! It ran off.
I must’ve gotten too close.
ch0039_00_viola_en.lsd.ch0039_00_viola/2501_0701_03_10:
The trick to taking Pokémon pictures is to not
alert them to your presence.
ch0039_00_viola_en.lsd.ch0039_00_viola/2501_0701_04_10:
Making sure you don’t startle or alert the
Pokémon—that’s gotta be the first step, right?
ch0039_00_viola_en.lsd.ch0039_00_viola/2501_0702_01_10:
Take your lens and focus it...focus it...
Then snap that shot!
ch0039_00_viola_en.lsd.ch0039_00_viola/2501_0702_02_10:
Practice helps you get better at taking pictures. 
It’s the same for catching Pokémon, right?
ch0039_00_viola_en.lsd.ch0039_00_viola/2501_0702_03_10:
You need to aim your throw with the Poké Ball.
Then throw it at the exact right time!
ch0039_00_viola_en.lsd.ch0039_00_viola/2501_0702_04_10:
Timing is important to both. Poké Balls and film
are limited, after all.
ch0039_00_viola_en.lsd.ch0039_00_viola/2511_0701_01_10:
Ah, wait! I should take a picture here! 
You’ve got a great smile going on!
ch0039_00_viola_en.lsd.ch0039_00_viola/2511_0701_02_10:
Hm? Why am I so into taking photos? Hmm.
I guess it’s because of my older sister.
ch0039_00_viola_en.lsd.ch0039_00_viola/2511_0701_03_10:
Alexa, writer for the Lumiose Press! That’s
my supercool older sister.
ch0039_00_viola_en.lsd.ch0039_00_viola/2511_0701_04_10:
My older sister knows I love pictures, so
she gave me this wonderful camera!
ch0039_00_viola_en.lsd.ch0039_00_viola/2511_0702_01_10:
Why do I take pictures of smiling faces?
That should be obvious!
ch0039_00_viola_en.lsd.ch0039_00_viola/2511_0702_02_10:
Because they’re just fabulous! That’s how I feel
about smiling faces!
ch0039_00_viola_en.lsd.ch0039_00_viola/2511_0702_03_10:
Taking pictures and having pictures taken
makes people happier and happier. It’s the best!
ch0039_00_viola_en.lsd.ch0039_00_viola/2511_0702_04_10:
Taking joyful pictures is the whole reason I’m
a photographer!
ch0039_00_viola_en.lsd.ch0039_00_viola/3001_0701_01_10:
Good morning!
Let’s make sure today’s fantastic!
ch0039_00_viola_en.lsd.ch0039_00_viola/3002_0701_01_10: I bet I’ll find a lot of photo ops today, too!
ch0039_00_viola_en.lsd.ch0039_00_viola/3003_0701_01_10:
Good afternoon!
No matter what time of day it is,
I always feel fantastic!
ch0039_00_viola_en.lsd.ch0039_00_viola/3004_0701_01_10:
During the day, everything gets so active!
Even Pokémon!
ch0039_00_viola_en.lsd.ch0039_00_viola/3005_0701_01_10:
Good evening!
Nighttime photography can be tricky,
but you can snag some fantastic photos.
ch0039_00_viola_en.lsd.ch0039_00_viola/3006_0701_01_10:
You worked hard today! Get some good rest so
we can take another shot tomorrow!

ch0040_00_hachiku_en.lsd.ch0040_00_hachiku/0101_0701_01_10:
Hi there, [Name:PlayerNickname ].
Running into you is always a joy.
ch0040_00_hachiku_en.lsd.ch0040_00_hachiku/0101_0701_02_10:
Continue to train hard, my friend.
Seize the heart of justice!
ch0040_00_hachiku_en.lsd.ch0040_00_hachiku/0601_0701_01_10:
There’s a Pokémon called Beartic that’s
native to my hometown in Unova.
It’s got sharp, icy claws and fangs...
ch0040_00_hachiku_en.lsd.ch0040_00_hachiku/0601_0701_02_10:
which can appear quite intimidating
to most people! But my Beartic
is truly stout of heart, I must say.
ch0040_00_hachiku_en.lsd.ch0040_00_hachiku/0601_0701_03_10:
I myself have gone on many a trek
through the snowiest mountains with
my Beartic to train.
ch0040_00_hachiku_en.lsd.ch0040_00_hachiku/0601_0701_04_10:
His warm, furry mass has kept me from
freezing to death out there on
countless occasions.
ch0040_00_hachiku_en.lsd.ch0040_00_hachiku/0601_0701_05_10:
Facing the harshest forces of nature
together with one’s Pokémon...
It’s all part of one’s training, in the end.
ch0040_00_hachiku_en.lsd.ch0040_00_hachiku/0601_0702_01_10:
Pokémon help out their Trainers, and
Trainers help out their Pokémon.
ch0040_00_hachiku_en.lsd.ch0040_00_hachiku/0601_0702_02_10:
Our mutual support is what gives us 
this incredible sync strength.
ch0040_00_hachiku_en.lsd.ch0040_00_hachiku/0602_0701_01_10:
Did you know that Cryogonal’s body
is made up of frozen ice crystals?
ch0040_00_hachiku_en.lsd.ch0040_00_hachiku/0602_0701_02_10:
If you touch one by accident,
be prepared to feel a freezing
-150 °F chill!
ch0040_00_hachiku_en.lsd.ch0040_00_hachiku/0602_0701_03_10:
Then again, Cryogonal and I have undergone
intensive training to improve our sync strength,
so I’ve felt its freezing touch many times.
ch0040_00_hachiku_en.lsd.ch0040_00_hachiku/0602_0701_04_10:
The fiery passion of our friendship
urges us to grow ever stronger!
ch0040_00_hachiku_en.lsd.ch0040_00_hachiku/0602_0702_02_10:
Oh, not to worry! I’m sure I’m only sneezing
because I, uh... Because I always have
my shoulder exposed! Mm-hmm!
ch0040_00_hachiku_en.lsd.ch0040_00_hachiku/0603_0701_01_10: Are you interested in films, child?
ch0040_00_hachiku_en.lsd.ch0040_00_hachiku/0603_0701_02_10:
Pokéstar Studios back in Unova is the
heart of the movie industry, you know!
Our films are incredibly popular.
ch0040_00_hachiku_en.lsd.ch0040_00_hachiku/0603_0701_03_10:
I’ve acted in lead roles in many
of them, of course.
ch0040_00_hachiku_en.lsd.ch0040_00_hachiku/0603_0701_04_10:
The brilliance of those films and all the
performers involved deserves to be shared!
Watch them—feel the creators’ passion!
ch0040_00_hachiku_en.lsd.ch0040_00_hachiku/0603_0702_01_10:
Did you know Pokéstar Studios utilizes
Pokémon talent in addition to us actors?
They add a whole new level to the narrative.
ch0040_00_hachiku_en.lsd.ch0040_00_hachiku/0603_0702_02_10:
If any of this has piqued your interest,
I strongly recommend picking up a film
or two. I promise you won’t regret it.
ch0040_00_hachiku_en.lsd.ch0040_00_hachiku/0604_0701_01_10:
I was once known as “the quiet one” or
“the strong, silent type,” but I have
come a long way since then.
ch0040_00_hachiku_en.lsd.ch0040_00_hachiku/0604_0701_02_10:
I found that...I wanted people to know
how I was feeling. I didn’t want to be
misunderstood, so I began to speak up.
ch0040_00_hachiku_en.lsd.ch0040_00_hachiku/0604_0701_03_10:
There are some things in life one simply
must put into words. You cannot expect
others to read your mind!
ch0040_00_hachiku_en.lsd.ch0040_00_hachiku/0604_0702_01_10:
Traveling to Pasio and meeting you
will prove to be one of my life’s
greatest treasures.
ch0040_00_hachiku_en.lsd.ch0040_00_hachiku/0604_0702_02_10:
It may sound grandiose, but it’s true.
In my heart, I consider every friend
I’ve ever met a priceless treasure.
ch0040_00_hachiku_en.lsd.ch0040_00_hachiku/0605_0701_01_10:
For reasons I shan’t discuss now,
I once retired from my career
as an actor.
ch0040_00_hachiku_en.lsd.ch0040_00_hachiku/0605_0701_02_10:
But, after some time had passed, the
Champion of the Unova region, Alder,
showed me a new path in life.
ch0040_00_hachiku_en.lsd.ch0040_00_hachiku/0605_0701_03_10:
No matter how hard things get...even when
it feels as if the entire world is against
you, you will always have a path.
ch0040_00_hachiku_en.lsd.ch0040_00_hachiku/0605_0701_04_10:
If you’re ever feeling lost, remember those words,
[Name:PlayerNickname ].
ch0040_00_hachiku_en.lsd.ch0040_00_hachiku/0605_0702_01_10:
In teaching others, we learn a great
deal about ourselves.
ch0040_00_hachiku_en.lsd.ch0040_00_hachiku/0605_0702_02_10:
Teaching and supporting you has taught
me a great deal indeed.
ch0040_00_hachiku_en.lsd.ch0040_00_hachiku/1701_0701_01_10: Here—a small token of our collaboration.
ch0040_00_hachiku_en.lsd.ch0040_00_hachiku/1701_0702_01_10: It feels good to give to others.
ch0040_00_hachiku_en.lsd.ch0040_00_hachiku/1701_0702_02_10:
Seeing the other person’s face light up
with joy alone is enough to make
it feel worthwhile.
ch0040_00_hachiku_en.lsd.ch0040_00_hachiku/2501_0701_01_10:
Would you say I resemble Brycen-Man
at all? Don’t we look alike?
ch0040_00_hachiku_en.lsd.ch0040_00_hachiku/2501_0701_02_10:
I’m referring to the star of the popular film 
Brycen-Man from Unova, of course.
ch0040_00_hachiku_en.lsd.ch0040_00_hachiku/2501_0701_03_10:
What?! You’ve never heard of the
unstoppable Brycen-Man?!
Now that just simply won’t do!
ch0040_00_hachiku_en.lsd.ch0040_00_hachiku/2501_0701_04_10:
Hmm... ... ...
I’ve got it! Let’s produce a new
Brycen-Man film here on Pasio!
ch0040_00_hachiku_en.lsd.ch0040_00_hachiku/2501_0701_05_10:
You’ll act in the film as well, of course.
I insist!
ch0040_00_hachiku_en.lsd.ch0040_00_hachiku/2501_0702_01_10:
Yes, child? You’re anxious
to start filming, you say?
ch0040_00_hachiku_en.lsd.ch0040_00_hachiku/2501_0702_02_10:
Mwahaha! What a coincidence!
Me too!
ch0040_00_hachiku_en.lsd.ch0040_00_hachiku/2501_0702_03_10:
After the PML is over, I’m sure our
schedules will be packed with filming!
ch0040_00_hachiku_en.lsd.ch0040_00_hachiku/2511_0701_01_10:
Whenever I watch you battle, I’m
reminded of just how splendid it is to
witness someone grow.
ch0040_00_hachiku_en.lsd.ch0040_00_hachiku/2511_0701_02_10:
The sight of both Trainer and Pokémon,
working together in earnest to improve
their skills...
ch0040_00_hachiku_en.lsd.ch0040_00_hachiku/2511_0701_03_10:
The pair of you will achieve great
things in the near future. I can see it
plainly within you.
ch0040_00_hachiku_en.lsd.ch0040_00_hachiku/2511_0701_04_10:
The journey ahead of you will by no
means be an easy one.
ch0040_00_hachiku_en.lsd.ch0040_00_hachiku/2511_0701_05_10:
But remember that you have people
like me, rooting for your victory.
ch0040_00_hachiku_en.lsd.ch0040_00_hachiku/2511_0702_01_10:
Strength doesn’t only come from within.
It comes from the people who believe in
you as well.
ch0040_00_hachiku_en.lsd.ch0040_00_hachiku/2511_0702_02_10:
Remember to treasure your friends,
your Pokémon, and especially yourself.
ch0040_00_hachiku_en.lsd.ch0040_00_hachiku/3001_0701_01_10:
Good morning to you! I see you’re starting
your training bright and early.
ch0040_00_hachiku_en.lsd.ch0040_00_hachiku/3002_0701_01_10:
A morning jog is a must for
building battle stamina.
ch0040_00_hachiku_en.lsd.ch0040_00_hachiku/3003_0701_01_10:
Good day. How goes it? I would be pleased to
join you in training, if you wish.
ch0040_00_hachiku_en.lsd.ch0040_00_hachiku/3004_0701_01_10:
Have you had lunch yet? You need to eat
properly to get the most from your training.
ch0040_00_hachiku_en.lsd.ch0040_00_hachiku/3005_0701_01_10:
Good evening. If you are tired, you should rest.
No need to put on an act.
ch0040_00_hachiku_en.lsd.ch0040_00_hachiku/3006_0701_01_10:
I’m impressed to see you out so late.
Try not to lose too much sleep, all right?

ch0041_00_nejiki_en.lsd.ch0041_00_nejiki/0101_0701_01_10:
Whoa! Hi, [Name:PlayerNickname ]!
You’re here, just as I predicted!
ch0041_00_nejiki_en.lsd.ch0041_00_nejiki/0101_0701_02_10:
I’m so ecstatic you came, I’m crackling
with energy! Come on—time to start the day!
ch0041_00_nejiki_en.lsd.ch0041_00_nejiki/0601_0701_01_10:
Electivire is a fierce, robust Pokémon
that can harness the power of electricity!
ch0041_00_nejiki_en.lsd.ch0041_00_nejiki/0601_0701_02_10:
If you touch Electivire while it’s
charged up with crackling electricity...
ch0041_00_nejiki_en.lsd.ch0041_00_nejiki/0601_0701_03_10:
you can actually lose consciousness for
several moments. So make sure you don’t
EVER do that, OK?
ch0041_00_nejiki_en.lsd.ch0041_00_nejiki/0601_0702_01_10:
Electivire are incredibly rare to
find in the wild, you know.
ch0041_00_nejiki_en.lsd.ch0041_00_nejiki/0601_0702_02_10:
If you ever manage to team up with one,
you can be sure it will be a dependable partner.
ch0041_00_nejiki_en.lsd.ch0041_00_nejiki/0602_0701_01_10:
Grrr... Still at 47 percent?
Slower than I expected.
ch0041_00_nejiki_en.lsd.ch0041_00_nejiki/0602_0701_02_10:
Whoa! I was so focused, I
didn’t even see you there!
ch0041_00_nejiki_en.lsd.ch0041_00_nejiki/0602_0701_03_10:
I was trying to perform an update on
my data-interpreting machine, see...
ch0041_00_nejiki_en.lsd.ch0041_00_nejiki/0602_0701_04_10:
But it’s taking forever! The update’s already
been going for a hundred hours or so!
ch0041_00_nejiki_en.lsd.ch0041_00_nejiki/0602_0702_01_10:
This is just the mobile version of my
data-interpreting machine, but it’s got
amazing functionality!
ch0041_00_nejiki_en.lsd.ch0041_00_nejiki/0602_0702_02_10:
I’ll tell you all about what this baby
can do next time.
ch0041_00_nejiki_en.lsd.ch0041_00_nejiki/0602_0702_03_10:
If we open that can of worms now,
it’ll be midnight before I can explain
all of its awesome features.
ch0041_00_nejiki_en.lsd.ch0041_00_nejiki/0603_0701_01_10:
Bronzong can call down the rain,
so people in ancient times used to
think they were deities.
ch0041_00_nejiki_en.lsd.ch0041_00_nejiki/0603_0701_02_10:
In fact, some people still worship them
as rain bringers today, if you can
believe that.
ch0041_00_nejiki_en.lsd.ch0041_00_nejiki/0603_0701_03_10:
I don’t really buy into that, though.
The only results I believe in are the ones
I can prove numerically.
ch0041_00_nejiki_en.lsd.ch0041_00_nejiki/0603_0701_04_10:
Besides, if it suddenly started raining
indoors, all of my machines would break.
ch0041_00_nejiki_en.lsd.ch0041_00_nejiki/0603_0702_01_10:
Did you know that many Pokémon
feel naturally energized by the rain?
ch0041_00_nejiki_en.lsd.ch0041_00_nejiki/0603_0702_02_10:
For that reason, a lot of Pokémon
feel thankful toward Bronzong, too.
ch0041_00_nejiki_en.lsd.ch0041_00_nejiki/0604_0701_01_10:
You look like you’re itching to
know more about me!
ch0041_00_nejiki_en.lsd.ch0041_00_nejiki/0604_0701_02_10:
In other words, you’d like to interpret
my data. Is that correct?
If so, feel free!
ch0041_00_nejiki_en.lsd.ch0041_00_nejiki/0604_0701_03_10:
Let’s see. Um... Male, teenager...
No, that’s not the sort of data you
want, is it?
ch0041_00_nejiki_en.lsd.ch0041_00_nejiki/0604_0701_04_10:
If you want to learn more about me, you’ll
need to collect some data. Spending time
with me is the best way to do that.
ch0041_00_nejiki_en.lsd.ch0041_00_nejiki/0604_0701_05_10:
It just so happens that I’m interested
in collecting some data on you as well.
Nice timing!
ch0041_00_nejiki_en.lsd.ch0041_00_nejiki/0604_0702_01_10:
There are plenty of things out there
that you can’t understand with just
a calculator.
ch0041_00_nejiki_en.lsd.ch0041_00_nejiki/0604_0702_02_10:
The more you learn about the world,
the more you’ll find things about it
that interest you.
ch0041_00_nejiki_en.lsd.ch0041_00_nejiki/0605_0701_01_10: Do you think my hairstyle is weird?
ch0041_00_nejiki_en.lsd.ch0041_00_nejiki/0605_0701_02_10:
I’m really specific about how I do it,
but it doesn’t take long at all.
ch0041_00_nejiki_en.lsd.ch0041_00_nejiki/0605_0701_03_10:
That could be because I use my invention
the Auto-Hairstyle-O-Matic to analyze
my hair type.
ch0041_00_nejiki_en.lsd.ch0041_00_nejiki/0605_0701_04_10:
Want to try it out, [Name:PlayerNickname ]?
My invention can turn any hairstyle
into one that’s just like mine.
ch0041_00_nejiki_en.lsd.ch0041_00_nejiki/0605_0702_01_10:
My Auto-Hairstyle-O-Matic doesn’t
work on bald people.
ch0041_00_nejiki_en.lsd.ch0041_00_nejiki/1701_0701_01_10:
My invention the Detect-O-Matic
picked this up out in the forest.
ch0041_00_nejiki_en.lsd.ch0041_00_nejiki/1701_0701_02_10:
I did a round of analysis on it,
and it seemed right up your alley!
ch0041_00_nejiki_en.lsd.ch0041_00_nejiki/1701_0702_01_10:
Collecting data and performing analyses
are important for all things in life.
ch0041_00_nejiki_en.lsd.ch0041_00_nejiki/1701_0702_02_10:
They are the key to obtaining greater
knowledge and experience.
ch0041_00_nejiki_en.lsd.ch0041_00_nejiki/2501_0701_01_10:
Whoa! Hey, you!
You came at just the right time!
ch0041_00_nejiki_en.lsd.ch0041_00_nejiki/2501_0701_02_10:
I’ve been wanting to do some
analysis on you. Give me your data!
ch0041_00_nejiki_en.lsd.ch0041_00_nejiki/2501_0701_03_10:
Don’t worry—I don’t need you to do
anything super specific. I just need to
look at you through my machine!
ch0041_00_nejiki_en.lsd.ch0041_00_nejiki/2501_0702_01_10:
Bzweeeeep!
Oh, don’t let the beeping concern you.
I’m just interpreting some of your data.
ch0041_00_nejiki_en.lsd.ch0041_00_nejiki/2501_0702_02_10:
You and your Pokémon continue to
exceed my calculations.
What’s the secret to your strength?
ch0041_00_nejiki_en.lsd.ch0041_00_nejiki/2501_0702_03_10:
Hmm... I’ve just gotta know!
I’m going to solve this mystery
through my analysis. I promise!
ch0041_00_nejiki_en.lsd.ch0041_00_nejiki/2511_0701_01_10:
If you collect lots of data and analyze
your Pokémon battles, you can utilize
that data moving forward!
ch0041_00_nejiki_en.lsd.ch0041_00_nejiki/2511_0701_02_10:
It’s true! It’s part of my job description
as Factory Head!
ch0041_00_nejiki_en.lsd.ch0041_00_nejiki/2511_0701_03_10:
Pokémon get disappointed when they lose
battles, too. That’s why you’ve got to
formulate new strategies!
ch0041_00_nejiki_en.lsd.ch0041_00_nejiki/2511_0701_04_10:
So that you can learn from your mistakes!
And so next time, you can win!
And things will go exactly as planned!
ch0041_00_nejiki_en.lsd.ch0041_00_nejiki/2511_0702_01_10:
I always get tons of great data
when I battle against you.
ch0041_00_nejiki_en.lsd.ch0041_00_nejiki/2511_0702_02_10:
It’ll all be put to good use when
I go back to the Battle Factory!
ch0041_00_nejiki_en.lsd.ch0041_00_nejiki/2511_0702_03_10:
Although I might as well collect as
much data as I can while I’m here...
