ch0041_00_nejiki_en.lsd.ch0041_00_nejiki/2511_0702_04_10:
The more knowledge I can amass,
the more helpful I can be to you
in a battle.
ch0041_00_nejiki_en.lsd.ch0041_00_nejiki/2511_0702_05_10:
AND I can keep getting stronger
in the meantime! Perfect logic,
just as I calculated!
ch0041_00_nejiki_en.lsd.ch0041_00_nejiki/3001_0701_01_10:
Morning! According to my analysis,
we’re in for a fine day!
ch0041_00_nejiki_en.lsd.ch0041_00_nejiki/3002_0701_01_10:
I always make excellent progress when
I study Pokémon in the morning.
ch0041_00_nejiki_en.lsd.ch0041_00_nejiki/3003_0701_01_10:
Greetings.
My calculations tell me that the current air 
temperature and humidity are optimal for battle.
ch0041_00_nejiki_en.lsd.ch0041_00_nejiki/3004_0701_01_10:
Creating a plan and then executing it is
the most efficient way to spend the day.
ch0041_00_nejiki_en.lsd.ch0041_00_nejiki/3005_0701_01_10:
Good evening. How much do you know
about nocturnal Pokémon?
ch0041_00_nejiki_en.lsd.ch0041_00_nejiki/3006_0701_01_10:
Each night, I like to review my accomplishments
of the day and evaluate my efficiency.

ch0042_00_nagi_en.lsd.ch0042_00_nagi/0101_0701_01_10:
Hello, [Name:PlayerNickname ]!
I thought I saw you come in.
ch0042_00_nagi_en.lsd.ch0042_00_nagi/0101_0701_02_10:
I can see the glow of adventure in
your eyes. Let it carry you like the
wind beneath your wings!
ch0042_00_nagi_en.lsd.ch0042_00_nagi/0601_0701_01_10:
Once, when I was a small child flying
through the sky with my bird Pokémon,
I tried to ride atop the clouds...
ch0042_00_nagi_en.lsd.ch0042_00_nagi/0601_0701_02_10:
I gazed up at them as they floated by...
perfectly fluffy and beautiful in the sky.
I wanted to take the clouds on a journey...
ch0042_00_nagi_en.lsd.ch0042_00_nagi/0601_0701_03_10:
And do you know what?
I did that very thing! I rode the clouds...
ch0042_00_nagi_en.lsd.ch0042_00_nagi/0601_0701_04_10:
For you see, what I thought were clouds
were really a flock of Altaria! You can
imagine my surprise when I tried to ride them!
ch0042_00_nagi_en.lsd.ch0042_00_nagi/0601_0702_01_10:
Drifting leisurely through the great
blue sky, the song of the Altaria
echoing on the wind...
ch0042_00_nagi_en.lsd.ch0042_00_nagi/0601_0702_02_10: It felt like something out of a dream.
ch0042_00_nagi_en.lsd.ch0042_00_nagi/0602_0701_01_10:
In my home of Fortree City, the trees
grow tall and the people live high up
in tree houses.
ch0042_00_nagi_en.lsd.ch0042_00_nagi/0602_0701_02_10:
We grow anxious when we’re too close
to the ground, you see.
I used to constantly stand on my tiptoes...
ch0042_00_nagi_en.lsd.ch0042_00_nagi/0602_0701_03_10:
but as you might guess, it led to
a great deal of leg cramping...
ch0042_00_nagi_en.lsd.ch0042_00_nagi/0602_0702_01_10:
One must always soar gracefully,
even if it means getting a
leg cramp or two!
ch0042_00_nagi_en.lsd.ch0042_00_nagi/0602_0702_02_10:
Such is the life of we who fly across
the skies with bird Pokémon!
ch0042_00_nagi_en.lsd.ch0042_00_nagi/0603_0701_01_10:
Pelipper are excellent at scooping
things up in their large beaks and
carrying them great distances.
ch0042_00_nagi_en.lsd.ch0042_00_nagi/0603_0701_02_10:
We often depend on their services
as messenger birds for this reason.
ch0042_00_nagi_en.lsd.ch0042_00_nagi/0603_0701_03_10:
When I was younger, my Pelipper was
kind enough to help me take on a
part-time job making deliveries.
ch0042_00_nagi_en.lsd.ch0042_00_nagi/0603_0702_01_10:
Pelipper and I were never in it for
the money.
ch0042_00_nagi_en.lsd.ch0042_00_nagi/0603_0702_02_10:
We delivered packages so that we could
learn everything we could about the
Fortree City Pokémon Gym.
ch0042_00_nagi_en.lsd.ch0042_00_nagi/0604_0701_01_10:
My beloved bird Pokémon soar freely
across the sky, claiming the wind as
their own with their great feathered wings.
ch0042_00_nagi_en.lsd.ch0042_00_nagi/0604_0701_02_10:
It’s as if their graceful forms are
a manifestation of our desire to
reach for those skies.
ch0042_00_nagi_en.lsd.ch0042_00_nagi/0604_0701_03_10:
When I’m soaring through the wind
with my Pokémon, I feel like I’m
one with nature.
ch0042_00_nagi_en.lsd.ch0042_00_nagi/0604_0702_01_10:
Bird Pokémon can teach us how to
be one with nature.
ch0042_00_nagi_en.lsd.ch0042_00_nagi/0604_0702_02_10:
When I look at you and your Pokémon,
I can tell you know that, too.
ch0042_00_nagi_en.lsd.ch0042_00_nagi/0605_0701_01_10:
You have a sparkling air
about you, [Name:PlayerNickname ].
ch0042_00_nagi_en.lsd.ch0042_00_nagi/0605_0701_02_10:
Your elegant gait seems to carry
a mysterious breeze throughout
the room with you.
ch0042_00_nagi_en.lsd.ch0042_00_nagi/0605_0701_03_10:
It’s as if Mother Nature herself
is sending the wind your way.
ch0042_00_nagi_en.lsd.ch0042_00_nagi/0605_0702_01_10:
I have a feeling that if I stick
with you, I’ll be able to soar
all the more gracefully...
ch0042_00_nagi_en.lsd.ch0042_00_nagi/0605_0702_02_10:
The sky is far too wide for one person
alone...
I’m sorry. Please ignore my ramblings...
ch0042_00_nagi_en.lsd.ch0042_00_nagi/1701_0701_01_10:
This item was carried to me on the wind.
Here, I hope you use it well.
ch0042_00_nagi_en.lsd.ch0042_00_nagi/1701_0701_02_10:
May Mother Nature’s great breath
bring you fortune in battle.
ch0042_00_nagi_en.lsd.ch0042_00_nagi/1701_0702_01_10:
Why do you think the winds of fortune
blow the way they do?
ch0042_00_nagi_en.lsd.ch0042_00_nagi/1701_0702_02_10:
A good wind does not falter on its path
and leaves the air pleasantly fresh
as it sweeps by.
ch0042_00_nagi_en.lsd.ch0042_00_nagi/2501_0701_01_10:
I thought long and hard about
how to be one with my bird Pokémon.
ch0042_00_nagi_en.lsd.ch0042_00_nagi/2501_0701_02_10:
I even tried behaving like a bird for
a while—I would perch up in the trees
from dawn till dusk, singing my songs.
ch0042_00_nagi_en.lsd.ch0042_00_nagi/2501_0701_03_10:
A few of the passersby seemed to be
quite worried about me at the time,
though I have no idea why...
ch0042_00_nagi_en.lsd.ch0042_00_nagi/2501_0702_01_10:
Learning to hear the whispers of the
wind was quite difficult as well...
ch0042_00_nagi_en.lsd.ch0042_00_nagi/2501_0702_02_10:
There are no translators or textbooks
to learn from.
ch0042_00_nagi_en.lsd.ch0042_00_nagi/2501_0702_03_10:
I feel like I’ve begun to understand it
now, but one-way conversations have
proven to be difficult...
ch0042_00_nagi_en.lsd.ch0042_00_nagi/2511_0701_01_10:
Would you like to try conversing
with the wind? It always puts me at ease.
ch0042_00_nagi_en.lsd.ch0042_00_nagi/2511_0701_02_10:
A gentle breeze means it’s happy.
A sudden gust means it’s angry or upset.
ch0042_00_nagi_en.lsd.ch0042_00_nagi/2511_0701_03_10:
A powerful storm means...well, maybe you
shouldn’t go any closer in that case.
Just a few windy tips for you!
ch0042_00_nagi_en.lsd.ch0042_00_nagi/2511_0701_04_10:
Although, now that I think about it,
the wind doesn’t behave all that
differently from us people.
ch0042_00_nagi_en.lsd.ch0042_00_nagi/2511_0702_01_10:
A pleasant breeze can make me feel positive
and motivated, and when I’m feeling that
way, good things tend to happen.
ch0042_00_nagi_en.lsd.ch0042_00_nagi/2511_0702_02_10:
Good fortune is carried on the wind,
or so they say.
ch0042_00_nagi_en.lsd.ch0042_00_nagi/2511_0702_03_10:
I hope the wind brings good fortune
to you.
ch0042_00_nagi_en.lsd.ch0042_00_nagi/3001_0701_01_10:
Good morning.
Do you ever think about how wonderful it would
be if you could soar gracefully through the sky?
ch0042_00_nagi_en.lsd.ch0042_00_nagi/3002_0701_01_10:
The best time to gauge the wind
is in the morning.
ch0042_00_nagi_en.lsd.ch0042_00_nagi/3003_0701_01_10:
The key to having a good afternoon is finding
a high place and feeling the wind on your face.
ch0042_00_nagi_en.lsd.ch0042_00_nagi/3004_0701_01_10:
Hello. I think it’s important to get some rest
from time to time.
ch0042_00_nagi_en.lsd.ch0042_00_nagi/3005_0701_01_10:
Don’t stay out too late—the night wind can
give you a nasty chill.
ch0042_00_nagi_en.lsd.ch0042_00_nagi/3006_0701_01_10:
I just love to feel the gentle breeze after the
sun goes down.

ch0043_00_toki_en.lsd.ch0043_00_toki/0101_0701_01_10:
Hey, [Name:PlayerNickname ]!
Riding a wave today, too?
ch0043_00_toki_en.lsd.ch0043_00_toki/0101_0701_02_10:
Anything can be training! So what should we
do today?
ch0043_00_toki_en.lsd.ch0043_00_toki/0601_0701_01_10:
Makuhita’s power is amazing! He trains all the
time without me having to say anything!
ch0043_00_toki_en.lsd.ch0043_00_toki/0601_0701_02_10: Although, long ago, we had an argument...
ch0043_00_toki_en.lsd.ch0043_00_toki/0601_0701_03_10: Hahaha! I suddenly got sent flying.
ch0043_00_toki_en.lsd.ch0043_00_toki/0601_0701_04_10:
His body may be small, but it’s packed full
of power and he’s got a lot of guts.
ch0043_00_toki_en.lsd.ch0043_00_toki/0601_0702_01_10:
With a tenacious Pokémon like that around, I
soon formed a rivalry.
ch0043_00_toki_en.lsd.ch0043_00_toki/0601_0702_02_10:
It’d be great if you can find a partner like
that, too!
ch0043_00_toki_en.lsd.ch0043_00_toki/0602_0701_01_10:
I love to go surfing! I’ve trained my body so I
can enjoy riding the rough waves!
ch0043_00_toki_en.lsd.ch0043_00_toki/0602_0701_02_10:
Planking is good for paddling!
Push-ups are good for improving your takeoff!
ch0043_00_toki_en.lsd.ch0043_00_toki/0602_0701_03_10: Squats and marathon running are effective, too!
ch0043_00_toki_en.lsd.ch0043_00_toki/0602_0701_04_10:
Even if you can’t ride the waves, don’t give up.
Training your body requires heart!
ch0043_00_toki_en.lsd.ch0043_00_toki/0602_0702_01_10: When I say heart, I don’t mean the organ.
ch0043_00_toki_en.lsd.ch0043_00_toki/0602_0702_02_10:
I mean that passion in your heart. That feeling
of being honest with yourself.
ch0043_00_toki_en.lsd.ch0043_00_toki/0603_0701_01_10: I’m from Dewford Town. It’s a small island.
ch0043_00_toki_en.lsd.ch0043_00_toki/0603_0701_02_10:
The island’s pretty small, so we’re all like
family there. We’re all bound by some incredibly
strong bonds.
ch0043_00_toki_en.lsd.ch0043_00_toki/0603_0701_03_10:
We all help each other out. We can stand
against even the strongest of waves.
’Cause we’ve got teamwork!
ch0043_00_toki_en.lsd.ch0043_00_toki/0603_0702_01_10:
When there’s a problem in Dewford Town,
people from all over the island come to help!
ch0043_00_toki_en.lsd.ch0043_00_toki/0603_0702_02_10:
Whether Dewford Town’s strength lives on 
depends on you! 
Ride that wave as best you can!
ch0043_00_toki_en.lsd.ch0043_00_toki/0603_0702_03_10:
If you ride that wave...
the rest will work itself out somehow!
ch0043_00_toki_en.lsd.ch0043_00_toki/0604_0701_01_10:
Hitmontop is a Pokémon with a really unique
kind of fighting pose!
ch0043_00_toki_en.lsd.ch0043_00_toki/0604_0701_02_10:
I use the feeling of the balance of that
excellent pose as reference for surfing.
ch0043_00_toki_en.lsd.ch0043_00_toki/0604_0701_03_10:
I can tell just by looking at you, you’d be
captivated by its pose, too!
ch0043_00_toki_en.lsd.ch0043_00_toki/0604_0702_01_10:
There’s a lot of things you can learn from
studying Pokémon!
ch0043_00_toki_en.lsd.ch0043_00_toki/0604_0702_02_10: Who we are today is thanks to Pokémon!
ch0043_00_toki_en.lsd.ch0043_00_toki/0605_0701_01_10:
[Name:PlayerNickname ]! We meet again!
Call me when you can’t ride those sweet waves!
ch0043_00_toki_en.lsd.ch0043_00_toki/0605_0701_02_10:
A long time ago, I used to relax with my training
partners a lot!
ch0043_00_toki_en.lsd.ch0043_00_toki/0605_0701_03_10:
The best break from working out is more of it!
And a Pokémon battle is the best thing for that!
ch0043_00_toki_en.lsd.ch0043_00_toki/0605_0702_01_10:
A long time ago, I used to train together with
one that had a love for Rage Candy Bars and
a fiery passion!
ch0043_00_toki_en.lsd.ch0043_00_toki/0605_0702_02_10:
I’m waiting for the day when we can
communicate with our hearts!
ch0043_00_toki_en.lsd.ch0043_00_toki/1701_0701_01_10: Hey, it’s you! I found something pretty good!
ch0043_00_toki_en.lsd.ch0043_00_toki/1701_0701_02_10:
I found this under a rock I was pushing
for training!
ch0043_00_toki_en.lsd.ch0043_00_toki/1701_0702_01_10:
It’s something great, right? 
Don’t be shy. Use it however you want!
ch0043_00_toki_en.lsd.ch0043_00_toki/2501_0701_01_10:
Look! Look at these biceps! These pecs!
These traps!
ch0043_00_toki_en.lsd.ch0043_00_toki/2501_0701_02_10:
Muscles are obedient!
If you train them, they will answer you!
ch0043_00_toki_en.lsd.ch0043_00_toki/2501_0701_03_10:
Put love into it, just like with raising Pokémon!
That’s the secret to muscle training!
ch0043_00_toki_en.lsd.ch0043_00_toki/2501_0702_01_10:
Waves will take anything you throw at them!
Muscles are the same!
ch0043_00_toki_en.lsd.ch0043_00_toki/2501_0702_02_10:
We say “mother ocean,” so are our muscles 
like a mother, too?
ch0043_00_toki_en.lsd.ch0043_00_toki/2501_0702_03_10:
Nah, wait. We’re the ones raising them, so
we’re the mothers? Or maybe fathers?
ch0043_00_toki_en.lsd.ch0043_00_toki/2501_0702_04_10:
Hm? That’s not the point? 
Hah, I say weird stuff sometimes!
ch0043_00_toki_en.lsd.ch0043_00_toki/2511_0701_01_10:
The trick to getting better at surfing...
is to have a stout heart!
ch0043_00_toki_en.lsd.ch0043_00_toki/2511_0701_02_10:
Pokémon battles are the same! Even if your real
ability isn’t enough, don’t lose in your heart!
ch0043_00_toki_en.lsd.ch0043_00_toki/2511_0701_03_10:
Don’t just train your body—train your heart!
That’s what it means to be truly strong!
ch0043_00_toki_en.lsd.ch0043_00_toki/2511_0701_04_10:
As long as you remember that, you can ride any
wave, no matter how rough!
ch0043_00_toki_en.lsd.ch0043_00_toki/2511_0702_01_10:
I love high waves and the salty breeze from the
bottom of my heart!
ch0043_00_toki_en.lsd.ch0043_00_toki/2511_0702_02_10:
When the sun’s summer rays are beating down,
I put my training to the test!
ch0043_00_toki_en.lsd.ch0043_00_toki/2511_0702_03_10:
And when I finally ride that wave, I’m filled
with an overflowing sense of accomplishment!
ch0043_00_toki_en.lsd.ch0043_00_toki/2511_0702_04_10:
I want to share that feeling!
Don’t you want to try out surfing?
ch0043_00_toki_en.lsd.ch0043_00_toki/3001_0701_01_10:
Morning! You’ll wake up in no time
when you start moving your body!
ch0043_00_toki_en.lsd.ch0043_00_toki/3002_0701_01_10:
Hey! Wanna join me for a jog?
The morning breeze is cool and refreshing!
ch0043_00_toki_en.lsd.ch0043_00_toki/3003_0701_01_10:
Chilling on the beach in the afternoon, waiting
for good waves... That can be fun, too!
ch0043_00_toki_en.lsd.ch0043_00_toki/3004_0701_01_10:
Weather’s nice and the sea is calm.
It’s a perfect afternoon for some training!
ch0043_00_toki_en.lsd.ch0043_00_toki/3005_0701_01_10:
It’s so nice listening to the sea at night
and hearing the tide roll in.
ch0043_00_toki_en.lsd.ch0043_00_toki/3006_0701_01_10:
It’s nice to cool off a bit at night.
Make sure you’re ready to hit the surf tomorrow!

ch0044_00_tsutsuji_en.lsd.ch0044_00_tsutsuji/0101_0701_01_10:
Oh, [Name:PlayerNickname ]!
I was waiting for you to come!
ch0044_00_tsutsuji_en.lsd.ch0044_00_tsutsuji/0101_0701_02_10: Let’s learn about Pokémon together again.
ch0044_00_tsutsuji_en.lsd.ch0044_00_tsutsuji/0601_0701_01_10:
I’m looking up all sorts of things about Trainers
and Gyms from different regions.
ch0044_00_tsutsuji_en.lsd.ch0044_00_tsutsuji/0601_0701_02_10:
If I want to win the PML, I have to learn 
as much as I can from old documents.
ch0044_00_tsutsuji_en.lsd.ch0044_00_tsutsuji/0601_0701_03_10: Humans are creatures of learning, after all!
ch0044_00_tsutsuji_en.lsd.ch0044_00_tsutsuji/0601_0702_01_10:
There are all sorts of things in history—both
big and small.
ch0044_00_tsutsuji_en.lsd.ch0044_00_tsutsuji/0601_0702_02_10:
Even small things are important. For example,
our meeting will go down in history.
ch0044_00_tsutsuji_en.lsd.ch0044_00_tsutsuji/0602_0701_01_10:
There are Geodude all over the world, but
many of them are in the Kanto region.
ch0044_00_tsutsuji_en.lsd.ch0044_00_tsutsuji/0602_0701_02_10:
Those Geodude evolve into Graveler and then
into Golem after that.
ch0044_00_tsutsuji_en.lsd.ch0044_00_tsutsuji/0602_0701_03_10: I always wanted to be a Trainer of a Golem.
ch0044_00_tsutsuji_en.lsd.ch0044_00_tsutsuji/0602_0701_04_10:
In fact, one of my goals as a young child 
was to train a Golem.
ch0044_00_tsutsuji_en.lsd.ch0044_00_tsutsuji/0602_0702_01_10: Even a small Pokémon can grow big and strong.
ch0044_00_tsutsuji_en.lsd.ch0044_00_tsutsuji/0602_0702_02_10:
Being able to see that moment is another perk
that comes with being a Trainer!
ch0044_00_tsutsuji_en.lsd.ch0044_00_tsutsuji/0603_0701_01_10:
Boulders, fossils, and minerals—aren’t they
all wonderful?
ch0044_00_tsutsuji_en.lsd.ch0044_00_tsutsuji/0603_0701_02_10: Just looking at them gets me excited!
ch0044_00_tsutsuji_en.lsd.ch0044_00_tsutsuji/0603_0701_03_10: These were here before I was born...
ch0044_00_tsutsuji_en.lsd.ch0044_00_tsutsuji/0603_0701_04_10:
and they will be here for a long time after.
They’re unbudging, absolute objects.
ch0044_00_tsutsuji_en.lsd.ch0044_00_tsutsuji/0603_0702_01_10:
Even a rock can be as beautiful as a jewel
or the stars in the night sky.
ch0044_00_tsutsuji_en.lsd.ch0044_00_tsutsuji/0603_0702_02_10:
But you have something that shines just
as brightly...
ch0044_00_tsutsuji_en.lsd.ch0044_00_tsutsuji/0603_0702_03_10:
Your passion. That hot, burning passion is
something that every Trainer should have.
ch0044_00_tsutsuji_en.lsd.ch0044_00_tsutsuji/0604_0701_02_10: Her firm stance, her well-featured face...
ch0044_00_tsutsuji_en.lsd.ch0044_00_tsutsuji/0604_0701_03_10:
She is absolutely beautiful, like an avatar of
beauty itself.
ch0044_00_tsutsuji_en.lsd.ch0044_00_tsutsuji/0604_0701_04_10:
She is not flashy, but her rugged look is what
makes her so beautiful.
ch0044_00_tsutsuji_en.lsd.ch0044_00_tsutsuji/0604_0702_01_10:
I want Nosepass to make her mark on a shiny
stage one day, too.
ch0044_00_tsutsuji_en.lsd.ch0044_00_tsutsuji/0604_0702_02_10: Because Nosepass is still a gem in the rough!
ch0044_00_tsutsuji_en.lsd.ch0044_00_tsutsuji/0605_0701_01_10:
You can see a Trainer’s preference even in
something as simple as a battle.
ch0044_00_tsutsuji_en.lsd.ch0044_00_tsutsuji/0605_0701_02_10: I like battles when I can predict the outcome.
ch0044_00_tsutsuji_en.lsd.ch0044_00_tsutsuji/0605_0701_03_10: But what I like even more are...
ch0044_00_tsutsuji_en.lsd.ch0044_00_tsutsuji/0605_0701_04_10:
battles with you for which no amount of studying
could ever prepare me for!
ch0044_00_tsutsuji_en.lsd.ch0044_00_tsutsuji/0605_0701_05_10:
Those battles get so hot that we could
melt boulders!
ch0044_00_tsutsuji_en.lsd.ch0044_00_tsutsuji/0605_0702_01_10:
I have so many things I can learn from battles
with you, [Name:PlayerNickname ].
ch0044_00_tsutsuji_en.lsd.ch0044_00_tsutsuji/0605_0702_02_10:
I just hope that you have something that you
can learn from them, too.
ch0044_00_tsutsuji_en.lsd.ch0044_00_tsutsuji/1701_0701_01_10:
I got you a present as a reward for all of your
hard work!
ch0044_00_tsutsuji_en.lsd.ch0044_00_tsutsuji/1701_0701_02_10:
Think well of how to use it. It can become
anything from exactly what you need to
completely worthless, depending on you.
ch0044_00_tsutsuji_en.lsd.ch0044_00_tsutsuji/1701_0702_01_10:
Even if you study up on it, you won’t know how
to use it properly until you actually use it.
ch0044_00_tsutsuji_en.lsd.ch0044_00_tsutsuji/1701_0702_02_10:
In whatever you do, there’s informational
knowledge and practical knowledge that you
have to consider.
ch0044_00_tsutsuji_en.lsd.ch0044_00_tsutsuji/2501_0701_01_10: Do you like to study? I absolutely love it!
ch0044_00_tsutsuji_en.lsd.ch0044_00_tsutsuji/2501_0701_02_10:
The more I learn, the more I feel that
I am polishing myself...
ch0044_00_tsutsuji_en.lsd.ch0044_00_tsutsuji/2501_0701_03_10:
very much like a rock being polished into a gem,
and I love that feeling.
ch0044_00_tsutsuji_en.lsd.ch0044_00_tsutsuji/2501_0702_01_10: I don’t need a break! I love to learn.
ch0044_00_tsutsuji_en.lsd.ch0044_00_tsutsuji/2501_0702_02_10: But I do want to learn more about Pasio.
ch0044_00_tsutsuji_en.lsd.ch0044_00_tsutsuji/2501_0702_03_10:
Rumors say that there are buildings with fossils
in the walls...
ch0044_00_tsutsuji_en.lsd.ch0044_00_tsutsuji/2501_0702_04_10: Uh, no! It’s nothing. Forget I said anything!
ch0044_00_tsutsuji_en.lsd.ch0044_00_tsutsuji/2511_0701_01_10:
Would you like to study with me?
The romantic secrets of the rocks?
ch0044_00_tsutsuji_en.lsd.ch0044_00_tsutsuji/2511_0701_02_10:
For example, the fossils buried in the walls...
Even living creatures become rocks!
ch0044_00_tsutsuji_en.lsd.ch0044_00_tsutsuji/2511_0701_03_10:
Learning is wanting to know more.
That is what is important.
ch0044_00_tsutsuji_en.lsd.ch0044_00_tsutsuji/2511_0701_04_10:
Let’s study the mysteries of Rock-type
Pokémon together!
ch0044_00_tsutsuji_en.lsd.ch0044_00_tsutsuji/2511_0702_01_10:
To be able to talk with me this much...
Are you, by chance, a rock maniac like me?
ch0044_00_tsutsuji_en.lsd.ch0044_00_tsutsuji/2511_0702_02_10: How splendid! Please be my rock pal!
ch0044_00_tsutsuji_en.lsd.ch0044_00_tsutsuji/2511_0702_03_10:
I have to introduce you to Steven, too!
He’s also my rock pal!
ch0044_00_tsutsuji_en.lsd.ch0044_00_tsutsuji/2511_0702_04_10:
Please come by the Rustboro Gym sometime 
and battle me! 
We’ll use our best Rock-type Pokémon!
ch0044_00_tsutsuji_en.lsd.ch0044_00_tsutsuji/3001_0701_01_10:
Hello! Using the morning to plan your day
is always a good idea.
ch0044_00_tsutsuji_en.lsd.ch0044_00_tsutsuji/3002_0701_01_10:
Waking up early always makes me feel like
something good will happen.
Like...maybe finding a rare stone!
ch0044_00_tsutsuji_en.lsd.ch0044_00_tsutsuji/3003_0701_01_10:
Afternoon! I prefer to get my chores done early
in the day. It helps keep things efficient!
ch0044_00_tsutsuji_en.lsd.ch0044_00_tsutsuji/3004_0701_01_10:
I always get a bit sleepy in the afternoon.
If I’m not careful, I... *yawn*
I might not be able to stop yawning.
ch0044_00_tsutsuji_en.lsd.ch0044_00_tsutsuji/3005_0701_01_10:
Hello! I suppose it’s time to rest for the night.
I hope you had a productive day!
ch0044_00_tsutsuji_en.lsd.ch0044_00_tsutsuji/3006_0701_01_10:
If you push yourself too hard in the evening,
it’ll affect how you feel the next day.
Make sure to set aside some time to rest.

ch0045_00_tsukushi_en.lsd.ch0045_00_tsukushi/0101_0701_01_10:
Hiya, [Name:PlayerNickname ]! I’m so glad
you’re here! I’ve been waiting for you.
ch0045_00_tsukushi_en.lsd.ch0045_00_tsukushi/0101_0701_02_10:
I wanted to show you the results of
all the new research I’ve been doing!
ch0045_00_tsukushi_en.lsd.ch0045_00_tsukushi/0601_0701_01_10:
A lot of people think Bug-type Pokémon,
like Weedle and Kakuna, are creepy.
ch0045_00_tsukushi_en.lsd.ch0045_00_tsukushi/0601_0701_02_10:
They don’t understand how awesome
and cute Bug-type Pokémon really are!
ch0045_00_tsukushi_en.lsd.ch0045_00_tsukushi/0601_0701_03_10:
When they evolve, sometimes they look
completely different than they did before!
It never gets old!
ch0045_00_tsukushi_en.lsd.ch0045_00_tsukushi/0601_0702_01_10:
They can go from a superhardened
chrysalis to sprouting big,
beautiful wings!
ch0045_00_tsukushi_en.lsd.ch0045_00_tsukushi/0601_0702_02_10:
Don’t you find that super mysterious?!
Oh boy, I’d love to expand my circle
of Bug-type Pokémon enthusiasts!
ch0045_00_tsukushi_en.lsd.ch0045_00_tsukushi/0602_0701_01_10:
When I go to the library, I can never
reach the books on the upper shelves,
no matter how far I stretch.
ch0045_00_tsukushi_en.lsd.ch0045_00_tsukushi/0602_0701_02_10:
I wish I could use String Shot!
I could grab a book from up high
and pull it right into my hand!
ch0045_00_tsukushi_en.lsd.ch0045_00_tsukushi/0602_0701_03_10:
You know what would be even cooler?
If I had beautiful wings to fly with,
like my Bug-type Pokémon...
ch0045_00_tsukushi_en.lsd.ch0045_00_tsukushi/0602_0701_04_10:
I wish I could evolve, like
Metapod or Kakuna.
ch0045_00_tsukushi_en.lsd.ch0045_00_tsukushi/0602_0702_01_10:
Maybe, when I grow up, I’ll completely
change my shape, too—just like
a chrysalis!
ch0045_00_tsukushi_en.lsd.ch0045_00_tsukushi/0603_0701_01_10:
When I grow up, I wanna be just like
the world-famous Pokémon professor,
Professor Oak!
ch0045_00_tsukushi_en.lsd.ch0045_00_tsukushi/0603_0701_02_10:
I wanna be super knowledgeable about ALL
Pokémon, not just Bug-type Pokémon!
ch0045_00_tsukushi_en.lsd.ch0045_00_tsukushi/0603_0701_03_10:
Oh boy! If I could do research alongside
Professor Oak someday, that would be a
dream come true.
ch0045_00_tsukushi_en.lsd.ch0045_00_tsukushi/0603_0701_04_10:
That’s why I’ve gotta study,
study, study so I can make
that happen one day!
ch0045_00_tsukushi_en.lsd.ch0045_00_tsukushi/0603_0702_01_10:
I’ll be rooting for your dreams to
come true, too!
Let’s work hard together!
ch0045_00_tsukushi_en.lsd.ch0045_00_tsukushi/0603_0702_02_10:
It’s better to have a goal in sight
than to run around recklessly.
At least, that’s what I think.
ch0045_00_tsukushi_en.lsd.ch0045_00_tsukushi/0604_0701_01_10:
When I was back in Johto, one of the
Pokémon I focused my research on
the most was Scyther.
ch0045_00_tsukushi_en.lsd.ch0045_00_tsukushi/0604_0701_02_10:
They zip around reeeally fast,
so it was extremely hard to catch one.
ch0045_00_tsukushi_en.lsd.ch0045_00_tsukushi/0604_0701_03_10:
Then again, the challenge made me
that much happier when I did manage
to finally catch one!
ch0045_00_tsukushi_en.lsd.ch0045_00_tsukushi/0604_0702_01_10:
Most people tend to focus on its
razor-sharp scythes...
ch0045_00_tsukushi_en.lsd.ch0045_00_tsukushi/0604_0702_02_10:
but the way Scyther’s beautiful green
color blends into the grass and trees
is also pretty amazing, if you ask me.
ch0045_00_tsukushi_en.lsd.ch0045_00_tsukushi/0605_0701_01_10:
Do you think there’s a Legendary Pokémon
out there that’s a Bug type?
ch0045_00_tsukushi_en.lsd.ch0045_00_tsukushi/0605_0701_02_10:
If you ever hear any rumors about one,
promise you’ll tell me!
ch0045_00_tsukushi_en.lsd.ch0045_00_tsukushi/0605_0701_03_10:
I’d search high and low all over the
world if it meant I could meet a
Legendary Bug-type Pokémon.
ch0045_00_tsukushi_en.lsd.ch0045_00_tsukushi/0605_0701_04_10:
A-and if I did, I’d be the most
excited bug catcher in the whole
wide world!
ch0045_00_tsukushi_en.lsd.ch0045_00_tsukushi/0605_0702_01_10:
If you’re searching for a Pokémon,
you should never give up! One will
appear eventually—if you keep at it!
ch0045_00_tsukushi_en.lsd.ch0045_00_tsukushi/0605_0702_02_10:
That’s pretty much the
story of my life!
ch0045_00_tsukushi_en.lsd.ch0045_00_tsukushi/1701_0701_01_10:
I found something neat when I was
out catching some bugs.
Here, you can have it!
ch0045_00_tsukushi_en.lsd.ch0045_00_tsukushi/1701_0701_02_10:
Don’t worry about it! It’s just a little
token of thanks for all the things you
do for me.
ch0045_00_tsukushi_en.lsd.ch0045_00_tsukushi/1701_0702_01_10:
Sometimes I catch more than just
Bug-type Pokémon in my net...
ch0045_00_tsukushi_en.lsd.ch0045_00_tsukushi/1701_0702_02_10:
like handy items and stuff!
I’ll be sure to share what I
find with you!
ch0045_00_tsukushi_en.lsd.ch0045_00_tsukushi/2501_0701_01_10:
If someone were to ask me why I love
Bug-type Pokémon so much...I...I’m not
sure how I’d answer that.
ch0045_00_tsukushi_en.lsd.ch0045_00_tsukushi/2501_0701_02_10:
They’re beautiful, they’re cool,
they’re tough! And, and...
ch0045_00_tsukushi_en.lsd.ch0045_00_tsukushi/2501_0701_03_10:
and there are so many amazing things
about them that I don’t think I could
list them all if I tried!
ch0045_00_tsukushi_en.lsd.ch0045_00_tsukushi/2501_0702_01_10:
Sometimes, it’s hard to explain
why you love something.
ch0045_00_tsukushi_en.lsd.ch0045_00_tsukushi/2501_0702_02_10:
That’s why I want to show everyone,
not just tell them, how awesome my
Beedrill is! I want them all to see it!
ch0045_00_tsukushi_en.lsd.ch0045_00_tsukushi/2501_0702_03_10:
When you see Beedrill’s giant stingers
and sharp, powerful attacks, it’ll be
love at first sight!
ch0045_00_tsukushi_en.lsd.ch0045_00_tsukushi/2511_0701_01_10:
Whenever we have a conversation, I feel
like I just babble nonstop about
Bug-type Pokémon and nothing else.
ch0045_00_tsukushi_en.lsd.ch0045_00_tsukushi/2511_0701_02_10:
Are you good at listening?
You’re so easy to talk to.
ch0045_00_tsukushi_en.lsd.ch0045_00_tsukushi/2511_0701_03_10:
I hope we can keep talking to each
other like this—as friends! That would
make me really happy!
ch0045_00_tsukushi_en.lsd.ch0045_00_tsukushi/2511_0702_01_10:
I really like you and I really like
Bug-type Pokémon, so I always want to
tell you all about them!
ch0045_00_tsukushi_en.lsd.ch0045_00_tsukushi/2511_0702_02_10:
If you have anything that you
really like, you can tell me all
about it, too!
ch0045_00_tsukushi_en.lsd.ch0045_00_tsukushi/3001_0701_01_10:
Up and at ’em! Those Bug-type Pokémon
aren’t gonna research themselves!
ch0045_00_tsukushi_en.lsd.ch0045_00_tsukushi/3002_0701_01_10:
Good morning. It’s so early. How do you have
so much energy? I’m still sleepy.
ch0045_00_tsukushi_en.lsd.ch0045_00_tsukushi/3003_0701_01_10:
Hey! Do you want to take a little nap
before heading out?
ch0045_00_tsukushi_en.lsd.ch0045_00_tsukushi/3004_0701_01_10:
Good afternoon! The weather is so nice.
We should go do some nature observation!
ch0045_00_tsukushi_en.lsd.ch0045_00_tsukushi/3005_0701_01_10:
Gee, look at the time!
Sometimes I get so caught up in my research,
I don’t realize how late it’s getting.
ch0045_00_tsukushi_en.lsd.ch0045_00_tsukushi/3006_0701_01_10:
Wow, you’re out late tonight! Maybe I should put
in a few extra hours of research myself!

ch0046_00_datsura_en.lsd.ch0046_00_datsura/0101_0701_01_10:
There you are! I was waiting for you,
[Name:PlayerNickname ]!
ch0046_00_datsura_en.lsd.ch0046_00_datsura/0101_0701_02_10:
We can’t get this party started without you!
I’m counting on you today, too!
ch0046_00_datsura_en.lsd.ch0046_00_datsura/0601_0701_01_10:
Pinsir is my bro. We’ve communicated—him with
his pincers and me with my fists—so many times
we understand each other perfectly!
ch0046_00_datsura_en.lsd.ch0046_00_datsura/0601_0701_02_10:
Clashing with body and spirit will allow anybody
to understand each other.
ch0046_00_datsura_en.lsd.ch0046_00_datsura/0601_0701_03_10:
Even if we can’t talk to each other, Pokémon are
humanity’s best friend!
ch0046_00_datsura_en.lsd.ch0046_00_datsura/0601_0702_01_10:
If you want to be friends, you gotta butt heads
a few times!
ch0046_00_datsura_en.lsd.ch0046_00_datsura/0601_0702_02_10:
So if you got something on your mind, don’t hold
nothin’ back. Come at me!
ch0046_00_datsura_en.lsd.ch0046_00_datsura/0602_0701_01_10: I’m the Frontier Brain that tests your knowledge.
ch0046_00_datsura_en.lsd.ch0046_00_datsura/0602_0701_02_10:
I know it’s hard to imagine 
with me lookin’ like this.
ch0046_00_datsura_en.lsd.ch0046_00_datsura/0602_0701_03_10:
But knowledge ain’t just somethin’ you get
by studyin’.
ch0046_00_datsura_en.lsd.ch0046_00_datsura/0602_0701_04_10:
In order to experience everything, you need to
have a honed mind and body to handle it!
ch0046_00_datsura_en.lsd.ch0046_00_datsura/0602_0702_01_10:
Everything is connected.
Nothing you do is ever a waste!
ch0046_00_datsura_en.lsd.ch0046_00_datsura/0602_0702_02_10:
You gotta know what you’re good at.
That is what’s gonna lead you to winning.
ch0046_00_datsura_en.lsd.ch0046_00_datsura/0603_0701_01_10:
Looks like there are a lot of areas that we still
don’t know about on Pasio.
ch0046_00_datsura_en.lsd.ch0046_00_datsura/0603_0701_02_10:
I gotta study up if I want to keep my title of
Frontier Brain!
ch0046_00_datsura_en.lsd.ch0046_00_datsura/0603_0701_03_10:
If you find any area information, let me know.
I wanna go with you.
ch0046_00_datsura_en.lsd.ch0046_00_datsura/0603_0701_04_10: I can’t stand not knowing something!
ch0046_00_datsura_en.lsd.ch0046_00_datsura/0603_0702_01_10:
And there are still plenty of things I don’t know
out there.
ch0046_00_datsura_en.lsd.ch0046_00_datsura/0603_0702_02_10:
That’s just frustratin’, ain’t it?
That’s why I want to know more!
ch0046_00_datsura_en.lsd.ch0046_00_datsura/0604_0701_01_10:
Back at the Battle Frontier where I’m from,
you fight each other with Pokémon that you rent.
ch0046_00_datsura_en.lsd.ch0046_00_datsura/0604_0701_02_10:
So you and your opponent are on an even
playing field! If you can’t think outside the box,
your opponent will read you like a book!
ch0046_00_datsura_en.lsd.ch0046_00_datsura/0604_0701_03_10:
No matter what hand you’re dealt, you gotta
bring all your Pokémon knowledge to battle!
ch0046_00_datsura_en.lsd.ch0046_00_datsura/0604_0701_04_10:
You’re tested on how well you can utilize
rented Pokémon!
ch0046_00_datsura_en.lsd.ch0046_00_datsura/0604_0702_01_10:
Even if you’re usin’ Pokémon that you’re not
accustomed to, as long as you know about ’em,
you can be strong!
ch0046_00_datsura_en.lsd.ch0046_00_datsura/0604_0702_02_10:
If you can know your partner Pokémon’s moves,
characteristics, and how it fights, that alone
gives you a connection to it!
ch0046_00_datsura_en.lsd.ch0046_00_datsura/0605_0701_01_10:
These guys on Pasio sure are fun!
They battle in ways I’ve never seen before!
ch0046_00_datsura_en.lsd.ch0046_00_datsura/0605_0701_02_10:
There are so many things I would never have
been able to experience had I stayed in Hoenn.
ch0046_00_datsura_en.lsd.ch0046_00_datsura/0605_0701_03_10: I gotta take this opportunity to study up!
ch0046_00_datsura_en.lsd.ch0046_00_datsura/0605_0701_05_10: If you ever need help, you can count on me!
ch0046_00_datsura_en.lsd.ch0046_00_datsura/0605_0702_01_10:
I’ll never be cheap with knowledge!
Watch and learn as much as you can!
ch0046_00_datsura_en.lsd.ch0046_00_datsura/0605_0702_02_10: I promise you won’t regret it!
ch0046_00_datsura_en.lsd.ch0046_00_datsura/1701_0702_01_10:
You probably need this more than me.
Use it well!
ch0046_00_datsura_en.lsd.ch0046_00_datsura/2501_0701_01_10:
Whoa whoa, what’s wrong? You’re gonna go
win a Pokémon battle, ain’t ya?
ch0046_00_datsura_en.lsd.ch0046_00_datsura/2501_0701_02_10: If you ever need my advice, you just gotta ask!
ch0046_00_datsura_en.lsd.ch0046_00_datsura/2501_0701_03_10:
With our knowledge and experience combined,
there’s nothin’ we can’t handle!
ch0046_00_datsura_en.lsd.ch0046_00_datsura/2501_0702_01_10: If you ever get stuck, don’t just stop!
ch0046_00_datsura_en.lsd.ch0046_00_datsura/2501_0702_02_10:
Try everything, and build up your experience!
Then use that knowledge to get results!
ch0046_00_datsura_en.lsd.ch0046_00_datsura/2501_0702_03_10:
All I can do is help. You need to find your own
resolve to get those results!
ch0046_00_datsura_en.lsd.ch0046_00_datsura/2511_0701_01_10:
I see that all your efforts, big and small,
are definitely making you stronger.
ch0046_00_datsura_en.lsd.ch0046_00_datsura/2511_0701_02_10:
Once we’re done with Pasio, come by the
Battle Frontier!
ch0046_00_datsura_en.lsd.ch0046_00_datsura/2511_0701_03_10: With your skill, you’ll make it far. I know it!
ch0046_00_datsura_en.lsd.ch0046_00_datsura/2511_0702_01_10:
Most don’t make it through the Battle Frontier
with force alone.
ch0046_00_datsura_en.lsd.ch0046_00_datsura/2511_0702_02_10:
But you? You might even be able to win the
entire thing!
ch0046_00_datsura_en.lsd.ch0046_00_datsura/2511_0702_03_10:
If you’re gonna challenge us, though, you’d
better be ready to go wild!
ch0046_00_datsura_en.lsd.ch0046_00_datsura/3001_0701_01_10:
Morning!
Time to start the day off with a spark!
ch0046_00_datsura_en.lsd.ch0046_00_datsura/3002_0701_01_10:
You’re looking a little sleepy there.
C’mon! I’ll wake you up!
ch0046_00_datsura_en.lsd.ch0046_00_datsura/3003_0701_01_10:
Hey hey! You look like you’re doing good.
Keep it up, and keep it going!
ch0046_00_datsura_en.lsd.ch0046_00_datsura/3004_0701_01_10:
Hey! C’mon!
Let’s get out there and do something!
ch0046_00_datsura_en.lsd.ch0046_00_datsura/3005_0701_01_10:
Just ’cause it’s late doesn’t mean I’m out
of energy. C’mon! Try to keep up!
ch0046_00_datsura_en.lsd.ch0046_00_datsura/3006_0701_01_10:
You look like you’re still ready for more.
C’mon! Let’s keep at it!

ch0047_00_itsuki_en.lsd.ch0047_00_itsuki/0101_0701_01_10:
I had a feeling that you would be coming here,
[Name:PlayerNickname ].
ch0047_00_itsuki_en.lsd.ch0047_00_itsuki/0101_0701_02_10: Well then, let’s start today’s training!
ch0047_00_itsuki_en.lsd.ch0047_00_itsuki/0601_0701_01_10:
After some training, my skill was recognized by
the Pokémon League and I joined the Elite Four.
ch0047_00_itsuki_en.lsd.ch0047_00_itsuki/0601_0701_02_10:
I can only keep getting better!
The possibilities are limitless!
ch0047_00_itsuki_en.lsd.ch0047_00_itsuki/0601_0701_03_10:
If you have the desire to progress, that will
be your drive to acquire more strength.
ch0047_00_itsuki_en.lsd.ch0047_00_itsuki/0601_0702_01_10:
To me, becoming a member of the Elite Four is
important but it isn’t my goal.
ch0047_00_itsuki_en.lsd.ch0047_00_itsuki/0601_0702_02_10:
What I’m aiming for is even higher. I want to be
the pinnacle of all Pokémon Trainers!
ch0047_00_itsuki_en.lsd.ch0047_00_itsuki/0602_0701_01_10:
Sometimes, we Elite Four have Pokémon battles
among ourselves.
ch0047_00_itsuki_en.lsd.ch0047_00_itsuki/0602_0701_02_10:
We all know each other’s tactics, so it always
comes down to the skin of our teeth.
ch0047_00_itsuki_en.lsd.ch0047_00_itsuki/0602_0701_03_10:
The key to my winning all of my battles...
I want to find it here on Pasio!
ch0047_00_itsuki_en.lsd.ch0047_00_itsuki/0602_0702_01_10:
There are people all over the world that my
Pokémon can’t beat yet...
ch0047_00_itsuki_en.lsd.ch0047_00_itsuki/0602_0702_02_10:
That’s what gets me fired up.
I want to beat all of them!
ch0047_00_itsuki_en.lsd.ch0047_00_itsuki/0603_0701_01_10: Xatu is a very mysterious Pokémon.
ch0047_00_itsuki_en.lsd.ch0047_00_itsuki/0603_0701_02_10: One time, I thought she disappeared...
ch0047_00_itsuki_en.lsd.ch0047_00_itsuki/0603_0701_03_10:
But then three days later, I found her in the same
spot as if nothing had happened.
ch0047_00_itsuki_en.lsd.ch0047_00_itsuki/0603_0701_04_10:
Now this is just hypothetical, but she might 
have transcended time and space!
ch0047_00_itsuki_en.lsd.ch0047_00_itsuki/0603_0701_05_10:
Even if that’s not the case, it’s possible that Xatu
have amazing powers we don’t know of yet.
ch0047_00_itsuki_en.lsd.ch0047_00_itsuki/0603_0702_01_10:
Xatu’s eyes are seeing both the past
and the future.
ch0047_00_itsuki_en.lsd.ch0047_00_itsuki/0603_0702_02_10: I wonder how she sees the present.
ch0047_00_itsuki_en.lsd.ch0047_00_itsuki/0604_0701_00_10:
As a member of the Indigo Elite Four, I need
reliable Pokémon to take on all my challengers.
One of mine is Jynx.
ch0047_00_itsuki_en.lsd.ch0047_00_itsuki/0604_0701_01_10:
Before I became an Elite Four member, I went to
the Ice Path in the Johto region.
ch0047_00_itsuki_en.lsd.ch0047_00_itsuki/0604_0701_02_10:
I slipped and was about to be stranded,
but then I heard somebody’s voice...
ch0047_00_itsuki_en.lsd.ch0047_00_itsuki/0604_0701_03_10: That was when I met Jynx!
ch0047_00_itsuki_en.lsd.ch0047_00_itsuki/0604_0701_04_10:
I instantly liked her humanlike voice and strange
dance, and so I decided to train one.
ch0047_00_itsuki_en.lsd.ch0047_00_itsuki/0604_0702_01_10:
I feel as if Jynx’s dance has a mysterious power
to it.
ch0047_00_itsuki_en.lsd.ch0047_00_itsuki/0604_0702_02_10:
I can count on her even when I battle as an
Elite Four member.
ch0047_00_itsuki_en.lsd.ch0047_00_itsuki/0605_0701_01_10:
If you want to become even stronger, I’ll teach
you an easy training method.
ch0047_00_itsuki_en.lsd.ch0047_00_itsuki/0605_0701_02_10:
Just concentrate really hard on the tree
in front of us.
ch0047_00_itsuki_en.lsd.ch0047_00_itsuki/0605_0701_03_10:
You can train your concentration like that, and
if you can train your concentration like that, you
will be able to concentrate in battle better, too!
ch0047_00_itsuki_en.lsd.ch0047_00_itsuki/0605_0701_04_10:
Your strength of mind—your strength of
will—becomes your advantage in battle. 
Try it out sometime!
ch0047_00_itsuki_en.lsd.ch0047_00_itsuki/0605_0702_01_10:
There are more ways to train, but I’m going to
keep those a secret.
ch0047_00_itsuki_en.lsd.ch0047_00_itsuki/0605_0702_02_10:
If I tell you how I train, you’ll figure out
the secrets to my strength!
ch0047_00_itsuki_en.lsd.ch0047_00_itsuki/1701_0701_01_10: Xatu brought me an item, but you can have it!
ch0047_00_itsuki_en.lsd.ch0047_00_itsuki/1701_0702_01_10:
Xatu brings back items that have a mysterious
power to them!
ch0047_00_itsuki_en.lsd.ch0047_00_itsuki/1701_0702_02_10:
At least I think they do. But I want you to
be able to feel that, too.
ch0047_00_itsuki_en.lsd.ch0047_00_itsuki/2501_0701_01_10:
After all of my travels and training, there
was something I came to feel.
ch0047_00_itsuki_en.lsd.ch0047_00_itsuki/2501_0701_02_10:
That is the strength of Psychic-type Pokémon!
The mysterious powers they hold is very strong!
ch0047_00_itsuki_en.lsd.ch0047_00_itsuki/2501_0701_03_10:
But willpower is not the only appeal of Psychic-
type Pokémon. They also have strength of mind!
ch0047_00_itsuki_en.lsd.ch0047_00_itsuki/2501_0701_04_10:
I can count on them in any battle.
That is what I was attracted to.
ch0047_00_itsuki_en.lsd.ch0047_00_itsuki/2501_0702_01_10:
I train to better myself and to not disappoint
my Pokémon.
ch0047_00_itsuki_en.lsd.ch0047_00_itsuki/2501_0702_02_10:
My Pokémon always give me a
splendid performance!
ch0047_00_itsuki_en.lsd.ch0047_00_itsuki/2501_0702_03_10:
The reason I can keep fighting as a member of
the Elite Four is my Pokémon try hard, too.
That’s why I have to work just as hard as them.
ch0047_00_itsuki_en.lsd.ch0047_00_itsuki/2511_0701_01_10:
You’re growing strong so quickly.
I have to watch my back!
ch0047_00_itsuki_en.lsd.ch0047_00_itsuki/2511_0701_02_10:
I’d like to have a race with you to see which
of us reaches the pinnacle of all Trainers first!
ch0047_00_itsuki_en.lsd.ch0047_00_itsuki/2511_0701_03_10:
I’m grateful for the chance to not only meet
you but to be on a team with you as well!
ch0047_00_itsuki_en.lsd.ch0047_00_itsuki/2511_0702_01_10:
I’ll keep you in mind when I train with my
Pokémon in the future.
ch0047_00_itsuki_en.lsd.ch0047_00_itsuki/2511_0702_02_10:
Because I want to beat you specifically!
Losing is not an option, after all!
ch0047_00_itsuki_en.lsd.ch0047_00_itsuki/2511_0702_03_10:
So if you could keep our future battle in mind
as well, that would be great!
ch0047_00_itsuki_en.lsd.ch0047_00_itsuki/3001_0701_01_10:
Hello there. Would you care to do some early
morning training with me?
ch0047_00_itsuki_en.lsd.ch0047_00_itsuki/3002_0701_01_10:
They say the early Pidgey catches the Weedle.
Like myself, you seem to have taken that lesson
to heart.
ch0047_00_itsuki_en.lsd.ch0047_00_itsuki/3003_0701_01_10:
Hi there. Would you be interested in seeing
some of my psychic powers in action?
ch0047_00_itsuki_en.lsd.ch0047_00_itsuki/3004_0701_01_10:
My Pokémon loves to stare up at the sun.
She’ll do it all day if she can!
ch0047_00_itsuki_en.lsd.ch0047_00_itsuki/3005_0701_01_10:
It could be my imagination, but I feel like
my psychic powers intensify at night.
ch0047_00_itsuki_en.lsd.ch0047_00_itsuki/3006_0701_01_10:
My Pokémon never stops gazing at the world—
even at night.

ch0049_00_fuyo_en.lsd.ch0049_00_fuyo/0101_0701_01_10:
Ahahaha! I’ve been waiting for you!
Glad you’re here, [Name:PlayerNickname ]!
ch0049_00_fuyo_en.lsd.ch0049_00_fuyo/0101_0701_02_10: Let’s deepen our bonds even more today!
ch0049_00_fuyo_en.lsd.ch0049_00_fuyo/0601_0701_02_10: I was just talking about you with her.
ch0049_00_fuyo_en.lsd.ch0049_00_fuyo/0601_0701_03_10:
Oh, she went home...
I guess she thought to give us some space.
ch0049_00_fuyo_en.lsd.ch0049_00_fuyo/0601_0702_01_10:
I talked to a lot of people on Mt. Pyre, so I got
used to all of them coming and going.
ch0049_00_fuyo_en.lsd.ch0049_00_fuyo/0601_0702_02_10:
I’m guessing she was just shy, so don’t worry
about it!
ch0049_00_fuyo_en.lsd.ch0049_00_fuyo/0602_0701_01_10:
Admittedly, I have a bit of a
“Grandma’s girl” streak.
ch0049_00_fuyo_en.lsd.ch0049_00_fuyo/0602_0701_03_10:
Whenever I’m feeling down, she tells me a joke
to make me laugh.
ch0049_00_fuyo_en.lsd.ch0049_00_fuyo/0602_0701_04_10:
So when I was a member of the Elite Four and
the Pokémon League, I couldn’t see my grandma.
That made me sad.
ch0049_00_fuyo_en.lsd.ch0049_00_fuyo/0602_0702_01_10:
Grandma tells me that the most important thing
is the bond between you and your Pokémon.
ch0049_00_fuyo_en.lsd.ch0049_00_fuyo/0602_0702_02_10: That’s why my Pokémon and I cherish our bonds!
ch0049_00_fuyo_en.lsd.ch0049_00_fuyo/0603_0701_01_10:
There’s a Pokémon called Sableye in the
Hoenn region!
ch0049_00_fuyo_en.lsd.ch0049_00_fuyo/0603_0701_02_10:
It has jewels for eyes, which sparkle, and it’s
really cute!
ch0049_00_fuyo_en.lsd.ch0049_00_fuyo/0603_0701_03_10:
It’s a bit of a prankster, so it might be a
handful, but be nice if you ever see one.
ch0049_00_fuyo_en.lsd.ch0049_00_fuyo/0603_0702_01_10:
A lot of people might not notice them, but
there are Pokémon in a lot more places than
you would expect!
ch0049_00_fuyo_en.lsd.ch0049_00_fuyo/0603_0702_03_10:
Wait a minute... There aren’t any wild Pokémon
on Pasio...
ch0049_00_fuyo_en.lsd.ch0049_00_fuyo/0604_0701_01_10: I’ve been with Dusclops for a long time now.
ch0049_00_fuyo_en.lsd.ch0049_00_fuyo/0604_0701_02_10:
Grandma brought her home when I was little
and feeling down.
ch0049_00_fuyo_en.lsd.ch0049_00_fuyo/0604_0701_03_10:
She’s been my best friend, and she’s stayed at
my side ever since!
ch0049_00_fuyo_en.lsd.ch0049_00_fuyo/0604_0702_01_10:
To have a friend at your side when 
you’re going through hard times is 
the most precious thing in the world.
ch0049_00_fuyo_en.lsd.ch0049_00_fuyo/0605_0701_02_10:
Wouldn’t you say our bonds have gotten
really strong?
ch0049_00_fuyo_en.lsd.ch0049_00_fuyo/0605_0701_03_10: I hope I can introduce you to my grandma soon.
ch0049_00_fuyo_en.lsd.ch0049_00_fuyo/0605_0701_04_10: I’m sure she would be really happy to meet you!
ch0049_00_fuyo_en.lsd.ch0049_00_fuyo/0605_0702_01_10:
My grandma’s Pokémon sometimes come to check
in on me!
ch0049_00_fuyo_en.lsd.ch0049_00_fuyo/0605_0702_02_10: They usually stay near the foot of Mt. Pyre.
ch0049_00_fuyo_en.lsd.ch0049_00_fuyo/1701_0701_01_10: Perfect timing! I have a present for you!
ch0049_00_fuyo_en.lsd.ch0049_00_fuyo/1701_0701_02_10: A nearby Pokémon told me that it was there.
ch0049_00_fuyo_en.lsd.ch0049_00_fuyo/1701_0702_01_10:
It was right here until a little while ago.
I guess it’s shy.
ch0049_00_fuyo_en.lsd.ch0049_00_fuyo/2501_0701_01_10:
You want to know what kind of training I did on
Mt. Pyre?
ch0049_00_fuyo_en.lsd.ch0049_00_fuyo/2501_0701_02_10:
I battled and befriended Ghost-type Pokémon to
understand them better.
ch0049_00_fuyo_en.lsd.ch0049_00_fuyo/2501_0701_03_10:
I took Grandma’s advice to become friends with
them more...
ch0049_00_fuyo_en.lsd.ch0049_00_fuyo/2501_0701_04_10:
And then, by the time I realized it, I had become
stronger, too! Isn’t the power of bonds amazing?
ch0049_00_fuyo_en.lsd.ch0049_00_fuyo/2501_0702_01_10:
Ghost-type Pokémon and I have an
unspoken understanding.
ch0049_00_fuyo_en.lsd.ch0049_00_fuyo/2501_0702_02_10:
Because they stay by my side when I’m happy,
sad, in good times, and in bad!
ch0049_00_fuyo_en.lsd.ch0049_00_fuyo/2501_0702_03_10: That’s why I hope I can stay with them forever!
ch0049_00_fuyo_en.lsd.ch0049_00_fuyo/2511_0701_01_10:
How many other Trainers or Pokémon did you
deepen bonds with since you came to Pasio?
ch0049_00_fuyo_en.lsd.ch0049_00_fuyo/2511_0701_02_10:
I was hoping that I would be able to become
stronger here.
ch0049_00_fuyo_en.lsd.ch0049_00_fuyo/2511_0701_04_10:
So that’s why I’m really happy that I can talk
to you like this! Ahahaha!
ch0049_00_fuyo_en.lsd.ch0049_00_fuyo/2511_0702_01_10:
Talking is great, isn’t it? It lets you
communicate your feelings to others!
ch0049_00_fuyo_en.lsd.ch0049_00_fuyo/2511_0702_02_10:
Even if you don’t speak the same language, even
if you can’t see each other...
ch0049_00_fuyo_en.lsd.ch0049_00_fuyo/2511_0702_03_10:
As long as you want to share something and are
willing to listen, you can be friends with anyone!
ch0049_00_fuyo_en.lsd.ch0049_00_fuyo/3001_0701_01_10:
Morning! Are your ears burning?
I was just talking about you!
ch0049_00_fuyo_en.lsd.ch0049_00_fuyo/3002_0701_01_10: Haha! It’s so nice and quiet this morning, isn’t it?
ch0049_00_fuyo_en.lsd.ch0049_00_fuyo/3003_0701_01_10:
The afternoon sunshine tells me our friendship
is gonna grow even stronger today!
ch0049_00_fuyo_en.lsd.ch0049_00_fuyo/3004_0701_01_10:
Already afternoon, huh?
Wish I could have tea with my grandma.
ch0049_00_fuyo_en.lsd.ch0049_00_fuyo/3005_0701_01_10:
Haha! What great timing!
There’s been a lot of buzz about you lately!
ch0049_00_fuyo_en.lsd.ch0049_00_fuyo/3006_0701_01_10:
It’s always so lively and fun here at night!
But I cherish our quiet conversations, too.

ch0050_00_sumomo_en.lsd.ch0050_00_sumomo/0101_0701_01_10:
Oh! Hi, [Name:PlayerNickname ]!
Maylene here, reporting for duty!
ch0050_00_sumomo_en.lsd.ch0050_00_sumomo/0101_0701_02_10:
Let’s fuel up with some healthy food
and get right to training today!
ch0050_00_sumomo_en.lsd.ch0050_00_sumomo/0601_0701_01_10:
Whenever we do yoga training,
my Meditite helps me out like
an instructor!
ch0050_00_sumomo_en.lsd.ch0050_00_sumomo/0601_0701_02_10:
Although now that I think about it,
I really just copy whatever she does...
ch0050_00_sumomo_en.lsd.ch0050_00_sumomo/0601_0701_03_10:
Meditite’s a pretty tough instructor, though!
She’s always on hard mode, even when
she knows I’m trying to copy her.
ch0050_00_sumomo_en.lsd.ch0050_00_sumomo/0601_0702_01_10:
Pokémon have their own personality
quirks, just like we do.
ch0050_00_sumomo_en.lsd.ch0050_00_sumomo/0601_0702_02_10:
Treasuring those unique personality
quirks is our job as Trainers!
ch0050_00_sumomo_en.lsd.ch0050_00_sumomo/0603_0701_01_10:
You can tell a lot about a person by
the way they fight using martial arts.
ch0050_00_sumomo_en.lsd.ch0050_00_sumomo/0603_0701_02_10:
You can figure out what they’re
fighting for, why they learned
the moves they did...
ch0050_00_sumomo_en.lsd.ch0050_00_sumomo/0603_0701_03_10:
and whether they aim to protect
or hurt.
ch0050_00_sumomo_en.lsd.ch0050_00_sumomo/0603_0701_04_10:
The same is true for Pokémon battles.
I can just sense it...
ch0050_00_sumomo_en.lsd.ch0050_00_sumomo/0603_0701_05_10:
I know what my opponents are
fighting for.
ch0050_00_sumomo_en.lsd.ch0050_00_sumomo/0603_0702_01_10:
I practice martial arts and train for
Pokémon battles to better myself.
ch0050_00_sumomo_en.lsd.ch0050_00_sumomo/0603_0702_02_10:
I know it’s kind of selfish. I wish
everyone would push themselves
to achieve something great.
ch0050_00_sumomo_en.lsd.ch0050_00_sumomo/0604_0701_01_10:
I’ve done a lot of rigorous training,
so the cold and the heat don’t bother
me at all.
ch0050_00_sumomo_en.lsd.ch0050_00_sumomo/0604_0701_02_10:
I mean, the training itself can sometimes
be pretty grueling...
ch0050_00_sumomo_en.lsd.ch0050_00_sumomo/0604_0701_03_10:
but in the end, I can make it through
all of that because my Pokémon are
there beside me.
ch0050_00_sumomo_en.lsd.ch0050_00_sumomo/0604_0701_04_10:
If I complained all the time, I’d feel
bad for my Pokémon.
ch0050_00_sumomo_en.lsd.ch0050_00_sumomo/0604_0702_01_10:
Sometimes my training regimen is so
tough that I just want to give up.
ch0050_00_sumomo_en.lsd.ch0050_00_sumomo/0604_0702_02_10:
When that happens, my Pokémon and I
take a break and play to our hearts’ content.
ch0050_00_sumomo_en.lsd.ch0050_00_sumomo/0604_0702_03_10:
Letting go and having fun for a while
recharges my energy for next time!
ch0050_00_sumomo_en.lsd.ch0050_00_sumomo/0605_0701_01_10:
I really want to fight against you in a
martial arts match, [Name:PlayerNickname ]!
ch0050_00_sumomo_en.lsd.ch0050_00_sumomo/0605_0701_02_10:
Not an actual fight! You know what I
mean, right? A standard match with
a set of rules.
ch0050_00_sumomo_en.lsd.ch0050_00_sumomo/0605_0701_03_10:
I’ve been trying to figure out why I want
to fight you so badly, and I think it’s
because I want to get to know you better.
ch0050_00_sumomo_en.lsd.ch0050_00_sumomo/0605_0701_04_10:
I’m pretty sure that’s gotta be
the reason.
ch0050_00_sumomo_en.lsd.ch0050_00_sumomo/0605_0702_01_10:
I’m not really all that great
with words, but what I’m trying
to say is...
ch0050_00_sumomo_en.lsd.ch0050_00_sumomo/0605_0702_02_10:
I always get this warm, happy feeling when we
battle each other, [Name:PlayerNickname ].
ch0050_00_sumomo_en.lsd.ch0050_00_sumomo/1701_0701_01_10:
I got you something!
It’s yours if you want it.
ch0050_00_sumomo_en.lsd.ch0050_00_sumomo/1701_0701_02_10:
You should use items if you have them!
They’re no good if you hoard them forever.
ch0050_00_sumomo_en.lsd.ch0050_00_sumomo/1701_0702_01_10:
Sometimes I feel bad if I have to
use my items...
ch0050_00_sumomo_en.lsd.ch0050_00_sumomo/1701_0702_02_10:
and because of that, they just end up
in a big pile... It’s bad—I know.
ch0050_00_sumomo_en.lsd.ch0050_00_sumomo/2501_0701_01_10:
I’ve thought a lot about what makes a
good Gym Leader and how I can
be better in the future.
ch0050_00_sumomo_en.lsd.ch0050_00_sumomo/2501_0701_02_10:
I’ve never been able to find a good
answer, though... I still don’t really
have a clue.
ch0050_00_sumomo_en.lsd.ch0050_00_sumomo/2501_0701_03_10:
But I feel like the longer I’m with
you, the closer I’ll be to finding
that answer.
ch0050_00_sumomo_en.lsd.ch0050_00_sumomo/2501_0702_01_10:
When I look at you, the way you always give
110 percent of your effort to everything,
especially Pokémon battling...
ch0050_00_sumomo_en.lsd.ch0050_00_sumomo/2501_0702_02_10:
you make me want to get up and
take action rather than worry and
overthink things.
ch0050_00_sumomo_en.lsd.ch0050_00_sumomo/2501_0702_03_10:
I still don’t really know what makes
a good Gym Leader, but you know what?
I’m just gonna do the best I can!
ch0050_00_sumomo_en.lsd.ch0050_00_sumomo/2511_0701_01_10:
One of my best friends is actually
a Gym Leader, too, like me!
ch0050_00_sumomo_en.lsd.ch0050_00_sumomo/2511_0701_02_10:
She gives me a lot of advice, and we
have a lot of Pokémon battles.
ch0050_00_sumomo_en.lsd.ch0050_00_sumomo/2511_0701_03_10:
Oh! Of course you’re my friend, too, silly!
I care a lot about you both!
ch0050_00_sumomo_en.lsd.ch0050_00_sumomo/2511_0702_01_10:
I’m really glad I decided to team up
with my Pokémon. We’ve really
put our hearts into training.
ch0050_00_sumomo_en.lsd.ch0050_00_sumomo/2511_0702_02_10:
Without Pokémon battling, we never would
have met you or any of the other amazing
people we’ve gotten to know.
ch0050_00_sumomo_en.lsd.ch0050_00_sumomo/2511_0702_03_10:
If I’d stuck with martial arts alone
or only focused on Pokémon battling,
none of this would have been possible.
ch0050_00_sumomo_en.lsd.ch0050_00_sumomo/2511_0702_04_10:
All of my memories and experiences
up until now have become my
greatest treasure!
ch0050_00_sumomo_en.lsd.ch0050_00_sumomo/3001_0701_01_10:
Morning!
I like to start my day off with some jogging!
ch0050_00_sumomo_en.lsd.ch0050_00_sumomo/3002_0701_01_10:
Good morning. Gee, I’m so hungry,
I could eat a whole Berry tree!
ch0050_00_sumomo_en.lsd.ch0050_00_sumomo/3003_0701_01_10:
Yo! I recommend weight training
for an afternoon workout!
ch0050_00_sumomo_en.lsd.ch0050_00_sumomo/3004_0701_01_10:
Maybe I’ll splurge and have some snacks today!
Nah. I gotta stick to my training regimen!
ch0050_00_sumomo_en.lsd.ch0050_00_sumomo/3005_0701_01_10:
I discovered that if I do stretching at night,
I end up sleeping better!
ch0050_00_sumomo_en.lsd.ch0050_00_sumomo/3006_0701_01_10:
If I’m hungry before I go to sleep at night,
I dream about food. You can pig out all you
want in a dream, after all!

ch0051_00_litchi_en.lsd.ch0051_00_litchi/0101_0701_01_10:
Alola, [Name:PlayerNickname ]!
You got here at the perfect time!
ch0051_00_litchi_en.lsd.ch0051_00_litchi/0101_0701_02_10:
I hope you have surprises and inspiration in your
adventures today.
ch0051_00_litchi_en.lsd.ch0051_00_litchi/0601_0701_01_10: You like my necklace? I think it’s pretty, too!
ch0051_00_litchi_en.lsd.ch0051_00_litchi/0601_0701_02_10:
Believe it or not, I run a jewelry shop 
on the side—while also being a kahuna.
ch0051_00_litchi_en.lsd.ch0051_00_litchi/0601_0701_03_10:
And sometimes, keeping the raw and rough
edges makes the jewels look fancier!
ch0051_00_litchi_en.lsd.ch0051_00_litchi/0601_0702_01_10:
If you ever find yourself interested in jewelry,
come to my shop!
ch0051_00_litchi_en.lsd.ch0051_00_litchi/0601_0702_02_10:
The wares might be pricy, but my selection
is top-of-the-line!
ch0051_00_litchi_en.lsd.ch0051_00_litchi/0602_0701_01_10:
Are you eating properly? Pokémon battles drain
Trainers as well as Pokémon.
ch0051_00_litchi_en.lsd.ch0051_00_litchi/0602_0701_02_10:
I eat well so I can battle well anyplace
and anytime.
ch0051_00_litchi_en.lsd.ch0051_00_litchi/0602_0701_03_10:
Maybe that’s why I like a person who
appreciates good food!
ch0051_00_litchi_en.lsd.ch0051_00_litchi/0602_0702_01_10:
I would totally recommend the Z-sets
you can get in Alola!
ch0051_00_litchi_en.lsd.ch0051_00_litchi/0602_0702_02_10:
They really pile food onto your plate, and they use
tasty family recipes. They’re my favorite!
ch0051_00_litchi_en.lsd.ch0051_00_litchi/0602_0702_03_10:
Though I hear that some people are just after
the Heart Scales that come along with the dish!
ch0051_00_litchi_en.lsd.ch0051_00_litchi/0603_0701_01_10:
Golem from the Alola region look different 
than ones from other regions.
ch0051_00_litchi_en.lsd.ch0051_00_litchi/0603_0701_02_10:
They throw electrified rocks.
Isn’t that pretty neat?
ch0051_00_litchi_en.lsd.ch0051_00_litchi/0603_0701_03_10:
And those electrified rocks shine like jewels and
are really pretty.
ch0051_00_litchi_en.lsd.ch0051_00_litchi/0603_0701_04_10:
Beautiful and strong! That’s what I really like
about that move.
ch0051_00_litchi_en.lsd.ch0051_00_litchi/0603_0702_01_10:
There are a lot of Pokémon that you can only
see in the Alola region.
ch0051_00_litchi_en.lsd.ch0051_00_litchi/0603_0702_02_10:
If you find any Trainers from Alola, maybe you
can ask them to show you their Pokémon.
ch0051_00_litchi_en.lsd.ch0051_00_litchi/0604_0701_01_10: My trusty partner is the rough ’n’ tough Lycanroc!
ch0051_00_litchi_en.lsd.ch0051_00_litchi/0604_0701_02_10:
He’s flexible and kindhearted.
In a way, he’s the opposite of me.
ch0051_00_litchi_en.lsd.ch0051_00_litchi/0604_0701_03_10:
But that’s why I’m drawn to him.
I think it’s the same for him, too.
ch0051_00_litchi_en.lsd.ch0051_00_litchi/0604_0701_04_10: That being said, all my Pokémon are adorable!
ch0051_00_litchi_en.lsd.ch0051_00_litchi/0604_0702_01_10: I like soft and cute things.
ch0051_00_litchi_en.lsd.ch0051_00_litchi/0604_0702_02_10: I even collect Stufful and other Pokémon plush.
ch0051_00_litchi_en.lsd.ch0051_00_litchi/0605_0701_01_10:
I might be the kahuna, but really, I’m just your
average girl, you know?
ch0051_00_litchi_en.lsd.ch0051_00_litchi/0605_0701_02_10: So you can be more relaxed around me, OK?
ch0051_00_litchi_en.lsd.ch0051_00_litchi/0605_0701_03_10:
Wouldn’t it make it easier for both of us if
we just acted natural around each other?
ch0051_00_litchi_en.lsd.ch0051_00_litchi/0605_0701_04_10:
At the least, it would make me happier if we
could be like that.
ch0051_00_litchi_en.lsd.ch0051_00_litchi/0605_0702_01_10:
Being laid-back is the best for both people and
Pokémon. Always being proper is so tiring.
ch0051_00_litchi_en.lsd.ch0051_00_litchi/0605_0702_02_10:
If you’re ever in a jam, talk to each other, and 
when things are calm, laugh with each other. 
That kind of relationship is the best!
ch0051_00_litchi_en.lsd.ch0051_00_litchi/1701_0701_02_10:
You’ve been working really hard, so here’s a
present from yours truly.
ch0051_00_litchi_en.lsd.ch0051_00_litchi/1701_0702_01_10: Don’t worry about it! I’m munificent like that!
ch0051_00_litchi_en.lsd.ch0051_00_litchi/2501_0701_01_10:
Thanks to the fact that I’m both a kahuna and a
member of the Elite Four...
ch0051_00_litchi_en.lsd.ch0051_00_litchi/2501_0701_02_10:
I get to meet all sorts of Trainers, but it’s never
on this kind of scale.
ch0051_00_litchi_en.lsd.ch0051_00_litchi/2501_0701_03_10:
Thanks to the PML, I’m having so much fun
interacting with Trainers from all over the world.
ch0051_00_litchi_en.lsd.ch0051_00_litchi/2501_0701_04_10:
You don’t get this kind of experience very often,
so make sure you enjoy yourself while you can!
ch0051_00_litchi_en.lsd.ch0051_00_litchi/2501_0702_01_10:
With there being so many people from all over
the world...
ch0051_00_litchi_en.lsd.ch0051_00_litchi/2501_0702_02_10: maybe I can find somebody special myself.
ch0051_00_litchi_en.lsd.ch0051_00_litchi/2511_0701_01_10:
You really do keep growing stronger, don’t you!
It’s really satisfying to watch!
ch0051_00_litchi_en.lsd.ch0051_00_litchi/2511_0701_02_10:
At this rate, you might even be able to reach the
apex of all Trainers.
ch0051_00_litchi_en.lsd.ch0051_00_litchi/2511_0702_01_10:
Your team members trust you 
because of your strength.
ch0051_00_litchi_en.lsd.ch0051_00_litchi/2511_0702_02_10:
Even I’m drawn to your strength and
your personality.
ch0051_00_litchi_en.lsd.ch0051_00_litchi/2511_0702_03_10:
I want you to show me more of your Pokémon
battles in the future, too!
ch0051_00_litchi_en.lsd.ch0051_00_litchi/3001_0701_01_10:
Alola! Today looks like it’s going
to be a lovely day, doesn’t it.
ch0051_00_litchi_en.lsd.ch0051_00_litchi/3002_0701_01_10:
*yawn* I think I slept in a little too late today...
It’s tough being a grown-up.
ch0051_00_litchi_en.lsd.ch0051_00_litchi/3003_0701_01_10:
Alola! Have you felt the breeze outside today?
It’s just lovely!
ch0051_00_litchi_en.lsd.ch0051_00_litchi/3004_0701_01_10:
I’ve got some kahuna errands I need to
run today, but I kinda want to relax and
have fun with you instead!
ch0051_00_litchi_en.lsd.ch0051_00_litchi/3005_0701_01_10:
Alola! Aren’t you a little young to be out and
about this late?
ch0051_00_litchi_en.lsd.ch0051_00_litchi/3006_0701_01_10:
The stars are beautiful tonight,
and the air is so clear here.

ch0052_00_shizui_en.lsd.ch0052_00_shizui/0101_0701_01_10:
’Sup, [Name:PlayerNickname ]!
I’ve been waitin’ for ya, dude!
ch0052_00_shizui_en.lsd.ch0052_00_shizui/0101_0701_02_10:
I’m always down for a swim or
a Pokémon battle, dude.
Either one’ll do!
ch0052_00_shizui_en.lsd.ch0052_00_shizui/0601_0701_01_10:
Yo, you know how much I love the
ocean, right? Can you believe I actually
almost drowned once?
ch0052_00_shizui_en.lsd.ch0052_00_shizui/0601_0701_02_10:
It’s true! Just when I thought I wasn’t
gonna make it, I got rescued by one o’ the
Caring Pokémon, Alomomola.
ch0052_00_shizui_en.lsd.ch0052_00_shizui/0601_0701_03_10:
I was barely conscious, but thanks to
Alomomola’s rad healing abilities,
I made it back to safety.
ch0052_00_shizui_en.lsd.ch0052_00_shizui/0601_0701_04_10:
I’ll never forget how the membrane on its
back felt while it carried me to shore—
soft and slippery but kinda warm, too.
ch0052_00_shizui_en.lsd.ch0052_00_shizui/0601_0702_01_10:
I wonder how that Alomomola’s
doing these days...
ch0052_00_shizui_en.lsd.ch0052_00_shizui/0601_0702_02_10:
The ocean’s full o’ friendly fishes!
I love ’em all, dude!
ch0052_00_shizui_en.lsd.ch0052_00_shizui/0602_0701_01_10:
My Carracosta’s shell is suuuper
hard, dude!
ch0052_00_shizui_en.lsd.ch0052_00_shizui/0602_0701_02_10:
A while back, he accidentally
bumped me in the face...
ch0052_00_shizui_en.lsd.ch0052_00_shizui/0602_0701_03_10:
Man, I was NOT expectin’ it to
hurt like that! It felt like concrete!
ch0052_00_shizui_en.lsd.ch0052_00_shizui/0602_0701_04_10:
If I hadn’t been wearin’ my goggles,
things coulda gone reeeal bad!
ch0052_00_shizui_en.lsd.ch0052_00_shizui/0602_0702_01_10:
Be careful out there, all right?
Don’t be reckless, dude!
ch0052_00_shizui_en.lsd.ch0052_00_shizui/0603_0701_01_10:
I’m a true man of the sea! When I’m not
workin’ at my Pokémon Gym, I’m usually
out swimmin’ somewhere!
ch0052_00_shizui_en.lsd.ch0052_00_shizui/0603_0701_02_10:
Some people tell me that bein’ a
man of the sea isn’t a real job, though...
ch0052_00_shizui_en.lsd.ch0052_00_shizui/0603_0701_03_10:
I mean, I know that... Duh.
But I love the sea more than I
love food, dude!
ch0052_00_shizui_en.lsd.ch0052_00_shizui/0603_0701_04_10: I dunno how else to say it...
ch0052_00_shizui_en.lsd.ch0052_00_shizui/0603_0702_01_10: I just keep doin’ what I love to do, yo!
ch0052_00_shizui_en.lsd.ch0052_00_shizui/0603_0702_02_10: That’s my motto! Do what ya love!
ch0052_00_shizui_en.lsd.ch0052_00_shizui/0604_0701_01_10:
Man, I love the ocean!
The beautiful, big, open blue!
ch0052_00_shizui_en.lsd.ch0052_00_shizui/0604_0701_02_10: And it’s got sooo much life, too!
ch0052_00_shizui_en.lsd.ch0052_00_shizui/0604_0701_03_10:
The ocean’s seriously epic, dude!
I can’t get enough of it!
ch0052_00_shizui_en.lsd.ch0052_00_shizui/0604_0701_04_10:
If I could be that epic someday,
that’d be pretty gnarly.
ch0052_00_shizui_en.lsd.ch0052_00_shizui/0604_0702_01_10:
When things get tough, I just stare
out at the waves and they wash
all my worries away.
ch0052_00_shizui_en.lsd.ch0052_00_shizui/0604_0702_02_10: Life is meant to be epic, dude!
ch0052_00_shizui_en.lsd.ch0052_00_shizui/0605_0701_01_10:
The beaches in Unova are rad,
but the ones here on Pasio are
pretty epic, too!
ch0052_00_shizui_en.lsd.ch0052_00_shizui/0605_0701_02_10:
I’ve got this righteous dream, dude—
to swim in every ocean in the world!
Wicked, right?!
ch0052_00_shizui_en.lsd.ch0052_00_shizui/0605_0701_03_10:
I’m plannin’ to swim every inch
o’ these beaches while I’m here!
ch0052_00_shizui_en.lsd.ch0052_00_shizui/0605_0701_04_10:
You should come swim with me when
you feel up to it, [Name:PlayerNickname ]!
ch0052_00_shizui_en.lsd.ch0052_00_shizui/0605_0702_01_10:
If you wanna get a real feel for what
the ocean’s like, swimmin’ is
where it’s at.
ch0052_00_shizui_en.lsd.ch0052_00_shizui/0605_0702_02_10:
You can even race against Pokémon, dude!
It’s totally awesome!
ch0052_00_shizui_en.lsd.ch0052_00_shizui/1701_0701_01_10:
Whoa! There you are!
I’ve got somethin’ for ya!
ch0052_00_shizui_en.lsd.ch0052_00_shizui/1701_0702_01_10: Use it whenever you feel like it!
ch0052_00_shizui_en.lsd.ch0052_00_shizui/1701_0702_02_10:
You don’t gotta be a hoarder, either.
There’s more where that came from, dude!
ch0052_00_shizui_en.lsd.ch0052_00_shizui/2501_0701_01_10:
Dude, the sea is seriously huge!
Yeah, you probably already knew that...
ch0052_00_shizui_en.lsd.ch0052_00_shizui/2501_0701_02_10:
But listen! It looks gigantic on the
surface, right? But there’s so much
underneath that you can’t even see!
ch0052_00_shizui_en.lsd.ch0052_00_shizui/2501_0701_03_10:
I mean, all kinds o’ rivers feed into
the ocean, and the ocean just takes ’em
all in, no questions asked!
ch0052_00_shizui_en.lsd.ch0052_00_shizui/2501_0701_04_10:
That’s how I wanna be! Openhearted
and accepting of others, just like
the ocean.
ch0052_00_shizui_en.lsd.ch0052_00_shizui/2501_0702_01_10:
When I’m swimmin’ in the big, open
ocean, I stop carin’ about all the stuff
that worries me on land.
ch0052_00_shizui_en.lsd.ch0052_00_shizui/2501_0702_02_10:
I know what I wanna do
and who I wanna be, yo!
ch0052_00_shizui_en.lsd.ch0052_00_shizui/2501_0702_03_10:
I wanna be epic! I wanna be openhearted!
I wanna be a true man o’ the sea!
ch0052_00_shizui_en.lsd.ch0052_00_shizui/2511_0701_01_10:
I try to always judge things
with my own two eyes, you know?
ch0052_00_shizui_en.lsd.ch0052_00_shizui/2511_0701_02_10:
I mean, who’s a good person? Who’s a
bad person? That’s somethin’ you’ve
gotta judge for yourself!
ch0052_00_shizui_en.lsd.ch0052_00_shizui/2511_0701_03_10:
If you let somebody else make that
judgment for you, you might miss out
on something awesome one day, dude.
ch0052_00_shizui_en.lsd.ch0052_00_shizui/2511_0702_01_10:
If you see somebody in trouble, you should
help ’em out, no questions asked!
ch0052_00_shizui_en.lsd.ch0052_00_shizui/2511_0702_02_10:
Even if another dude tells you they’re
a bad person, that shouldn’t stop you
from helpin’ ’em out!
ch0052_00_shizui_en.lsd.ch0052_00_shizui/2511_0702_03_10:
That’s how I live my life, dude!
I believe it to my core.
ch0052_00_shizui_en.lsd.ch0052_00_shizui/3001_0701_01_10: ’Sup, dude! Ready for a mornin’ swim?
ch0052_00_shizui_en.lsd.ch0052_00_shizui/3002_0701_01_10:
Hey, you an early riser, too?
Stayin’ healthy is no small thing!
ch0052_00_shizui_en.lsd.ch0052_00_shizui/3003_0701_01_10:
Whoa, look at that sunshine!
The sea’s almost sparklin’!
ch0052_00_shizui_en.lsd.ch0052_00_shizui/3004_0701_01_10:
Yo, what are you lazin’ around for?
Up and at ’em!
ch0052_00_shizui_en.lsd.ch0052_00_shizui/3005_0701_01_10:
Dude, it’s wicked out tonight!
I’m down to head out one more time, if you are.
ch0052_00_shizui_en.lsd.ch0052_00_shizui/3006_0701_01_10:
You’re out pretty late tonight.
It’s good to take breaks, you know!

ch0053_00_zakuro_en.lsd.ch0053_00_zakuro/0101_0701_01_10:
Hi, [Name:PlayerNickname ]!
I’ve been looking forward to seeing you again.
ch0053_00_zakuro_en.lsd.ch0053_00_zakuro/0101_0701_02_10:
If there are walls we have to climb
today, let’s climb them together!
ch0053_00_zakuro_en.lsd.ch0053_00_zakuro/0601_0701_01_10:
My Amaura is always on his best
behavior, and his skin feels so
nice and cool to the touch.
ch0053_00_zakuro_en.lsd.ch0053_00_zakuro/0601_0701_02_10:
When I look at his long neck, I feel
a sense of friendship and closeness.
ch0053_00_zakuro_en.lsd.ch0053_00_zakuro/0601_0701_03_10: I feel like he’s just as eager as I am.
ch0053_00_zakuro_en.lsd.ch0053_00_zakuro/0601_0702_01_10:
I wonder what sort of things Amaura can
utilize his long neck for. Other than
eating food in high places, that is.
ch0053_00_zakuro_en.lsd.ch0053_00_zakuro/0601_0702_02_10:
I’d love to sit down with him and leisurely
debate all of the many possibilities.
ch0053_00_zakuro_en.lsd.ch0053_00_zakuro/0602_0701_01_10:
One time, a chunk of the cliff collapsed
where I was rock-climbing.
ch0053_00_zakuro_en.lsd.ch0053_00_zakuro/0602_0701_02_10:
I actually found a fossil among
the stones that fell...
ch0053_00_zakuro_en.lsd.ch0053_00_zakuro/0602_0701_03_10:
and it turned into a Tyrunt when
I had it restored at the Fossil Lab.
ch0053_00_zakuro_en.lsd.ch0053_00_zakuro/0602_0701_04_10:
Funnily enough, I found my Amaura’s
fossil at those very same cliffs.
ch0053_00_zakuro_en.lsd.ch0053_00_zakuro/0602_0702_01_10:
I wonder how I happened to find my
selfish Tyrunt in the same place I found
my sweet Amaura...
ch0053_00_zakuro_en.lsd.ch0053_00_zakuro/0602_0702_02_10:
Maybe our friendship goes above and
beyond the walls of our differences.
ch0053_00_zakuro_en.lsd.ch0053_00_zakuro/0603_0701_01_10:
I get along really well with Siebold,
one of the Elite Four of Kalos, where
we’re from.
ch0053_00_zakuro_en.lsd.ch0053_00_zakuro/0603_0701_02_10:
He and I are a lot alike in that we’re
both completely devoted to bettering
ourselves and what we do.
ch0053_00_zakuro_en.lsd.ch0053_00_zakuro/0603_0701_03_10:
I’m sure he’s on a deep dive into
Pasio cuisine right now, honing his
skills as a chef.
ch0053_00_zakuro_en.lsd.ch0053_00_zakuro/0603_0702_01_10:
All this talk about Siebold is making me
miss his delicious cooking.
ch0053_00_zakuro_en.lsd.ch0053_00_zakuro/0603_0702_02_10:
I’ll have to ask him to whip me up
something tasty the next time I see him.
ch0053_00_zakuro_en.lsd.ch0053_00_zakuro/0604_0701_01_10:
This might surprise you, but I have
a little bit of a sweet tooth.
ch0053_00_zakuro_en.lsd.ch0053_00_zakuro/0604_0701_02_10:
I’m trying to maintain my current body
weight, though, so I can’t have
too many sweets.
ch0053_00_zakuro_en.lsd.ch0053_00_zakuro/0604_0701_03_10:
I limit myself to one slice of cake
each week, but sometimes it’s so
hard to resist.
ch0053_00_zakuro_en.lsd.ch0053_00_zakuro/0604_0701_04_10:
Then again, that one slice of cake
tastes even more sublime after a whole
week of not eating any.
ch0053_00_zakuro_en.lsd.ch0053_00_zakuro/0604_0702_01_10:
Strictly refraining from doing something
for a while makes me even more excited
to do that thing.
ch0053_00_zakuro_en.lsd.ch0053_00_zakuro/0604_0702_02_10:
I continue to be strict with myself
so that I can savor that feeling!
ch0053_00_zakuro_en.lsd.ch0053_00_zakuro/0605_0701_01_10:
These stones I use to decorate my
hair are all the rage back in Kalos.
ch0053_00_zakuro_en.lsd.ch0053_00_zakuro/0605_0701_02_10:
I’m the one who started the
fashion trend, actually...
ch0053_00_zakuro_en.lsd.ch0053_00_zakuro/0605_0701_03_10:
Incidentally, that’s how I earned my title as a 
trendsetter and fashion leader in Kalos.
ch0053_00_zakuro_en.lsd.ch0053_00_zakuro/0605_0701_04_10:
I can be your fashion advisor if you
like, [Name:PlayerNickname ].
ch0053_00_zakuro_en.lsd.ch0053_00_zakuro/0605_0702_01_10:
These hair stones are unique in the
same way that we’re all unique
as people.
ch0053_00_zakuro_en.lsd.ch0053_00_zakuro/0605_0702_02_10:
When your clothes and accessories are a
perfect match for your unique personality—
that’s TRUE fashion!
ch0053_00_zakuro_en.lsd.ch0053_00_zakuro/1701_0701_01_10:
I found something nice for you
up in the mountains. Here!
ch0053_00_zakuro_en.lsd.ch0053_00_zakuro/1701_0702_01_10:
You can find a lot of interesting
things up in the mountains if you
know how to look for them.
ch0053_00_zakuro_en.lsd.ch0053_00_zakuro/1701_0702_02_10:
That’s one of the things I love
most about rock-climbing.
ch0053_00_zakuro_en.lsd.ch0053_00_zakuro/2501_0701_01_10:
Having a daring, adventurous spirit
is most important of all.
ch0053_00_zakuro_en.lsd.ch0053_00_zakuro/2501_0701_02_10:
When it comes to sports, there’s no
question. But challenging yourself when
it comes to food is also important!
ch0053_00_zakuro_en.lsd.ch0053_00_zakuro/2501_0701_03_10:
I wonder what sort of flavors Pasio
has to offer us...
ch0053_00_zakuro_en.lsd.ch0053_00_zakuro/2501_0701_04_10:
Now THAT’S an adventure I’d dare to
get behind!
ch0053_00_zakuro_en.lsd.ch0053_00_zakuro/2501_0702_01_10:
Competing in the PML is an incredible
challenge—a mountain unlike any other
I’ve climbed before.
ch0053_00_zakuro_en.lsd.ch0053_00_zakuro/2501_0702_02_10:
I wonder what it’ll look like at the
summit, towering over all the other
Trainers. I’d love to see for myself.
ch0053_00_zakuro_en.lsd.ch0053_00_zakuro/2501_0702_03_10:
That is, after I’ve climbed over my
FIRST wall—defeating you, my friend.
ch0053_00_zakuro_en.lsd.ch0053_00_zakuro/2511_0701_01_10:
You and your Pokémon seem like you
have a really close relationship
with each other.
ch0053_00_zakuro_en.lsd.ch0053_00_zakuro/2511_0701_02_10:
Relationships with Pokémon can change
just like relationships with people, though,
depending on how dedicated you are.
ch0053_00_zakuro_en.lsd.ch0053_00_zakuro/2511_0701_03_10:
But with someone as dedicated as you,
I’m sure there’ll never be any issues.
ch0053_00_zakuro_en.lsd.ch0053_00_zakuro/2511_0702_01_10:
There are some things you just can’t reach,
no matter how far you stretch out your hand.
ch0053_00_zakuro_en.lsd.ch0053_00_zakuro/2511_0702_02_10:
But you never give up—you keep on
fighting with everything in your heart.
ch0053_00_zakuro_en.lsd.ch0053_00_zakuro/2511_0702_03_10:
I feel lucky to have found friends that are as 
talented and spirited as you and your Pokémon.
ch0053_00_zakuro_en.lsd.ch0053_00_zakuro/3001_0701_01_10:
Good morning.
Are you ready for some early training?
ch0053_00_zakuro_en.lsd.ch0053_00_zakuro/3002_0701_01_10:
Good morning!
It’s great weather for rock-climbing today.
ch0053_00_zakuro_en.lsd.ch0053_00_zakuro/3003_0701_01_10:
Hi there! How’s your training coming?
Make sure you’re thoroughly prepared to climb!
ch0053_00_zakuro_en.lsd.ch0053_00_zakuro/3004_0701_01_10:
Hi! Let’s put on a smile and give it
our best shot out there today.
ch0053_00_zakuro_en.lsd.ch0053_00_zakuro/3005_0701_01_10:
It’s getting pretty late, isn’t it.
I admire you for training hard into the night.
ch0053_00_zakuro_en.lsd.ch0053_00_zakuro/3006_0701_01_10:
You’re certainly working hard tonight!
Just be careful not to overdo it.

ch0054_00_kyo_en.lsd.ch0054_00_kyo/0101_0701_01_10:
[Name:PlayerNickname ]!
I have been waiting for you!
ch0054_00_kyo_en.lsd.ch0054_00_kyo/0101_0701_02_10:
Fwahaha! Let us not waste a single day that
could be used to hone our skills!
ch0054_00_kyo_en.lsd.ch0054_00_kyo/0601_0701_01_10:
I was originally a Gym Leader, and 
I made an invisible labyrinth in my Gym.
ch0054_00_kyo_en.lsd.ch0054_00_kyo/0601_0701_02_10: Of course, it was to weed out weak Trainers!
ch0054_00_kyo_en.lsd.ch0054_00_kyo/0601_0701_03_10:
But my daughter got lost in there once and
created quite a scene.
ch0054_00_kyo_en.lsd.ch0054_00_kyo/0601_0701_04_10:
She has since grown to be my successor and a
fine ninja as well as a Gym Leader, but...
ch0054_00_kyo_en.lsd.ch0054_00_kyo/0601_0701_05_10:
No matter how old she may become, she is still
my child. That story will always bring a smile
to my face.
ch0054_00_kyo_en.lsd.ch0054_00_kyo/0601_0702_01_10:
My daughter looks up to me. Maybe it’s because
of this that she is showing very fast growth!
ch0054_00_kyo_en.lsd.ch0054_00_kyo/0601_0702_02_10:
I must train twice as hard to make sure that I am
not overtaken by the girl.
ch0054_00_kyo_en.lsd.ch0054_00_kyo/0602_0701_01_10:
We have a large park in Fuchsia City called the
Safari Zone.
ch0054_00_kyo_en.lsd.ch0054_00_kyo/0602_0701_02_10:
It is a place where you can observe Pokémon
in their natural habitat.
ch0054_00_kyo_en.lsd.ch0054_00_kyo/0602_0701_03_10:
If you ever go to the Kanto region, go see
for yourself! I am certain you’d discover
something new.
ch0054_00_kyo_en.lsd.ch0054_00_kyo/0602_0702_01_10: I also patrol the Safari Zone myself.
ch0054_00_kyo_en.lsd.ch0054_00_kyo/0602_0702_02_10:
Fwahaha! It is in order for all visiting guests
to enjoy the park safely!
ch0054_00_kyo_en.lsd.ch0054_00_kyo/0602_0702_03_10:
The nature in Fuchsia City is our pride and joy!
Therefore, we must all cherish and protect
our environment!
ch0054_00_kyo_en.lsd.ch0054_00_kyo/0603_0701_01_10:
Venomoth, a Pokémon that inhabits the Kanto
region, looks very beautiful.
ch0054_00_kyo_en.lsd.ch0054_00_kyo/0603_0701_02_10:
However, behind that beauty, it hides a
deadly poison.
ch0054_00_kyo_en.lsd.ch0054_00_kyo/0603_0701_03_10:
Beautiful things often hide their share of danger.
Remember that for the future.
ch0054_00_kyo_en.lsd.ch0054_00_kyo/0603_0702_01_10:
Fwahaha! A long time ago, I was hit by
Venomoth’s poison.
ch0054_00_kyo_en.lsd.ch0054_00_kyo/0603_0702_02_10:
But it was through that experience that I became
interested in Poison-type Pokémon. It was
through that I became the man in front of you!
ch0054_00_kyo_en.lsd.ch0054_00_kyo/0604_0701_01_10: My Crobat hunts his prey swiftly and silently.
ch0054_00_kyo_en.lsd.ch0054_00_kyo/0604_0701_02_10:
Would you not say that he is a ninja’s
perfect partner?
ch0054_00_kyo_en.lsd.ch0054_00_kyo/0604_0701_03_10:
Of course, if I am not careful, he tries to
suck my blood!
ch0054_00_kyo_en.lsd.ch0054_00_kyo/0604_0702_01_10:
Crobat and I are equals. Words do no justice to
what we share.
ch0054_00_kyo_en.lsd.ch0054_00_kyo/0604_0702_02_10:
Perhaps trying to suck my blood is his way of
showing me affection.
ch0054_00_kyo_en.lsd.ch0054_00_kyo/0605_0701_01_10:
If you’re going to be battling all sorts of pairs,
make sure you choose the type of moves
that your opponents are weak against.
ch0054_00_kyo_en.lsd.ch0054_00_kyo/0605_0701_02_10:
Fwahaha! As long as you can find 
your opponent’s weakness, you’ll have
an edge in any Pokémon battle!
ch0054_00_kyo_en.lsd.ch0054_00_kyo/0605_0701_03_10:
If you know not only what the opposing Pokémon
are weak to but also what yours are weak to...
ch0054_00_kyo_en.lsd.ch0054_00_kyo/0605_0701_04_10:
you will be able to identify both opportunities
and crises!
ch0054_00_kyo_en.lsd.ch0054_00_kyo/0605_0702_01_10:
Now that I’ve warned you to look out for
your opponent’s weaknesses, you understand
what that means, yes?
ch0054_00_kyo_en.lsd.ch0054_00_kyo/0605_0702_02_10: It means that I challenge you!
ch0054_00_kyo_en.lsd.ch0054_00_kyo/0605_0702_03_10:
I am intrigued to see how you will deal with my
