ch0071_00_otona_en.lsd.ch0071_00_otona/1901_0601_03_10:
But I know I’ll forget these mistakes by tomorrow
and lather, rinse, repeat... That’s me.
ch0071_00_otona_en.lsd.ch0071_00_otona/2863_1031_02_10:
I pride myself on my
beautiful and dignified
Pokémon battles.
ch0071_00_otona_en.lsd.ch0071_00_otona/2863_1031_03_10:
We have to be beautiful
no matter where we are.
ch0071_00_otona_en.lsd.ch0071_00_otona/2863_0101_01_10:
I’ll be the judge of whether you’re beautiful
or not.
ch0071_00_otona_en.lsd.ch0071_00_otona/2863_0101_02_10:
Now, try to bedazzle me with a
Pokémon battle!
ch0071_00_otona_en.lsd.ch0071_00_otona/2863_0102_01_10:
What I want is a polished and beautiful
Pokémon battle.
ch0071_00_otona_en.lsd.ch0071_00_otona/2863_0102_02_10:
Now, try to bedazzle me with a
Pokémon battle!
ch0071_00_otona_en.lsd.ch0071_00_otona/2863_0601_01_10: So beautiful that I was entranced by you.
ch0071_00_otona_en.lsd.ch0071_00_otona/2863_0601_02_10:
Thank you for showing me such a
splendid bond.

ch0072_00_kaipan_en.lsd.ch0072_00_kaipan/2702_1031_01_10:
I always end up buying
things for my Pokémon...
ch0072_00_kaipan_en.lsd.ch0072_00_kaipan/2702_1031_02_10:
There’s just so many things
I can buy, I can never 
make up my mind.
ch0072_00_kaipan_en.lsd.ch0072_00_kaipan/2702_0701_01_10:
Have you been to the shop in the
Pokémon Center yet?
ch0072_00_kaipan_en.lsd.ch0072_00_kaipan/2702_0701_02_10:
Their selection is really good, so I end up buying
a lot!
ch0072_00_kaipan_en.lsd.ch0072_00_kaipan/2702_0701_03_10:
I always take a peek when I’m at the
Pokémon Center. Shopping is the best, isn’t it?
ch0072_00_kaipan_en.lsd.ch0072_00_kaipan/2702_0702_01_10: I’m buying supplies for my Pokémon!
ch0072_00_kaipan_en.lsd.ch0072_00_kaipan/2702_0702_02_10: Fortune favors the prepared, after all!
ch0072_00_kaipan_en.lsd.ch0072_00_kaipan/2703_0701_01_10:
How is this possible?
I chose the perfect pair!
ch0072_00_kaipan_en.lsd.ch0072_00_kaipan/2703_0701_02_10: The perfectly cool pair of swim trunks!
ch0072_00_kaipan_en.lsd.ch0072_00_kaipan/2703_0701_03_10:
I spent all day trying all my trunks on to
finally choose this pair!
ch0072_00_kaipan_en.lsd.ch0072_00_kaipan/2703_0701_04_10:
So how is this possible?
I’m the exact same as all the other swimmers!
ch0072_00_kaipan_en.lsd.ch0072_00_kaipan/2703_0701_05_10:
Everybody has the exact same pair of my
perfect trunks!
ch0072_00_kaipan_en.lsd.ch0072_00_kaipan/2703_0702_01_10:
No, wait.
All of us have an undying love for the ocean.
ch0072_00_kaipan_en.lsd.ch0072_00_kaipan/2703_0702_02_10:
So of course we’d have the same clothing taste!
We are all siblings of the sea!
ch0072_00_kaipan_en.lsd.ch0072_00_kaipan/2704_0701_01_10:
You have to warm up before going into
the water. That’s basic.
ch0072_00_kaipan_en.lsd.ch0072_00_kaipan/2704_0701_02_10:
Once you have the basics down,
next comes application!
ch0072_00_kaipan_en.lsd.ch0072_00_kaipan/2704_0701_03_10:
Float on the water and relax! Pretend you’re a
Tentacool, and let the water refresh you!
ch0072_00_kaipan_en.lsd.ch0072_00_kaipan/2704_0702_01_10:
Once you’re recovered, give it your all like
a Basculin!
ch0072_00_kaipan_en.lsd.ch0072_00_kaipan/2704_0702_02_10:
*pant pant* I’m beat!
That’s enough image training for today!
ch0072_00_kaipan_en.lsd.ch0072_00_kaipan/2751_1031_01_10: I want to be that free.
ch0072_00_kaipan_en.lsd.ch0072_00_kaipan/2751_1031_02_10:
But I’m too conscious of
other people.
ch0072_00_kaipan_en.lsd.ch0072_00_kaipan/2751_0701_01_10:
Do you feel that wind, too?
Doesn’t it embrace your whole body?
ch0072_00_kaipan_en.lsd.ch0072_00_kaipan/2751_0701_02_10:
He’s so dreamy...
I wish I could live as freely as he did.
ch0072_00_kaipan_en.lsd.ch0072_00_kaipan/2751_0701_03_10:
You only live once!
And I’m going to live free, just as a
swimmer should!
ch0072_00_kaipan_en.lsd.ch0072_00_kaipan/2751_0701_04_10:
I worry too much about my parents’ expectations
and how others see me...
ch0072_00_kaipan_en.lsd.ch0072_00_kaipan/2751_0701_05_10:
The only thing you have to worry about is
whether you’re living true to yourself!
ch0072_00_kaipan_en.lsd.ch0072_00_kaipan/2751_0701_06_10:
I decided!
I’m going to become a swimmer, too!
ch0072_00_kaipan_en.lsd.ch0072_00_kaipan/2751_0701_07_10:
I want my life to be something that I can proudly
call my own!
ch0072_00_kaipan_en.lsd.ch0072_00_kaipan/1903_0101_01_10:
I am good at breaststroke, freestyle,
butterfly...and, of course, Pokémon battles!
ch0072_00_kaipan_en.lsd.ch0072_00_kaipan/1903_0501_01_10:
Did I just lose a Pokémon battle, even though
I’m so good at them?
ch0072_00_kaipan_en.lsd.ch0072_00_kaipan/1903_0601_01_10:
Wow, you’re strong! I even trained with
backstroke and diving!
ch0072_00_kaipan_en.lsd.ch0072_00_kaipan/1903_0601_02_10:
Fine, I’ll swim with a Wailmer on my back
from now on for training.

ch0073_00_karate_en.lsd.ch0073_00_karate/2701_0701_01_10:
To establish a bond, I have to... Hi-yah!
Whew...
That’s enough for today!
ch0073_00_karate_en.lsd.ch0073_00_karate/2701_0701_02_10: Sorry, I’m trying something out here!
ch0073_00_karate_en.lsd.ch0073_00_karate/2701_0701_03_10:
When a Trainer and their Pokémon make 
a real bond as a sync pair, an amazing 
special move will activate...or so I hear!
ch0073_00_karate_en.lsd.ch0073_00_karate/2701_0701_04_10: Right now, I’m training to activate it! Hi-yah!
ch0073_00_karate_en.lsd.ch0073_00_karate/2701_0702_01_10:
Apparently these special moves have 
different effects depending on 
the sync pair that uses them.
ch0073_00_karate_en.lsd.ch0073_00_karate/2701_0702_02_10:
Almost like the bond that is born from the clash
of spirit to spirit and fist to fist!
ch0073_00_karate_en.lsd.ch0073_00_karate/2701_0702_03_10: So, the key must be found in training! Hi-yah!
ch0073_00_karate_en.lsd.ch0073_00_karate/2702_1031_01_10:
An opponent with such
high defenses...
ch0073_00_karate_en.lsd.ch0073_00_karate/2702_1031_02_10:
We’ve trained to
handle opponents
with low defenses!
ch0073_00_karate_en.lsd.ch0073_00_karate/2702_0701_01_10:
A good offense is the greatest strength!
It’s what my Pokémon and I train for every day!
ch0073_00_karate_en.lsd.ch0073_00_karate/2702_0701_02_10:
Because we train our offense so much, low
defenses are no challenge! Battle us whenever!
ch0073_00_karate_en.lsd.ch0073_00_karate/2702_0701_03_10:
But an opponent with BIG defenses makes things
difficult! That’s our biggest weakness!
ch0073_00_karate_en.lsd.ch0073_00_karate/2702_0702_01_10:
When you master one thing, another becomes
your weakness.
ch0073_00_karate_en.lsd.ch0073_00_karate/2702_0702_02_10:
And recently, all of the opponents that challenge
me have had very high defense!
ch0073_00_karate_en.lsd.ch0073_00_karate/2702_0702_03_10:
High defenses are my weakness!
How does everybody know my weakness!
ch0073_00_karate_en.lsd.ch0073_00_karate/2703_0701_01_10:
I’m going to train in the fiercest of rain or the
scorchiest of heat!
ch0073_00_karate_en.lsd.ch0073_00_karate/2703_0701_03_10:
I finally met my idol, the Karate King!
And not only did he battle me—he even
gave me a Pokémon!
ch0073_00_karate_en.lsd.ch0073_00_karate/2703_0701_04_10:
I am at the peak of happiness!
I’d follow him for life!
ch0073_00_karate_en.lsd.ch0073_00_karate/2703_0701_05_10:
That is...if I hadn’t lost sight of him!
So instead, I just started training again.
ch0073_00_karate_en.lsd.ch0073_00_karate/2703_0702_01_10: You can train anywhere and anytime!
ch0073_00_karate_en.lsd.ch0073_00_karate/2703_0702_02_10:
This Pokémon isn’t the only thing I got from the
Karate King, after all! Life lessons count, too!
ch0073_00_karate_en.lsd.ch0073_00_karate/2704_0701_01_10:
You, human that uses Pokémon...
Can you understand my words?
ch0073_00_karate_en.lsd.ch0073_00_karate/2704_0701_03_10:
Ha ha ha! I surprised you, didn’t I!
I was actually in a movie a long time ago!
ch0073_00_karate_en.lsd.ch0073_00_karate/2704_0701_04_10:
It wasn’t an easy gig for anyone, but the lead
actor was amazing!
ch0073_00_karate_en.lsd.ch0073_00_karate/2704_0701_05_10:
The movie didn’t exactly go according to script,
but he never gave up and kept redoing his shots.
I consider him my mentor!
ch0073_00_karate_en.lsd.ch0073_00_karate/2704_0702_01_10:
I make sure to train as both a Trainer and an
actor every day!
ch0073_00_karate_en.lsd.ch0073_00_karate/2704_0702_02_10: But whenever I’m acting, nobody talks to me!
ch0073_00_karate_en.lsd.ch0073_00_karate/2751_1031_01_10:
Come on, now.
You’re trying to overcome
this, aren’t you?
ch0073_00_karate_en.lsd.ch0073_00_karate/2751_1031_03_10:
It’ll be OK, though!
Don’t worry about it!
ch0073_00_karate_en.lsd.ch0073_00_karate/2751_0701_02_10:
Come on, buddy! I’m here with you! We’ll get
through this together!
ch0073_00_karate_en.lsd.ch0073_00_karate/2751_0701_03_10:
A long time ago...when I was still a
security guard for the gift shop...
ch0073_00_karate_en.lsd.ch0073_00_karate/2751_0701_04_10:
Uh...yeah.
You told me that part already.
ch0073_00_karate_en.lsd.ch0073_00_karate/2751_0701_05_10:
A frighteningly strong opponent...
But it was because of that that I decided to
try to reach the top!
ch0073_00_karate_en.lsd.ch0073_00_karate/2751_0701_06_10:
Yeah, that’s the ticket! I’ll help you, too!
You’ll be fine, buddy!
ch0073_00_karate_en.lsd.ch0073_00_karate/2751_0701_07_10: But I’m still scared of Hyper Beam!
ch0073_00_karate_en.lsd.ch0073_00_karate/1901_0101_01_10: I just won a battle, so I’m feeling good!
ch0073_00_karate_en.lsd.ch0073_00_karate/1901_0501_02_10:
Oh, whatever!
I’m in a terrible mood now!
ch0073_00_karate_en.lsd.ch0073_00_karate/1901_0601_01_10: I think I’m gonna go to bed...
ch0073_00_karate_en.lsd.ch0073_00_karate/1901_0601_02_10:
I’m not strong enough to be able to get right
back up and try again.
ch0073_00_karate_en.lsd.ch0073_00_karate/1901_0601_03_10:
Uh, well, you know...
I’m grateful for you battling me!
ch0073_00_karate_en.lsd.ch0073_00_karate/1902_0101_01_10:
Muahaha! My hobby is to beat Trainers on their
way to what lies ahead!
ch0073_00_karate_en.lsd.ch0073_00_karate/1902_0601_01_10:
Rather than enjoying defeating someone, should I
aim higher?
ch0073_00_karate_en.lsd.ch0073_00_karate/1902_0601_02_10:
It’s probably people with that kind of attitude
who gather for the PML.
ch0073_00_karate_en.lsd.ch0073_00_karate/1903_0101_01_10: Err... I wasn’t sleeping! Let’s battle!
ch0073_00_karate_en.lsd.ch0073_00_karate/1903_0501_02_10:
This can’t be happening!
This must be a dream!
ch0073_00_karate_en.lsd.ch0073_00_karate/1903_0601_01_10:
I was careless, but being half-asleep isn’t
a good enough excuse!
ch0073_00_karate_en.lsd.ch0073_00_karate/1903_0601_02_10:
I mean...I wasn’t asleep!
I swear! It’s not true!

ch0074_00_tanpan_en.lsd.ch0074_00_tanpan/2701_1031_01_10:
These shorts are a badge
of honor!
ch0074_00_tanpan_en.lsd.ch0074_00_tanpan/2701_1031_03_10:
I really wish I could put 
shorts on Pokémon, too.
ch0074_00_tanpan_en.lsd.ch0074_00_tanpan/2701_0701_02_10:
You might skin yourself if you fall, 
and it would hurt.
ch0074_00_tanpan_en.lsd.ch0074_00_tanpan/2701_0701_03_10: But you can’t deny how comfortable they are!
ch0074_00_tanpan_en.lsd.ch0074_00_tanpan/2701_0701_04_10: I wish I could put shorts on my Pokémon, too.
ch0074_00_tanpan_en.lsd.ch0074_00_tanpan/2701_0702_01_10: Wintertime? Of course! I wear shorts then, too!
ch0074_00_tanpan_en.lsd.ch0074_00_tanpan/2701_0702_02_10:
After all, shorts are the coolest 
and the comfiest!
ch0074_00_tanpan_en.lsd.ch0074_00_tanpan/2702_1031_01_10:
So many legs... 
How should I do this?
ch0074_00_tanpan_en.lsd.ch0074_00_tanpan/2702_1031_03_10:
The two of us are gonna
go the distance!
ch0074_00_tanpan_en.lsd.ch0074_00_tanpan/2702_0701_01_10:
Isn’t my Ariados cool? I met her in the forest,
and she’s been my partner ever since!
ch0074_00_tanpan_en.lsd.ch0074_00_tanpan/2702_0701_02_10: I want to put a pair of shorts on her...
ch0074_00_tanpan_en.lsd.ch0074_00_tanpan/2702_0701_03_10:
But with her having so many legs, 
I don’t know how to put them on.
ch0074_00_tanpan_en.lsd.ch0074_00_tanpan/2702_0702_01_10:
Do they even make shorts with 
more than two leg holes in them?
ch0074_00_tanpan_en.lsd.ch0074_00_tanpan/2702_0702_02_10:
Where could I find them... Do you think any
stores on Pasio would sell them?
ch0074_00_tanpan_en.lsd.ch0074_00_tanpan/2751_1031_01_10:
You’re always whining!
Jeez, that’s all you do!
ch0074_00_tanpan_en.lsd.ch0074_00_tanpan/2751_1031_02_10:
My little brother is so
rebellious!
ch0074_00_tanpan_en.lsd.ch0074_00_tanpan/2751_1031_03_10:
He used to be adorable,
like a doll...
ch0074_00_tanpan_en.lsd.ch0074_00_tanpan/2751_1032_01_10:
My sister and I used to be
really close.
ch0074_00_tanpan_en.lsd.ch0074_00_tanpan/2751_1032_02_10:
But lately, she keeps
nagging me.
ch0074_00_tanpan_en.lsd.ch0074_00_tanpan/2751_1032_03_10:
I wish she would be nicer
to me.
ch0074_00_tanpan_en.lsd.ch0074_00_tanpan/2751_0701_01_10: Why do you always only wear skirts?
ch0074_00_tanpan_en.lsd.ch0074_00_tanpan/2751_0701_02_10: Well, why do you only wear shorts?
ch0074_00_tanpan_en.lsd.ch0074_00_tanpan/2751_0701_03_10:
Shorts are the only things I have to wear. 
I don’t have anything else.
ch0074_00_tanpan_en.lsd.ch0074_00_tanpan/2751_0701_04_10: Shorts are my thing—and they’re my favorite!
ch0074_00_tanpan_en.lsd.ch0074_00_tanpan/2751_0701_06_10: I’ve got an idea! Let’s trade!
ch0074_00_tanpan_en.lsd.ch0074_00_tanpan/2751_0701_07_10:
No way! Are you crazy?! 
Your skirt is all open and frilly!

ch0075_00_bikini_en.lsd.ch0075_00_bikini/2702_1031_01_10:
A beautiful thing can
also be poisonous.
ch0075_00_bikini_en.lsd.ch0075_00_bikini/2702_1031_02_10:
Ahh...
I wish I could feel them...
ch0075_00_bikini_en.lsd.ch0075_00_bikini/2702_0701_01_10:
Mareanie’s got the most gorgeous tentacles...
It’s like an art piece!
ch0075_00_bikini_en.lsd.ch0075_00_bikini/2702_0701_02_10:
But they’re poisonous, so when other Pokémon
touch them, they faint.
ch0075_00_bikini_en.lsd.ch0075_00_bikini/2702_0701_05_10:
Even if your Pokémon is poisoned or paralyzed,
you can use items or moves to heal it!
ch0075_00_bikini_en.lsd.ch0075_00_bikini/2702_0702_01_10: But you can’t heal Trainers with items or moves.
ch0075_00_bikini_en.lsd.ch0075_00_bikini/2702_0702_02_10:
What if a Trainer were to become poisoned?
What would you do?!
ch0075_00_bikini_en.lsd.ch0075_00_bikini/2703_1031_01_10:
I totally know how
you feel.
ch0075_00_bikini_en.lsd.ch0075_00_bikini/2703_1031_02_10:
It’s important to have a
place to relax...
ch0075_00_bikini_en.lsd.ch0075_00_bikini/2703_1031_03_10:
Same goes for Trainers
and Pokémon...
ch0075_00_bikini_en.lsd.ch0075_00_bikini/2703_0701_01_10: Try to really understand your Pokémon.
ch0075_00_bikini_en.lsd.ch0075_00_bikini/2703_0701_02_10:
For example, Pokémon that have excellent
Water-type moves can use those moves
even in deserts or forests.
ch0075_00_bikini_en.lsd.ch0075_00_bikini/2703_0701_03_10:
But Pokémon that like water are happiest
when they’re close to water.
ch0075_00_bikini_en.lsd.ch0075_00_bikini/2703_0701_04_10:
You have your favorite spot, right?
So do Pokémon!
ch0075_00_bikini_en.lsd.ch0075_00_bikini/2703_0702_02_10:
Even after an exhausting adventure,
once you come home, you feel restored.
ch0075_00_bikini_en.lsd.ch0075_00_bikini/2704_1031_03_10:
I should scout some
sync pairs.
ch0075_00_bikini_en.lsd.ch0075_00_bikini/2704_0701_01_10:
When I feel lonely, I like making new friends to
go on adventures with.
ch0075_00_bikini_en.lsd.ch0075_00_bikini/2704_0701_02_10:
You seem a bit lonely, so I’ll let you in on
a little secret.
ch0075_00_bikini_en.lsd.ch0075_00_bikini/2704_0701_03_10:
If you go to the Pokémon Center shop,
you might find friends there!
ch0075_00_bikini_en.lsd.ch0075_00_bikini/2704_0701_04_10: Not that I’m asking you to be my friend, but...
ch0075_00_bikini_en.lsd.ch0075_00_bikini/2704_0702_01_10:
I hope you get to meet lots of new people
as you travel.
ch0075_00_bikini_en.lsd.ch0075_00_bikini/2704_0702_02_10:
If I happen to be one of them... *cough*
Oh, nothing... Never mind.
ch0075_00_bikini_en.lsd.ch0075_00_bikini/2751_1031_01_10:
What’s he doing with
that Poké Ball?
ch0075_00_bikini_en.lsd.ch0075_00_bikini/2751_1031_02_10:
Does he not know how
things work on Pasio?
ch0075_00_bikini_en.lsd.ch0075_00_bikini/2751_1032_02_10:
Maybe it doesn’t like the
way I throw my Poké Ball.
ch0075_00_bikini_en.lsd.ch0075_00_bikini/2751_1032_03_10: Do I need to try harder?
ch0075_00_bikini_en.lsd.ch0075_00_bikini/2751_0701_01_10:
Dude, every time I try to catch a Pokémon,
people interfere with me.
ch0075_00_bikini_en.lsd.ch0075_00_bikini/2751_0701_02_10:
Um, you’re not serious, are you?
This joke’s gone on long enough, bro.
ch0075_00_bikini_en.lsd.ch0075_00_bikini/2751_0701_03_10:
What? Come on, don’t say that.
Gimme some advice!
ch0075_00_bikini_en.lsd.ch0075_00_bikini/2751_0701_04_10:
To begin with, there are no
wild Pokémon on Pasio.
ch0075_00_bikini_en.lsd.ch0075_00_bikini/2751_0701_06_10:
How have you not noticed that?
All of the Pokémon are with Trainers.

ch0076_00_collector_en.lsd.ch0076_00_collector/2701_1031_01_10:
I want to fill in the blank
spots in my Pokédex.
ch0076_00_collector_en.lsd.ch0076_00_collector/2701_1031_02_10:
I just can’t find some
Legendary Pokémon.
ch0076_00_collector_en.lsd.ch0076_00_collector/2701_1031_03_10:
Where in the world could
they be?
ch0076_00_collector_en.lsd.ch0076_00_collector/2701_0701_01_10:
I mean, if I’m going to call myself a collector,
I at least want some Legendary Pokémon!
ch0076_00_collector_en.lsd.ch0076_00_collector/2701_0701_02_10: That’s why I’m out here traveling the world.
ch0076_00_collector_en.lsd.ch0076_00_collector/2701_0701_03_10:
But for some reason, somebody always gets there
ahead of me.
ch0076_00_collector_en.lsd.ch0076_00_collector/2701_0701_04_10:
I wonder if it could be the same person that’s
catching them all.
ch0076_00_collector_en.lsd.ch0076_00_collector/2701_0702_01_10:
Couldn’t somebody sneak a Legendary Pokémon
onto Pasio for me?
ch0076_00_collector_en.lsd.ch0076_00_collector/2701_0702_02_10:
I’d be happy to just register it in my Pokédex.
Isn’t there anybody out there who can help me...
ch0076_00_collector_en.lsd.ch0076_00_collector/2702_1031_01_10:
You can’t just be sweet to
your Pokémon all the time.
ch0076_00_collector_en.lsd.ch0076_00_collector/2702_1031_02_10:
I’ve got a Ponyta as well
as a Blastoise.
ch0076_00_collector_en.lsd.ch0076_00_collector/2702_1031_03_10:
I’m scared of fires,
you know.
ch0076_00_collector_en.lsd.ch0076_00_collector/2702_0701_02_10: I’d really like to keep him indoors.
ch0076_00_collector_en.lsd.ch0076_00_collector/2702_0701_03_10: But I’m too afraid of starting a fire, so I can’t.
ch0076_00_collector_en.lsd.ch0076_00_collector/2702_0701_04_10:
As long as Blastoise is around, we can put out
any fire.
ch0076_00_collector_en.lsd.ch0076_00_collector/2702_0702_01_10:
But when Blastoise is around, the whole house
gets flooded.
ch0076_00_collector_en.lsd.ch0076_00_collector/2702_0702_02_10:
Ooh, I know! I should just get a Vanilluxe to
freeze all the water!
ch0076_00_collector_en.lsd.ch0076_00_collector/2704_1031_02_10:
My curiosity can never
be satisfied!
ch0076_00_collector_en.lsd.ch0076_00_collector/2704_0701_01_10:
Pokémon from all over the world have gathered
here for the PML.
ch0076_00_collector_en.lsd.ch0076_00_collector/2704_0701_02_10:
My goal is to see as many different Pokémon
as I can!
ch0076_00_collector_en.lsd.ch0076_00_collector/2704_0701_03_10: I wonder what kind of Pokémon I’ll spot next.
ch0076_00_collector_en.lsd.ch0076_00_collector/2704_0701_04_10: Just thinking about it is making me crazy excited!
ch0076_00_collector_en.lsd.ch0076_00_collector/2704_0702_01_10:
I hope I can meet a Trainer who has a
Legendary Pokémon!
ch0076_00_collector_en.lsd.ch0076_00_collector/2704_0702_02_10:
If you know anyone who has one, you have
to tell me, OK?!

ch0077_00_daisukim_en.lsd.ch0077_00_daisukim/2701_1031_01_10:
Pikachu? Does anybody
have a Pikachu?
ch0077_00_daisukim_en.lsd.ch0077_00_daisukim/2701_1031_02_10:
I want to meet one and
rub cheeks with it...
ch0077_00_daisukim_en.lsd.ch0077_00_daisukim/2701_1031_03_10: This is an isle of dreams.
ch0077_00_daisukim_en.lsd.ch0077_00_daisukim/2701_0701_02_10:
Just by raising a Pikachu, you’d become the
center of attention.
ch0077_00_daisukim_en.lsd.ch0077_00_daisukim/2701_0701_03_10:
There aren’t any Trainers with Pikachu 
back where I’m from, but I’m sure 
I can meet one on Pasio!
ch0077_00_daisukim_en.lsd.ch0077_00_daisukim/2701_0701_04_10: That’s what makes Pasio the island of dreams!
ch0077_00_daisukim_en.lsd.ch0077_00_daisukim/2701_0702_01_10:
I think the secret to a Pikachu’s cuteness comes
from its tail.
ch0077_00_daisukim_en.lsd.ch0077_00_daisukim/2701_0702_02_10:
It zigs like this and zags like that. It’s just
way too cute!
ch0077_00_daisukim_en.lsd.ch0077_00_daisukim/2702_1031_02_10:
Look how he’s playing 
with his ball.
ch0077_00_daisukim_en.lsd.ch0077_00_daisukim/2702_0701_01_10:
I wish I were the ball that my Seel is
playing with.
ch0077_00_daisukim_en.lsd.ch0077_00_daisukim/2702_0701_02_10: Roll me around, frolic with me, and ignore me.
ch0077_00_daisukim_en.lsd.ch0077_00_daisukim/2702_0701_03_10:
Do you understand my feelings? You do, right?
That’s how much I love my Seel!
ch0077_00_daisukim_en.lsd.ch0077_00_daisukim/2702_0702_01_10:
I don’t care if he loses interest in me and
forgets me.
ch0077_00_daisukim_en.lsd.ch0077_00_daisukim/2702_0702_02_10:
In fact, because I’m there as a point of
comparison, Seel looks that much cuter!
ch0077_00_daisukim_en.lsd.ch0077_00_daisukim/2703_1031_01_10:
I want this...
but I want that, too...
ch0077_00_daisukim_en.lsd.ch0077_00_daisukim/2703_1031_03_10:
I know I have to watch
my spending, but...
ch0077_00_daisukim_en.lsd.ch0077_00_daisukim/2703_0701_01_10: Buying things at the shop is my favorite pastime!
ch0077_00_daisukim_en.lsd.ch0077_00_daisukim/2703_0701_02_10:
If I see any new Pokémon goods, I can’t help but
buy them.
ch0077_00_daisukim_en.lsd.ch0077_00_daisukim/2703_0701_03_10:
If I hear something’s a limited edition, I hold
nothing back!
ch0077_00_daisukim_en.lsd.ch0077_00_daisukim/2703_0701_04_10:
I can make money whenever, but I can only get
limited editions then and there!
ch0077_00_daisukim_en.lsd.ch0077_00_daisukim/2703_0702_01_10: But of course I think money is important.
ch0077_00_daisukim_en.lsd.ch0077_00_daisukim/2703_0702_02_10:
If I didn’t have money, I wouldn’t be able to
buy new goods!
ch0077_00_daisukim_en.lsd.ch0077_00_daisukim/2704_1031_02_10:
Hmm, would like to make
my partner stronger...
ch0077_00_daisukim_en.lsd.ch0077_00_daisukim/2704_1031_03_10:
Need to coordinate with
my team, though...
ch0077_00_daisukim_en.lsd.ch0077_00_daisukim/2704_0701_01_10:
Are you using the café?
You can make your partner stronger or edit your
team there.
ch0077_00_daisukim_en.lsd.ch0077_00_daisukim/2704_0701_02_10:
It’s great that it’s in the Pokémon Center
and we can use it whenever we want!
ch0077_00_daisukim_en.lsd.ch0077_00_daisukim/2704_0701_03_10: Go there with your Pokémon and relax sometime!
ch0077_00_daisukim_en.lsd.ch0077_00_daisukim/2704_0702_01_10:
Heh heh. You know, I enjoy sitting at the café
and watching the Trainers come into the
Pokémon Center with their Pokémon.
ch0077_00_daisukim_en.lsd.ch0077_00_daisukim/2704_0702_02_10:
A lot of Trainers walk around with their Pokémon
out of their Poké Balls. This place is great!
ch0077_00_daisukim_en.lsd.ch0077_00_daisukim/2751_1031_02_10:
I must not have enough
love for my Pokémon.
ch0077_00_daisukim_en.lsd.ch0077_00_daisukim/2751_1031_03_10:
I have so much to learn
from a Poké Fan.
ch0077_00_daisukim_en.lsd.ch0077_00_daisukim/2751_1032_01_10:
Pokémon aren’t just
creatures to catch.
ch0077_00_daisukim_en.lsd.ch0077_00_daisukim/2751_1032_02_10:
As long as you can stay
with your Pokémon...
ch0077_00_daisukim_en.lsd.ch0077_00_daisukim/2751_1032_03_10:
then they can be a part of
your collection!
ch0077_00_daisukim_en.lsd.ch0077_00_daisukim/2751_0701_02_10: Wow, this many! That is amazing!
ch0077_00_daisukim_en.lsd.ch0077_00_daisukim/2751_0701_03_10: If you love Pokémon like I do, this much is easy!
ch0077_00_daisukim_en.lsd.ch0077_00_daisukim/2751_0701_04_10: But there aren’t any wild Pokémon here, right?
ch0077_00_daisukim_en.lsd.ch0077_00_daisukim/2751_0701_05_10:
You don’t have to catch them. If you become
friends with me, you can play with my Pokémon
whenever you like!
ch0077_00_daisukim_en.lsd.ch0077_00_daisukim/2751_0701_07_10:
Come over to my house sometime.
We have plenty to talk about!

ch0078_00_rangerf_en.lsd.ch0078_00_rangerf/2701_1031_01_10:
This and that...
Oh, and that, too...
ch0078_00_rangerf_en.lsd.ch0078_00_rangerf/2701_1031_02_10:
Preparation is key
before an adventure.
ch0078_00_rangerf_en.lsd.ch0078_00_rangerf/2701_1031_03_10:
Be diligent!
Every ranger knows that!
ch0078_00_rangerf_en.lsd.ch0078_00_rangerf/2701_0701_01_10:
I’m a Pokémon Ranger!
I’ll protect the peace of Pasio!
ch0078_00_rangerf_en.lsd.ch0078_00_rangerf/2701_0701_02_10:
You’re going on an adventure, too, huh?
Then you must prepare!
ch0078_00_rangerf_en.lsd.ch0078_00_rangerf/2701_0701_03_10:
Even when your Pokémon are dependable,
you can’t just count on them.
ch0078_00_rangerf_en.lsd.ch0078_00_rangerf/2701_0701_04_10:
Call me as soon as you’re in danger!
I’ll come rescue you!
ch0078_00_rangerf_en.lsd.ch0078_00_rangerf/2701_0702_01_10:
Giving up when you know that the adventure is
too arduous is also important.
ch0078_00_rangerf_en.lsd.ch0078_00_rangerf/2701_0702_02_10:
Only Pokémon Rangers never give up—
even when the situation seems impossible!
ch0078_00_rangerf_en.lsd.ch0078_00_rangerf/2701_0702_03_10:
It’s because if I give up, it means that
I’m giving up on somebody else.
ch0078_00_rangerf_en.lsd.ch0078_00_rangerf/2702_1031_01_10:
Grass-type moves are
gentle on the skin.
ch0078_00_rangerf_en.lsd.ch0078_00_rangerf/2702_1031_02_10:
Nature means grass,
and grass means beauty!
ch0078_00_rangerf_en.lsd.ch0078_00_rangerf/2702_1031_03_10:
Being one with nature
means silky smooth skin.
ch0078_00_rangerf_en.lsd.ch0078_00_rangerf/2702_0701_01_10: My Bayleef’s aromatherapy is truly excellent!
ch0078_00_rangerf_en.lsd.ch0078_00_rangerf/2702_0701_02_10:
Apparently, the spicy aroma emitted
from the buds makes the skin smooth and supple.
ch0078_00_rangerf_en.lsd.ch0078_00_rangerf/2702_0701_03_10:
That’s why Pokémon Rangers are
young and beautiful!
ch0078_00_rangerf_en.lsd.ch0078_00_rangerf/2702_0702_01_10:
Bayleef is such a good Pokémon.
She thrives on praise!
ch0078_00_rangerf_en.lsd.ch0078_00_rangerf/2702_0702_02_10:
But if I praise her too much, she sometimes
gets bashful and uses Tackle on me.
ch0078_00_rangerf_en.lsd.ch0078_00_rangerf/2704_1031_01_10:
I swiftly come to the
rescue of those in need.
ch0078_00_rangerf_en.lsd.ch0078_00_rangerf/2704_1031_03_10:
Even in deep forests, be
sure not to miss anything!
ch0078_00_rangerf_en.lsd.ch0078_00_rangerf/2704_0701_01_10:
I have great eyesight!
I can see faraway objects even in the forest.
ch0078_00_rangerf_en.lsd.ch0078_00_rangerf/2704_0701_02_10:
My good vision comes in handy in battles, too!
I can aim well and hit the target with moves.
ch0078_00_rangerf_en.lsd.ch0078_00_rangerf/2704_0701_03_10:
But moves that are difficult sometimes
tend to be more powerful.
ch0078_00_rangerf_en.lsd.ch0078_00_rangerf/2704_0701_04_10:
To fight with certitude, or to aim for a
single blow—that is the question...
ch0078_00_rangerf_en.lsd.ch0078_00_rangerf/2704_0702_01_10:
Oftentimes, powerful moves tend to miss the
target when it’s a critical moment.
ch0078_00_rangerf_en.lsd.ch0078_00_rangerf/2704_0702_02_10:
But Pokémon are the ones using the moves,
so perhaps my vision doesn’t matter so much?
ch0078_00_rangerf_en.lsd.ch0078_00_rangerf/2751_1031_01_10: It’s great to live in nature!
ch0078_00_rangerf_en.lsd.ch0078_00_rangerf/2751_1031_03_10:
I hope to be one when I
grow up.
ch0078_00_rangerf_en.lsd.ch0078_00_rangerf/2751_1032_02_10:
It’s adorable that you
admire me!
ch0078_00_rangerf_en.lsd.ch0078_00_rangerf/2751_1032_03_10: I have to teach you a lot!
ch0078_00_rangerf_en.lsd.ch0078_00_rangerf/2751_0701_01_10:
What’s needed in a Pokémon Ranger
is a strong sense of justice!
ch0078_00_rangerf_en.lsd.ch0078_00_rangerf/2751_0701_02_10:
And respect for and understanding of nature
and Pokémon!
ch0078_00_rangerf_en.lsd.ch0078_00_rangerf/2751_0701_04_10:
Camping is especially great since
you get to directly experience nature!
ch0078_00_rangerf_en.lsd.ch0078_00_rangerf/2751_0701_05_10:
Learning from a camper about proper
clothing and gear is also useful!
ch0078_00_rangerf_en.lsd.ch0078_00_rangerf/2751_0701_06_10: If so, will I no longer be called a “lass”...?
ch0078_00_rangerf_en.lsd.ch0078_00_rangerf/2751_0701_07_10:
An identity crisis!
Could this be a challenge I have to overcome
in order to become a Pokémon Ranger?!
ch0078_00_rangerf_en.lsd.ch0078_00_rangerf/1901_0101_01_10: Will you be able to face the majesty of nature?
ch0078_00_rangerf_en.lsd.ch0078_00_rangerf/1901_0501_01_10: I believe that you can face it!
ch0078_00_rangerf_en.lsd.ch0078_00_rangerf/1901_0601_01_10: Your Pokémon have such genuine eyes!
ch0078_00_rangerf_en.lsd.ch0078_00_rangerf/1901_0601_02_10:
You can overcome anything
when you’re with your Pokémon!
ch0078_00_rangerf_en.lsd.ch0078_00_rangerf/1901_0601_03_10:
That kind of relationship is very important.
You have a good match!
ch0078_00_rangerf_en.lsd.ch0078_00_rangerf/1902_0101_01_10:
It’s the law of the jungle that prevails in nature!
I’ll take a bite out of you!
ch0078_00_rangerf_en.lsd.ch0078_00_rangerf/1902_0601_01_10:
The law of the jungle is real. You have to be
creative if you want to beat stronger opponents.

ch0079_00_miniskirt_en.lsd.ch0079_00_miniskirt/2701_1031_02_10:
Yup!
I looked so cute just now!
ch0079_00_miniskirt_en.lsd.ch0079_00_miniskirt/2701_1031_03_10:
Look at me!
I need compliments!
ch0079_00_miniskirt_en.lsd.ch0079_00_miniskirt/2701_0701_01_10:
Ooh, so cute! Soooo cute! And stylish!
I love it, I love it, I love it!
ch0079_00_miniskirt_en.lsd.ch0079_00_miniskirt/2701_0701_02_10:
I’m complimenting myself and my Pokémon to get
us fired up.
ch0079_00_miniskirt_en.lsd.ch0079_00_miniskirt/2701_0701_03_10: I can’t be outdone by these Pasio party girls!
ch0079_00_miniskirt_en.lsd.ch0079_00_miniskirt/2701_0701_04_10: My Pokémon and I are the cutest in the world!
ch0079_00_miniskirt_en.lsd.ch0079_00_miniskirt/2701_0702_01_10:
I get to decide what’s stylish and what’s not,
by the way.
ch0079_00_miniskirt_en.lsd.ch0079_00_miniskirt/2701_0702_02_10:
The same way I choose whatever Pokémon I
like to accompany me around, I choose to wear
whatever fashion I like.
ch0079_00_miniskirt_en.lsd.ch0079_00_miniskirt/2702_1031_01_10:
She’s so cute when she
tilts her head to the side.
ch0079_00_miniskirt_en.lsd.ch0079_00_miniskirt/2702_1031_02_10:
Her teeth are nice and
straight, and she doesn’t
have any cavities!
ch0079_00_miniskirt_en.lsd.ch0079_00_miniskirt/2702_1031_03_10:
Uh-oh! Did I scare you?
Oh, I’m sorry. I know you
don’t like scary things.
ch0079_00_miniskirt_en.lsd.ch0079_00_miniskirt/2702_0701_02_10:
That’s because I brush her beautiful, sharp fangs
every day!
ch0079_00_miniskirt_en.lsd.ch0079_00_miniskirt/2702_0701_04_10: Cleanliness is very important, after all!
ch0079_00_miniskirt_en.lsd.ch0079_00_miniskirt/2702_0702_01_10: My Granbull is such a timid little princess.
ch0079_00_miniskirt_en.lsd.ch0079_00_miniskirt/2702_0702_02_10:
She likes to look her best, but she gets scared
when people stare.
ch0079_00_miniskirt_en.lsd.ch0079_00_miniskirt/2703_1031_02_10:
I can’t be afraid.
I have to try to be nice.
ch0079_00_miniskirt_en.lsd.ch0079_00_miniskirt/2703_1031_03_10:
I want to make friends.
Just need some courage...
ch0079_00_miniskirt_en.lsd.ch0079_00_miniskirt/2703_0701_02_10:
The Pokémon Center is where all the latest
trends start, so there’s always a lot of people.
ch0079_00_miniskirt_en.lsd.ch0079_00_miniskirt/2703_0701_03_10:
You can usually see some friends, and there will
always be people you don’t know.
ch0079_00_miniskirt_en.lsd.ch0079_00_miniskirt/2703_0701_04_10:
If there’s someone you’re interested in, maybe
you can make friends with them. You need the
courage to talk to them first, though...
ch0079_00_miniskirt_en.lsd.ch0079_00_miniskirt/2703_0702_01_10:
I got up the courage to say something,
but I forgot to ask if we could be friends.
ch0079_00_miniskirt_en.lsd.ch0079_00_miniskirt/2703_0702_02_10:
But if I keep going to the Pokémon Center,
I’m sure I’ll get another chance!
ch0079_00_miniskirt_en.lsd.ch0079_00_miniskirt/2704_1031_01_10:
Can’t be burned, huh?
That’s pretty surprising.
ch0079_00_miniskirt_en.lsd.ch0079_00_miniskirt/2704_1031_02_10:
I wonder, is there anything
more fashionable?
ch0079_00_miniskirt_en.lsd.ch0079_00_miniskirt/2704_1031_03_10:
With a passive skill, 
I’ll be a very capable girl.
ch0079_00_miniskirt_en.lsd.ch0079_00_miniskirt/2704_0701_01_10:
Once you and your Pokémon get strong enough,
you’ll learn a passive skill.
ch0079_00_miniskirt_en.lsd.ch0079_00_miniskirt/2704_0701_02_10:
Passive skills are special capabilities of sync pairs.
They can stop you from being burned and stuff.
ch0079_00_miniskirt_en.lsd.ch0079_00_miniskirt/2704_0701_03_10: I can’t wait to see what passive skill we’ll learn!
ch0079_00_miniskirt_en.lsd.ch0079_00_miniskirt/2704_0702_01_10:
If I had a passive skill that kept me from
being burned...
ch0079_00_miniskirt_en.lsd.ch0079_00_miniskirt/2704_0702_02_10:
maybe I could drink hot coffee without cooling
it off first!
ch0079_00_miniskirt_en.lsd.ch0079_00_miniskirt/2751_1031_02_10:
Emotes can say way
more than words can.
ch0079_00_miniskirt_en.lsd.ch0079_00_miniskirt/2751_1031_03_10:
I use waaay too
many emotes...
ch0079_00_miniskirt_en.lsd.ch0079_00_miniskirt/2751_1032_01_10:
I dream about emotes
all day long...
ch0079_00_miniskirt_en.lsd.ch0079_00_miniskirt/2751_1032_02_10:
Sometimes I spam
them during battles.
ch0079_00_miniskirt_en.lsd.ch0079_00_miniskirt/2751_1032_03_10:
I’m totally hooked on
emote spamming!
ch0079_00_miniskirt_en.lsd.ch0079_00_miniskirt/2751_0701_01_10:
When you want to communicate during a Pokémon
battle, emotes are totally super useful.
ch0079_00_miniskirt_en.lsd.ch0079_00_miniskirt/2751_0701_03_10: Oh, you do?! We’re, like, so good together!
ch0079_00_miniskirt_en.lsd.ch0079_00_miniskirt/2751_0701_04_10:
You can literally say anything with emotes,
like “TYVM!” or “Yeet!” or “Hundo P!”
ch0079_00_miniskirt_en.lsd.ch0079_00_miniskirt/2751_0701_06_10: Maybe we should, like, just talk with emotes?
ch0079_00_miniskirt_en.lsd.ch0079_00_miniskirt/2751_0701_07_10: I think that may be a little too much.
ch0079_00_miniskirt_en.lsd.ch0079_00_miniskirt/1902_0101_01_10:
Hey! Look me in the eyes! There!
All right—let’s battle.
ch0079_00_miniskirt_en.lsd.ch0079_00_miniskirt/1902_0601_01_10:
When Trainers’ eyes meet, it might be time for a
Pokémon battle.
ch0079_00_miniskirt_en.lsd.ch0079_00_miniskirt/1902_0601_02_10: Or I’ve also heard that you might fall in love.

ch0080_00_yamaotoko_en.lsd.ch0080_00_yamaotoko/2701_1031_01_10:
Ga ha ha! The mountains
and oceans of Pasio!
ch0080_00_yamaotoko_en.lsd.ch0080_00_yamaotoko/2701_1031_02_10:
Where there is nature,
you will find a hiker!
ch0080_00_yamaotoko_en.lsd.ch0080_00_yamaotoko/2701_1031_03_10:
I don’t even need clothes!
I want to feel nature with
my whole body!
ch0080_00_yamaotoko_en.lsd.ch0080_00_yamaotoko/2701_0701_01_10:
Not just the mountains. The volcanoes, forests,
caves, and glaciers...
ch0080_00_yamaotoko_en.lsd.ch0080_00_yamaotoko/2701_0701_02_10: Pasio is such a colorful place!
ch0080_00_yamaotoko_en.lsd.ch0080_00_yamaotoko/2701_0701_03_10:
I can hardly believe that this island is
completely man-made!
ch0080_00_yamaotoko_en.lsd.ch0080_00_yamaotoko/2701_0701_04_10: I bet a lot of Pokémon helped in building it!
ch0080_00_yamaotoko_en.lsd.ch0080_00_yamaotoko/2701_0702_01_10:
Pasio isn’t an exception. Other places all have
their strong points, too!
ch0080_00_yamaotoko_en.lsd.ch0080_00_yamaotoko/2701_0702_02_10:
And you have to feel that with your whole body!
That is real exploring; that is real adventure!
ch0080_00_yamaotoko_en.lsd.ch0080_00_yamaotoko/2702_1031_02_10:
His tiny hands are so
charming, too...
ch0080_00_yamaotoko_en.lsd.ch0080_00_yamaotoko/2702_1031_03_10:
And when he tries to hug
you, he vibrates.
ch0080_00_yamaotoko_en.lsd.ch0080_00_yamaotoko/2702_0701_01_10:
My partner is Palpitoad.
He’s the Vibration Pokémon. He makes crying
children tremble!
ch0080_00_yamaotoko_en.lsd.ch0080_00_yamaotoko/2702_0701_02_10:
If you hug him, you can feel his
stomach vibrating.
ch0080_00_yamaotoko_en.lsd.ch0080_00_yamaotoko/2702_0701_03_10: He’s a lot more effective than an ab stimulator!
ch0080_00_yamaotoko_en.lsd.ch0080_00_yamaotoko/2702_0701_04_10:
He’s also cool and damp in the summer, so I
can’t recommend this Pokémon enough!
ch0080_00_yamaotoko_en.lsd.ch0080_00_yamaotoko/2702_0702_01_10: Palpitoad has a very charming face, doesn’t he?
ch0080_00_yamaotoko_en.lsd.ch0080_00_yamaotoko/2702_0702_02_10:
Whenever I see his face, 
I can’t help but feel at ease.
ch0080_00_yamaotoko_en.lsd.ch0080_00_yamaotoko/2703_1031_01_10:
Rock-type Pokémon are
the embodiment of
adventurous spirit!
ch0080_00_yamaotoko_en.lsd.ch0080_00_yamaotoko/2703_1031_02_10:
Ruggedness!
Real outdoorsmen
ought to be rugged!
ch0080_00_yamaotoko_en.lsd.ch0080_00_yamaotoko/2703_1031_03_10:
Strength of mind and body
is vital in the outdoors!
ch0080_00_yamaotoko_en.lsd.ch0080_00_yamaotoko/2703_0701_01_10:
Yeah, no matter how you shake it, 
I like Rock-type Pokémon.
ch0080_00_yamaotoko_en.lsd.ch0080_00_yamaotoko/2703_0701_02_10:
It helps that I see them the most when hiking
in the mountains, but that’s not the only reason.
ch0080_00_yamaotoko_en.lsd.ch0080_00_yamaotoko/2703_0701_03_10: More than anything, it’s those rugged bodies.
ch0080_00_yamaotoko_en.lsd.ch0080_00_yamaotoko/2703_0701_04_10:
Take a look at a Golem, and you’ll know what
I’m talking about.
ch0080_00_yamaotoko_en.lsd.ch0080_00_yamaotoko/2703_0702_01_10:
Rock types are hard, sure, 
but they aren’t invincible.
ch0080_00_yamaotoko_en.lsd.ch0080_00_yamaotoko/2703_0702_02_10: But I think that just adds to their charm.
ch0080_00_yamaotoko_en.lsd.ch0080_00_yamaotoko/2751_1031_01_10:
I want to know more tricks
on climbing.
ch0080_00_yamaotoko_en.lsd.ch0080_00_yamaotoko/2751_1031_02_10:
I suppose I should ask a
grown-up.
ch0080_00_yamaotoko_en.lsd.ch0080_00_yamaotoko/2751_1031_03_10:
I want to hear more from
Mr. Hiker.
ch0080_00_yamaotoko_en.lsd.ch0080_00_yamaotoko/2751_1032_02_10:
it makes my heart sing to
see young people
interested in hiking.
ch0080_00_yamaotoko_en.lsd.ch0080_00_yamaotoko/2751_1032_03_10:
Pokémon that are born on
the mountains are strong.
ch0080_00_yamaotoko_en.lsd.ch0080_00_yamaotoko/2751_0701_01_10:
Learn the routes that Pokémon on the mountain
use! That makes so much sense!
ch0080_00_yamaotoko_en.lsd.ch0080_00_yamaotoko/2751_0701_02_10:
Ga ha ha!
The same can be said for the oceans and
forests, too!
ch0080_00_yamaotoko_en.lsd.ch0080_00_yamaotoko/2751_0701_03_10:
There are even stories from other places in
which wild Pokémon help lost children get home.
ch0080_00_yamaotoko_en.lsd.ch0080_00_yamaotoko/2751_0701_04_10:
I really have to watch for more Pokémon on
my travels...
ch0080_00_yamaotoko_en.lsd.ch0080_00_yamaotoko/2751_0701_05_10:
Make sure you ask other Trainers for advice, too.
And if you want to know about mountains, I’ll
answer any of your questions!
ch0080_00_yamaotoko_en.lsd.ch0080_00_yamaotoko/2751_0701_06_10:
Thank you so much! Let’s go hiking
together sometime!
ch0080_00_yamaotoko_en.lsd.ch0080_00_yamaotoko/2751_0701_07_10:
I like it! You remind me of myself when I
was younger!
ch0080_00_yamaotoko_en.lsd.ch0080_00_yamaotoko/1902_0101_01_10:
I’m a hiker...
I might be big, but I’m a coward...
ch0080_00_yamaotoko_en.lsd.ch0080_00_yamaotoko/1902_0101_02_10:
I guess we can have a Pokémon battle if you
want, but go easy on me, OK?
ch0080_00_yamaotoko_en.lsd.ch0080_00_yamaotoko/1902_0501_01_10: I asked you to go easy on me...
ch0080_00_yamaotoko_en.lsd.ch0080_00_yamaotoko/1902_0601_01_10: Could you be a little...nicer next time?
ch0080_00_yamaotoko_en.lsd.ch0080_00_yamaotoko/1903_0101_01_10:
I’m chasing my dream, and I’m fighting for
a victory!
ch0080_00_yamaotoko_en.lsd.ch0080_00_yamaotoko/1903_0601_01_10:
My dream is to research the artificial mountains
on Pasio so I can create my own someday!
ch0080_00_yamaotoko_en.lsd.ch0080_00_yamaotoko/1903_0601_02_10:
Ha ha ha! That’s right. Men are hopeless
romantics no matter how old they get.
ch0080_00_yamaotoko_en.lsd.ch0080_00_yamaotoko/2861_1031_02_10:
Live on the mountain,
and love the mountain.
ch0080_00_yamaotoko_en.lsd.ch0080_00_yamaotoko/2861_0101_01_10:
Ga ha ha!
Aren’t the mountains great?
ch0080_00_yamaotoko_en.lsd.ch0080_00_yamaotoko/2861_0101_02_10:
The air is clean, and the waters are
crystal clear!
ch0080_00_yamaotoko_en.lsd.ch0080_00_yamaotoko/2861_0101_03_10: And the Pokémon battles are hot! Right?
ch0080_00_yamaotoko_en.lsd.ch0080_00_yamaotoko/2861_0401_01_10: That’s the ticket! Here I go!
ch0080_00_yamaotoko_en.lsd.ch0080_00_yamaotoko/2861_0102_01_10:
Ga ha ha! The mountains are great!
The greenery is beautiful!
The clouds are beautiful!
ch0080_00_yamaotoko_en.lsd.ch0080_00_yamaotoko/2861_0102_02_10: Pokémon battles really are hot, aren’t they.
ch0080_00_yamaotoko_en.lsd.ch0080_00_yamaotoko/2861_0601_01_10: I guess I still have a ways to go!

ch0081_00_enjif_en.lsd.ch0081_00_enjif/2701_1031_01_10:
I have so many friends,
I can’t play with them all!
ch0081_00_enjif_en.lsd.ch0081_00_enjif/2701_1031_02_10:
I’m friends with everybody,
and everybody’s friends
with me!
ch0081_00_enjif_en.lsd.ch0081_00_enjif/2701_1031_03_10:
Pokémon are my friends,
too! I like my friends.
ch0081_00_enjif_en.lsd.ch0081_00_enjif/2701_0701_01_10:
My mommy says that friends are like stars.
You don’t always see them, but you know
they are there.
ch0081_00_enjif_en.lsd.ch0081_00_enjif/2701_0701_02_10:
Did you know you can make friends
with people you play with?
ch0081_00_enjif_en.lsd.ch0081_00_enjif/2701_0701_03_10: It would be cool if I could make 100 friends...
ch0081_00_enjif_en.lsd.ch0081_00_enjif/2701_0701_04_10:
Oh boy! If I really do make 100 friends,
how will I remember everybody’s names?!
ch0081_00_enjif_en.lsd.ch0081_00_enjif/2701_0702_01_10:
If I have a Pokémon battle with 100
different friends starting right now...
ch0081_00_enjif_en.lsd.ch0081_00_enjif/2701_0702_02_10:
I think I’ll be a grown-up before
I get to the last person!
That would take forever!
ch0081_00_enjif_en.lsd.ch0081_00_enjif/2702_1031_03_10:
And their abs are like
ice cube trays!
ch0081_00_enjif_en.lsd.ch0081_00_enjif/2702_0701_01_10:
When I grow up, I wanna be big and strong
like Machamp.
ch0081_00_enjif_en.lsd.ch0081_00_enjif/2702_0701_02_10:
What if I could beat Machamp at
arm wrestling? That would be so cool!
ch0081_00_enjif_en.lsd.ch0081_00_enjif/2702_0701_04_10:
I could even give a Machamp
a piggyback ride!
ch0081_00_enjif_en.lsd.ch0081_00_enjif/2702_0702_01_10:
There’s probably so much cool stuff
I can do once I’m a grown-up.
ch0081_00_enjif_en.lsd.ch0081_00_enjif/2702_0702_02_10:
But...I still want Machamp to pick me up
and hold me even when I’m big.
ch0081_00_enjif_en.lsd.ch0081_00_enjif/2703_1031_01_10:
I like playing
hide-and-seek with
Daddy’s Pidgeot.
ch0081_00_enjif_en.lsd.ch0081_00_enjif/2703_1031_02_10:
No matter how far I run,
Pidgeot catches up!
ch0081_00_enjif_en.lsd.ch0081_00_enjif/2703_1031_03_10:
Whizzing through the sky
is the best!
ch0081_00_enjif_en.lsd.ch0081_00_enjif/2703_0701_01_10:
My daddy’s Pidgeot is the
bestest Pidgeot ever!
ch0081_00_enjif_en.lsd.ch0081_00_enjif/2703_0701_02_10:
Even when I hide really good,
it always finds me right away!
ch0081_00_enjif_en.lsd.ch0081_00_enjif/2703_0701_03_10:
And...and it even lets me ride it
high up where the clouds are!
ch0081_00_enjif_en.lsd.ch0081_00_enjif/2703_0702_01_10: Daddy says Pidgeot spoils me too much.
ch0081_00_enjif_en.lsd.ch0081_00_enjif/2703_0702_02_10:
But it doesn’t matter, ’cause Pidgeot
always takes my side! Tee-hee!
Just don’t tell Daddy... It’s a secret!
ch0081_00_enjif_en.lsd.ch0081_00_enjif/2704_1031_01_10:
You shouldn’t treat people
like they’re little kids.
ch0081_00_enjif_en.lsd.ch0081_00_enjif/2704_1031_02_10:
I’m a kid...but I act just
like a grown-up!
ch0081_00_enjif_en.lsd.ch0081_00_enjif/2704_0701_01_10:
You shouldn’t judge people by
the way they look.
ch0081_00_enjif_en.lsd.ch0081_00_enjif/2704_0701_02_10:
Sure, I may look like a
little preschooler...
ch0081_00_enjif_en.lsd.ch0081_00_enjif/2704_0701_03_10:
but I’m actually... Well, I’m actually
still only four, so I guess I am a
preschooler just like I look...
ch0081_00_enjif_en.lsd.ch0081_00_enjif/2704_0702_01_10:
You know how one day, Pokémon evolve
and change the way they look?
ch0081_00_enjif_en.lsd.ch0081_00_enjif/2704_0702_02_10:
One day, I’m gonna evolve into a
grown-up, just like that.
ch0081_00_enjif_en.lsd.ch0081_00_enjif/2704_0702_03_10:
It’ll be really exciting but also really sad.
I guess that’s life, though, huh.

ch0082_00_kowai_en.lsd.ch0082_00_kowai/2701_0701_01_10:
If you use an attack type that your opponent’s
Pokémon is weak against...
ch0082_00_kowai_en.lsd.ch0082_00_kowai/2701_0701_02_10: You can do a lot of damage!
ch0082_00_kowai_en.lsd.ch0082_00_kowai/2701_0701_03_10:
But I found a type that is stronger than all
other types.
ch0082_00_kowai_en.lsd.ch0082_00_kowai/2701_0701_04_10:
That is the adorable type!
Adorableness is the best! Adorableness is divine!
ch0082_00_kowai_en.lsd.ch0082_00_kowai/2701_0702_01_10:
When I’m observing Pokémon,
sometimes they try to run away.
ch0082_00_kowai_en.lsd.ch0082_00_kowai/2701_0702_02_10: They are so cute how they get shy, too!
ch0082_00_kowai_en.lsd.ch0082_00_kowai/2703_1031_01_10:
Pokémon might walk on
this road!
ch0082_00_kowai_en.lsd.ch0082_00_kowai/2703_1031_02_10:
We should put a garbage
can around here...
ch0082_00_kowai_en.lsd.ch0082_00_kowai/2703_1031_03_10:
I gotta clean this up for
the Pokémon!
ch0082_00_kowai_en.lsd.ch0082_00_kowai/2703_0701_01_10:
Somebody threw garbage on the ground here...
Over there, too!
ch0082_00_kowai_en.lsd.ch0082_00_kowai/2703_0701_02_10:
Pasio is a public space.
It’s for everybody to use.
ch0082_00_kowai_en.lsd.ch0082_00_kowai/2703_0701_03_10:
And then you get these selfish punks who think 
they can litter like it’s their own backyard!
ch0082_00_kowai_en.lsd.ch0082_00_kowai/2703_0702_01_10:
There was so much litter here until a bit ago,
but it’s all clean now...
ch0082_00_kowai_en.lsd.ch0082_00_kowai/2703_0702_02_10:
I guess there are others that care for the
Pokémon and the island as much as I do.
ch0082_00_kowai_en.lsd.ch0082_00_kowai/2702_1031_01_10:
Mercy!
I do declare—I might start
growing ears like Liepard!
ch0082_00_kowai_en.lsd.ch0082_00_kowai/2702_1031_03_10:
And I’m still on my way
up with Liepard!
ch0082_00_kowai_en.lsd.ch0082_00_kowai/2702_0701_01_10:
I’ve heard that if you’re close to someone,
you start taking on the same habits.
ch0082_00_kowai_en.lsd.ch0082_00_kowai/2702_0701_02_10:
Well, I make sure to do my nails and groom 
myself at the same time that Liepard does.
ch0082_00_kowai_en.lsd.ch0082_00_kowai/2702_0701_03_10: And look at me now. I am fabulooouuus!
ch0082_00_kowai_en.lsd.ch0082_00_kowai/2702_0702_02_10: Show me how to be more like you!

ch0083_00_badgirl_en.lsd.ch0083_00_badgirl/2701_1031_02_10:
I’m so booored!
Calling all bored people!
Let’s do something!
ch0083_00_badgirl_en.lsd.ch0083_00_badgirl/2701_1031_03_10:
Come out, come out,
wherever you are!
ch0083_00_badgirl_en.lsd.ch0083_00_badgirl/2701_0701_02_10:
Ooh, a new face! I don’t think
we’ve met before. Probably.
Most likely. Sure!
ch0083_00_badgirl_en.lsd.ch0083_00_badgirl/2701_0701_03_10:
I’m just your average punk girl!
But it seems like fate wanted us to
meet, huh. Welp, nice to meet you!
ch0083_00_badgirl_en.lsd.ch0083_00_badgirl/2701_0701_04_10:
Ooh! You’ve got a Pokémon with
you, right? We should, like, hang out!
I’ve got nothing better to do!
ch0083_00_badgirl_en.lsd.ch0083_00_badgirl/2701_0702_02_10:
Don’t be shy, pip-squeak! C’mon, have a chat. 
We’re all brothers and sisters here!
ch0083_00_badgirl_en.lsd.ch0083_00_badgirl/2702_1031_01_10:
I wonder if my Dusclops
is OK...
ch0083_00_badgirl_en.lsd.ch0083_00_badgirl/2702_1031_02_10:
Who can guess what she’s
thinking... It’s pointless.
ch0083_00_badgirl_en.lsd.ch0083_00_badgirl/2702_1031_03_10:
Does that, like, make me
a nihilist? Whatever.
ch0083_00_badgirl_en.lsd.ch0083_00_badgirl/2702_0701_01_10:
Dusclops doesn’t really make
sense to me. Like, what’s going
on in that head of hers?
ch0083_00_badgirl_en.lsd.ch0083_00_badgirl/2702_0701_02_10:
It feels empty.
Like it’s just a dark void in there.
ch0083_00_badgirl_en.lsd.ch0083_00_badgirl/2702_0701_03_10:
I guess that’s fine, though...
After all, the one with a dark void in her
heart is ME! Ahahaha!
ch0083_00_badgirl_en.lsd.ch0083_00_badgirl/2702_0702_01_10:
What I DO know about this little
enigma is that she loves me.
ch0083_00_badgirl_en.lsd.ch0083_00_badgirl/2702_0702_02_10:
And, well, I love her, too.
And, like, just having that
friendship is enough for us.
ch0083_00_badgirl_en.lsd.ch0083_00_badgirl/2703_1031_01_10:
Facing Pokémon with high
Special Defense is, like, 
a hard-core challenge.
ch0083_00_badgirl_en.lsd.ch0083_00_badgirl/2703_1031_02_10:
Facing Pokémon with low
Special Defense is a total
breeze though.
ch0083_00_badgirl_en.lsd.ch0083_00_badgirl/2703_1031_03_10:
My Gengar and I have 
been hittin’ the books!
ch0083_00_badgirl_en.lsd.ch0083_00_badgirl/2703_0701_01_10:
I, like, really want my Gengar to
win more battles.
ch0083_00_badgirl_en.lsd.ch0083_00_badgirl/2703_0701_02_10:
And, like, when I asked my teacher
about it, she told me Gengar’s got
really high Special Attack and stuff.
ch0083_00_badgirl_en.lsd.ch0083_00_badgirl/2703_0701_03_10:
So, like, against a Pokémon with
low Special Defense, Gengar’ll be
super strong, I guess.
ch0083_00_badgirl_en.lsd.ch0083_00_badgirl/2703_0701_04_10:
I mean, I wish she woulda told me
that sooner, though. Coulda saved
Gengar some trouble.
ch0083_00_badgirl_en.lsd.ch0083_00_badgirl/2703_0702_01_10:
So, like, I think all this studyin’
is startin’ to help us win.
ch0083_00_badgirl_en.lsd.ch0083_00_badgirl/2703_0702_02_10:
Makes me wanna study harder, ya know?
I mean, we must be doing somethin’ right.
ch0083_00_badgirl_en.lsd.ch0083_00_badgirl/2704_1031_01_10:
I wonder if I could, like,
move here to Pasio...
Is that possible?
ch0083_00_badgirl_en.lsd.ch0083_00_badgirl/2704_1031_03_10:
I just wanna stay here and
have fun forever...
ch0083_00_badgirl_en.lsd.ch0083_00_badgirl/2704_0701_01_10:
I got transported here to Pasio before
I really knew what was happening, and
now I’m competing in the PML...
ch0083_00_badgirl_en.lsd.ch0083_00_badgirl/2704_0701_02_10:
but, like, when the tournament’s
over, we’ll all have to go
back home, right?
ch0083_00_badgirl_en.lsd.ch0083_00_badgirl/2704_0701_03_10:
After hangin’ out with all the cool
people here, goin’ explorin’ all the time...
I don’t wanna leave.
ch0083_00_badgirl_en.lsd.ch0083_00_badgirl/2704_0701_04_10:
I’d, like, totally swap sides and be
a host or something... I could welcome
other people to Pasio, ya know?
ch0083_00_badgirl_en.lsd.ch0083_00_badgirl/2704_0702_01_10:
Yep! I made my decision!
Talkin’ to my parents about it
isn’t gonna be very fun, though.
ch0083_00_badgirl_en.lsd.ch0083_00_badgirl/2704_0702_02_10:
But ya know what? This is what I
wanna do! And I’m gonna convince
them I made the right decision!
ch0083_00_badgirl_en.lsd.ch0083_00_badgirl/2704_0702_03_10:
Makin’ my way up in the ranks o’
this tournament should help my
cause, too, yeah?
ch0083_00_badgirl_en.lsd.ch0083_00_badgirl/2751_1031_03_10:
Heh heh...
They like to hang out with
their friends!
ch0083_00_badgirl_en.lsd.ch0083_00_badgirl/2751_1032_01_10:
Did you just wing it?
Wait, this one’s bat-ter...
Sink your teeth into this!
ch0083_00_badgirl_en.lsd.ch0083_00_badgirl/2751_1032_02_10:
What’s the first thing little
Crobat learn at school?
ch0083_00_badgirl_en.lsd.ch0083_00_badgirl/2751_0701_01_10:
What? Not even a giggle?
I doubt you could do any better...
ch0083_00_badgirl_en.lsd.ch0083_00_badgirl/2751_0701_05_10:
Hmm... You’ve got me there!
I dunno! What keeps them going?
ch0083_00_badgirl_en.lsd.ch0083_00_badgirl/2751_0701_07_10:
*sigh*
And I had such high hopes
for that one...
ch0083_00_badgirl_en.lsd.ch0083_00_badgirl/1901_0101_01_10:
Ugh! I just can’t!
It’s driving me crazy!
ch0083_00_badgirl_en.lsd.ch0083_00_badgirl/1901_0101_02_10: HOW is my Pokémon this cute?!
ch0083_00_badgirl_en.lsd.ch0083_00_badgirl/1901_0501_01_10:
My Pokémon is so cute, it hurts...
So pretty and lovely, even when we lose!
ch0083_00_badgirl_en.lsd.ch0083_00_badgirl/1901_0601_01_10:
This Pokémon is gonna ruin me—
I know it... It’s just too darn cute!
I can’t help but spoil it rotten.
ch0083_00_badgirl_en.lsd.ch0083_00_badgirl/1901_0601_02_10:
I know it’s bad to spoil your Pokémon—
my parents spoiled me and look how I
turned out! I just can’t help it...
ch0083_00_badgirl_en.lsd.ch0083_00_badgirl/1902_0101_01_10:
Wh-why are you looking at me like that!
I didn’t do anything!
ch0083_00_badgirl_en.lsd.ch0083_00_badgirl/1902_0501_01_10:
I haven’t done anything bad!
I swear! C’mon, it’s the truth!
ch0083_00_badgirl_en.lsd.ch0083_00_badgirl/1902_0601_01_10:
Sorry... Sometimes I just get this feeling
that, like, everybody around me hates
me and looks down on me.
ch0083_00_badgirl_en.lsd.ch0083_00_badgirl/1902_0601_02_10:
They get scared, and their first reaction
is to challenge me to a Pokémon battle...
ch0083_00_badgirl_en.lsd.ch0083_00_badgirl/1902_0601_03_10:
I think my fashion’s super cute, not scary!
But I guess it gives people the wrong
idea sometimes...

ch0084_00_kenkyuin_en.lsd.ch0084_00_kenkyuin/2701_1031_01_10:
My battle strategy is
different from others...
ch0084_00_kenkyuin_en.lsd.ch0084_00_kenkyuin/2701_1031_02_10:
Whittle them down with
status conditions...
ch0084_00_kenkyuin_en.lsd.ch0084_00_kenkyuin/2701_0701_01_10:
There are numerous methods
for fighting in a Pokémon battle!
ch0084_00_kenkyuin_en.lsd.ch0084_00_kenkyuin/2701_0701_02_10:
Dominating the battlefield with powerful
attacks is one way, but using logic and
strategy can win battles as well.
ch0084_00_kenkyuin_en.lsd.ch0084_00_kenkyuin/2701_0701_03_10:
Pokémon that seem weak at a glance can
actually be very effective in battle by
utilizing status conditions and stat changes!
ch0084_00_kenkyuin_en.lsd.ch0084_00_kenkyuin/2701_0701_04_10:
That’s the strategy my Pokémon and I
often use when we battle.
ch0084_00_kenkyuin_en.lsd.ch0084_00_kenkyuin/2701_0702_01_10:
Even if you don’t have a type
advantage over your opponent,
it’s still possible to triumph!
ch0084_00_kenkyuin_en.lsd.ch0084_00_kenkyuin/2701_0702_02_10:
Pokémon battles aren’t just about
raw strength—they’re about strategy, too.
ch0084_00_kenkyuin_en.lsd.ch0084_00_kenkyuin/2701_0702_03_10:
That’s the focus of my research, actually,
and it’s why I’ve come to participate
in the PML!
ch0084_00_kenkyuin_en.lsd.ch0084_00_kenkyuin/2702_0701_02_10:
They also happen to share an uncanny
resemblance to a Poké Ball! I’ve
always wondered why that is!
ch0084_00_kenkyuin_en.lsd.ch0084_00_kenkyuin/2702_0701_03_10:
In fact, I’ve dedicated my research
to solving that very mystery!
ch0084_00_kenkyuin_en.lsd.ch0084_00_kenkyuin/2702_0702_01_10:
Which came first, the Voltorb
or the Poké Ball...
ch0084_00_kenkyuin_en.lsd.ch0084_00_kenkyuin/2703_1031_01_10:
Pssst. I’ve got some intel.
Want some intel?
ch0084_00_kenkyuin_en.lsd.ch0084_00_kenkyuin/2703_1031_02_10:
It’s really good intel.
Believe me—it’s good.
ch0084_00_kenkyuin_en.lsd.ch0084_00_kenkyuin/2703_1031_03_10:
It’s super top secret intel
about that professor.
ch0084_00_kenkyuin_en.lsd.ch0084_00_kenkyuin/2703_0701_01_10:
Ah, hello there, Trainer. As thanks for
coming over to chat, I’ll give you
some useful information.
ch0084_00_kenkyuin_en.lsd.ch0084_00_kenkyuin/2703_0701_02_10:
Combining certain moves together
can give you an incredible
advantage in battle.
ch0084_00_kenkyuin_en.lsd.ch0084_00_kenkyuin/2703_0701_03_10:
If you try using low-accuracy moves
after using Telekinesis on a Pokémon...
ch0084_00_kenkyuin_en.lsd.ch0084_00_kenkyuin/2703_0701_04_10:
you’ll find that even the low-accuracy
moves will be mysteriously on-target!
ch0084_00_kenkyuin_en.lsd.ch0084_00_kenkyuin/2703_0701_05_10: So? Was that helpful for you?
ch0084_00_kenkyuin_en.lsd.ch0084_00_kenkyuin/2703_0702_01_10:
Try experimenting with different
combinations the next time you battle!
ch0084_00_kenkyuin_en.lsd.ch0084_00_kenkyuin/2703_0702_02_10:
I guarantee your battling will be
even more enjoyable!
ch0084_00_kenkyuin_en.lsd.ch0084_00_kenkyuin/2751_1031_01_10:
There’s way too much stuff
I know nothing about.
ch0084_00_kenkyuin_en.lsd.ch0084_00_kenkyuin/2751_1031_02_10:
It would take forever 
to research it all. There’s 
no way I’m doing that!
ch0084_00_kenkyuin_en.lsd.ch0084_00_kenkyuin/2751_1032_01_10:
Why don’t people ever
use them?!
ch0084_00_kenkyuin_en.lsd.ch0084_00_kenkyuin/2751_1032_02_10:
If you simply TRIED using
one, you’d see how
convenient they are!
ch0084_00_kenkyuin_en.lsd.ch0084_00_kenkyuin/2751_1032_03_10:
I gotta spread the word...
People need to know.
ch0084_00_kenkyuin_en.lsd.ch0084_00_kenkyuin/2751_0701_01_10:
Tell me—why doesn’t anyone bother to read
level-up manuals?! They’re extremely useful!
ch0084_00_kenkyuin_en.lsd.ch0084_00_kenkyuin/2751_0701_02_10:
Huh? What are you talking about?
I’ve never heard of a level-up manual.
ch0084_00_kenkyuin_en.lsd.ch0084_00_kenkyuin/2751_0701_03_10:
If you train using level-up manuals, you can 
gain experience without having to battle!
Convenient, right?
ch0084_00_kenkyuin_en.lsd.ch0084_00_kenkyuin/2751_0701_04_10:
Interesting... So where can I get ahold
of those? Can I buy them somewhere?
ch0084_00_kenkyuin_en.lsd.ch0084_00_kenkyuin/2751_0701_05_10:
They’re available for purchase at the
shop, but you can also receive them as
a log-in bonus sometimes!
ch0084_00_kenkyuin_en.lsd.ch0084_00_kenkyuin/2751_0701_06_10: Really? I might already have some, then...
ch0084_00_kenkyuin_en.lsd.ch0084_00_kenkyuin/2751_0701_07_10:
Why don’t you try checking your bag?
See if you have any level-up manuals
you can train with!
ch0084_00_kenkyuin_en.lsd.ch0084_00_kenkyuin/2861_1031_01_10:
Heehee, it’s time to collect
my precious samples...
ch0084_00_kenkyuin_en.lsd.ch0084_00_kenkyuin/2861_1031_02_10:
Careful not to step on the
samples at your feet.
ch0084_00_kenkyuin_en.lsd.ch0084_00_kenkyuin/2861_1031_03_10:
I’m in the middle of some
significant research here...
ch0084_00_kenkyuin_en.lsd.ch0084_00_kenkyuin/2861_0101_01_10:
Science happens wherever scientists
are present!
ch0084_00_kenkyuin_en.lsd.ch0084_00_kenkyuin/2861_0101_02_10:
Namely, this very place, which contains
things I’d very much like to research!
So do not come any closer!
ch0084_00_kenkyuin_en.lsd.ch0084_00_kenkyuin/2861_0101_03_10:
I’d like to immerse myself in my research
now, so I’ll be eliminating you from
my vicinity. Prepare to battle.
ch0084_00_kenkyuin_en.lsd.ch0084_00_kenkyuin/2861_0401_01_10:
Time to eliminate the overly
enthusiastic youngster!
ch0084_00_kenkyuin_en.lsd.ch0084_00_kenkyuin/2861_0302_01_10: If I’m in your way, I can leave...
ch0084_00_kenkyuin_en.lsd.ch0084_00_kenkyuin/2861_0402_01_10:
It seems you can take a hint.
I like that.
ch0084_00_kenkyuin_en.lsd.ch0084_00_kenkyuin/2861_0102_01_10:
Would you KINDLY refrain from stomping
all over my precious research samples?!
ch0084_00_kenkyuin_en.lsd.ch0084_00_kenkyuin/2861_0102_02_10:
I’d like to immerse myself in my research
now, so I’ll be eliminating you from
my vicinity. Prepare to battle.
ch0084_00_kenkyuin_en.lsd.ch0084_00_kenkyuin/2861_0501_01_10: You DARE take research away from a scientist?!
ch0084_00_kenkyuin_en.lsd.ch0084_00_kenkyuin/2861_0601_01_10:
Arrrgh! I said don’t step there!
You’ll ruin my precious research samples!
ch0084_00_kenkyuin_en.lsd.ch0084_00_kenkyuin/2861_0601_02_10:
I mean it! Don’t come anywhere near
my vicinity!

ch0085_00_hopef_en.lsd.ch0085_00_hopef/2701_1031_01_10:
Power is important,
but support is, too, right?
ch0085_00_hopef_en.lsd.ch0085_00_hopef/2701_1031_02_10:
I’m not alone.
I’m going to do my
best with my friends.
ch0085_00_hopef_en.lsd.ch0085_00_hopef/2701_1031_03_10:
I want to live up to
everybody’s expectations.
ch0085_00_hopef_en.lsd.ch0085_00_hopef/2701_0701_01_10:
My Pokémon and I specialize 
in healing and raising stats!
ch0085_00_hopef_en.lsd.ch0085_00_hopef/2701_0701_02_10:
I’m not really good at attacking, 
but leave support to me!
ch0085_00_hopef_en.lsd.ch0085_00_hopef/2701_0701_03_10:
I always come through in the end! 
You can count on me!
ch0085_00_hopef_en.lsd.ch0085_00_hopef/2701_0702_01_10: If things aren’t going well, just remember me...
ch0085_00_hopef_en.lsd.ch0085_00_hopef/2701_0702_02_10:
because I’ll always be in your heart!
Ha ha! Just kidding!
ch0085_00_hopef_en.lsd.ch0085_00_hopef/2702_1031_01_10:
Keep your hopes and
dreams in your heart!
ch0085_00_hopef_en.lsd.ch0085_00_hopef/2702_1031_02_10:
Let them shine bright like a
rising star!
ch0085_00_hopef_en.lsd.ch0085_00_hopef/2702_1031_03_10:
You can keep going!
Don’t look back!
ch0085_00_hopef_en.lsd.ch0085_00_hopef/2702_0701_01_10:
I know the kind of Trainer that I ultimately 
want to become...
ch0085_00_hopef_en.lsd.ch0085_00_hopef/2702_0701_02_10:
and even if my goal seems impossible, 
I’ll never give up hope!
ch0085_00_hopef_en.lsd.ch0085_00_hopef/2702_0701_03_10: I’ll reach my dreams and surpass them!
ch0085_00_hopef_en.lsd.ch0085_00_hopef/2702_0701_04_10: That will be my life’s work!
ch0085_00_hopef_en.lsd.ch0085_00_hopef/2702_0702_01_10: If you ever lose sight of your dreams...
ch0085_00_hopef_en.lsd.ch0085_00_hopef/2702_0702_02_10:
just remember the person you wanted to be.
Envision the future self you aspired to become.
ch0085_00_hopef_en.lsd.ch0085_00_hopef/2703_1031_01_10:
I hope I can make a lot of
new friends on Pasio, too!
ch0085_00_hopef_en.lsd.ch0085_00_hopef/2703_1031_02_10:
New friends just make us
betta, y’know?
ch0085_00_hopef_en.lsd.ch0085_00_hopef/2703_1031_03_10:
Havin’ a rival is always
wicked cool, too!
ch0085_00_hopef_en.lsd.ch0085_00_hopef/2703_0701_01_10: Ya gotta watch your buddies’ backs!
ch0085_00_hopef_en.lsd.ch0085_00_hopef/2703_0701_02_10:
Whetha it’s with a Pokémon or anotha Trainer,
the powa of bonds is wicked strong.
ch0085_00_hopef_en.lsd.ch0085_00_hopef/2703_0701_03_10:
I mean, when yiz pull off a sync move?
Aw, just fugget about it!
ch0085_00_hopef_en.lsd.ch0085_00_hopef/2703_0701_04_10: And more importantly, it’s just wicked fun!
ch0085_00_hopef_en.lsd.ch0085_00_hopef/2703_0702_01_10: Yiz and me? Yeah, we’re already friends!
ch0085_00_hopef_en.lsd.ch0085_00_hopef/2703_0702_02_10:
Ah, but yiz my rival, too.
Don’t yiz fugget that!
ch0085_00_hopef_en.lsd.ch0085_00_hopef/2704_1031_01_10:
I can do this!
We can do this!
ch0085_00_hopef_en.lsd.ch0085_00_hopef/2704_1031_02_10:
I just can’t get enough of
Pokémon battles!
ch0085_00_hopef_en.lsd.ch0085_00_hopef/2704_0701_01_10:
I lost a battle the other day.
Man, that was frustrating!
ch0085_00_hopef_en.lsd.ch0085_00_hopef/2704_0701_02_10:
So I thought about it, trying to figure out what
went wrong.
ch0085_00_hopef_en.lsd.ch0085_00_hopef/2704_0701_03_10:
But I couldn’t figure it out. Was it our
coordination? Maybe my Pokémon and I are
a bad match...
ch0085_00_hopef_en.lsd.ch0085_00_hopef/2704_0701_04_10:
The other Trainer probably just did more
research than I did...
ch0085_00_hopef_en.lsd.ch0085_00_hopef/2704_0701_05_10:
There are a lot more things I don’t understand,
but if I keep at it, it’ll work itself out!
I’m sure of it!
ch0085_00_hopef_en.lsd.ch0085_00_hopef/2704_0702_01_10:
I’m sure there are plenty of questions that can’t
be answered no matter how hard you think.
ch0085_00_hopef_en.lsd.ch0085_00_hopef/2704_0702_02_10:
But not letting that stop you is the sign of
true strength!
ch0085_00_hopef_en.lsd.ch0085_00_hopef/2751_1031_01_10:
I want to be an
Ace Trainer, just like you!
ch0085_00_hopef_en.lsd.ch0085_00_hopef/2751_1031_02_10:
One of these days, I hope
I can be as cool as you!
ch0085_00_hopef_en.lsd.ch0085_00_hopef/2751_1031_03_10:
Well, it’ll probably take a
long time, but...
ch0085_00_hopef_en.lsd.ch0085_00_hopef/2751_1032_01_10:
Well, that’s a lot of
pressure you’re putting
on me. Ha ha!
ch0085_00_hopef_en.lsd.ch0085_00_hopef/2751_1032_02_10:
Oh, your gaze, brimming
with expectations...
ch0085_00_hopef_en.lsd.ch0085_00_hopef/2751_1032_03_10:
Yes! Look at me more!
Tell me how cool I am!
ch0085_00_hopef_en.lsd.ch0085_00_hopef/2751_0701_01_10:
What should I do when I have more than
one opponent?
ch0085_00_hopef_en.lsd.ch0085_00_hopef/2751_0701_02_10: There were so many, I got dizzy. So I ran away!
ch0085_00_hopef_en.lsd.ch0085_00_hopef/2751_0701_03_10:
If you calm down and scope out your opponents,
you’ll find the right target.
ch0085_00_hopef_en.lsd.ch0085_00_hopef/2751_0701_04_10:
But but but...
How will I know which Pokémon to target?
ch0085_00_hopef_en.lsd.ch0085_00_hopef/2751_0701_05_10: Think of the type of move you are using.
ch0085_00_hopef_en.lsd.ch0085_00_hopef/2751_0701_06_10:
Oh, right! I have to pick the Pokémon that my
own Pokémon will have the advantage over!
ch0085_00_hopef_en.lsd.ch0085_00_hopef/2751_0701_07_10:
Aw, man, I have such a way to go!
I want to be like you faster!
ch0085_00_hopef_en.lsd.ch0085_00_hopef/2751_0701_08_10:
Uh, well... Keep at it!
Remember, you can always ask me anything!
ch0085_00_hopef_en.lsd.ch0085_00_hopef/1901_0101_01_10:
Well, well, well!
Do you really think you can beat me?
ch0085_00_hopef_en.lsd.ch0085_00_hopef/1901_0501_01_10:
Well, well, well!
Wait... I lost?
ch0085_00_hopef_en.lsd.ch0085_00_hopef/1901_0601_01_10:
Well, well, well...
You’re pretty good!
ch0085_00_hopef_en.lsd.ch0085_00_hopef/1901_0601_02_10: Just kidding! I figured you would be this strong!
ch0085_00_hopef_en.lsd.ch0085_00_hopef/1901_0601_03_10:
But I couldn’t run away, could I? That would be
really uncool!
ch0085_00_hopef_en.lsd.ch0085_00_hopef/1903_0101_01_10: Oh gosh! I am so good, it’s becoming a burden!
ch0085_00_hopef_en.lsd.ch0085_00_hopef/1903_0601_01_10: Hold on! You’re way too strong!
ch0085_00_hopef_en.lsd.ch0085_00_hopef/1903_0601_02_10:
You’re probably stronger than the Elite Four!
You might even win the PML!
ch0085_00_hopef_en.lsd.ch0085_00_hopef/1903_0601_03_10: Ha ha! Don’t worry—I’m not trying to hustle ya!

ch0086_00_campm_en.lsd.ch0086_00_campm/2701_1031_02_10:
I’m totally ready to
go off and explore...
ch0086_00_campm_en.lsd.ch0086_00_campm/2701_1031_03_10:
but there’s no one around
to look me in the eye.
ch0086_00_campm_en.lsd.ch0086_00_campm/2701_0701_01_10:
If you’re eager to battle but you can’t
seem to find an opponent...
ch0086_00_campm_en.lsd.ch0086_00_campm/2701_0701_02_10:
that’s when you should dash over to the
Pokémon Center and talk to Trista!
ch0086_00_campm_en.lsd.ch0086_00_campm/2701_0701_03_10:
She’ll help you reach out to your friends
so you can go out exploring together!
ch0086_00_campm_en.lsd.ch0086_00_campm/2701_0702_01_10:
If you can’t seem to meet eyes with any
other Trainers, you should go and talk to
Trista at the reception desk!
ch0086_00_campm_en.lsd.ch0086_00_campm/2701_0702_02_10: She’ll always be there to look you in the eye!
ch0086_00_campm_en.lsd.ch0086_00_campm/2702_1031_01_10:
Chopping wood is a cinch
with its two giant pincers.
ch0086_00_campm_en.lsd.ch0086_00_campm/2702_1031_03_10:
Perfectly straight posture!
What I’d give for that...
ch0086_00_campm_en.lsd.ch0086_00_campm/2702_0701_01_10:
My partner here is the Stag Beetle
Pokémon, Pinsir!
ch0086_00_campm_en.lsd.ch0086_00_campm/2702_0701_02_10:
Pinsir’s the perfect Pokémon for a camper
like me! He can chop a piece of firewood
in half lickety-split!
ch0086_00_campm_en.lsd.ch0086_00_campm/2702_0701_03_10:
His superflat back is the best part
about him, though! It sure makes riding
Pinsir easier than, say, Heracross!
ch0086_00_campm_en.lsd.ch0086_00_campm/2702_0702_01_10:
Then again, Heracross’s horn is a lot
easier to grab on to.
ch0086_00_campm_en.lsd.ch0086_00_campm/2703_1031_01_10:
There are as many moves
out there as there are
Pokémon types!
ch0086_00_campm_en.lsd.ch0086_00_campm/2703_1031_02_10:
There are ones that make
your Pokémon rock solid!
ch0086_00_campm_en.lsd.ch0086_00_campm/2703_1031_03_10:
And the more you use
them, the stronger your
Pokémon’s defenses get!
ch0086_00_campm_en.lsd.ch0086_00_campm/2703_0701_01_10:
There are all kinds of different moves
that your Pokémon can use!
ch0086_00_campm_en.lsd.ch0086_00_campm/2703_0701_02_10:
For example, there are moves 
that can increase your Pokémon’s defenses 
or reduce your opponent’s! Isn’t that cool?!
ch0086_00_campm_en.lsd.ch0086_00_campm/2703_0701_03_10:
If you use a move like that two or three times
or more, it’ll be that much more effective!
ch0086_00_campm_en.lsd.ch0086_00_campm/2703_0701_04_10:
Keep using it, and your Pokémon’ll be
rock solid for sure!
ch0086_00_campm_en.lsd.ch0086_00_campm/2703_0702_01_10:
Wait... What if my Pokémon could learn a move
that makes my opponent infatuated with me?!
ch0086_00_campm_en.lsd.ch0086_00_campm/2703_0702_02_10:
That...that would make me super popular!
I wonder if moves can actually work
on people, not just Pokémon...
ch0086_00_campm_en.lsd.ch0086_00_campm/2704_1031_01_10:
Maybe I should listen to
the radio today, too...
ch0086_00_campm_en.lsd.ch0086_00_campm/2704_1031_02_10:
Gathering data is one of
the basics of being a
good Trainer, after all.
ch0086_00_campm_en.lsd.ch0086_00_campm/2704_1031_03_10:
I just learned that male
and female Pokémon can
look really different.
ch0086_00_campm_en.lsd.ch0086_00_campm/2704_0701_01_10:
Battling is a surefire way to make your
Pokémon stronger, but gathering data is
really important, too.
ch0086_00_campm_en.lsd.ch0086_00_campm/2704_0701_02_10:
I’ve started listening to the radio to get my
information. I bet I know way more about
Pokémon now!
ch0086_00_campm_en.lsd.ch0086_00_campm/2704_0701_03_10:
Take Magikarp, for example! Did you know
that males have yellow whiskers and
females have white?
ch0086_00_campm_en.lsd.ch0086_00_campm/2704_0701_04_10:
Whether or not that knowledge helps you
make your Pokémon stronger all depends
on you!
ch0086_00_campm_en.lsd.ch0086_00_campm/2704_0702_01_10:
Knowledge is a greater weapon than
raw strength.
ch0086_00_campm_en.lsd.ch0086_00_campm/2704_0702_02_10:
Knowing that Magikarp get super strong when
they evolve into Gyarados makes it easier
to persevere through training one.
ch0086_00_campm_en.lsd.ch0086_00_campm/2751_1031_01_10:
I only choose the most
beautiful Pokémon.
They suit me the best!
ch0086_00_campm_en.lsd.ch0086_00_campm/2751_1031_02_10:
But what can I do to get
closer to my Pokémon?
What’ll make him like me?
ch0086_00_campm_en.lsd.ch0086_00_campm/2751_1031_03_10:
Maybe I need to be more
beautiful! And confident!
ch0086_00_campm_en.lsd.ch0086_00_campm/2751_1032_01_10:
You look pretty confident
to me already, kid!
ch0086_00_campm_en.lsd.ch0086_00_campm/2751_1032_02_10:
Shucks, I’m wonderin’ the
same thing! How do I get
MY Pokémon to like me?
ch0086_00_campm_en.lsd.ch0086_00_campm/2751_0701_01_10:
Aha! Maybe it’s all about showing affection!
I should try petting and grooming my Weepinbell
more often. That oughta do the trick!
ch0086_00_campm_en.lsd.ch0086_00_campm/2751_0701_02_10:
Ohoho! You may be right, m’boy!
My Onix is massive, though. Pettin’ and
groomin’ all that stone is no easy feat...
ch0086_00_campm_en.lsd.ch0086_00_campm/2751_0701_03_10:
Hmm... Well then, how else are you gonna
get your Pokémon to like you?
ch0086_00_campm_en.lsd.ch0086_00_campm/2751_0701_04_10:
Well, do you think just bein’ a swell person
in general could be enough to get a Pokémon
to warm up to you? Seems plausible.
ch0086_00_campm_en.lsd.ch0086_00_campm/2751_0701_05_10:
Yeah! I think you’re onto something!
If we want our Pokémon to like us more,
we’ve gotta work on ourselves first, huh!
ch0086_00_campm_en.lsd.ch0086_00_campm/2751_0701_06_10:
Hmm... Think getting squeaky clean in the bath
will help? I should fix my hair, too... Maybe I
could get some fashion advice from a Sylveon!
ch0086_00_campm_en.lsd.ch0086_00_campm/2751_0701_07_10:
Hey, you shouldn’t mention other Pokémon
around your Weepinbell. He’ll get jealous,
and that kinda defeats the purpose!
ch0086_00_campm_en.lsd.ch0086_00_campm/2751_0701_08_10:
Really? Did I make you jealous, Weepinbell?
I’m sorry, buddy. From now on, it’ll just be
you and me!
ch0086_00_campm_en.lsd.ch0086_00_campm/1901_0101_01_10:
I gotta look cool so I can show off
to my girlfriend!
ch0086_00_campm_en.lsd.ch0086_00_campm/1901_0101_02_10: Do me a favor and battle with me!
ch0086_00_campm_en.lsd.ch0086_00_campm/1901_0601_01_10:
I can be pretty stylish when I’m putting up
a tent, but that’s basically the only
cool thing about me...
ch0086_00_campm_en.lsd.ch0086_00_campm/1901_0601_02_10:
I should just give up... Yep.
I’m gonna spend the rest of my life boasting
about how well I can put up a tent...
ch0086_00_campm_en.lsd.ch0086_00_campm/1903_0101_01_10:
When it comes to camping, safety comes first!
Same goes for Pokémon battling!
ch0086_00_campm_en.lsd.ch0086_00_campm/1903_0501_01_10: I thought it was safe to say I’d beat you...
ch0086_00_campm_en.lsd.ch0086_00_campm/1903_0601_01_10:
You know, you should always be prepared
for the unexpected!
ch0086_00_campm_en.lsd.ch0086_00_campm/1903_0601_02_10:
Then again, if you’re always prepared for the
unexpected, is it really unexpected anymore?

ch0092_00_iris_en.lsd.ch0092_00_iris/0101_0701_01_10:
There you are, [Name:PlayerNickname ]!
I’ve been craning my neck like a
Haxorus trying to find you around here!
ch0092_00_iris_en.lsd.ch0092_00_iris/0101_0701_02_10:
I’m glad I got to meet up with
you today! We should go do
some exploring!
ch0092_00_iris_en.lsd.ch0092_00_iris/0601_0701_01_10:
I grew up in a mysterious place called
the Village of Dragons.
ch0092_00_iris_en.lsd.ch0092_00_iris/0601_0701_02_10:
It’s a really awesome place where people
and Dragon-type Pokémon live together
in harmony!
ch0092_00_iris_en.lsd.ch0092_00_iris/0601_0701_03_10:
Haxorus was basically my neighborhood
buddy when we were growing up.
Nowadays, we might as well be family!
ch0092_00_iris_en.lsd.ch0092_00_iris/0601_0701_04_10:
Hmm... If we were really family, would
that make Haxorus my big sister? Weird,
since I’m the one always taking care of her.
ch0092_00_iris_en.lsd.ch0092_00_iris/0601_0702_01_10:
Before my Haxorus evolved, she was
smaller than I am! Can you believe that?
ch0092_00_iris_en.lsd.ch0092_00_iris/0601_0702_02_10:
She was so itty-bitty.
She used to play inside my hair
everywhere we went!
ch0092_00_iris_en.lsd.ch0092_00_iris/0602_0701_01_10: What do you think it means to be an adult?
ch0092_00_iris_en.lsd.ch0092_00_iris/0602_0701_02_10:
Like...dressing fancy? And caring about
important stuff? Using big, fancy words?
ch0092_00_iris_en.lsd.ch0092_00_iris/0602_0701_03_10:
I know I can’t be a kid forever,
and I’ve gotta grow up at some point.
ch0092_00_iris_en.lsd.ch0092_00_iris/0602_0701_04_10:
I’ve been kinda copying what other
adults do recently, but I don’t
really get it.
ch0092_00_iris_en.lsd.ch0092_00_iris/0602_0701_05_10:
You know what? I don’t wanna change!
I’m just gonna keep acting like my
normal kid self!
ch0092_00_iris_en.lsd.ch0092_00_iris/0602_0702_01_10:
I asked old Grandpa what it means to
be an adult, and he said nobody knows!
ch0092_00_iris_en.lsd.ch0092_00_iris/0602_0702_02_10:
If nobody knows, how’s a kid like me
supposed to know?!
ch0092_00_iris_en.lsd.ch0092_00_iris/0603_0701_01_10:
I’m Iris!
The girl who knows the hearts of dragons!
ch0092_00_iris_en.lsd.ch0092_00_iris/0603_0701_02_10:
Tee-hee! That almost sounds like it
came from one of those TV specials, huh?
ch0092_00_iris_en.lsd.ch0092_00_iris/0603_0701_03_10:
“Mystic Discoveries: The Girl
Who Was Raised by Dragon Pokémon”
kinda has a nice ring to it!
ch0092_00_iris_en.lsd.ch0092_00_iris/0603_0702_01_10:
If I ever do get put on TV, I wanna
show the world that Dragon-type
Pokémon aren’t really scary.
ch0092_00_iris_en.lsd.ch0092_00_iris/0603_0702_02_10:
Sometimes they get moody and angry—
but so do people!
ch0092_00_iris_en.lsd.ch0092_00_iris/0604_0701_01_10:
Isn’t my hairstyle super cool?!
People always tell me it’s the
first thing they notice!
ch0092_00_iris_en.lsd.ch0092_00_iris/0604_0701_02_10:
My hair’s so big and fluffy that I can
actually store things in there if I want!
ch0092_00_iris_en.lsd.ch0092_00_iris/0604_0701_03_10:
This one time, Haxorus hid some Berries
in it, and when we took them out later, they
looked exactly the same! Weird, right?!
ch0092_00_iris_en.lsd.ch0092_00_iris/0604_0702_01_10:
I always take really good care
of my hair!
ch0092_00_iris_en.lsd.ch0092_00_iris/0604_0702_02_10: I mean, it’s my trademark, after all!
ch0092_00_iris_en.lsd.ch0092_00_iris/0605_0701_01_10:
Whenever I’m walking around downtown
Pasio, I can’t help fidgeting and
looking around everywhere...
ch0092_00_iris_en.lsd.ch0092_00_iris/0605_0701_02_10:
Where I grew up, my only playgrounds
were forests and waterfalls. Being in the
big city makes me so nervous!
ch0092_00_iris_en.lsd.ch0092_00_iris/0605_0701_04_10:
You should come play with us sometime,
[Name:PlayerNickname ]! I’ll teach you some
cool tips for playing tag!
ch0092_00_iris_en.lsd.ch0092_00_iris/0605_0702_01_10:
It’s kinda hard to compare the big city
to somewhere full of nature—
they’re way too different!
ch0092_00_iris_en.lsd.ch0092_00_iris/0605_0702_02_10:
When I’m surrounded by nature, it makes
me think of my hometown, the Village of
Dragons. It’s nice and nostalgic!
ch0092_00_iris_en.lsd.ch0092_00_iris/1701_0701_01_10:
Here, take this!
I’m pretty sure it’ll be useful!
ch0092_00_iris_en.lsd.ch0092_00_iris/1701_0701_02_10:
Haxorus said it might be dangerous
if I step on it, so she brought it over!
ch0092_00_iris_en.lsd.ch0092_00_iris/1701_0702_01_10:
Haxorus looks super big and strong,
but she’s actually really gentle
and well behaved!
ch0092_00_iris_en.lsd.ch0092_00_iris/1701_0702_02_10:
Then again...she can get pretty scary
when she’s mad!
ch0092_00_iris_en.lsd.ch0092_00_iris/2501_0701_01_10:
I’ve been around Pokémon my whole life,
and battling has always been like
second nature to me.
ch0092_00_iris_en.lsd.ch0092_00_iris/2501_0701_02_10:
Before I knew it, I’d gotten to be
super strong!
ch0092_00_iris_en.lsd.ch0092_00_iris/2501_0701_03_10:
Getting to battle all the time used to seem
super normal to me, but it’s actually
kinda awesome!
ch0092_00_iris_en.lsd.ch0092_00_iris/2501_0701_04_10:
And also getting to meet and become
friends with so many cool people!
That part is super awesome, too!
ch0092_00_iris_en.lsd.ch0092_00_iris/2501_0701_05_10:
Let’s aim to be the best of the best
Pokémon Trainers out there!
ch0092_00_iris_en.lsd.ch0092_00_iris/2501_0702_01_10:
I feel like together we can both grow
sooo much stronger!
ch0092_00_iris_en.lsd.ch0092_00_iris/2501_0702_02_10:
Imagine what the view would look like!
Standing proudly at the top—
the greatest Pokémon Trainer ever!
ch0092_00_iris_en.lsd.ch0092_00_iris/2511_0701_01_10:
Grandpa Drayden always says that
people and Pokémon have to trust and
depend on each other to live.
ch0092_00_iris_en.lsd.ch0092_00_iris/2511_0701_02_10:
That’s why I battle together with my
Pokémon! So that we can deepen our
trust and friendship!
ch0092_00_iris_en.lsd.ch0092_00_iris/2511_0701_03_10:
In a Pokémon battle, the Trainer’s heart and
the Pokémon’s heart become one!
ch0092_00_iris_en.lsd.ch0092_00_iris/2511_0701_04_10:
If we give it our all, it doesn’t
matter if we win or lose!
We’re still smiling in the end!
ch0092_00_iris_en.lsd.ch0092_00_iris/2511_0702_01_10:
Pokémon have an awesome power
inside of them that we, as people, don’t.
ch0092_00_iris_en.lsd.ch0092_00_iris/2511_0702_02_10:
But you know what? The fact that we get to
