become such good friends with such awesome
Pokémon is also super cool!
ch0092_00_iris_en.lsd.ch0092_00_iris/2511_0702_03_10:
Don’t you think so?! I gotta keep
battling so I can learn everything there is
to know about Pokémon and Trainers!
ch0092_00_iris_en.lsd.ch0092_00_iris/3001_0701_01_10:
Good morning!
Gotta make sure you’re dressed well!
ch0092_00_iris_en.lsd.ch0092_00_iris/3002_0701_01_10:
I’m gonna let my Pokémon do some sunbathing
this morning, while the sun’s nice and bright!
ch0092_00_iris_en.lsd.ch0092_00_iris/3003_0701_01_10:
Hi! Kids shouldn’t be afraid of the outdoors.
Come on—let’s go out and play!
ch0092_00_iris_en.lsd.ch0092_00_iris/3004_0701_01_10:
It’s so bright outside! Makes me want to lie
down and soak up some sun with my Pokémon!
ch0092_00_iris_en.lsd.ch0092_00_iris/3005_0701_01_10:
Evening! Ready for more fun?
Back at the Village of Dragons, lots of
Pokémon become more active at night!
ch0092_00_iris_en.lsd.ch0092_00_iris/3006_0701_01_10:
My granddad always said that
children who sleep well grow well!

ch0093_00_staff_center_en.lsd.ch0093_00_staff_center/3201_0701_01_10:
Welcome!
I can help you check your current
area information right here.
ch0093_00_staff_center_en.lsd.ch0093_00_staff_center/3201_0701_02_10: We hope to see you again!
ch0093_00_staff_center_en.lsd.ch0093_00_staff_center/3202_0701_01_10:
Welcome!
You’d like to check your current area info, right?
I can do that for you!
ch0093_00_staff_center_en.lsd.ch0093_00_staff_center/3202_0701_02_10: We look forward to your next visit!
ch0093_00_staff_center_en.lsd.ch0093_00_staff_center/3203_0701_01_10:
Welcome!
Feel free to check your current area information
right over here.
ch0093_00_staff_center_en.lsd.ch0093_00_staff_center/3203_0701_02_10: We hope to serve you again!
ch0093_00_staff_center_en.lsd.ch0093_00_staff_center/3301_1031_01_10:
Does anyone want to
go exploring?
ch0093_00_staff_center_en.lsd.ch0093_00_staff_center/3301_1031_02_10:
Today is a perfect day
for an adventure.
ch0093_00_staff_center_en.lsd.ch0093_00_staff_center/3301_1031_03_10:
Maybe I should do some
exploring, too...
ch0093_00_staff_center_en.lsd.ch0093_00_staff_center/3301_1031_05_10:
When it comes to area
info, I’m your girl!
ch0093_00_staff_center_en.lsd.ch0093_00_staff_center/3301_1031_07_10:
Aw... I wish I had a
partner Pokémon, too...
ch0093_00_staff_center_en.lsd.ch0093_00_staff_center/3401_0701_01_10:
Seems like you’re achieving great things these
days! I hear there’s someone who wants to
meet you!
ch0093_00_staff_center_en.lsd.ch0093_00_staff_center/3402_0701_01_10: I’ve got new info for you—hot off the presses!
ch0093_00_staff_center_en.lsd.ch0093_00_staff_center/3501_1031_01_10:
I’ve got to share this
info, and fast!
ch0093_00_staff_center_en.lsd.ch0093_00_staff_center/3501_1031_02_10:
The faster this info gets
out, the better...

ch0094_00_genji_en.lsd.ch0094_00_genji/0101_0701_01_10:
Good to see you, [Name:PlayerNickname ]!
I knew you were a Trainer I could count on.
ch0094_00_genji_en.lsd.ch0094_00_genji/0101_0701_02_10:
I can’t wait to see how you navigate your
Pokémon through Pasio.
ch0094_00_genji_en.lsd.ch0094_00_genji/0601_0701_01_10:
Just how many years has it been since I became
one of the Hoenn League’s Elite Four...
ch0094_00_genji_en.lsd.ch0094_00_genji/0601_0701_02_10:
I’ve battled so many Trainers like you over the
years—young and full of hope with a deep love
for their Pokémon.
ch0094_00_genji_en.lsd.ch0094_00_genji/0601_0701_03_10:
What always gets me fired up the most is when
I bring out my ace card—Salamence!
ch0094_00_genji_en.lsd.ch0094_00_genji/0601_0701_04_10:
Everything that I am as a Trainer 
I’ve poured into my Salamence.
ch0094_00_genji_en.lsd.ch0094_00_genji/0601_0701_05_10:
When a Trainer is strong enough to make me
bring out ol’ Salamence, it makes my heart
pound with excitement!
ch0094_00_genji_en.lsd.ch0094_00_genji/0601_0702_01_10:
Salamence and I have been training together
since he was just a Bagon.
ch0094_00_genji_en.lsd.ch0094_00_genji/0601_0702_02_10:
Since we’ve been together for so long, 
we know a lot about each other, 
such as our favorite colors of Pokéblocks.
ch0094_00_genji_en.lsd.ch0094_00_genji/0602_0701_01_10: Kids catching Pokémon are so adorable.
ch0094_00_genji_en.lsd.ch0094_00_genji/0602_0701_02_10:
I saw one recently that was so cute, 
I decided to say something. But that kid 
was scared of me and ran away.
ch0094_00_genji_en.lsd.ch0094_00_genji/0602_0701_03_10:
Briney has mentioned it from time to time,
but do I really have such a scary face?
ch0094_00_genji_en.lsd.ch0094_00_genji/0602_0702_01_10:
Maybe I should practice making nice faces
sometimes so that adorable kids don’t hate me.
ch0094_00_genji_en.lsd.ch0094_00_genji/0602_0702_02_10:
Hmmm, let’s see... Like this? No, no, no...
Like this, right?
ch0094_00_genji_en.lsd.ch0094_00_genji/0602_0702_03_10:
This is tough. How can I get a happy, smiling
face like yours?
ch0094_00_genji_en.lsd.ch0094_00_genji/0603_0701_01_10: A long, long time ago, a Pokémon saved my life.
ch0094_00_genji_en.lsd.ch0094_00_genji/0603_0701_02_10:
I fell overboard and was about to drown when
a wild Dragonite rescued me.
ch0094_00_genji_en.lsd.ch0094_00_genji/0603_0701_03_10:
I felt I needed to repay that majestic Pokémon in
some way, so I vowed to become a Trainer.
ch0094_00_genji_en.lsd.ch0094_00_genji/0603_0701_04_10:
Spending my youth with a Dratini I encountered
after that is one of my treasured memories.
ch0094_00_genji_en.lsd.ch0094_00_genji/0603_0702_01_10:
It’s the relationships between Pokémon, people,
and nature that make our world what it is.
ch0094_00_genji_en.lsd.ch0094_00_genji/0603_0702_02_10:
For the Dragonite that taught me that, I’ll keep
on being one of the Hoenn Elite Four for as long
as I can.
ch0094_00_genji_en.lsd.ch0094_00_genji/0604_0701_01_10:
I’ve got an old friend in Hoenn.
The way he handles a rudder is quite impressive.
ch0094_00_genji_en.lsd.ch0094_00_genji/0604_0701_02_10:
Why, I can still remember all the times we set
sail together like it was yesterday.
ch0094_00_genji_en.lsd.ch0094_00_genji/0604_0701_03_10:
Cherish your friends. Someday, the time you
spent together will become wonderful memories.
ch0094_00_genji_en.lsd.ch0094_00_genji/0604_0702_01_10: I wonder how ol’ Briney and Peeko are doing.
ch0094_00_genji_en.lsd.ch0094_00_genji/0604_0702_02_10:
In our day, Briney and Drake were names that
echoed throughout our hometown.
ch0094_00_genji_en.lsd.ch0094_00_genji/0605_0701_01_10:
It’s good to set ambitious goals for yourself,
[Name:PlayerNickname ], but don’t overdo it.
ch0094_00_genji_en.lsd.ch0094_00_genji/0605_0701_02_10:
A goal can be like a massive wave, and getting
over the top can seem like an impossible task.
ch0094_00_genji_en.lsd.ch0094_00_genji/0605_0701_03_10:
Just keep getting over as many small waves as
you can. The experience will be of great value
to you.
ch0094_00_genji_en.lsd.ch0094_00_genji/0605_0702_01_10:
I sincerely hope that the path you’re on is the
right one.
ch0094_00_genji_en.lsd.ch0094_00_genji/0605_0702_02_10:
It’s up to us adults to serve as a lighthouse,
guiding you as you make your way.
You can always count on me.
ch0094_00_genji_en.lsd.ch0094_00_genji/1701_0701_02_10:
I’ve got a present for you.
Use it to improve your skills as a Trainer.
ch0094_00_genji_en.lsd.ch0094_00_genji/1701_0702_01_10: A ship at sea will be buffeted by the waves.
ch0094_00_genji_en.lsd.ch0094_00_genji/1701_0702_02_10: And those waves have brought that gift to you.
ch0094_00_genji_en.lsd.ch0094_00_genji/2501_0701_01_10:
Back when Briney and I were trying to be the
greatest sailors in the world, we used to spend
a lot of time talking.
ch0094_00_genji_en.lsd.ch0094_00_genji/2501_0701_02_10:
We talked about all kinds of things and sure did
have a lot of fun.
ch0094_00_genji_en.lsd.ch0094_00_genji/2501_0701_04_10: Hey, don’t give me that suspicious look!
ch0094_00_genji_en.lsd.ch0094_00_genji/2501_0702_01_10:
I talk about all kinds of things, but it was really
just about ships, like arguing over which one
we should set sail on next.
ch0094_00_genji_en.lsd.ch0094_00_genji/2501_0702_02_10:
Yes, Briney and I have been crazy about ships
since way back.
ch0094_00_genji_en.lsd.ch0094_00_genji/2501_0702_03_10: And now I feel the same way about Pokémon.
ch0094_00_genji_en.lsd.ch0094_00_genji/2501_0702_04_10:
What do you think? Do you want to have some
fun talking Pokémon with me?
ch0094_00_genji_en.lsd.ch0094_00_genji/2511_0701_01_10:
Let me tell you, [Name:PlayerNickname ],
Hoenn is a great place—full of beautiful nature
and, more than anything, a nice place to live.
ch0094_00_genji_en.lsd.ch0094_00_genji/2511_0701_02_10:
When you’ve gotten a little stronger,
we should go visit it at the same time.
ch0094_00_genji_en.lsd.ch0094_00_genji/2511_0701_03_10:
I know you’re a Trainer I can count on,
so it shouldn’t be too far off in the future!
ch0094_00_genji_en.lsd.ch0094_00_genji/2511_0702_01_10:
When you do make it there, I’ll already be
waiting for you as one of the Hoenn League
Elite Four!
ch0094_00_genji_en.lsd.ch0094_00_genji/2511_0702_02_10:
Just because you make it to me, don’t think that
I won’t go down without a fight!
ch0094_00_genji_en.lsd.ch0094_00_genji/2511_0702_03_10:
And because it’s you, this ol’ Drake will give
you everything he’s got!
ch0094_00_genji_en.lsd.ch0094_00_genji/3001_0701_01_10:
Looks like you had a restful sleep. A good day
often starts after a good night, doesn’t it.
ch0094_00_genji_en.lsd.ch0094_00_genji/3002_0701_01_10:
The sea is calm this morning.
Seems like a good day for sailing.
ch0094_00_genji_en.lsd.ch0094_00_genji/3003_0701_01_10:
Already afternoon. Fine weather like this
makes me want to go for a sail.
ch0094_00_genji_en.lsd.ch0094_00_genji/3004_0701_01_10:
Don’t waste away your afternoons.
Time is limited, after all!
ch0094_00_genji_en.lsd.ch0094_00_genji/3005_0701_01_10:
Make sure you rest well for tomorrow.
Your Pokémon will worry if you’re not shipshape.
ch0094_00_genji_en.lsd.ch0094_00_genji/3006_0701_01_10:
Don’t force yourself to stay awake if you get
tired. Heed a little advice from an old sailor.

ch0096_00_zumi_en.lsd.ch0096_00_zumi/0101_0701_01_10:
Ah, there you are, [Name:PlayerNickname ].
I’ve been expecting you.
ch0096_00_zumi_en.lsd.ch0096_00_zumi/0101_0701_02_10:
You mustn’t let the day go to waste if you
mean to bring out the best in your
Pokémon. Chop-chop!
ch0096_00_zumi_en.lsd.ch0096_00_zumi/0601_0701_01_10:
There’s one ingredient that is guaranteed
to make any recipe tastier.
Do you know what it is?
ch0096_00_zumi_en.lsd.ch0096_00_zumi/0601_0701_03_10:
Enjoying a meal with a smile on your face
makes everything taste that much more
delicious, don’t you think?
ch0096_00_zumi_en.lsd.ch0096_00_zumi/0601_0701_04_10:
Watching others enjoy a meal you prepared
is the greatest happiness of all for a
chef like myself.
ch0096_00_zumi_en.lsd.ch0096_00_zumi/0601_0701_05_10:
You should always endeavor to do your
very best in order to bring happiness
to yourself and the people around you.
ch0096_00_zumi_en.lsd.ch0096_00_zumi/0601_0702_01_10:
At times, I tend to stress myself out over a lot
of things... But you know, not every problem
has a definite answer.
ch0096_00_zumi_en.lsd.ch0096_00_zumi/0601_0702_02_10:
That’s why it feels so good when you find
your own way to solve things.
It’s a different sort of happiness.
ch0096_00_zumi_en.lsd.ch0096_00_zumi/0601_0702_03_10:
Both cooking and Pokémon training have so
many deep layers. We could continue to learn
about them forever—and we should!
ch0096_00_zumi_en.lsd.ch0096_00_zumi/0602_0701_01_10:
I’ve heard some people call me
a legendary chef.
ch0096_00_zumi_en.lsd.ch0096_00_zumi/0602_0701_02_10:
But truthfully, I don’t think that
moniker is entirely accurate.
ch0096_00_zumi_en.lsd.ch0096_00_zumi/0602_0701_03_10:
There is still so much more that I can
learn and endeavor to achieve.
ch0096_00_zumi_en.lsd.ch0096_00_zumi/0602_0701_04_10:
I strive to elevate my cooking and my
Pokémon battles to a level of true art!
They must be masterpieces!
ch0096_00_zumi_en.lsd.ch0096_00_zumi/0602_0702_01_10:
When I’m defeated in a Pokémon battle,
I feel that my own weakness is to blame.
ch0096_00_zumi_en.lsd.ch0096_00_zumi/0602_0702_02_10:
I need to draw out the absolute best in my
Pokémon, or I’ll never achieve my goals.
ch0096_00_zumi_en.lsd.ch0096_00_zumi/0603_0701_01_10:
I met my Clawitzer when he was still a
Clauncher, and he’s been my most dependable
front-liner ever since.
ch0096_00_zumi_en.lsd.ch0096_00_zumi/0603_0701_02_10:
It was a bit shocking how we first met, actually.
I still remember it clearly to this day...
ch0096_00_zumi_en.lsd.ch0096_00_zumi/0603_0701_03_10:
You see, Clauncher somehow got mixed in
with some ingredients I had procured for a
recipe of mine.
ch0096_00_zumi_en.lsd.ch0096_00_zumi/0603_0701_04_10:
After I’d gotten over my initial shock,
I thought to myself, this Pokémon would
really shine in a battle!
ch0096_00_zumi_en.lsd.ch0096_00_zumi/0603_0701_05_10:
Finding Clauncher among my ingredients that day
and making that immediate judgment set things
in motion for the long term.
ch0096_00_zumi_en.lsd.ch0096_00_zumi/0603_0702_01_10:
And you know, if you really think about it,
it wasn’t I who found Clawitzer...
ch0096_00_zumi_en.lsd.ch0096_00_zumi/0603_0702_02_10: It was Clawitzer who found me.
ch0096_00_zumi_en.lsd.ch0096_00_zumi/0604_0701_01_10:
Once, I decided to leave Kalos and go on
a journey to discover the ultimate recipe.
ch0096_00_zumi_en.lsd.ch0096_00_zumi/0604_0701_02_10:
I was fishing one day and caught a
Magikarp, but it was no ordinary Magikarp.
I felt immense potential within it.
ch0096_00_zumi_en.lsd.ch0096_00_zumi/0604_0701_03_10:
Eventually I learned that my instincts were
correct. It more than lived up to my expectations.
ch0096_00_zumi_en.lsd.ch0096_00_zumi/0604_0701_04_10:
When it evolved into Gyarados, the pair of
us conquered many a rough wave together.
ch0096_00_zumi_en.lsd.ch0096_00_zumi/0604_0702_01_10: Potential is something that lies hidden within.
ch0096_00_zumi_en.lsd.ch0096_00_zumi/0604_0702_02_10:
Drawing out that hidden flicker of light
is the job of every Trainer—as well as the
job of a world-class chef.
ch0096_00_zumi_en.lsd.ch0096_00_zumi/0605_0701_01_10:
I’m so glad that we had the opportunity
to meet, [Name:PlayerNickname ].
ch0096_00_zumi_en.lsd.ch0096_00_zumi/0605_0701_02_10:
You are a Trainer that possesses the
ability to draw out the most amazing
potential in your Pokémon.
ch0096_00_zumi_en.lsd.ch0096_00_zumi/0605_0701_03_10:
I firmly believe that you have a
bright future ahead of you.
There’s so much you will accomplish.
ch0096_00_zumi_en.lsd.ch0096_00_zumi/0605_0702_01_10:
Your strength as a Trainer is directly
related to your ability to bring out the
best in your Pokémon.
ch0096_00_zumi_en.lsd.ch0096_00_zumi/0605_0702_02_10:
Remember that, and I’m positive you’ll
continue to grow even stronger.
ch0096_00_zumi_en.lsd.ch0096_00_zumi/1701_0701_01_10:
I found something interesting while I was
cleaning up the kitchen. Here, take it.
ch0096_00_zumi_en.lsd.ch0096_00_zumi/1701_0701_02_10:
I’m certain you won’t let a fine item
like this go to waste.
ch0096_00_zumi_en.lsd.ch0096_00_zumi/1701_0702_01_10:
Both Trainers and chefs should endeavor
to make the most of the raw materials
they start with!
ch0096_00_zumi_en.lsd.ch0096_00_zumi/1701_0702_02_10:
If I find anything else you might like,
I’ll be sure to send it your way.
ch0096_00_zumi_en.lsd.ch0096_00_zumi/2501_0701_01_10:
The art of cooking and Pokémon battling
are both beautiful in their impermanence.
ch0096_00_zumi_en.lsd.ch0096_00_zumi/2501_0701_02_10:
The end result may only last for a short
while, but it takes a great amount of time
and devotion to get up to that point.
ch0096_00_zumi_en.lsd.ch0096_00_zumi/2501_0701_03_10:
That brief moment feels special because of
all that time spent earnestly debating,
researching, learning, and practicing.
ch0096_00_zumi_en.lsd.ch0096_00_zumi/2501_0701_04_10:
One could call it a compilation of their life.
That’s why we must always do the very best
we can.
ch0096_00_zumi_en.lsd.ch0096_00_zumi/2501_0702_01_10:
Our Pokémon are always inching closer
and closer into our hearts.
ch0096_00_zumi_en.lsd.ch0096_00_zumi/2501_0702_02_10:
I’m constantly tackling my own worries
and stress for that reason.
ch0096_00_zumi_en.lsd.ch0096_00_zumi/2501_0702_03_10:
When I do, we all end up feeling
a little bit happier.
ch0096_00_zumi_en.lsd.ch0096_00_zumi/2501_0702_04_10:
To be truly happy, we must continually
devote ourselves.
ch0096_00_zumi_en.lsd.ch0096_00_zumi/2511_0701_01_10:
You know, when it comes to Pokémon battling,
you help me out in a myriad of ways.
ch0096_00_zumi_en.lsd.ch0096_00_zumi/2511_0701_02_10:
I’d like to treat you to a delicious meal.
One that I’ve poured my heart and soul into.
ch0096_00_zumi_en.lsd.ch0096_00_zumi/2511_0701_03_10:
This conundrum I’ve been going back and
forth over—whether or not Pokémon battles
are worthy of being called art...
ch0096_00_zumi_en.lsd.ch0096_00_zumi/2511_0701_04_10:
I’d like you to taste my food—my art—
and tell me what you think the answer to
that question is.
ch0096_00_zumi_en.lsd.ch0096_00_zumi/2511_0702_01_10:
In essence, the art of cooking and
Pokémon battling are one and the same.
ch0096_00_zumi_en.lsd.ch0096_00_zumi/2511_0702_02_10:
The quality of the ingredients, the skill of
one’s Pokémon... Drawing out the best of each
will take you to greater heights.
ch0096_00_zumi_en.lsd.ch0096_00_zumi/2511_0702_03_10:
I know that you have great effort and
true skill. That’s why I feel I can ask
you this question.
ch0096_00_zumi_en.lsd.ch0096_00_zumi/3001_0701_01_10:
Morning.
Have you eaten a well-rounded breakfast?
It’s the most important meal of the day.
ch0096_00_zumi_en.lsd.ch0096_00_zumi/3002_0701_01_10:
A new dawn, a new day. One should savor
every last moment lest tomorrow never come.
ch0096_00_zumi_en.lsd.ch0096_00_zumi/3003_0701_01_10:
Hello! Did you have a nice lunch?
One is not living if one is not enjoying food.
ch0096_00_zumi_en.lsd.ch0096_00_zumi/3004_0701_01_10:
Hohoho! What shall I cook for dinner tonight?
I’ll need to stock up on ingredients.
ch0096_00_zumi_en.lsd.ch0096_00_zumi/3005_0701_01_10:
A tip: Try chewing your food slowly,
and really savor the flavor.
That always gives me a boost of motivation!
ch0096_00_zumi_en.lsd.ch0096_00_zumi/3006_0701_01_10:
Remember to get a good night’s sleep tonight
so that you’re ready for tomorrow’s adventures.

ch0097_00_mai_en.lsd.ch0097_00_mai/0101_0701_02_10: I hope we can enjoy our time together...
ch0097_00_mai_en.lsd.ch0097_00_mai/0601_0701_01_10: I depend on my Arcanine a lot...
ch0097_00_mai_en.lsd.ch0097_00_mai/0601_0701_02_10:
Since I was little, I’ve held her
while I’m going to sleep...
ch0097_00_mai_en.lsd.ch0097_00_mai/0601_0701_03_10:
She’s fluffy and warm... It’s a strange feeling,
but she makes me feel at ease.
ch0097_00_mai_en.lsd.ch0097_00_mai/0601_0701_04_10: I want to be with her forever.
ch0097_00_mai_en.lsd.ch0097_00_mai/0601_0702_01_10:
No matter how far away she is, 
she’ll always come if I call her...
ch0097_00_mai_en.lsd.ch0097_00_mai/0601_0702_02_10: My Arcanine is truly dear to me...
ch0097_00_mai_en.lsd.ch0097_00_mai/0602_0701_01_10:
Weavile is a Pokémon you can find in the
Sinnoh region...
ch0097_00_mai_en.lsd.ch0097_00_mai/0602_0701_02_10:
And a friend of mine...
We traveled together.
ch0097_00_mai_en.lsd.ch0097_00_mai/0602_0701_03_10:
It has sharp claws, but it’s actually
quite sweet and playful. I think it’s adorable!
ch0097_00_mai_en.lsd.ch0097_00_mai/0602_0701_04_10:
If you ever come across a Weavile, it would make
me happy if you’d show it some affection, too.
ch0097_00_mai_en.lsd.ch0097_00_mai/0602_0702_01_10:
It’s nice to touch the cool body of Weavile when
it’s warm out.
ch0097_00_mai_en.lsd.ch0097_00_mai/0602_0702_02_10: But it doesn’t like it if you touch it too much...
ch0097_00_mai_en.lsd.ch0097_00_mai/0603_0701_01_10:
If a Trainer doesn’t give good commands,
Pokémon get hurt in battle...
ch0097_00_mai_en.lsd.ch0097_00_mai/0603_0701_02_10: That’s why I want to get better at battling.
ch0097_00_mai_en.lsd.ch0097_00_mai/0603_0701_03_10:
And it’s fun for me and my Pokémon when we
battle with you.
ch0097_00_mai_en.lsd.ch0097_00_mai/0603_0702_01_10: What I can do is just a little...
ch0097_00_mai_en.lsd.ch0097_00_mai/0603_0702_02_10: But I used that little bit of strength and got here.
ch0097_00_mai_en.lsd.ch0097_00_mai/0604_0701_01_10:
I... I don’t like to talk because I’m afraid
I will accidentally hurt someone with my words.
ch0097_00_mai_en.lsd.ch0097_00_mai/0604_0701_02_10:
That’s why I choose my words carefully...
But then my responses take too long.
ch0097_00_mai_en.lsd.ch0097_00_mai/0604_0701_03_10: But I don’t mind talking to you like this.
ch0097_00_mai_en.lsd.ch0097_00_mai/0604_0701_04_10: I think it’s because you listen to me...
ch0097_00_mai_en.lsd.ch0097_00_mai/0604_0702_02_10: If so, I’ll share a little bit more about myself.
ch0097_00_mai_en.lsd.ch0097_00_mai/0605_0701_01_10:
I think I like Pasio...
There’s so much good food and fun things to do.
ch0097_00_mai_en.lsd.ch0097_00_mai/0605_0701_02_10:
Most importantly, I get to battle with
so many Trainers...
ch0097_00_mai_en.lsd.ch0097_00_mai/0605_0701_03_10:
Being close to you, I feel like I can
get stronger...
ch0097_00_mai_en.lsd.ch0097_00_mai/0605_0701_04_10: I might have said some embarrassing things.
ch0097_00_mai_en.lsd.ch0097_00_mai/0605_0702_01_10: It’s truly difficult to say what you mean...
ch0097_00_mai_en.lsd.ch0097_00_mai/0605_0702_02_10:
That’s why I think it’s wonderful to be able to
be genuine with your words.
ch0097_00_mai_en.lsd.ch0097_00_mai/1701_0701_01_10: Here, this is for you. Please take it.
ch0097_00_mai_en.lsd.ch0097_00_mai/1701_0701_02_10: I thought you might like it... That’s all.
ch0097_00_mai_en.lsd.ch0097_00_mai/1701_0702_01_10: I don’t need anything in return.
ch0097_00_mai_en.lsd.ch0097_00_mai/1701_0702_02_10: It’s just a thank-you for always being there...
ch0097_00_mai_en.lsd.ch0097_00_mai/2501_0701_01_10:
Arcanine is always with me when I go on
an adventure.
ch0097_00_mai_en.lsd.ch0097_00_mai/2501_0701_02_10: She has taught me so much.
ch0097_00_mai_en.lsd.ch0097_00_mai/2501_0701_03_10:
That’s why...I want to give her
something special...
ch0097_00_mai_en.lsd.ch0097_00_mai/2501_0701_04_10:
If I win the PML, will that be a good gift
for her...?
ch0097_00_mai_en.lsd.ch0097_00_mai/2501_0702_01_10:
I’ve been with my Arcanine since she was
a Growlithe...
ch0097_00_mai_en.lsd.ch0097_00_mai/2501_0702_02_10:
She comforts me. I don’t feel lonely on
adventures if I’m with her.
ch0097_00_mai_en.lsd.ch0097_00_mai/2511_0701_01_10:
I don’t like to talk, so I’ve always
kept my distance from people.
ch0097_00_mai_en.lsd.ch0097_00_mai/2511_0701_02_10:
But...you’ve always been there for me,
even when I kept my distance...
ch0097_00_mai_en.lsd.ch0097_00_mai/2511_0701_03_10: And I started to enjoy talking...just a little...
ch0097_00_mai_en.lsd.ch0097_00_mai/2511_0701_04_10:
I want to get better at talking because I want to
know more about you.
ch0097_00_mai_en.lsd.ch0097_00_mai/2511_0702_01_10:
I’ve always chosen my words carefully so as to
not hurt anyone.
ch0097_00_mai_en.lsd.ch0097_00_mai/2511_0702_02_10:
I wonder if I can stop worrying about it so much
when I get more comfortable talking...
ch0097_00_mai_en.lsd.ch0097_00_mai/3003_0701_01_10:
Hi. Is there somewhere you want to go?
Can I join you?
ch0097_00_mai_en.lsd.ch0097_00_mai/3004_0701_01_10: Just having you around makes me happy.
ch0097_00_mai_en.lsd.ch0097_00_mai/3005_0701_01_10:
It’s a bit late, but I’m happy I get
to spend more time with you.
ch0097_00_mai_en.lsd.ch0097_00_mai/3006_0701_01_10:
Nighttime can be lonely sometimes...
But when you’re around, it’s not so bad.

ch0098_00_hau_en.lsd.ch0098_00_hau/0101_0701_02_10:
All right! Another great day to play with
our Pokémon!
ch0098_00_hau_en.lsd.ch0098_00_hau/0601_0701_01_10: Just being on Pasio gets me pumped up!
ch0098_00_hau_en.lsd.ch0098_00_hau/0601_0701_02_10:
I don’t know anything about this place,
so everything is so cool and fresh!
ch0098_00_hau_en.lsd.ch0098_00_hau/0601_0701_03_10:
Doesn’t it feel great when you make
new discoveries?
ch0098_00_hau_en.lsd.ch0098_00_hau/0601_0702_01_10:
You know, whenever I feel cramped, 
I go out on adventures.
ch0098_00_hau_en.lsd.ch0098_00_hau/0601_0702_02_10:
I feel that I can become a new me
when I breathe some fresh air.
ch0098_00_hau_en.lsd.ch0098_00_hau/0601_0702_03_10:
There’s always a new view right outside 
your door! In fact, let’s go on an adventure!
ch0098_00_hau_en.lsd.ch0098_00_hau/0602_0701_01_10:
Do you know the Pokémon Komala?
I really admire them.
ch0098_00_hau_en.lsd.ch0098_00_hau/0602_0701_02_10:
They are always asleep, and the only movements
they make or battles they get into are just them
being restless sleepers.
ch0098_00_hau_en.lsd.ch0098_00_hau/0602_0701_03_10:
They might not be able to see me, but 
maybe we can be friends in their dreams!
ch0098_00_hau_en.lsd.ch0098_00_hau/0602_0702_01_10:
Komala are probably adventuring in
their dreams!
ch0098_00_hau_en.lsd.ch0098_00_hau/0602_0702_02_10:
I wonder if I’ll ever be able to go to the
dream world...
ch0098_00_hau_en.lsd.ch0098_00_hau/0603_0701_01_10:
Even if they build up their electricity,
they don’t get really antsy.
ch0098_00_hau_en.lsd.ch0098_00_hau/0603_0701_02_10:
But I do have to make sure I let my Raichu
battle regularly to discharge his electricity.
ch0098_00_hau_en.lsd.ch0098_00_hau/0603_0701_03_10:
If I leave it be, you can feel
the air get all tingly—even indoors.
ch0098_00_hau_en.lsd.ch0098_00_hau/0603_0702_01_10:
After a battle, I would always have malasadas
with Raichu. You can only find those in Alola.
ch0098_00_hau_en.lsd.ch0098_00_hau/0603_0702_02_10:
He doesn’t seem too excited when he
eats malasadas...
ch0098_00_hau_en.lsd.ch0098_00_hau/0603_0702_03_10:
but he always finishes them,
so I think he really likes them.
ch0098_00_hau_en.lsd.ch0098_00_hau/0604_0701_01_10: I’m a Trainer, and I like Pokémon battles a lot.
ch0098_00_hau_en.lsd.ch0098_00_hau/0604_0701_02_10:
But this one time, a friend of mine, 
who isn’t a Trainer, saved me.
ch0098_00_hau_en.lsd.ch0098_00_hau/0604_0701_03_10:
I realized then that battles aren’t about
whether you win or lose. They’re about
whether you have the will to win!
ch0098_00_hau_en.lsd.ch0098_00_hau/0604_0702_01_10: The girl that saved me’s named Lillie!
ch0098_00_hau_en.lsd.ch0098_00_hau/0604_0702_02_10: She has a really strong heart!
ch0098_00_hau_en.lsd.ch0098_00_hau/0605_0701_01_10:
What do you think of me,
[Name:PlayerNickname ]?
ch0098_00_hau_en.lsd.ch0098_00_hau/0605_0701_02_10:
I’d be really happy if you thought
I was a good person.
ch0098_00_hau_en.lsd.ch0098_00_hau/0605_0701_03_10:
Both people and Pokémon have their good and
bad sides, you know?
ch0098_00_hau_en.lsd.ch0098_00_hau/0605_0701_04_10:
I think what sets the good people and the bad
people apart is whether they can see the good
in others or not.
ch0098_00_hau_en.lsd.ch0098_00_hau/0605_0702_01_10: Even bad people have good sides to them.
ch0098_00_hau_en.lsd.ch0098_00_hau/0605_0702_02_10:
If not, then why would they have so many allies,
you know?
ch0098_00_hau_en.lsd.ch0098_00_hau/1701_0701_01_10:
Alola!
Here, I have something nice for you!
ch0098_00_hau_en.lsd.ch0098_00_hau/1701_0701_02_10: Sharing makes it that much nicer, too!
ch0098_00_hau_en.lsd.ch0098_00_hau/1701_0702_01_10:
This one time, I gave away a lot of stuff
without thinking.
ch0098_00_hau_en.lsd.ch0098_00_hau/1701_0702_02_10:
Then everybody got really worried about
me and started giving me stuff back!
I went home with more stuff than I left with!
ch0098_00_hau_en.lsd.ch0098_00_hau/2501_0701_01_10:
My gramps is an island kahuna,
and he’s super strong!
ch0098_00_hau_en.lsd.ch0098_00_hau/2501_0701_02_10:
Gramps is really good at bringing out a
Pokémon’s true strength!
ch0098_00_hau_en.lsd.ch0098_00_hau/2501_0701_03_10: I’m not as good as he is, but I’m doing my best!
ch0098_00_hau_en.lsd.ch0098_00_hau/2501_0702_01_10:
Are you able to bring out your
Pokémon’s strengths?
ch0098_00_hau_en.lsd.ch0098_00_hau/2501_0702_02_10:
It’d be great if you could, and I bet you could
do some awesome stuff!
ch0098_00_hau_en.lsd.ch0098_00_hau/2501_0702_03_10:
One day, I’m gonna be a kahuna like my gramps
and make everybody happy!
ch0098_00_hau_en.lsd.ch0098_00_hau/2511_0701_01_10:
Have you ever had a Pokémon battle that gave
you the chills?
ch0098_00_hau_en.lsd.ch0098_00_hau/2511_0701_02_10:
I have! I lost that time, but it was a mixture
of enjoyment and frustration.
ch0098_00_hau_en.lsd.ch0098_00_hau/2511_0701_03_10:
But it was great!
I hope I can have a battle like that again!
ch0098_00_hau_en.lsd.ch0098_00_hau/2511_0702_01_10:
If you’re aiming to be the best Trainer,
that makes us rivals!
ch0098_00_hau_en.lsd.ch0098_00_hau/2511_0702_02_10: I respect you and your Pokémon a lot!
ch0098_00_hau_en.lsd.ch0098_00_hau/2511_0702_03_10:
That’s why I want to have a real battle with
you one of these days and beat you!
ch0098_00_hau_en.lsd.ch0098_00_hau/3001_0701_01_10:
Morning!
C’mon—I wanna go eat some malasadas!
ch0098_00_hau_en.lsd.ch0098_00_hau/3002_0701_01_10:
Wow! Going all out this early? I’m gonna chow
down on some breakfast and get going, too!
ch0098_00_hau_en.lsd.ch0098_00_hau/3003_0701_01_10:
Alola! It’s hard to get out and keep moving
on an empty stomach!
ch0098_00_hau_en.lsd.ch0098_00_hau/3004_0701_01_10:
I’m gonna grab a bite to eat.
Wanna come?
ch0098_00_hau_en.lsd.ch0098_00_hau/3005_0701_01_10:
You’re working pretty late!
I’m gonna do my best, too! See ya!
ch0098_00_hau_en.lsd.ch0098_00_hau/3006_0701_01_10:
I get chewed out by my old gramps
if I stay up too late.

ch0099_00_jun_en.lsd.ch0099_00_jun/0101_0701_01_10:
[Name:PlayerNickname ]!
You kept me waiting long enough!
Let’s hurry up and head out on an adventure!
ch0099_00_jun_en.lsd.ch0099_00_jun/0101_0701_02_10:
You want to have a Pokémon battle, too, right?
I’m fining you a million if you’re late!
ch0099_00_jun_en.lsd.ch0099_00_jun/0601_0701_01_10:
My dad is Palmer, the Battle Frontier’s
Tower Tycoon! He’s so awesomely cool!
ch0099_00_jun_en.lsd.ch0099_00_jun/0601_0701_02_10: I want to be a cool, tough Trainer like my dad.
ch0099_00_jun_en.lsd.ch0099_00_jun/0601_0701_03_10:
Then I’ll be able to have Pokémon battles with
lots of other tough Trainers!
ch0099_00_jun_en.lsd.ch0099_00_jun/0601_0701_04_10:
That’s why there’s no time to lose!
I’ve gotta get to work!
ch0099_00_jun_en.lsd.ch0099_00_jun/0601_0702_01_10:
You’ll see! I’m gonna be a cool Trainer just like
my dad!
ch0099_00_jun_en.lsd.ch0099_00_jun/0601_0702_02_10:
That’s why I’m making sure not to slack off on
my training or whatever.
ch0099_00_jun_en.lsd.ch0099_00_jun/0602_0701_01_10: Piplup really has a lot of pride.
ch0099_00_jun_en.lsd.ch0099_00_jun/0602_0701_02_10:
When I was just starting out as a Trainer,
he didn’t listen to me at all!
ch0099_00_jun_en.lsd.ch0099_00_jun/0602_0701_03_10:
But now my relationship with Piplup is
totally different!
ch0099_00_jun_en.lsd.ch0099_00_jun/0602_0701_04_10:
Piplup is my reliable ace in the hole now!
Makes me wanna puff out my chest with pride!
ch0099_00_jun_en.lsd.ch0099_00_jun/0602_0702_01_10: When Piplup started listening to what I said...
ch0099_00_jun_en.lsd.ch0099_00_jun/0602_0702_02_10:
I was so happy that he had finally
accepted me as a Trainer!
ch0099_00_jun_en.lsd.ch0099_00_jun/0602_0702_03_10:
That’s why I decided to get even
tougher—for Piplup!
ch0099_00_jun_en.lsd.ch0099_00_jun/0603_0701_01_10: Hey, I’ve been on an adventure with Staraptor!
ch0099_00_jun_en.lsd.ch0099_00_jun/0603_0701_02_10:
When I got on his back, he took off and
started flying around super fast!
I was holding on for dear life!
ch0099_00_jun_en.lsd.ch0099_00_jun/0603_0701_03_10:
But the scenery you can see when you’re flying
through the air is incredibly beautiful!
ch0099_00_jun_en.lsd.ch0099_00_jun/0603_0701_04_10:
Don’t you wanna try to ride him once?
If you get scared and cry, I’ll fine you!
ch0099_00_jun_en.lsd.ch0099_00_jun/0603_0702_01_10:
Staraptor is so cool! You can fly anywhere with
him straightaway thanks to his Fly move!
ch0099_00_jun_en.lsd.ch0099_00_jun/0603_0702_02_10:
But I’m trying to walk more and not fly
everywhere. Physical health is the
foundation of any tough Trainer!
ch0099_00_jun_en.lsd.ch0099_00_jun/0603_0702_03_10:
Don’t get the wrong idea!
It’s not because I’m scared or anything!
ch0099_00_jun_en.lsd.ch0099_00_jun/0604_0701_01_10:
I smack right into people a lot when I run.
Like...thud!
ch0099_00_jun_en.lsd.ch0099_00_jun/0604_0701_02_10:
So I’m trying to think up a way of running
where I won’t bump into people so much,
but it’s pretty hard!
ch0099_00_jun_en.lsd.ch0099_00_jun/0604_0701_03_10:
I mean, I guess I could just walk,
but it’s so slow!
ch0099_00_jun_en.lsd.ch0099_00_jun/0604_0701_04_10:
I run because I wanna hurry up and get to
where I’m going!
ch0099_00_jun_en.lsd.ch0099_00_jun/0604_0702_01_10:
I wanna get tougher and tougher.
There are still so many things I wanna do!
ch0099_00_jun_en.lsd.ch0099_00_jun/0604_0702_02_10:
That’s why I’ve got no time to sit around
taking it easy!
ch0099_00_jun_en.lsd.ch0099_00_jun/0604_0702_03_10:
But between you and me, sometimes going
around the long way can turn out to be
a shortcut.
ch0099_00_jun_en.lsd.ch0099_00_jun/0605_0701_01_10:
Hey, [Name:PlayerNickname ], is there
anyone you look up to?
ch0099_00_jun_en.lsd.ch0099_00_jun/0605_0701_02_10:
Of course I have someone I look up to—my dad,
the Frontier Brain Tower Tycoon!
ch0099_00_jun_en.lsd.ch0099_00_jun/0605_0701_03_10:
The Tower Tycoon is the toughest Trainer at a
facility called the Battle Tower, you know.
ch0099_00_jun_en.lsd.ch0099_00_jun/0605_0701_04_10:
If you don’t win a ton of Pokémon battles,
you can’t even battle him!
ch0099_00_jun_en.lsd.ch0099_00_jun/0605_0701_05_10:
I want to be cool like my dad! That’s the reason
I decided to become a Trainer!
ch0099_00_jun_en.lsd.ch0099_00_jun/0605_0702_01_10:
Of course I want to beat my dad in a
Pokémon battle.
ch0099_00_jun_en.lsd.ch0099_00_jun/0605_0702_02_10:
Winning alone won’t make me into a cool
Trainer like my dad, though.
ch0099_00_jun_en.lsd.ch0099_00_jun/0605_0702_03_10:
Hmm, what should I do? I guess I’ve still got a
long way to go, huh?
ch0099_00_jun_en.lsd.ch0099_00_jun/0605_0702_04_10:
I will do it, though!
Try to keep up, [Name:PlayerNickname ]!
ch0099_00_jun_en.lsd.ch0099_00_jun/1701_0701_02_10:
I’ve already got one. One what?
This item, of course!
ch0099_00_jun_en.lsd.ch0099_00_jun/1701_0702_01_10: I could learn a lot from the way you use items.
ch0099_00_jun_en.lsd.ch0099_00_jun/1701_0702_02_10: So if I find another good item, I’ll give it you!
ch0099_00_jun_en.lsd.ch0099_00_jun/2501_0701_01_10:
I’ve got a friend from Twinleaf Town just like me
who’s amazingly tough in Pokémon battles!
ch0099_00_jun_en.lsd.ch0099_00_jun/2501_0701_02_10: Battling with you makes me think of that kid.
ch0099_00_jun_en.lsd.ch0099_00_jun/2501_0701_03_10: It makes me wanna win even more!
ch0099_00_jun_en.lsd.ch0099_00_jun/2501_0701_04_10:
Let’s go together someday. Then we can have a
battle with my old friend!
ch0099_00_jun_en.lsd.ch0099_00_jun/2501_0702_01_10:
When you’ve got a really tough Trainer by
your side, it gives you confidence!
ch0099_00_jun_en.lsd.ch0099_00_jun/2501_0702_02_10:
You can’t have a Pokémon battle by yourself,
so there’s no point in getting tougher if you’re
all alone.
ch0099_00_jun_en.lsd.ch0099_00_jun/2501_0702_03_10:
When you have an opponent who wants to get
tougher and battle against you, it makes you so
amazingly happy!
ch0099_00_jun_en.lsd.ch0099_00_jun/2511_0701_01_10:
Pokémon battles are hard. When you get your
directions wrong, you can lose just like that!
ch0099_00_jun_en.lsd.ch0099_00_jun/2511_0701_02_10:
When Pokémon are tough, you can be sure they
have a Trainer they can count on.
ch0099_00_jun_en.lsd.ch0099_00_jun/2511_0701_03_10:
I’m doing my best to keep my precious Pokémon
from getting hurt in battle.
ch0099_00_jun_en.lsd.ch0099_00_jun/2511_0701_04_10:
I think it’s because I’ve been trying so hard that
my Pokémon grew to like me.
ch0099_00_jun_en.lsd.ch0099_00_jun/2511_0702_01_10:
There are some things Pokémon can’t do
and some things Trainers can’t do.
ch0099_00_jun_en.lsd.ch0099_00_jun/2511_0702_02_10:
If each of them focuses on getting better at the
things they can do, they make the toughest team!
ch0099_00_jun_en.lsd.ch0099_00_jun/3001_0701_01_10:
Morning! You slept in, huh?
I’ve been awake since yesterday!
ch0099_00_jun_en.lsd.ch0099_00_jun/3002_0701_01_10:
I try to take after my master and wake up early!
Come to think of it, though,
I’m not even sure if he does wake up early...
ch0099_00_jun_en.lsd.ch0099_00_jun/3003_0701_01_10:
*yawn* Starting to feel a little sleepy.
But I gotta keep going full steam ahead!
ch0099_00_jun_en.lsd.ch0099_00_jun/3004_0701_01_10:
I’m definitely prepared for some battling today!
There’s no way I’ll forget anything this time.
ch0099_00_jun_en.lsd.ch0099_00_jun/3005_0701_01_10:
Evening!
You’d think I’d be tired now, but I’m still wired!
ch0099_00_jun_en.lsd.ch0099_00_jun/3006_0701_01_10:
Time for my secret night training! 
Wait, if you’ve found me, 
it’s not secret anymore!

ch0101_00_mei_en.lsd.ch0101_00_mei/0101_0701_01_10:
Oh! Hi, [Name:PlayerNickname ]!
You’re looking bright eyed and
bushy tailed today!
ch0101_00_mei_en.lsd.ch0101_00_mei/0101_0701_02_10:
I’m feeling great myself! Let’s both get
out there and do our best today!
ch0101_00_mei_en.lsd.ch0101_00_mei/0601_0701_01_10: What? Is there something stuck to my face? Or...
ch0101_00_mei_en.lsd.ch0101_00_mei/0601_0701_02_10:
Is it that the buns on my head look
like meatballs or something?!
ch0101_00_mei_en.lsd.ch0101_00_mei/0601_0701_03_10:
How very kind of you to notice!
Even Snivy started making googly eyes
at my hair buns the other day...
ch0101_00_mei_en.lsd.ch0101_00_mei/0601_0701_04_10:
She started nibbling on them,
thinking they were actual food!
Silly Snivy...
ch0101_00_mei_en.lsd.ch0101_00_mei/0601_0702_01_10:
Ugh, all this talk about food
is making me hungry now...
ch0101_00_mei_en.lsd.ch0101_00_mei/0601_0702_02_10:
What do you think the chances are that my
hair buns have actually turned into
meatballs without me noticing it? Hmm...
ch0101_00_mei_en.lsd.ch0101_00_mei/0602_0701_01_10:
There are so many different Trainers
from all over the world gathered here
on Pasio right now.
ch0101_00_mei_en.lsd.ch0101_00_mei/0602_0701_02_10:
The Pokémon everyone’s brought along
are all so different, too! I hope I get
the chance to battle each and every one.
ch0101_00_mei_en.lsd.ch0101_00_mei/0602_0701_03_10:
You know what? I WILL battle them all!
I’m gonna make it happen for sure!
ch0101_00_mei_en.lsd.ch0101_00_mei/0602_0701_04_10:
This could be a once-in-a-lifetime
opportunity, you know? As a Trainer,
I’d be silly to pass it up!
ch0101_00_mei_en.lsd.ch0101_00_mei/0602_0702_01_10:
As long as you keep on battling, you’re
bound to end up facing opponents from
all over the world!
ch0101_00_mei_en.lsd.ch0101_00_mei/0602_0702_02_10:
Especially right now, with everyone
gathered around for the festivities!
It feels like one big party!
ch0101_00_mei_en.lsd.ch0101_00_mei/0603_0701_01_10:
I love going out to big open fields
to play with my Pokémon.
ch0101_00_mei_en.lsd.ch0101_00_mei/0603_0701_02_10:
We can relax and soak up the sun, and
as a bonus, the photosynthesis process
seems to perk up my Grass-type Pokémon!
ch0101_00_mei_en.lsd.ch0101_00_mei/0603_0701_03_10:
Being there always makes me feel good, too.
It’s beneficial in all kinds of ways!
ch0101_00_mei_en.lsd.ch0101_00_mei/0603_0702_01_10:
Wait a sec! Do you think the reason my energy
and enthusiasm is always at one thousand
percent is because... *gasp*
ch0101_00_mei_en.lsd.ch0101_00_mei/0603_0702_02_10:
because I’m constantly breathing the pure,
clean air that my Grass-type Pokémon
produce around me?!
ch0101_00_mei_en.lsd.ch0101_00_mei/0604_0701_01_10:
Pokémon battles are a ton of fun, but
sometimes it’s nice to just slow down
and take a stroll.
ch0101_00_mei_en.lsd.ch0101_00_mei/0604_0701_03_10:
The truth is, I’m always itching to battle!
I just love Pokémon battling that much!
ch0101_00_mei_en.lsd.ch0101_00_mei/0604_0701_04_10:
If someone were to ask me what my favorite
thing in the whole wide world is, I would
absolutely say Pokémon battling!
ch0101_00_mei_en.lsd.ch0101_00_mei/0604_0702_01_10:
It’s weird... Sometimes I wonder how
it’s even possible that I love Pokémon
battling this much.
ch0101_00_mei_en.lsd.ch0101_00_mei/0604_0702_02_10:
All I know is that for me, Pokémon
battling is the funnest thing
in the whole universe!
ch0101_00_mei_en.lsd.ch0101_00_mei/0605_0701_01_10:
Wow, you’re just getting stronger
by the day, [Name:PlayerNickname ]!
ch0101_00_mei_en.lsd.ch0101_00_mei/0605_0701_02_10:
Watching it happen right here beside me
just fills me with warm fuzzies!
ch0101_00_mei_en.lsd.ch0101_00_mei/0605_0701_03_10:
If we keep working hard, someday we’ll
mark our place among the top Pokémon
Trainers in the world!
ch0101_00_mei_en.lsd.ch0101_00_mei/0605_0702_01_10:
The heat and excitement of a Pokémon
battle is like...like the climax of a
really good movie!
ch0101_00_mei_en.lsd.ch0101_00_mei/0605_0702_02_10:
When your heart’s pounding and you’re on
the edge of your seat... It’s so much fun,
you just can’t help it!
ch0101_00_mei_en.lsd.ch0101_00_mei/1701_0701_01_10:
So, the other day I battled this REALLY
strong sync pair! I wish you coulda seen
the way I handled it!
ch0101_00_mei_en.lsd.ch0101_00_mei/1701_0701_02_10:
Anyway, I picked this up for you at the time!
Here, it’s a present!
ch0101_00_mei_en.lsd.ch0101_00_mei/1701_0702_01_10:
Gotcha something!
I’m sure it’ll come in handy!
ch0101_00_mei_en.lsd.ch0101_00_mei/1701_0702_02_10:
I mean, how could anything I give
you NOT come in handy?
Kidding, kidding...
ch0101_00_mei_en.lsd.ch0101_00_mei/2501_0701_01_10:
Are you going out exploring today?
I feel like something good’s gonna happen!
ch0101_00_mei_en.lsd.ch0101_00_mei/2501_0701_02_10:
I mean, it’s just my intuition, though...
It’s not like I have proof or anything!
ch0101_00_mei_en.lsd.ch0101_00_mei/2501_0701_03_10:
Then again, just getting to meet
someone and talk to them qualifies
as good in my book!
ch0101_00_mei_en.lsd.ch0101_00_mei/2501_0702_01_10:
I love Pokémon battling, but I also
really love talking to other people!
ch0101_00_mei_en.lsd.ch0101_00_mei/2501_0702_02_10:
Plus I’m greedy, so I just wanna do
all the fun stuff all the time!
ch0101_00_mei_en.lsd.ch0101_00_mei/2501_0702_03_10:
If something fun happens, please tell me!
I’d love to hear all about it!
ch0101_00_mei_en.lsd.ch0101_00_mei/2511_0701_01_10:
You know, since meeting you, I’ve learned
so many amazing things.
ch0101_00_mei_en.lsd.ch0101_00_mei/2511_0701_02_10:
Things like...like just how precious
the bond is between a Trainer and
their Pokémon!
ch0101_00_mei_en.lsd.ch0101_00_mei/2511_0701_03_10:
I still have a lot left to learn, but you
just watch! Pretty soon I’ll be
impressing you with how I’ve grown!
ch0101_00_mei_en.lsd.ch0101_00_mei/2511_0702_01_10:
You know, I sometimes get a little sad
when I lose a Pokémon battle.
Or I feel like I’m just not good enough.
ch0101_00_mei_en.lsd.ch0101_00_mei/2511_0702_02_10:
But then I think about how much potential
I have to grow stronger, and suddenly
I feel all better!
ch0101_00_mei_en.lsd.ch0101_00_mei/2511_0702_03_10:
It’s important to stay positive, you see?
Taking that first little step will really
propel you forward!
ch0101_00_mei_en.lsd.ch0101_00_mei/3001_0701_01_10:
Good morning!
Ready to go all out today? I know I am!
ch0101_00_mei_en.lsd.ch0101_00_mei/3002_0701_01_10:
Good morning!
Let’s make sure we put today to good use!
ch0101_00_mei_en.lsd.ch0101_00_mei/3003_0701_01_10: Hiii! I think it’s time for a tasty afternoon snack!
ch0101_00_mei_en.lsd.ch0101_00_mei/3004_0701_01_10:
Oh man, I’m itching to get out there and battle!
So, when are we going? Now?
ch0101_00_mei_en.lsd.ch0101_00_mei/3005_0701_01_10:
Hi there!
It’s not good to stay up too late, you know!
ch0101_00_mei_en.lsd.ch0101_00_mei/3006_0701_01_10:
Whoa, look at the time! We should go to
sleep soon so we’re not tired tomorrow!

ch0103_00_staff_shop_en.lsd.ch0103_00_staff_shop/3201_0701_01_10:
Welcome!
We have an assortment of sorts, so
please take your time looking around!
ch0103_00_staff_shop_en.lsd.ch0103_00_staff_shop/3201_0701_02_10:
Thank you!
We look forward to your next visit!
ch0103_00_staff_shop_en.lsd.ch0103_00_staff_shop/3202_0701_01_10:
Welcome!
Here are the current products!
ch0103_00_staff_shop_en.lsd.ch0103_00_staff_shop/3202_0701_02_10:
Thank you!
Please come again soon!
ch0103_00_staff_shop_en.lsd.ch0103_00_staff_shop/3203_0701_01_10:
Welcome!
Are you doing some shopping?
We have a variety of useful items!
ch0103_00_staff_shop_en.lsd.ch0103_00_staff_shop/3203_0701_02_10:
Thank you!
I look forward to your next visit!
ch0103_00_staff_shop_en.lsd.ch0103_00_staff_shop/3301_1031_01_10:
Where are the customers?
We have some nice stuff.
ch0103_00_staff_shop_en.lsd.ch0103_00_staff_shop/3301_1031_02_10:
I wonder when that
person will come again...
ch0103_00_staff_shop_en.lsd.ch0103_00_staff_shop/3301_1031_03_10:
Perhaps I should change
the layout of the products.
ch0103_00_staff_shop_en.lsd.ch0103_00_staff_shop/3301_1031_05_10:
It’s about time for me
to replenish stock.
ch0103_00_staff_shop_en.lsd.ch0103_00_staff_shop/3301_1031_07_10:
I get excited when I make
a ton of sales!
ch0103_00_staff_shop_en.lsd.ch0103_00_staff_shop/3401_0701_01_10:
We just got some new products!
Take your time looking around!
ch0103_00_staff_shop_en.lsd.ch0103_00_staff_shop/3402_0701_01_10: Take a look at this cool thing. It’s cool, right?
ch0103_00_staff_shop_en.lsd.ch0103_00_staff_shop/3501_1031_01_10:
New product in stock!
I want to scream!
ch0103_00_staff_shop_en.lsd.ch0103_00_staff_shop/3501_1031_02_10:
This would be perfect
for that person...

ch0104_00_staff_cafe_en.lsd.ch0104_00_staff_cafe/3201_0701_01_10:
Welcome!
For anything related to your team members,
please come this way!
ch0104_00_staff_cafe_en.lsd.ch0104_00_staff_cafe/3202_0701_01_10:
Welcome!
Would you like to prepare for an adventure?
ch0104_00_staff_cafe_en.lsd.ch0104_00_staff_cafe/3202_0701_02_10:
Thank you!
We hope to see you again!
ch0104_00_staff_cafe_en.lsd.ch0104_00_staff_cafe/3203_0701_01_10:
Welcome!
If you’d like to discuss your team members,
come right this way!
ch0104_00_staff_cafe_en.lsd.ch0104_00_staff_cafe/3203_0701_02_10:
Thank you!
Please stop by anytime!
ch0104_00_staff_cafe_en.lsd.ch0104_00_staff_cafe/3301_1031_01_10:
I hope we get lots of
customers at the café.
ch0104_00_staff_cafe_en.lsd.ch0104_00_staff_cafe/3301_1031_02_10:
The role of a café is
to connect people.
ch0104_00_staff_cafe_en.lsd.ch0104_00_staff_cafe/3301_1031_03_10:
What kind of person will
stop by the café today?
ch0104_00_staff_cafe_en.lsd.ch0104_00_staff_cafe/3301_1031_05_10:
Oh my, that person’s
Pokémon is cute!
ch0104_00_staff_cafe_en.lsd.ch0104_00_staff_cafe/3301_1031_06_10:
Let me take care of
your team!
ch0104_00_staff_cafe_en.lsd.ch0104_00_staff_cafe/3301_1031_07_10:
If that person met that
person... Hee-hee!
ch0104_00_staff_cafe_en.lsd.ch0104_00_staff_cafe/3401_0701_01_10:
So I’ve got an interesting scoop!
You wanna hear?
ch0104_00_staff_cafe_en.lsd.ch0104_00_staff_cafe/3402_0701_01_10:
That was some interesting news.
Oh, welcome!
I just got a nifty piece of information!
ch0104_00_staff_cafe_en.lsd.ch0104_00_staff_cafe/3501_1031_01_10:
I just heard a great piece
of information!

ch0110_01_kasumi_en.lsd.ch0110_01_kasumi/0101_0701_01_10:
There you are, [Name:PlayerNickname ]!
Are you ready to get out there and
do some exploring today?
ch0110_01_kasumi_en.lsd.ch0110_01_kasumi/0101_0701_02_10:
Come on—let’s give it all we’ve got!
And don’t be afraid to ask questions, OK?
You can ask me anything!
ch0110_01_kasumi_en.lsd.ch0110_01_kasumi/0601_0701_01_10:
So, what’s your policy when it comes to
training up your Pokémon?
ch0110_01_kasumi_en.lsd.ch0110_01_kasumi/0601_0701_02_10:
I mean, what do you think about when
choosing a Pokémon to be your partner
in a sync pair?
ch0110_01_kasumi_en.lsd.ch0110_01_kasumi/0601_0701_03_10:
When you’re aiming to master something,
I feel like sticking to a policy is super important.
ch0110_01_kasumi_en.lsd.ch0110_01_kasumi/0601_0702_01_10:
You and your Pokémon always look like
you’re having so much fun while you battle.
ch0110_01_kasumi_en.lsd.ch0110_01_kasumi/0601_0702_02_10:
Whatever your personal policy is when it
comes to training, I’m sure it must be as
all-out powerful as mine!
ch0110_01_kasumi_en.lsd.ch0110_01_kasumi/0602_0701_01_10:
I’m so excited for the Pokémon Masters League!
Only the toughest Trainers get to compete.
ch0110_01_kasumi_en.lsd.ch0110_01_kasumi/0602_0701_02_10:
If I get the chance to battle it out, I’d love to
go up against a certain Ice-type Trainer...
ch0110_01_kasumi_en.lsd.ch0110_01_kasumi/0602_0701_03_10:
Lorelei, from the Indigo League Elite Four
in Kanto! I’ll show her what an all-out
offensive looks like!
ch0110_01_kasumi_en.lsd.ch0110_01_kasumi/0602_0702_01_10:
I’ve always looked up to Lorelei’s calm, cool,
intellectual battle style.
ch0110_01_kasumi_en.lsd.ch0110_01_kasumi/0602_0702_02_10:
I’ve already battled against so many different
Trainers since coming to Pasio.
ch0110_01_kasumi_en.lsd.ch0110_01_kasumi/0602_0702_03_10: I feel like I’m bound to face her eventually!
ch0110_01_kasumi_en.lsd.ch0110_01_kasumi/0603_0701_01_10:
Water-type Pokémon are all so adorable,
don’t you think?
ch0110_01_kasumi_en.lsd.ch0110_01_kasumi/0603_0701_02_10:
Starmie, Psyduck, Dewgong, Quagsire, Seaking,
Lanturn, Slowbro...
ch0110_01_kasumi_en.lsd.ch0110_01_kasumi/0603_0701_03_10:
Lapras, Gyarados, Horsea, Blastoise,
Seel, Seadra, Poliwhirl...
ch0110_01_kasumi_en.lsd.ch0110_01_kasumi/0603_0701_04_10:
I love every last one of them! But it’s Starmie here
that I chose to partner up with as a sync pair.
ch0110_01_kasumi_en.lsd.ch0110_01_kasumi/0603_0702_01_10: Do you like Water-type Pokémon, too?
ch0110_01_kasumi_en.lsd.ch0110_01_kasumi/0603_0702_02_10:
Starmie is so nice. It always helps me out
with morning training.
ch0110_01_kasumi_en.lsd.ch0110_01_kasumi/0603_0702_03_10:
And there’s nothing like surfing the waves
on a Lapras! Let me know if you ever
feel like giving it a shot!
ch0110_01_kasumi_en.lsd.ch0110_01_kasumi/0604_0701_01_10:
That red crystal in the center of Starmie’s body
is what we call its “core.” It kinda looks like
a jewel, right?
ch0110_01_kasumi_en.lsd.ch0110_01_kasumi/0604_0701_02_10:
Well, it may be pretty, but Starmie’s not just 
for looks! Starmie is actually super fast.
ch0110_01_kasumi_en.lsd.ch0110_01_kasumi/0604_0701_03_10:
It’s also great at supporting its allies—
Starmie’s just a really dependable Pokémon
all around!
ch0110_01_kasumi_en.lsd.ch0110_01_kasumi/0604_0702_01_10:
Did you know that Bubble Beam is one of
Starmie’s specialties?
ch0110_01_kasumi_en.lsd.ch0110_01_kasumi/0604_0702_02_10:
As moves go, it’s a lot more powerful than
Bubble. The number of bubbles it spews out
is really amazing!
ch0110_01_kasumi_en.lsd.ch0110_01_kasumi/0604_0702_03_10:
Next time we battle, I’ll show you what I’m
talking about!
ch0110_01_kasumi_en.lsd.ch0110_01_kasumi/0605_0701_01_10:
I’ve done a lot of traveling, even before
coming here to Pasio.
ch0110_01_kasumi_en.lsd.ch0110_01_kasumi/0605_0701_02_10:
But ever since I teamed up with you,
I’ve felt like my Pokémon and I have
become closer than ever before.
ch0110_01_kasumi_en.lsd.ch0110_01_kasumi/0605_0701_03_10:
Battling on a team with you has helped me
realize so many things I never noticed before.
ch0110_01_kasumi_en.lsd.ch0110_01_kasumi/0605_0701_04_10:
I’m so glad I decided to come to Pasio!
And thank you!
ch0110_01_kasumi_en.lsd.ch0110_01_kasumi/0605_0702_01_10:
For a long time, it was my dream to go off on
a journey and battle against tough Trainers...
ch0110_01_kasumi_en.lsd.ch0110_01_kasumi/0605_0702_02_10:
That dream came true, but now I have a new
one: to defeat you, [Name:PlayerNickname ]!
ch0110_01_kasumi_en.lsd.ch0110_01_kasumi/0605_0702_03_10:
I’m so glad we were able to meet
here on Pasio!
ch0110_01_kasumi_en.lsd.ch0110_01_kasumi/1701_0701_01_10:
Great timing! I’ve got something for you
that I think you’re gonna like!
ch0110_01_kasumi_en.lsd.ch0110_01_kasumi/1701_0701_02_10:
Here, this is from me.
Make sure you take good care of it, OK?
ch0110_01_kasumi_en.lsd.ch0110_01_kasumi/1701_0702_01_10:
I don’t know why, but giving people presents
always feels a little embarrassing.
ch0110_01_kasumi_en.lsd.ch0110_01_kasumi/1701_0702_02_10:
Anyway, now that you have it,
you’ll have to decide how best to use it!
ch0110_01_kasumi_en.lsd.ch0110_01_kasumi/2501_0701_01_10:
If you want to be better friends with your
Pokémon, my advice to you is to train in
an environment that it likes!
ch0110_01_kasumi_en.lsd.ch0110_01_kasumi/2501_0701_02_10:
I use Water-type Pokémon, so I end up at
the beach more often than not.
ch0110_01_kasumi_en.lsd.ch0110_01_kasumi/2501_0701_03_10:
For us, swimming, surfing, and spending
time together there is really important.
ch0110_01_kasumi_en.lsd.ch0110_01_kasumi/2501_0702_01_10:
Hmm... Should I buy a new swimsuit or
some new clothes for training...
ch0110_01_kasumi_en.lsd.ch0110_01_kasumi/2501_0702_02_10:
When it comes to self-improvement and
looking good, I never spare any expense.
ch0110_01_kasumi_en.lsd.ch0110_01_kasumi/2501_0702_03_10:
Working on yourself is just as important
as working on your Pokémon!
ch0110_01_kasumi_en.lsd.ch0110_01_kasumi/2511_0701_01_10:
Have you gotten used to Pasio yet?
For being an artificial island, it sure is huge.
ch0110_01_kasumi_en.lsd.ch0110_01_kasumi/2511_0701_02_10:
Do you have a favorite spot that you
like to go to? If you do some exploring,
you might discover someplace new!
ch0110_01_kasumi_en.lsd.ch0110_01_kasumi/2511_0701_03_10:
There aren’t any wild Pokémon to catch here,
but battling with all the different Trainers is
actually a lot of fun!
ch0110_01_kasumi_en.lsd.ch0110_01_kasumi/2511_0702_01_10: The sunsets on Pasio are so pretty.
ch0110_01_kasumi_en.lsd.ch0110_01_kasumi/2511_0702_02_10:
I’ve always loved gazing out at the sunset
back home on the Cerulean Cape, too.
ch0110_01_kasumi_en.lsd.ch0110_01_kasumi/2511_0702_03_10:
I feel like it’s giving me a push—
like it’s telling me to do my best tomorrow, too!
ch0110_01_kasumi_en.lsd.ch0110_01_kasumi/3001_0701_01_10:
Morning! Starmie and I were just about
to go out for some early training!
ch0110_01_kasumi_en.lsd.ch0110_01_kasumi/3002_0701_01_10:
A quick swim right after you wake up 
is a perfect, refreshing start to the day!
ch0110_01_kasumi_en.lsd.ch0110_01_kasumi/3003_0701_01_10:
Hey! Are you free right now?
How about a quick swim?
ch0110_01_kasumi_en.lsd.ch0110_01_kasumi/3004_0701_01_10:
Snack time’s over! Time to get out there
and use up all this energy! Wanna battle?
ch0110_01_kasumi_en.lsd.ch0110_01_kasumi/3005_0701_01_10:
Are you going out to train at this hour?
Have fun, but don’t overdo it!
ch0110_01_kasumi_en.lsd.ch0110_01_kasumi/3006_0701_01_10:
Man, I don’t feel sleepy at all yet!
Maybe it’s because I took a nap while
surfing with my Pokémon earlier...

charaepi_ch0002_00_kotone_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0002_00_kotone/2301_1101_0100:
[Name:PlayerNickname ] saw Lyra enter the
forest and followed her until reaching a clearing.
charaepi_ch0002_00_kotone_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0002_00_kotone/2301_1201_0200:
Oh! Hey, [Name:PlayerNickname ]!
I didn’t expect you here!
charaepi_ch0002_00_kotone_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0002_00_kotone/2301_0301_0300: I saw you entering the forest.
charaepi_ch0002_00_kotone_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0002_00_kotone/2301_0401_0400:
Oh, I see! I was planning on spending the day
with Chikorita, but you would definitely be a
welcome addition!
charaepi_ch0002_00_kotone_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0002_00_kotone/2301_0302_0500: I was just in the neighborhood.
charaepi_ch0002_00_kotone_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0002_00_kotone/2301_0402_0600:
Oh, I see! I was planning on spending the day
with Chikorita, but you would definitely be a
welcome addition!
charaepi_ch0002_00_kotone_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0002_00_kotone/2301_1201_0700: I came out here to let Chikorita sunbathe.
charaepi_ch0002_00_kotone_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0002_00_kotone/2301_1201_0800:
Well, here we are, Chikorita!
Go find a spot you like!
charaepi_ch0002_00_kotone_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0002_00_kotone/2301_0401_1000: Chikorita likes places with good sunlight!
charaepi_ch0002_00_kotone_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0002_00_kotone/2301_0402_1200: Of course she is! She’s my partner, after all!
charaepi_ch0002_00_kotone_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0002_00_kotone/2301_0402_1300:
You know how they say that the longer the
Pokémon stays with the Trainer, the more
similar they become?
charaepi_ch0002_00_kotone_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0002_00_kotone/2301_1201_1400:
I love Pokémon—all Pokémon. That’s why I want
to treat all of them the best I can!
charaepi_ch0002_00_kotone_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0002_00_kotone/2301_1201_1600: Oh, look! It looks like she found a good spot!
charaepi_ch0002_00_kotone_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0002_00_kotone/2301_1201_1700: Can you smell that sweet scent in the air?
charaepi_ch0002_00_kotone_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0002_00_kotone/2301_1201_1800: That’s proof that Chikorita is in a good mood.
charaepi_ch0002_00_kotone_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0002_00_kotone/2301_1201_1900:
When we were traveling around Johto, she
would let this aroma waft around all the time.
charaepi_ch0002_00_kotone_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0002_00_kotone/2301_1201_2000:
On sunny days, both she and I would lie down in
the sun...
charaepi_ch0002_00_kotone_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0002_00_kotone/2301_1201_2100:
And before we knew it, we would have both
fallen asleep.
charaepi_ch0002_00_kotone_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0002_00_kotone/2301_1201_2200:
Ahaha, now that I think about it, we may have
made nothing but detours during our travels.
charaepi_ch0002_00_kotone_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0002_00_kotone/2301_1201_2300:
Admittedly, we treated it like a walk rather than
a journey.
charaepi_ch0002_00_kotone_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0002_00_kotone/2301_0401_2500:
Yeah! Traveling gives me a chance to see and
hear and feel things that I might not be able
to otherwise!
charaepi_ch0002_00_kotone_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0002_00_kotone/2301_0302_2600: I want to travel around Johto, too.
charaepi_ch0002_00_kotone_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0002_00_kotone/2301_0402_2700:
Well, let me know when you do! I’ll
show you around! But first, we should
enjoy Pasio as much as possible!
charaepi_ch0002_00_kotone_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0002_00_kotone/2301_1201_2800:
If you find any good places on Pasio,
let me know!
charaepi_ch0002_00_kotone_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0002_00_kotone/2301_1201_2900:
The memories Chikorita and I have with each
other are like the most precious treasure.
charaepi_ch0002_00_kotone_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0002_00_kotone/2301_1201_3000:
So I’m hoping to find more “treasure”
here on Pasio, too!
charaepi_ch0002_00_kotone_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0002_00_kotone/2301_1201_3100:
And I was hoping that maybe...you would help
me with that.
charaepi_ch0002_00_kotone_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0002_00_kotone/2301_0401_3400: Oh, great! That makes me so happy!
charaepi_ch0002_00_kotone_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0002_00_kotone/2301_0302_3500: Me? Are you sure about that?
charaepi_ch0002_00_kotone_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0002_00_kotone/2301_1201_3800:
Aw, shucks. Saying it out loud is kinda
embarrassing, isn’t it?
charaepi_ch0002_00_kotone_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0002_00_kotone/2301_1201_3900:
Whatever the case, if you ever need help,
talk to me!
charaepi_ch0002_00_kotone_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0002_00_kotone/2301_1201_4000: Oh no! Chikorita’s already looking sleepy.
charaepi_ch0002_00_kotone_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0002_00_kotone/2301_1201_4100: She must have really taken a liking to this spot.
charaepi_ch0002_00_kotone_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0002_00_kotone/2301_1201_4200:
Well, I guess there’s no helping it, then!
We might as well take a little break ourselves!
charaepi_ch0002_00_kotone_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0002_00_kotone/2311_1201_0100:
Bzweeeep! My data-analyzing machine is telling
me that your Chikorita is ready to evolve!
charaepi_ch0002_00_kotone_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0002_00_kotone/2311_1201_0200: Wait, really? Chikorita’s about to evolve?!
charaepi_ch0002_00_kotone_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0002_00_kotone/2311_1201_0300:
I’m curious about her Evolution, and
I’m wondering how strong you’ll become, Lyra.
OK, continuing analysis!
charaepi_ch0002_00_kotone_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0002_00_kotone/2311_0101_0100:
I’ve already used my data-analyzing machine on
you. I have a good idea of how strong you are.
charaepi_ch0002_00_kotone_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0002_00_kotone/2311_0101_0200: Well then, let’s get this battle started!
charaepi_ch0002_00_kotone_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0002_00_kotone/2311_0501_0100: Wow! You guys are as strong as the rumors say!
charaepi_ch0002_00_kotone_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0002_00_kotone/2311_0501_0200:
You bet! My Chikorita is as strong
as she is adorable!
charaepi_ch0002_00_kotone_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0002_00_kotone/2311_0501_0300:
My data-analyzing machine is good to go!
I’m ready to analyze Chikorita once she evolves!
charaepi_ch0002_00_kotone_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0002_00_kotone/2311_0501_0400: Come on! At least react to what I’m saying!
charaepi_ch0002_00_kotone_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0002_00_kotone/2311_0501_0500:
This is great! Chikorita looks
like she’s going to evolve!
charaepi_ch0002_00_kotone_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0002_00_kotone/2311_0501_0600:
Congratulations, Chikorita!
We’re going to have so much more fun!
charaepi_ch0002_00_kotone_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0002_00_kotone/2312_1201_0100:
Wow, your Bayleef is looking great!
She looks like she’s gonna get even stronger!
charaepi_ch0002_00_kotone_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0002_00_kotone/2312_1201_0200:
Thanks! Your Servine looks impressive, too,
and full of determination!
charaepi_ch0002_00_kotone_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0002_00_kotone/2312_1201_0300:
Well, seeing as we’re both so great, why don’t
we have a Pokémon battle?
charaepi_ch0002_00_kotone_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0002_00_kotone/2312_1201_0400: Cool! I’ve always wanted to battle you!
charaepi_ch0002_00_kotone_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0002_00_kotone/2312_0101_0100:
I think your Bayleef is gonna get even stronger
after this battle.
charaepi_ch0002_00_kotone_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0002_00_kotone/2312_0101_0200:
Then let’s get this super-duper,
exciting show on the road!
charaepi_ch0002_00_kotone_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0002_00_kotone/2312_0501_0100:
Oh no, I lost...
But! As a fellow Grass-type user,
I learned so much! Thank you!
charaepi_ch0002_00_kotone_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0002_00_kotone/2312_0501_0200:
I should be thanking you! That battle made me
feel infinite possibilities!
charaepi_ch0002_00_kotone_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0002_00_kotone/2312_0501_0300:
I’m glad.
I’ll be stronger the next time we meet, so get
ready to battle me then!
charaepi_ch0002_00_kotone_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0002_00_kotone/2312_0501_0400:
Look at that!
Bayleef looks like she’s going to evolve!
charaepi_ch0002_00_kotone_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0002_00_kotone/2312_0501_0500: I hope you get even cuter, Bayleef!

charaepi_ch0005_00_kanna_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0005_00_kanna/2301_1101_0100_:
While walking along the beach and admiring
the sights, [Name:PlayerNickname ] paused...
Was that a moving island?!
charaepi_ch0005_00_kanna_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0005_00_kanna/2301_1101_0200_:
Intrigued by the phenomenon, 
[EN:Gen Ref='255' M='he' F='she' ] moved closer...
charaepi_ch0005_00_kanna_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0005_00_kanna/2301_1101_0300_:
and found Lorelei and Lapras 
standing on the beach.
charaepi_ch0005_00_kanna_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0005_00_kanna/2301_1201_0400_:
Oh, [Name:PlayerNickname ].
I didn’t expect to see you here.
charaepi_ch0005_00_kanna_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0005_00_kanna/2301_1201_0500_:
Lapras and I were just taking a joyride on
the ocean.
charaepi_ch0005_00_kanna_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0005_00_kanna/2301_0401_0700_:
It is. Pasio has beautiful oceans around it.
Just floating on the ocean is very pleasant.
charaepi_ch0005_00_kanna_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0005_00_kanna/2301_0402_0900_: Not at all. Lapras is very comfortable to ride on.
charaepi_ch0005_00_kanna_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0005_00_kanna/2301_0402_1000_:
Not only that—Pasio’s waters are so calm,
I can’t imagine getting sick at all.
charaepi_ch0005_00_kanna_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0005_00_kanna/2301_1201_1100_:
And in case you were wondering, Lapras like to
swim with people riding on their backs.
charaepi_ch0005_00_kanna_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0005_00_kanna/2301_1201_1200_:
I don’t want you thinking that I’m forcing her
to carry me around.
charaepi_ch0005_00_kanna_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0005_00_kanna/2301_0401_1400_:
I guess that was unnecessary. You seem to
understand what’s important as a Trainer.
charaepi_ch0005_00_kanna_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0005_00_kanna/2301_0302_1500_: Oh, really? I didn’t know that!
charaepi_ch0005_00_kanna_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0005_00_kanna/2301_0402_1600_:
Oh, stop joking. I know you’re the kind 
of Trainer who always thinks about 
your Pokémon first and foremost.
charaepi_ch0005_00_kanna_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0005_00_kanna/2301_0402_1700_: I can tell just by looking at you.
charaepi_ch0005_00_kanna_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0005_00_kanna/2301_1201_1800_:
I sometimes come across people who take it 
for granted that Pokémon stay with them.
charaepi_ch0005_00_kanna_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0005_00_kanna/2301_1201_1900_:
They take it for granted that Pokémon battle—
that they listen to humans.
charaepi_ch0005_00_kanna_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0005_00_kanna/2301_1201_2000_:
But the truth is that these Pokémon stay 
with us because they trust us, 
and those people have forgotten that.
charaepi_ch0005_00_kanna_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0005_00_kanna/2301_1201_2100_:
Our Pokémon are our friends, and our friends
are our equals.
charaepi_ch0005_00_kanna_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0005_00_kanna/2301_1201_2600_: It’s great to enjoy being with your Pokémon.
charaepi_ch0005_00_kanna_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0005_00_kanna/2301_1201_2700_:
But I want more people to think about whether a
Pokémon enjoys being with them the same way.
charaepi_ch0005_00_kanna_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0005_00_kanna/2301_1201_2800_:
All in all, I think it’s kindhearted Trainers like
you who are going to rise to the top of the PML.
charaepi_ch0005_00_kanna_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0005_00_kanna/2301_1201_2900_:
At least, I hope that’s the case! That being said,
I have every intention of winning myself.
charaepi_ch0005_00_kanna_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0005_00_kanna/2301_1201_3000_:
Hm? You want to go for another swim, Lapras?
Really, what am I going to do with you...
charaepi_ch0005_00_kanna_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0005_00_kanna/2301_1201_3100_:
Well, last time I was the one who suggested
we go out...
charaepi_ch0005_00_kanna_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0005_00_kanna/2301_1201_3200_:
I suppose it’s only fair that we go out again if
that’s what Lapras wants.

charaepi_ch0006_00_oba_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0006_00_oba/2301_1101_0100_20:
[Name:PlayerNickname ] arrived at the coast
in search of a Trainer to battle.
charaepi_ch0006_00_oba_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0006_00_oba/2301_1101_0200_20:
And there [EN:Gen Ref='255' M='he' F='she' ] found Flint, with his Infernape,
standing perfectly still.
charaepi_ch0006_00_oba_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0006_00_oba/2301_1201_0400_10:
Sorry, I just had a blazing-hot battle that nearly
burnt me down to cinders.
charaepi_ch0006_00_oba_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0006_00_oba/2301_1201_0500_10: But I’m all right now! I just got my strength back.
charaepi_ch0006_00_oba_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0006_00_oba/2301_1201_0600_10:
You’ve got something hot with you, don’t you.
I can feel the heat from here!
charaepi_ch0006_00_oba_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0006_00_oba/2301_0401_0800_10: You know I can see right through you, right?
charaepi_ch0006_00_oba_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0006_00_oba/2301_0402_1000_10: You know I can see right through you, right?
charaepi_ch0006_00_oba_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0006_00_oba/2301_1201_1100_10:
Passionate Trainers are always particular
about something.
charaepi_ch0006_00_oba_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0006_00_oba/2301_1201_1200_10: How about you? What’s your secret to success?
charaepi_ch0006_00_oba_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0006_00_oba/2301_0401_1400_10:
I knew it! I can feel your red-hot passion
pouring out of you!
charaepi_ch0006_00_oba_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0006_00_oba/2301_0402_1600_10:
I knew it! I can feel your red-hot passion
pouring out of you!
charaepi_ch0006_00_oba_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0006_00_oba/2301_1201_1700_10: For me, it’s my blazing hairdo!
charaepi_ch0006_00_oba_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0006_00_oba/2301_1201_1800_10:
Some people think if you’re in the Elite Four,
you need to be more clean-cut.
charaepi_ch0006_00_oba_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0006_00_oba/2301_1201_1900_10:
But do they know how much work I put into this
hair? And anyway, it’s your heart that matters,
not your appearance!
charaepi_ch0006_00_oba_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0006_00_oba/2301_0402_2400_10:
What am I saying? It must be a
compliment! Thanks!
charaepi_ch0006_00_oba_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0006_00_oba/2301_1201_2500_10:
Infernape has some things he’s very particular
about, too.
charaepi_ch0006_00_oba_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0006_00_oba/2301_1201_2600_10:
He always wants to battle against Pokémon that
use moves that are a bad type matchup for him!
charaepi_ch0006_00_oba_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0006_00_oba/2301_1201_2700_10:
He’s been this way ever since he
was a Chimchar.
charaepi_ch0006_00_oba_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0006_00_oba/2301_1201_2800_10:
At first I thought he just wasn’t paying attention,
but then I realized what was going on.
charaepi_ch0006_00_oba_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0006_00_oba/2301_1201_2900_10:
This dude’s got flames in his eyes! All he’s
thinking about is how he wants to get stronger!
charaepi_ch0006_00_oba_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0006_00_oba/2301_1201_3000_10:
Having him as my partner hasn’t been easy,
let me tell you. He’s nearly turned my hair
to ash many, many times.
charaepi_ch0006_00_oba_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0006_00_oba/2301_1201_3100_10:
People have tried to warn me about him, but I
chose to keep on believing in him. We’ve had
a fiery-hot life together!
charaepi_ch0006_00_oba_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0006_00_oba/2301_1201_3200_10:
Don’t get me wrong, though. I’m not saying you
should ignore everybody’s advice.
charaepi_ch0006_00_oba_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0006_00_oba/2301_0401_3400_10:
Always hear what people have to say, 
but if you still decide you’re right, 
you don’t have to change!
charaepi_ch0006_00_oba_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0006_00_oba/2301_0402_3600_10:
Always hear what people have to say, 
but if you still decide you’re right, 
you don’t have to change!
charaepi_ch0006_00_oba_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0006_00_oba/2301_1201_3700_10:
If you do it that way, then when you fail,
you own that failure—but at least you did it
your way, right?
charaepi_ch0006_00_oba_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0006_00_oba/2301_1201_3800_10: Staying true to ourselves is our way of battling!
charaepi_ch0006_00_oba_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0006_00_oba/2301_0301_3900_10: What a great combination you are!
charaepi_ch0006_00_oba_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0006_00_oba/2301_0401_4000_10:
Heh! Hearing that from you makes the fire in my
heart burn even brighter!
charaepi_ch0006_00_oba_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0006_00_oba/2301_0402_4200_10:
Heh! Hearing that from you makes the fire in my
heart burn even brighter!
charaepi_ch0006_00_oba_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0006_00_oba/2301_1201_4300_10:
I haven’t had a conversation like this with
anybody since Volkner! I like you even
more now!
charaepi_ch0006_00_oba_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0006_00_oba/2301_1201_4400_10:
Let’s have a blazing-hot battle sometime to see
whose way of doing things comes out on top!

charaepi_ch0007_00_acerola_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0007_00_acerola/2301_1101_010:
While out exploring, [Name:PlayerNickname ]
stumbled across a road [EN:Gen Ref='255' M='he' F='she' ] hadn’t seen before.
charaepi_ch0007_00_acerola_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0007_00_acerola/2301_1101_020:
Curious, [EN:Gen Ref='255' M='he' F='she' ] decided to follow the road
to see where it led...
charaepi_ch0007_00_acerola_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0007_00_acerola/2301_1101_030:
Eventually, the road led [EN:Gen Ref='255' M='him' F='her' ] to
a beautiful, sandy beach.
charaepi_ch0007_00_acerola_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0007_00_acerola/2301_1101_040:
Then, just as [Name:PlayerNickname ] was
about to settle down and take a little break...
charaepi_ch0007_00_acerola_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0007_00_acerola/2301_1201_070:
I guess my secret beach isn’t much of a
secret anymore!
charaepi_ch0007_00_acerola_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0007_00_acerola/2301_0401_090: Nope! Me and my Palossand came here to play!
charaepi_ch0007_00_acerola_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0007_00_acerola/2301_0402_110: Uh-huh! Me and my Palossand came here to play!
charaepi_ch0007_00_acerola_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0007_00_acerola/2301_1201_120:
Nobody really knows about this place, so it’s
always nice and quiet and perfect for relaxing!
charaepi_ch0007_00_acerola_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0007_00_acerola/2301_1201_130:
Palossand seems to really love it here, too!
Sometimes she even comes here to play
all on her own!
charaepi_ch0007_00_acerola_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0007_00_acerola/2301_0301_140: And then you follow her here?
charaepi_ch0007_00_acerola_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0007_00_acerola/2301_0401_150:
Yep! That’s right!
’Cause I love this beach, too!
charaepi_ch0007_00_acerola_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0007_00_acerola/2301_0302_160: Sounds like you two are best friends!
charaepi_ch0007_00_acerola_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0007_00_acerola/2301_1201_180:
And Palossand always does her very, very best
for me, you know?
charaepi_ch0007_00_acerola_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0007_00_acerola/2301_1201_190:
And she’s super strong! I can always depend on
her in a Pokémon battle.
charaepi_ch0007_00_acerola_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0007_00_acerola/2301_1201_200: She listens to my commands really well...
charaepi_ch0007_00_acerola_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0007_00_acerola/2301_1201_210:
and even when she doesn’t, she still
fights hard in her own way.
charaepi_ch0007_00_acerola_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0007_00_acerola/2301_1201_220:
That’s why I always ask for Palossand’s
help when I know I have a tough battle
ahead of me.
charaepi_ch0007_00_acerola_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0007_00_acerola/2301_0401_240:
I know, right?! I depend on her a lot,
even when we’re not in a battle.
charaepi_ch0007_00_acerola_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0007_00_acerola/2301_0402_260:
I know, right?! I depend on her a lot,
even when we’re not in a battle.
charaepi_ch0007_00_acerola_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0007_00_acerola/2301_1201_270: Back in Alola, where I’m from...
charaepi_ch0007_00_acerola_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0007_00_acerola/2301_1201_280: she even looks after little kids and Pokémon, too.
charaepi_ch0007_00_acerola_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0007_00_acerola/2301_1201_290:
We live at a place called Aether House—
there are always plenty of tiny tots
and Pokémon running around!
charaepi_ch0007_00_acerola_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0007_00_acerola/2301_1201_300:
It makes me so happy that Palossand
always does her very best for me...
charaepi_ch0007_00_acerola_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0007_00_acerola/2301_1201_310:
So whenever Palossand wants to play,
I always let her play a whole bunch!
charaepi_ch0007_00_acerola_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0007_00_acerola/2301_0401_330:
Yeah! Actually, I’m really hoping that
you and I can become even better
friends, too!
charaepi_ch0007_00_acerola_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0007_00_acerola/2301_0302_340: I could learn a lot from you.
charaepi_ch0007_00_acerola_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0007_00_acerola/2301_0402_350:
Well, actually, I’m really hoping that
you and I can become even better
friends, too!
charaepi_ch0007_00_acerola_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0007_00_acerola/2301_1201_360:
It was so nice of you to let us join your team—
it really means a lot to me!
charaepi_ch0007_00_acerola_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0007_00_acerola/2301_1201_370:
I think of you as a really close friend.
And when we battle together, it’s so fun!
And neither of us holds anything back!
charaepi_ch0007_00_acerola_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0007_00_acerola/2301_1201_380:
From now on, I’m gonna try to take on
an even more active role on the team
and help you out where I can!
charaepi_ch0007_00_acerola_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0007_00_acerola/2301_0301_390: Thank you! I really appreciate that!
charaepi_ch0007_00_acerola_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0007_00_acerola/2301_0401_400: Tee-hee! Aw, now I’m a little embarrassed!
charaepi_ch0007_00_acerola_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0007_00_acerola/2301_0302_410: I can always count on you, Acerola!
charaepi_ch0007_00_acerola_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0007_00_acerola/2301_0402_420: Tee-hee! Ahh, now I’m a little embarrassed!
charaepi_ch0007_00_acerola_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0007_00_acerola/2301_1201_440:
Where did Palossand go?
She was right here just a second ago!
charaepi_ch0007_00_acerola_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0007_00_acerola/2301_1201_450:
Oh! I think I see her playing over there!
Let’s go see what she’s up to.
charaepi_ch0007_00_acerola_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0007_00_acerola/2301_1201_460:
Aha! I thought Palossand was just playing
around in the sand, but look at all these
shells! I think she’s collecting them!
charaepi_ch0007_00_acerola_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0007_00_acerola/2301_1201_470:
Hey! Do you wanna collect some
shells with Palossand, too?
charaepi_ch0007_00_acerola_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0007_00_acerola/2301_1201_480:
We should all compete to see who can
find the prettiest shell!
charaepi_ch0007_00_acerola_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0007_00_acerola/2301_0401_500:
OK! Let’s do it!
Betcha I’ll find the prettiest one!
charaepi_ch0007_00_acerola_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0007_00_acerola/2301_0302_510: You’re on! You can’t beat me!
charaepi_ch0007_00_acerola_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0007_00_acerola/2301_0402_520:
All right!
Betcha I’ll find the prettiest one!

charaepi_ch0008_00_erika_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0008_00_erika/2301_1101_0100_:
While strolling through the city,
[Name:PlayerNickname ] spotted Erika looking
around in confusion and decided to say hello.
charaepi_ch0008_00_erika_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0008_00_erika/2301_0401_0400_:
I am, actually...
I wanted to do some shopping,
but I seem to have lost my way.
charaepi_ch0008_00_erika_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0008_00_erika/2301_0402_0600_:
Well, maybe...
I wanted to do some shopping,
but I seem to have lost my way.
charaepi_ch0008_00_erika_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0008_00_erika/2301_1201_0700_: I was walking with my Vileplume at first...
charaepi_ch0008_00_erika_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0008_00_erika/2301_1201_0800_:
but she kept getting farther and farther away
from me, and eventually we got separated.
charaepi_ch0008_00_erika_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0008_00_erika/2301_0301_0900_: It seems she has a mind of her own.
charaepi_ch0008_00_erika_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0008_00_erika/2301_0401_1000_:
Tee-hee! You may be right about that.
I find that part of her so adorable, though...
charaepi_ch0008_00_erika_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0008_00_erika/2301_0302_1100_: Sounds like she’s a little impatient.
charaepi_ch0008_00_erika_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0008_00_erika/2301_0402_1200_:
Tee-hee! You may be right about that.
I find that part of her so adorable, though...
charaepi_ch0008_00_erika_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0008_00_erika/2301_1201_1300_:
Oh dear... I’ve derailed the whole
conversation, haven’t I?
charaepi_ch0008_00_erika_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0008_00_erika/2301_1201_1400_:
Vileplume and I were actually heading to
the flower shop.
charaepi_ch0008_00_erika_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0008_00_erika/2301_1201_1500_: I’m very fond of flower arranging, you see.
charaepi_ch0008_00_erika_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0008_00_erika/2301_1201_1600_:
And I heard that Pasio has all sorts of
flowers and plants imported from
all over the world.
charaepi_ch0008_00_erika_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0008_00_erika/2301_1201_1700_:
So I thought I’d try to visit the best flower shop
in the city.
charaepi_ch0008_00_erika_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0008_00_erika/2301_1201_1800_:
My dear Vileplume... I hope she made it
to the flower shop all right.
charaepi_ch0008_00_erika_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0008_00_erika/2301_1201_1900_:
Would it be too much if I asked you to
escort me to the flower shop now?
charaepi_ch0008_00_erika_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0008_00_erika/2301_0401_2100_:
Oh, thank you so much.
