I really appreciate it.
charaepi_ch0008_00_erika_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0008_00_erika/2301_0402_2300_:
Oh, thank you so much.
I really appreciate it.
charaepi_ch0008_00_erika_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0008_00_erika/2301_1201_2400_: We seem to have arrived, but...
charaepi_ch0008_00_erika_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0008_00_erika/2301_1201_2500_:
The shop is so big, and I don’t see
Vileplume anywhere.
charaepi_ch0008_00_erika_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0008_00_erika/2301_0302_2800_: Do you know how we could find her?
charaepi_ch0008_00_erika_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0008_00_erika/2301_1201_3000_: I know just the thing! I have an idea.
charaepi_ch0008_00_erika_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0008_00_erika/2301_1201_3100_:
Vileplume has a specific type of flower
that she really loves.
charaepi_ch0008_00_erika_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0008_00_erika/2301_1201_3200_:
If I can make an arrangement with those flowers
and some of the plants imported here to Pasio...
charaepi_ch0008_00_erika_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0008_00_erika/2301_1201_3300_:
maybe Vileplume will notice them and come right
to us.
charaepi_ch0008_00_erika_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0008_00_erika/2301_1201_3400_:
Vileplume really loves my
flower arrangements, you see.
charaepi_ch0008_00_erika_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0008_00_erika/2301_1201_3500_:
Sometimes, when I’m arranging the flowers,
Vileplume suddenly appears right next to
me without me realizing.
charaepi_ch0008_00_erika_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0008_00_erika/2301_0401_3700_: Oh, thank you! I think it’s a good idea, too!
charaepi_ch0008_00_erika_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0008_00_erika/2301_0402_3900_:
Really? Well, hopefully you’ll see it
in just a few moments.
charaepi_ch0008_00_erika_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0008_00_erika/2301_1101_4100_:
and after a few moments, a crowd started forming
around her, mesmerized by her skillful hands.
charaepi_ch0008_00_erika_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0008_00_erika/2301_1101_4200_:
Suddenly, a pungent odor wafted through the
space, causing the enraptured audience to hold
their noses.
charaepi_ch0008_00_erika_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0008_00_erika/2301_1201_4300_:
Oh, thank goodness! You had me so
worried for a moment, Vileplume.
charaepi_ch0008_00_erika_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0008_00_erika/2301_1201_4400_:
But it looks like you did make it all the way
to the flower shop by yourself, didn’t you?
And without spreading any of your toxic pollen!
charaepi_ch0008_00_erika_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0008_00_erika/2301_1201_4500_:
I should really thank you for all of
your help, [Name:PlayerNickname ].
charaepi_ch0008_00_erika_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0008_00_erika/2301_1201_4600_:
If I hadn’t met you on the road, 
I would probably still be lost out there.
charaepi_ch0008_00_erika_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0008_00_erika/2301_1201_4700_:
And look—this shop has so many cute flowers.
I’m so glad you helped me find it.
charaepi_ch0008_00_erika_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0008_00_erika/2301_1201_4800_:
Now that I’m here, I think I’ll stock up on a bunch
of different flowers for my flower arranging.
charaepi_ch0008_00_erika_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0008_00_erika/2301_1201_4900_:
I’m sure I’ll be able to create something
simply lovely with them.
charaepi_ch0008_00_erika_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0008_00_erika/2301_1201_5000_:
I promise to let you know as soon as it’s done,
all right?

charaepi_ch0009_00_senri_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0009_00_senri/2301_1101_0100_:
Norman asked [Name:PlayerNickname ] to
meet him at a clearing in the forest.
charaepi_ch0009_00_senri_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0009_00_senri/2301_1201_0200_:
Thanks for coming, [Name:PlayerNickname ].
I’ve asked you here to talk.
charaepi_ch0009_00_senri_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0009_00_senri/2301_1201_0300_:
I’ve been wanting to know how you feel about
the PML.
charaepi_ch0009_00_senri_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0009_00_senri/2301_1201_0400_:
I’ll ask you straight, [Name:PlayerNickname ]:
What does the PML mean to you?
charaepi_ch0009_00_senri_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0009_00_senri/2301_0401_0600_: Hm, I thought you’d say that.
charaepi_ch0009_00_senri_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0009_00_senri/2301_0302_0700_:
I think it’s about the bond with
my Pokémon.
charaepi_ch0009_00_senri_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0009_00_senri/2301_0402_0800_: Hm, I thought you’d say that.
charaepi_ch0009_00_senri_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0009_00_senri/2301_1201_0900_:
I’ve had a feeling that was the case ever
since I joined the team.
charaepi_ch0009_00_senri_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0009_00_senri/2301_1201_1000_:
I wanted to hear it straight from you, though.
You did, too, didn’t you, Slaking.
charaepi_ch0009_00_senri_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0009_00_senri/2301_0401_1200_:
Hm... Back home in Hoenn where I was a Gym
Leader, I battled against my own son in my Gym
and lost.
charaepi_ch0009_00_senri_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0009_00_senri/2301_0302_1300_: What made you think of that?
charaepi_ch0009_00_senri_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0009_00_senri/2301_0402_1400_:
Hm... Back home in Hoenn where I was a Gym
Leader, I battled against my own son in my Gym
and lost.
charaepi_ch0009_00_senri_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0009_00_senri/2301_1201_1500_:
As a parent, I was happy to see my child’s
growth. On the other hand, the truth is that I
was disappointed in myself as a Trainer.
charaepi_ch0009_00_senri_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0009_00_senri/2301_1201_1600_: I acutely felt a need to thoroughly retrain myself.
charaepi_ch0009_00_senri_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0009_00_senri/2301_1201_1700_:
That’s why I decided to enter the PML
with Slaking.
charaepi_ch0009_00_senri_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0009_00_senri/2301_1201_1800_:
I’ve heard other Gym Leaders from the Hoenn
region have come to Pasio to enter the PML.
charaepi_ch0009_00_senri_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0009_00_senri/2301_1201_1900_:
I thought about forming a team with them, but
that would miss the whole point of coming to a
new place.
charaepi_ch0009_00_senri_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0009_00_senri/2301_1201_2000_:
I wanted to work with Trainers from different
regions and different cultures to find new kinds
of power.
charaepi_ch0009_00_senri_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0009_00_senri/2301_1201_2100_:
I thought that we could cooperate with them in
battles and increase our sync strength.
charaepi_ch0009_00_senri_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0009_00_senri/2301_1201_2200_:
Thanks to you, I’ve learned what sync strength 
is really all about.
charaepi_ch0009_00_senri_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0009_00_senri/2301_0401_2500_:
Mm-hmm, thanks. Slaking looks happy to hear
that, too.
charaepi_ch0009_00_senri_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0009_00_senri/2301_0302_2600_: I’m glad I could help you.
charaepi_ch0009_00_senri_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0009_00_senri/2301_0402_2700_:
Mm-hmm, thanks. Slaking looks happy to hear
that, too.
charaepi_ch0009_00_senri_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0009_00_senri/2301_1201_2800_:
I may not show it, but you’ve gotten through to
me, too.
charaepi_ch0009_00_senri_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0009_00_senri/2301_1201_2900_:
Battling alongside you was a wonderful
experience for both Slaking and me that we
never could have had without you...
charaepi_ch0009_00_senri_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0009_00_senri/2301_1201_3000_:
I only hope that you got something out of your
experience teaming up with me, too.
charaepi_ch0009_00_senri_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0009_00_senri/2301_1201_3100_:
I believe that the power of our bond will give us
great strength on the grand stage of the PML.
charaepi_ch0009_00_senri_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0009_00_senri/2301_1201_3200_:
We were very lucky to meet you. It’s been a
privilege. Thank you, [Name:PlayerNickname ].
charaepi_ch0009_00_senri_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0009_00_senri/2301_1201_3700_: Oh yes, looking at Slaking reminded me...
charaepi_ch0009_00_senri_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0009_00_senri/2301_1201_3800_:
As long as you’re here, could I ask you one
more thing?
charaepi_ch0009_00_senri_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0009_00_senri/2301_1201_3900_:
I think you may know this, but my son has also
come here to Pasio.
charaepi_ch0009_00_senri_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0009_00_senri/2301_1201_4000_: We’re not working together right now, though.
charaepi_ch0009_00_senri_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0009_00_senri/2301_1201_4200_:
Do you know of any good restaurants that are
popular with young people on Pasio?
charaepi_ch0009_00_senri_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0009_00_senri/2301_1201_4300_:
I was thinking I’d like to take my son out
the next time we have a day off!
charaepi_ch0009_00_senri_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0009_00_senri/2301_1201_4400_:
Sometimes it’s good to take a cue from Slaking
and just take it easy.

charaepi_ch0010_00_maximum_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0010_00_maximum/2301_1101_010:
As [Name:PlayerNickname ] was walking the
beach, [EN:Gen Ref='255' M='he' F='she' ] heard a distant singing.
charaepi_ch0010_00_maximum_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0010_00_maximum/2301_1101_020:
While looking for the source of the singing,
[EN:Gen Ref='255' M='he' F='she' ] came across Crasher Wake and Floatzel.
charaepi_ch0010_00_maximum_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0010_00_maximum/2301_1201_030: The ring is my rolling sea. ♪
charaepi_ch0010_00_maximum_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0010_00_maximum/2301_1201_040:
Fight! Get ’im!
Flying Press!
Undefeated hero! ♪
charaepi_ch0010_00_maximum_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0010_00_maximum/2301_1201_050:
What? Whoa, [Name:PlayerNickname ]!
I didn’t see you there!
charaepi_ch0010_00_maximum_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0010_00_maximum/2301_0401_070:
Ha ha ha!
So you heard my singing and came all this way?
charaepi_ch0010_00_maximum_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0010_00_maximum/2301_0302_080: I heard you from way over there.
charaepi_ch0010_00_maximum_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0010_00_maximum/2301_0402_090:
Ha ha ha!
You heard my singing and came all this way, huh?
charaepi_ch0010_00_maximum_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0010_00_maximum/2301_1201_100:
Well, if you want to know, I was singing a song
to the people in Sinnoh across the sea!
charaepi_ch0010_00_maximum_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0010_00_maximum/2301_0301_110:
You, uh...
You think they can hear you?
charaepi_ch0010_00_maximum_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0010_00_maximum/2301_0401_120:
Ha ha ha! My voice carries across oceans and
soars over mountains!
charaepi_ch0010_00_maximum_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0010_00_maximum/2301_0302_140: Why don’t you just use a phone?
charaepi_ch0010_00_maximum_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0010_00_maximum/2301_0402_150:
Come on, [Name:PlayerNickname ]!
Don’t spoil the fun!
charaepi_ch0010_00_maximum_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0010_00_maximum/2301_1201_160:
I know it’s pointless, but you shouldn’t not do
something just because it’s pointless!
charaepi_ch0010_00_maximum_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0010_00_maximum/2301_0401_180:
Seems like you don’t get it. Maybe I should tell
you a story about Floatzel and me. Eh, Floatzel?
charaepi_ch0010_00_maximum_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0010_00_maximum/2301_0402_200:
Seems like you don’t get it. Maybe I should tell
you a story about Floatzel and me. Eh, Floatzel?
charaepi_ch0010_00_maximum_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0010_00_maximum/2301_1201_210:
Back when I had just started my
pro wrestling career...
charaepi_ch0010_00_maximum_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0010_00_maximum/2301_1201_220:
Floatzel begged me to take him to sea by boat,
so we voyaged out to the wild blue yonder!
charaepi_ch0010_00_maximum_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0010_00_maximum/2301_1201_230:
Unfortunately, though, we anchored our boat in
a spot that had a cold and very fast current.
charaepi_ch0010_00_maximum_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0010_00_maximum/2301_1201_240:
It would have been impossible to swim through.
Pointless, even.
charaepi_ch0010_00_maximum_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0010_00_maximum/2301_1201_250:
At least I thought so! Floatzel, on the other hand,
jumped into the ocean and started swimming
against the current!
charaepi_ch0010_00_maximum_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0010_00_maximum/2301_1201_260:
A battle with Mother Nature herself! Of course,
at the beginning, there was nothing Floatzel
could have really done—just be swept away.
charaepi_ch0010_00_maximum_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0010_00_maximum/2301_1201_270:
But day after day, Floatzel would
continue swimming.
charaepi_ch0010_00_maximum_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0010_00_maximum/2301_1201_280:
After seeing that determination,
I decided to train as well!
charaepi_ch0010_00_maximum_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0010_00_maximum/2301_1201_290:
While I swam with him every day, I noticed he
was able to swim a little bit faster each time.
charaepi_ch0010_00_maximum_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0010_00_maximum/2301_1201_300:
Little by little, he got stronger and 
made progress each day.
charaepi_ch0010_00_maximum_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0010_00_maximum/2301_1201_310: And eventually, he outpaced the ocean current!
charaepi_ch0010_00_maximum_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0010_00_maximum/2301_1201_320:
In that moment, Floatzel’s efforts meant something!
It hadn’t all been for nothing after all!
charaepi_ch0010_00_maximum_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0010_00_maximum/2301_0401_340:
I know, right? I was so happy, I jumped into the
water with him!
charaepi_ch0010_00_maximum_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0010_00_maximum/2301_0401_350: Then we got carried out to open sea...
charaepi_ch0010_00_maximum_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0010_00_maximum/2301_0402_370:
I don’t blame you if you don’t believe me. Even I
thought it was a dream when I first saw it.
charaepi_ch0010_00_maximum_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0010_00_maximum/2301_1201_380:
Maybe if others had seen Floatzel swimming,
they would’ve thought it pointless at first.
charaepi_ch0010_00_maximum_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0010_00_maximum/2301_1201_390:
I mean, you won’t know if something’s worth the
effort if you never give it a try, right?
charaepi_ch0010_00_maximum_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0010_00_maximum/2301_1201_400:
If Floatzel had thought there was no point in 
trying, he would’ve never outpaced that current!
charaepi_ch0010_00_maximum_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0010_00_maximum/2301_1201_410: That is what Floatzel has taught me!
charaepi_ch0010_00_maximum_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0010_00_maximum/2301_1201_420:
So...before you start to say my singing is pointless,
join me for a verse or two! Maybe our voices will
reach Sinnoh!
charaepi_ch0010_00_maximum_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0010_00_maximum/2301_1201_480:
Well, that’s enough of a warm-up!
Let’s do another!
charaepi_ch0010_00_maximum_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0010_00_maximum/2301_1201_490:
So that the whole world—!
Er...I mean, so the whole island can hear us!
charaepi_ch0010_00_maximum_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0010_00_maximum/2301_1201_540:
Hm? Hey, look over there! There’s a
Pokémon Ranger up on that cliff!
charaepi_ch0010_00_maximum_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0010_00_maximum/2301_1201_550:
How about that! She’s waving at us!
She can hear our voices!

charaepi_ch0011_00_homika_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0011_00_homika/2301_1101_0100:
As [Name:PlayerNickname ] was walking the
beach, [EN:Gen Ref='255' M='he' F='she' ] heard the sound of a bass guitar and
someone singing loudly in the distance.
charaepi_ch0011_00_homika_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0011_00_homika/2301_1101_0200:
Curious, [EN:Gen Ref='255' M='he' F='she' ] headed toward the music
and eventually discovered the culprits—
Roxie and her Whirlipede.
charaepi_ch0011_00_homika_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0011_00_homika/2301_1201_0300:
Oh! Hey there, [Name:PlayerNickname ].
Did we catch your attention with
our little jam session?
charaepi_ch0011_00_homika_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0011_00_homika/2301_0402_0700:
Aw, you don’t gotta be shy!
Come on—I’m positive you heard us.
charaepi_ch0011_00_homika_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0011_00_homika/2301_1201_0800:
If you ever wanna get into music, we should
totally form a band. I mean, we’re already
on the same team, right?
charaepi_ch0011_00_homika_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0011_00_homika/2301_1201_0900: Come on! Sing a little something for me!
charaepi_ch0011_00_homika_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0011_00_homika/2301_0402_1300:
You don’t gotta be nervous!
Nobody’ll laugh at you—I promise!
charaepi_ch0011_00_homika_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0011_00_homika/2301_1201_1400:
So, what kind of song are you
gonna sing for me?
charaepi_ch0011_00_homika_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0011_00_homika/2301_0401_1600:
Haha! I knew you had rock music
in your soul! I love heavy metal, too!
charaepi_ch0011_00_homika_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0011_00_homika/2301_0402_1800:
Haha! I kinda figured you would
sing something like that!
charaepi_ch0011_00_homika_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0011_00_homika/2301_1201_1900: Well, come on! Let’s hear it!
charaepi_ch0011_00_homika_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0011_00_homika/2301_1101_2000:
After a moment, [Name:PlayerNickname ]
cleared [EN:Gen Ref='255' M='his' F='her' ] throat and started to sing.
charaepi_ch0011_00_homika_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0011_00_homika/2301_1201_2100:
Well, I think you might have made
a fan outta Whirlipede!
charaepi_ch0011_00_homika_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0011_00_homika/2301_1201_2200:
You know, listening to you sing kinda put
my heart at ease, [Name:PlayerNickname ].
charaepi_ch0011_00_homika_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0011_00_homika/2301_1201_2300:
That kind, fun personality of yours
really came through in your singing!
charaepi_ch0011_00_homika_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0011_00_homika/2301_1201_2400:
Buuut...I feel like being in a band
might not really be your thing.
charaepi_ch0011_00_homika_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0011_00_homika/2301_0401_2600: No no! That’s not what I meant!
charaepi_ch0011_00_homika_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0011_00_homika/2301_1201_2900:
Argh! I’m saying it all wrong...
Just listen to me for a sec!
charaepi_ch0011_00_homika_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0011_00_homika/2301_1101_3000:
At once, Roxie launched into a heavy bass riff.
[Name:PlayerNickname ] felt the deep sound
echo in [EN:Gen Ref='255' M='his' F='her' ] chest, making [EN:Gen Ref='255' M='his' F='her' ] heart beat faster.
charaepi_ch0011_00_homika_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0011_00_homika/2301_1201_3100:
I think...you’re thinking about it
too much, [Name:PlayerNickname ].
charaepi_ch0011_00_homika_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0011_00_homika/2301_1201_3200:
I mean, when I jam, I JAM! Sometimes I rock out 
and headbang so hard, I forget my own name!
charaepi_ch0011_00_homika_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0011_00_homika/2301_1201_3300:
When I heard you sing, it kinda
made me realize something.
charaepi_ch0011_00_homika_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0011_00_homika/2301_1201_3400:
[Name:PlayerNickname ]...
I think Pokémon battling is your jam!
It’s where you’re most in your element!
charaepi_ch0011_00_homika_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0011_00_homika/2301_1201_3500:
So, I guess it might sound a little
selfish of me to say this, but...
charaepi_ch0011_00_homika_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0011_00_homika/2301_1201_3600:
I’d much rather see you stand up on stage
and battle it out next to your Pokémon!
charaepi_ch0011_00_homika_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0011_00_homika/2301_0301_3700:
I get what you mean.
Will you root for me, then?
charaepi_ch0011_00_homika_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0011_00_homika/2301_0401_3800:
Duh! I’ll be cheering for you from the
front row! That’s what friends are for!
charaepi_ch0011_00_homika_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0011_00_homika/2301_0302_3900:
Guess we should have a
battle soon, then!
charaepi_ch0011_00_homika_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0011_00_homika/2301_0402_4100:
Just you wait—we’re gonna blast away
the competition! Kaboom!
charaepi_ch0011_00_homika_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0011_00_homika/2301_1201_4200:
You know, I’ve got loads of fans
that love and support my music...
charaepi_ch0011_00_homika_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0011_00_homika/2301_1201_4300:
but when it comes to Trainers,
I’m YOUR biggest fan!

charaepi_ch0012_00_corni_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0012_00_corni/2301_1201_0200_:
Lucario told me he’s feeling a little
curious about your aura.
charaepi_ch0012_00_corni_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0012_00_corni/2301_1201_0800_:
Right now, it seems like he’s curious about
the bond you share with your Pokémon.
How strong it is.
charaepi_ch0012_00_corni_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0012_00_corni/2301_0401_1000_:
Yep! We sure are! Did you know that Lucario
understands us when we talk to him?
charaepi_ch0012_00_corni_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0012_00_corni/2301_0302_1100_:
Can Lucario understand what
we’re saying?
charaepi_ch0012_00_corni_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0012_00_corni/2301_0402_1200_:
Actually, Lucario can understand ANYONE who
talks to him! Isn’t that cool?
charaepi_ch0012_00_corni_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0012_00_corni/2301_1201_1400_:
Oh! I mean Lucario—or Riolu, before he
evolved into Lucario.
charaepi_ch0012_00_corni_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0012_00_corni/2301_1201_1500_:
Anyway, back then, I didn’t really connect with
Riolu at all.
charaepi_ch0012_00_corni_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0012_00_corni/2301_0401_1700_:
It’s kinda embarrassing to talk about since it’s
been so long, but I guess I might as well tell
the story now!
charaepi_ch0012_00_corni_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0012_00_corni/2301_0402_1900_:
It’s kinda embarrassing to talk about since it’s
been so long, but I guess I might as well tell
the story now!
charaepi_ch0012_00_corni_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0012_00_corni/2301_1201_2000_:
So, when I was a little girl, I met Riolu
and we decided to train together.
charaepi_ch0012_00_corni_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0012_00_corni/2301_1201_2100_:
Since I’m successor to the Key Stones,
which you need to Mega Evolve a Pokémon...
charaepi_ch0012_00_corni_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0012_00_corni/2301_1201_2200_:
I knew I had to form a strong bond of friendship
with Riolu so that he could evolve into Lucario
and eventually Mega Lucario one day.
charaepi_ch0012_00_corni_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0012_00_corni/2301_1201_2300_:
My grandpa gave me some good advice.
He told me that dancing is perfect for learning
how to trust and connect with your Pokémon.
charaepi_ch0012_00_corni_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0012_00_corni/2301_1201_2400_:
It makes sense, right? If you can’t connect
with your dance partner, you’ll fall out of
sync and fumble your footwork!
charaepi_ch0012_00_corni_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0012_00_corni/2301_1201_2500_: But I was actually really bad at that!
charaepi_ch0012_00_corni_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0012_00_corni/2301_1201_2600_:
Riolu was amazing at dancing, and he
was able to match all of my moves perfectly...
charaepi_ch0012_00_corni_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0012_00_corni/2301_1201_2700_:
but when I saw how good he was,
I wanted to show that I was even better!
So...I got a little overzealous.
charaepi_ch0012_00_corni_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0012_00_corni/2301_1201_2800_:
Despite the fact that Riolu was doing his
best to match my dance moves...
charaepi_ch0012_00_corni_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0012_00_corni/2301_1201_2900_:
I was actually way off, so the two of us
ended up totally out of sync.
charaepi_ch0012_00_corni_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0012_00_corni/2301_1201_3000_:
My grandpa was pretty appalled, as you can
probably imagine!
charaepi_ch0012_00_corni_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0012_00_corni/2301_0301_3100_: I’m sure it happens all the time.
charaepi_ch0012_00_corni_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0012_00_corni/2301_0401_3200_:
Well, it was kinda like that for a while.
Then one day, my legs got kinda tangled up
when we were practicing our dance steps...
charaepi_ch0012_00_corni_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0012_00_corni/2301_0402_3400_:
Well, it was kinda like that for a while.
Then one day, my legs got kinda tangled up
when we were practicing our dance steps...
charaepi_ch0012_00_corni_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0012_00_corni/2301_1201_3500_:
I thought I was gonna do a face-plant, but Riolu
leaped in front of me and saved me from the fall!
charaepi_ch0012_00_corni_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0012_00_corni/2301_1201_3600_:
He put my safety above his own, even though
he could easily have been injured doing that.
charaepi_ch0012_00_corni_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0012_00_corni/2301_1201_3700_:
And that’s when I realized...
Up until that point, I hadn’t been trying
to connect with Riolu at all.
charaepi_ch0012_00_corni_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0012_00_corni/2301_1201_3800_:
How could I expect to get closer to him
if I wasn’t even doing my part?
charaepi_ch0012_00_corni_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0012_00_corni/2301_1201_3900_:
After I realized that, both my dance moves
and my connection with Riolu became
so much more in sync!
charaepi_ch0012_00_corni_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0012_00_corni/2301_0301_4000_: I’m glad it turned out OK!
charaepi_ch0012_00_corni_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0012_00_corni/2301_0401_4100_:
Thanks! We’re so proud of the perfect sync we
have now, but it probably wouldn’t have been
possible if we hadn’t made those early mistakes!
charaepi_ch0012_00_corni_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0012_00_corni/2301_0302_4200_: And now you’re a perfect combo!
charaepi_ch0012_00_corni_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0012_00_corni/2301_0402_4300_:
Thanks! We’re so proud of the perfect sync we
have now, but it probably wouldn’t have been
possible if we hadn’t made those early mistakes!
charaepi_ch0012_00_corni_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0012_00_corni/2301_1201_4400_:
Oh, that reminds me! Our super-special move
came out of that whole experience as well!
Our deadly rolling axe-kick!
charaepi_ch0012_00_corni_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0012_00_corni/2301_1201_4500_:
We might have to go visit you in the hospital if
you ever get hit with that... Haha! Just teasing!

charaepi_ch0013_00_hapu_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0013_00_hapu/2301_1101_0100_2:
[Name:PlayerNickname ] headed into the city
to meet up with Hapu at her request.
charaepi_ch0013_00_hapu_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0013_00_hapu/2301_1101_0200_2:
When [EN:Gen Ref='255' M='he' F='she' ] arrived at the meeting spot
they’d arranged, [EN:Gen Ref='255' M='he' F='she' ] found Hapu 
already waiting there with Mudsdale.
charaepi_ch0013_00_hapu_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0013_00_hapu/2301_1201_0300_1:
Ho! Thank you for agreeing to meet
with me, friend. I have a favor I
would like to ask of you.
charaepi_ch0013_00_hapu_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0013_00_hapu/2301_0401_0500_1:
Well, as a matter of fact, I was hoping
you could show me around Pasio.
charaepi_ch0013_00_hapu_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0013_00_hapu/2301_0302_0600_1: What did you have in mind?
charaepi_ch0013_00_hapu_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0013_00_hapu/2301_0402_0700_1:
Well, as a matter of fact, I was hoping
you could show me around Pasio.
charaepi_ch0013_00_hapu_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0013_00_hapu/2301_1201_0800_1:
I thought it would be far more enjoyable
if I had you to accompany me.
charaepi_ch0013_00_hapu_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0013_00_hapu/2301_0401_1000_2:
And so the pair of them took off on a
merry stroll through the city, making a few
stops here and there along the way.
charaepi_ch0013_00_hapu_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0013_00_hapu/2301_0402_1200_2:
And so the pair of them took off on a
merry stroll through the city, making a few
stops here and there along the way.
charaepi_ch0013_00_hapu_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0013_00_hapu/2301_1201_1300_1:
My skin feels as soft as a baby’s bottom
after using that mud face mask I bought!
charaepi_ch0013_00_hapu_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0013_00_hapu/2301_1201_1400_1:
And just look at Mudsdale’s coat—
I’ve never seen it so shiny! All thanks to
the power of mud. It’s like magic, it is!
charaepi_ch0013_00_hapu_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0013_00_hapu/2301_1201_1500_1:
Oh, and I got to purchase some new clothing
as well! I’d say today was quite a success.
What sort of fashion do you think would suit me?
charaepi_ch0013_00_hapu_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0013_00_hapu/2301_0401_1700_1:
Oho! That is just what I was thinking!
Perhaps my instincts were correct, then!
charaepi_ch0013_00_hapu_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0013_00_hapu/2301_0402_1900_1:
Oho! That is just what I was thinking!
Perhaps my instincts were correct, then!
charaepi_ch0013_00_hapu_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0013_00_hapu/2301_1201_2000_1: The big city really is like a whole different world.
charaepi_ch0013_00_hapu_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0013_00_hapu/2301_0301_2100_1: Do you want to move to the city?
charaepi_ch0013_00_hapu_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0013_00_hapu/2301_0302_2300_1: Do you dream of big-city life?
charaepi_ch0013_00_hapu_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0013_00_hapu/2301_1201_2500_1:
It’s just that Trainers from all sorts of different
backgrounds have gathered here on Pasio with
one similar goal—to triumph at the PML.
charaepi_ch0013_00_hapu_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0013_00_hapu/2301_1201_2600_1:
Think about it. All of that passion and energy
is concentrated in one place. That’s what
makes the atmosphere here so exciting!
charaepi_ch0013_00_hapu_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0013_00_hapu/2301_1201_2700_1:
The way everyone is accepted here—whether
their background or the way they is think is bad
or good—is just like in Alola, where I’m from.
charaepi_ch0013_00_hapu_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0013_00_hapu/2301_1201_2800_1:
So, really, it’s the opposite. Being in this big
city makes me miss Alola, and it’s reminded
me of how proud I am to call it my home!
charaepi_ch0013_00_hapu_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0013_00_hapu/2301_1201_2900_1: Mm-hmm! Mudsdale says the feeling is mutual...
charaepi_ch0013_00_hapu_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0013_00_hapu/2301_1201_3100_1:
Uh-oh... It appears Mudsdale’s hooves
have worn a hole into the pavement...
charaepi_ch0013_00_hapu_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0013_00_hapu/2301_1201_3200_1:
We are used to trotting on dirt roads
in Alola, so the thought of this happening
never even entered my mind...
charaepi_ch0013_00_hapu_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0013_00_hapu/2301_1201_3300_1:
Alrighty! I should contact the proper authorities
here immediately and get this hole patched up.
charaepi_ch0013_00_hapu_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0013_00_hapu/2301_1201_3400_1:
Well, life is full of surprises, isn’t it!
You never know what might Hapun,
especially on Pasio! Heh heh.
charaepi_ch0013_00_hapu_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0013_00_hapu/2301_1201_3500_1:
Pasio invites all manner of Trainers and
Pokémon onto its open shores...
charaepi_ch0013_00_hapu_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0013_00_hapu/2301_1201_3600_1:
In that sense, I would be more surprised
if NOTHING Hapuned! Heh heh.

charaepi_ch0014_01_cheren_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0014_01_cheren/2301_1101_0100:
[Name:PlayerNickname ] made [EN:Gen Ref='255' M='his' F='her' ] way 
to the forest at the edge of the city 
to meet up with Cheren.
charaepi_ch0014_01_cheren_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0014_01_cheren/2301_1101_0200:
When [Name:PlayerNickname ] arrived, 
[EN:Gen Ref='255' M='he' F='she' ] found him practicing move commands
with his Stoutland.
charaepi_ch0014_01_cheren_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0014_01_cheren/2301_0401_0500:
Don’t worry about it. Stoutland and I were just
practicing some commands for different moves
and actions.
charaepi_ch0014_01_cheren_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0014_01_cheren/2301_0402_0700:
Just practicing some commands for different
moves and actions. Stoutland and I have been
putting a lot of our energy into training lately.
charaepi_ch0014_01_cheren_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0014_01_cheren/2301_1201_0800:
Ever since I’ve been a Gym Leader,
the two of us have been best buds.
charaepi_ch0014_01_cheren_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0014_01_cheren/2301_1201_0900:
I like to think about tactical advantages and
plan all sorts of things while I battle.
charaepi_ch0014_01_cheren_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0014_01_cheren/2301_1201_1000:
And Stoutland here has been a resourceful
partner full of endless potential ever since
he was a Lillipup.
charaepi_ch0014_01_cheren_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0014_01_cheren/2301_1201_1100:
In that sense, I think Stoutland and I
really make the perfect pair.
charaepi_ch0014_01_cheren_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0014_01_cheren/2301_1201_1300:
Ever since I became a Gym Leader
and Stoutland and I became a sync pair,
the work’s really piled up for us.
charaepi_ch0014_01_cheren_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0014_01_cheren/2301_1201_1400:
But I’m hoping that if we continue battling
and training like we were just now, we’ll
learn how best to utilize our strengths.
charaepi_ch0014_01_cheren_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0014_01_cheren/2301_0301_1500: It seems you have it all figured out!
charaepi_ch0014_01_cheren_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0014_01_cheren/2301_0401_1600:
Thanks. And thanks to you, Stoutland has
been even more excited to work hard and
grow stronger.
charaepi_ch0014_01_cheren_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0014_01_cheren/2301_0402_1800:
Indeed. And thanks to you, Stoutland has
been even more excited to work hard and
grow stronger.
charaepi_ch0014_01_cheren_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0014_01_cheren/2301_1201_1900:
So, have you figured out why I called you here
to meet us today?
charaepi_ch0014_01_cheren_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0014_01_cheren/2301_1201_2000:
That’s right. I’m confident that Stoutland and I
have you beat when it comes to sync strength...
charaepi_ch0014_01_cheren_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0014_01_cheren/2301_1201_2200:
Phew! All right, let’s continue to
fight hard together as a team.
charaepi_ch0014_01_cheren_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0014_01_cheren/2301_0401_2400: Well, I suppose we could battle if you want to.
charaepi_ch0014_01_cheren_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0014_01_cheren/2301_0302_2500:
I thought you were going to
challenge me to a battle!
charaepi_ch0014_01_cheren_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0014_01_cheren/2301_0402_2600: Well, I suppose we could battle if you want to.
charaepi_ch0014_01_cheren_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0014_01_cheren/2301_1201_2700:
But I just saw with my own eyes that we’re
pretty even when it comes to sync strength.
charaepi_ch0014_01_cheren_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0014_01_cheren/2301_1201_2800:
When a Trainer and a Pokémon click so
well together, it means they’re powerful
in a battle, without a doubt.
charaepi_ch0014_01_cheren_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0014_01_cheren/2301_1201_2900:
I’ve already seen your skills at work
in a Pokémon battle, so I know it’s true.
And I confirmed it with what I just saw.
charaepi_ch0014_01_cheren_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0014_01_cheren/2301_0401_3100:
So I thought, if we’re going to be forming a
team with powerhouse sync pairs, we’d better
do our best to amp up our own strengths.
charaepi_ch0014_01_cheren_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0014_01_cheren/2301_0302_3200:
Ah, I get it.
And we fight as a team, right?
charaepi_ch0014_01_cheren_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0014_01_cheren/2301_0402_3300:
Right. I thought, if we’re going to be forming a
team with powerhouse sync pairs, we’d better
do our best to amp up our own strengths.
charaepi_ch0014_01_cheren_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0014_01_cheren/2301_1201_3400:
Having a team full of Trainers who treasure
the bond they have with their Pokémon...
I know that would give me confidence!
charaepi_ch0014_01_cheren_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0014_01_cheren/2301_1201_3500:
And just so we’re clear...I want to battle on a
team with YOU, [Name:PlayerNickname ].
charaepi_ch0014_01_cheren_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0014_01_cheren/2301_1201_3600:
Together, we’ll aim for the top!
The best of the best among Pokémon Trainers!
charaepi_ch0014_01_cheren_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0014_01_cheren/2301_1201_3700:
Let’s give this our all.
What do you say?
charaepi_ch0014_01_cheren_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0014_01_cheren/2301_0302_4000: How could I say no to that?!

charaepi_ch0015_00_takeshi_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0015_00_takeshi/2301_1201_010: Where’s a good, open space around here...
charaepi_ch0015_00_takeshi_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0015_00_takeshi/2301_1201_020:
Hm? Oh, hey, [Name:PlayerNickname ]!
Are you out shopping?
charaepi_ch0015_00_takeshi_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0015_00_takeshi/2301_0401_040: Really? If that’s the case, could you help me out?
charaepi_ch0015_00_takeshi_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0015_00_takeshi/2301_0302_050: I was just taking a stroll.
charaepi_ch0015_00_takeshi_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0015_00_takeshi/2301_0402_060: Really? If that’s the case, could you help me out?
charaepi_ch0015_00_takeshi_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0015_00_takeshi/2301_1201_070:
I was looking for a good place in town where
I could train.
charaepi_ch0015_00_takeshi_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0015_00_takeshi/2301_0401_090:
Thanks, [Name:PlayerNickname ]!
All right, then. No time like the present! Let’s go!
charaepi_ch0015_00_takeshi_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0015_00_takeshi/2301_0402_110:
Great idea, [Name:PlayerNickname ]!
All right, then. No time like the present! Let’s go!
charaepi_ch0015_00_takeshi_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0015_00_takeshi/2301_1201_120: I’m glad you knew this place! You’re a lifesaver!
charaepi_ch0015_00_takeshi_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0015_00_takeshi/2301_1201_130: Onix is bigger than most Pokémon, after all.
charaepi_ch0015_00_takeshi_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0015_00_takeshi/2301_1201_140:
It can be pretty difficult for us to train unless
we’re outside or in a Gym.
charaepi_ch0015_00_takeshi_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0015_00_takeshi/2301_0401_160: Onix seems happy. He must like this place.
charaepi_ch0015_00_takeshi_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0015_00_takeshi/2301_0302_170:
I’m glad we found this place,
then, Onix.
charaepi_ch0015_00_takeshi_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0015_00_takeshi/2301_0402_180: Onix seems happy. He must like this place.
charaepi_ch0015_00_takeshi_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0015_00_takeshi/2301_1201_190: Onix has been my partner for a long time.
charaepi_ch0015_00_takeshi_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0015_00_takeshi/2301_1201_200:
So it’s my duty as his Trainer to give him a
space where he can move around freely.
charaepi_ch0015_00_takeshi_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0015_00_takeshi/2301_1201_210: But now, it’s about time we got to training!
charaepi_ch0015_00_takeshi_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0015_00_takeshi/2301_0401_230:
Yeah! I want to make sure that I’m completely in
sync with Onix during our battles!
charaepi_ch0015_00_takeshi_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0015_00_takeshi/2301_0402_250:
It can be for Trainers, too! I want to ensure I’m
completely in sync with Onix during our battles!
charaepi_ch0015_00_takeshi_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0015_00_takeshi/2301_1201_260: By training and working out with Onix...
charaepi_ch0015_00_takeshi_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0015_00_takeshi/2301_1201_270:
I naturally get to see what he’s good at and bad
at, how he fights, and what his abilities are.
That tells me how to best use him in battle.
charaepi_ch0015_00_takeshi_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0015_00_takeshi/2301_1201_280:
It’s because I do this that Onix and I have won
countless Pokémon battles.
charaepi_ch0015_00_takeshi_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0015_00_takeshi/2301_0301_290: Do you think I can get stronger, too?
charaepi_ch0015_00_takeshi_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0015_00_takeshi/2301_0401_300:
Of course!
As your personal coach, I guarantee it!
charaepi_ch0015_00_takeshi_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0015_00_takeshi/2301_0302_310: Do you think I can be more like you?
charaepi_ch0015_00_takeshi_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0015_00_takeshi/2301_0402_320:
Of course!
As your personal coach, I guarantee it!
charaepi_ch0015_00_takeshi_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0015_00_takeshi/2301_1201_330:
Wait, are you Brock?
THE Brock?
charaepi_ch0015_00_takeshi_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0015_00_takeshi/2301_1201_340:
That’s right!
I’m the rock-solid Pokémon Trainer Brock!
charaepi_ch0015_00_takeshi_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0015_00_takeshi/2301_1201_350: And, uh... Can I help you?
charaepi_ch0015_00_takeshi_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0015_00_takeshi/2301_1201_360:
We became Rock-type Pokémon Trainers after
being inspired by you!
charaepi_ch0015_00_takeshi_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0015_00_takeshi/2301_1201_370: Brock! Please let us train with you!
charaepi_ch0015_00_takeshi_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0015_00_takeshi/2301_1201_390:
Then, [Name:PlayerNickname ], why don’t we
try out what we were talking about earlier?
charaepi_ch0015_00_takeshi_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0015_00_takeshi/2301_1201_400:
I’m sure it would be good training for these
fellas, too!
charaepi_ch0015_00_takeshi_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0015_00_takeshi/2301_0301_450: Oof, I can’t feel my arms...
charaepi_ch0015_00_takeshi_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0015_00_takeshi/2301_0401_460: Yeah, those hikers look tired...but satisfied, too!
charaepi_ch0015_00_takeshi_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0015_00_takeshi/2301_0402_480: Yeah, those hikers look tired...but satisfied, too!
charaepi_ch0015_00_takeshi_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0015_00_takeshi/2301_0401_500: Of course! I meant to work out myself!
charaepi_ch0015_00_takeshi_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0015_00_takeshi/2301_0402_520: No worries! I meant to work out myself!
charaepi_ch0015_00_takeshi_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0015_00_takeshi/2301_1201_530:
You know, you have a really good sense for
Pokémon battles, [Name:PlayerNickname ].
charaepi_ch0015_00_takeshi_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0015_00_takeshi/2301_1201_540:
You’re definitely destined to become a great
Trainer in the future.
charaepi_ch0015_00_takeshi_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0015_00_takeshi/2301_1201_550: I want to be there when it happens!
charaepi_ch0015_00_takeshi_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0015_00_takeshi/2301_0401_570:
Ha ha! Well, life’s most fun when you have lofty
goals, right?
charaepi_ch0015_00_takeshi_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0015_00_takeshi/2301_0402_590:
Ha ha! Well, life’s most fun when you have lofty
goals, right?
charaepi_ch0015_00_takeshi_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0015_00_takeshi/2301_1201_600:
Take me, for instance. I have Trainers that know
me now, sure.
charaepi_ch0015_00_takeshi_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0015_00_takeshi/2301_1201_610:
But at one point in time, I was a rookie just
like you.
charaepi_ch0015_00_takeshi_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0015_00_takeshi/2301_1201_620:
From there, I focused on experiencing as many
things as possible. Like that training.
charaepi_ch0015_00_takeshi_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0015_00_takeshi/2301_1201_630:
And after a long time of doing that, I became a
Gym Leader.
charaepi_ch0015_00_takeshi_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0015_00_takeshi/2301_1201_640:
So I know that you can do the
same, [Name:PlayerNickname ].
charaepi_ch0015_00_takeshi_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0015_00_takeshi/2301_1201_650:
The workout we did today was strictly what I
developed with Onix.
charaepi_ch0015_00_takeshi_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0015_00_takeshi/2301_1201_660:
If that workout and training session can inspire
you, that would make me happy.
charaepi_ch0015_00_takeshi_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0015_00_takeshi/2301_1201_670: Onix is cheering you on, too.
charaepi_ch0015_00_takeshi_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0015_00_takeshi/2301_0302_700: Well, I’ll do what I can.
charaepi_ch0015_00_takeshi_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0015_00_takeshi/2301_1201_720: If there’s anything I can do to help, let me know!

charaepi_ch0015_01_takeshi_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0015_01_takeshi/2301_1201_020:
Now, I want an honest answer.
Do you think this outfit suits me?
charaepi_ch0015_01_takeshi_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0015_01_takeshi/2301_0401_040: I’m glad to hear you think so, too.
charaepi_ch0015_01_takeshi_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0015_01_takeshi/2301_0402_060:
Hm. When you say “not bad,” that means 
that it’s somewhat becoming, right?
charaepi_ch0015_01_takeshi_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0015_01_takeshi/2301_1201_070: I’m rather fond of this suit myself.
charaepi_ch0015_01_takeshi_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0015_01_takeshi/2301_1201_080: But...I also kind of feel it’s a little...too much.
charaepi_ch0015_01_takeshi_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0015_01_takeshi/2301_1201_090:
While I do like it, it’s a little 
embarrassing at the same time.
charaepi_ch0015_01_takeshi_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0015_01_takeshi/2301_1201_140:
Apparently, this sygna suit was designed to give
Trainers a stronger connection to their Pokémon.
charaepi_ch0015_01_takeshi_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0015_01_takeshi/2301_1201_150:
I’m not familiar with fashion, 
but some so-called famous designer 
was very insistent that I wear this suit.
charaepi_ch0015_01_takeshi_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0015_01_takeshi/2301_1201_160:
And here’s the weird thing: when I’m wearing
this outfit, I feel like I’ve become Tyranitar.
charaepi_ch0015_01_takeshi_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0015_01_takeshi/2301_1201_170:
I’ve been training with Tyranitar for a 
while now. I would trust him with my life.
charaepi_ch0015_01_takeshi_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0015_01_takeshi/2301_1201_180:
And before I started wearing this suit, 
I thought we perfectly understood each other.
charaepi_ch0015_01_takeshi_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0015_01_takeshi/2301_1201_190: But once I put on this outfit...
charaepi_ch0015_01_takeshi_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0015_01_takeshi/2301_1201_200:
I feel like I can feel the same things he does.
Like I know exactly what he wants me to do
with incredible clarity.
charaepi_ch0015_01_takeshi_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0015_01_takeshi/2301_1201_210: At least that’s how it feels.
charaepi_ch0015_01_takeshi_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0015_01_takeshi/2301_1201_220:
If I can focus on honing this sensation 
to perfection, Tyranitar and I should be 
able to reach new heights!
charaepi_ch0015_01_takeshi_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0015_01_takeshi/2301_1201_230:
This sygna suit made me feel the possibility
of becoming even closer to my Pokémon.
charaepi_ch0015_01_takeshi_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0015_01_takeshi/2301_0401_250: As a fellow Trainer, I agree.
charaepi_ch0015_01_takeshi_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0015_01_takeshi/2301_0302_260: I want to wear it, too!
charaepi_ch0015_01_takeshi_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0015_01_takeshi/2301_0402_270:
As a fellow Trainer, I can understand
the sentiment.
charaepi_ch0015_01_takeshi_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0015_01_takeshi/2301_1201_280: Tyranitar is known as the Armor Pokémon.
charaepi_ch0015_01_takeshi_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0015_01_takeshi/2301_1201_290:
This sygna suit is my armor! Now, Tyranitar
and I can fight even closer than ever!
charaepi_ch0015_01_takeshi_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0015_01_takeshi/2301_1201_310:
Now that I have this sygna suit, don’t think 
we are the same as we were before.
We are stronger than you could imagine!

charaepi_ch0016_00_huuro_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0016_00_huuro/2301_1101_0100_:
[Name:PlayerNickname ] climbed up a
rigorous mountain trail during [EN:Gen Ref='255' M='his' F='her' ] travels.
charaepi_ch0016_00_huuro_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0016_00_huuro/2301_1101_0200_:
[EN:Gen Ref='255' M='He' F='She' ] trudged toward the top of the mountain,
hoping for a good view of Pasio. That’s where
[EN:Gen Ref='255' M='he' F='she' ] ran into Skyla and Swanna.
charaepi_ch0016_00_huuro_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0016_00_huuro/2301_1201_0400_: Are you on your way up the mountain?
charaepi_ch0016_00_huuro_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0016_00_huuro/2301_0401_0600_:
I thought so! I figured you were heading that
way if you were on this trail!
charaepi_ch0016_00_huuro_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0016_00_huuro/2301_0402_0800_:
I thought so! I figured you were heading that
way if you were on this trail!
charaepi_ch0016_00_huuro_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0016_00_huuro/2301_1201_0900_:
I was looking down on the trail while Swanna 
and I were flying overhead, and I realized...
charaepi_ch0016_00_huuro_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0016_00_huuro/2301_0401_1200_: But don’t worry! Swanna and I are here now!
charaepi_ch0016_00_huuro_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0016_00_huuro/2301_0302_1300_: Yeah, it’s a lot harder than it looked.
charaepi_ch0016_00_huuro_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0016_00_huuro/2301_0402_1400_: But don’t worry! Swanna and I are here now!
charaepi_ch0016_00_huuro_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0016_00_huuro/2301_1201_1500_:
If it’s getting too tough to keep hiking, 
you can just fly to the top!
charaepi_ch0016_00_huuro_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0016_00_huuro/2301_1201_1600_: Looks like Swanna’s all for it, too!
charaepi_ch0016_00_huuro_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0016_00_huuro/2301_1201_1700_: So, how about it? Let’s go for a nice flight!
charaepi_ch0016_00_huuro_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0016_00_huuro/2301_1201_2200_: Thanks, Swanna. That was fun, wasn’t it?
charaepi_ch0016_00_huuro_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0016_00_huuro/2301_1201_2700_:
She got stronger by always flying next to me
whenever I flew my cargo plane.
charaepi_ch0016_00_huuro_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0016_00_huuro/2301_1201_2800_:
Hanging out with her made me realize how fun
it is to do things with your Pokémon—
charaepi_ch0016_00_huuro_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0016_00_huuro/2301_1201_2900_: and how fun it is to get help from them!
charaepi_ch0016_00_huuro_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0016_00_huuro/2301_1201_3000_: That’s why I’m really glad I came to Pasio.
charaepi_ch0016_00_huuro_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0016_00_huuro/2301_1201_3100_:
Trainers and Pokémon all help each other out 
to make great Pokémon battles together.
charaepi_ch0016_00_huuro_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0016_00_huuro/2301_1201_3200_:
And you can make better memories if you share
them with Pokémon and other people!
charaepi_ch0016_00_huuro_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0016_00_huuro/2301_1201_3300_:
What I’m trying to say is that it made me really
appreciate working hard together!
charaepi_ch0016_00_huuro_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0016_00_huuro/2301_1201_3400_:
I’d love to have more Pokémon battles with you
and share more memories together!
charaepi_ch0016_00_huuro_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0016_00_huuro/2301_0401_3600_: Great! It’s a unanimous decision, then!
charaepi_ch0016_00_huuro_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0016_00_huuro/2301_0302_3700_: Yeah, I feel the same way.
charaepi_ch0016_00_huuro_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0016_00_huuro/2301_0402_3800_: Great! It’s a unanimous decision, then!

charaepi_ch0018_00_chris_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0018_00_chris/2301_1101_0100_:
While taking a stroll in the forest one day,
[Name:PlayerNickname ] ran into Kris.
charaepi_ch0018_00_chris_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0018_00_chris/2301_1101_0200_:
She seemed to be in the middle of observing her
Totodile and jotting down some notes.
charaepi_ch0018_00_chris_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0018_00_chris/2301_1201_0300_:
Heh heh heh. I guess Berries are no problem
for you, Totodile, with the way your teeth crunch
through everything!
charaepi_ch0018_00_chris_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0018_00_chris/2301_0301_0400_: You look like you’re having fun!
charaepi_ch0018_00_chris_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0018_00_chris/2301_0401_0500_: Yeah, observing Totodile like this is so much fun!
charaepi_ch0018_00_chris_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0018_00_chris/2301_0302_0600_: I wouldn’t want to be bitten by her!
charaepi_ch0018_00_chris_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0018_00_chris/2301_0402_0700_:
You have no idea how many times she’s tried to
bite me...
charaepi_ch0018_00_chris_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0018_00_chris/2301_0402_0800_:
And despite Totodile’s funny nature, there’s
no reason for her to ever change, either.
charaepi_ch0018_00_chris_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0018_00_chris/2301_1201_0900_: She’s always been like this, you know.
charaepi_ch0018_00_chris_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0018_00_chris/2301_1201_1000_:
Ever since we went on our journey. And she
hasn’t really changed since we came to
Pasio, either.
charaepi_ch0018_00_chris_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0018_00_chris/2301_1201_1100_: I wish I could stay the same like her.
charaepi_ch0018_00_chris_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0018_00_chris/2301_0401_1300_: Rather, I feel like I have to change.
charaepi_ch0018_00_chris_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0018_00_chris/2301_0402_1500_: Yeah. She’s always so energetic and optimistic.
charaepi_ch0018_00_chris_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0018_00_chris/2301_1201_1600_:
My goal has always been to learn everything
there is to know about Pokémon.
charaepi_ch0018_00_chris_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0018_00_chris/2301_1201_1700_:
But I’ve started thinking that trying to master
everything would only make me into a
jack-of-all-trades...and a master of none.
charaepi_ch0018_00_chris_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0018_00_chris/2301_1201_1800_:
All the famous professors have their field of
expertise, and they carry their subject further
and further.
charaepi_ch0018_00_chris_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0018_00_chris/2301_1201_1900_:
And here I am, trying to know everything...
I should at least figure out whether I’m going to
specialize in battles or ecology.
charaepi_ch0018_00_chris_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0018_00_chris/2301_0401_2100_:
Well, they’re both really interesting fields, so
I’m having a hard time figuring out which one
to choose.
charaepi_ch0018_00_chris_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0018_00_chris/2301_0302_2200_:
You want to master
Pokémon ecology?
charaepi_ch0018_00_chris_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0018_00_chris/2301_0402_2300_:
Well, they’re both really interesting fields, so
I’m having a hard time figuring out which one
to choose.
charaepi_ch0018_00_chris_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0018_00_chris/2301_1201_2400_:
But Professor Oak is already perfecting the study
of Pokémon ecology.
charaepi_ch0018_00_chris_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0018_00_chris/2301_1201_2500_:
And Agatha is already on the path to becoming
a master of Pokémon battles.
charaepi_ch0018_00_chris_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0018_00_chris/2301_1201_2600_: I have to find my own path, just like they did.
charaepi_ch0018_00_chris_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0018_00_chris/2301_1201_2700_: What do you think I should do, Totodile?
charaepi_ch0018_00_chris_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0018_00_chris/2301_1201_2800_: That’s a tough question, isn’t it?
charaepi_ch0018_00_chris_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0018_00_chris/2301_1201_2900_: What path would be best for me...
charaepi_ch0018_00_chris_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0018_00_chris/2301_0301_3000_:
Why not ask one of those
famous people?
charaepi_ch0018_00_chris_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0018_00_chris/2301_0302_3200_:
Why not look for that path
with Totodile?
charaepi_ch0018_00_chris_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0018_00_chris/2301_1201_3400_:
Oh, never mind me. This is my problem.
I should make the decision on my own.
charaepi_ch0018_00_chris_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0018_00_chris/2301_0301_3500_:
You don’t have to do it
all on your own.
charaepi_ch0018_00_chris_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0018_00_chris/2301_0302_3700_: I’ll help any way I can.
charaepi_ch0018_00_chris_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0018_00_chris/2301_1201_3900_:
Thanks.
I appreciate the concern—and your support.
charaepi_ch0018_00_chris_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0018_00_chris/2301_1201_4100_:
As long as I’m on Pasio, Totodile and I 
will do this. We’ll meet and talk to 
as many people as we can!
charaepi_ch0018_00_chris_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0018_00_chris/2301_1201_4200_: No, not just talk to them—battle them, too!
charaepi_ch0018_00_chris_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0018_00_chris/2301_1201_4300_:
Yeah! No more dwelling on this alone! I’m gonna
ask for more help from you guys in the future!
charaepi_ch0018_00_chris_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0018_00_chris/2301_0302_4600_: You can come to us for anything!
charaepi_ch0018_00_chris_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0018_00_chris/2301_0402_4700_:
Thanks, guys!
And [Name:PlayerNickname ], if you ever
need somebody to talk to, you can count on me!
charaepi_ch0018_00_chris_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0018_00_chris/2301_1201_4800_:
I’ll use my knowledge to help you solve
your problems!
charaepi_ch0018_00_chris_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0018_00_chris/2311_1201_0100_:
Hey, since we’re crossing paths here, 
let’s have a Pokémon battle!
charaepi_ch0018_00_chris_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0018_00_chris/2311_1201_0200_: Sure! Totodile and I are ready for anything!
charaepi_ch0018_00_chris_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0018_00_chris/2311_1201_0300_:
All right! Then time for a serious battle with
pretty ol’ me!
charaepi_ch0018_00_chris_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0018_00_chris/2311_0101_0100_:
I think your Pokémon is going to change after
this battle!
charaepi_ch0018_00_chris_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0018_00_chris/2311_0501_0100_: I lost? But I’m so pretty... How is this possible?
charaepi_ch0018_00_chris_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0018_00_chris/2311_0501_0200_:
You might be cuter, but I won’t let that stop me
from winning!
charaepi_ch0018_00_chris_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0018_00_chris/2311_0501_0300_:
You think I’m...
Waaah! That makes me so happy!
Say it again!
charaepi_ch0018_00_chris_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0018_00_chris/2311_0501_0400_:
Hm?
Totodile’s acting strange...
Oh, she’s evolving!
charaepi_ch0018_00_chris_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0018_00_chris/2311_0501_0500_:
That’s great, Totodile!
You’re going to get even stronger!
charaepi_ch0018_00_chris_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0018_00_chris/2312_1201_0100_: You there! Let’s have a Pokémon battle!
charaepi_ch0018_00_chris_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0018_00_chris/2312_1201_0200_:
Well, that came out of nowhere, but we’re ready
for anything! Bring it on!
charaepi_ch0018_00_chris_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0018_00_chris/2312_1201_0300_:
You and your Pokémon are just as good as
people say you are!
charaepi_ch0018_00_chris_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0018_00_chris/2312_0101_0100_:
My Pokémon and your Pokémon—let’s see which
one’s tougher!
charaepi_ch0018_00_chris_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0018_00_chris/2312_0501_0100_:
To think that you are tougher than us...
Your Croconaw truly is amazing.
charaepi_ch0018_00_chris_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0018_00_chris/2312_0501_0200_:
Thanks!
I think Croconaw is great, too!
charaepi_ch0018_00_chris_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0018_00_chris/2312_0501_0300_:
Not only that—Croconaw looks like she’s about
to evolve from that last battle. She IS great!
charaepi_ch0018_00_chris_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0018_00_chris/2312_0501_0400_:
Croconaw! You’re going to evolve!
That’s amazing!
charaepi_ch0018_00_chris_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0018_00_chris/2312_0501_0500_: I’m so happy for you, Croconaw!

charaepi_ch0019_00_yuki_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0019_00_yuki/2301_1101_0200_2:
Thinking that he was secretly training,
[Name:PlayerNickname ] followed him.
charaepi_ch0019_00_yuki_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0019_00_yuki/2301_1201_0400_1:
Wait... [Name:PlayerNickname ]?!
What are you doing here?!
charaepi_ch0019_00_yuki_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0019_00_yuki/2301_1201_0500_1:
Sorry I startled you.
Treecko looked like he was itching for a fight.
charaepi_ch0019_00_yuki_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0019_00_yuki/2301_0401_0700_1:
Man, Trainers aiming for the top 
have some guts, don’t they?
charaepi_ch0019_00_yuki_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0019_00_yuki/2301_0302_0800_1: I felt my heart skip a beat!
charaepi_ch0019_00_yuki_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0019_00_yuki/2301_0402_0900_1:
Sorry, sorry!
But in my defense, you did let your guard down.
charaepi_ch0019_00_yuki_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0019_00_yuki/2301_1201_1000_1:
Treecko and I were just in the middle of trying
to figure out some new tactics.
charaepi_ch0019_00_yuki_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0019_00_yuki/2301_1201_1100_1:
Treecko can climb trees and walls using the
small hooks on his hands and feet.
charaepi_ch0019_00_yuki_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0019_00_yuki/2301_1201_1200_1:
I was just wondering if that would be 
something we can use on the ground, too.
charaepi_ch0019_00_yuki_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0019_00_yuki/2301_1201_1300_1:
As long as I’m here, I’d like to do
everything I possibly can!
charaepi_ch0019_00_yuki_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0019_00_yuki/2301_1201_1400_1:
I’m probably going to end up battling my
father, too.
charaepi_ch0019_00_yuki_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0019_00_yuki/2301_1201_1500_1:
It’s a little awkward going up against your own
family, isn’t it?
charaepi_ch0019_00_yuki_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0019_00_yuki/2301_1201_1600_1:
I mean, it clearly shows you who’s
stronger, right?
charaepi_ch0019_00_yuki_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0019_00_yuki/2301_1201_1700_1:
And it doesn’t matter whether you win or lose.
It will still become awkward. I mean...what do
you talk about after that?
charaepi_ch0019_00_yuki_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0019_00_yuki/2301_1201_1800_1:
But that wasn’t the case for my dad. He lost to
me, but he seemed a little happy.
charaepi_ch0019_00_yuki_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0019_00_yuki/2301_1201_1900_1:
I don’t get it...
It’s frustrating when you lose, right?
At least, I don’t like losing.
charaepi_ch0019_00_yuki_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0019_00_yuki/2301_1201_2400_1:
I get to have a strong rival really close by!
How could I not battle him?!
charaepi_ch0019_00_yuki_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0019_00_yuki/2301_1201_2500_1:
Besides, I can’t say that I’m stronger than him
just because I beat him once.
charaepi_ch0019_00_yuki_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0019_00_yuki/2301_1201_2600_1:
Maybe if my dad and I had different specialties,
like the neighbors do, I wouldn’t be so bothered.
charaepi_ch0019_00_yuki_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0019_00_yuki/2301_0401_2800_1:
Yeah, Professor Birch and May.
They’re my next-door neighbors.
charaepi_ch0019_00_yuki_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0019_00_yuki/2301_0402_3000_1:
Yeah, like Professor Birch and May have.
They’re my next-door neighbors.
charaepi_ch0019_00_yuki_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0019_00_yuki/2301_1201_3100_1:
Professor Birch focuses on his fieldwork,
and May focuses on her contests.
See? No overlap.
charaepi_ch0019_00_yuki_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0019_00_yuki/2301_1201_3200_1:
But thinking like that is just me running away.
While clashing can be tough, it might actually
be fortunate at the same time.
charaepi_ch0019_00_yuki_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0019_00_yuki/2301_1201_3300_1:
My dad is strong and respectable.
That’s why I want to overcome him.
charaepi_ch0019_00_yuki_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0019_00_yuki/2301_1201_3400_1:
And that’s why I have to get even better at
my specialty!
charaepi_ch0019_00_yuki_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0019_00_yuki/2301_1201_3600_1:
Hey, [Name:PlayerNickname ].
Let’s have a battle sometime!
charaepi_ch0019_00_yuki_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0019_00_yuki/2301_1201_3700_1: That way I can see how much stronger I’ve gotten!

charaepi_ch0020_00_toya_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0020_00_toya/2301_1101_0100_2:
One day, [Name:PlayerNickname ] saw Hilbert
while walking through the city.
charaepi_ch0020_00_toya_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0020_00_toya/2301_1101_0200_2:
Hilbert was surrounded by all sorts of Pokémon,
including his partner, Oshawott.
charaepi_ch0020_00_toya_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0020_00_toya/2301_0401_0400_1:
Whoa! [Name:PlayerNickname ]!
I didn’t see you there!
charaepi_ch0020_00_toya_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0020_00_toya/2301_0402_0600_1:
Whoa! [Name:PlayerNickname ]!
I didn’t see you there!
charaepi_ch0020_00_toya_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0020_00_toya/2301_1201_0700_1:
Ha ha, yeah. I was wondering what I was going
to do with all these.
charaepi_ch0020_00_toya_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0020_00_toya/2301_1201_0800_1:
Before I realized it, these Pokémon were
following me.
charaepi_ch0020_00_toya_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0020_00_toya/2301_1201_0900_1: There aren’t any wild Pokémon on Pasio, right?
charaepi_ch0020_00_toya_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0020_00_toya/2301_1201_1000_1:
If that’s true, there must be a lot of Trainers out
there looking for their Pokémon right now.
charaepi_ch0020_00_toya_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0020_00_toya/2301_1201_1100_1:
Do you think you could help me find all of their
Trainers, [Name:PlayerNickname ]?
charaepi_ch0020_00_toya_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0020_00_toya/2301_0302_1400_1:
No way!
That’s way too much trouble!
charaepi_ch0020_00_toya_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0020_00_toya/2301_0402_1500_1:
Whoa, Oshawott! Calm down!
Sorry, I guess he wants you to help us out.
charaepi_ch0020_00_toya_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0020_00_toya/2301_0402_1600_1:
You’ll help me? Really?
Thanks so much! I really appreciate it!
charaepi_ch0020_00_toya_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0020_00_toya/2301_1201_1700_1:
Let’s first ask around to every Trainer we
come across.
charaepi_ch0020_00_toya_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0020_00_toya/2301_1201_1800_1: Maybe we can find some clues that way!
charaepi_ch0020_00_toya_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0020_00_toya/2301_1201_1900_1:
I can’t thank you enough! We were able to get
all those Pokémon back to their Trainers,
thanks to you!
charaepi_ch0020_00_toya_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0020_00_toya/2301_1201_2000_1:
But I wonder why they got separated to
begin with? They all mentioned seeing
some suspicious Trainers going around.
charaepi_ch0020_00_toya_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0020_00_toya/2301_0301_2100_1:
It might be those knuckleheads with
the masks.
charaepi_ch0020_00_toya_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0020_00_toya/2301_0401_2200_1:
Oh, you may be right.
I didn’t think of that possibility.
charaepi_ch0020_00_toya_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0020_00_toya/2301_0302_2300_1: Maybe there are bad Trainers about?
charaepi_ch0020_00_toya_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0020_00_toya/2301_0402_2400_1:
Oh, you may be right.
I didn’t think of that possibility.
charaepi_ch0020_00_toya_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0020_00_toya/2301_1201_2500_1:
If that’s the case, maybe it was for the best that
those Pokémon gathered around me.
charaepi_ch0020_00_toya_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0020_00_toya/2301_1201_2600_1:
I’ve been to all sorts of regions, training my
Pokémon and testing my abilities.
charaepi_ch0020_00_toya_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0020_00_toya/2301_1201_2700_1:
Oshawott looks like he wants to get stronger,
as well.
charaepi_ch0020_00_toya_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0020_00_toya/2301_1201_2800_1: I’ve had Oshawott since he was an Egg.
charaepi_ch0020_00_toya_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0020_00_toya/2301_1201_2900_1:
I found that Egg a while back, after I had left a
Samurott I had at a Pokémon Day Care.
charaepi_ch0020_00_toya_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0020_00_toya/2301_1201_3000_1:
I think he wants to be like my Samurott.
I can’t blame him. Samurott is really strong.
charaepi_ch0020_00_toya_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0020_00_toya/2301_1201_3100_1:
I want to help Oshawott and make his dream to
become a strong Samurott come true.
charaepi_ch0020_00_toya_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0020_00_toya/2301_1201_3200_1:
Seeing those Pokémon and Trainers separated from
each other got me thinking.
charaepi_ch0020_00_toya_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0020_00_toya/2301_1201_3300_1:
Trainers and Pokémon don’t really do well on their
own, do they?
charaepi_ch0020_00_toya_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0020_00_toya/2301_1201_3400_1: Ah, sorry. Guess I’m just starting to ramble now.
charaepi_ch0020_00_toya_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0020_00_toya/2301_1201_3500_1:
You’re such a good listener that I got
carried away.
charaepi_ch0020_00_toya_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0020_00_toya/2301_1201_3600_1: That reminds me. You want to be stronger, right?
charaepi_ch0020_00_toya_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0020_00_toya/2301_0401_3800_1:
Then it might be a good thing 
that we teamed up!
charaepi_ch0020_00_toya_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0020_00_toya/2301_0402_4000_1:
Then it might be a good thing 
that we teamed up!
charaepi_ch0020_00_toya_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0020_00_toya/2301_1201_4100_1: I think we’re on the same wavelength!
charaepi_ch0020_00_toya_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0020_00_toya/2301_1201_4200_1:
I’m sure we’ll be tagging along at least until
Oshawott reaches his full potential.
charaepi_ch0020_00_toya_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0020_00_toya/2301_1201_4300_1:
I’m with you not only as your teammate
but also as a friend and rival!

charaepi_ch0021_00_green_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0021_00_green/2301_1101_0100_:
As [Name:PlayerNickname ] was doing some
shopping, [EN:Gen Ref='255' M='he' F='she' ] spotted Blue a little ways away.
charaepi_ch0021_00_green_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0021_00_green/2301_1201_0300_:
I was atop the arena when I saw you walking,
so I thought I would come down to talk to you!
charaepi_ch0021_00_green_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0021_00_green/2301_0301_0400_: You were on top of the arena?
charaepi_ch0021_00_green_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0021_00_green/2301_0401_0500_:
Yeah, the best way to get the lay of the land is
to get a good look from as high as you can get.
charaepi_ch0021_00_green_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0021_00_green/2301_0402_0700_:
Nah. Plus, the best way to get 
the lay of the land is to get a good look 
from as high as you can get.
charaepi_ch0021_00_green_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0021_00_green/2301_1201_0900_:
Not only that, but he can pinpoint a Magikarp
a thousand meters below him.
charaepi_ch0021_00_green_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0021_00_green/2301_1201_1000_:
High places are Pidgeot’s territory, to the degree
that he and I might spend more time in the skies
than on land.
charaepi_ch0021_00_green_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0021_00_green/2301_1201_1200_:
We’ve been all over the world, 
but Pasio really is a nice place.
charaepi_ch0021_00_green_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0021_00_green/2301_0401_1400_:
Yeah, while Pidgeot and I were flying around,
we saw firsthand how pretty the island is.
charaepi_ch0021_00_green_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0021_00_green/2301_0401_1500_:
It shows how well this artificial island is able
to blend into nature.
charaepi_ch0021_00_green_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0021_00_green/2301_0402_1700_:
Sure is. There are Trainers and their Pokémon
gathered here from all over the world.
charaepi_ch0021_00_green_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0021_00_green/2301_0402_1800_:
We have plenty of people to battle, too, 
so that’s also a plus.
charaepi_ch0021_00_green_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0021_00_green/2301_1201_1900_:
It’s pretty much a paradise for Trainers
and Pokémon!
charaepi_ch0021_00_green_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0021_00_green/2301_1201_2500_:
I’ve got this rival, Red.
You’ve seen him around, right?
charaepi_ch0021_00_green_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0021_00_green/2301_1201_2600_: You kinda remind me of him!
charaepi_ch0021_00_green_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0021_00_green/2301_1201_2700_: You’re like a crimson flame quietly burning.
charaepi_ch0021_00_green_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0021_00_green/2301_1201_2800_:
But even though you’re on the quiet side, you’re
hiding some awesome power, too, right?
charaepi_ch0021_00_green_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0021_00_green/2301_0402_3200_: No, I’m sure of it. Pidgeot agrees, too.
charaepi_ch0021_00_green_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0021_00_green/2301_1201_3300_:
That’s why I have to take you down
myself someday!
charaepi_ch0021_00_green_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0021_00_green/2301_1201_3400_: OK... Maybe that came out a bit strong.
charaepi_ch0021_00_green_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0021_00_green/2301_1201_3500_:
But anyway, I’m traveling around the world so
that I can get even one step closer to being the
absolute best.
charaepi_ch0021_00_green_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0021_00_green/2301_1201_3600_:
Right now, I don’t think I’d lose to either you
or Red!
charaepi_ch0021_00_green_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0021_00_green/2301_1201_3700_:
What? Don’t be overconfident?
Come on, Pidgeot...
charaepi_ch0021_00_green_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0021_00_green/2301_1201_3800_:
How am I supposed to keep my feet on the
ground if I’m flying high with you, buddy?
charaepi_ch0021_00_green_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0021_00_green/2301_0301_3900_: I’ll blast you out of the sky!
charaepi_ch0021_00_green_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0021_00_green/2301_0401_4000_: Ooh, looks like somebody can talk big! I like it!
charaepi_ch0021_00_green_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0021_00_green/2301_0302_4100_: I’ll fly just as high and catch you!
charaepi_ch0021_00_green_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0021_00_green/2301_0402_4200_: Ooh, looks like somebody can talk big! I like it!
charaepi_ch0021_00_green_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0021_00_green/2301_1201_4300_:
But if you’re gonna try your hand, I’d recommend
you try sooner rather than later.
charaepi_ch0021_00_green_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0021_00_green/2301_1201_4400_: We’re as free as the wind, after all.
charaepi_ch0021_00_green_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0021_00_green/2301_1201_4500_:
If we get bored, we’ll wander away to who
knows where next.
charaepi_ch0021_00_green_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0021_00_green/2301_1201_4600_: You’re the same, too, aren’t you? I can tell.
charaepi_ch0021_00_green_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0021_00_green/2301_1201_4700_: Birds of a feather and all that!

charaepi_ch0022_00_urup_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0022_00_urup/2301_1101_0100_2:
[Name:PlayerNickname ] slowly walked through
the narrow passageways of the caves.
charaepi_ch0022_00_urup_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0022_00_urup/2301_1101_0200_2:
Passageways so narrow, in fact, that two people
would have a difficult time passing each other.
charaepi_ch0022_00_urup_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0022_00_urup/2301_1201_0300_1: Whoa there... Hang on a minute.
charaepi_ch0022_00_urup_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0022_00_urup/2301_1201_0400_1: Well, aren’t we in a pickle.
charaepi_ch0022_00_urup_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0022_00_urup/2301_0401_0600_1:
I didn’t think I would run in to you here.
How are we gonna get through this path now?
charaepi_ch0022_00_urup_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0022_00_urup/2301_0402_0800_1:
Oh, don’t put on airs. You want to get to the
other side, right?
charaepi_ch0022_00_urup_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0022_00_urup/2301_1201_0900_1:
Life throws you moments like this from time
to time, doesn’t it?
charaepi_ch0022_00_urup_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0022_00_urup/2301_1201_1000_1:
If we could both change form, 
like water changes into ice, 
that might let us slip on by each other.
charaepi_ch0022_00_urup_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0022_00_urup/2301_1201_1100_1: But I’m about as graceful as a hunk of ice!
charaepi_ch0022_00_urup_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0022_00_urup/2301_1201_1200_1:
I wouldn’t say I’m meticulous either...
And I don’t have the best patience.
charaepi_ch0022_00_urup_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0022_00_urup/2301_1201_1300_1:
I just do what I want to do. I even left my
Gym in my wife’s care so I could travel!
She wasn’t too happy about that...
charaepi_ch0022_00_urup_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0022_00_urup/2301_1201_1400_1: I do feel bad about it, y’know?
charaepi_ch0022_00_urup_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0022_00_urup/2301_0301_1500_1: Well, that certainly can’t feel good.
charaepi_ch0022_00_urup_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0022_00_urup/2301_0402_1800_1:
I’m being serious. But I just can’t seem to change
that easily...
charaepi_ch0022_00_urup_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0022_00_urup/2301_1201_1900_1:
But rest assured, I can do more than just
cause trouble for my team.
charaepi_ch0022_00_urup_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0022_00_urup/2301_1201_2000_1:
I might be stubborn and inflexible, but...
Here, watch this!
charaepi_ch0022_00_urup_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0022_00_urup/2301_1201_2100_1:
How ’bout that! A lot more reliable all of a
sudden, aren’t I?
charaepi_ch0022_00_urup_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0022_00_urup/2301_1201_2200_1:
Except...now we’re definitely not
going anywhere.
charaepi_ch0022_00_urup_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0022_00_urup/2301_1201_2300_1:
Heh... Avalugg can’t even be flipped 
by a Slaking moving at full power!
charaepi_ch0022_00_urup_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0022_00_urup/2301_1201_2400_1:
We can protect you from any opponent!
That’s what friends are for, y’know?
charaepi_ch0022_00_urup_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0022_00_urup/2301_0401_2600_1: I know! You can count on me anytime!
charaepi_ch0022_00_urup_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0022_00_urup/2301_0302_2700_1:
You can rely on me from 
time to time, too, you know.
charaepi_ch0022_00_urup_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0022_00_urup/2301_0402_2800_1:
Well, that’s a nice thing to say.
Makes it really hit home that we’re a team!
charaepi_ch0022_00_urup_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0022_00_urup/2301_1201_2900_1: You really are a good person, y’know?
charaepi_ch0022_00_urup_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0022_00_urup/2301_1201_3000_1: I’m glad I have such supportive friends.
charaepi_ch0022_00_urup_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0022_00_urup/2301_1201_3100_1:
As you know, I’m pretty unyielding.
But that’s why when I say something, I mean it.
charaepi_ch0022_00_urup_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0022_00_urup/2301_1201_3200_1:
As long as I’ve got breath in my body, I’ll stand
in front and protect you.
charaepi_ch0022_00_urup_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0022_00_urup/2301_1201_3400_1:
That being said...it looks like flexibility might be
what we really need in this situation, huh?
charaepi_ch0022_00_urup_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0022_00_urup/2301_1201_3500_1:
These crevices are a little too narrow for me.
I don’t think I can move forward any farther,
so I guess I’ll double back the way I came.
charaepi_ch0022_00_urup_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0022_00_urup/2301_1201_3600_1:
Some days you might think you’re moving forward,
but you just end up moving backward...
That’s just the way it is, y’know.
charaepi_ch0022_00_urup_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0022_00_urup/2301_1201_3700_1:
I guess having an unrelenting personality
doesn’t do me any good in these situations!

charaepi_ch0023_00_momi_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0023_00_momi/2301_1101_0100_2:
[Name:PlayerNickname ] wandered into a
clearing in the forest, hoping to relax
and catch a nice breath of fresh air.
charaepi_ch0023_00_momi_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0023_00_momi/2301_1101_0200_2:
There, [EN:Gen Ref='255' M='he' F='she' ] found Cheryl and Blissey
playing happily together.
charaepi_ch0023_00_momi_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0023_00_momi/2301_1201_0300_1:
Oh, hello, [Name:PlayerNickname ].
Are you seeking out new Trainers to
battle with again today?
charaepi_ch0023_00_momi_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0023_00_momi/2301_0401_0500_1:
Really? In that case, I know a
lovely spot for relaxing.
charaepi_ch0023_00_momi_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0023_00_momi/2301_0402_0700_1:
I see. Are you feeling tired at all?
How about taking a little break for a change?
I know a lovely spot for relaxing.
charaepi_ch0023_00_momi_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0023_00_momi/2301_1201_0800_1:
Not many people go there,
so it should be nice and quiet.
charaepi_ch0023_00_momi_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0023_00_momi/2301_1201_0900_1:
I can show you the way.
Come on—let’s go!
charaepi_ch0023_00_momi_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0023_00_momi/2301_1101_1000_2:
Cheryl started forward on the path
with a happy spring in her step.
charaepi_ch0023_00_momi_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0023_00_momi/2301_1101_1100_2:
But along the way, her foot got caught on
a knobbly root sticking out of the ground,
causing her to lose her balance.
charaepi_ch0023_00_momi_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0023_00_momi/2301_1101_1400_2:
[Name:PlayerNickname ] instinctively reached
out a hand to keep Cheryl from falling...
charaepi_ch0023_00_momi_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0023_00_momi/2301_1101_1410_2: only to take a tumble [EN:Gen Ref='255' M='himself' F='herself' ] instead.
charaepi_ch0023_00_momi_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0023_00_momi/2301_1201_1800_1: Oh dear... This is all my fault.
charaepi_ch0023_00_momi_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0023_00_momi/2301_1201_1900_1:
It looks like you might have scraped
your knee. May I take a look?
charaepi_ch0023_00_momi_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0023_00_momi/2301_0401_2100_1:
I’ll fix you right up.
Hold still for just a moment, OK?
charaepi_ch0023_00_momi_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0023_00_momi/2301_0402_2300_1:
Nonsense! Come now—let me take a look.
You don’t want it to get infected, do you?
charaepi_ch0023_00_momi_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0023_00_momi/2301_1201_2600_1:
It almost looks like you never scraped
your knee at all. I’m so glad you’re OK.
charaepi_ch0023_00_momi_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0023_00_momi/2301_1201_2700_1:
Although...I can’t help but feel a little giddy about
all of this.
charaepi_ch0023_00_momi_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0023_00_momi/2301_1201_2800_1:
Your strong, steady determination is a
constant support for me...
charaepi_ch0023_00_momi_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0023_00_momi/2301_1201_2900_1:
but it’s not often that I get the chance
to return the favor and be helpful to
you, [Name:PlayerNickname ].
charaepi_ch0023_00_momi_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0023_00_momi/2301_1201_3000_1:
Wait... But it was my fault that you got
injured in the first place today, wasn’t it?
Oh dear, I’m sorry!
charaepi_ch0023_00_momi_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0023_00_momi/2301_0301_3100_1: It’s OK! Thanks for your help.
charaepi_ch0023_00_momi_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0023_00_momi/2301_0401_3200_1:
Oh, you’re a dear, [Name:PlayerNickname ]...
Just being around you always seems to
make my heart bubble up with joy.
charaepi_ch0023_00_momi_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0023_00_momi/2301_0402_3400_1:
Oh, you’re a dear, [Name:PlayerNickname ]...
Just being around you always seems to
make my heart bubble up with joy.
charaepi_ch0023_00_momi_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0023_00_momi/2301_1201_3500_1:
Compared to you, I think I...
I still have a lot of room to grow in that area.
charaepi_ch0023_00_momi_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0023_00_momi/2301_1201_3600_1:
Did you know that Blissey are called
the Happiness Pokémon?
Making others happy brings them joy.
charaepi_ch0023_00_momi_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0023_00_momi/2301_1201_3700_1:
That means that when other people are happy,
Blissey feels happy, too. It’s contagious!
charaepi_ch0023_00_momi_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0023_00_momi/2301_1201_3800_1:
For a while, I used to be really hesitant
when it came to asking my Pokémon to battle.
I sort of felt bad for them, you see...
charaepi_ch0023_00_momi_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0023_00_momi/2301_1201_3900_1:
But then my dear Blissey here, still a Chansey
at the time, decided to evolve so that she
could help me work through those feelings.
charaepi_ch0023_00_momi_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0023_00_momi/2301_1201_4000_1:
Blissey was actually my inspiration for
participating in the PML. I knew that I
wanted to make people happy, just like her.
charaepi_ch0023_00_momi_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0023_00_momi/2301_0401_4200_1:
You know, it’s so strange...
For some reason, when I hear you say that,
I really believe that I CAN.
charaepi_ch0023_00_momi_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0023_00_momi/2301_0402_4400_1:
You know, it’s so strange...
For some reason, when I hear you say that,
I really believe that I can do it!
charaepi_ch0023_00_momi_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0023_00_momi/2301_1201_4500_1:
I must be the luckiest Trainer in the world
to have such a great role model as a friend.
charaepi_ch0023_00_momi_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0023_00_momi/2301_1201_4600_1:
Moving forward, I hope that you’ll continue
to teach us all sorts of new things.
That would make us both so happy.

charaepi_ch0024_00_shikimi_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0024_00_shikimi/2301_1101_010:
[Name:PlayerNickname ] spotted Shauntal
while strolling through town, but Shauntal
did not seem to notice [EN:Gen Ref='255' M='him' F='her' ].
charaepi_ch0024_00_shikimi_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0024_00_shikimi/2301_1201_020:
“The bond between them was deeper than
the darkest abyss. It would outlast eternity,
continuing without pause, forevermore...”
charaepi_ch0024_00_shikimi_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0024_00_shikimi/2301_1201_030: Ahh, this place makes me feel so inspired!
charaepi_ch0024_00_shikimi_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0024_00_shikimi/2301_0401_070:
[Name:PlayerNickname ]?! G-gosh, I’m sorry!
I must have been spacing out.
charaepi_ch0024_00_shikimi_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0024_00_shikimi/2301_0402_090:
[Name:PlayerNickname ]?! G-gosh, I’m sorry!
I must have been spacing out.
charaepi_ch0024_00_shikimi_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0024_00_shikimi/2301_0401_110:
I suppose so. I’m in the middle of writing
a novel, you see...
charaepi_ch0024_00_shikimi_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0024_00_shikimi/2301_0401_120:
My imagination must have gotten the best
of me as I was gazing out at the beautiful
cityscape here.
charaepi_ch0024_00_shikimi_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0024_00_shikimi/2301_0402_140: Yes, as a matter of fact!
