another lesson today.
charaepi_ch0038_00_hyouta_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0038_00_hyouta/2301_1201_3800:
No matter how crazy and outlandish my dream
may seem, as long as I never give up, I may
think of a way to make it a reality someday!
charaepi_ch0038_00_hyouta_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0038_00_hyouta/2301_1201_3900:
I’ll have to learn how to think outside
the box and become more resourceful,
just like my partner here!
charaepi_ch0038_00_hyouta_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0038_00_hyouta/2301_1201_4000:
I’ll still be Roark the Rock!
My willpower will still be unbreakable!
charaepi_ch0038_00_hyouta_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0038_00_hyouta/2301_1201_4100:
I just need to break out of my box
and think more unconventionally!

charaepi_ch0039_00_viola_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0039_00_viola/2301_1101_0100_:
The streets were bustling with people
and Pokémon.
charaepi_ch0039_00_viola_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0039_00_viola/2301_1101_0200_:
Suddenly, a white light flashed 
right next to [Name:PlayerNickname ]!
charaepi_ch0039_00_viola_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0039_00_viola/2301_1201_0300_:
Hello, [Name:PlayerNickname ]!
I got a fantastic shot of you!
charaepi_ch0039_00_viola_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0039_00_viola/2301_1201_0400_:
I was here shooting Pokémon that have gathered
from all across the country, when I finally saw
you, [Name:PlayerNickname ]!
charaepi_ch0039_00_viola_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0039_00_viola/2301_0401_0600_:
Of course! I like Pokémon, obviously, but getting
the perfect shot of a Trainer’s smiling face is
always what makes me the most excited.
charaepi_ch0039_00_viola_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0039_00_viola/2301_0302_0700_:
Did you get some good shots
of Pokémon?
charaepi_ch0039_00_viola_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0039_00_viola/2301_0402_0800_: Yeah, I already got a lot!
charaepi_ch0039_00_viola_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0039_00_viola/2301_0402_0900_:
I don’t want to let even a single Pokémon or
Trainer pass by without taking a picture!
charaepi_ch0039_00_viola_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0039_00_viola/2301_1201_1000_: I’ve been taking photos all day today, though.
charaepi_ch0039_00_viola_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0039_00_viola/2301_1201_1100_:
I just want to get one more good one of you,
and then I think I’ll take a break!
charaepi_ch0039_00_viola_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0039_00_viola/2301_1201_1200_: There it is! Right there! Fantastic! Just fantastic!
charaepi_ch0039_00_viola_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0039_00_viola/2301_1201_1300_:
I can see in your face that I caught you by
surprise with that one!
charaepi_ch0039_00_viola_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0039_00_viola/2301_1201_1400_:
But a surprised face makes for quite a
nice photo!
charaepi_ch0039_00_viola_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0039_00_viola/2301_1201_1500_:
So many Pokémon and Trainers have come to
this town, so everybody has a happy expression
on their face.
charaepi_ch0039_00_viola_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0039_00_viola/2301_1201_1600_:
I’ve been so busy, I’ve barely taken my eyes off
my camera’s viewfinder!
charaepi_ch0039_00_viola_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0039_00_viola/2301_0401_1800_:
It’s absolutely fantastic! Of course it’s fun!
Photography is my whole life!
charaepi_ch0039_00_viola_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0039_00_viola/2301_0302_1900_: Did you get any good pictures?
charaepi_ch0039_00_viola_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0039_00_viola/2301_0402_2000_:
Of course! All the Pokémon look so happy!
I almost feel like you can see the bonds they
have with their Trainers in the photos.
charaepi_ch0039_00_viola_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0039_00_viola/2301_1201_2100_:
When you look at Pokémon through the
viewfinder, you realize that each and every
one of them is totally unique.
charaepi_ch0039_00_viola_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0039_00_viola/2301_1201_2200_:
I mean, there are a lot of other Surskit out there
besides my Surskit.
charaepi_ch0039_00_viola_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0039_00_viola/2301_1201_2300_: But not one of them is quite like mine.
charaepi_ch0039_00_viola_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0039_00_viola/2301_1201_2400_:
Some are cool, some are a little scary, some
space cadets, some mischievous...
Each one is different, just like people.
charaepi_ch0039_00_viola_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0039_00_viola/2301_1201_2500_: That’s why I never get tired of them at all.
charaepi_ch0039_00_viola_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0039_00_viola/2301_0401_2700_:
When you take as many pictures as I do,
you start to notice the little things.
charaepi_ch0039_00_viola_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0039_00_viola/2301_0402_2900_:
You get it, too. That shows me that you’re really
paying attention to the Pokémon around you.
charaepi_ch0039_00_viola_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0039_00_viola/2301_1201_3000_:
This cutie has one expression that only I can
bring out of her.
charaepi_ch0039_00_viola_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0039_00_viola/2301_1201_3100_:
I’m sure your Pokémon has a face that it only
ever shows to you, too.
charaepi_ch0039_00_viola_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0039_00_viola/2301_1201_3200_:
For some Pokémon, it might only be a
really small difference.
charaepi_ch0039_00_viola_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0039_00_viola/2301_1201_3300_:
But those loving expressions are proof that your
Pokémon trusts you.
charaepi_ch0039_00_viola_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0039_00_viola/2301_1201_3400_:
Isn’t it just fantastic when you notice the small
things like that?
charaepi_ch0039_00_viola_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0039_00_viola/2311_1201_0100_:
Ummm, Viola? 
I want you to take on my Beedrill in a battle!
charaepi_ch0039_00_viola_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0039_00_viola/2311_1201_0200_:
Of course! Let’s give it all we’ve got in a
showdown between two lovers of
Bug-type Pokémon!
charaepi_ch0039_00_viola_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0039_00_viola/2311_1201_0300_:
OK! I’ll show you how all my research 
here on Pasio has paid off!
charaepi_ch0039_00_viola_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0039_00_viola/2311_0101_0100_:
I’ll be carefully observing the power 
of your Bug-type Pokémon!
charaepi_ch0039_00_viola_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0039_00_viola/2311_0501_0100_:
Whoa, your Surskit is amazing! And I thought 
my Beedrill had been doing really well...
charaepi_ch0039_00_viola_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0039_00_viola/2311_0501_0200_:
Yes, your Beedrill was really strong, too. 
I thought you had me there! Ooh, I know! 
Let’s take a photo to remember this by!
charaepi_ch0039_00_viola_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0039_00_viola/2311_0501_0300_: Wait! Your Surskit looks like it’s about to evolve!
charaepi_ch0039_00_viola_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0039_00_viola/2311_0501_0400_: Ooh, Surskit’s going to get even stronger!
charaepi_ch0039_00_viola_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0039_00_viola/2311_0501_0500_:
Fantastic! Just fantastic! I can’t let this photo op
get away from me!

charaepi_ch0040_00_hachiku_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0040_00_hachiku/2301_1101_010:
While taking a stroll through town,
[Name:PlayerNickname ] spotted Brycen and
Cryogonal a short distance away.
charaepi_ch0040_00_hachiku_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0040_00_hachiku/2301_1101_020:
After a moment, Brycen spotted [EN:Gen Ref='255' M='him' F='her' ] as well,
waving his hand in greeting as he approached.
charaepi_ch0040_00_hachiku_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0040_00_hachiku/2301_1201_030:
Hehe, I was just doing a bit of rehearsing
for a certain something.
charaepi_ch0040_00_hachiku_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0040_00_hachiku/2301_1201_040:
I’ve asked Cryogonal to create some
frost in the air for a nice smoky,
misty effect...
charaepi_ch0040_00_hachiku_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0040_00_hachiku/2301_1201_050: Any guesses what I’m up to?
charaepi_ch0040_00_hachiku_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0040_00_hachiku/2301_0401_070:
Precisely! Just because I came to Pasio
for Pokémon battling doesn’t mean I’ve
abandoned my other interests!
charaepi_ch0040_00_hachiku_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0040_00_hachiku/2301_0402_090:
Hahaha, I’m afraid not.
I’m an actor, child.
charaepi_ch0040_00_hachiku_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0040_00_hachiku/2301_1201_100:
I’m attempting to produce my very own film,
from the early stages of planning to the
final execution.
charaepi_ch0040_00_hachiku_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0040_00_hachiku/2301_1201_110:
The theme of my film is sync strength!
The bonds that connect us all.
charaepi_ch0040_00_hachiku_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0040_00_hachiku/2301_1201_120:
Bonds that connect Trainer to Trainer,
Pokémon to Pokémon! A fiery meeting
in the excitement of the PML!
charaepi_ch0040_00_hachiku_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0040_00_hachiku/2301_1201_130:
Bonds that grow stronger 
in the very heat of battle!
charaepi_ch0040_00_hachiku_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0040_00_hachiku/2301_1201_140:
What do you think?
A marvelous pitch for a film, is it not?
charaepi_ch0040_00_hachiku_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0040_00_hachiku/2301_0401_160: Yes! I knew you would agree!
charaepi_ch0040_00_hachiku_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0040_00_hachiku/2301_0401_170:
However, capturing the intangible beauty of
sync strength—the bond between Trainer
and Pokémon—and expressing it...
charaepi_ch0040_00_hachiku_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0040_00_hachiku/2301_0401_180:
through a tangible medium such as film 
will be exceedingly difficult.
charaepi_ch0040_00_hachiku_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0040_00_hachiku/2301_0402_210:
When it comes to sync strength, others pale 
in comparison to you and your Pokémon.
charaepi_ch0040_00_hachiku_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0040_00_hachiku/2301_1201_220:
I want to show the world the wonder
of my Pokémon—my costar in life.
charaepi_ch0040_00_hachiku_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0040_00_hachiku/2301_1201_230:
I intend to explore my theme fully
throughout my film.
charaepi_ch0040_00_hachiku_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0040_00_hachiku/2301_1201_240:
It will be a series of stories based on
the many adventures Cryogonal and I have
experienced thus far.
charaepi_ch0040_00_hachiku_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0040_00_hachiku/2301_1201_250:
It will be a film of epic proportions—
a documentary, but a marvelously
entertaining one!
charaepi_ch0040_00_hachiku_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0040_00_hachiku/2301_1201_260:
Oh my... I mustn’t get too ahead of myself.
Sometimes I get so excited, I can barely
contain myself.
charaepi_ch0040_00_hachiku_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0040_00_hachiku/2301_0401_280:
Thank you for the support, friend.
As the star of the film, I promise
I won’t let you down!
charaepi_ch0040_00_hachiku_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0040_00_hachiku/2301_0402_300:
Hahaha! Every road comes with
its own obstacles, child.
charaepi_ch0040_00_hachiku_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0040_00_hachiku/2301_0402_310:
The road to success could be nothing but
thin ice, and I would still sprint forward,
never looking back. That’s my policy.
charaepi_ch0040_00_hachiku_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0040_00_hachiku/2301_1201_320:
I believe that Cryogonal shares
that sentiment as well.
charaepi_ch0040_00_hachiku_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0040_00_hachiku/2301_1201_330:
Hehe, you do feel the same,
don’t you, Cryogonal?
charaepi_ch0040_00_hachiku_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0040_00_hachiku/2301_1201_340:
Come now, my dutiful costar!
Let’s get back to that rehearsal!
charaepi_ch0040_00_hachiku_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0040_00_hachiku/2301_1201_350:
With stupendous sync strength like ours,
I’m sure we’ll be able to produce
a complete film in no time!
charaepi_ch0040_00_hachiku_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0040_00_hachiku/2301_1201_360:
I mean, it would be impossible to make a film
about bonds of friendship if you have no bond
of your own to speak of, right? But we do!

charaepi_ch0041_00_nejiki_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0041_00_nejiki/2301_1101_0100:
As [Name:PlayerNickname ] was hiking,
[EN:Gen Ref='255' M='he' F='she' ] came upon a Bronzong perched
in the middle of the path ahead.
charaepi_ch0041_00_nejiki_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0041_00_nejiki/2301_1201_0200:
Hmm. According to my data-analyzing machine,
this should be the correct path...
charaepi_ch0041_00_nejiki_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0041_00_nejiki/2301_0401_0400:
Whoa! [Name:PlayerNickname ]!
Are we in your way?
charaepi_ch0041_00_nejiki_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0041_00_nejiki/2301_0402_0600:
Whoa! [Name:PlayerNickname ]!
Sorry. Are we in your way?
charaepi_ch0041_00_nejiki_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0041_00_nejiki/2301_1201_0700:
My Bronzong and I were just analyzing
our battle from yesterday.
charaepi_ch0041_00_nejiki_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0041_00_nejiki/2301_0401_0900:
After a battle, I like to use my data-analyzing
machine to learn everything I can about
my opponent’s Pokémon.
charaepi_ch0041_00_nejiki_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0041_00_nejiki/2301_0402_1100:
After a battle, I like to use my data-analyzing
machine to learn everything I can about
my opponent’s Pokémon.
charaepi_ch0041_00_nejiki_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0041_00_nejiki/2301_1201_1200:
There’s a vast number of Trainers
here on Pasio right now.
charaepi_ch0041_00_nejiki_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0041_00_nejiki/2301_1201_1300:
Being able to gather so much diverse data
all in one place is incredibly useful.
charaepi_ch0041_00_nejiki_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0041_00_nejiki/2301_1201_1400: Or at least it should be...
charaepi_ch0041_00_nejiki_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0041_00_nejiki/2301_0401_1600:
Not really... It’s my machine.
I keep getting really strange results.
charaepi_ch0041_00_nejiki_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0041_00_nejiki/2301_0302_1700: Are your opponents not very good?
charaepi_ch0041_00_nejiki_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0041_00_nejiki/2301_0402_1800:
No, they were all really strong! I should
have been able to gather some brilliant
data from them, but...something’s off.
charaepi_ch0041_00_nejiki_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0041_00_nejiki/2301_1201_1900:
I’ve had many battles where my machine
refuses to analyze my opponents properly
or its calculations are way off.
charaepi_ch0041_00_nejiki_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0041_00_nejiki/2301_1201_2000:
Perhaps my data-analyzing machine
is in need of repair...
charaepi_ch0041_00_nejiki_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0041_00_nejiki/2301_0301_2100:
Pokémon are more than just data,
you know.
charaepi_ch0041_00_nejiki_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0041_00_nejiki/2301_0401_2200:
Not just data...? You mean they can’t
be fully expressed with just numbers?
charaepi_ch0041_00_nejiki_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0041_00_nejiki/2301_0302_2300: Surprise is what makes a battle.
charaepi_ch0041_00_nejiki_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0041_00_nejiki/2301_0402_2400:
You make a good point. Sometimes battles
simply can’t be analyzed—it’s impossible
to codify and predict everything.
charaepi_ch0041_00_nejiki_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0041_00_nejiki/2301_1201_2500:
That reminds me—I haven’t been able to express
you and your Pokémon in numerical values yet,
[Name:PlayerNickname ].
charaepi_ch0041_00_nejiki_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0041_00_nejiki/2301_1201_2700:
I chose to pair up with it because of
the protective, metal nature of its body...
charaepi_ch0041_00_nejiki_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0041_00_nejiki/2301_1201_2800:
but also because it has an air of mystery
about it—something that can’t be quantified.
It just seemed really interesting.
charaepi_ch0041_00_nejiki_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0041_00_nejiki/2301_1201_2900:
It surprised me, in a way, to discover
such a huge pool of strength that couldn’t be
measured by machine analysis alone.
charaepi_ch0041_00_nejiki_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0041_00_nejiki/2301_0401_3100:
Precisely! Sometimes the strength
of a sync pair—the strength of their bond—
can overcome even the strongest opponents!
charaepi_ch0041_00_nejiki_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0041_00_nejiki/2301_0402_3300:
Certainly! With enough determination, one can
overcome even the strongest opponents!
charaepi_ch0041_00_nejiki_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0041_00_nejiki/2301_1201_3500:
If I can somehow figure out how to enhance
my data-analyzing machine so that it can
measure things like trust and determination...
charaepi_ch0041_00_nejiki_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0041_00_nejiki/2301_1201_3600:
perhaps I can become even stronger in
Pokémon battles.
charaepi_ch0041_00_nejiki_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0041_00_nejiki/2301_1201_3700:
Whoa! Whoa! The lightbulb just
went off in my brain!
charaepi_ch0041_00_nejiki_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0041_00_nejiki/2301_1201_3800:
There’s so much to do but so little time to do it!
I’m going to be a very, very busy man!
charaepi_ch0041_00_nejiki_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0041_00_nejiki/2301_1201_3900:
I should thank you, [Name:PlayerNickname ]!
For giving me the brilliant hint that
sparked this whole idea!
charaepi_ch0041_00_nejiki_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0041_00_nejiki/2301_1201_4100:
First things first! Bronzong and I are
going to have to perform some deep
self-analysis!

charaepi_ch0042_00_nagi_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0042_00_nagi/2301_1101_0100_2:
[Name:PlayerNickname ] was strolling
through town one day, doing some shopping...
charaepi_ch0042_00_nagi_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0042_00_nagi/2301_1101_0200_2:
when [EN:Gen Ref='255' M='he' F='she' ] turned a corner and suddenly 
found [EN:Gen Ref='255' M='himself' F='herself' ] nose to nose with Winona!
charaepi_ch0042_00_nagi_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0042_00_nagi/2301_0301_0400_1: How did you know I’d be here?
charaepi_ch0042_00_nagi_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0042_00_nagi/2301_0401_0500_1:
A little bird Pokémon told me...
I heard tidings on the wind...
charaepi_ch0042_00_nagi_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0042_00_nagi/2301_0401_0600_1:
I am a bird Pokémon user, after all.
News tends to fly fast when one of us is around.
charaepi_ch0042_00_nagi_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0042_00_nagi/2301_0402_0800_1:
Then it must be fate.
Maybe the wind guided us both here...
charaepi_ch0042_00_nagi_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0042_00_nagi/2301_0402_0900_1: I had hoped the two of us would meet.
charaepi_ch0042_00_nagi_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0042_00_nagi/2301_1201_1000_1: I was wondering if you had a moment to...
charaepi_ch0042_00_nagi_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0042_00_nagi/2301_1201_1400_1:
That intense gaze...
That aura of determination...
charaepi_ch0042_00_nagi_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0042_00_nagi/2301_1201_1500_1: They can only mean one thing...
charaepi_ch0042_00_nagi_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0042_00_nagi/2301_1201_1600_1:
That this person wishes to challenge me
to a Pokémon battle!
charaepi_ch0042_00_nagi_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0042_00_nagi/2301_1201_1700_1:
Well, if a battle is what he wants,
then a battle he shall get! We’ll blow him
away like a strong gust of wind!
charaepi_ch0042_00_nagi_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0042_00_nagi/2301_0401_2000_1:
What you mean to say is that maybe he values
my skill as a fellow Pokémon Trainer, correct?
charaepi_ch0042_00_nagi_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0042_00_nagi/2301_0401_2100_1:
If that’s the case, then I really must defeat him.
It would be embarrassing to lose to someone
who respects me so much!
charaepi_ch0042_00_nagi_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0042_00_nagi/2301_0302_2200_1: He might not want to battle at all.
charaepi_ch0042_00_nagi_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0042_00_nagi/2301_0402_2300_1:
But...why would he be emanating such an
air of intensity if he didn’t want to
challenge me to a battle?
charaepi_ch0042_00_nagi_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0042_00_nagi/2301_0402_2400_1:
He looks like a tough opponent, in my eyes.
Either way, there’s no point in hesitating!
I’ll confirm it myself!
charaepi_ch0042_00_nagi_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0042_00_nagi/2301_1201_2600_1:
What’s the matter?
Pelipper doesn’t look like she’s
ready to put up a fight at all...
charaepi_ch0042_00_nagi_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0042_00_nagi/2301_1201_2700_1:
We certainly can’t battle like this.
Whatever should I do?
charaepi_ch0042_00_nagi_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0042_00_nagi/2301_0301_2800_1: Why not ask him what he wants?
charaepi_ch0042_00_nagi_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0042_00_nagi/2301_0401_2900_1:
I’m almost positive he wishes to
challenge me to a battle...
charaepi_ch0042_00_nagi_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0042_00_nagi/2301_0402_3100_1: What? I could never be so rude!
charaepi_ch0042_00_nagi_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0042_00_nagi/2301_0402_3200_1:
I’ll have to fight him head on
with everything I’ve got.
charaepi_ch0042_00_nagi_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0042_00_nagi/2301_1101_3300_2:
[Name:PlayerNickname ] began to feel like
the conversation would never end,
the way things were going...
charaepi_ch0042_00_nagi_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0042_00_nagi/2301_1101_3400_2:
so [EN:Gen Ref='255' M='he' F='she' ] decided to go talk to the
mysterious Trainer [EN:Gen Ref='255' M='himself' F='herself' ].
charaepi_ch0042_00_nagi_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0042_00_nagi/2301_1201_3500_1:
Interesting...
So you’re saying that Trainer over there was
just trying to observe me?
charaepi_ch0042_00_nagi_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0042_00_nagi/2301_1201_3600_1:
He was impressed by my skills as a
Pokémon Trainer and wanted to discover
the secret to my strength?
charaepi_ch0042_00_nagi_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0042_00_nagi/2301_1201_3700_1:
Very interesting indeed. I don’t actually
have a secret, but if he wants to learn
more about me, I’d be happy to share...
charaepi_ch0042_00_nagi_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0042_00_nagi/2301_1201_3800_1:
I feel quite happy now, knowing that
someone respects me that much as a
Trainer. I truly am overjoyed.
charaepi_ch0042_00_nagi_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0042_00_nagi/2301_1201_3900_1:
Do you feel the same way he does
about me, [Name:PlayerNickname ]?
charaepi_ch0042_00_nagi_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0042_00_nagi/2301_0401_4100_1: Really? I feel the same about you.
charaepi_ch0042_00_nagi_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0042_00_nagi/2301_0401_4200_1:
You’re the Trainer I feel I have to
look out for the most. I can’t afford to
let my guard down at all against you.
charaepi_ch0042_00_nagi_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0042_00_nagi/2301_0402_4500_1: I suppose I still have much to learn.
charaepi_ch0042_00_nagi_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0042_00_nagi/2301_0402_4600_1:
I shall continue to train hard in the hope
that one day our Trainer skill levels
will be equal, [Name:PlayerNickname ].
charaepi_ch0042_00_nagi_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0042_00_nagi/2301_1201_4700_1:
After all, we’re all rivals here at the PML.
Let’s give this tournament our utmost
effort and leave here without any regrets!

charaepi_ch0043_00_toki_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0043_00_toki/2301_1101_0100_2:
[Name:PlayerNickname ] was walking along
the coast when [EN:Gen Ref='255' M='he' F='she' ] realized [EN:Gen Ref='255' M='he' F='she' ] could hear a
loud voice mixed in with the sound of the waves.
charaepi_ch0043_00_toki_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0043_00_toki/2301_1201_0200_1:
What’s wrong, Makuhita? You’re never gonna
catch me at that rate!
charaepi_ch0043_00_toki_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0043_00_toki/2301_1201_0300_1:
You’re gonna have to show me more if you
wanna catch me! Let me see your guts!
charaepi_ch0043_00_toki_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0043_00_toki/2301_1101_0400_2:
Brawly and Makuhita had come up on land 
and were glaring at each other.
charaepi_ch0043_00_toki_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0043_00_toki/2301_1201_0500_1: Heh, looks like I’ve finally lit a fire under you.
charaepi_ch0043_00_toki_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0043_00_toki/2301_1201_0600_1: That’s it! I know you’ve got more guts than that!
charaepi_ch0043_00_toki_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0043_00_toki/2301_0401_0800_1:
Huh? [Name:PlayerNickname ]?
I didn’t expect to see you here.
charaepi_ch0043_00_toki_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0043_00_toki/2301_0402_1000_1:
Huh? [Name:PlayerNickname ]?
I didn’t expect to see you here.
charaepi_ch0043_00_toki_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0043_00_toki/2301_1201_1100_1: Did you think we were fighting?
charaepi_ch0043_00_toki_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0043_00_toki/2301_1201_1200_1:
If you did, you’re wrong. We were training to
improve our balance for surfing.
charaepi_ch0043_00_toki_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0043_00_toki/2301_1201_1300_1:
Makuhita wanted me to help improve his
surfing skills.
charaepi_ch0043_00_toki_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0043_00_toki/2301_1201_1400_1: I was just trying to get him fired up.
charaepi_ch0043_00_toki_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0043_00_toki/2301_0401_1600_1:
Surfing is more than just our hobby.
It’s serious training for us.
charaepi_ch0043_00_toki_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0043_00_toki/2301_0402_1800_1:
Surfing is more than just our hobby.
It’s serious training for us.
charaepi_ch0043_00_toki_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0043_00_toki/2301_1201_1900_1:
It’s been that way ever since I taught Makuhita
how to surf.
charaepi_ch0043_00_toki_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0043_00_toki/2301_1201_2000_1: At first, he couldn’t even stand up on the board.
charaepi_ch0043_00_toki_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0043_00_toki/2301_1201_2100_1:
But every time he failed, Makuhita’s toughness
wouldn’t let him quit. He never gave up, so he
improved quickly.
charaepi_ch0043_00_toki_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0043_00_toki/2301_1201_2200_1:
That unwavering fighting spirit that never gives
up—no matter what—is what made Makuhita.
charaepi_ch0043_00_toki_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0043_00_toki/2301_1201_2300_1: No, not just Makuhita. It made us both grow.
charaepi_ch0043_00_toki_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0043_00_toki/2301_0401_2500_1:
Of course! Seeing Makuhita’s fighting spirit lit
a fire in my heart, too!
charaepi_ch0043_00_toki_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0043_00_toki/2301_0302_2600_1: You guys have worked hard, huh?
charaepi_ch0043_00_toki_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0043_00_toki/2301_0402_2700_1:
Yup! No matter how hard things got, we never
threw in the towel.
charaepi_ch0043_00_toki_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0043_00_toki/2301_0402_2800_1:
When Makuhita is working as hard as he does,
it gives me strength, too.
charaepi_ch0043_00_toki_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0043_00_toki/2301_1201_2900_1:
Makuhita’s strength is that no matter how hard
you hit him, he always gets back up.
charaepi_ch0043_00_toki_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0043_00_toki/2301_1201_3100_1: Huh?! Makuhita?! What are you doing?!
charaepi_ch0043_00_toki_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0043_00_toki/2301_1101_3200_2:
Makuhita turned toward Brawly and
charged right at him!
charaepi_ch0043_00_toki_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0043_00_toki/2301_1201_3300_1: Hahaha! I guess he was still mad from earlier.
charaepi_ch0043_00_toki_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0043_00_toki/2301_1201_3400_1:
Even still, you’ve gotten stronger,
haven’t you, Makuhita?
charaepi_ch0043_00_toki_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0043_00_toki/2301_1201_3500_1:
You’re like a totally different Pokémon from
when we first met!
charaepi_ch0043_00_toki_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0043_00_toki/2301_1201_3600_1:
We have to keep our momentum if we wanna
get stronger than [Name:PlayerNickname ]!
charaepi_ch0043_00_toki_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0043_00_toki/2301_0401_3800_1:
I think you’re the opponent everyone should
be afraid of.
charaepi_ch0043_00_toki_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0043_00_toki/2301_0402_4000_1:
I think you’re the opponent everyone should
be afraid of.
charaepi_ch0043_00_toki_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0043_00_toki/2301_1201_4100_1:
You have a fighting spirit just like Makuhita’s.
You never break, no matter what happens.
charaepi_ch0043_00_toki_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0043_00_toki/2301_1201_4200_1:
You’re a tough opponent that we won’t be able
to defeat easily, but that makes me excited.
charaepi_ch0043_00_toki_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0043_00_toki/2301_1201_4400_1:
The bigger the wave that’s coming at you,
the more a surfer wants to ride it!

charaepi_ch0044_00_tsutsuji_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0044_00_tsutsuji/2301_1101_01:
[Name:PlayerNickname ] had been called 
to a cave by Roxanne.
charaepi_ch0044_00_tsutsuji_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0044_00_tsutsuji/2301_1101_02:
Roxanne said she had something 
to discuss with [Name:PlayerNickname ].
charaepi_ch0044_00_tsutsuji_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0044_00_tsutsuji/2301_1201_03:
My sincerest apologies for summoning you here
so suddenly.
charaepi_ch0044_00_tsutsuji_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0044_00_tsutsuji/2301_1201_04:
The truth is, [Name:PlayerNickname ], I would
like to borrow some of your wisdom, if I may.
charaepi_ch0044_00_tsutsuji_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0044_00_tsutsuji/2301_0401_07: I had a feeling you would say that.
charaepi_ch0044_00_tsutsuji_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0044_00_tsutsuji/2301_0302_08: Can I be of use to you?
charaepi_ch0044_00_tsutsuji_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0044_00_tsutsuji/2301_0402_10:
You can be an immense help
to me, [Name:PlayerNickname ].
charaepi_ch0044_00_tsutsuji_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0044_00_tsutsuji/2301_1201_11:
As for why I’ve asked you here, it’s about the
Trainers’ School in Rustboro City.
charaepi_ch0044_00_tsutsuji_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0044_00_tsutsuji/2301_1201_12:
I’ve been given the opportunity to instruct some
more junior Trainers.
charaepi_ch0044_00_tsutsuji_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0044_00_tsutsuji/2301_1201_13:
I’m having trouble thinking of what sort of
problems I could give them that would make for
an enjoyable, educational experience.
charaepi_ch0044_00_tsutsuji_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0044_00_tsutsuji/2301_1201_14: I’m thinking of doing a hands-on lesson.
charaepi_ch0044_00_tsutsuji_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0044_00_tsutsuji/2301_1201_15:
I thought that escaping a cave such as this one
would be a good start, but I haven’t thought of
what should come next.
charaepi_ch0044_00_tsutsuji_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0044_00_tsutsuji/2301_1201_16:
I’ve asked Nosepass for advice, 
but she just stays quiet and faces north.
charaepi_ch0044_00_tsutsuji_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0044_00_tsutsuji/2301_0401_18: Nosepass is magnetic, so that’s typical behavior.
charaepi_ch0044_00_tsutsuji_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0044_00_tsutsuji/2301_0402_20:
That could be, but facing north is also typical
Nosepass behavior.
charaepi_ch0044_00_tsutsuji_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0044_00_tsutsuji/2301_1201_21:
Her magnetic nose is always facing north,
and she can also control magnetism.
charaepi_ch0044_00_tsutsuji_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0044_00_tsutsuji/2301_1201_22:
If you lose your way, as long as Nosepass is
with you, you’ll know roughly which direction
you’re headed.
charaepi_ch0044_00_tsutsuji_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0044_00_tsutsuji/2301_1201_23:
When you’re on a journey, her behavior can be
quite useful!
charaepi_ch0044_00_tsutsuji_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0044_00_tsutsuji/2301_0301_24: You could use that in a lesson.
charaepi_ch0044_00_tsutsuji_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0044_00_tsutsuji/2301_0401_25: If the lesson were on escaping from a cave...
charaepi_ch0044_00_tsutsuji_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0044_00_tsutsuji/2301_0302_27:
Maybe it could be useful not just
when you’re traveling?
charaepi_ch0044_00_tsutsuji_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0044_00_tsutsuji/2301_0402_28:
When we’re not traveling? Is there some other
way Nosepass’s compass could prove useful?
charaepi_ch0044_00_tsutsuji_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0044_00_tsutsuji/2301_0402_30: Of course! A lesson on escaping from a cave!
charaepi_ch0044_00_tsutsuji_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0044_00_tsutsuji/2301_1201_31:
Nosepass’s habit of facing north and her capacity
to control magnetism...
charaepi_ch0044_00_tsutsuji_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0044_00_tsutsuji/2301_1201_32:
Both are perfect for a lesson on how to escape
from a cave!
charaepi_ch0044_00_tsutsuji_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0044_00_tsutsuji/2301_0301_33: I think her facing north is good.
charaepi_ch0044_00_tsutsuji_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0044_00_tsutsuji/2301_0401_34: If students use her habit of facing north...
charaepi_ch0044_00_tsutsuji_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0044_00_tsutsuji/2301_0401_35:
I think I could make a maze that requires them to
use Nosepass as a compass!
charaepi_ch0044_00_tsutsuji_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0044_00_tsutsuji/2301_0302_36:
I think her controlling magnetism
is good.
charaepi_ch0044_00_tsutsuji_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0044_00_tsutsuji/2301_0402_37:
If the students use her power 
to control magnetism...
charaepi_ch0044_00_tsutsuji_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0044_00_tsutsuji/2301_0402_38:
I could design a maze that makes them use
Nosepass to escape from a cave tinged
with magnetism!
charaepi_ch0044_00_tsutsuji_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0044_00_tsutsuji/2301_1201_40:
With such an exciting lesson, I’m sure the
students will enjoy it!
charaepi_ch0044_00_tsutsuji_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0044_00_tsutsuji/2301_1201_41: I knew consulting you was the right answer!
charaepi_ch0044_00_tsutsuji_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0044_00_tsutsuji/2301_0302_44: I’m glad you solved your problem!
charaepi_ch0044_00_tsutsuji_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0044_00_tsutsuji/2301_1201_46:
Thanks to you, I was able to find the correct
answer to my problem.
charaepi_ch0044_00_tsutsuji_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0044_00_tsutsuji/2301_1201_47:
I was only thinking about what sort of lesson to
give some junior Trainers.
charaepi_ch0044_00_tsutsuji_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0044_00_tsutsuji/2301_1201_48: Now I realized I’ve learned quite a bit myself!
charaepi_ch0044_00_tsutsuji_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0044_00_tsutsuji/2301_1201_49:
There’s still so much for me to learn from you
and Nosepass, [Name:PlayerNickname ]!

charaepi_ch0045_00_tsukushi_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0045_00_tsukushi/2301_1101_01:
[Name:PlayerNickname ] needed a breath
of fresh air away from the bustle of the city,
so [EN:Gen Ref='255' M='he' F='she' ] decided to take a stroll in the forest.
charaepi_ch0045_00_tsukushi_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0045_00_tsukushi/2301_1101_02:
However, the moment [EN:Gen Ref='255' M='he' F='she' ] arrived 
in a quiet place, a Beedrill suddenly 
zoomed out of the trees right toward [EN:Gen Ref='255' M='him' F='her' ]!
charaepi_ch0045_00_tsukushi_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0045_00_tsukushi/2301_1201_04:
Oh, it’s you, [Name:PlayerNickname ].
Sorry if my Beedrill scared you just now!
charaepi_ch0045_00_tsukushi_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0045_00_tsukushi/2301_1201_05:
I think your shadow actually scared him
when you walked up, so he was trying
to zoom away.
charaepi_ch0045_00_tsukushi_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0045_00_tsukushi/2301_1201_06:
Either way, he owes you an apology. Beedrill,
apologize to [Name:PlayerNickname ].
charaepi_ch0045_00_tsukushi_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0045_00_tsukushi/2301_1201_07:
He didn’t mean any harm—I promise.
I hope you’ll forgive him.
charaepi_ch0045_00_tsukushi_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0045_00_tsukushi/2301_1201_08:
Beedrill are known to be a little
aggressive at times...
charaepi_ch0045_00_tsukushi_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0045_00_tsukushi/2301_0401_11: Aw, I was afraid you’d say that...
charaepi_ch0045_00_tsukushi_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0045_00_tsukushi/2301_0302_12: No, I’m not afraid of them!
charaepi_ch0045_00_tsukushi_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0045_00_tsukushi/2301_1201_14:
So many people have a fear of
Bug-type Pokémon, you know?
charaepi_ch0045_00_tsukushi_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0045_00_tsukushi/2301_1201_15:
Before Beedrill evolved to look like this,
we never really had any issues, but with
the way he looks now...
charaepi_ch0045_00_tsukushi_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0045_00_tsukushi/2301_0401_17:
Yeah. Pretty recently, actually...
It made me feel really sad.
charaepi_ch0045_00_tsukushi_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0045_00_tsukushi/2301_0402_19:
Thanks. But actually, something happened
recently that made me really sad...
charaepi_ch0045_00_tsukushi_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0045_00_tsukushi/2301_1201_20:
It happened in a region I was
exploring before I came to Pasio.
charaepi_ch0045_00_tsukushi_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0045_00_tsukushi/2301_1201_21:
When Beedrill was still just a Weedle,
there were these kids that would come and
play with him all the time. They loved him.
charaepi_ch0045_00_tsukushi_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0045_00_tsukushi/2301_1201_22:
When he evolved into Kakuna, the kids
stopped coming to play. Kakuna don’t move
around at all, so maybe they lost interest...
charaepi_ch0045_00_tsukushi_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0045_00_tsukushi/2301_1201_23:
Then he evolved into Beedrill. I thought they’d
be excited to play with him again, so I brought
him over...but the kids got scared and cried.
charaepi_ch0045_00_tsukushi_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0045_00_tsukushi/2301_1201_24:
He’s still the same Pokémon that he was as a
Weedle and a Kakuna—he just looks different.
It’s strange how people can forget that.
charaepi_ch0045_00_tsukushi_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0045_00_tsukushi/2301_0401_26:
Yeah, it is sad. But I’m not giving up
anytime soon! That’s the whole reason
I came here to compete in the PML!
charaepi_ch0045_00_tsukushi_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0045_00_tsukushi/2301_0302_27: We can’t do anything about that.
charaepi_ch0045_00_tsukushi_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0045_00_tsukushi/2301_0402_28:
I disagree! And I don’t plan on giving up
anytime soon! That’s the whole reason
I came here to compete in the PML!
charaepi_ch0045_00_tsukushi_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0045_00_tsukushi/2301_1201_29:
I want to use the PML to show the world how
awesome and powerful Bug-type Pokémon are!
I bet they’ll be super popular by the end!
charaepi_ch0045_00_tsukushi_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0045_00_tsukushi/2301_1201_30:
In order to make that happen, Beedrill and I
are going to have to defeat a whole lot of
other Pokémon! And we will! Just watch!
charaepi_ch0045_00_tsukushi_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0045_00_tsukushi/2301_0401_32:
Yeah! I mean, everybody loves
a strong Pokémon, right?
charaepi_ch0045_00_tsukushi_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0045_00_tsukushi/2301_0401_33:
Wait a sec...
That doesn’t make sense...
charaepi_ch0045_00_tsukushi_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0045_00_tsukushi/2301_0402_35:
What do you mean? Strong Pokémon are
always really popular, aren’t they?
charaepi_ch0045_00_tsukushi_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0045_00_tsukushi/2301_0402_36:
Wait a sec...
That doesn’t make sense...
charaepi_ch0045_00_tsukushi_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0045_00_tsukushi/2301_1201_37:
If Beedrill is already so strong and powerful
that people are scared of him, why isn’t
he more popular?
charaepi_ch0045_00_tsukushi_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0045_00_tsukushi/2301_0301_38: It’s not all about being strong.
charaepi_ch0045_00_tsukushi_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0045_00_tsukushi/2301_0401_39:
Y-you think so?
Hmm...maybe you’re right.
charaepi_ch0045_00_tsukushi_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0045_00_tsukushi/2301_0302_40:
You have to show off some
other good qualities, too.
charaepi_ch0045_00_tsukushi_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0045_00_tsukushi/2301_0402_41:
Well, Bug-type Pokémon have a ton
of good qualities! I should know that
better than anyone else.
charaepi_ch0045_00_tsukushi_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0045_00_tsukushi/2301_1201_42:
Take Weedle, for example. It may look
cute on the outside, but on the inside,
it’s super tough!
charaepi_ch0045_00_tsukushi_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0045_00_tsukushi/2301_1201_43:
Kakuna still has Weedle’s toughness,
plus it gets a hard, protective shell
on top of that!
charaepi_ch0045_00_tsukushi_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0045_00_tsukushi/2301_1201_44:
Then its appearance really shifts when it
evolves into Beedrill and gets super-strong
poisonous stingers!
charaepi_ch0045_00_tsukushi_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0045_00_tsukushi/2301_1201_45:
At their core, they’re all the same Pokémon,
but the qualities that make them awesome
change from Evolution to Evolution!
charaepi_ch0045_00_tsukushi_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0045_00_tsukushi/2301_1201_46:
Kind of mysterious, right?
That’s what makes Bug-type
Pokémon so interesting to me!
charaepi_ch0045_00_tsukushi_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0045_00_tsukushi/2301_0301_47:
You sound like a Bug-type
Pokémon Professor!
charaepi_ch0045_00_tsukushi_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0045_00_tsukushi/2301_0401_48:
Hehe, I DO know a lot about
Bug-type Pokémon.
charaepi_ch0045_00_tsukushi_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0045_00_tsukushi/2301_1201_51:
You’re right. I know all there is to know about
Bug-type Pokémon, so there are probably
things about them that only I can teach others.
charaepi_ch0045_00_tsukushi_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0045_00_tsukushi/2301_1201_52:
I should really thank you!
I don’t know if I would have been able
to realize that all on my own!
charaepi_ch0045_00_tsukushi_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0045_00_tsukushi/2301_1201_54:
I think I can start by teaching people that
Beedrill only attack with their poisonous
stingers if they’re attacked first...

charaepi_ch0046_00_datsura_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0046_00_datsura/2301_1101_010:
[Name:PlayerNickname ] came to the village 
to do a sprint workout.
charaepi_ch0046_00_datsura_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0046_00_datsura/2301_1101_020: While there, [EN:Gen Ref='255' M='he' F='she' ] saw somebody unexpected.
charaepi_ch0046_00_datsura_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0046_00_datsura/2301_1201_030:
Yo! If it isn’t [Name:PlayerNickname ]!
Workin’ hard, or hardly workin’?
charaepi_ch0046_00_datsura_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0046_00_datsura/2301_0402_070:
Ha ha ha!
I like your honesty, kid!
charaepi_ch0046_00_datsura_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0046_00_datsura/2301_1201_080:
You’re going around, seeing the sights on
your own, right?
charaepi_ch0046_00_datsura_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0046_00_datsura/2301_1201_090:
It’s best to see, hear, and experience things
for yourself! Especially if it’s somewhere new!
charaepi_ch0046_00_datsura_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0046_00_datsura/2301_1201_100:
You could get the information from a book that
you can read in the safety of your room, sure.
charaepi_ch0046_00_datsura_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0046_00_datsura/2301_1201_110:
But you wouldn’t experience anything that way.
It’s the experience that becomes real knowledge.
charaepi_ch0046_00_datsura_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0046_00_datsura/2301_1201_120: You can’t say you’ve studied until you do that.
charaepi_ch0046_00_datsura_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0046_00_datsura/2301_0401_140: You look like you don’t exactly believe me.
charaepi_ch0046_00_datsura_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0046_00_datsura/2301_0302_150: That sounds like a lot of work.
charaepi_ch0046_00_datsura_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0046_00_datsura/2301_0402_160:
You got that right!
It’s always easier said than done.
charaepi_ch0046_00_datsura_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0046_00_datsura/2301_1201_170:
All right, here’s a special treat.
I’ll tell you how I met my Pinsir!
charaepi_ch0046_00_datsura_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0046_00_datsura/2301_1201_180: Clean those ears out and listen up!
charaepi_ch0046_00_datsura_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0046_00_datsura/2301_1201_190:
It happened a while back, when I was searching
for Berries in the forest for my research.
charaepi_ch0046_00_datsura_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0046_00_datsura/2301_1201_200:
I came across a Berry I had never seen before.
That’s when this guy showed up in front of me.
charaepi_ch0046_00_datsura_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0046_00_datsura/2301_1201_210: I’m guessing he wanted to eat the Berry!
charaepi_ch0046_00_datsura_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0046_00_datsura/2301_1201_220:
Well, from there, it was a conversation between
my fists and his horns.
charaepi_ch0046_00_datsura_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0046_00_datsura/2301_1201_230:
But here’s the thing. See these horns?
They’re hard as anything! 
We weren’t getting anywhere!
charaepi_ch0046_00_datsura_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0046_00_datsura/2301_1201_240: So we entered a war of attrition.
charaepi_ch0046_00_datsura_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0046_00_datsura/2301_1201_250:
See, I knew that Pinsir can’t move 
as quickly on cold nights.
charaepi_ch0046_00_datsura_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0046_00_datsura/2301_1201_260:
And just as I planned, 
Pinsir finally forfeited to me!
charaepi_ch0046_00_datsura_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0046_00_datsura/2301_1201_270: And ever since then, we’ve been best buddies!
charaepi_ch0046_00_datsura_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0046_00_datsura/2301_0401_290:
Nah, just a day in the life of a guy who can let 
himself stay curious.
charaepi_ch0046_00_datsura_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0046_00_datsura/2301_0302_300: I’m surprised you got out of that OK.
charaepi_ch0046_00_datsura_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0046_00_datsura/2301_0402_310:
Well, you can’t move forward if you’re afraid,
ya know?
charaepi_ch0046_00_datsura_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0046_00_datsura/2301_1201_320:
I want to test what I know, and I want to
know what I don’t already know.
charaepi_ch0046_00_datsura_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0046_00_datsura/2301_1201_330:
But in order to do so, I have to be
physically strong.
charaepi_ch0046_00_datsura_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0046_00_datsura/2301_1201_340:
So what do you think?
You feel like you got stronger already, don’t ya?
charaepi_ch0046_00_datsura_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0046_00_datsura/2301_0301_350: Uh, I’m not sure about that.
charaepi_ch0046_00_datsura_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0046_00_datsura/2301_0401_360:
Come on! You’re wasting your life away with
that kind of attitude!
charaepi_ch0046_00_datsura_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0046_00_datsura/2301_0402_390:
Earnest people get strong!
They can absorb a lot more that way!
charaepi_ch0046_00_datsura_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0046_00_datsura/2301_1201_400:
Whether you can use my story to make yourself
stronger is all up to you.
charaepi_ch0046_00_datsura_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0046_00_datsura/2301_1201_410:
But don’t just think about it, because that’s not
enough. You have to experience it yourself, too.
charaepi_ch0046_00_datsura_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0046_00_datsura/2301_1201_420:
If there’s something you want to do, try it.
It doesn’t matter if you’re nervous about it
or if you’re crummy at it.
charaepi_ch0046_00_datsura_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0046_00_datsura/2301_1201_430:
Being able to do that is the most important
quality you can have!

charaepi_ch0047_00_itsuki_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0047_00_itsuki/2301_1101_0100:
As [Name:PlayerNickname ] was wandering
the town, [EN:Gen Ref='255' M='he' F='she' ] felt like someone was calling [EN:Gen Ref='255' M='him' F='her' ].
charaepi_ch0047_00_itsuki_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0047_00_itsuki/2301_1101_0200:
Looking around, [EN:Gen Ref='255' M='he' F='she' ] noticed Will 
and Xatu standing there.
charaepi_ch0047_00_itsuki_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0047_00_itsuki/2301_0401_0600: I see that my psychic powers reached you.
charaepi_ch0047_00_itsuki_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0047_00_itsuki/2301_0302_0700: I felt like somebody was calling me.
charaepi_ch0047_00_itsuki_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0047_00_itsuki/2301_0402_0800: I see that my psychic powers reached you.
charaepi_ch0047_00_itsuki_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0047_00_itsuki/2301_1201_0900:
I thought this would be a good opportunity for us
to get better acquainted with each other.
So I set up this meeting so we could chat.
charaepi_ch0047_00_itsuki_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0047_00_itsuki/2301_1201_1000:
I thought...that I might need your help in order
to become stronger.
charaepi_ch0047_00_itsuki_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0047_00_itsuki/2301_0401_1200: I thought so, too...but I was wrong.
charaepi_ch0047_00_itsuki_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0047_00_itsuki/2301_0402_1400:
That’s right.
I sense raw power sleeping inside of you.
charaepi_ch0047_00_itsuki_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0047_00_itsuki/2301_1201_1500:
I trained vigorously in order to become a
member of the Elite Four.
And at long last, I was able to become one.
charaepi_ch0047_00_itsuki_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0047_00_itsuki/2301_1201_1600:
I was confident that nobody but the Champion
could defeat me.
charaepi_ch0047_00_itsuki_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0047_00_itsuki/2301_1201_1700:
But one day, a random Trainer was able to
defeat me easily.
charaepi_ch0047_00_itsuki_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0047_00_itsuki/2301_1201_1800: I was much weaker than I had thought.
charaepi_ch0047_00_itsuki_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0047_00_itsuki/2301_1201_1900:
That is why I want to find new power at
the PML.
charaepi_ch0047_00_itsuki_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0047_00_itsuki/2301_1201_2000: I want to defeat that Trainer with that power!
charaepi_ch0047_00_itsuki_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0047_00_itsuki/2301_1201_2100:
I shall show you how I am training to do so.
Look into Xatu’s eyes.
charaepi_ch0047_00_itsuki_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0047_00_itsuki/2301_1201_2200:
It is said that Xatu is gazing at both the past
and the future.
charaepi_ch0047_00_itsuki_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0047_00_itsuki/2301_1201_2300:
By looking into her eyes, you can feel like you’re
able to predict what will happen in battle!
charaepi_ch0047_00_itsuki_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0047_00_itsuki/2301_0402_2800:
I appreciate you taking me seriously,
but please don’t lie.
charaepi_ch0047_00_itsuki_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0047_00_itsuki/2301_0402_2900: I wonder why it’s not working.
charaepi_ch0047_00_itsuki_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0047_00_itsuki/2301_1201_3000:
Well, this is a predicament.
I thought you’d be able to feel something, but...
charaepi_ch0047_00_itsuki_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0047_00_itsuki/2301_1201_3400:
Did you feel it, too? Like the cheers and 
excitement of thousands of people!
charaepi_ch0047_00_itsuki_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0047_00_itsuki/2301_1201_3900:
A vision of us facing each other at the PML.
At least that is how I interpreted it.
charaepi_ch0047_00_itsuki_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0047_00_itsuki/2301_1201_4000: As I thought, I need you.
charaepi_ch0047_00_itsuki_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0047_00_itsuki/2301_1201_4100:
As two Trainers who were gifted 
with a vision from Xatu...
charaepi_ch0047_00_itsuki_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0047_00_itsuki/2301_1201_4200: let’s keep moving forward toward that future!
charaepi_ch0047_00_itsuki_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0047_00_itsuki/2301_1201_4300:
Hm?
No, you shouldn’t stare into her eyes too long!
charaepi_ch0047_00_itsuki_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0047_00_itsuki/2301_1201_4400:
You might accidentally see the result of
our battle.
charaepi_ch0047_00_itsuki_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0047_00_itsuki/2301_1201_4500: That would take the fun out of it, wouldn’t it?
charaepi_ch0047_00_itsuki_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0047_00_itsuki/2301_1201_4600:
We may be able to forecast the future, but it
is up to us to be able to pave the way to it!
charaepi_ch0047_00_itsuki_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0047_00_itsuki/2301_1201_4700: I’m looking forward to our future!

charaepi_ch0049_00_fuyo_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0049_00_fuyo/2301_1101_0100_2:
[Name:PlayerNickname ] entered the forest,
feeling as if something was drawing [EN:Gen Ref='255' M='him' F='her' ] in.
charaepi_ch0049_00_fuyo_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0049_00_fuyo/2301_1101_0200_2:
Proceeding farther, [EN:Gen Ref='255' M='he' F='she' ] found Phoebe 
alone in a clearing looking around.
charaepi_ch0049_00_fuyo_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0049_00_fuyo/2301_0402_0800_1: Huh? Wait, can’t you see her?
charaepi_ch0049_00_fuyo_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0049_00_fuyo/2301_1201_1200_1: Wait, can you not see Dusclops?
charaepi_ch0049_00_fuyo_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0049_00_fuyo/2301_1201_1300_1:
Well, let’s find out! Try to figure out where
Dusclops is!
charaepi_ch0049_00_fuyo_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0049_00_fuyo/2301_1201_1800_1: Come on out, Dusclops! Say hi!
charaepi_ch0049_00_fuyo_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0049_00_fuyo/2301_1201_1900_1:
Well, now that [Name:PlayerNickname ]
is here, let’s put the game on hold.
charaepi_ch0049_00_fuyo_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0049_00_fuyo/2301_1201_2000_1:
Dusclops was on a roll,
so I guess I lose this time.
charaepi_ch0049_00_fuyo_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0049_00_fuyo/2301_1201_2100_1:
Oh, but we should count how many she actually
found! I might still have a chance!
charaepi_ch0049_00_fuyo_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0049_00_fuyo/2301_1201_2600_1: Wait a minute. Do you not...?
charaepi_ch0049_00_fuyo_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0049_00_fuyo/2301_1201_2700_1:
Ahaha! I get it now! You thought I was playing
hide-and-seek with Dusclops!
charaepi_ch0049_00_fuyo_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0049_00_fuyo/2301_1201_2800_1: No, we’re both always “it.” We do the seeking!
charaepi_ch0049_00_fuyo_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0049_00_fuyo/2301_1201_2900_1:
The ones hiding are the spirits 
wandering around the forest!
charaepi_ch0049_00_fuyo_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0049_00_fuyo/2301_0401_3100_1:
Dusclops absorbs wandering spirits
into her empty body.
charaepi_ch0049_00_fuyo_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0049_00_fuyo/2301_0402_3300_1:
Dusclops absorbs wandering spirits into her
empty body.
charaepi_ch0049_00_fuyo_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0049_00_fuyo/2301_1201_3400_1:
...I don’t know what happens to them when she
absorbs them, though...
charaepi_ch0049_00_fuyo_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0049_00_fuyo/2301_1201_3500_1: OK, let’s see. Dusclops found one...two...three...
charaepi_ch0049_00_fuyo_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0049_00_fuyo/2301_1201_3700_1:
I guess you really can’t see them,
can you, [Name:PlayerNickname ]?
charaepi_ch0049_00_fuyo_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0049_00_fuyo/2301_1201_3800_1: You’re depending on your eyes too much.
charaepi_ch0049_00_fuyo_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0049_00_fuyo/2301_1201_3900_1: Try to see with your heart. Feel them there.
charaepi_ch0049_00_fuyo_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0049_00_fuyo/2301_1201_4000_1:
If you do that, you’ll be able to see things that
you weren’t able to before.
charaepi_ch0049_00_fuyo_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0049_00_fuyo/2301_1201_4100_1:
For example, I can’t see the sync strength that
Dusclops and I share.
charaepi_ch0049_00_fuyo_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0049_00_fuyo/2301_1201_4200_1: But if I close my eyes like this, I can feel it.
charaepi_ch0049_00_fuyo_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0049_00_fuyo/2301_1201_4300_1: Just don’t think about it too hard!
charaepi_ch0049_00_fuyo_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0049_00_fuyo/2301_1201_4400_1:
Even if it’s something you can’t logically
understand, you can have an emotional
connection with your Pokémon.
charaepi_ch0049_00_fuyo_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0049_00_fuyo/2301_1201_4500_1:
I’m sure you can feel that sync strength 
with your Pokémon, too!
charaepi_ch0049_00_fuyo_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0049_00_fuyo/2301_1201_4600_1:
If you can do that, maybe you’ll be able to see
the spirits, also!

charaepi_ch0050_00_sumomo_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0050_00_sumomo/2301_1101_0100:
[Name:PlayerNickname ] heard that Maylene
was training up in the mountains, so [EN:Gen Ref='255' M='he' F='she' ]
decided to go and check it out [EN:Gen Ref='255' M='himself' F='herself' ].
charaepi_ch0050_00_sumomo_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0050_00_sumomo/2301_1101_0200:
Upon arriving, [EN:Gen Ref='255' M='he' F='she' ] found Maylene and
her Meditite in focused meditation.
charaepi_ch0050_00_sumomo_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0050_00_sumomo/2301_0401_0600:
Aw, shucks!
I’m not supposed to talk while
I’m meditating...
charaepi_ch0050_00_sumomo_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0050_00_sumomo/2301_0401_0700:
I guess this is proof I haven’t perfected
it yet. If I can hear voices, it means I’m
not concentrating hard enough.
charaepi_ch0050_00_sumomo_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0050_00_sumomo/2301_0402_0900:
Mm... Do you have to stare at me like that?
You’re ruining my concentration.
charaepi_ch0050_00_sumomo_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0050_00_sumomo/2301_0402_1000:
*sigh*
I suppose me getting flustered means I’m
not concentrating enough in the first place.
charaepi_ch0050_00_sumomo_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0050_00_sumomo/2301_1201_1200:
Sorry if that came across as rude! I should be
embarrassed, seeing as how you hiked all the
way up here to see me...
charaepi_ch0050_00_sumomo_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0050_00_sumomo/2301_1201_1400:
I don’t really have anything I can serve you
up here, unfortunately, but feel free to
make yourself at home.
charaepi_ch0050_00_sumomo_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0050_00_sumomo/2301_1201_1500:
Oh, wait! This might be a good opportunity
for us to train together! What do you
think, [Name:PlayerNickname ]?
charaepi_ch0050_00_sumomo_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0050_00_sumomo/2301_1201_1600:
I was planning on trying out the training
regimen that Meditite always follows,
starting today.
charaepi_ch0050_00_sumomo_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0050_00_sumomo/2301_1201_1700:
She has one meal per day—one Berry.
She sleeps for one hour total and spends
about 15 hours in meditation...
charaepi_ch0050_00_sumomo_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0050_00_sumomo/2301_1201_1800:
It sounds pretty tough, but I think it will
be great experience for us in the end!
charaepi_ch0050_00_sumomo_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0050_00_sumomo/2301_0401_2000: It’s fine! I’ve got a lot of self-discipline.
charaepi_ch0050_00_sumomo_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0050_00_sumomo/2301_0401_2100:
I’m used to sticking to a strict diet.
I’ve been following a pretty tough
training regimen for a while now.
charaepi_ch0050_00_sumomo_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0050_00_sumomo/2301_0401_2200: So yes! I’ll be totally fine...I think.
charaepi_ch0050_00_sumomo_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0050_00_sumomo/2301_0402_2400: It’s fine! I’ve got a lot of self-discipline.
charaepi_ch0050_00_sumomo_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0050_00_sumomo/2301_0402_2500:
If I hyper-focus on my training, maybe I won’t
think about my lack of sleep!
charaepi_ch0050_00_sumomo_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0050_00_sumomo/2301_0402_2600: So yes! I’ll be totally fine...I think.
charaepi_ch0050_00_sumomo_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0050_00_sumomo/2301_1201_2700:
Huh? Oh, sorry, Meditite!
You’re getting impatient to start your
training, aren’t you?
charaepi_ch0050_00_sumomo_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0050_00_sumomo/2301_0401_3000:
Aw... I think Meditite might be worried about
me following her training regimen.
charaepi_ch0050_00_sumomo_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0050_00_sumomo/2301_0401_3100:
To tell you the truth, I wasn’t really sure
if I could do it to begin with...
charaepi_ch0050_00_sumomo_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0050_00_sumomo/2301_0302_3200: I think she’s trying to warn you.
charaepi_ch0050_00_sumomo_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0050_00_sumomo/2301_0402_3400:
She must be worried about me following
her training regimen...
charaepi_ch0050_00_sumomo_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0050_00_sumomo/2301_1201_3500:
You know, maybe I was getting a little
ahead of myself.
charaepi_ch0050_00_sumomo_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0050_00_sumomo/2301_1201_3600:
I got a little absorbed in the idea of growing
stronger with my Meditite.
charaepi_ch0050_00_sumomo_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0050_00_sumomo/2301_1201_3700: What do you think I should do now?
charaepi_ch0050_00_sumomo_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0050_00_sumomo/2301_0301_3800:
Let’s do some training that’s meant
for Trainers, not Pokémon.
charaepi_ch0050_00_sumomo_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0050_00_sumomo/2301_1201_4200:
I shouldn’t overdo it—I should just start with
what I know, then slowly work my way up
to more challenging training.
charaepi_ch0050_00_sumomo_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0050_00_sumomo/2301_1201_4300:
After all, people and Pokémon are different,
so of course they’re going to struggle with
different things.
charaepi_ch0050_00_sumomo_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0050_00_sumomo/2301_1201_4400:
Thank you, [Name:PlayerNickname ]!
I think I learned an important lesson today!
charaepi_ch0050_00_sumomo_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0050_00_sumomo/2301_1201_4500:
I’m going to start my new training regimen
with something more reasonable, like climbing
up cliffs and things!
charaepi_ch0050_00_sumomo_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0050_00_sumomo/2301_0401_4700:
Uh... Isn’t that something people
can’t usually do?
charaepi_ch0050_00_sumomo_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0050_00_sumomo/2301_0402_4900:
Uh... Isn’t that something people
can’t usually do?
charaepi_ch0050_00_sumomo_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0050_00_sumomo/2301_1201_5000:
It’s fine! If I build up my leg muscles,
I’ll be able to keep going after battle
without getting tired!
charaepi_ch0050_00_sumomo_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0050_00_sumomo/2301_1201_5100:
[Name:PlayerNickname ], want to go climbing
with me? I bet it’ll be really fun!

charaepi_ch0051_00_litchi_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0051_00_litchi/2301_1201_0100: Did I do something to make you angry, Lycanroc?
charaepi_ch0051_00_litchi_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0051_00_litchi/2301_1201_0200: If I gave a bad command, I’m sorry...
charaepi_ch0051_00_litchi_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0051_00_litchi/2301_1101_0300:
[Name:PlayerNickname ] arrived in the
village and looked for the source of the voice.
charaepi_ch0051_00_litchi_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0051_00_litchi/2301_1101_0400:
[EN:Gen Ref='255' M='He' F='She' ] noticed a Lycanroc turning its back 
to Olivia as Olivia apologized to it.
charaepi_ch0051_00_litchi_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0051_00_litchi/2301_1201_0600:
Well, you saw a bit of an embarrassing scene,
didn’t you?
charaepi_ch0051_00_litchi_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0051_00_litchi/2301_0301_0700: You look like you’re in a bit of a jam.
charaepi_ch0051_00_litchi_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0051_00_litchi/2301_0401_0800:
We finished battling a Trainer, and now Lycanroc
doesn’t want to look at me.
charaepi_ch0051_00_litchi_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0051_00_litchi/2301_0402_1000:
We finished battling a Trainer, and now Lycanroc
doesn’t want to look at me.
charaepi_ch0051_00_litchi_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0051_00_litchi/2301_1201_1100: I don’t have a clue... Did I do something bad?
charaepi_ch0051_00_litchi_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0051_00_litchi/2301_0401_1300: No. And Lycanroc is my best partner...
charaepi_ch0051_00_litchi_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0051_00_litchi/2301_0402_1500: It is. Lycanroc is my best partner...
charaepi_ch0051_00_litchi_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0051_00_litchi/2301_1201_1600:
I always make sure she’s in tip-top shape so she
can battle whenever, and I make sure to give
careful instructions during battle.
charaepi_ch0051_00_litchi_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0051_00_litchi/2301_1201_1700:
I go to sleep holding her tight every night,
just like I would with a Stufful plushy.
charaepi_ch0051_00_litchi_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0051_00_litchi/2301_1201_1800:
I thought I treated her well, so I don’t know
what could have brought this on.
charaepi_ch0051_00_litchi_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0051_00_litchi/2301_0401_2000: That’s not that weird, is it?
charaepi_ch0051_00_litchi_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0051_00_litchi/2301_0401_2100: I like cute things just like anybody else!
charaepi_ch0051_00_litchi_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0051_00_litchi/2301_0402_2300: I treat her like my own child!
charaepi_ch0051_00_litchi_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0051_00_litchi/2301_0402_2400: She’s my pride and joy and can do no wrong!
charaepi_ch0051_00_litchi_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0051_00_litchi/2301_1201_2500:
But to be honest, I think she’s just as cute
ignoring me like this, too.
charaepi_ch0051_00_litchi_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0051_00_litchi/2301_1201_2600:
Of course, I wouldn’t like it if she continued to
ignore me.
charaepi_ch0051_00_litchi_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0051_00_litchi/2301_0301_2700: You’re paying her too much attention.
charaepi_ch0051_00_litchi_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0051_00_litchi/2301_0401_2800:
Huh? But we’ve always been together,
and we will be from now on, too.
charaepi_ch0051_00_litchi_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0051_00_litchi/2301_0302_2900: She might want some alone time.
charaepi_ch0051_00_litchi_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0051_00_litchi/2301_0402_3000:
Huh? But we’ve always been together,
and we will be from now on, too.
charaepi_ch0051_00_litchi_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0051_00_litchi/2301_1201_3400:
Maybe she needs her alone time 
because we’ve spent so much time together.
charaepi_ch0051_00_litchi_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0051_00_litchi/2301_1201_3500: Maybe that’s what Lycanoc’s been thinking.
charaepi_ch0051_00_litchi_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0051_00_litchi/2301_1201_3600:
Especially since we’ve been a sync pair here
on Pasio...
charaepi_ch0051_00_litchi_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0051_00_litchi/2301_1201_3700:
Lycanroc usually attacks strong opponents,
throwing caution to the wind. 
Isn’t that adorable?
charaepi_ch0051_00_litchi_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0051_00_litchi/2301_1201_3800:
But because she’s like that, maybe she hasn’t
liked the cautious instructions I’ve been giving.
charaepi_ch0051_00_litchi_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0051_00_litchi/2301_1201_3900:
It’s true that caring for each other is important in
any trusting relationship, but...
charaepi_ch0051_00_litchi_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0051_00_litchi/2301_1201_4000:
maybe I should have trusted her more,
even if doing so can be a bit reckless.
charaepi_ch0051_00_litchi_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0051_00_litchi/2301_1201_4100:
That, in and of itself, might be another form of
trust, after all.
charaepi_ch0051_00_litchi_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0051_00_litchi/2301_1201_4200: It looks like you’re in a better mood!
charaepi_ch0051_00_litchi_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0051_00_litchi/2301_1201_4300:
Thanks, [Name:PlayerNickname ]!
You taught me that there is more than one way
for us to trust one another!
charaepi_ch0051_00_litchi_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0051_00_litchi/2301_1201_4400: Trust between friends, partners, rivals, family...
charaepi_ch0051_00_litchi_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0051_00_litchi/2301_1201_4500:
People and Pokémon are really interesting, aren’t
they? This is why I can never get enough of this!
charaepi_ch0051_00_litchi_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0051_00_litchi/2301_1201_4600:
Lycanroc, let’s use our time on Pasio to build the
perfect relationship to make us even stronger!
charaepi_ch0051_00_litchi_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0051_00_litchi/2301_1201_4700:
I trust you with my life.
You’re my precious partner, after all!

charaepi_ch0052_00_shizui_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0052_00_shizui/2301_1101_0100:
As [Name:PlayerNickname ] was walking down
the beach, [EN:Gen Ref='255' M='he' F='she' ] spotted what looked like
Marlon and his Carracosta off in the distance.
charaepi_ch0052_00_shizui_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0052_00_shizui/2301_1101_0200:
[EN:Gen Ref='255' M='He' F='She' ] moved toward them to say hi,
but when [EN:Gen Ref='255' M='he' F='she' ] got closer, they were
nowhere to be found...
charaepi_ch0052_00_shizui_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0052_00_shizui/2301_1201_0300: Wooo! The ocean’s so big ’n’ bluuue!
charaepi_ch0052_00_shizui_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0052_00_shizui/2301_1101_0400:
Suddenly, [EN:Gen Ref='255' M='he' F='she' ] heard the booming voice of
Marlon as he and his Carracosta leaped
out of the water with a splash!
charaepi_ch0052_00_shizui_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0052_00_shizui/2301_1201_0600:
Yo, Pasio’s beaches are seriously outta
this world, dude!
charaepi_ch0052_00_shizui_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0052_00_shizui/2301_1201_0700:
We’ve been swimmin’ out here since the
crack o’ dawn!
charaepi_ch0052_00_shizui_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0052_00_shizui/2301_0301_0800: You must really like to swim.
charaepi_ch0052_00_shizui_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0052_00_shizui/2301_0401_0900:
Totally, dude! I’ve been swimmin’ since
before I could walk!
charaepi_ch0052_00_shizui_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0052_00_shizui/2301_0402_1100:
Ha ha ha! Man, I’ve literally spent ALL DAY
in the water before. Wicked, right?!
charaepi_ch0052_00_shizui_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0052_00_shizui/2301_1201_1200:
Me ’n’ Carracosta feel more at home in the
water than we do on land!
charaepi_ch0052_00_shizui_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0052_00_shizui/2301_1201_1300:
We actually swam here to Pasio all the way
from the Unova region, dude!
charaepi_ch0052_00_shizui_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0052_00_shizui/2301_0401_1500:
Yeah, man! Me ’n’ Carracosta decided to go
for a long-distance swim off an island
we were stayin’ at.
charaepi_ch0052_00_shizui_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0052_00_shizui/2301_0402_1700:
Yeah, man! Me ’n’ Carracosta decided to go
for a long-distance swim off an island
we were stayin’ at.
charaepi_ch0052_00_shizui_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0052_00_shizui/2301_1201_1800:
Then, all of a sudden, this weird circle appeared
outta nowhere, right in front of our eyes!
charaepi_ch0052_00_shizui_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0052_00_shizui/2301_1201_1900:
It looked pretty rad, so we just dove right in.
I mean, how could we NOT?
charaepi_ch0052_00_shizui_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0052_00_shizui/2301_1201_2000:
Anyway, we kept swimmin’ and swimmin’...
and eventually we ended up here on this island!
Crazy, right?!
charaepi_ch0052_00_shizui_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0052_00_shizui/2301_0401_2200:
Ha ha ha! Nah, dude! 
I was too stoked to see what was 
on the other side to be scared!
charaepi_ch0052_00_shizui_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0052_00_shizui/2301_0402_2400:
Yeah, dude! We’re both fine... Actually, MORE
than fine! I’m stoked we made it all the way here.
charaepi_ch0052_00_shizui_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0052_00_shizui/2301_1201_2500:
That reminds me—this one time back in the day,
I was feelin’ totally wiped out after a
Pokémon battle...
charaepi_ch0052_00_shizui_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0052_00_shizui/2301_1201_2600:
Carracosta was all outta whack, too,
so we decided to bail out on a trip we
were plannin’ on takin’ with a friend.
charaepi_ch0052_00_shizui_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0052_00_shizui/2301_1201_2700:
When our friend got back from the trip,
he told us about all the fun stuff we
missed out on...
charaepi_ch0052_00_shizui_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0052_00_shizui/2301_1201_2800:
I realized in hindsight that I shoulda gone on
that trip anyway, even if I was tired.
charaepi_ch0052_00_shizui_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0052_00_shizui/2301_1201_2900:
Ever since that day, I’ve been tellin’ myself to
dive headfirst into anything that seems fun.
charaepi_ch0052_00_shizui_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0052_00_shizui/2301_1201_3000:
But to do that, I gotta max out my upper body
strength, so I’ve been out here swimmin’
every day!
charaepi_ch0052_00_shizui_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0052_00_shizui/2301_1201_3100:
I swim till my arms feel like they’re
gonna fall off!
charaepi_ch0052_00_shizui_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0052_00_shizui/2301_1201_3200:
But if doin’ that means I get to go all out
’n’ have fun all over the world, that’s
fine with me!
charaepi_ch0052_00_shizui_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0052_00_shizui/2301_1201_3300: You feel the same way, don’t you, dude?
charaepi_ch0052_00_shizui_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0052_00_shizui/2301_1201_3400:
You got those thrill-seeker vibes! I can tell
you go all out to have a good time!
charaepi_ch0052_00_shizui_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0052_00_shizui/2301_0401_3600:
Dude, I knew it!
I knew there was a reason we get along!
charaepi_ch0052_00_shizui_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0052_00_shizui/2301_0402_3800:
What do you mean, you guess so?!
Aren’t you havin’ wicked fun out here
every day gettin’ ready for the PML?
charaepi_ch0052_00_shizui_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0052_00_shizui/2301_1201_3900:
Yo, maybe I’m seein’ things, but your
Pokémon looks totally happy to me!
That’s proof enough, dude.
charaepi_ch0052_00_shizui_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0052_00_shizui/2301_1201_4000:
Man, I’m stoked to see where you go from here!
You got some serious talent, dude!
charaepi_ch0052_00_shizui_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0052_00_shizui/2301_1201_4100:
If you ever get serious, you might even
beat me! There’s no way I’m gonna let that
happen, though!
charaepi_ch0052_00_shizui_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0052_00_shizui/2301_1201_4200:
Ha ha ha! Aw, man!
I can’t wait for that battle!
charaepi_ch0052_00_shizui_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0052_00_shizui/2301_1201_4300:
It’s one more wave we can look forward to
shreddin’ one day, Carracosta!

charaepi_ch0053_00_zakuro_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0053_00_zakuro/2301_1101_0100:
[Name:PlayerNickname ] heard Grant and his
Amaura were heading up to the mountains,
so [EN:Gen Ref='255' M='he' F='she' ] decided to head that way as well.
charaepi_ch0053_00_zakuro_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0053_00_zakuro/2301_1101_0200:
Upon arriving, [EN:Gen Ref='255' M='he' F='she' ] spotted the pair of them
gazing up at some tall cliffs.
charaepi_ch0053_00_zakuro_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0053_00_zakuro/2301_1201_0300:
Well now... Look who we have here.
What brings you up here to the mountains
today, [Name:PlayerNickname ]?
charaepi_ch0053_00_zakuro_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0053_00_zakuro/2301_0301_0400: I was actually looking for you.
charaepi_ch0053_00_zakuro_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0053_00_zakuro/2301_0401_0500: Oh? Did you follow me up here?
charaepi_ch0053_00_zakuro_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0053_00_zakuro/2301_0302_0600: I was curious what you were doing.
charaepi_ch0053_00_zakuro_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0053_00_zakuro/2301_0402_0700: Oh? Did you follow me up here?
charaepi_ch0053_00_zakuro_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0053_00_zakuro/2301_1201_0800:
Well, sorry to disappoint you, but we just
came to scope out the area today in
preparation for the real climb.
charaepi_ch0053_00_zakuro_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0053_00_zakuro/2301_1201_0900:
We’re practicing so that one day, Amaura and
I can conquer this mountain together.
charaepi_ch0053_00_zakuro_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0053_00_zakuro/2301_0401_1100:
Of course it is! That’s why we make sure
we take every safety precaution possible.
charaepi_ch0053_00_zakuro_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0053_00_zakuro/2301_0401_1200:
Don’t worry—we’ll still be extremely cautious.
After all, mountain climbing is never 100 percent
safe, no matter how well prepared you are.
charaepi_ch0053_00_zakuro_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0053_00_zakuro/2301_0402_1400:
Thank you! I’d love to ask you to join us
on the climb...
charaepi_ch0053_00_zakuro_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0053_00_zakuro/2301_0402_1500: but it can actually be quite dangerous.
charaepi_ch0053_00_zakuro_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0053_00_zakuro/2301_0402_1600:
It’s important to be vigilant, no matter how
many safety precautions you’ve taken.
charaepi_ch0053_00_zakuro_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0053_00_zakuro/2301_1201_1700:
I came to compete in the PML in order to
reach greater heights as a Trainer.
charaepi_ch0053_00_zakuro_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0053_00_zakuro/2301_1201_1800:
But that’s not the only reason I decided to
come here to Pasio.
charaepi_ch0053_00_zakuro_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0053_00_zakuro/2301_1201_1900:
This is an artificial island... That means
someone had to create all of this beautiful,
majestic nature.
charaepi_ch0053_00_zakuro_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0053_00_zakuro/2301_1201_2000:
I knew that climbing the mountains here
would be unlike anything I’ve ever done before!
charaepi_ch0053_00_zakuro_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0053_00_zakuro/2301_1201_2100:
Ahh, I’m getting excited just thinking about it...
I can’t wait to start climbing.
charaepi_ch0053_00_zakuro_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0053_00_zakuro/2301_0301_2200: Is there something at the very top?
charaepi_ch0053_00_zakuro_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0053_00_zakuro/2301_0302_2400: Do you get a prize for doing it?
charaepi_ch0053_00_zakuro_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0053_00_zakuro/2301_1201_2600:
Just a wide, open view of the
landscape below.
charaepi_ch0053_00_zakuro_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0053_00_zakuro/2301_0401_2800:
Well, when I see a wall in front of me,
I’ve just got to climb it.
charaepi_ch0053_00_zakuro_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0053_00_zakuro/2301_0402_3000: Well, what if I told you it’s a lot of fun for me?
charaepi_ch0053_00_zakuro_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0053_00_zakuro/2301_1201_3100:
Pokémon battling and rock-climbing are really
different, but they have a lot in common, too.
charaepi_ch0053_00_zakuro_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0053_00_zakuro/2301_1201_3200:
They can both feel like a wall in front of you.
You just have to climb over that wall and
keep aiming higher and higher.
charaepi_ch0053_00_zakuro_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0053_00_zakuro/2301_1201_3300:
Wouldn’t you agree? I feel like the whole
process is really important.
charaepi_ch0053_00_zakuro_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0053_00_zakuro/2301_0401_3500:
When it comes to Pokémon battling,
you and I are a lot alike.
charaepi_ch0053_00_zakuro_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0053_00_zakuro/2301_0401_3600:
The look of enjoyment on our faces is as
plain as day, even when we’re up against
a tough opponent.
charaepi_ch0053_00_zakuro_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0053_00_zakuro/2301_0402_3800:
Really? But I thought you were like me when
it comes to tackling challenges...pushing
yourself hard, past your limits, sometimes.
charaepi_ch0053_00_zakuro_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0053_00_zakuro/2301_1201_3900:
Oh! Did you hear Amaura make that sound
just now? Maybe we’ll get to see it tonight.
charaepi_ch0053_00_zakuro_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0053_00_zakuro/2301_1201_4000:
Legends say that the cry of an Amaura is a
sign that an aurora will appear in the sky.
charaepi_ch0053_00_zakuro_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0053_00_zakuro/2301_1201_4100: I’ve never actually seen one myself, though.
charaepi_ch0053_00_zakuro_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0053_00_zakuro/2301_1201_4200:
Wouldn’t it be amazing if Amaura and I climbed
to the top of this treacherous mountain to
witness that beautiful aurora together?
charaepi_ch0053_00_zakuro_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0053_00_zakuro/2301_1201_4300:
Knowing there may be a special reward like
that at the top makes me want to go for it
even more!
charaepi_ch0053_00_zakuro_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0053_00_zakuro/2301_1201_4500:
I don’t know if she understands me or not...
I think whether we decide to go up
will depend on how Amaura feels.
charaepi_ch0053_00_zakuro_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0053_00_zakuro/2301_1201_4700:
Rock-climbing is my own challenge to myself,
but Pokémon battling can be something we
strive to conquer together.
charaepi_ch0053_00_zakuro_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0053_00_zakuro/2301_1201_4800:
Overcoming a tough battle is like climbing a
giant wall—there’s beauty on the other side
that you won’t find anywhere else...
charaepi_ch0053_00_zakuro_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0053_00_zakuro/2301_1201_4900: That’s how I like to look at it, anyway.

charaepi_ch0054_00_kyo_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0054_00_kyo/2301_1101_0100_20:
[Name:PlayerNickname ] arrived at the cave 
where Koga had asked [EN:Gen Ref='255' M='him' F='her' ] to meet him.
charaepi_ch0054_00_kyo_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0054_00_kyo/2301_1101_0200_20: However, Koga was nowhere to be seen.
charaepi_ch0054_00_kyo_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0054_00_kyo/2301_1201_0400_10:
You will never find me if you depend only on
your eyes!
charaepi_ch0054_00_kyo_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0054_00_kyo/2301_1201_0500_10:
Sharpen your senses! 
Find me with more than just your vision!
charaepi_ch0054_00_kyo_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0054_00_kyo/2301_1101_0600_20:
[Name:PlayerNickname ] closed [EN:Gen Ref='255' M='his' F='her' ] eyes to
try to sense Koga in the darkness.
charaepi_ch0054_00_kyo_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0054_00_kyo/2301_0401_0800_10: Well, well! Good senses you have there!
charaepi_ch0054_00_kyo_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0054_00_kyo/2301_1201_1100_10:
To think that you could see past my ninja
techniques so well!
charaepi_ch0054_00_kyo_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0054_00_kyo/2301_1201_1200_10:
But! Not good enough!
Wouldn’t you say, partner?
charaepi_ch0054_00_kyo_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0054_00_kyo/2301_1201_1300_10:
I’m just saying that you let down your guard!
You became careless just because you found me!
charaepi_ch0054_00_kyo_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0054_00_kyo/2301_1201_1400_10:
What you see is not everything there is. Being
able to see what is not visible is most crucial!
charaepi_ch0054_00_kyo_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0054_00_kyo/2301_1201_1500_10:
Read what your opponent is thinking and
decipher their strategies to claim the flow
of battle as your own!
charaepi_ch0054_00_kyo_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0054_00_kyo/2301_1201_1600_10:
And you will need an unwavering 
willpower in order to do this!
charaepi_ch0054_00_kyo_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0054_00_kyo/2301_1201_1700_10:
My dojo has been training for 400 years 
how to be calm at all times!
charaepi_ch0054_00_kyo_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0054_00_kyo/2301_1201_1800_10:
The reason I called you out here today was to
teach you the secrets of being a ninja.
charaepi_ch0054_00_kyo_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0054_00_kyo/2301_1201_2100_10: You really don’t emote much, do you?
charaepi_ch0054_00_kyo_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0054_00_kyo/2301_1201_2200_10: But I’m sure you’re surprised nonetheless, right?
charaepi_ch0054_00_kyo_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0054_00_kyo/2301_0401_2400_10:
Well, I see that you have your emotions under
control. That is good.
charaepi_ch0054_00_kyo_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0054_00_kyo/2301_0402_2600_10: I knew it! You worried me a little bit!
charaepi_ch0054_00_kyo_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0054_00_kyo/2301_1201_2700_10: But prepare yourself. We have only just begun.
charaepi_ch0054_00_kyo_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0054_00_kyo/2301_1201_2800_10:
I would recommend you don’t take Crobat’s
techniques or speed lightly!
charaepi_ch0054_00_kyo_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0054_00_kyo/2301_1201_2900_10:
Fwahaha! I see Crobat’s Double Team is causing
you trouble!
charaepi_ch0054_00_kyo_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0054_00_kyo/2301_1201_3000_10:
You must be quite surprised!
I see it in your face!
charaepi_ch0054_00_kyo_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0054_00_kyo/2301_1201_3100_10:
We’re only able to pull off combination moves
like this because of how in sync we are.
charaepi_ch0054_00_kyo_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0054_00_kyo/2301_1201_3200_10:
We can do this without any planning—with only
shared experience and eye contact!
charaepi_ch0054_00_kyo_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0054_00_kyo/2301_1201_3300_10:
You should understand how difficult synchronicity
like that can be. But if you can achieve it, it will
prove a great power for you and your Pokémon.
charaepi_ch0054_00_kyo_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0054_00_kyo/2301_0401_3500_10: Of course! I know you can!
charaepi_ch0054_00_kyo_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0054_00_kyo/2301_0302_3600_10: Do you think we can do it, too?
charaepi_ch0054_00_kyo_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0054_00_kyo/2301_0402_3700_10: Of course! I know you can!
charaepi_ch0054_00_kyo_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0054_00_kyo/2301_1201_3800_10:
But all this is why you must never let your guard
down, especially since you and your Pokémon
have such a strong bond.
charaepi_ch0054_00_kyo_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0054_00_kyo/2301_1201_3900_10:
You cannot cut corners at the PML.
Or rather, there are not many Trainers here
that you can win against by cutting corners.
charaepi_ch0054_00_kyo_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0054_00_kyo/2301_1201_4000_10:
I’m looking forward to seeing if your bond can
overcome ours!

charaepi_ch0055_00_gampi_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0055_00_gampi/2301_1101_0100_:
[Name:PlayerNickname ] had heard talk of a
man in gleaming armor spotted in the village,
so [EN:Gen Ref='255' M='he' F='she' ] decided to make [EN:Gen Ref='255' M='his' F='her' ] way there.
charaepi_ch0055_00_gampi_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0055_00_gampi/2301_1101_0200_:
Fortunately, the polished sheen 
of steel is easy to spot.
charaepi_ch0055_00_gampi_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0055_00_gampi/2301_1201_0400_:
Do not fear! I, Wikstrom, have taken it
upon myself to protect this village!
charaepi_ch0055_00_gampi_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0055_00_gampi/2301_0401_0600_:
Indeed. Defending the townspeople
is the duty of a knight such as I.
charaepi_ch0055_00_gampi_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0055_00_gampi/2301_0402_0800_:
Why, I have volunteered my time to
guard it! Your security is in capable
hands, I assure you.
charaepi_ch0055_00_gampi_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0055_00_gampi/2301_1201_0900_:
I hear tell that some ruffians have been
skulking about, taking advantage of the PML’s
bustling crowds to commit their evil deeds.
charaepi_ch0055_00_gampi_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0055_00_gampi/2301_1201_1100_:
This village looks very much like the
place mine own family hails from.
charaepi_ch0055_00_gampi_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0055_00_gampi/2301_1201_1200_:
I believe Aegislash has taken notice of that
as well and so has kindly agreed to assist me
in guarding it.
