charaepi_ch0055_00_gampi_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0055_00_gampi/2301_1201_1300_:
Such bravery! Such valor! This is why my family
has chosen to fight alongside a line of noble
Aegislash through the generations!
charaepi_ch0055_00_gampi_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0055_00_gampi/2301_0401_1500_:
Indeed. My family has an exceedingly
long history in the Kalos region.
charaepi_ch0055_00_gampi_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0055_00_gampi/2301_0402_1700_:
Indeed. My family has an exceedingly
long history in the Kalos region.
charaepi_ch0055_00_gampi_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0055_00_gampi/2301_1201_1800_:
We have battled in contests and tourneys
across the land for generations, with
Aegislash fighting tirelessly by our side.
charaepi_ch0055_00_gampi_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0055_00_gampi/2301_1201_1900_:
It is with regret that I must admit we were not
always victorious. Eras of toil and hardship
have been recorded in our histories as well.
charaepi_ch0055_00_gampi_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0055_00_gampi/2301_1201_2000_:
Nevertheless, the Aegislash have been
our faithful companions for all these years.
charaepi_ch0055_00_gampi_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0055_00_gampi/2301_1201_2100_:
As a descendant of such a venerable family,
I feel it is my duty to continue that tradition
and carve my own name into history as well.
charaepi_ch0055_00_gampi_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0055_00_gampi/2301_1201_2200_:
And what, pray tell, could be a more splendid
stage for me to do so on than the PML, where I
can battle against the world’s strongest Trainers?
charaepi_ch0055_00_gampi_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0055_00_gampi/2301_0401_2400_:
Thank you, child! You shall witness the
glory of my esteemed family soon enough!
I shall make it so!
charaepi_ch0055_00_gampi_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0055_00_gampi/2301_0402_2600_:
Oho! What bold words you speak, child!
You will be a formidable opponent, surely!
I eagerly await the day we cross swords!
charaepi_ch0055_00_gampi_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0055_00_gampi/2301_1201_2700_:
But alas! ’Twould be a grave mistake to
seek out victory and victory alone.
charaepi_ch0055_00_gampi_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0055_00_gampi/2301_1201_2800_:
Winning is of great import, of course, but
embracing the path of chivalry and fighting
with honor is of the utmost importance.
charaepi_ch0055_00_gampi_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0055_00_gampi/2301_1201_2900_:
Not even in the face of the direst
circumstances would my family
relinquish its pride.
charaepi_ch0055_00_gampi_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0055_00_gampi/2301_1201_3000_:
Even in defeat, we respect those who have
bested us. Both sides can smile and praise
the other for a battle fought bravely.
charaepi_ch0055_00_gampi_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0055_00_gampi/2301_1201_3100_:
For one must exhibit knightly behavior,
both in victory and in defeat!
One must be just, honorable, and fair!
charaepi_ch0055_00_gampi_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0055_00_gampi/2301_1201_3200_:
If nothing else, I hope that you will
remember these words, young [EN:Gen Ref='255' M='sir' F='lady' ].
charaepi_ch0055_00_gampi_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0055_00_gampi/2301_0401_3400_:
Protect what you believe in, have faith in
yourself, and stay true to the promises you make.
charaepi_ch0055_00_gampi_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0055_00_gampi/2301_0402_3600_:
Indeed. The weight of one’s shield can seem
heavy when compared to a blade, but there 
is beauty found only in protecting something.
charaepi_ch0055_00_gampi_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0055_00_gampi/2301_1201_3700_:
For you see, when you break a promise,
whether to yourself or to another, even the
greatest triumph grows sour.
charaepi_ch0055_00_gampi_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0055_00_gampi/2301_1201_3800_:
Mine own principles and promises—
the pride and honor of my esteemed family—
are forever intertwined with Aegislash.
charaepi_ch0055_00_gampi_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0055_00_gampi/2301_1201_3900_:
When you started your journey, I am certain
you felt something similar stir within your heart.
Have faith and stay true to yourself.
charaepi_ch0055_00_gampi_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0055_00_gampi/2301_1201_4000_:
When you do, ’twill mean you have at last
found the true path of a knight—of honor.
charaepi_ch0055_00_gampi_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0055_00_gampi/2301_0401_4200_:
Oh, mine heart doth swell at such a
courageous answer!
charaepi_ch0055_00_gampi_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0055_00_gampi/2301_0302_4300_: I’ll do the best I can.
charaepi_ch0055_00_gampi_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0055_00_gampi/2301_0402_4400_:
Indeed, you shall!
But you need not be hasty, child.
Lumiose City was not built in a day!
charaepi_ch0055_00_gampi_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0055_00_gampi/2301_1201_4500_:
What was that, Aegislash?
You are growing weary of my
long-winded speech?
charaepi_ch0055_00_gampi_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0055_00_gampi/2301_1201_4600_:
Alas! The will to battle beats so strongly in
Aegislash’s heart, he can scarcely sit still.
charaepi_ch0055_00_gampi_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0055_00_gampi/2301_1201_4700_: The brazen, bladed buffoon! Ha ha ha!
charaepi_ch0055_00_gampi_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0055_00_gampi/2301_1201_4800_:
I must apologize if I have prattled on
too long... ’Tis important to enjoy a good
Pokémon battle now and again as well!
charaepi_ch0055_00_gampi_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0055_00_gampi/2301_1201_4900_:
Ha ha ha! Oh, my dear Aegislash!
Let us go now. We shall enjoy this merry
festival of the PML with honor and grace!

charaepi_ch0056_00_kuchinashi_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0056_00_kuchinashi/2301_1101_:
While out shopping, [Name:PlayerNickname ]
saw a certain Trainer.
charaepi_ch0056_00_kuchinashi_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0056_00_kuchinashi/2301_1201_:
My precious Drifloon blew away in the wind!
I only took my eyes off him for a second!
charaepi_ch0056_00_kuchinashi_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0056_00_kuchinashi/2301_1101_:
[Name:PlayerNickname ], seeing the Trainer
in trouble, offered to help find the Pokémon.
charaepi_ch0056_00_kuchinashi_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0056_00_kuchinashi/2301_0401_:
Thank you so much for helping me!
I couldn’t have found him without you!
charaepi_ch0056_00_kuchinashi_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0056_00_kuchinashi/2301_0402_: Yeah, and I couldn’t have done it without you!
charaepi_ch0056_00_kuchinashi_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0056_00_kuchinashi/2301_1201_: Thank you for looking after him.
charaepi_ch0056_00_kuchinashi_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0056_00_kuchinashi/2301_0401_: Nah, I didn’t do anything special.
charaepi_ch0056_00_kuchinashi_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0056_00_kuchinashi/2301_1201_: I just saw a Pokémon wandering alone.

And you two came by when Persian and I tried
to approach the Drifloon.

I mean, Pasio doesn’t have 
any wild Pokémon at all.
My Persian can’t leave lonely Pokémon alone.
charaepi_ch0056_00_kuchinashi_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0056_00_kuchinashi/2301_0401_:
I suppose. 
He’s been like this since we were in Alola.
charaepi_ch0056_00_kuchinashi_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0056_00_kuchinashi/2301_0402_:
I suppose. 
He’s been like this since we were in Alola.
charaepi_ch0056_00_kuchinashi_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0056_00_kuchinashi/2301_1201_: And there’s not a lot that happens in Alola.

There were a lot of Pokémon that got separated
from their Trainers and were having a hard time
adjusting to the new environment.

He picked those Pokémon up 
and took care of them.
charaepi_ch0056_00_kuchinashi_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0056_00_kuchinashi/2301_0301_: You’re pretty nice, too, huh, Nanu?
charaepi_ch0056_00_kuchinashi_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0056_00_kuchinashi/2301_0302_: So you’re watching over them, too?
charaepi_ch0056_00_kuchinashi_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0056_00_kuchinashi/2301_1201_:
But if you think Persian is protective,
he might be.

You’re also the kind of Trainer who 
can’t leave a person or Pokémon 
in trouble alone, aren’t you?
charaepi_ch0056_00_kuchinashi_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0056_00_kuchinashi/2301_0401_:
It might be weird for me to say this,
being the one who brought it up...
charaepi_ch0056_00_kuchinashi_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0056_00_kuchinashi/2301_0402_:
It might be weird for me to say this,
being the one who brought it up...
charaepi_ch0056_00_kuchinashi_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0056_00_kuchinashi/2301_1201_:
but it’s as clear as day that you are, so it 
doesn’t even really matter what you answer.

I just think that watching a Trainer like you
would keep me entertained.

charaepi_ch0057_00_shiba_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0057_00_shiba/2301_1101_0100_:
[Name:PlayerNickname ] stopped in town
during [EN:Gen Ref='255' M='his' F='her' ] travels for a little rest and relaxation.
charaepi_ch0057_00_shiba_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0057_00_shiba/2301_1101_0200_:
Suddenly, [EN:Gen Ref='255' M='he' F='she' ] heard laughter 
coming from close by.
charaepi_ch0057_00_shiba_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0057_00_shiba/2301_1201_0400_:
Who would have thought I would find Rage
Candy Bars on Pasio!
charaepi_ch0057_00_shiba_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0057_00_shiba/2301_1201_0500_:
Ah, it’s been too long since I tasted this!
No need to be polite! Have some yourself!
charaepi_ch0057_00_shiba_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0057_00_shiba/2301_1201_1100_:
These are Rage Candy Bars!
They are my favorite!
charaepi_ch0057_00_shiba_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0057_00_shiba/2301_1201_1200_:
I lost myself in the excitement of being able to
eat these...
charaepi_ch0057_00_shiba_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0057_00_shiba/2301_1201_1300_: I’m embarrassed you had to see that.
charaepi_ch0057_00_shiba_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0057_00_shiba/2301_0302_1600_: I must admit I was surprised.
charaepi_ch0057_00_shiba_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0057_00_shiba/2301_0402_1700_:
Yes... I know it is vastly different 
from how I normally act.
charaepi_ch0057_00_shiba_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0057_00_shiba/2301_1201_1900_:
But that’s behind us now.
I welcome you, [Name:PlayerNickname ]!
charaepi_ch0057_00_shiba_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0057_00_shiba/2301_1201_2000_: Have some Rage Candy Bars. Relax with us.
charaepi_ch0057_00_shiba_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0057_00_shiba/2301_1201_2100_: Machamp looks happy to see you as well.
charaepi_ch0057_00_shiba_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0057_00_shiba/2301_0401_2300_: If you have no urgent matters to attend to, rest.
charaepi_ch0057_00_shiba_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0057_00_shiba/2301_0401_2400_: A moment of respite will do wonders for you.
charaepi_ch0057_00_shiba_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0057_00_shiba/2301_0402_2600_: Yes, I come to this village often to relax.
charaepi_ch0057_00_shiba_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0057_00_shiba/2301_0402_2700_: I come here often with Machamp.
charaepi_ch0057_00_shiba_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0057_00_shiba/2301_1201_2800_:
You train hard when you train, and you rest
hard when you rest.
charaepi_ch0057_00_shiba_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0057_00_shiba/2301_1201_2900_: That is the secret to training with longevity!
charaepi_ch0057_00_shiba_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0057_00_shiba/2301_1201_3000_:
You’re a Trainer, so you know 
how important it is to rest.
charaepi_ch0057_00_shiba_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0057_00_shiba/2301_0402_3400_:
You must rest if you want to become stronger.
That’s all I wanted to say.
charaepi_ch0057_00_shiba_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0057_00_shiba/2301_0402_3500_:
It might seem roundabout, but resting is an
important part of training.
charaepi_ch0057_00_shiba_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0057_00_shiba/2301_1201_3600_:
I believe that training is something you do to
elevate yourself and not to challenge yourself.
charaepi_ch0057_00_shiba_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0057_00_shiba/2301_1201_3700_:
If you continue training without rest, 
you may indeed become stronger 
but your spirit will suffer for it.
charaepi_ch0057_00_shiba_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0057_00_shiba/2301_1201_3800_:
That kind of strength...
That is not what Machamp and I yearn for.
charaepi_ch0057_00_shiba_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0057_00_shiba/2301_1201_3900_:
You must hone your spirit along with your
muscles to gain true strength.
charaepi_ch0057_00_shiba_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0057_00_shiba/2301_0401_4100_:
Machamp and I train the same way, and we
rest the same way.
charaepi_ch0057_00_shiba_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0057_00_shiba/2301_0402_4300_:
Machamp and I train the same way, and we
rest the same way.
charaepi_ch0057_00_shiba_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0057_00_shiba/2301_1201_4400_:
We can understand each other 
because we both go through 
the same pleasures and the same hardships.
charaepi_ch0057_00_shiba_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0057_00_shiba/2301_1201_4500_:
We want to become stronger not only for
ourselves but for each other as well.
charaepi_ch0057_00_shiba_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0057_00_shiba/2301_1201_4600_:
That is what drives us to become stronger than
we have ever been.
charaepi_ch0057_00_shiba_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0057_00_shiba/2301_1201_4800_:
And that path goes on forever. We will continue
training our minds and bodies like this.

charaepi_ch0058_00_kahiri_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0058_00_kahiri/2301_1101_0100:
[Name:PlayerNickname ] found a golf ball 
at the base of a tree.
charaepi_ch0058_00_kahiri_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0058_00_kahiri/2301_1101_0200:
After picking it up, [EN:Gen Ref='255' M='he' F='she' ] noticed that 
there was a name written on it...
charaepi_ch0058_00_kahiri_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0058_00_kahiri/2301_1201_0400:
You went out of your way to return this to me?
Thank you.
charaepi_ch0058_00_kahiri_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0058_00_kahiri/2301_1201_0500:
There aren’t any places I can practice
a full game of golf on Pasio.
charaepi_ch0058_00_kahiri_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0058_00_kahiri/2301_1201_0600:
But I go to the forest so that 
I can at least practice my swing.
charaepi_ch0058_00_kahiri_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0058_00_kahiri/2301_1201_0700:
Toucannon often goes out with a golf ball
in her mouth, so I guess we lost this one
when we were in the forest last time.
charaepi_ch0058_00_kahiri_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0058_00_kahiri/2301_1201_0800:
I practice my swing six hours every day.
It has become a fundamental routine for me.
charaepi_ch0058_00_kahiri_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0058_00_kahiri/2301_0401_1000:
Yes, of course! 
I train them as much as I practice golf.
charaepi_ch0058_00_kahiri_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0058_00_kahiri/2301_0302_1100: Wow, you must be really busy.
charaepi_ch0058_00_kahiri_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0058_00_kahiri/2301_0402_1200:
I suppose I am pretty busy, but training 
my Pokémon is always a priority.
charaepi_ch0058_00_kahiri_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0058_00_kahiri/2301_1201_1300:
I have to juggle both since 
I promised myself that I would.
charaepi_ch0058_00_kahiri_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0058_00_kahiri/2301_0401_1500:
I make sure to go to sleep 
at the same time every day.
charaepi_ch0058_00_kahiri_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0058_00_kahiri/2301_0401_1600:
No matter what, I always take care of my body
so I can keep up with my training regimen.
charaepi_ch0058_00_kahiri_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0058_00_kahiri/2301_0302_1700: Don’t wear yourself out too much.
charaepi_ch0058_00_kahiri_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0058_00_kahiri/2301_0402_1900:
But I make sure that I am in peak physical
condition, so no need to worry.
charaepi_ch0058_00_kahiri_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0058_00_kahiri/2301_1201_2000: Besides, I have Toucannon by my side.
charaepi_ch0058_00_kahiri_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0058_00_kahiri/2301_1201_2100:
Toucannon’s beak is nice and warm, so I sleep 
very comfortably when I snuggle up to her.
charaepi_ch0058_00_kahiri_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0058_00_kahiri/2301_1201_2200:
It’s so cozy next to her beak, 
and touching it helps me fall asleep.
charaepi_ch0058_00_kahiri_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0058_00_kahiri/2301_1201_2300: See? If you get close like this...
charaepi_ch0058_00_kahiri_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0058_00_kahiri/2301_1201_2400:
Hmmm...
She doesn’t seem to be in a mood to humor me.
charaepi_ch0058_00_kahiri_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0058_00_kahiri/2301_1201_2500: Is this because of what happened yesterday?
charaepi_ch0058_00_kahiri_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0058_00_kahiri/2301_0401_2700:
Well, yesterday a Trainer asked us to battle 
with them after our daily golf practice.
charaepi_ch0058_00_kahiri_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0058_00_kahiri/2301_0402_2900:
Well, yesterday a Trainer asked us to battle 
with them after our daily golf practice.
charaepi_ch0058_00_kahiri_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0058_00_kahiri/2301_1201_3000:
There were many onlookers who wanted to
challenge me, one after another.
charaepi_ch0058_00_kahiri_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0058_00_kahiri/2301_1201_3100:
In the end, we had 20 Pokémon 
battles back-to-back.
charaepi_ch0058_00_kahiri_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0058_00_kahiri/2301_1201_3200:
We were exhausted by the end of the day,
and I just collapsed next to Toucannon.
charaepi_ch0058_00_kahiri_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0058_00_kahiri/2301_1201_3300:
I meant to snuggle close to her beak, 
but I ended up sticking my head into it 
and falling asleep there.
charaepi_ch0058_00_kahiri_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0058_00_kahiri/2301_1201_3400:
Toucannon stayed in that awkward position 
all night and waited for me to wake up.
charaepi_ch0058_00_kahiri_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0058_00_kahiri/2301_1201_3500:
I’m sure the poor thing was trying 
hard not to wake me.
charaepi_ch0058_00_kahiri_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0058_00_kahiri/2301_1201_3600:
By morning, her beak was trembling 
from the strain.
charaepi_ch0058_00_kahiri_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0058_00_kahiri/2301_1201_3700: Do you think my head was heavy?
charaepi_ch0058_00_kahiri_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0058_00_kahiri/2301_1201_3800:
Ow, ow! Toucannon! Stop! Stop pecking!
Your beak is so hot!
What does this rhythm mean... Are you angry?
charaepi_ch0058_00_kahiri_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0058_00_kahiri/2301_1201_3900:
My Toucannon is usually shy, but she becomes
very stern when she’s angry.
charaepi_ch0058_00_kahiri_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0058_00_kahiri/2301_1201_4000:
I guess this is just her showing how much she
cares. I’m sorry, Toucannon. I’ll make sure to
not let myself doze off like that again.
charaepi_ch0058_00_kahiri_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0058_00_kahiri/2301_0301_4100: How can you work so hard like that?
charaepi_ch0058_00_kahiri_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0058_00_kahiri/2301_0401_4200: I suppose it’s because it’s something I enjoy.
charaepi_ch0058_00_kahiri_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0058_00_kahiri/2301_0302_4300: Don’t you ever just take a break?
charaepi_ch0058_00_kahiri_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0058_00_kahiri/2301_0402_4400:
That’s a good question...
That thought hasn’t really crossed my mind.
charaepi_ch0058_00_kahiri_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0058_00_kahiri/2301_1201_4500:
I was fortunate enough to find 
two things that I love.
charaepi_ch0058_00_kahiri_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0058_00_kahiri/2301_1201_4600: And those are Toucannon and golf.
charaepi_ch0058_00_kahiri_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0058_00_kahiri/2301_1201_4700:
It would be wrong for me to say that
either of those is a burden to me.
charaepi_ch0058_00_kahiri_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0058_00_kahiri/2301_0401_4900: You don’t need to worry about that with me!
charaepi_ch0058_00_kahiri_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0058_00_kahiri/2301_0402_5100: You don’t need to worry about that with me!
charaepi_ch0058_00_kahiri_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0058_00_kahiri/2301_1201_5200:
If I go so far that I might really hurt myself,
Toucannon will be there to peck some sense 
back into me.
charaepi_ch0058_00_kahiri_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0058_00_kahiri/2301_1201_5300:
She is the perfect partner when it comes to
golf, Pokémon battles, and even everyday life.
charaepi_ch0058_00_kahiri_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0058_00_kahiri/2301_1201_5400:
If I overwork myself and collapse, 
it would cause a lot of trouble for Toucannon.
charaepi_ch0058_00_kahiri_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0058_00_kahiri/2301_1201_5500:
And that is something I want to avoid 
more than anything.

charaepi_ch0059_00_katsura_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0059_00_katsura/2301_1101_010:
[Name:PlayerNickname ] saw a Ponyta racing
up toward the volcano and decided to chase it.
charaepi_ch0059_00_katsura_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0059_00_katsura/2301_1101_020:
At the end of the chase, [EN:Gen Ref='255' M='he' F='she' ] found 
Blaine deep in thought.
charaepi_ch0059_00_katsura_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0059_00_katsura/2301_1201_090:
Oh, [Name:PlayerNickname ]!
I didn’t hear you coming!
charaepi_ch0059_00_katsura_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0059_00_katsura/2301_1201_100:
I was just trying to think up a quiz using Ponyta
as the subject.
charaepi_ch0059_00_katsura_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0059_00_katsura/2301_1201_110: I can’t come up with a single idea!
charaepi_ch0059_00_katsura_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0059_00_katsura/2301_1201_120:
I haven’t been able to come up with anything
good lately. I might be in a slump.
charaepi_ch0059_00_katsura_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0059_00_katsura/2301_0301_130: Show me what you have so far!
charaepi_ch0059_00_katsura_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0059_00_katsura/2301_0402_160:
It’s the worst it’s been for me since I started
thinking up these quizzes!
charaepi_ch0059_00_katsura_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0059_00_katsura/2301_0402_170:
But now let me think.
Ah, yes—let’s try this one out.
charaepi_ch0059_00_katsura_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0059_00_katsura/2301_1201_180:
Bam! A question!
We all know that Pasio is an artificial island...
charaepi_ch0059_00_katsura_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0059_00_katsura/2301_1201_190:
But there is, in fact, a Pokémon that 
only exists on this island! True or false?!
charaepi_ch0059_00_katsura_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0059_00_katsura/2301_1201_250: I feel like I can do better than that, though.
charaepi_ch0059_00_katsura_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0059_00_katsura/2301_1201_260:
That wasn’t much of a quiz... 
More like testing general knowledge.
charaepi_ch0059_00_katsura_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0059_00_katsura/2301_1201_280:
I have to think of more fun questions, or else I
won’t even be able to focus on Pokémon battles!
charaepi_ch0059_00_katsura_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0059_00_katsura/2301_0301_290: I don’t think those are related...
charaepi_ch0059_00_katsura_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0059_00_katsura/2301_0401_300: You don’t get it, do you?!
charaepi_ch0059_00_katsura_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0059_00_katsura/2301_0402_320: Exactly! I have to get out of this slump quickly!
charaepi_ch0059_00_katsura_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0059_00_katsura/2301_1201_330:
Life is one big question! It’s a cycle of asking
yourself questions and figuring out answers!
charaepi_ch0059_00_katsura_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0059_00_katsura/2301_1201_340:
Every mystery you solve is one more step you
take in your growth!
charaepi_ch0059_00_katsura_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0059_00_katsura/2301_1201_350: The same can be said for Pokémon battles!
charaepi_ch0059_00_katsura_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0059_00_katsura/2301_1201_360:
No matter what walls you run into, you become
stronger every time you overcome one!
charaepi_ch0059_00_katsura_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0059_00_katsura/2301_1201_370:
As long as I live, I will continue thinking up quiz
questions and having Pokémon battles!
charaepi_ch0059_00_katsura_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0059_00_katsura/2301_1201_380:
That is my way of life as the hotheaded
quiz master!
charaepi_ch0059_00_katsura_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0059_00_katsura/2301_1201_460:
I actually thought of something 
when I was shouting my manifesto...
charaepi_ch0059_00_katsura_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0059_00_katsura/2301_1201_470:
But the impact of my revelation
made me forget it again!
charaepi_ch0059_00_katsura_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0059_00_katsura/2301_1201_480:
It was going to be my swan song!
My masterpiece!
charaepi_ch0059_00_katsura_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0059_00_katsura/2301_1201_490: Ponyta! Kick me in the head!
charaepi_ch0059_00_katsura_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0059_00_katsura/2301_1201_500:
Maybe I’ll recall it if I get 
kicked in the head really hard!
charaepi_ch0059_00_katsura_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0059_00_katsura/2301_0401_520:
What’s wrong, Ponyta? You’re saying that my
head is more important than quizzes?!
charaepi_ch0059_00_katsura_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0059_00_katsura/2301_0302_530: This might not be a good idea...
charaepi_ch0059_00_katsura_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0059_00_katsura/2301_0402_540:
What’s wrong, Ponyta? You’re saying that my
head is more important than quizzes?!
charaepi_ch0059_00_katsura_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0059_00_katsura/2301_1201_550:
Don’t worry about it! My head may seem
defenseless, but it’s plenty trained!
charaepi_ch0059_00_katsura_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0059_00_katsura/2301_1201_560:
Fine... It’s a waste, but I suppose I’ll forget
about that quiz.
charaepi_ch0059_00_katsura_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0059_00_katsura/2301_1201_580:
One day, I will think of a quiz that everybody
can enjoy!
charaepi_ch0059_00_katsura_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0059_00_katsura/2301_1201_590: I will make quizzes the next craze on Pasio!

charaepi_ch0060_00_anzu_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0060_00_anzu/2301_1101_0100_2:
Janine was intently watching people 
going to and fro in town.
charaepi_ch0060_00_anzu_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0060_00_anzu/2301_1101_0200_2:
She did not notice [Name:PlayerNickname ]
as [EN:Gen Ref='255' M='he' F='she' ] approached her.
charaepi_ch0060_00_anzu_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0060_00_anzu/2301_1201_0300_1:
Hmm, I see.
So that’s how you’re gonna fight, huh?
charaepi_ch0060_00_anzu_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0060_00_anzu/2301_0401_0600_1: I was, uh... I was watching the townspeople.
charaepi_ch0060_00_anzu_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0060_00_anzu/2301_0302_0700_1: Do you see someone you know?
charaepi_ch0060_00_anzu_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0060_00_anzu/2301_1201_1000_1:
I was watching the movements of all the
Trainers and Pokémon in town.
charaepi_ch0060_00_anzu_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0060_00_anzu/2301_1201_1100_1:
I was also watching the Pokémon battles that
were happening all over.
charaepi_ch0060_00_anzu_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0060_00_anzu/2301_1201_1200_1: This is a part of my training, too!
charaepi_ch0060_00_anzu_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0060_00_anzu/2301_1201_1300_1: I’ve been out here since early this morning!
charaepi_ch0060_00_anzu_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0060_00_anzu/2301_0301_1400_1:
You really work hard on 
your studies, don’t you?
charaepi_ch0060_00_anzu_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0060_00_anzu/2301_0302_1600_1: You’re just slacking off, aren’t you?!
charaepi_ch0060_00_anzu_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0060_00_anzu/2301_1201_1800_1: I train every day with Ariados.
charaepi_ch0060_00_anzu_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0060_00_anzu/2301_1201_1900_1:
But what makes Pokémon battles deep is the fact
that they’re more than just tests of strength.
charaepi_ch0060_00_anzu_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0060_00_anzu/2301_1201_2000_1:
It’s suuuper important that you read what your
opponent is thinking and build your strategy
around that!
charaepi_ch0060_00_anzu_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0060_00_anzu/2301_1201_2100_1:
I was watching all of these Trainers
and Pokémon...
charaepi_ch0060_00_anzu_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0060_00_anzu/2301_1201_2200_1:
so I can learn to read one—even two—steps
ahead in battle.
charaepi_ch0060_00_anzu_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0060_00_anzu/2301_1201_2700_1: With perfect strategy is how a ninja fights!
charaepi_ch0060_00_anzu_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0060_00_anzu/2301_1201_2800_1:
My father has always told me that I must train
not only my body but my mind and spirit, too!
charaepi_ch0060_00_anzu_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0060_00_anzu/2301_1201_2900_1:
But...no matter how perfect your strategy is,
it doesn’t count for anything unless you are
connected with your Pokémon.
charaepi_ch0060_00_anzu_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0060_00_anzu/2301_1201_3000_1:
I learned that the most important thing is
for the Trainer and the Pokémon to have
a trusting relationship.
charaepi_ch0060_00_anzu_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0060_00_anzu/2301_0401_3200_1:
It’s not like Ariados and I need 
that kind of advice, though! 
We have each other’s back all the time!
charaepi_ch0060_00_anzu_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0060_00_anzu/2301_0302_3300_1: I can see that being really important.
charaepi_ch0060_00_anzu_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0060_00_anzu/2301_0402_3400_1:
It’s not like Ariados and I need 
that kind of advice, though! 
We have each other’s back all the time!
charaepi_ch0060_00_anzu_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0060_00_anzu/2301_1201_3500_1:
All the pain and sorrows that we went through...
We were able to overcome them together.
charaepi_ch0060_00_anzu_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0060_00_anzu/2301_1201_3700_1:
Considering what good partners we are, 
I know we won’t lose to anybody!
charaepi_ch0060_00_anzu_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0060_00_anzu/2301_0301_3800_1: We’ll give you a run for your money!
charaepi_ch0060_00_anzu_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0060_00_anzu/2301_0401_3900_1: Well then, I guess that makes us rivals!
charaepi_ch0060_00_anzu_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0060_00_anzu/2301_0402_4200_1: We could beat my father and his Crobat!
charaepi_ch0060_00_anzu_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0060_00_anzu/2301_1201_4300_1:
With our sync power, Ariados and I will only
get stronger!
charaepi_ch0060_00_anzu_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0060_00_anzu/2301_1201_4400_1: Stronger than you...and stronger than Father!

charaepi_ch0061_00_kikuko_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0061_00_kikuko/2301_1101_0100:
[Name:PlayerNickname ] carefully made [EN:Gen Ref='255' M='his' F='her' ]
way through a long, dark cave.
charaepi_ch0061_00_kikuko_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0061_00_kikuko/2301_1101_0200: [EN:Gen Ref='255' M='He' F='She' ] thought [EN:Gen Ref='255' M='he' F='she' ] heard something.
charaepi_ch0061_00_kikuko_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0061_00_kikuko/2301_1101_0300:
And then a Gengar that appeared 
to be wild jumped out at [EN:Gen Ref='255' M='him' F='her' ]!
charaepi_ch0061_00_kikuko_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0061_00_kikuko/2301_0401_0500:
Now, now, dear, you shouldn’t frighten guests
like that.
charaepi_ch0061_00_kikuko_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0061_00_kikuko/2301_0402_0700:
Now, now, dear, you shouldn’t frighten guests
like that.
charaepi_ch0061_00_kikuko_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0061_00_kikuko/2301_1201_0900:
You can draw out Gengar’s power to the fullest
in dark places, which is why we’re here.
charaepi_ch0061_00_kikuko_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0061_00_kikuko/2301_1201_1000:
I myself like places where the sun doesn’t
shine. They make me feel calm.
charaepi_ch0061_00_kikuko_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0061_00_kikuko/2301_0401_1200: Don’t judge me. That’s just how I am.
charaepi_ch0061_00_kikuko_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0061_00_kikuko/2301_0402_1400: Don’t judge me. That’s just how I am.
charaepi_ch0061_00_kikuko_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0061_00_kikuko/2301_0401_1600: That’s really none of your concern.
charaepi_ch0061_00_kikuko_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0061_00_kikuko/2301_0302_1700: Without me, wouldn’t it be lonely?
charaepi_ch0061_00_kikuko_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0061_00_kikuko/2301_0402_1800: That’s really none of your concern.
charaepi_ch0061_00_kikuko_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0061_00_kikuko/2301_1201_1900:
Why is it that I always meet people like you?
It’s been that way for a long, long time.
charaepi_ch0061_00_kikuko_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0061_00_kikuko/2301_0401_2100:
And on top of being nosy, you’re a
meddlesome child, too.
charaepi_ch0061_00_kikuko_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0061_00_kikuko/2301_0402_2300:
And on top of being nosy, you’re a
meddlesome child, too.
charaepi_ch0061_00_kikuko_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0061_00_kikuko/2301_1201_2400: Ah well... I guess it won’t hurt to talk a bit.
charaepi_ch0061_00_kikuko_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0061_00_kikuko/2301_1201_2500:
Do you know Oak? I’ve been stuck
with him for a long, long time.
charaepi_ch0061_00_kikuko_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0061_00_kikuko/2301_1201_2600:
That old duff was once tough and handsome!
He’s a shadow of his former self now.
charaepi_ch0061_00_kikuko_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0061_00_kikuko/2301_1201_2700:
He does know and talk a lot about Pokémon,
which might be why he’s always surrounded
by people. He used to shine so brightly.
charaepi_ch0061_00_kikuko_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0061_00_kikuko/2301_1201_2800:
Compared to him, I’m the quiet type when it
comes to Pokémon. I like to get lost in thought
about them all by myself.
charaepi_ch0061_00_kikuko_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0061_00_kikuko/2301_1201_2900:
I was doing what I liked, but that old duff Oak
would not stop talking to me.
charaepi_ch0061_00_kikuko_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0061_00_kikuko/2301_1201_3000:
I think he was just trying to be nice, but he was
giving me help I had never asked for.
charaepi_ch0061_00_kikuko_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0061_00_kikuko/2301_1201_3100:
He was taking up the time I wanted to
spend in contemplation, so I thought I’d try
to shut him up with a Pokémon battle.
charaepi_ch0061_00_kikuko_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0061_00_kikuko/2301_1201_3200:
But back then, that old guy was strong—
undefeated, in fact. Was he as good as
me? He was better.
charaepi_ch0061_00_kikuko_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0061_00_kikuko/2301_1201_3300: So then I battled Oak again and again.
charaepi_ch0061_00_kikuko_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0061_00_kikuko/2301_1201_3400:
At some point, the time I spent with him started
meaning a lot to me.
charaepi_ch0061_00_kikuko_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0061_00_kikuko/2301_1201_3500:
One day, all of a sudden, the old duff said he
wanted to make a Pokédex.
charaepi_ch0061_00_kikuko_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0061_00_kikuko/2301_1201_3600:
I told him that Pokémon are for battling,
but he wouldn’t listen.
charaepi_ch0061_00_kikuko_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0061_00_kikuko/2301_1201_3700:
He wasted my precious time, and when he’d had
enough of our battles, he left. Why do charming
men have to be so meddlesome?
charaepi_ch0061_00_kikuko_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0061_00_kikuko/2301_1201_3800:
He trampled all over my youth, even though I
never wanted anything to do with him in the
first place.
charaepi_ch0061_00_kikuko_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0061_00_kikuko/2301_1201_3900:
Hey, Gengar, don’t interrupt me 
when I’m talking. You’re just as
meddlesome as ever, aren’t you?
charaepi_ch0061_00_kikuko_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0061_00_kikuko/2301_0401_4100:
That’s right. She always interrupts me when she
thinks it’s for my own good.
charaepi_ch0061_00_kikuko_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0061_00_kikuko/2301_0402_4300:
No, it’s not that. She always interrupts me when
she thinks it’s for my own good.
charaepi_ch0061_00_kikuko_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0061_00_kikuko/2301_1201_4400:
Whenever I talk about that old Oak guy, 
my tone of voice gets harsh, 
so she worries about me.
charaepi_ch0061_00_kikuko_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0061_00_kikuko/2301_1201_4500: I always tell her she doesn’t need to, though.
charaepi_ch0061_00_kikuko_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0061_00_kikuko/2301_1201_4600:
But the truth is, she has helped me many times
throughout my life.
charaepi_ch0061_00_kikuko_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0061_00_kikuko/2301_1201_4700:
That’s one thing you should keep
in mind, [Name:PlayerNickname ].
charaepi_ch0061_00_kikuko_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0061_00_kikuko/2301_1201_4800:
No matter how much you think you’re all alone
and no one understands you, people are never
really alone.
charaepi_ch0061_00_kikuko_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0061_00_kikuko/2301_1201_4900:
If you take a look around, you’ll definitely find
someone meddlesome lurking nearby.
Like in the shadow of that rock there.

charaepi_ch0062_00_karin_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0062_00_karin/2301_1101_0100_:
As [Name:PlayerNickname ] was walking
down a city street, [EN:Gen Ref='255' M='he' F='she' ] noticed Karen and
Houndoom walking just ahead of [EN:Gen Ref='255' M='him' F='her' ].
charaepi_ch0062_00_karin_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0062_00_karin/2301_1101_0200_:
[EN:Gen Ref='255' M='He' F='She' ] opened [EN:Gen Ref='255' M='his' F='her' ] mouth to call out to them,
but at that exact same moment, 
they turned around to face [EN:Gen Ref='255' M='him' F='her' ].
charaepi_ch0062_00_karin_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0062_00_karin/2301_1201_0300_:
Ah, I had a feeling it was you.
I sensed your presence coming closer to me.
charaepi_ch0062_00_karin_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0062_00_karin/2301_1201_0400_: You didn’t seem very vigilant, though.
charaepi_ch0062_00_karin_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0062_00_karin/2301_1201_0500_: You should never let your guard down.
charaepi_ch0062_00_karin_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0062_00_karin/2301_0401_0800_:
Uh-oh, there’s a loose piece of thread
hanging down from your clothes there.
charaepi_ch0062_00_karin_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0062_00_karin/2301_0302_0900_: Was my guard down just now?
charaepi_ch0062_00_karin_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0062_00_karin/2301_0402_1100_:
Oh, look! There’s a loose piece of thread
hanging down from your clothes there.
charaepi_ch0062_00_karin_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0062_00_karin/2301_1101_4700_:
Suddenly, Houndoom let out a small stream of fire
just big enough to burn away the stray thread.
charaepi_ch0062_00_karin_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0062_00_karin/2301_1201_1400_: You still don’t get it, do you?
charaepi_ch0062_00_karin_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0062_00_karin/2301_1201_1500_:
If my intentions had been malicious instead of
helpful just now, you’d already be reduced to a
pile of cinders.
charaepi_ch0062_00_karin_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0062_00_karin/2301_1201_1600_:
That’s why I told you—
you can’t afford to let your guard down.
charaepi_ch0062_00_karin_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0062_00_karin/2301_1201_1700_:
You need to be fully aware, right down to
the seams on your clothes. Bad people will
invent all sorts of reasons to approach you.
charaepi_ch0062_00_karin_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0062_00_karin/2301_0401_1900_:
Hmm... You’re good at adapting, aren’t you?
You’re determined to grow and improve,
but you’re flexible, too.
charaepi_ch0062_00_karin_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0062_00_karin/2301_0402_2100_:
Hmm... You’re good at adapting, aren’t you?
You’re determined to grow and improve,
but you’re flexible, too.
charaepi_ch0062_00_karin_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0062_00_karin/2301_1201_2300_:
Especially since Houndoom and I
can’t really relate.
charaepi_ch0062_00_karin_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0062_00_karin/2301_0401_2500_:
No, we don’t. To live life following
the advice of others...
charaepi_ch0062_00_karin_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0062_00_karin/2301_0401_2600_: That just wouldn’t be in our nature.
charaepi_ch0062_00_karin_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0062_00_karin/2301_0402_2800_:
To put it simply, we want to be free
to live however we want to.
charaepi_ch0062_00_karin_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0062_00_karin/2301_0402_2900_:
We tend to favor that sort of
unrestrained lifestyle.
charaepi_ch0062_00_karin_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0062_00_karin/2301_1201_3000_:
Likewise, we don’t stop anyone else
from doing what they want to do, either.
charaepi_ch0062_00_karin_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0062_00_karin/2301_1201_3100_:
That being said, you should still straighten
up your appearance and try not to give
your opponent an opening.
charaepi_ch0062_00_karin_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0062_00_karin/2301_1201_3200_:
Besides, if you possess true, genuine power,
you won’t need to change yourself anyway.
charaepi_ch0062_00_karin_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0062_00_karin/2301_0401_3400_: I have noticed one thing, though...
charaepi_ch0062_00_karin_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0062_00_karin/2301_0402_3600_: I have noticed one thing, though...
charaepi_ch0062_00_karin_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0062_00_karin/2301_1201_3700_:
When Houndoom howls, most people and
Pokémon can’t help but quiver in fear.
charaepi_ch0062_00_karin_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0062_00_karin/2301_1201_3800_:
But since we’ve been talking, I haven’t
seen you react that way at all.
charaepi_ch0062_00_karin_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0062_00_karin/2301_1201_3900_:
You must have some serious guts—
or else somehow be perfectly at ease...
charaepi_ch0062_00_karin_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0062_00_karin/2301_1201_4200_:
Sorry. Forget about what I said
earlier, all right?
charaepi_ch0062_00_karin_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0062_00_karin/2301_1201_4300_: You’re strong in your own way.
charaepi_ch0062_00_karin_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0062_00_karin/2301_1201_4400_:
Trainers like you should battle with
whatever Pokémon they want and
however they wish.
charaepi_ch0062_00_karin_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0062_00_karin/2301_1201_4500_:
You have your own way of doing things,
and so do I...
charaepi_ch0062_00_karin_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0062_00_karin/2301_1201_4600_:
I hope someday we can see how our
differences measure up in battle. 
I’ll be looking forward to it.

charaepi_ch0063_00_renbu_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0063_00_renbu/2301_1101_0100_:
Hearing a loud noise coming from somewhere
on the mountain, [Name:PlayerNickname ]
decided to investigate.
charaepi_ch0063_00_renbu_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0063_00_renbu/2301_1101_0200_:
The source of the mysterious sound was Marshal
and his Conkeldurr’s rigorous training.
charaepi_ch0063_00_renbu_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0063_00_renbu/2301_1201_0300_:
Ah, [Name:PlayerNickname ], fancy meeting
you here. I was just training.
charaepi_ch0063_00_renbu_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0063_00_renbu/2301_0401_0500_:
I was testing my strength using 
Conkeldurr’s concrete pillars. 
All in pursuit of surpassing my limits!
charaepi_ch0063_00_renbu_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0063_00_renbu/2301_0402_0700_:
I was testing my strength using 
Conkeldurr’s concrete pillars. 
All in pursuit of surpassing my limits!
charaepi_ch0063_00_renbu_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0063_00_renbu/2301_1201_0800_:
Then a strange ring appeared and 
I went through it to come to this island.
charaepi_ch0063_00_renbu_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0063_00_renbu/2301_1201_0900_:
But regardless of where I am, 
what I do does not change!
charaepi_ch0063_00_renbu_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0063_00_renbu/2301_1201_1000_:
As long as my partner Conkeldurr is by my
side, we can train wherever we are!
charaepi_ch0063_00_renbu_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0063_00_renbu/2301_0401_1200_:
Trying to overcome all problems with strength
alone is both arduous and difficult.
charaepi_ch0063_00_renbu_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0063_00_renbu/2301_0402_1400_:
Trying to overcome all problems with strength
alone is both arduous and difficult.
charaepi_ch0063_00_renbu_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0063_00_renbu/2301_1201_1500_:
But Conkeldurr uses not only his strength but
also moves that depend on centrifugal force.
charaepi_ch0063_00_renbu_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0063_00_renbu/2301_1201_1600_:
In other words, Conkeldurr has both strength
and wisdom!
charaepi_ch0063_00_renbu_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0063_00_renbu/2301_1201_1700_:
This is more than just transforming sand and
rocks into concrete.
charaepi_ch0063_00_renbu_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0063_00_renbu/2301_1201_1800_:
It’s more than just strength or willpower.
It is something that is only possible through
the perfect mixture of wisdom and technique.
charaepi_ch0063_00_renbu_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0063_00_renbu/2301_1201_1900_:
Conkeldurr is the very embodiment of constant
pursuit of power!
charaepi_ch0063_00_renbu_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0063_00_renbu/2301_1201_2000_:
That is why I am convinced that I can 
achieve something if I stay with Conkeldurr.
charaepi_ch0063_00_renbu_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0063_00_renbu/2301_0401_2200_:
No!
While I appreciate the offer, you have your own
training that you should focus on.
charaepi_ch0063_00_renbu_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0063_00_renbu/2301_0302_2300_: Is there anything I can do to help?
charaepi_ch0063_00_renbu_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0063_00_renbu/2301_0402_2400_:
No!
While I appreciate the offer, you have your own
training that you should focus on.
charaepi_ch0063_00_renbu_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0063_00_renbu/2301_0301_2500_: I want to become stronger with you!
charaepi_ch0063_00_renbu_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0063_00_renbu/2301_0302_2700_: Then how about as a rival?
charaepi_ch0063_00_renbu_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0063_00_renbu/2301_1201_2900_:
None of us can become stronger on our own.
We need each other to compete with 
and to hone our skills against!
charaepi_ch0063_00_renbu_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0063_00_renbu/2301_1201_3000_:
My mentor, Alder, had many rivals who 
he fought against in his youth.
charaepi_ch0063_00_renbu_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0063_00_renbu/2301_1201_3100_:
However, for one to be my rival, they must be
either my equal or greater in strength than me.
charaepi_ch0063_00_renbu_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0063_00_renbu/2301_1201_3200_:
I have been searching for such a rival, and I
thought that I might find one here at the PML!
charaepi_ch0063_00_renbu_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0063_00_renbu/2301_1201_3300_:
Very well, [Name:PlayerNickname ]! 
I will acknowledge your desire to grow stronger!
charaepi_ch0063_00_renbu_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0063_00_renbu/2301_1201_3400_:
Well, then let us begin our training!
First, we practice our punches on
Conkeldurr’s concrete pillars!
charaepi_ch0063_00_renbu_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0063_00_renbu/2301_0402_3800_:
Where did your resolve go?
You can’t give up before you’ve tried!
charaepi_ch0063_00_renbu_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0063_00_renbu/2301_0401_4200_: Hm? Conkeldurr was surprised by your punch...?
charaepi_ch0063_00_renbu_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0063_00_renbu/2301_0402_4400_: Hm? Conkeldurr was surprised by your punch...?
charaepi_ch0063_00_renbu_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0063_00_renbu/2301_1201_4500_:
You’re going soft, Conkeldurr!
You shouldn’t be afraid of such an attack!
charaepi_ch0063_00_renbu_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0063_00_renbu/2301_1201_4700_:
However, I do understand.
Even I was taken aback at that fighting spirit.
charaepi_ch0063_00_renbu_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0063_00_renbu/2301_1201_4800_:
I was not mistaken in acknowledging you,
[Name:PlayerNickname ]. You truly are
a spirited Trainer!
charaepi_ch0063_00_renbu_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0063_00_renbu/2301_1201_4900_: Let’s make our way to the top, rival!
charaepi_ch0063_00_renbu_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0063_00_renbu/2301_1201_5000_:
You may even be able to shatter Conkeldurr’s
concrete one day!

charaepi_ch0092_00_iris_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0092_00_iris/2301_1101_0100_2:
While exploring the volcano one day,
[Name:PlayerNickname ] heard a strange,
metallic clanking sound.
charaepi_ch0092_00_iris_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0092_00_iris/2301_1101_0200_2:
Curious, [EN:Gen Ref='255' M='he' F='she' ] decided to move deeper 
into the volcano to investigate...
charaepi_ch0092_00_iris_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0092_00_iris/2301_1101_0500_2:
Suddenly, [EN:Gen Ref='255' M='he' F='she' ] was knocked to the ground as
a tiny but powerful body slammed into [EN:Gen Ref='255' M='him' F='her' ].
charaepi_ch0092_00_iris_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0092_00_iris/2301_1201_0600_1:
S-sorry! My fault!
Are you OK?!
charaepi_ch0092_00_iris_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0092_00_iris/2301_1201_0800_1:
I’ve been training with Haxorus here,
slicing up some bars of metal!
charaepi_ch0092_00_iris_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0092_00_iris/2301_1201_0900_1:
I was trying to warn you not to come
any closer since her claws are so sharp...
charaepi_ch0092_00_iris_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0092_00_iris/2301_0401_1100_1:
Yep! Sawyer gave them to us.
There were some extras lying around,
so he said we could use them for training!
charaepi_ch0092_00_iris_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0092_00_iris/2301_0402_1300_1:
Yep! Sawyer gave us some metal bars
to train with since there were a few
extras lying around!
charaepi_ch0092_00_iris_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0092_00_iris/2301_1201_1400_1:
He wants to help Haxorus and I get super strong
so that we can do well in the tournament.
charaepi_ch0092_00_iris_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0092_00_iris/2301_0401_1600_1:
Nope! Not at all! It actually feels even more fun
and exciting having you around!
charaepi_ch0092_00_iris_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0092_00_iris/2301_0402_1800_1:
Nope! No secrets here! It actually feels even more
fun and exciting having you around!
charaepi_ch0092_00_iris_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0092_00_iris/2301_1201_1900_1:
Haxorus fell in love with this new
training routine, so she’s been begging
me to come and do it every day.
charaepi_ch0092_00_iris_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0092_00_iris/2301_1201_2000_1:
It was starting to get a little boring for me—
until now, that is!
charaepi_ch0092_00_iris_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0092_00_iris/2301_1201_2100_1:
It’s OK if [Name:PlayerNickname ] stays for a
little while, right, Haxorus?
charaepi_ch0092_00_iris_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0092_00_iris/2301_1201_2200_1: Yep! She says it’s OK with her!
charaepi_ch0092_00_iris_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0092_00_iris/2301_0401_2400_1:
Of course! I don’t really know how, though.
I just do!
charaepi_ch0092_00_iris_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0092_00_iris/2301_0402_2600_1:
Yep! I don’t really know how I know that—
I just do!
charaepi_ch0092_00_iris_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0092_00_iris/2301_1201_2700_1:
Oh, people always call me “the girl who knows
the hearts of dragons,” but I don’t think that’s
got anything to do with it, really.
charaepi_ch0092_00_iris_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0092_00_iris/2301_1201_2800_1:
Don’t you feel like the more time you spend
with someone, the more you can sort of
sense what they’re feeling?
charaepi_ch0092_00_iris_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0092_00_iris/2301_1201_2900_1:
That’s normal, right? I don’t really get
why everybody thinks I’m so amazing.
charaepi_ch0092_00_iris_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0092_00_iris/2301_1201_3000_1:
It doesn’t even feel like they’re praising me, really,
since it’s all just common sense in my book.
charaepi_ch0092_00_iris_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0092_00_iris/2301_0401_3200_1:
Tee-hee! You understand me so well,
don’t you, [Name:PlayerNickname ]!
charaepi_ch0092_00_iris_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0092_00_iris/2301_0302_3300_1: I wouldn’t give it too much thought.
charaepi_ch0092_00_iris_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0092_00_iris/2301_0402_3400_1:
Tee-hee!
Don’t worry—it doesn’t really bother me.
charaepi_ch0092_00_iris_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0092_00_iris/2301_1201_3500_1:
I mean, the reason we keep coming back
here to train is because I can sense how
much Haxorus really wants to do it!
charaepi_ch0092_00_iris_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0092_00_iris/2301_1201_3600_1:
Hm? What was that, Haxorus?
You want to get back to your training now?
OK, OK, I’m coming!
charaepi_ch0092_00_iris_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0092_00_iris/2301_1201_3700_1:
Ready, Haxorus? Let’s do a thousand of your
special speedy slices on these metal bars!
charaepi_ch0092_00_iris_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0092_00_iris/2301_1201_3800_1:
What? You want me to wear a sygna suit 
so I can look super cool, too?
charaepi_ch0092_00_iris_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0092_00_iris/2301_1201_3900_1:
Haha! You sure are awfully demanding today,
aren’t you?
charaepi_ch0092_00_iris_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0092_00_iris/2301_1201_4000_1:
I’ve already got the clothes my grandpa
gave me...but I guess I’d wear a sygna suit
if somebody gave me one!

charaepi_ch0094_00_genji_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0094_00_genji/2301_1101_0100_:
The sound of a steam whistle echoed 
throughout the area.
charaepi_ch0094_00_genji_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0094_00_genji/2301_1101_0200_:
Drawn by it, [Name:PlayerNickname ] moved
toward the coast, where [EN:Gen Ref='255' M='he' F='she' ] found Drake and
Salamence gazing out at the ocean.
charaepi_ch0094_00_genji_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0094_00_genji/2301_1201_0300_:
If it isn’t [Name:PlayerNickname ]!
You must’ve heard the whistle blowing.
charaepi_ch0094_00_genji_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0094_00_genji/2301_1201_0400_: A ship left the port just now.
charaepi_ch0094_00_genji_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0094_00_genji/2301_1201_0500_: Look, over there. Pasio sure has some fine ships.
charaepi_ch0094_00_genji_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0094_00_genji/2301_1201_0600_:
They’re powerful enough to stay on the course
they’ve plotted even in stormy seas.
charaepi_ch0094_00_genji_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0094_00_genji/2301_1201_0700_:
Seeing them makes me wonder whether
I’ve been living strongly enough.
charaepi_ch0094_00_genji_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0094_00_genji/2301_0401_0900_: Just memories of my youthful foolishness.
charaepi_ch0094_00_genji_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0094_00_genji/2301_0402_1100_:
Maybe it’s because I’m getting on in years, but
I think about things a lot these days.
charaepi_ch0094_00_genji_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0094_00_genji/2301_1201_1200_:
A long time ago, my friend Briney and I
were trying to become the greatest sailors
in the world.
charaepi_ch0094_00_genji_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0094_00_genji/2301_1201_1300_:
We dreamed of mastering every sea route
there is.
charaepi_ch0094_00_genji_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0094_00_genji/2301_1201_1400_:
But then, one day, when I was out to sea,
my ship got caught in a storm.
charaepi_ch0094_00_genji_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0094_00_genji/2301_1201_1500_:
Somehow, I avoided sinking, but I was adrift for
days after that.
charaepi_ch0094_00_genji_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0094_00_genji/2301_1201_1600_:
I had used up the last of my food and water,
so I thought I was done for, but then a
Dragonite appeared in the sky.
charaepi_ch0094_00_genji_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0094_00_genji/2301_1201_1700_: That Dragonite led me all the way back to shore.
charaepi_ch0094_00_genji_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0094_00_genji/2301_0401_1900_:
Legend has it that Dragonite is a kind Pokémon
that leads people who are lost at sea back
to safety.
charaepi_ch0094_00_genji_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0094_00_genji/2301_0402_2100_:
Of course! Unconditional kindness is not exclusive
to people. Pokémon can show it, too.
charaepi_ch0094_00_genji_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0094_00_genji/2301_1201_2200_:
Having a different species show me that sort of
kindness impacted me deeply.
charaepi_ch0094_00_genji_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0094_00_genji/2301_1201_2300_:
I decided that if my life had been saved by a
Pokémon, I should use it to benefit Pokémon.
That’s when I decided to become a Trainer.
charaepi_ch0094_00_genji_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0094_00_genji/2301_1201_2400_:
I abandoned my friend and started 
down a different path. I apologized 
to Briney so many times.
charaepi_ch0094_00_genji_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0094_00_genji/2301_1201_2500_:
But he wasn’t even angry at me!
He sent me on my way with a smile.
charaepi_ch0094_00_genji_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0094_00_genji/2301_1201_2600_:
That’s why I want to be the greatest Trainer
of them all. It’s for my old friend Briney, too.
charaepi_ch0094_00_genji_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0094_00_genji/2301_1201_2700_:
Like a ship that stays the course through a storm,
no matter what difficulties I may encounter, I’ll
continue on the path that I’ve chosen.
charaepi_ch0094_00_genji_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0094_00_genji/2301_1201_2800_:
I come to the ocean to remind myself of what
I have resolved to do.
charaepi_ch0094_00_genji_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0094_00_genji/2301_1201_2900_:
And also to remember that Dragonite that saved
me so long ago, wherever it is now...
charaepi_ch0094_00_genji_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0094_00_genji/2301_1201_3000_:
Did you hear that cry?
It sounded just like Dragonite.
charaepi_ch0094_00_genji_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0094_00_genji/2301_1201_3100_:
How could it possibly be the same 
Dragonite here on Pasio, though?
charaepi_ch0094_00_genji_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0094_00_genji/2301_1201_3200_:
No time to think now! Salamence! Let’s fly
out and see! There’s something I need to
tell Dragonite!
charaepi_ch0094_00_genji_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0094_00_genji/2301_1201_3300_:
Salamence is a Pokémon that hoped and
wished it could fly for a long time until it finally
got its wings.
charaepi_ch0094_00_genji_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0094_00_genji/2301_1201_3400_:
Salamence is proof that you can reach your
goals if you keep believing in yourself.
charaepi_ch0094_00_genji_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0094_00_genji/2301_1201_3500_:
Now it’s my turn. I won’t let this chance get
away from me!

charaepi_ch0096_00_zumi_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0096_00_zumi/2301_1101_0100_2:
[Name:PlayerNickname ] met up with Siebold
to buy some ingredients for his recipe.
charaepi_ch0096_00_zumi_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0096_00_zumi/2301_1101_0200_2:
Once they’d collected everything on the list,
they decided to take a short break.
charaepi_ch0096_00_zumi_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0096_00_zumi/2301_1201_0300_1:
Thanks to you, I was able to gather
all of the ingredients I need in record time.
charaepi_ch0096_00_zumi_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0096_00_zumi/2301_1201_0400_1:
Soon, with the expert touch of my chef’s knife,
these fresh, crisp vegetables will be reborn!
charaepi_ch0096_00_zumi_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0096_00_zumi/2301_1201_0500_1:
Whether the ingredients shine beautifully
in the dish or end up ruining it
depends on the skill of the chef.
charaepi_ch0096_00_zumi_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0096_00_zumi/2301_1201_0600_1:
We chefs must carefully consider our
ingredients and take full responsibility 
for the outcome of each dish we create.
charaepi_ch0096_00_zumi_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0096_00_zumi/2301_1201_0700_1:
Ingredients and chefs,
Pokémon and Trainers...
charaepi_ch0096_00_zumi_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0096_00_zumi/2301_1201_0800_1:
The relationships between them are
quite similar in a lot of ways.
charaepi_ch0096_00_zumi_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0096_00_zumi/2301_1201_0900_1:
I think that’s why both of them 
appeal to me so much.
charaepi_ch0096_00_zumi_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0096_00_zumi/2301_1201_1000_1:
I hate to change the subject so abruptly,
but I have a question I’d like to ask you.
charaepi_ch0096_00_zumi_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0096_00_zumi/2301_1201_1100_1:
Do you believe that Pokémon have
limitless potential?
charaepi_ch0096_00_zumi_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0096_00_zumi/2301_0401_1400_1:
Many Pokémon live their lives very close
to our own, while others do not show
themselves in front of people at all.
charaepi_ch0096_00_zumi_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0096_00_zumi/2301_0401_1500_1:
Most of them are shrouded in mystery.
Therefore, we can’t possibly know how
limitless their potential truly is.
charaepi_ch0096_00_zumi_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0096_00_zumi/2301_0401_1600_1:
To draw out the hidden potential in our
Pokémon—to create a future full of possibility—
is the greatest mission of all for us Trainers.
charaepi_ch0096_00_zumi_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0096_00_zumi/2301_0402_1900_1:
How can you place a limit on your
Pokémon’s potential and still call
yourself a Pokémon Trainer?!
charaepi_ch0096_00_zumi_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0096_00_zumi/2301_0402_2000_1:
A Trainer and their Pokémon play 
vital roles in each other’s future.
charaepi_ch0096_00_zumi_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0096_00_zumi/2301_0402_2100_1:
They go through their lives together.
They hurt together and they help together.
They must continue to survive together.
charaepi_ch0096_00_zumi_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0096_00_zumi/2301_0402_2200_1:
If Trainers can’t believe in their Pokémon or
would try to limit their Pokémon’s potential,
maybe the world is better off without them!
charaepi_ch0096_00_zumi_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0096_00_zumi/2301_0402_2300_1:
Oh dear, I must apologize...
I got a bit too carried away.
charaepi_ch0096_00_zumi_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0096_00_zumi/2301_1201_2400_1:
Personally, I do believe that Pokémon have
limitless potential hidden deep within them.
charaepi_ch0096_00_zumi_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0096_00_zumi/2301_1201_2500_1:
The PML is like a great, brilliant stage
where we can witness that potential
with our own two eyes.
charaepi_ch0096_00_zumi_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0096_00_zumi/2301_1201_2600_1:
Nothing makes me happier than
watching a Pokémon battle...
charaepi_ch0096_00_zumi_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0096_00_zumi/2301_1201_2700_1:
and witnessing firsthand the incredible
potential that Trainers are able to
draw out of their Pokémon.
charaepi_ch0096_00_zumi_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0096_00_zumi/2301_0301_2800_1: Then let’s do our absolute best!
charaepi_ch0096_00_zumi_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0096_00_zumi/2301_0401_3000_1:
Trainers can help draw out the potential
in their fellow Trainers as well, you know!
charaepi_ch0096_00_zumi_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0096_00_zumi/2301_0402_3200_1:
Pardon me?
Have you been listening to what
I’ve been saying at all?!
charaepi_ch0096_00_zumi_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0096_00_zumi/2301_0402_3300_1:
You, young [EN:Gen Ref='255' M='sir' F='miss' ], are ill qualified to be
a Trainer! What do you expect to achieve
at the PML if you can’t even comprehend that?
charaepi_ch0096_00_zumi_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0096_00_zumi/2301_0402_3400_1:
Oh dear, I do apologize...
I get so caught up in my own enthusiasm.
charaepi_ch0096_00_zumi_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0096_00_zumi/2301_1201_3500_1:
Just as I do with the recipes I create,
I have endeavored to draw out my
Clawitzer’s maximum potential...
charaepi_ch0096_00_zumi_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0096_00_zumi/2301_1201_3600_1:
and with me doing so, Clawitzer has also helped
me draw out my own potential as a Trainer.
charaepi_ch0096_00_zumi_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0096_00_zumi/2301_1201_3700_1:
And just as certain ingredients and spices
serve to heighten the flavor of others
in a recipe...
charaepi_ch0096_00_zumi_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0096_00_zumi/2301_1201_3800_1:
so, too, do Pokémon and their Trainers.
We are better together. I’ve witnessed it
in others and experienced it firsthand.
charaepi_ch0096_00_zumi_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0096_00_zumi/2301_0401_4000_1:
Yes, indeed! But what it all boils down to
in the end is...I want nothing more than to
truly connect with my Pokémon. That’s it.
charaepi_ch0096_00_zumi_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0096_00_zumi/2301_0402_4200_1:
Yes, indeed! But what it all boils down to
in the end is...I want nothing more than to
truly connect with my Pokémon. That’s it.
charaepi_ch0096_00_zumi_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0096_00_zumi/2301_1201_4300_1:
Well now! All of this talking has
made me work up quite an appetite.
charaepi_ch0096_00_zumi_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0096_00_zumi/2301_1201_4400_1:
We’ve already purchased all of the necessary
ingredients. I think it’s time we turned them
into something shockingly delicious!
charaepi_ch0096_00_zumi_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0096_00_zumi/2301_1201_4500_1:
Feast your eyes as Chef Siebold draws out
the limitless potential of the ingredients
he’s chosen for this dish...

charaepi_ch0097_00_mai_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0097_00_mai/2301_1101_0100_20:
[Name:PlayerNickname ] noticed the light of 
a swaying flame deep in the forest.
charaepi_ch0097_00_mai_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0097_00_mai/2301_1101_0200_20: Curious, [EN:Gen Ref='255' M='he' F='she' ] snuck deeper into the forest.
charaepi_ch0097_00_mai_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0097_00_mai/2301_1201_0400_10: Do you want me for something?
charaepi_ch0097_00_mai_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0097_00_mai/2301_0401_0600_10: I didn’t think anybody would be out here.
charaepi_ch0097_00_mai_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0097_00_mai/2301_0302_0700_10: What are you doing out here?
charaepi_ch0097_00_mai_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0097_00_mai/2301_0402_0800_10: I was talking with my partner Pokémon.
charaepi_ch0097_00_mai_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0097_00_mai/2301_1201_0900_10: I just wanted some time alone with Arcanine.
charaepi_ch0097_00_mai_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0097_00_mai/2301_1201_1000_10:
It’s noisy outside of the forest...
We can’t talk if it’s noisy.
charaepi_ch0097_00_mai_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0097_00_mai/2301_0401_1700_10: I mean...thank you for being considerate...
charaepi_ch0097_00_mai_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0097_00_mai/2301_0402_1900_10: I mean...thank you for being considerate...
charaepi_ch0097_00_mai_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0097_00_mai/2301_1201_2000_10: I try not to apologize too much.
charaepi_ch0097_00_mai_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0097_00_mai/2301_1201_2100_10:
You feel better being thanked than being
apologized to, right?
charaepi_ch0097_00_mai_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0097_00_mai/2301_1201_2200_10: Do you...understand what I’m trying to say?
charaepi_ch0097_00_mai_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0097_00_mai/2301_1201_2700_10:
I’m...very scared of conveying my feelings
in words...
charaepi_ch0097_00_mai_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0097_00_mai/2301_1201_2800_10: Even if I don’t mean to, I end up hurting people.
charaepi_ch0097_00_mai_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0097_00_mai/2301_1201_2900_10:
But I have so many things 
that I want to tell them.
charaepi_ch0097_00_mai_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0097_00_mai/2301_1201_3000_10:
That’s why I want to take as much time as I can
to talk with Arcanine.
charaepi_ch0097_00_mai_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0097_00_mai/2301_1201_3200_10: I can’t... The words don’t come out.
charaepi_ch0097_00_mai_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0097_00_mai/2301_0401_3400_10: This is still too fast for me.
charaepi_ch0097_00_mai_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0097_00_mai/2301_0302_3500_10: You don’t have to push yourself!
charaepi_ch0097_00_mai_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0097_00_mai/2301_0402_3600_10: This is still too fast for me.
charaepi_ch0097_00_mai_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0097_00_mai/2301_1201_3700_10: I’m not confident that I can communicate well.
charaepi_ch0097_00_mai_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0097_00_mai/2301_1201_3900_10: I know what I have to do in these situations.
charaepi_ch0097_00_mai_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0097_00_mai/2301_1201_4100_10:
that all you need to do is say thank you and
give a flower to somebody you love.
charaepi_ch0097_00_mai_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0097_00_mai/2301_1201_4200_10: She told me that would be enough.
charaepi_ch0097_00_mai_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0097_00_mai/2301_1201_4300_10:
I was thinking of going to find some flowers,
but what do you think?
charaepi_ch0097_00_mai_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0097_00_mai/2301_1201_4400_10:
Am I expressing myself all right?
*giggle* I’m glad.
charaepi_ch0097_00_mai_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0097_00_mai/2301_1201_4500_10:
I really appreciate you following me.
Thank you.
charaepi_ch0097_00_mai_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0097_00_mai/2301_1201_4600_10:
One of these days, I’ll make sure to
thank you properly.
charaepi_ch0097_00_mai_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0097_00_mai/2301_1201_4700_10:
I love you, Arcanine.
Please stay with me always.

charaepi_ch0098_00_hau_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0098_00_hau/2301_1101_0100_20:
[Name:PlayerNickname ] spotted Hau walking
into the mountains.
charaepi_ch0098_00_hau_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0098_00_hau/2301_1101_0200_20:
Concerned about Raichu’s cries, 
[EN:Gen Ref='255' M='he' F='she' ] decided to follow Hau into the mountains.
charaepi_ch0098_00_hau_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0098_00_hau/2301_1201_0300_10:
Wait, is that... It’s [Name:PlayerNickname ]!
Were you following me?
charaepi_ch0098_00_hau_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0098_00_hau/2301_0401_0600_10:
I mean, it wasn’t like it was a secret,
so you should have called out to me.
charaepi_ch0098_00_hau_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0098_00_hau/2301_0402_0800_10:
Aw, you don’t have to hide it!
I mean, it’s not really a secret that I’m here!
charaepi_ch0098_00_hau_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0098_00_hau/2301_1201_0900_10: I actually came here to train.
charaepi_ch0098_00_hau_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0098_00_hau/2301_1201_1000_10:
I don’t know quite how it happened,
but somehow I ended up here on Pasio.
charaepi_ch0098_00_hau_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0098_00_hau/2301_1201_1100_10:
As long as I’m here, though,
I want to get stronger.
charaepi_ch0098_00_hau_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0098_00_hau/2301_0402_1500_10: There’s somebody I want to beat.
charaepi_ch0098_00_hau_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0098_00_hau/2301_1201_1600_10:
My rival always comes at me and doesn’t hold
anything back. Kinda like you!
charaepi_ch0098_00_hau_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0098_00_hau/2301_1201_1700_10:
But I’ve never won a match, so I can’t help 
but feel frustrated—and a little sad.
charaepi_ch0098_00_hau_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0098_00_hau/2301_1201_1800_10:
That’s why I’m going to go meet 
a really strong Trainer up ahead!
charaepi_ch0098_00_hau_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0098_00_hau/2301_1201_1900_10:
All right, let’s go, Raichu! I hear 
this Trainer is super strong, but I’m sure 
the two of us can handle it!
charaepi_ch0098_00_hau_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0098_00_hau/2301_1201_2000_10: Huh? Are you not feeling up to this?
charaepi_ch0098_00_hau_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0098_00_hau/2301_1201_2100_10:
Maybe our sync strength isn’t as high as I thought.
But we’ve surfed so much...
charaepi_ch0098_00_hau_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0098_00_hau/2301_0302_2400_10: Maybe he’s not comfortable with it.
charaepi_ch0098_00_hau_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0098_00_hau/2301_0402_2500_10:
Oh, I see!
You might be right, [Name:PlayerNickname ]!
charaepi_ch0098_00_hau_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0098_00_hau/2301_1201_2600_10: Sorry, Raichu. I forgot our promise today!
charaepi_ch0098_00_hau_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0098_00_hau/2301_1201_2700_10:
We were supposed to go exploring the town
today, weren’t we? I’m so sorry, Raichu.
Come on—don’t be angry!
charaepi_ch0098_00_hau_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0098_00_hau/2301_1201_2800_10: Hm? What is that smell? It smells really good.
charaepi_ch0098_00_hau_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0098_00_hau/2301_1201_2900_10:
I must have accidentally touched
Raichu’s cheeks...
charaepi_ch0098_00_hau_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0098_00_hau/2301_0401_3100_10: If you ever touch an Alolan Raichu’s cheeks...
charaepi_ch0098_00_hau_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0098_00_hau/2301_0401_3200_10: the smell of pancakes comes wafting out.
charaepi_ch0098_00_hau_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0098_00_hau/2301_0402_3400_10: If you ever touch an Alolan Raichu’s cheeks...
charaepi_ch0098_00_hau_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0098_00_hau/2301_0402_3500_10: the smell of pancakes comes wafting out.
charaepi_ch0098_00_hau_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0098_00_hau/2301_1201_3700_10:
In fact, nobody really knows why Raichu look the
way they do in Alola.
charaepi_ch0098_00_hau_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0098_00_hau/2301_1201_3800_10:
There are people that say that it’s because
they ate too many pancakes, but I think it’s
the opposite.
charaepi_ch0098_00_hau_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0098_00_hau/2301_0401_4000_10:
Pancakes in Alola make you hungry with just
their smell.
charaepi_ch0098_00_hau_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0098_00_hau/2301_0402_4200_10:
Pancakes in Alola make you hungry with just
their smell.
charaepi_ch0098_00_hau_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0098_00_hau/2301_1201_4300_10:
So I think Raichu learned to ride on their tails so
they could go find and eat pancakes more easily.
charaepi_ch0098_00_hau_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0098_00_hau/2301_1201_4500_10:
I guess he’s just hungry.
He doesn’t care for theories right now.
charaepi_ch0098_00_hau_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0098_00_hau/2301_1201_4600_10:
All right, forget training for today!
Let’s all go get some pancakes!
charaepi_ch0098_00_hau_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0098_00_hau/2301_1201_4700_10:
Come with us, [Name:PlayerNickname ]!
And once we’re done eating...
charaepi_ch0098_00_hau_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0098_00_hau/2301_1201_4800_10: I’d like you to come train with us!
charaepi_ch0098_00_hau_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0098_00_hau/2301_1201_4900_10:
I think you’re a lot stronger of 
an opponent than other Trainers!

charaepi_ch0099_00_jun_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0099_00_jun/2301_1101_0100_20:
[Name:PlayerNickname ] had come to town 
to do some shopping.
charaepi_ch0099_00_jun_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0099_00_jun/2301_1101_0200_20:
[EN:Gen Ref='255' M='He' F='She' ] turned the corner onto a big street to get 
to the shop [EN:Gen Ref='255' M='he' F='she' ] was heading for.
charaepi_ch0099_00_jun_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0099_00_jun/2301_1201_0400_10:
Oh, [Name:PlayerNickname ]!
Don’t jump out at people like that!
charaepi_ch0099_00_jun_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0099_00_jun/2301_1201_0500_10: You bumped into me, so I’m fining you a million!
charaepi_ch0099_00_jun_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0099_00_jun/2301_0401_0700_10: Really?! Hey, I’m serious about this!
charaepi_ch0099_00_jun_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0099_00_jun/2301_0402_0900_10:
What’s that all about?!
You can’t just refuse like that!
charaepi_ch0099_00_jun_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0099_00_jun/2301_1201_1000_10:
You’re the one who bumped into me, so
of course you have to pay a fine...right?
charaepi_ch0099_00_jun_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0099_00_jun/2301_1201_1100_10:
You know, I kind of get the feeling that maybe 
it was I who bumped into you. Hmmm...
charaepi_ch0099_00_jun_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0099_00_jun/2301_1201_1200_10:
I guess it can’t be helped! No fine 
for you this time! I mean, that’s how 
it always ends up, anyway.
charaepi_ch0099_00_jun_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0099_00_jun/2301_1201_1300_10:
I’m so disappointed. I finally had a chance to get
you to pay me a fine.
charaepi_ch0099_00_jun_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0099_00_jun/2301_1201_1400_10: I’ll never reach my goal at this rate.
charaepi_ch0099_00_jun_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0099_00_jun/2301_0401_1600_10: Hehehe! Don’t act too shocked when I tell you!
charaepi_ch0099_00_jun_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0099_00_jun/2301_0302_1700_10: There’s a purpose to your fines?
charaepi_ch0099_00_jun_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0099_00_jun/2301_1201_1900_10:
My goal is to use the fines I collect to build my
own Battle Tower!
charaepi_ch0099_00_jun_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0099_00_jun/2301_1201_2000_10:
The Battle Tower is a place to have Pokémon
battles. My daddy—
charaepi_ch0099_00_jun_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0099_00_jun/2301_1201_2100_10:
I mean, my DAD faces off against challengers
who climb the Battle Tower.
charaepi_ch0099_00_jun_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0099_00_jun/2301_1201_2200_10:
I’ve made many attempts myself, but it always
ended in defeat for me.
charaepi_ch0099_00_jun_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0099_00_jun/2301_1201_2300_10:
But someday, I’ll make my dad take on the
Battle Tower that I build!
charaepi_ch0099_00_jun_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0099_00_jun/2301_1201_2400_10:
And I will definitely beat him!
That’s one of my dreams!
charaepi_ch0099_00_jun_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0099_00_jun/2301_0401_2600_10:
Right? You’ve gotta dream big if you wanna
have fun!
charaepi_ch0099_00_jun_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0099_00_jun/2301_0401_2700_10: That’s not my only dream, though.
charaepi_ch0099_00_jun_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0099_00_jun/2301_0402_2900_10: Yup, and this next one’s a doozy of a dream!
charaepi_ch0099_00_jun_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0099_00_jun/2301_1201_3100_10:
My master, Mr. Wake—pro wrestler Crasher
Wake—doesn’t acknowledge my skills at all!
charaepi_ch0099_00_jun_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0099_00_jun/2301_1201_3200_10: I’ve devised a special plan just for him!
charaepi_ch0099_00_jun_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0099_00_jun/2301_1201_3300_10:
Mr. Wake’s Floatzel and my Piplup are both
Pokémon that use Water-type moves.
charaepi_ch0099_00_jun_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0099_00_jun/2301_1201_3400_10:
I’m going to make my Piplup learn more
awesome moves than his Floatzel to surprise him!
charaepi_ch0099_00_jun_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0099_00_jun/2301_0401_3600_10:
It’s good to have dreams, but when 
you have too many, you might not be able
to make any of them come true.
charaepi_ch0099_00_jun_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0099_00_jun/2301_0402_3800_10:
It’s good to have dreams, but when 
you have too many, you might not be able
to make any of them come true.
charaepi_ch0099_00_jun_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0099_00_jun/2301_1201_3900_10: Which one do you think I should go for first?
charaepi_ch0099_00_jun_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0099_00_jun/2301_1201_4000_10:
You have to decide right now!
Ready? Three, two, one...
charaepi_ch0099_00_jun_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0099_00_jun/2301_1201_4100_10:
Oh, never mind! This is exactly the kind of
thing that I need to take the time to think
about for myself.
charaepi_ch0099_00_jun_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0099_00_jun/2301_1201_4200_10: Hehehe! I told you my dreams.
charaepi_ch0099_00_jun_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0099_00_jun/2301_1201_4300_10: So you have to tell me yours!
charaepi_ch0099_00_jun_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0099_00_jun/2301_1201_4400_10: If you don’t tell, I’m fining you!
charaepi_ch0099_00_jun_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0099_00_jun/2311_1201_0100_10: Excuse me, young lady! Come battle my Piplup!
charaepi_ch0099_00_jun_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0099_00_jun/2311_1201_0200_10: Who, me? Of course. I’ll be your opponent.
charaepi_ch0099_00_jun_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0099_00_jun/2311_1201_0300_10:
Hehe! All right! My Piplup is raring to go!
Time for a Pokémon battle!
charaepi_ch0099_00_jun_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0099_00_jun/2311_0101_0100_10:
I’m not sure how well I’ll battle,
but I’ll give my absolute best!
charaepi_ch0099_00_jun_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0099_00_jun/2311_0501_0100_10:
What a strong Piplup you have! I couldn’t help
myself from being impressed.
charaepi_ch0099_00_jun_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0099_00_jun/2311_0501_0200_10:
Right?! I knew it!
My synergy with Piplup is perfect!
charaepi_ch0099_00_jun_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0099_00_jun/2311_0501_0300_10:
Huh? What’s happening to Piplup?
Could this be Evolution?
charaepi_ch0099_00_jun_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0099_00_jun/2311_0501_0400_10:
Piplup, are you evolving?!
I told you he was raring to go!
charaepi_ch0099_00_jun_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0099_00_jun/2311_0501_0500_10:
All right! We’re going to get stronger and
stronger until we’re the strongest Pokémon
and Trainer in the world!
charaepi_ch0099_00_jun_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0099_00_jun/2312_1201_0100_10:
I’m still not saying you can be my apprentice,
but you’re certainly growing! 
I’ve had my eye on you.
charaepi_ch0099_00_jun_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0099_00_jun/2312_1201_0200_10:
Thanks for watching, Master! Ooh, my master
finally acknowledged my skills!
charaepi_ch0099_00_jun_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0099_00_jun/2312_1201_0300_10:
I just said I’m not your master! You’re still far
too soft to be my apprentice! You can still
get stronger!
charaepi_ch0099_00_jun_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0099_00_jun/2312_0101_0100_10:
First, you have to show me your skills.
Then we can talk!
charaepi_ch0099_00_jun_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0099_00_jun/2312_0501_0100_10:
Barry and Prinplup, you gave me a good 
match! You look happy about it, don’t you?
charaepi_ch0099_00_jun_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0099_00_jun/2312_0501_0200_10:
Master...I’m so moved! I can really feel that
Prinplup and I have gotten stronger.
charaepi_ch0099_00_jun_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0099_00_jun/2312_0501_0300_10:
The way you battled, I almost thought you were
your father!
charaepi_ch0099_00_jun_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0099_00_jun/2312_0501_0400_10:
We did it, Prinplup! It’s all thanks to
y— Wait, what’s happening?!
charaepi_ch0099_00_jun_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0099_00_jun/2312_0501_0500_10:
What’s that all about?! If you’re going to evolve,
at least say something!

charaepi_ch0101_00_mei_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0101_00_mei/2301_1101_0100_20:
[Name:PlayerNickname ] entered a clearing
in the forest and heard Rosa’s voice nearby.
charaepi_ch0101_00_mei_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0101_00_mei/2301_1201_0200_10: “All right! I’ll show you how it’s done!”
charaepi_ch0101_00_mei_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0101_00_mei/2301_1201_0300_10:
“Why? ’Cause I’m the most powerful Trainer
in the world! That’s why!”
charaepi_ch0101_00_mei_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0101_00_mei/2301_0401_0500_10:
Oh! Hi, [Name:PlayerNickname ]!
Was my imitation pretty close? Tee-hee!
charaepi_ch0101_00_mei_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0101_00_mei/2301_0401_0600_10:
You guessed correctly! I was trying
to do Blue’s voice.
charaepi_ch0101_00_mei_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0101_00_mei/2301_0402_0800_10:
Oh! Hi, [Name:PlayerNickname ]!
Tee-hee! Guess I’ve been discovered.
charaepi_ch0101_00_mei_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0101_00_mei/2301_0402_0900_10:
I was trying to imitate Blue’s voice,
but it’s pretty hard!
charaepi_ch0101_00_mei_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0101_00_mei/2301_1201_1000_10:
See, Snivy and I have been practicing
our acting skills!
charaepi_ch0101_00_mei_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0101_00_mei/2301_1201_1100_10:
Not many people know this, but I actually
did some movie acting for a little while
back in the Unova region.
charaepi_ch0101_00_mei_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0101_00_mei/2301_1201_1600_10:
In Unova, there’s this awesome place called
Pokéstar Studios where movies are made.
charaepi_ch0101_00_mei_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0101_00_mei/2301_1201_1700_10:
And Snivy and I acted together in
some of the movies produced there.
charaepi_ch0101_00_mei_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0101_00_mei/2301_1201_2200_10: If you ever visit the Unova region...
charaepi_ch0101_00_mei_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0101_00_mei/2301_1201_2300_10: I’ll definitely give you a tour!
charaepi_ch0101_00_mei_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0101_00_mei/2301_1201_2400_10:
Anyway, Snivy and I have been keeping
on top of our acting skills so that we can
star in another movie someday.
charaepi_ch0101_00_mei_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0101_00_mei/2301_1201_2600_10:
When you break it all down, acting is
a lot like imitating other people.
You just do whatever they would do!
charaepi_ch0101_00_mei_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0101_00_mei/2301_1201_2700_10:
In other words, if I try to act just like
the Trainers I battle against...
charaepi_ch0101_00_mei_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0101_00_mei/2301_1201_2800_10:
or just imitate lots of other Trainers
in general...
charaepi_ch0101_00_mei_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0101_00_mei/2301_1201_2900_10:
maybe I can learn to do all sorts of
new things, too! Just like them!
The possibilities are endless!
charaepi_ch0101_00_mei_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0101_00_mei/2301_1201_3000_10:
After all, if you want to act like someone else,
you have to put yourself in their shoes.
You learn how they think and how they battle.
charaepi_ch0101_00_mei_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0101_00_mei/2301_0401_3200_10:
Yeah! We could try it out together
if you want, [Name:PlayerNickname ].
charaepi_ch0101_00_mei_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0101_00_mei/2301_0402_3400_10:
Yeah! We could try it out together
if you want, [Name:PlayerNickname ].
charaepi_ch0101_00_mei_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0101_00_mei/2301_1201_3500_10:
It’s OK if you’ve never acted before!
Snivy will be keeping an eye on you!
charaepi_ch0101_00_mei_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0101_00_mei/2301_0401_3700_10:
Snivy’s got a great eye! She can tell
if you’re totally in character or not.
charaepi_ch0101_00_mei_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0101_00_mei/2301_0402_3900_10:
Snivy’s got a great eye! She can tell
if you’re totally in character or not.
charaepi_ch0101_00_mei_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0101_00_mei/2301_1201_4000_10:
See, your aura kinda changes when you
take on a role and you really
embody that character.
charaepi_ch0101_00_mei_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0101_00_mei/2301_1201_4100_10:
And little Snivy here is ultra sensitive
to that sort of thing!
charaepi_ch0101_00_mei_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0101_00_mei/2301_1201_4200_10:
I think it’s, like...one of those things that
only a Pokémon can truly sense, you know?
charaepi_ch0101_00_mei_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0101_00_mei/2301_1201_4300_10:
Snivy’s always on the lookout—even during
Pokémon battles! She watches her opponents
really carefully.
charaepi_ch0101_00_mei_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0101_00_mei/2301_0401_4500_10: I know, right?! I think so, too!
