charaepi_ch0101_00_mei_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0101_00_mei/2301_0402_4700_10: I know, right?! I think so, too!
charaepi_ch0101_00_mei_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0101_00_mei/2301_1201_4800_10: The next time we battle against you...
charaepi_ch0101_00_mei_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0101_00_mei/2301_1201_4900_10:
Snivy and I will have to study the way you
do things, too, [Name:PlayerNickname ]!
So that we can imitate you someday!
charaepi_ch0101_00_mei_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0101_00_mei/2301_1201_5000_10:
I’ll always be me in the end, though!
That’s never gonna change!
charaepi_ch0101_00_mei_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0101_00_mei/2301_1201_5100_10:
I’ll study a bunch of Trainers and learn
what I can from imitating them, but I’m
not just gonna copy whatever they do.
charaepi_ch0101_00_mei_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0101_00_mei/2301_1201_5200_10:
I’m gonna take all that new knowledge
and experience and use it to flavor
my OWN battle style! And I’m gonna win!
charaepi_ch0101_00_mei_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0101_00_mei/2311_1201_0100_10:
Mwahaha! ’Tis I, Brycen-Man!
I have waited an eternity for this
day to come, Snivy-Girl!
charaepi_ch0101_00_mei_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0101_00_mei/2311_1201_0200_10:
Huh?! Who are you?!
Wait, is that you, Brycen?
charaepi_ch0101_00_mei_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0101_00_mei/2311_1201_0300_10:
Hm? You wish to do some intensive training
with your Snivy? Well then, I shall oblige!
Prepare to be defeated!
charaepi_ch0101_00_mei_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0101_00_mei/2311_1201_0400_10:
Wh-what’s going on?!
It’s like you’ve totally become the
character you play in the movies!
charaepi_ch0101_00_mei_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0101_00_mei/2311_0101_0100_10:
I knew this day would come!
I procured this Zoroark for that very purpose!
charaepi_ch0101_00_mei_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0101_00_mei/2311_0501_0100_10:
How? How did you manage to brush aside ME,
Brycen-Man, and my mighty Zoroark so easily?
I underestimated you, Snivy-Girl...
charaepi_ch0101_00_mei_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0101_00_mei/2311_0501_0200_10:
Brycen, you don’t have to keep up the act
anymore! You came here to battle for Snivy
and my sake, didn’t you?
charaepi_ch0101_00_mei_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0101_00_mei/2311_0501_0300_10:
I...I have no idea what you’re talking about!
F-farewell, Snivy-Girl!
charaepi_ch0101_00_mei_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0101_00_mei/2311_0501_0400_10:
Whoa! Snivy, are you about to evolve?!
I just felt this sudden rush of power!
charaepi_ch0101_00_mei_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0101_00_mei/2311_0501_0500_10:
This is amazing! Promise me we’ll always
be together, even after you evolve!
charaepi_ch0101_00_mei_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0101_00_mei/2312_1201_0100_10:
Rosa, I’m confident your Servine still has
plenty of room to grow. So come on!
Let’s battle it out and see what he can do!
charaepi_ch0101_00_mei_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0101_00_mei/2312_1201_0200_10:
Yes! Of course I’ll battle you!
You and Onix are as strong as rocks, 
though, so we’ll give it our best shot!
charaepi_ch0101_00_mei_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0101_00_mei/2312_1201_0300_10:
I’ve been wanting to fight in an all-out
one-on-one battle with you for a long time!
Come on—let’s do this!
charaepi_ch0101_00_mei_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0101_00_mei/2312_0101_0100_10:
Just see if you can get past the impenetrable
wall of my rock-solid willpower and my
Onix’s rock-hard armor!
charaepi_ch0101_00_mei_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0101_00_mei/2312_0101_0200_10:
Don’t hold back! Come at me with
everything you’ve got!
charaepi_ch0101_00_mei_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0101_00_mei/2312_0501_0100_10:
Man! Your power smashed right through
our rock-solid defense!
charaepi_ch0101_00_mei_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0101_00_mei/2312_0501_0200_10:
Thanks! I had so much fun battling
against you and Onix!
charaepi_ch0101_00_mei_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0101_00_mei/2312_0501_0300_10:
It was fun for us, too.
We should do this again sometime.
charaepi_ch0101_00_mei_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0101_00_mei/2312_0501_0400_10:
We did it, Servine! Brock was right—
I think you’re gonna continue to get
even stronger!
charaepi_ch0101_00_mei_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0101_00_mei/2312_0501_0500_10:
Whoa! Hold on. Are you evolving?!
This is amazing! Promise me we’ll always
be together, even after you evolve!

charaepi_ch0110_00_kasumi_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0110_00_kasumi/2301_1101_0100:
One day, [Name:PlayerNickname ] was taking
a stroll with [EN:Gen Ref='255' M='his' F='her' ] Pokémon along the beach when
[EN:Gen Ref='255' M='he' F='she' ] came upon a peculiar sync pair.
charaepi_ch0110_00_kasumi_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0110_00_kasumi/2301_1101_0200:
The two of them appeared to be roping off 
an area of the beach for themselves...
charaepi_ch0110_00_kasumi_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0110_00_kasumi/2301_1201_0300:
Hey, you! Stop right there!
This is MY beach! Go away!
charaepi_ch0110_00_kasumi_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0110_00_kasumi/2301_1201_0400: Uhh... Was I not clear the first time?
charaepi_ch0110_00_kasumi_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0110_00_kasumi/2301_1201_0500:
The sand here is super soft.
It doesn’t hurt at all when you fall down on it.
charaepi_ch0110_00_kasumi_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0110_00_kasumi/2301_1201_0600:
So I’m turning this area into a training ground 
for me and my Tepig! Right now! Got it?
We’re claiming this sand!
charaepi_ch0110_00_kasumi_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0110_00_kasumi/2301_1201_0900: Hey! What do you think you’re doing over there?
charaepi_ch0110_00_kasumi_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0110_00_kasumi/2301_1201_1000:
Leave [Name:PlayerNickname ] alone!
If you want a battle, you can battle with me!
charaepi_ch0110_00_kasumi_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0110_00_kasumi/2301_1201_1100:
Hmph... A Starmie?
That wouldn’t be good for my Tepig...
charaepi_ch0110_00_kasumi_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0110_00_kasumi/2301_1201_1200:
Ugh. Fine, whatever! I guess you can have
this spot, then! Go on, take it! It’s yours!
charaepi_ch0110_00_kasumi_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0110_00_kasumi/2301_1201_1300:
Phew... I think she’s gone. I can’t believe she
picked a fight with you like that!
charaepi_ch0110_00_kasumi_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0110_00_kasumi/2301_0401_1600:
I’m glad nothing bad happened. 
But even if it did, I’m sure you could 
have taken them down in a pinch.
charaepi_ch0110_00_kasumi_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0110_00_kasumi/2301_0302_1700: Yeah. I’ll take care of the next one!
charaepi_ch0110_00_kasumi_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0110_00_kasumi/2301_0402_1800:
All right! You probably could have 
wiped the floor with that sync pair just now, 
even if I hadn’t shown up.
charaepi_ch0110_00_kasumi_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0110_00_kasumi/2301_1201_1900:
I kinda wish she would’ve stuck around a
little longer! I would’ve liked to chase her off
with a Pokémon battle.
charaepi_ch0110_00_kasumi_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0110_00_kasumi/2301_1201_2000:
See, the Starmie I have here is actually different
from the one I used to battle with at my Gym.
charaepi_ch0110_00_kasumi_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0110_00_kasumi/2301_1201_2100:
I left that Starmie at a Pokémon Day Care for
a little while, and the Pokémon Breeders found
an Egg! That’s where this Starmie hatched from.
charaepi_ch0110_00_kasumi_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0110_00_kasumi/2301_1201_2200:
It’s not very experienced yet, 
so I want to let it battle as much as I can.
charaepi_ch0110_00_kasumi_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0110_00_kasumi/2301_1201_2300:
It’s definitely making progress, though!
The poor thing had a lot of trouble before it
evolved, back when it was a Staryu...
charaepi_ch0110_00_kasumi_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0110_00_kasumi/2301_0401_2500:
Where do I begin? Sometimes it would fire its
Bubble Beam at the ground, and the recoil would
send it flying backwards...
charaepi_ch0110_00_kasumi_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0110_00_kasumi/2301_0401_2600:
Or it would try to tackle its opponents with a
big jump, only to end up wedged into the sand
because it overestimated the distance...
charaepi_ch0110_00_kasumi_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0110_00_kasumi/2301_0302_2700: Is it a lot stronger now?
charaepi_ch0110_00_kasumi_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0110_00_kasumi/2301_0402_2800:
It’s getting there, little by little! We still work
really hard with our day-to-day training.
charaepi_ch0110_00_kasumi_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0110_00_kasumi/2301_0402_2900: I’m always surprised by how peppy this Starmie is!
charaepi_ch0110_00_kasumi_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0110_00_kasumi/2301_0402_3000:
It never gets discouraged, even when we’re 
doing really intense training drills. It’s amazing!
charaepi_ch0110_00_kasumi_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0110_00_kasumi/2301_1201_3100:
In any case, I want to do my best to make sure
my special pal here grows up nice and strong!
charaepi_ch0110_00_kasumi_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0110_00_kasumi/2301_1201_3200:
I feel like I owe it to my old buddy Starmie
for sticking with me through all those battles
back at the Gym.
charaepi_ch0110_00_kasumi_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0110_00_kasumi/2301_1201_3300:
By the way, if you ever need our help with
anything, don’t hesitate to ask, OK?
charaepi_ch0110_00_kasumi_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0110_00_kasumi/2301_1201_3400:
It’s all great training for Starmie in the end! And 
helping people and Pokémon is super important!
charaepi_ch0110_00_kasumi_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0110_00_kasumi/2301_1201_3500:
Helping you would make me really happy!
I love supporting younger Trainers like you
almost as much as I love raising up Pokémon!
charaepi_ch0110_00_kasumi_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0110_00_kasumi/2301_1201_3600:
Either way, Starmie and I are looking forward to
having tons more fun together from here on out!
It’s gonna be great!

episode_event_M1_ch0021_00_green_en.lsd.episode_event_M1_ch0021_00_green/4001_10:
Whew! I think that’s good enough for today’s
training! How about we head back, Pidgeot?

Bad timing! I would have let you battle me
if you’d gotten here a little sooner. Oh well.

When you’re as famous as we are, Trainers’ll
challenge you every time you walk down the
street! Pidgeot needs some rest now.
episode_event_M1_ch0021_00_green_en.lsd.episode_event_M1_ch0021_00_green/4001_03: So you do have a heart!
episode_event_M1_ch0021_00_green_en.lsd.episode_event_M1_ch0021_00_green/4001_04:
Of course I do! What kind of Trainer would I be if
I didn’t take care of my Pokémon?!

Thanks! You’ve gotta get plenty of rest if you
want to be on your A game. That goes for
Pokémon AND for Trainers!
episode_event_M1_ch0021_00_green_en.lsd.episode_event_M1_ch0021_00_green/4001_10:
Hm? What is it?
Ohhh... I know that look in your eye. You want me
to give you some tips on battling, don’t you.

All right! First, let me introduce you to some other
Trainers that are here on Pasio!
episode_event_M1_ch0021_00_green_en.lsd.episode_event_M1_ch0021_00_green/4002_10:
Oh, hey, Blue!
You’re here, too, [Name:PlayerNickname ]?
What’s going on here?
Wait, you two know each other?

Of course!
We’re on a team, after all!

Whoa, look at you!
Sounds like you’ve already got a pretty good
team going, don’t you, [Name:PlayerNickname ]!

It’s no easy feat to get a strong Trainer to
acknowledge you as a teammate, so good going!
Of course, she’s not as good as me, but...

You just had to keep talking, didn’t you.
Well, you implied that I’m a strong Trainer,
so I’ll take the compliment.

I wanted to introduce you two, but if you already
know each other...I guess we can move on!
episode_event_M1_ch0021_00_green_en.lsd.episode_event_M1_ch0021_00_green/4003_10:
There she is.
Heeey! Misty!

Hey, Blue! Hey, [Name:PlayerNickname ]!
Oh, and Flannery, too? What are you all up to?
Doing some training?

Don’t tell me...
You’re on [Name:PlayerNickname ]’s team, too,
aren’t you, Misty.

Yup! [Name:PlayerNickname ]’s been working
super hard to grow strong for the team!

Brock and I made sure to teach [EN:Gen Ref='255' M='him' F='her' ] the basics.
[EN:Gen Ref='255' M='He' F='She' ]’s got a real knack for Pokémon battling.

Hm, I see...
Of course, if I were on the team, too,
[EN:Gen Ref='255' M='he' F='she' ] would be even stronger.
Hey! Are you trying to say I’m a bad teacher?

I’m just saying...[EN:Gen Ref='255' M='he' F='she' ] could learn a lot more from
a stronger sync pair.

Ugh! I guess some things never change.
You think you’re better than me. Just admit it!

Hey, guys, I don’t feel right saying this, but let’s
cool down a bit! Why not just settle this with a
Pokémon battle?

I’m game for that!
But just a normal battle would be boring...

There are a bunch of event matches going on
all over Pasio right now for the PML.

I heard one of them is a team-on-team
elimination battle... You interested?

That kind of feels like a roundabout way of solving
things, but all right! Challenge accepted.

I guess it’ll be more fun to settle this with a bang.
Let’s do it!

All right! Then [Name:PlayerNickname ] and
Flannery are with me!

Wait, why do you get
[Name:PlayerNickname ] on your team?!
Because [EN:Gen Ref='255' M='he' F='she' ] can learn more that way.

You really are a piece of work, aren’t you...
Fine, then I’ll make my own Water-type team
that’ll knock your socks off!
This is getting pretty intense! I like it!
episode_event_M1_ch0021_00_green_en.lsd.episode_event_M1_ch0021_00_green/4005_10:
You guys aren’t bad! I didn’t think you’d be able to
keep up with me! Not a bad team we have here!
No kidding! We even made it to the finals!

Huh, it looks like I just got a Poryphone message
from Misty... Wait—what?!
What’s wrong?

She lost?! There’s somebody in this tournament that
could beat Misty?

I thought that she and her Starmie would easily
make it to the finals.
episode_event_M1_ch0021_00_green_en.lsd.episode_event_M1_ch0021_00_green/4005_03: So you admit that she’s good.
episode_event_M1_ch0021_00_green_en.lsd.episode_event_M1_ch0021_00_green/4005_04:
She’s the Cerulean City Gym Leader. It’s only
common sense she would make it to the finals.
episode_event_M1_ch0021_00_green_en.lsd.episode_event_M1_ch0021_00_green/4005_03: You had faith in her, didn’t you.
episode_event_M1_ch0021_00_green_en.lsd.episode_event_M1_ch0021_00_green/4005_04:
She’s the Cerulean City Gym Leader. It’s only
common sense she would make it to the finals.
episode_event_M1_ch0021_00_green_en.lsd.episode_event_M1_ch0021_00_green/4005_10:
Aww, man...
I’m so bummed I lost that battle. I guess I won’t
be battling you in the finals after all.
Misty! What happened?!
You got sloppy, didn’t you.

I’m just gonna pretend I didn’t hear that...
We had fun, and that’s what matters. By the way,
the guy that beat me had a message for you!
He said he wants a rematch with you, Blue.

A rematch?!
You mean I’ve battled this guy before?

Oh, you’ll know him when you see him...
Watch out, though. He’s strong! I guess I’ll see
you at the arena in a bit! I’m not missing this!
I’ve been waiting for you, Blue!

Ahhh, Bruno. So you’re the one who beat
Misty, huh? Guess that’s to be expected from
a member of the Indigo League Elite Four.

It is all a result of my perseverance training from
before and during my time on Pasio.

Indigo Elite Four?!
Oh man, I have to put my game face on!

Good call, Flannery.
Bruno is the real deal.
Flannery, [Name:PlayerNickname ], time to get serious!
Get ready for our superior power! Hoo hah!
episode_event_M1_ch0021_00_green_en.lsd.episode_event_M1_ch0021_00_green/4007_10: We...lost?! To these children?!

We went through arduous training with Master
Bruno... We even beat a Gym Leader!

This is nothing strange.
They were just stronger than us.

And as long as you underestimate them
as children, that means you still harbor
hubris in your heart.

Team battles aren’t about the power of each
individual pair but of how well those pairs
work together.

Blue, Flannery, and [Name:PlayerNickname ]
unleashed their true potential as a team.

You’re right, Bruno.
It’s true. You guys are all strong sync pairs...

but my team went a step further, making sure we
covered each other’s weaknesses.

Flannery, [Name:PlayerNickname ]...
I think that battle was the best this team
has done yet! Good job, guys!

It’s our loss.
Blue, you are a really impressive Trainer.

No matter the situation or predicament, you strive
to be the best there is, and you have the tenacity
and serenity to actualize that desire.
I have trained to the absolute limit.

But perhaps you have the power to surpass
that limit.

I know a guy that I don’t want to lose to.
And I know that he continues to get even stronger.
That’s why I can’t afford to stop.

That’s why I want strong Trainers to battle.
So if you ever want another rematch, just
let me know!
I shall train more and challenge you again.

So that’s what makes you such a strong Trainer,
huh, Blue? I gotta work harder, too!
Hey, Bruno! Can I train with you?

Of course!
We can start immediately!

Well, I guess that means our little impromptu team
is disbanding. It’s been fun, [Name:PlayerNickname ].
episode_event_M1_ch0021_00_green_en.lsd.episode_event_M1_ch0021_00_green/4007_04:
Heh! Glad to hear that. You know you’re on the
right track if you’re able to have fun.

Make sure you remember how strong Pidgeot
and I are, all right?
episode_event_M1_ch0021_00_green_en.lsd.episode_event_M1_ch0021_00_green/4007_10:
Here’s hoping we can see each other again at
some other tournament event.

I have no intention of losing, so if you keep
moving up the ranks, I’m sure we’ll end up
battling each other one way or another.
I look forward to seeing how strong you become!

episode_event_M1_general_ch0021_00_green.episode_event_M1_general_ch0021_00_green:
I think I’m gonna go do some training.
You can come watch if you want, I guess.

Today let’s work on...
Oh! I’ve got an idea!

Bonjour, [Name:PlayerNickname ]!
I was about to go train. You want to join me?

Guess Blue already left...
I should go train, too!

I think Blue left to go do some training a little
bit ago. If you hurry, you can probably still
catch him!

grow_event_M1_type_grass_en.lsd.grow_event_M1_type_grass/3901_1301_0100_:
’Sup, dude? How’s it goin’?
Lemme know when that battlin’ mood strikes ya!
grow_event_M1_type_grass_en.lsd.grow_event_M1_type_grass/3902_1301_0100_:
Yo! Have you been workin’ out with
Crasher Wake? Sweeeet. I’m ready
to go whenever you are, dude!
grow_event_M1_type_grass_en.lsd.grow_event_M1_type_grass/3903_1301_0100_:
Do you know how strong Grass types are?!
We have to train them up if we want to take
on Marlon!

grow_event_M1_type_rock_en.lsd.grow_event_M1_type_rock/3901_1301_0100_1:
Hah!
I’ll be waiting for you to get stronger and
challenge me again!
grow_event_M1_type_rock_en.lsd.grow_event_M1_type_rock/3902_1301_0100_1:
You want to challenge me after you train under
Shauntal? Very good! I’ll be ready for you!
grow_event_M1_type_rock_en.lsd.grow_event_M1_type_rock/3903_1301_0100_1:
“The time has come to learn about stone...”
Come on. Let’s do some rock-solid training
and prepare to challenge Blaine!

grow_event_M1_type_water_en.lsd.grow_event_M1_type_water/3901_1301_0100_:
C’mon, let’s heat it up! 
I wanna see just how hot your spirit burns!
grow_event_M1_type_water_en.lsd.grow_event_M1_type_water/3902_1301_0100_:
So you trained with Roark, huh? But have you seen
just how hot a Pokémon battle can be?! ’Cause I’m
about to show you!
grow_event_M1_type_water_en.lsd.grow_event_M1_type_water/3903_1031_0100_:
It takes hard work to be
a solid training partner.
grow_event_M1_type_water_en.lsd.grow_event_M1_type_water/3903_1301_0100_:
Come on, I’ll give you a hand! Let’s train up
our Pokémon and get ready to challenge Flint!

search_01_001_en.lsd.search_01_001/4301_1001_0100_10:
Eager to learn more about team battling,
[Name:PlayerNickname ] made [EN:Gen Ref='255' M='his' F='her' ] way over to
Professor Bellis’s lab for some advice.
search_01_001_en.lsd.search_01_001/4301_1001_0300_10:
Oh! Hola, [Name:PlayerNickname ]!
Welcome to my lab! Thanks for coming.
search_01_001_en.lsd.search_01_001/4301_1001_0400_10:
So, how have you been? How are your
team battles going?
search_01_001_en.lsd.search_01_001/4301_0301_0500_10: Great! I want to learn more!
search_01_001_en.lsd.search_01_001/4301_0401_0600_10:
Subarashii! That’s great! It sounds like you’ve
accomplished quite a lot in a short amount of
time. I’d love to see what you can do...
search_01_001_en.lsd.search_01_001/4301_0402_0800_10:
Ganbatte! Keep at it!
With your Pokémon by your side, I’m sure
you’ll get the hang of it in no time!
search_01_001_en.lsd.search_01_001/4301_1001_0900_10:
As a matter of fact, I think I have an idea!
Would you mind joining me for some fieldwork?
search_01_001_en.lsd.search_01_001/4301_1001_1000_10:
There’s a trail in the mountains nearby
that would be perfecto!
Are you ready to leave now? Let’s go!

search_01_002_en.lsd.search_01_002/4301_1001_0100_10:
Bravo! I can tell you’ve already formed an
incredible bond with your Pokémon.
search_01_002_en.lsd.search_01_002/4301_1001_0200_10:
Speaking of which, has anyone told you how
sync moves work or why we’re able to use
them here on Pasio?
search_01_002_en.lsd.search_01_002/4301_1001_0300_10: It has to do with these things called sync stones.
search_01_002_en.lsd.search_01_002/4301_1001_0400_10:
Have you ever noticed that there’s a shiny,
rainbow-colored stone embedded in
your Poryphone?
search_01_002_en.lsd.search_01_002/4301_1001_0500_10:
That’s a sync stone. They’re quite rare—
in fact, they can only be found right here
in the ocean where Pasio was built.
search_01_002_en.lsd.search_01_002/4301_1001_0600_10:
The interaction between sync stones and
Pokémon is actually the prime subject of my
research! It’s quite brilliant...
search_01_002_en.lsd.search_01_002/4301_1001_0700_10:
Sync stones amplify the power that comes from
the bond between a Trainer and their Pokémon.
I call this “sync strength.“
search_01_002_en.lsd.search_01_002/4301_1001_0800_10:
Tapping into that sync strength is what allows us
to use sync moves, as you just demonstrated.
That’s what makes battling on Pasio special!
search_01_002_en.lsd.search_01_002/4301_1001_0900_10:
The more you and your Pokémon develop
your sync strength—your bond—the happier
you’ll be as a sync pair!
search_01_002_en.lsd.search_01_002/4301_1001_1000_10:
In the end, that’s the real reason I’m continuing
my research! Now, focus on your sync strength
and try using your sync move again!

search_01_003_en.lsd.search_01_003/4301_1001_0100_10:
Perfecto! My, my! You’re really getting the
hang of how Pokémon battles work here!
search_01_003_en.lsd.search_01_003/4301_1001_0200_10:
I’m glad I was able to observe you up close
today. This impromptu fieldwork has been
so helpful!
search_01_003_en.lsd.search_01_003/4301_1001_0300_10:
To create an even playing field, we’ve given
every sync pair their own Poryphone to use
while here on Pasio.
search_01_003_en.lsd.search_01_003/4301_1001_0400_10:
Since each Poryphone contains a sync stone,
everyone has the ability to use sync moves.
search_01_003_en.lsd.search_01_003/4301_1001_0500_10:
And as I explained before, as your bond with
your Pokémon grows, your sync strength
as partners grows, too.
search_01_003_en.lsd.search_01_003/4301_1001_0600_10:
I’ll be sure to share any new and helpful
information I come across as I continue
my research, OK?
search_01_003_en.lsd.search_01_003/4301_1001_0700_10:
For now, I think our fieldwork is complete!
Danke very much, [Name:PlayerNickname ]!
Ta-ta!

search_01_004_en.lsd.search_01_004/4301_1001_0100_10: All right! Let the fieldwork begin!
search_01_004_en.lsd.search_01_004/4301_1001_0200_10:
Why don’t you try tapping someone on the
shoulder and get to conversing! A happy smile
and an “Alola!” should do the trick!

search_02_001_en.lsd.search_02_001/4301_1001_0100_10:
Oho! I see you’ve collected a badge or two!
You must be aiming to compete in the PML.
search_02_001_en.lsd.search_02_001/4301_1001_0200_10:
Which means...you must have been transported
here via one of those mysterious rings, correct?
search_02_001_en.lsd.search_02_001/4301_1001_0300_10:
Oh? You haven’t heard the rumors, then?
Allow me to enlighten you...
search_02_001_en.lsd.search_02_001/4301_1001_0400_10:
It appears that some of the Trainers participating
in the PML did not travel to Pasio on a boat.
search_02_001_en.lsd.search_02_001/4301_1001_0500_10:
In fact, there are rumors floating around that
those Trainers were instead teleported here
through strange rings or loops!
search_02_001_en.lsd.search_02_001/4301_1001_0600_10:
Mysterious, isn’t it?! I wonder if the rumors are
true... I’m so curious! Aren’t you curious?!
search_02_001_en.lsd.search_02_001/4301_1001_0700_10:
In any case... If you come across someone who
knows the truth about the rings, do let me know,
would you?
search_02_001_en.lsd.search_02_001/4301_0401_0900_10:
Thank you so much! I’ll continue doing some
investigating of my own in the meantime.
I hope to hear back from you soon!
search_02_001_en.lsd.search_02_001/4301_0402_1100_10:
Wh-why the hesitation?
Pleeease? Keep me in the loop—I beg of you!
search_02_001_en.lsd.search_02_001/4301_1001_1200_10:
I’ll continue doing some investigating of my own
in the meantime, all right? Yes? OK!
I hope to hear back from you soon!

search_02_002_en.lsd.search_02_002/4301_1001_0100_10:
Huh? A weird circle?
Yeah, I think I saw something like that.
search_02_002_en.lsd.search_02_002/4301_1001_0200_10:
I’m pretty sure it was a circle, anyways...
I mean, it was definitely round...
search_02_002_en.lsd.search_02_002/4301_1001_0300_10:
It was a Pokémon I never thought I’d see—that’s
for sure. The world’s a big, big place...
search_02_002_en.lsd.search_02_002/4301_1001_0500_10: What? You want to know what Pokémon I saw?
search_02_002_en.lsd.search_02_002/4301_1001_0600_10:
Well, battle me and maybe I’ll tell you.
If you can beat me, that is!
search_02_002_en.lsd.search_02_002/4301_0601_0700_10:
All right, I’ll tell you! The weird circle I saw
was round...perfectly round!
search_02_002_en.lsd.search_02_002/4301_0601_0800_10:
The Pokémon was really cute...and pretty, too!
It had a round head and a kind of mischievous
look in its eyes.
search_02_002_en.lsd.search_02_002/4301_0601_0900_10:
That’s right! I saw an Alolan Persian!
It was sooo cute!
search_02_002_en.lsd.search_02_002/4301_0601_1000_10: I’ve never seen a Persian of that form before!
search_02_002_en.lsd.search_02_002/4301_0601_1100_10:
Oh, I’m sorry... I guess that wasn’t the
answer you were looking to hear, was it.
search_02_002_en.lsd.search_02_002/4301_0601_1200_10:
What? You heard that mysterious rings or loops
have something to do with the way people are
being transported to Pasio? That’s weird...
search_02_002_en.lsd.search_02_002/4301_0601_1300_10:
Now that you mention it, I think I’ve heard
rumors about a Pokémon like that before...
Something about moving objects through loops...
search_02_002_en.lsd.search_02_002/4301_0601_1301_10:
I overheard a pretty lady talking about how
she got to Pasio not too long ago.
search_02_002_en.lsd.search_02_002/4301_0601_1400_10:
Maybe she’ll have the information you’re
looking for!

search_02_003_en.lsd.search_02_003/4301_1001_0100_10:
Ah, hello again!
Well? Have you found any new information
concerning the strange, mysterious rings?
search_02_003_en.lsd.search_02_003/4301_0401_0300_10:
I see... Alolan Persian, huh?
I...uh...think we may need to keep looking,
but thank you for your efforts thus far.
search_02_003_en.lsd.search_02_003/4301_1001_0600_10:
Anyway, if the true solution was that simple 
to find, the problem wouldn’t be worth solving
at all, now would it!
search_02_003_en.lsd.search_02_003/4301_1001_0700_10:
We must carefully examine all evidence and
continue our pursuit of the truth!
search_02_003_en.lsd.search_02_003/4301_0401_0900_10:
Huh? Behind me?
Did you see something?
search_02_003_en.lsd.search_02_003/4301_0402_1100_10:
Huh? What are you talking about?
I don’t see anything.
search_02_003_en.lsd.search_02_003/4301_1001_1200_10:
Tsk! I don’t appreciate pranks, you know...
Anyways, I’m not going to give up on this search!
Just tell me when you have more information!

search_03_001_en.lsd.search_03_001/4301_1001_0100_10:
Heyyy, look who just showed up at the right
place at the right time.
search_03_001_en.lsd.search_03_001/4301_1001_0300_10:
Hey, Sawyer... How ’bout we get these guys
to help us out?
search_03_001_en.lsd.search_03_001/4301_1001_0400_10:
The young master gave us a specific job
to do, Rachel.
search_03_001_en.lsd.search_03_001/4301_1001_0500_10:
Duhhh. I know. But don’t you think Master Lear
will be wayyy happier if we can get the job
done even faster?
search_03_001_en.lsd.search_03_001/4301_0401_0800_10:
Heh heh, I think I’ll take that curiosity as a sign
that you’d be willing to help us sniff out those
Team Break goons...
search_03_001_en.lsd.search_03_001/4301_0402_1000_10:
Is today my lucky day? Yeah! You can help us
sniff out those Team Break goons. You’ve gotta
be pretty fed up with them, too, right?
search_03_001_en.lsd.search_03_001/4301_1001_1200_10:
Oh, hush. It’s fiiine! Let’s just get this over with.
Come on, [Name:PlayerNickname ]. Let’s gooo!

search_03_002_en.lsd.search_03_002/4301_0101_0100_10:
Blasted Team Break thugs...wreaking havoc
everywhere you go while the young master’s
trying to run a tournament!
search_03_002_en.lsd.search_03_002/4301_0101_0200_10:
I knew there’d be more of them slinking around...
And look, here they are. Surprise, surprise.
search_03_002_en.lsd.search_03_002/4301_0101_0300_10:
Whoa! Check this guy out...
Hey, muscle man! You and your pretty girlfriend
over there need to scram! This is our turf!
search_03_002_en.lsd.search_03_002/4301_0101_0400_10:
Who do you think you’re talking to?
Master Lear handpicked the two of us to
crack down on troublemaking misfits like you!
search_03_002_en.lsd.search_03_002/4301_0101_0500_10:
Yo! You guys take care o’ the big guy and
the girl! Leave this bunch o’ losers to me.
search_03_002_en.lsd.search_03_002/4301_0501_0100_10:
Arrgh! We gotta scram for now, boys!
Let’s go!
search_03_002_en.lsd.search_03_002/4301_0501_0200_10:
Ugh, fiiinally. I thought that would never end.
Come on. Let’s hurry up and report back to
Master Lear.
search_03_002_en.lsd.search_03_002/4301_0501_0300_10:
Not yet. We need to continue making our
rounds. Team Break have probably scattered
all over this island.
search_03_002_en.lsd.search_03_002/4301_0501_0400_10:
Did you hear that, [Name:PlayerNickname ]?
Sounds like we need your help for a
li’l bit longer...

search_03_003_en.lsd.search_03_003/4301_1001_0100_10:
Phew... Looks like we cleared out all the
Team Break stragglers in this area.
search_03_003_en.lsd.search_03_003/4301_1001_0200_10:
Hmm... Think we did good enough to squeeze
a compliment out of Master Lear for once?
search_03_003_en.lsd.search_03_003/4301_1001_0300_10:
Rachel...the young master highly values
the work that you do. You know that.
search_03_003_en.lsd.search_03_003/4301_1001_0400_10:
I knowww, but he never says it to my face...
I’m just saying, a li’l compliment here and there
would be nice.
search_03_003_en.lsd.search_03_003/4301_1001_0500_10:
Well, he’s got a lot on his shoulders for someone
so young. Running the PML is no small feat.
search_03_003_en.lsd.search_03_003/4301_1001_0600_10:
Yeahhh, Master Lear does seem pretty passionate
about it. He says he’s gonna create a whole
new way to battle, starting here on Pasio.
search_03_003_en.lsd.search_03_003/4301_1001_0700_10:
That’s right. Right now, what the young master
wants most is to see his tournament go off
without a hitch.
search_03_003_en.lsd.search_03_003/4301_1001_0800_10:
That’s why we’re out here keeping order.
We can’t afford to let Team Break ruin
Pasio’s reputation.
search_03_003_en.lsd.search_03_003/4301_1001_0900_10:
Yeahhh. We do it because we love him,
huh, Sawyer.
search_03_003_en.lsd.search_03_003/4301_1001_1000_10:
L-love the—! The young master is someone
I respect. He’s my prince!
search_03_003_en.lsd.search_03_003/4301_1001_1100_10:
Saaame thing.... Anyways, thanks a bunch for
helping us out, [Name:PlayerNickname ].
search_03_003_en.lsd.search_03_003/4301_1001_1300_10:
However...the young master IS going to
win the PML. Both of us support him
wholeheartedly in that, all right?
search_03_003_en.lsd.search_03_003/4301_1001_1400_10:
Well, maaaybe we could root for you a
li’l bit, too. Juuust a li’l bit.

search_general_talk_01_en.lsd.search_general_talk_01/4401_1031_0200_10:
They’re so shiny, and
they’re only found here...
search_general_talk_01_en.lsd.search_general_talk_01/4401_1031_0300_10:
I’d look so great
wearing one...
search_general_talk_01_en.lsd.search_general_talk_01/4401_0701_0100_10:
Hmm... I wonder how I can get my hands
on a sync stone...
search_general_talk_01_en.lsd.search_general_talk_01/4401_0701_0200_10:
They’re so shiny and pretty...
It’d be so cute if I could make one
into a hair clip!
search_general_talk_01_en.lsd.search_general_talk_01/4401_0701_0300_10:
I heard they can only be found at a special
spot in the ocean around Pasio!
search_general_talk_01_en.lsd.search_general_talk_01/4402_0701_0100_10:
It’s important for sync pairs to have strong bonds
so that we can use sync moves! So we need
sync strength! And a sync stone, of course!
search_general_talk_01_en.lsd.search_general_talk_01/4402_0701_0200_10:
Wait...is that right? I said the word “sync“ so
many times that I’m not sure anymore...
search_general_talk_01_en.lsd.search_general_talk_01/4402_0701_0300_10:
A-anyway, you have to use lots of regular moves
before you can use your sync move, OK?!
At least...that’s what I heard!
search_general_talk_01_en.lsd.search_general_talk_01/4403_0701_0100_10:
I see, I see... So you two have been building up
your trust in one another for decades now?
How wonderful!
search_general_talk_01_en.lsd.search_general_talk_01/4403_0701_0200_10:
Yep, this one and I’ve been rollin’ together all
our lives!
search_general_talk_01_en.lsd.search_general_talk_01/4403_0701_0300_10: Wonderful! You could almost pass for twins!
search_general_talk_01_en.lsd.search_general_talk_01/4403_0701_0400_10:
Gahahaha! People don’t say we look alike
fer nuthin’!
search_general_talk_01_en.lsd.search_general_talk_01/4404_0701_0100_10:
Therefore, we can conclude that communication
is crucial in team battles!
search_general_talk_01_en.lsd.search_general_talk_01/4404_0701_0200_10:
So...what you’re saying is the team members
all have to be on the same page, correct?
search_general_talk_01_en.lsd.search_general_talk_01/4404_0701_0300_10:
Well, practice makes perfect...
Hey, look! Some Trainers!
Let’s battle—my team against yours!
search_general_talk_01_en.lsd.search_general_talk_01/4404_0701_0400_10:
Hold on—I’m not ready!
Don’t go challenging people all on your own!
search_general_talk_01_en.lsd.search_general_talk_01/4404_0701_0500_10:
Oh shoot, right... Communication...
Sorry, we’re gonna need to take a rain check
on that battle!
search_general_talk_01_en.lsd.search_general_talk_01/4405_0701_0200_10:
Mi corazón is going doki doki because you’re so
belle, capisce? How about tú and je have a
walk conmigo?
search_general_talk_01_en.lsd.search_general_talk_01/4405_0701_0400_10: Sorry, I have no idea what you just said.
search_general_talk_01_en.lsd.search_general_talk_01/4405_0701_0500_10:
You have to use your words properly, or else
no comprendo.
search_general_talk_01_en.lsd.search_general_talk_01/4405_0702_0100_10:
I can’t believe that tu ne comprends pas...
What is there to not understand?
search_general_talk_01_en.lsd.search_general_talk_01/4501_0701_0100_10:
I tend to babble on endlessly whenever the
subject of sync pairs comes up!
search_general_talk_01_en.lsd.search_general_talk_01/4501_0701_0200_10:
But you see, it’s my job as a researcher to
spread the information I discover!
search_general_talk_01_en.lsd.search_general_talk_01/4501_0701_0300_10:
Mm-hmm... I expect magnifico things from you.
I hope you go on to become a fantastique
sync pair! Do your best!
search_general_talk_01_en.lsd.search_general_talk_01/4501_0701_0400_10:
Oh! I can tell that little boost of encouragement
has really lifted your spirits.
search_general_talk_01_en.lsd.search_general_talk_01/4501_0701_0500_10:
If a passerby is kind enough to give you a
morale boost, it can make you feel a little
stronger for a while! Remember that!
search_general_talk_01_en.lsd.search_general_talk_01/4501_0702_0100_10:
If a passerby is kind enough to give you a
morale boost, it can make you feel a little
stronger for a while! Remember that!
search_general_talk_01_en.lsd.search_general_talk_01/4601_0701_0200_10:
Your Pokémon was just so lovely that I couldn’t
help but stare! Here, take this as an apology.
search_general_talk_01_en.lsd.search_general_talk_01/4601_0702_0300_10: Oh my! It’s even more lovely up close!
search_general_talk_01_en.lsd.search_general_talk_01/4601_0702_0400_10:
Oh, I’m in love...
Aren’t Pokémon just the best?
Let me look at your Pokémon again sometime!
search_general_talk_01_en.lsd.search_general_talk_01/4701_0101_0100_10:
Hey, it’s Professor Bellis!
What’cha doin’?
search_general_talk_01_en.lsd.search_general_talk_01/4701_0101_0300_10:
Oh...yeah! Of course! Fieldwork!
I love fieldwork, too!
search_general_talk_01_en.lsd.search_general_talk_01/4701_0101_0400_10:
Er, why don’t we have a Pokémon battle?
You know, for fieldwork?
search_general_talk_01_en.lsd.search_general_talk_01/4701_0401_0100_10: All right! I’m goin’ all out!
search_general_talk_01_en.lsd.search_general_talk_01/4701_0402_0100_10: Aw, that’s a shame. Maybe next time!
search_general_talk_01_en.lsd.search_general_talk_01/4701_0102_0100_10: Remember, this is all in the name of fieldwork!
search_general_talk_01_en.lsd.search_general_talk_01/4701_0501_0100_10: By the way, what is fieldwork?
search_general_talk_01_en.lsd.search_general_talk_01/4701_0601_0100_10: Fieldwork is something that gets us very excited!
search_general_talk_01_en.lsd.search_general_talk_01/4701_0601_0200_10:
Oh, I get it! It’s like a field day!
They both got the word “field“ in ’em, too!
search_general_talk_01_en.lsd.search_general_talk_01/4702_0101_0100_10:
Hm? Are you lookin’ for an opponent for a
Pokémon battle?
search_general_talk_01_en.lsd.search_general_talk_01/4702_0101_0200_10:
Bingo!
Yo quiero a great Pokémon battle!
search_general_talk_01_en.lsd.search_general_talk_01/4702_0101_0300_10:
Er...yo...what?
Speak English, Doc! We ain’t scientists!
search_general_talk_01_en.lsd.search_general_talk_01/4702_0101_0400_10: Anyway, you’re lookin’ for a battle, right?
search_general_talk_01_en.lsd.search_general_talk_01/4702_0101_0401_10:
Oui oui! 
I think this will be our last battle of the day!
search_general_talk_01_en.lsd.search_general_talk_01/4702_0101_0402_10:
What do you say we win this match and end
our fieldwork with a bang!
search_general_talk_01_en.lsd.search_general_talk_01/4702_0401_0100_10: Well then, let’s get this rollin’!
search_general_talk_01_en.lsd.search_general_talk_01/4702_0402_0100_10:
Don’t worry. We ain’t goin’ nowhere.
We’ll be here when you’re ready.
search_general_talk_01_en.lsd.search_general_talk_01/4702_0102_0100_10: There you are. Are you ready?

search_general_talk_02_en.lsd.search_general_talk_02/4401_1031_0200_10: Pasio is my stage to shine!
search_general_talk_02_en.lsd.search_general_talk_02/4401_0701_0100_10:
Oh, are you scouting new talent?
Why, of course! I’d be happy to...
search_general_talk_02_en.lsd.search_general_talk_02/4401_0701_0200_10:
Huh? A mysterious ring?
What are you talking about?
search_general_talk_02_en.lsd.search_general_talk_02/4401_0701_0300_10:
Ugh... I gave you my best smile thinking you were
scouting for models! Now you just want to ask
me questions? How lame.
search_general_talk_02_en.lsd.search_general_talk_02/4401_0701_0400_10:
Teleporting across the world through rings, huh?
Um...did you hit your head or something?
How does that even sound possible to you?
search_general_talk_02_en.lsd.search_general_talk_02/4401_0701_0500_10:
Some important-looking person asked me 
something or another like that back there, too.
Why don’t you go ask them?
search_general_talk_02_en.lsd.search_general_talk_02/4402_1031_0100_10:
A good mode of transport
is essential to having
a great adventure!
search_general_talk_02_en.lsd.search_general_talk_02/4402_1031_0200_10:
I’m certain that how I
came to Pasio was the
best way.
search_general_talk_02_en.lsd.search_general_talk_02/4402_1031_0300_10:
But I wonder how I should
get home...
search_general_talk_02_en.lsd.search_general_talk_02/4402_0701_0100_10: Hm. You want to know how I came to Pasio?
search_general_talk_02_en.lsd.search_general_talk_02/4402_0701_0200_10:
I came by ferry, same as everybody else.
It was such a nice trip!
search_general_talk_02_en.lsd.search_general_talk_02/4402_0701_0300_10: Another way to travel? I haven’t heard of one.
search_general_talk_02_en.lsd.search_general_talk_02/4402_0701_0400_10: If there is one, maybe I’ll try that out to get home.
search_general_talk_02_en.lsd.search_general_talk_02/4402_0702_0100_10:
A mysterious ring? I don’t think I saw one on
the ferry... Hmmm... A mysterious ring...
search_general_talk_02_en.lsd.search_general_talk_02/4402_0702_0200_10:
Maybe a Pokémon has something to do with it.
If that’s the case, I think there’s a gentleman up
ahead who mentioned something like that.
search_general_talk_02_en.lsd.search_general_talk_02/4403_0701_0100_10:
Did you know that this island is completely
artificial? We were on the construction team that
built it!
search_general_talk_02_en.lsd.search_general_talk_02/4403_0701_0200_10:
Pretty sweet, huh? Looks like a real island now
that all these people showed up! Guess our
hard work really paid off!
search_general_talk_02_en.lsd.search_general_talk_02/4403_0701_0300_10:
He says that, but it’s really his Machamp
that did the hard work.
search_general_talk_02_en.lsd.search_general_talk_02/4403_0701_0400_10:
Don’t become a grown-up like him. Remember
that you work together with your Pokémon!
search_general_talk_02_en.lsd.search_general_talk_02/4404_0701_0100_10:
I heard that somebody saw some strange things
around here... Are you interested in that, too?
search_general_talk_02_en.lsd.search_general_talk_02/4404_0701_0200_10: I see! Then we are kindred spirits!
search_general_talk_02_en.lsd.search_general_talk_02/4404_0701_0300_10:
If you find anything out of the ordinary, 
please let me know.
If you don’t...
search_general_talk_02_en.lsd.search_general_talk_02/4405_0701_0100_10:
Come on, let’s go back. 
There aren’t any rare Pokémon around here.
search_general_talk_02_en.lsd.search_general_talk_02/4405_0701_0300_10:
Aaah! There’s something there! Nonononono!
Let’s get out of here!
search_general_talk_02_en.lsd.search_general_talk_02/4601_0701_0100_10:
Oh no, I’ve been spotted! 
P-please, d-don’t open up another hole!
I don’t wanna be taken anywhere else!
search_general_talk_02_en.lsd.search_general_talk_02/4601_0701_0200_10:
Who...who are you?
Are you one of its minions?!
search_general_talk_02_en.lsd.search_general_talk_02/4601_0701_0300_10:
I’m sorry, I’m sorry!
Here, take this and leave me alone!
search_general_talk_02_en.lsd.search_general_talk_02/4601_0702_0100_10:
Be careful of holes! They’ll transport you all over
the place! Eeek!
search_general_talk_02_en.lsd.search_general_talk_02/4501_0701_0100_10:
Hey, there you are!
A researcher guy asked me to look for you.
search_general_talk_02_en.lsd.search_general_talk_02/4501_0701_0200_10:
He told me to help out a Trainer wearing a hat
who was traveling with a Pikachu!
search_general_talk_02_en.lsd.search_general_talk_02/4501_0702_0100_10:
I don’t know what that was all about,
but I think I did my job well!
search_general_talk_02_en.lsd.search_general_talk_02/2861_0101_0100_10:
You’re looking for a strange Pokémon?
What a coincidence! I am, too!
search_general_talk_02_en.lsd.search_general_talk_02/2861_0101_0200_10:
By the way, what information do you have?
Will you share it with me? Come on.
search_general_talk_02_en.lsd.search_general_talk_02/2861_0101_0300_10:
You only know of a mysterious hoop? That’s it?
No, you’re hiding something, aren’t you?
Why aren’t you telling me? Huh?!
search_general_talk_02_en.lsd.search_general_talk_02/2861_0101_0400_10:
Fine! Pokémon battle! Now!
And if I win, you tell me everything!
search_general_talk_02_en.lsd.search_general_talk_02/2861_0101_0402_10:
I swear I’ll get to the bottom of this mysterious
Pokémon puzzle...and you’re going to help me!
search_general_talk_02_en.lsd.search_general_talk_02/2861_0101_0404_10: Fine, then! I suppose I can wait a little longer!
search_general_talk_02_en.lsd.search_general_talk_02/2861_0101_0405_10:
You’re back! This time I won’t let you go without
a battle! Tell me everything you know about that
mysterious Pokémon!
search_general_talk_02_en.lsd.search_general_talk_02/2861_0501_0200_10:
Oh gosh, I’m so sorry. I just lost my temper and
saw red.
search_general_talk_02_en.lsd.search_general_talk_02/2861_0501_0300_10:
I like Pokémon so much that people around me
say that I’m a bit of a weirdo.
search_general_talk_02_en.lsd.search_general_talk_02/2861_0501_0400_10:
If there is a strange Pokémon around here,
I think I can really relate to it.

search_general_talk_03_en.lsd.search_general_talk_03/4401_1031_0100_10:
I wonder what kind of
country it is...
search_general_talk_03_en.lsd.search_general_talk_03/4401_1031_0200_10:
He’s next in line for the
throne, right?
search_general_talk_03_en.lsd.search_general_talk_03/4401_1031_0300_10:
An actual real-life prince!
Isn’t that dreamy?
search_general_talk_03_en.lsd.search_general_talk_03/4401_0701_0100_10: Lear? Of course I know him!
search_general_talk_03_en.lsd.search_general_talk_03/4401_0701_0200_10: He’s supposedly the prince of some country, huh.
search_general_talk_03_en.lsd.search_general_talk_03/4401_0701_0300_10:
If he’s got the kind of power that would allow
him to build an entire island like this, he’s got
to be incredibly rich!
search_general_talk_03_en.lsd.search_general_talk_03/4402_1031_0300_10:
But a lot of people think
he’s a bad guy...
search_general_talk_03_en.lsd.search_general_talk_03/4402_0701_0100_10:
Lear pwetends to be mean, but he’s actually
a weally wespectable puyson.
search_general_talk_03_en.lsd.search_general_talk_03/4402_0701_0200_10:
He’s talented—and always twied his hahdest to
become the pwince he is today!
search_general_talk_03_en.lsd.search_general_talk_03/4402_0701_0300_10: I huyd a lady with puyple haiyuh saying that!
search_general_talk_03_en.lsd.search_general_talk_03/4403_0701_0100_10:
Not too shabby, [Name:PlayerNickname ]!
Let’s keep up the pace!
search_general_talk_03_en.lsd.search_general_talk_03/4403_0701_0200_10:
Heh, Rachel’s right. It’s obvious you kids have
grown a lot as Trainers since the last time we
saw you.
search_general_talk_03_en.lsd.search_general_talk_03/4403_0701_0300_10:
But the young master’s putting in just as much
effort—if not more. He’s made sure the volcanoes
and glaciers all look as realistic as possible...
search_general_talk_03_en.lsd.search_general_talk_03/4403_0701_0400_10:
all so that the Trainers who come to Pasio
can experience Pokémon battles in a load of
different environments.
search_general_talk_03_en.lsd.search_general_talk_03/4403_0701_0500_10:
Sooo true. Master Lear’s not just a genius—he’s a
hard worker, too.
search_general_talk_03_en.lsd.search_general_talk_03/4404_0701_0100_10:
Hey, you’re not gonna believe it!
I saw a sync pair being attacked by Team Break!
search_general_talk_03_en.lsd.search_general_talk_03/4404_0701_0200_10: And get this: Lear helped the Trainers!
search_general_talk_03_en.lsd.search_general_talk_03/4404_0701_0300_10:
Wait, whaaat?! Lear, as in Prince Lear?
And you’re saying that he actually
helped somebody?
search_general_talk_03_en.lsd.search_general_talk_03/4404_0701_0400_10:
Yeah, I was as surprised as you are.
Maybe he’s a better guy than we thought.
search_general_talk_03_en.lsd.search_general_talk_03/4404_0702_0100_10: I’m having a hard time imagining a nice Lear...
search_general_talk_03_en.lsd.search_general_talk_03/4404_0702_0200_10:
Well, it is true he has a major attitude problem.
If he fixes that, he might turn out to be a good
tournament host.
search_general_talk_03_en.lsd.search_general_talk_03/4601_0701_0100_10:
Shhh! Don’t scream!
I promise, I don’t bite!
search_general_talk_03_en.lsd.search_general_talk_03/4601_0701_0200_10:
Rachel fan? Me? Nah, I couldn’t care less
about her.
search_general_talk_03_en.lsd.search_general_talk_03/4601_0701_0300_10:
Sawyer’s the one I gel with, man.
Now here! Take this and leave me alone!
search_general_talk_03_en.lsd.search_general_talk_03/4601_0702_0100_10:
Ahhh, he’s so ripped!
Body-building goals, dude...
search_general_talk_03_en.lsd.search_general_talk_03/4501_0701_0100_10:
These other Team Break thugs look stronger than
the last ones. Don’t let your guard down,
[Name:PlayerNickname ].
search_general_talk_03_en.lsd.search_general_talk_03/4501_0701_0200_10:
[EN:Gen Ref='255' M='He' F='She' ]’ll be fiiine. Even Master Lear has his eye on
[EN:Gen Ref='255' M='him' F='her' ] lately. Right, [Name:PlayerNickname ]?
This’ll be, like, a piece of cake for you.
search_general_talk_03_en.lsd.search_general_talk_03/4501_0701_0300_10:
I mean, if we’re being toootally honest here,
the two of us are lookin’ forward to seeing
what you can do, too.
search_general_talk_03_en.lsd.search_general_talk_03/4501_0701_0400_10:
Leave it at that, Rachel. We just happen to share
an enemy with [Name:PlayerNickname ]
right now... That’s all.
search_general_talk_03_en.lsd.search_general_talk_03/4501_0701_0500_10:
I know, I knooow...
Only be nice if it benefits Master Lear...
search_general_talk_03_en.lsd.search_general_talk_03/4701_0101_0200_10:
I’ll make you head over heels for me just like
everybody else!
search_general_talk_03_en.lsd.search_general_talk_03/4701_0301_0100_10: I’d like to see you try.
search_general_talk_03_en.lsd.search_general_talk_03/4701_0401_0100_10:
Ooh, I like you. You’ll fit right in with my
other followers!
search_general_talk_03_en.lsd.search_general_talk_03/4701_0402_0200_10:
No, wait! Don’t run away! I know I seem
suspicious, but I swear I’m not a bad person!
search_general_talk_03_en.lsd.search_general_talk_03/4701_0102_0100_10: I see you thought it over.
search_general_talk_03_en.lsd.search_general_talk_03/4701_0102_0200_10:
I’ll make you head over heels for me just like
everybody else!
search_general_talk_03_en.lsd.search_general_talk_03/4701_0501_0100_10: I thought I could show off to all my followers!
search_general_talk_03_en.lsd.search_general_talk_03/4701_0501_0200_10:
It doesn’t matter if you lose! This weak and
vulnerable side of you is just as lovely!

story_00_01000_en.lsd.story_00_01000/2401_1001_0100_10:
Hey there, friend!
Welcome to the world of Pokémon Masters!
story_00_01000_en.lsd.story_00_01000/2401_1001_0200_10:
I’m Blue!
I’m a pretty big deal around here.
story_00_01000_en.lsd.story_00_01000/2401_1001_0300_10: But enough about me. Tell me about you!
story_00_01000_en.lsd.story_00_01000/2401_1001_0400_10:
So your name’s [Name:PlayerNickname ]?
That’s got a nice ring to it.
story_00_01000_en.lsd.story_00_01000/2401_1001_0500_10:
Well, [Name:PlayerNickname ], buckle up,
because there’s a huge team tournament 
right around the corner.
story_00_01000_en.lsd.story_00_01000/2401_1001_0600_10:
The Pokémon Masters League!
Or PML, for short.
story_00_01000_en.lsd.story_00_01000/2401_1001_0700_10:
It’s one big festival for Pokémon Trainers like us.
Trainers from all over the world gather to form 
teams of three and battle it out!
story_00_01000_en.lsd.story_00_01000/2401_1001_0800_10:
Each Trainer can only use one Pokémon, 
though, so the real challenge is how well 
your team works together!
story_00_01000_en.lsd.story_00_01000/2401_1001_0900_10:
We’re gonna meet so many awesome Trainers
here! It’s kind of crazy to think about.
I know I’m excited!
story_00_01000_en.lsd.story_00_01000/2401_1001_1000_10:
Well then, off we go! 
To the world of Pokémon Masters!

story_00_02000_en.lsd.story_00_02000/2401_1001_0100_10:
Hello! Nice to meet you!
I’m Trista, the receptionist here at
the Pokémon Masters League.
story_00_02000_en.lsd.story_00_02000/2401_1001_0110_10:
Would you and Pikachu like to register
to compete, [Name:PlayerNickname ]?
If so, you’ll be needing one of these!
story_00_02000_en.lsd.story_00_02000/2401_1001_0300_10:
This is a Poryphone! It’s a multi-purpose
information device that is an absolute
must-have here on Pasio!
story_00_02000_en.lsd.story_00_02000/2401_1001_0400_10:
Since team battles are the norm here at the PML,
you’ll need your Poryphone to communicate
with the other sync pairs on your team.
story_00_02000_en.lsd.story_00_02000/2401_1001_0500_10:
Oops! I got ahead of myself. “Sync pair” is a
special term we use here on Pasio to describe
a single Trainer-Pokémon pair.
story_00_02000_en.lsd.story_00_02000/2401_1001_0600_10: Hm? Are you perhaps looking for a team?
story_00_02000_en.lsd.story_00_02000/2401_1001_0700_10:
In that case, you’re in luck! I just met a couple
other sync pairs who are searching for
new teammates as well. I’ll introduce you!
story_00_02000_en.lsd.story_00_02000/2401_1001_0800_10: So, we heard you were looking for a team, too?
story_00_02000_en.lsd.story_00_02000/2401_1001_0900_10:
You look like you’re raring to go! Let’s take on
the PML together, [Name:PlayerNickname ]!
story_00_02000_en.lsd.story_00_02000/2401_1001_1100_10:
Why not? 
It looks like [EN:Gen Ref='255' M='he’s' F='she’s' ] got some fire in [EN:Gen Ref='255' M='his' F='her' ] eyes.
story_00_02000_en.lsd.story_00_02000/2401_1001_1200_10:
Oh, I’m Misty, by the way.
Let’s give this tournament our best shot!
story_00_02000_en.lsd.story_00_02000/2401_1001_1300_10: And I’m Brock! Glad to be on your team!
story_00_02000_en.lsd.story_00_02000/2401_1001_1350_10:
Well, now that we’re all together, 
why don’t we head out to the city?
story_00_02000_en.lsd.story_00_02000/2401_1001_1400_10:
Lots of Trainers like to gather around just outside
the Pokémon Center. It shouldn’t be too hard to
find more teammates there!
story_00_02000_en.lsd.story_00_02000/2401_1001_1500_10:
Here. Take this, [Name:PlayerNickname ].
Let’s head out whenever you’re ready!

story_01_01000_en.lsd.story_01_01000/2401_1001_0100_10:
This is Centra City, the biggest city on Pasio.
You might be surprised to know that Pasio is
a completely artificial island!
story_01_01000_en.lsd.story_01_01000/2401_1001_0200_10:
Now then, I have a sync pair in mind 
that might be willing to join our team, 
so let’s go look for them.
story_01_01000_en.lsd.story_01_01000/2401_1001_0300_10:
Oh, are you talking about that girl from Unova?
I think I saw her in the square up ahead
not too long ago...
story_01_01000_en.lsd.story_01_01000/2401_1001_0400_10:
Will you please stop?! It’s against the rules to
force a Trainer to battle if they don’t want to!
story_01_01000_en.lsd.story_01_01000/2401_1001_0600_10:
Sounds like trouble...
Do you think they’re OK?
We should see if they need help!
story_01_01000_en.lsd.story_01_01000/2401_1001_0700_10:
I’m sorry, but I just can’t battle right now.
My Pokémon needs to rest—she’s worked
hard enough for today.
story_01_01000_en.lsd.story_01_01000/2401_1001_0800_10:
Yeah! If you really want to battle, you’ll
have to challenge her another day!
story_01_01000_en.lsd.story_01_01000/2401_1001_0900_10: Forget that! You’re battling me now, Champion!
story_01_01000_en.lsd.story_01_01000/2401_1001_1000_10:
There’s no way I’m passin’ up a chance
like this! C’mon, let’s just battle already!
story_01_01000_en.lsd.story_01_01000/2401_1001_1100_10:
Hey, you two! Cut that out! Don’t you see
you’re bothering them?
story_01_01000_en.lsd.story_01_01000/2401_1001_1300_10:
You look like you could use a hand, Rosa.
Don’t worry—we’ll take care of these guys!
story_01_01000_en.lsd.story_01_01000/2401_1001_1400_10:
Who are you? If you wanna start somethin’,
you got it! We’ll make you eat dirt!

story_01_02000_en.lsd.story_01_02000/2401_1001_0100_10:
I...I can’t believe we lost to you bozos!
Argh! You’ll pay for this!
story_01_02000_en.lsd.story_01_02000/2401_1001_0200_10:
Nice timing, you guys!
Cynthia and I were having a nice chat
before those two started harassing us...
story_01_02000_en.lsd.story_01_02000/2401_1001_0300_10:
So that’s what was going on...
All in all, I’m glad nothing bad happened.
story_01_02000_en.lsd.story_01_02000/2401_1001_0400_10:
Oh, I should introduce you two.
[Name:PlayerNickname ], this is Rosa.
She’s a famous Trainer from the Unova region.
story_01_02000_en.lsd.story_01_02000/2401_1001_0500_10:
Hiya! Rosa here!
Nice to meet you, [Name:PlayerNickname ]!
story_01_02000_en.lsd.story_01_02000/2401_1001_0600_10:
We were looking for you because we wanted
to talk to you, but...
story_01_02000_en.lsd.story_01_02000/2401_1001_0700_10:
Imagine our surprise when we saw you 
with the Sinnoh Champion.
Who would have thought you’d be here, too!
story_01_02000_en.lsd.story_01_02000/2401_1001_0800_10:
Ahh, so you’ve heard of me, then. 
You’re correct—I’m Cynthia. Lovely to meet 
you all. I’m flattered you think so highly of me.
story_01_02000_en.lsd.story_01_02000/2401_1001_0900_10:
Thanks for helping us back there.
I really appreciate it.
story_01_02000_en.lsd.story_01_02000/2401_1001_1000_10:
You especially, [Name:PlayerNickname ]...
That was a magnificent battle.
I sense a great deal of potential in you!
story_01_02000_en.lsd.story_01_02000/2401_1001_1100_10:
If there are other Trainers like you here
competing in the PML, I’m even more
excited for things to get started.
story_01_02000_en.lsd.story_01_02000/2401_1001_1200_10:
Next time we cross paths with one another,
we should have a Pokémon battle.
story_01_02000_en.lsd.story_01_02000/2401_1001_1500_10:
Look at you, [Name:PlayerNickname ]!
You actually managed to impress THE Cynthia!
story_01_02000_en.lsd.story_01_02000/2401_1001_1600_10:
But she was right to be impressed. You were
great in battle, [Name:PlayerNickname ]!
story_01_02000_en.lsd.story_01_02000/2401_1001_1700_10:
Right, we had something we wanted to talk
to you about, Rosa.
story_01_02000_en.lsd.story_01_02000/2401_1001_1800_10:
We’re looking for people to join our team 
for the PML. What do you think?
story_01_02000_en.lsd.story_01_02000/2401_1001_1900_10:
Ahh... So that’s why you came to find me.
I’m so flattered!
story_01_02000_en.lsd.story_01_02000/2401_1001_2000_10:
But first things first.
We’ve gotta have a Pokémon battle!
story_01_02000_en.lsd.story_01_02000/2401_1001_2100_10:
A battle should teach me all I need to know
about you, [Name:PlayerNickname ]!
Show me what you’ve got!

story_01_03000_en.lsd.story_01_03000/2401_1001_0100_10:
That was impressive, [Name:PlayerNickname ]!
You’re way better than I expected!
story_01_03000_en.lsd.story_01_03000/2401_1001_0200_10:
I’d be more than happy to join your team,
if you’ll have me! 
You didn’t change your minds, did you?!
story_01_03000_en.lsd.story_01_03000/2401_0301_0300_10: Nope! Glad to have you on board!
story_01_03000_en.lsd.story_01_03000/2401_0401_0400_10:
Yay! Thank you, thank you! Oh gosh, this is
so exciting! I promise I’ll give it my all!
story_01_03000_en.lsd.story_01_03000/2401_0302_0500_10: Nah. We’ll be counting on you!
story_01_03000_en.lsd.story_01_03000/2401_0402_0600_10:
Absolutely! You can count on me for sure!
I promise I’ll give this my best shot!
story_01_03000_en.lsd.story_01_03000/2401_1001_0700_10:
Oh! Speaking of which, I should introduce
you all to my new friend, Barry!
We met here on Pasio.
story_01_03000_en.lsd.story_01_03000/2401_1001_0800_10:
OK, that sounds good.
As they say, the more the merrier!
story_01_03000_en.lsd.story_01_03000/2401_1001_1000_10:
The last time I saw him, he said he’d be
heading to the beach for a while!
story_01_03000_en.lsd.story_01_03000/2401_1001_1100_10:
I can take you there, if you want!
Come on! Let’s go, [Name:PlayerNickname ]!

story_02_01000_en.lsd.story_02_01000/2401_1001_0100_10:
This way, [Name:PlayerNickname ]!
Barry should be just up ahead!
story_02_01000_en.lsd.story_02_01000/2401_1001_0200_10: Hurry up! I want to introduce you all!
story_02_01000_en.lsd.story_02_01000/2401_1001_0300_10:
OK, OK! Hold your Horsea...
What kind of person is this Barry, anyway?
story_02_01000_en.lsd.story_02_01000/2401_1001_0400_10:
Hmm... I think I’d describe Barry as a pretty
straightforward, purehearted, “nice guy“
sort of Trainer!
story_02_01000_en.lsd.story_02_01000/2401_1001_0500_10:
He’s always so earnest and sincere—
I feel like I could learn a lot from him!
story_02_01000_en.lsd.story_02_01000/2401_1001_0600_10:
Oh, and on top of all that, he’s also a
really great Pokémon Trainer!
story_02_01000_en.lsd.story_02_01000/2401_1001_0700_10: Even Cynthia speaks highly of him!
story_02_01000_en.lsd.story_02_01000/2401_1001_0800_10:
Wow, really?
I’m looking forward to meeting this Barry now!
story_02_01000_en.lsd.story_02_01000/2401_1001_0900_10: Well, come on, then! Let’s hurry!

story_02_02000_en.lsd.story_02_02000/2401_1001_0100_10:
Hmm... I wonder what the deal is with those
weird, masked Trainers.
story_02_02000_en.lsd.story_02_02000/2401_1001_0200_10:
I’ve heard some rumors! Apparently, a bunch of
Trainers wearing masks have been running
around trying to steal people’s Pokémon!
story_02_02000_en.lsd.story_02_02000/2401_1001_0300_10:
Seriously?! It seems like I run into jerks like that
everywhere I go... Next time I’m not gonna
let them off so easily.
story_02_02000_en.lsd.story_02_02000/2401_1001_0400_10: I’ve been waiting for you guys FOREVER!
story_02_02000_en.lsd.story_02_02000/2401_1001_0500_10:
You’re those Team Break guys, aren’t you?!
Play dumb, and you’ll pay a fine!
story_02_02000_en.lsd.story_02_02000/2401_1001_0600_10:
Team Break? What’s that?
Oh! Is that you, Barry?
story_02_02000_en.lsd.story_02_02000/2401_1001_0700_10:
Wait, hold on—THIS is the guy we were 
looking for?! Why is he yelling at us?
story_02_02000_en.lsd.story_02_02000/2401_1001_0900_10:
Here we go, Piplup!
Let’s show them what we’re made of!
story_02_02000_en.lsd.story_02_02000/2401_1001_1000_10:
Eeek! It doesn’t look like we’re getting
through to him at all!
story_02_02000_en.lsd.story_02_02000/2401_1001_1100_10:
[Name:PlayerNickname ]! 
It looks like we’re gonna have to battle him!

story_02_03000_en.lsd.story_02_03000/2401_1001_0100_10:
What just happened?!
Did I really just lose to Team Break?!
story_02_03000_en.lsd.story_02_03000/2401_1001_0200_10:
Barry, listen to me!
It’s me, Rosa! Look!
story_02_03000_en.lsd.story_02_03000/2401_1001_0300_10:
Huh? Wait... Is that you, Rosa?
Hold on... So you guys aren’t Team Break?
story_02_03000_en.lsd.story_02_03000/2401_1001_0400_10:
No! Took you long enough to realize.
You nearly scared the living daylights out of us!
story_02_03000_en.lsd.story_02_03000/2401_1001_0500_10:
What?! Oh... I’m sorry about that!
Guess I jumped to the wrong conclusion.
story_02_03000_en.lsd.story_02_03000/2401_1001_0600_10:
But on the bright side, I’m glad I didn’t lose to
Team Break!
story_02_03000_en.lsd.story_02_03000/2401_1001_0700_10:
Wait, Rosa, you know who I’m talking about,
right? They’re those suspicious weirdos that
wear goofy masks!
story_02_03000_en.lsd.story_02_03000/2401_1001_0800_10:
Yeah, we just dealt with a few ourselves.
Why do you think they’re causing all this trouble?
They’re a real nuisance, if you ask me...
story_02_03000_en.lsd.story_02_03000/2401_1001_0900_10:
Oh, so they came after you, too, huh?
Man, what is their problem?!
story_02_03000_en.lsd.story_02_03000/2401_1001_1000_10:
Oh yeah! By the way, what are you guys
doing here? Did you come to take down
Team Break?
story_02_03000_en.lsd.story_02_03000/2401_1001_1100_10:
Oops, I almost forgot! We actually came here
looking for you!
story_02_03000_en.lsd.story_02_03000/2401_1001_1200_10:
[Name:PlayerNickname ], I’d like to introduce
you to my friend Barry!
story_02_03000_en.lsd.story_02_03000/2401_1001_1300_10:
He’s a famous Trainer from the Sinnoh region.
He can be a little impulsive at times...but other
than that, Barry’s a really dependable guy!
story_02_03000_en.lsd.story_02_03000/2401_1001_1400_10:
So, Barry, we’ve actually been on the lookout
for sync pairs who might want to join our team
for the PML!
story_02_03000_en.lsd.story_02_03000/2401_1001_1500_10:
What do you think? Would you be interested
in joining [Name:PlayerNickname ]’s team?!
story_02_03000_en.lsd.story_02_03000/2401_1001_1600_10:
For the PML?! I really want to,
but Team Break are still out there...
story_02_03000_en.lsd.story_02_03000/2401_1001_1700_10:
I heard there’s a spot nearby where they like to
hang out... Aww, man! Should I join up with you
or go deal with Team Break?!
story_02_03000_en.lsd.story_02_03000/2401_0401_2000_10:
I like that plan! Come on, Barry!
Let’s go take down those Team Break meanies!
story_02_03000_en.lsd.story_02_03000/2401_0401_2100_10:
Seriously?! All right! If we can take those
clowns down, I’ll join your team!
story_02_03000_en.lsd.story_02_03000/2401_0402_2300_10:
Wait, you’re gonna help me find those clowns?!
That would be great!
story_02_03000_en.lsd.story_02_03000/2401_0402_2400_10:
You know what? I think I WILL join your team.
We’re gonna be awesome together!
story_02_03000_en.lsd.story_02_03000/2401_1001_2500_10:
So like I was saying before, I heard Team Break’s
been using a cave nearby as their hideout.
story_02_03000_en.lsd.story_02_03000/2401_1001_2600_10:
Come on! I’ll race you there!
Last one to the cave’s a rotten egg!

story_02_04000_en.lsd.story_02_04000/2401_1001_0400_10:
He’s not wearing a mask! 
He might not be part of Team Break at all!
story_02_04000_en.lsd.story_02_04000/2401_1001_0600_10:
Ahh! Guess I jumped to the wrong conclusion
again... Sorry about that!
story_02_04000_en.lsd.story_02_04000/2401_1001_0700_10:
It’s all right. No harm done...
I’m Paulo.
story_02_04000_en.lsd.story_02_04000/2401_1001_0800_10:
As a Pokémon Trainer, I can’t just sit by and let
Team Break get away with what they’re doing.
I came here to crush them once and for all.
story_02_04000_en.lsd.story_02_04000/2401_1001_0900_10:
I’m here for the same thing!
This is one of their hideouts, right?
story_02_04000_en.lsd.story_02_04000/2401_1001_1000_10:
Yeah. Don’t let your guard down—
they could attack us from anywhere...
story_02_04000_en.lsd.story_02_04000/2401_1001_1100_10:
Well, look at what we got here! Didn’t think
we’d get suckers showing up on their own...
Let’s teach ’em a lesson!
story_02_04000_en.lsd.story_02_04000/2401_1001_1200_10:
There you are!
Let’s take ’em out, [Name:PlayerNickname ]!

story_02_05000_en.lsd.story_02_05000/2401_1001_0100_10:
Hey, nice battling back there.
Thanks to you guys, we were able to
chase off those goons in no time.
story_02_05000_en.lsd.story_02_05000/2401_1001_0200_10:
No sweat! [Name:PlayerNickname ] and I
came here for that exact reason anyway!
story_02_05000_en.lsd.story_02_05000/2401_1001_0300_10:
I feel way better now that we took care of
those Team Break guys.
Guess it’s time to focus on the PML!
story_02_05000_en.lsd.story_02_05000/2401_1001_0400_10: Hang on—this is your team for the PML?
story_02_05000_en.lsd.story_02_05000/2401_1001_0500_10:
Yep, that’s right!
Are you thinking about competing, too?
story_02_05000_en.lsd.story_02_05000/2401_1001_0600_10:
Hey! Why don’t you join our team, Paulo?
You seem pretty cool. I bet you’d be an
awesome teammate!
story_02_05000_en.lsd.story_02_05000/2401_1001_0700_10:
No, thanks... I think I’ll pass.
I’m actually thinking of putting together
my own team to enter the tournament.
story_02_05000_en.lsd.story_02_05000/2401_1001_0800_10:
Aww, come on!
Well...I guess if you have your own plans,
we can’t really force you.
story_02_05000_en.lsd.story_02_05000/2401_1001_0900_10:
If you’re looking for more teammates,
you might want to try the volcano area.
story_02_05000_en.lsd.story_02_05000/2401_1001_1000_10:
I hear it’s a popular spot for doing training
exercises with your Pokémon...
story_02_05000_en.lsd.story_02_05000/2401_1001_1100_10:
Seriously?! Dude, thanks for the info!
Let’s go, [Name:PlayerNickname ]!
I’m fining you if you’re late!

story_03_01000_en.lsd.story_03_01000/2401_1001_0100_10:
The place Paulo told us about should be around
here, right?
story_03_01000_en.lsd.story_03_01000/2401_1001_0200_10:
But yikes, this place is hot!
Are there really Trainers that come
here on purpose?
story_03_01000_en.lsd.story_03_01000/2401_1001_0500_10:
I guess there actually are people here...
Look over there.
story_03_01000_en.lsd.story_03_01000/2401_1001_0600_10:
Is that all you’ve got, Flannery?!
Get back up!
story_03_01000_en.lsd.story_03_01000/2401_1001_0800_10:
Hey, you guys are Trainers right?
Can we ask you a question?
story_03_01000_en.lsd.story_03_01000/2401_1001_1000_10: We’re looking for people to join our PML team!
story_03_01000_en.lsd.story_03_01000/2401_1001_1100_10:
Oh, the PML!
I see, but...
story_03_01000_en.lsd.story_03_01000/2401_1001_1200_10:
I’m training with Blaine here so I can be an
awesome Trainer like my grandpa.
story_03_01000_en.lsd.story_03_01000/2401_1001_1300_10:
I’m flattered you’d ask, but I want to focus on
getting stronger right now.
story_03_01000_en.lsd.story_03_01000/2401_1001_1400_10:
Aw, man. You’re not gonna compete?
Well...I guess we can’t force you.
story_03_01000_en.lsd.story_03_01000/2401_1001_1500_10:
I see you’ve made your way to Pasio
as well, Blaine. Didn’t think I’d see you here.
story_03_01000_en.lsd.story_03_01000/2401_1001_1600_10:
Pleasure running into you, too, Brock!
Seems like you’ve got yourself a pretty
strong team here.
story_03_01000_en.lsd.story_03_01000/2401_1001_1700_10:
Hmm... I just had a brilliant idea.
See, I’ve been thinking of moving on to
a new training area here pretty soon...
story_03_01000_en.lsd.story_03_01000/2401_1001_1800_10:
Sorry to spring this on you guys, but how
would you feel about battling Flannery here?
story_03_01000_en.lsd.story_03_01000/2401_0301_1900_10: Sure! Let’s do it right now!
story_03_01000_en.lsd.story_03_01000/2401_0401_2000_10:
Whoa, there... Pump the brakes a bit, would ya?
I didn’t mean right this second.
story_03_01000_en.lsd.story_03_01000/2401_0302_2100_10: Wait, we’re not ready to battle yet!
story_03_01000_en.lsd.story_03_01000/2401_0402_2200_10:
Whoa, there... Pump the brakes a bit!
Don’t worry. I didn’t mean right this second.
story_03_01000_en.lsd.story_03_01000/2401_1001_2300_10:
There are a lot of other sync pairs that came here
to train. A lot of hot-blooded ones, just like us.
story_03_01000_en.lsd.story_03_01000/2401_1001_2400_10:
How about you battle your way through them and
finally battle Flannery at the top of the volcano?
story_03_01000_en.lsd.story_03_01000/2401_1001_2500_10:
Wait... You want me to represent all the other
Trainers here and stand atop the volcano?
As the final Trainer to beat?!
story_03_01000_en.lsd.story_03_01000/2401_1001_2600_10: Oh gosh... That sounds like a pretty big role...
story_03_01000_en.lsd.story_03_01000/2401_1001_2700_10:
Wait, why am I hesitating?!
Blaine’s entrusting me to represent the volcano
as the strongest Trainer of us all...
story_03_01000_en.lsd.story_03_01000/2401_1001_2800_10:
I’ll show you what I’m made of!
Come see me at the top...if you can!
story_03_01000_en.lsd.story_03_01000/2401_1001_2900_10:
Well, look at that kid go...
Sorry to put all of this on you kids, but could you
do me a favor and humor her for a bit?
story_03_01000_en.lsd.story_03_01000/2401_1001_3000_10:
Don’t worry—we won’t waste your time.
You’re looking for team members, right?
I’m sure you’ll find a few great ones.
story_03_01000_en.lsd.story_03_01000/2401_1001_3100_10:
Good deal! Thanks for lookin’ out, old man!
Let’s get to it, [Name:PlayerNickname ]!

story_03_02000_en.lsd.story_03_02000/2401_1001_0100_10:
Ah, there you are. I saw the way 
you battled out there with your team. 
You’re much stronger than I imagined.
story_03_02000_en.lsd.story_03_02000/2401_1001_0200_10:
Wait, you’re that old guy from earlier!
What are you doing here?
story_03_02000_en.lsd.story_03_02000/2401_1001_0300_10:
I realized that I may not have explained 
the full situation.
story_03_02000_en.lsd.story_03_02000/2401_1001_0400_10: What do you mean, the full situation?
story_03_02000_en.lsd.story_03_02000/2401_1001_0500_10:
It’s about Flannery. She’s a good Trainer—
has a lot of passion and ambition.
story_03_02000_en.lsd.story_03_02000/2401_1001_0600_10:
The problem with her is that she gets riled up
very easily...
story_03_02000_en.lsd.story_03_02000/2401_1001_0700_10:
Now that you mention it, that girl earlier 
was getting oddly pumped up.
story_03_02000_en.lsd.story_03_02000/2401_1001_0800_10:
You know that the battles on Pasio are all
team battles. I want her to learn to not get
ahead of herself and to depend on others.
story_03_02000_en.lsd.story_03_02000/2401_1001_0900_10: That’s why I suggested that she battle your team.
story_03_02000_en.lsd.story_03_02000/2401_1001_1000_10: I see. If that’s the case, leave it to us!
story_03_02000_en.lsd.story_03_02000/2401_1001_1100_10:
I appreciate it.
I really owe you one.
story_03_02000_en.lsd.story_03_02000/2401_1001_1200_10:
Flannery should be up ahead.
I’ll be watching your battle from the shadows!
story_03_02000_en.lsd.story_03_02000/2401_1001_1300_10:
Despite what he says, Blaine must 
be worried about Flannery.
story_03_02000_en.lsd.story_03_02000/2401_1001_1400_10:
All right!
Let’s hurry to the top!
story_03_02000_en.lsd.story_03_02000/2401_1001_1600_10:
Errr... I mean...
You’ve done well to make it this far!
story_03_02000_en.lsd.story_03_02000/2401_1001_1700_10:
If you’re here, that means you were 
able to win all your battles to get here!
You must be pretty good!
story_03_02000_en.lsd.story_03_02000/2401_1001_1800_10:
For my honor as a Gym Leader and as the
granddaughter of an Elite Four member...and to 
bring honor to Blaine, who trained with me...
story_03_02000_en.lsd.story_03_02000/2401_1001_1900_10: I’ll show you my hottest moves!

story_03_04000_en.lsd.story_03_04000/2401_1001_0100_10:
Whew... I haven’t had a heated battle like that
in ages! And your teamwork! That was awesome!
story_03_04000_en.lsd.story_03_04000/2401_1001_0200_10: Exactly! You did well to notice, Flannery!
story_03_04000_en.lsd.story_03_04000/2401_1001_0300_10: B-Blaine?! How long were you watching us?
story_03_04000_en.lsd.story_03_04000/2401_1001_0400_10:
You are indeed a powerful Trainer, Flannery.
But your eagerness as a Gym Leader has given
you tunnel vision!
story_03_04000_en.lsd.story_03_04000/2401_1001_0500_10:
What you need right now are friends that you
can trust and depend on!
story_03_04000_en.lsd.story_03_04000/2401_1001_0700_10:
That’s right—friends!
So here’s your final challenge, Flannery.
story_03_04000_en.lsd.story_03_04000/2401_1001_0800_10:
Join [Name:PlayerNickname ]’s team,
and make your way to the PML!
story_03_04000_en.lsd.story_03_04000/2401_1001_1000_10:
Travel with friends, have fun, battle with them,
and try to reflect on the choices you’ve made.
I’m certain you’ll grow a lot as you go!
story_03_04000_en.lsd.story_03_04000/2401_1001_1100_10:
We’d be more than glad to have you on our
team, Flannery. What do you say?
story_03_04000_en.lsd.story_03_04000/2401_1001_1200_10:
Thanks. I think you’re right, Blaine...
I’ll do it!
story_03_04000_en.lsd.story_03_04000/2401_1001_1300_10: That’s what I wanted to hear!
story_03_04000_en.lsd.story_03_04000/2401_1001_1400_10:
[Name:PlayerNickname ], let me on your team!
Let’s make it to the PML together!
story_03_04000_en.lsd.story_03_04000/2401_0402_1800_10:
I recognize that “hah“!
I’m looking forward to working with you guys!
story_03_04000_en.lsd.story_03_04000/2401_1001_1900_10:
Make sure she doesn’t get into too much
trouble, all right, [Name:PlayerNickname ]?
I’m off to form my own team for the PML!
story_03_04000_en.lsd.story_03_04000/2401_1001_2100_10:
Hehe. I never said it out loud, Flannery, but I’ve
been itching to battle you with these new rules!
story_03_04000_en.lsd.story_03_04000/2401_1001_2200_10: My Trainer’s spirit has long been ignited! Hahaha!
story_03_04000_en.lsd.story_03_04000/2401_1001_2300_10:
All right, if that’s the game you’re playing,
I want in! The next time we see each other,
I’m not holding anything back!
story_03_04000_en.lsd.story_03_04000/2401_1001_2400_10:
Let’s get moving, [Name:PlayerNickname ]!
How many badges do you have so far?
story_03_04000_en.lsd.story_03_04000/2401_0401_2600_10:
Oh, right. Badges.
This might be a good time to start collecting them.
story_03_04000_en.lsd.story_03_04000/2401_0302_2700_10: I don’t think I have any.
story_03_04000_en.lsd.story_03_04000/2401_0402_2800_10:
Oh, right. Badges.
This might be a good time to start collecting them.
story_03_04000_en.lsd.story_03_04000/2401_1001_2900_10:
We need to collect five badges to officially
compete in the PML.
story_03_04000_en.lsd.story_03_04000/2401_1001_3000_10: And each badge is held by a PML Leader.
story_03_04000_en.lsd.story_03_04000/2401_1001_3100_10: Do you know who any of these leaders might be?
story_03_04000_en.lsd.story_03_04000/2401_1001_3300_10:
A Gym Leader friend of mine from Kanto, Erika,
might’ve said something about being a PML Leader.
story_03_04000_en.lsd.story_03_04000/2401_1001_3400_10:
Then we don’t have any time to lose!
Thanks for everything, Blaine! I’m looking forward
to battling you the next time we see each other!

story_04_01000_en.lsd.story_04_01000/2401_1001_0100_10:
Let’s get going. The forest should be just up
ahead of this road, and Erika should be
somewhere in the forest.
story_04_01000_en.lsd.story_04_01000/2401_1001_0200_10:
According to the rules, we need to collect
five badges from PML Leaders to compete
in the tournament matches, right?
story_04_01000_en.lsd.story_04_01000/2401_1001_0300_10:
Right.
How are we supposed to get the badges, though?
story_04_01000_en.lsd.story_04_01000/2401_1001_0400_10:
From what I hear, we have to prove that we’re
worthy to each of the leaders.
story_04_01000_en.lsd.story_04_01000/2401_1001_0500_10: OK... Well, how do we do that?
story_04_01000_en.lsd.story_04_01000/2401_1001_0600_10:
Standing around here isn’t gonna give us the
answer to that. Come on. Let’s find Erika and
ask her ourselves!

story_04_02000_en.lsd.story_04_02000/2401_1001_0100_10:
Man, there sure are a lot of female Trainers
around here.
story_04_02000_en.lsd.story_04_02000/2401_1001_0300_10:
You weren’t kidding...
I wonder what they’re all doing here.
story_04_02000_en.lsd.story_04_02000/2401_1001_0400_10:
Well, a lot of girls really idolize Erika...
Maybe they’ve all sort of gravitated here
in hopes of getting close to her.
story_04_02000_en.lsd.story_04_02000/2401_1001_0500_10:
Although, this may be taking that admiration
a little too far... I heard that some of the girls
even act like her personal bodyguards.
story_04_02000_en.lsd.story_04_02000/2401_1001_0600_10: You there! Especially you in the orange!
story_04_02000_en.lsd.story_04_02000/2401_1001_0700_10: Uh... Is she talking to me?
story_04_02000_en.lsd.story_04_02000/2401_1001_0800_10:
Who else would I be talking to?
You’re here to challenge Lady Erika, aren’t you!
story_04_02000_en.lsd.story_04_02000/2401_1001_0900_10: You know Erika?! Could you tell us where—
story_04_02000_en.lsd.story_04_02000/2401_1001_1000_10:
Excuse me! That’s “Lady Erika“ to you!
How dare you address her so rudely?
Where are your manners?
story_04_02000_en.lsd.story_04_02000/2401_1001_1100_10:
Ever since Lady Erika became a PML Leader,
cretins like you have been gathering around her
in swarms...
story_04_02000_en.lsd.story_04_02000/2401_1001_1200_10:
I won’t allow such rude citizens to bother her!
Go away, or I’ll be forced to drive you off myself!

story_04_03000_en.lsd.story_04_03000/2401_1001_0100_10:
I can’t believe I lost to filth like you...
This...this is mortifying!
story_04_03000_en.lsd.story_04_03000/2401_1001_0200_10:
All right, will you just calm down a second
and hear us out? Misty and I are actually
friends of Erika’s.
story_04_03000_en.lsd.story_04_03000/2401_1001_0300_10:
It’s true. We need to collect badges in order
to compete in the PML, and we heard that
we could get one from Erika.
