story_04_03000_en.lsd.story_04_03000/2401_1001_0400_10:
Wait...you guys are friends of Lady Erika’s?
Oh no... Now I feel like a complete idiot.
story_04_03000_en.lsd.story_04_03000/2401_1001_0500_10:
Well, you didn’t really give us a chance to explain.
Anyway, as long as we’re all clear now...
story_04_03000_en.lsd.story_04_03000/2401_1001_0600_10:
I’m still not happy I lost to you all...
but I suppose I owe you an apology.
story_04_03000_en.lsd.story_04_03000/2401_1001_0700_10:
It’s fine! Don’t worry about it.
It’s really no big deal.
story_04_03000_en.lsd.story_04_03000/2401_1001_0800_10:
Lady Erika really does have 
the loveliest friends... Thank you. 
Forgive my behavior a moment ago.
story_04_03000_en.lsd.story_04_03000/2401_1001_0900_10:
If you’d like to speak with Lady Erika,
she’s just up ahead, a bit deeper into
the forest.
story_04_03000_en.lsd.story_04_03000/2401_1001_1000_10:
Great! Thanks for the info!
Ready to go, everyone?

story_04_04000_en.lsd.story_04_04000/2401_1001_0200_10:
[Name:PlayerNickname ], meet Erika.
Erika, meet... Erika...? Are you asleep?
story_04_04000_en.lsd.story_04_04000/2401_1001_0300_10:
Oh... Oh dear!
I drifted off again, didn’t I.
story_04_04000_en.lsd.story_04_04000/2401_1001_0400_10:
Brock? Is that you? What a pleasant surprise.
And...who might this be?
story_04_04000_en.lsd.story_04_04000/2401_1001_0500_10:
This is [Name:PlayerNickname ]. We formed a
team together to compete in the PML.
story_04_04000_en.lsd.story_04_04000/2401_1001_0600_10:
Really? Well, isn’t that delightful.
I suppose you came for a badge, then?
story_04_04000_en.lsd.story_04_04000/2401_1001_0700_10:
You guessed it. Uh, what exactly do we
have to do to get our hands on one of
these badges, anyway?
story_04_04000_en.lsd.story_04_04000/2401_1001_0800_10:
Well, first things first—we go head-to-head
in a Pokémon battle.
story_04_04000_en.lsd.story_04_04000/2401_0302_1100_10: Are you sure you aren’t too tired?
story_04_04000_en.lsd.story_04_04000/2401_0402_1200_10:
Tee-hee! That’s very kind of you,
but I assure you, I’m quite prepared.
story_04_04000_en.lsd.story_04_04000/2401_1001_1300_10: I’m not going to go easy on you!

story_04_05000_en.lsd.story_04_05000/2401_1001_0100_10:
Well, well!
What a wonderful battle.
story_04_05000_en.lsd.story_04_05000/2401_1001_0200_10:
You’re like a hardy root, spreading deep into
the soil to connect your teammates to
one another...
story_04_05000_en.lsd.story_04_05000/2401_1001_0300_10:
But I also see a calm, quiet oak within you,
standing tall... A kind heart that cares for
those around you.
story_04_05000_en.lsd.story_04_05000/2401_1001_0400_10:
I see all of these things when I look at you,
[Name:PlayerNickname ]. So it’s with great
joy that I now present you with this.
story_04_05000_en.lsd.story_04_05000/2401_1001_0500_10:
We did it!
We got our first badge!
story_04_05000_en.lsd.story_04_05000/2401_1001_0600_10:
One more thing...
Would it be all right if I asked you 
one small favor?
story_04_05000_en.lsd.story_04_05000/2401_1001_0700_10: What kind of favor are we talking about?
story_04_05000_en.lsd.story_04_05000/2401_1001_0800_10:
Well, I was wondering if it would be
all right if I joined your team.
story_04_05000_en.lsd.story_04_05000/2401_1001_1000_10:
[Name:PlayerNickname ], you are going to
bloom into a beautiful flower as this competition
goes on. I’d love to be there to see it firsthand.
story_04_05000_en.lsd.story_04_05000/2401_1001_1100_10:
Well, that’s pretty flattering and all...
but wouldn’t it be weird for a PML Leader
to join a team?
story_04_05000_en.lsd.story_04_05000/2401_1001_1200_10:
Not at all. I’ve been told that I’m free to
participate in any way I like.
story_04_05000_en.lsd.story_04_05000/2401_1001_1300_10:
In fact, I believe there are a fair number 
of other PML Leaders in charge of 
the same badge that I’ve just given you.
story_04_05000_en.lsd.story_04_05000/2401_1001_1400_10:
Huh, I see... Guess I have no objection, then.
What do you think, [Name:PlayerNickname ]?
story_04_05000_en.lsd.story_04_05000/2401_0301_1500_10: Of course! Welcome to the team!
story_04_05000_en.lsd.story_04_05000/2401_0401_1600_10:
Thank you so much!
I look forward to competing together soon.
story_04_05000_en.lsd.story_04_05000/2401_0302_1700_10:
Let’s see what sort of flower 
we bloom into together!
story_04_05000_en.lsd.story_04_05000/2401_0402_1800_10:
Of course! I look forward to being there
when it happens.
story_04_05000_en.lsd.story_04_05000/2401_1001_1900_10: Right! Time to hunt for the next badge, then!
story_04_05000_en.lsd.story_04_05000/2401_1001_2000_10:
Oh! I think I might actually know another
one of the PML Leaders!
story_04_05000_en.lsd.story_04_05000/2401_1001_2100_10:
She’s from the Unova region, like me—
a Gym Leader who uses Flying-type Pokémon!

story_05_01000_en.lsd.story_05_01000/2401_1001_0100_10:
According to Rosa, there should be a PML Leader
somewhere on this mountain...
story_05_01000_en.lsd.story_05_01000/2401_1001_0200_10:
Yep! Her name’s Skyla. She’s a Gym Leader
back in Unova.
story_05_01000_en.lsd.story_05_01000/2401_1001_0300_10:
She’s super strong, so let’s make sure
we bring our A game!
story_05_01000_en.lsd.story_05_01000/2401_0301_0400_10: I can’t wait to meet her!
story_05_01000_en.lsd.story_05_01000/2401_0401_0500_10:
Tee-hee! Hearing she’s strong didn’t even make
you flinch, did it, [Name:PlayerNickname ]!
story_05_01000_en.lsd.story_05_01000/2401_0302_0600_10: I wonder what her battle style is like.
story_05_01000_en.lsd.story_05_01000/2401_0402_0700_10:
Tee-hee! Your mind is always on Pokémon
battling, isn’t it, [Name:PlayerNickname ]!
story_05_01000_en.lsd.story_05_01000/2401_1001_0800_10:
I look forward to meeting her as well.
I wonder what she’s like...
story_05_01000_en.lsd.story_05_01000/2401_1001_0900_10:
I’m sure we’ll all be fast friends!
She’s super friendly!

story_05_02000_en.lsd.story_05_02000/2401_1001_0100_10:
What do you know—another win for me.
Now, hand over that badge.
story_05_02000_en.lsd.story_05_02000/2401_1001_0200_10:
Sure, here you go!
Thanks for that battle! I think I got a bit stronger!
story_05_02000_en.lsd.story_05_02000/2401_1001_0300_10:
Nice job out there, Swanna!
Good hustle!
story_05_02000_en.lsd.story_05_02000/2401_1001_0400_10:
How can you praise your Pokémon after a
crushing defeat like that?! Pokémon aren’t
friends—they’re tools. No wonder you lost.
story_05_02000_en.lsd.story_05_02000/2401_1001_0500_10:
Hey, look! There she is! Skylaaa!
...Huh? What’s going on over there?
story_05_02000_en.lsd.story_05_02000/2401_1001_0600_10:
Winning is all that matters! How can you just
smile and accept defeat like that?!
You should feel terrible!
story_05_02000_en.lsd.story_05_02000/2401_1001_0700_10:
Terrible? But I don’t feel terrible at all!
Swanna and I had a lot of fun!
story_05_02000_en.lsd.story_05_02000/2401_1001_0800_10:
Skyla! Are you OK?!
What’s going on?
story_05_02000_en.lsd.story_05_02000/2401_1001_0900_10:
Oh my gosh! Rosa! How’ve you been? I haven’t
seen you in ages! And you guys... Wait, I don’t
think I’ve met you yet.
story_05_02000_en.lsd.story_05_02000/2401_1001_1100_10:
Why must the universe conspire to irritate me...
What are you doing here?
story_05_02000_en.lsd.story_05_02000/2401_1001_1200_10:
Don’t tell me you amateurs are trying to
enter the Pokémon Masters League...
story_05_02000_en.lsd.story_05_02000/2401_0401_1400_10:
You can’t be serious... Of all the ridiculous,
insolent, pathetic—! I knew you’d be
a pain the moment I saw that hat of yours...
story_05_02000_en.lsd.story_05_02000/2401_0302_1500_10: You got a problem with that?
story_05_02000_en.lsd.story_05_02000/2401_0402_1600_10:
Excuse me?! Of all the ridiculous, insolent,
pathetic—! I knew you’d be a pain in the neck
the moment I saw that hat of yours...
story_05_02000_en.lsd.story_05_02000/2401_1001_1800_10:
Never mind that... It doesn’t matter anyway.
I shall crush you under my heel here and now!
story_05_02000_en.lsd.story_05_02000/2401_1001_1900_10:
A one-on-one battle, just you and me.
None of you interfere!
story_05_02000_en.lsd.story_05_02000/2401_1001_2000_10:
I shall teach you a lesson even
a fool like you will remember.
story_05_02000_en.lsd.story_05_02000/2401_1001_2100_10:
What’s wrong? Is that all you’ve got?
I didn’t even get to enjoy myself!
story_05_02000_en.lsd.story_05_02000/2401_1001_2200_10:
Bow before the victor, amateur...
And don’t forget, I always win!
story_05_02000_en.lsd.story_05_02000/2401_1001_2300_10:
Bwahaha! See? I win, you lose,
and all is right in the universe.
story_05_02000_en.lsd.story_05_02000/2401_1001_2400_10: Well done as always, young master.
story_05_02000_en.lsd.story_05_02000/2401_1001_2600_10:
Obviously failure begets failure...
You amateurs belong together!
We’re done here. Let’s go.
story_05_02000_en.lsd.story_05_02000/2401_1001_2900_10:
You said your name’s [Name:PlayerNickname ],
right? That battle was great!
story_05_02000_en.lsd.story_05_02000/2401_1001_3000_10:
You and your Pokémon were so earnest
and straightforward!
story_05_02000_en.lsd.story_05_02000/2401_1001_3100_10:
It doesn’t matter whether you win or lose!
Being able to have friendly Pokémon battles
is the best!
story_05_02000_en.lsd.story_05_02000/2401_1001_3200_10: I couldn’t agree with you more, Skyla.
story_05_02000_en.lsd.story_05_02000/2401_1001_3300_10:
You know...while we’re on that subject...
We were actually hoping we could get a
badge from you today, too.
story_05_02000_en.lsd.story_05_02000/2401_1001_3400_10:
Oh, I see! Well, my favorite place is nearby.
Why don’t we go there and take a break first?
story_05_02000_en.lsd.story_05_02000/2401_1001_3500_10:
Good idea! You and [Name:PlayerNickname ]
must be exhausted after battling that jerk, Lear!

story_05_04000_en.lsd.story_05_04000/2401_1001_0100_10:
Oh, wow! Check out that sky!
This place is great, Skyla!
story_05_04000_en.lsd.story_05_04000/2401_1001_0200_10: I’m glad you like it, too!
story_05_04000_en.lsd.story_05_04000/2401_1001_0300_10:
Did you and your Pokémon get a good enough
chance to rest?
story_05_04000_en.lsd.story_05_04000/2401_1001_0400_10: Well then, why don’t we have a little bit of fun?
story_05_04000_en.lsd.story_05_04000/2401_0401_0600_10: Oh, you know what I’m talking about.
story_05_04000_en.lsd.story_05_04000/2401_1001_0900_10: I think we need a fun battle to pick our spirits up!

story_05_05000_en.lsd.story_05_05000/2401_1001_0100_10:
What a great battle! I’m so glad I had the chance
to battle you!
story_05_05000_en.lsd.story_05_05000/2401_1001_0200_10:
My Pokémon and I are super satisfied we were
able to really spread our wings!
story_05_05000_en.lsd.story_05_05000/2401_1001_0300_10:
Not to mention, I could tell that you were enjoying
battling alongside your Pokémon and friends.
story_05_05000_en.lsd.story_05_05000/2401_0301_0400_10: Good match! That was really fun!
story_05_05000_en.lsd.story_05_05000/2401_1001_0800_10:
Oh, that’s right! This belongs to you now.
You’ve earned it!
story_05_05000_en.lsd.story_05_05000/2401_1001_0900_10:
You did it, [Name:PlayerNickname ]!
We’ve got our second badge!
story_05_05000_en.lsd.story_05_05000/2401_1001_1000_10:
You know what? I decided.
I’m going to join your team!
story_05_05000_en.lsd.story_05_05000/2401_0401_1200_10:
If I go along with you guys, I think we’ll be
able to have tons of fun adventures!
story_05_05000_en.lsd.story_05_05000/2401_0402_1400_10:
If I go along with you guys, I think we’ll be
able to have tons of fun adventures!
story_05_05000_en.lsd.story_05_05000/2401_1001_1500_10:
All right, then! Make sure your seat belt is secure,
your seat is upright, and your tray table is stowed.
We’re taking off to the next badge!

story_06_01000_en.lsd.story_06_01000/2401_1001_0100_10:
All right! Everybody ready for takeoff?
We’ve gotta go find the PML Leaders in
charge of the remaining badges!
story_06_01000_en.lsd.story_06_01000/2401_1001_0300_10:
Are you OK, Rosa?
Why the long face all of a sudden?
story_06_01000_en.lsd.story_06_01000/2401_1001_0400_10:
I’m fine! I just can’t stop thinking about that
jerk, Lear, from before...
story_06_01000_en.lsd.story_06_01000/2401_1001_0500_10:
It’s wrong the way he treats Pokémon like tools,
and I don’t agree with the way he thinks,
but the fact is...he’s still really strong.
story_06_01000_en.lsd.story_06_01000/2401_1001_0600_10:
And I bet there’ll be others just as strong as
he is when we get to the tournament matches...
story_06_01000_en.lsd.story_06_01000/2401_0301_0700_10: Then we’ve gotta get stronger, too!
story_06_01000_en.lsd.story_06_01000/2401_0401_0800_10:
You’re right, [Name:PlayerNickname ]!
I was just thinking the same thing.
story_06_01000_en.lsd.story_06_01000/2401_0302_0900_10: Then we need to train even harder!
story_06_01000_en.lsd.story_06_01000/2401_0402_1000_10:
You’re right, [Name:PlayerNickname ]!
I was just thinking the same thing.
story_06_01000_en.lsd.story_06_01000/2401_1001_1100_10:
Aha! In other words, you want to see if we
can power up our team around here in the
meantime, right?
story_06_01000_en.lsd.story_06_01000/2401_1001_1200_10:
If that’s the case, why don’t we go pay the
Evolution fighter a visit!
story_06_01000_en.lsd.story_06_01000/2401_1001_1400_10:
Supposedly she’s a pretty amazing Trainer.
I’ve heard whispers of her skill in the wind
more than a few times!
story_06_01000_en.lsd.story_06_01000/2401_1001_1500_10:
She trains with her Pokémon nonstop,
and I hear that sync pairs who train with
her all end up getting a lot stronger!
story_06_01000_en.lsd.story_06_01000/2401_1001_1600_10:
Whoa! This girl sounds incredible!
You sure convinced me!
story_06_01000_en.lsd.story_06_01000/2401_1001_1700_10:
C’mon, [Name:PlayerNickname ]!
Let’s go find this Evolution fighter!
story_06_01000_en.lsd.story_06_01000/2401_0401_1900_10:
Yes! I love that enthusiasm!
I’ll be right behind you, friend!
story_06_01000_en.lsd.story_06_01000/2401_0402_2100_10:
Yeah! If we raise our team’s strength now,
we can rise through the ranks in no time
once the tournament begins!
story_06_01000_en.lsd.story_06_01000/2401_1001_2200_10:
OK! Let’s take a break from collecting
badges for a little while, then!
story_06_01000_en.lsd.story_06_01000/2401_1001_2300_10:
Come on! Off to the Evolution fighter we go!
It’s time for takeoff!

story_06_02000_en.lsd.story_06_02000/2401_1001_0100_10: Is this the right place, Skyla?
story_06_02000_en.lsd.story_06_02000/2401_1001_0200_10:
Yep! At least, this is where I heard 
she does her training, anyway...
story_06_02000_en.lsd.story_06_02000/2401_1001_0300_10:
Lucario!
Give me a Low Sweep!
story_06_02000_en.lsd.story_06_02000/2401_1001_0400_10:
Ooh! That Trainer over there looks like
she’s doing exercises with a Lucario!
story_06_02000_en.lsd.story_06_02000/2401_1001_0500_10:
Do you think she could be the Evolution fighter
you’ve been hearing about?!
story_06_02000_en.lsd.story_06_02000/2401_1001_0600_10:
Definitely! I heard the Evolution fighter is a
great skater as well, so that’s gotta be her.
story_06_02000_en.lsd.story_06_02000/2401_1001_0700_10:
Wow, I never imagined the Evolution fighter
would be a girl around my age!
story_06_02000_en.lsd.story_06_02000/2401_1001_0800_10: Huh? What brings all of you here?
story_06_02000_en.lsd.story_06_02000/2401_1001_0900_10: My name’s Rosa! Nice to meet you!
story_06_02000_en.lsd.story_06_02000/2401_1001_1000_10:
Right back at you! I’m Korrina, the Gym Leader
of Shalour City back in the Kalos region.
What can I do for you?
story_06_02000_en.lsd.story_06_02000/2401_1001_1100_10:
Well, we heard that Trainers who come and
train with you end up becoming really strong,
and we reeeally want to get stronger!
story_06_02000_en.lsd.story_06_02000/2401_1001_1200_10:
Is that so! Well, I can definitely relate...
I’d like to grow stronger myself.
story_06_02000_en.lsd.story_06_02000/2401_1001_1300_10:
Hm? Lucario seems to be really curious
about all of you...
story_06_02000_en.lsd.story_06_02000/2401_1001_1400_10:
Well, you seem like a group of interesting
sync pairs, in any case! What have I got to lose?
Sure! Let’s train together!
story_06_02000_en.lsd.story_06_02000/2401_1001_1600_10:
Yeah! Come on!
Let’s head to the training grounds right now!
story_06_02000_en.lsd.story_06_02000/2401_1001_1700_10:
Just so you know, we might run into other
eager sync pairs along the way. There’s a
chance they could challenge us to a battle!
story_06_02000_en.lsd.story_06_02000/2401_1001_1800_10:
Just make sure you stick with me and
don’t fall too far behind, OK?

story_06_03000_en.lsd.story_06_03000/2401_1001_0100_10:
Keep it up, everyone!
We’re almost to the training ground!
story_06_03000_en.lsd.story_06_03000/2401_1001_0200_10:
I wonder what sort of training Korrina
is gonna have us do...
story_06_03000_en.lsd.story_06_03000/2401_1001_0300_10:
Hey there, Korrina!
You’ve gathered quite the crowd today.
story_06_03000_en.lsd.story_06_03000/2401_1001_0400_10:
Oh! Hi, Brendan!
I didn’t know you’d be here today!
story_06_03000_en.lsd.story_06_03000/2401_1001_0500_10:
Everyone, this is my friend Brendan!
Brendan, everyone!
story_06_03000_en.lsd.story_06_03000/2401_1001_0600_10:
Nice to meet you. Name’s Brendan.
I’m a Pokémon Trainer from the Hoenn region.
story_06_03000_en.lsd.story_06_03000/2401_1001_0700_10:
So, if all of you are here with Korrina,
that must mean...
story_06_03000_en.lsd.story_06_03000/2401_1001_0800_10: Yep! We’re about to do some training together!
story_06_03000_en.lsd.story_06_03000/2401_1001_0900_10:
Nice! Do you mind if I join you?
I’ve been wanting to do some training myself!
story_06_03000_en.lsd.story_06_03000/2401_1001_1000_10:
Haha, I should have known.
Of course you can, Brendan!
story_06_03000_en.lsd.story_06_03000/2401_1001_1100_10:
Come on, [Name:PlayerNickname ]! Let’s go!
Everyone’s waiting for us just up ahead!

story_06_04000_en.lsd.story_06_04000/2401_1001_0100_10:
We’re here, everyone!
This is where I do all of my training.
story_06_04000_en.lsd.story_06_04000/2401_1001_0200_10:
A bunch of my Trainer friends like to
hang out around here, too!
story_06_04000_en.lsd.story_06_04000/2401_1001_0300_10:
We finally made it...
Better take a deep breath.
This seems like it could get pretty intense!
story_06_04000_en.lsd.story_06_04000/2401_1001_0400_10:
Don’t worry about it so much!
The most important thing is to have fun.

story_06_05000_en.lsd.story_06_05000/2401_1001_0100_10: So? How do you think they did, Lucario?
story_06_05000_en.lsd.story_06_05000/2401_1001_0200_10:
Yeah, I think so, too!
Lucario seems to have taken a liking to you all.
story_06_05000_en.lsd.story_06_05000/2401_1001_0400_10:
Yeah! Lucario has the ability to sense
the auras that surround people.
story_06_05000_en.lsd.story_06_05000/2401_1001_0500_10:
He must have sensed how tightly bonded
you all are with your Pokémon!
story_06_05000_en.lsd.story_06_05000/2401_1001_0600_10:
In fact, I was able to pick up on the same
thing pretty clearly while I was watching
you guys train.
story_06_05000_en.lsd.story_06_05000/2401_1001_0700_10:
And not just the bonds you have with your
Pokémon, but also the bonds you have with
each other as a team!
story_06_05000_en.lsd.story_06_05000/2401_1001_0800_10:
Be confident! The tighter your bonds get,
the stronger you’ll become!
story_06_05000_en.lsd.story_06_05000/2401_1001_0900_10:
Our bonds... You’re right!
All of us have bonds that connect us.
story_06_05000_en.lsd.story_06_05000/2401_1001_1000_10:
Bonds with our Pokémon and bonds
with our friends and teammates!
story_06_05000_en.lsd.story_06_05000/2401_1001_1100_10:
If we put all of our effort into strengthening
those bonds, I’m sure we’ll be able to defeat
Trainers like Lear!
story_06_05000_en.lsd.story_06_05000/2401_0401_1300_10:
All right! I’m starting to see a little bit of
that confidence shine through!
story_06_05000_en.lsd.story_06_05000/2401_0402_1500_10:
Like I said, confidence is key! Looks like you’re
finally starting to see the possibilities, though.
story_06_05000_en.lsd.story_06_05000/2401_1001_1600_10:
All right! What do you say we finish this
training session with a battle!
story_06_05000_en.lsd.story_06_05000/2401_1001_1800_10:
It’s go time...
Let’s give it all we’ve got!

story_06_06000_en.lsd.story_06_06000/2401_1001_0100_10:
You beat me!
That was a ton of fun, though.
story_06_06000_en.lsd.story_06_06000/2401_1001_0200_10:
This just proves that the bond you and
your Pokémon share really is second to none!
story_06_06000_en.lsd.story_06_06000/2401_1001_0300_10:
Thanks, Korrina! Thanks, Brendan!
Thanks to you guys, I feel more confident.
story_06_06000_en.lsd.story_06_06000/2401_1001_0400_10:
I think we can get back to focusing on
collecting badges now.
story_06_06000_en.lsd.story_06_06000/2401_1001_0500_10: Oh? Were you guys collecting badges?
story_06_06000_en.lsd.story_06_06000/2401_1001_0600_10:
If that’s what you’re up to, I know a PML Leader
I can introduce you to!
story_06_06000_en.lsd.story_06_06000/2401_1001_0800_10:
Hey, can I come with you, too?
You seem like a fun team to be around.
story_06_06000_en.lsd.story_06_06000/2401_0401_1100_10:
Awesome! Now we’ll be able to battle
each other whenever we want!
story_06_06000_en.lsd.story_06_06000/2401_0302_1200_10: Sure! I hope to learn more from you!
story_06_06000_en.lsd.story_06_06000/2401_0402_1300_10:
All right! If you ever want to learn any
roller-skating tricks, like my rolling axe-kick,
I’m your girl!
story_06_06000_en.lsd.story_06_06000/2401_1001_1400_10:
Bigger! Stronger!
More energy! More fun!
story_06_06000_en.lsd.story_06_06000/2401_1001_1500_10: I look forward to our new adventures together!

story_07_01000_en.lsd.story_07_01000/2401_1001_0100_10:
This weather is beautiful!
It’s a perfect day for a Pokémon battle.
story_07_01000_en.lsd.story_07_01000/2401_1001_0200_10:
Hey, Brendan? Didn’t you say you were
gonna introduce us to a PML Leader?
Who is it? Tell us!
story_07_01000_en.lsd.story_07_01000/2401_1001_0300_10: Oh, yeah! I guess I should fill you in.
story_07_01000_en.lsd.story_07_01000/2401_1001_0400_10:
We’re going to go meet Norman, a Gym Leader
from the Hoenn region.
story_07_01000_en.lsd.story_07_01000/2401_1001_0700_10:
Do I know him? He’s another Gym Leader from
the same region as me, and he’s Brendan’s dad!
story_07_01000_en.lsd.story_07_01000/2401_0401_0900_10:
Yup. Guess I forgot to mention that part! He’s a
really strong Trainer, so we gotta get focused.
story_07_01000_en.lsd.story_07_01000/2401_0402_1200_10: Yeah, I can hardly wait, either!
story_07_01000_en.lsd.story_07_01000/2401_1001_1300_10:
A man in pursuit of power... It should come as
no surprise that someone like him would be
chosen to be a PML Leader.
story_07_01000_en.lsd.story_07_01000/2401_1001_1400_10:
Heh. I gotta admit, it makes me happy to hear
you talk about my dad like that.
story_07_01000_en.lsd.story_07_01000/2401_1001_1500_10: Come on. I’ll take you guys to him!

story_07_02000_en.lsd.story_07_02000/2401_1001_0100_10:
Brendan, are we there yet?
When are we gonna meet Norman?
story_07_02000_en.lsd.story_07_02000/2401_1001_0200_10:
There’s still a ways to go. Dad always says that
the journey’s part of the training—that’s why he
set up camp way out in the mountains.
story_07_02000_en.lsd.story_07_02000/2401_1001_0300_10: And that has proven very useful to us!
story_07_02000_en.lsd.story_07_02000/2401_1001_0600_10:
That mask... I know all about you!
You’re those nasty Team Break guys who’ve 
been trying to steal people’s Pokémon!
story_07_02000_en.lsd.story_07_02000/2401_1001_0700_10:
Ha! If you already know, then I guess I don’t
have to explain what comes next.
story_07_02000_en.lsd.story_07_02000/2401_1001_0800_10: I’ll be taking your Pokémon off your hands!

story_07_03000_en.lsd.story_07_03000/2401_1001_0100_10:
You gotta admit, one thing those Team Break
guys can do well is run away.
story_07_03000_en.lsd.story_07_03000/2401_1001_0200_10:
Hey... Lucario still senses a bunch of those
masked thugs nearby.
story_07_03000_en.lsd.story_07_03000/2401_0301_0300_10: We should hurry and find Norman!
story_07_03000_en.lsd.story_07_03000/2401_0401_0400_10:
I think so, too!
Who knows what could jump out at us next!
story_07_03000_en.lsd.story_07_03000/2401_0402_0600_10: No, it’s not! We should hurry and find Norman!
story_07_03000_en.lsd.story_07_03000/2401_1001_0700_10:
Let’s get up this
mountain quick, [Name:PlayerNickname ]!

story_07_04000_en.lsd.story_07_04000/2401_1001_0100_10:
Argh! I couldn’t beat you...
Guess I’m still not good enough...
story_07_04000_en.lsd.story_07_04000/2401_1001_0200_10:
Don’t be too hard on yourself. It’s been a long
time since someone pushed me like that
in battle. Believe in yourself.
story_07_04000_en.lsd.story_07_04000/2401_1001_0500_10:
Is that you, Brendan?
What brings you all the way out here?
story_07_04000_en.lsd.story_07_04000/2401_1001_0600_10:
[Name:PlayerNickname ]! I’m guessing you
came here for the same reason I did.
story_07_04000_en.lsd.story_07_04000/2401_1001_0700_10: Oh, I’m so relieved. Looks like you guys are fine.
story_07_04000_en.lsd.story_07_04000/2401_1001_0900_10:
Oh, it’s nothing—as long as you’re safe. More
importantly, I’ve brought you another challenger.
story_07_04000_en.lsd.story_07_04000/2401_1001_1100_10:
Nice to meet you. I’m Norman. I’m Brendan’s
dad and currently a PML Leader.
story_07_04000_en.lsd.story_07_04000/2401_1001_1200_10:
I like that look in your eyes. We just might be
able to have as wonderful a battle as I had
with Paulo!
story_07_04000_en.lsd.story_07_04000/2401_1001_1300_10:
Go for it, [Name:PlayerNickname ]! Watch out
for my dad’s Slaking. He’s amazingly strong!
story_07_04000_en.lsd.story_07_04000/2401_1001_1400_10:
I just lost to him...
It still kind of stings, to be honest.
story_07_04000_en.lsd.story_07_04000/2401_1001_1500_10:
Your friend’s right—you definitely shouldn’t
underestimate Norman and his Slaking.
Good luck!
story_07_04000_en.lsd.story_07_04000/2401_1001_1600_10: It looks like you’re ready for battle.
story_07_04000_en.lsd.story_07_04000/2401_1001_1700_10:
Now show me how well you’ve trained
your Pokémon!

story_07_05000_en.lsd.story_07_05000/2401_1001_0100_10: You’ve trained your Pokémon really well.
story_07_05000_en.lsd.story_07_05000/2401_1001_0200_10:
The bond between you and your Pokémon is
strong, and your teamwork was spectacular. You
have defeated me, [Name:PlayerNickname ].
story_07_05000_en.lsd.story_07_05000/2401_1001_0300_10:
I had no idea you were this strong,
[Name:PlayerNickname ]...
story_07_05000_en.lsd.story_07_05000/2401_1001_0400_10:
Don’t get me wrong—I’ve been rooting for you.
It’s just...frustrating, getting left behind.
story_07_05000_en.lsd.story_07_05000/2401_1001_0500_10:
Don’t allow yourself to get frustrated. The skills
you displayed when you pushed my Slaking to
the limit are the real deal.
story_07_05000_en.lsd.story_07_05000/2401_1001_0600_10:
[Name:PlayerNickname ]! What an awesome
battle that was to watch!
story_07_05000_en.lsd.story_07_05000/2401_1001_0700_10:
If you keep improving at this rate, we won’t
have anything to be afraid of no matter how
many of those Team Break thugs we run into!
story_07_05000_en.lsd.story_07_05000/2401_1001_0800_10:
Team Break? Is that what you call those weirdos
I’ve been seeing around lately?
story_07_05000_en.lsd.story_07_05000/2401_1001_0900_10:
Yeah, we ran into them on the way here,
but they were no match for us!
story_07_05000_en.lsd.story_07_05000/2401_1001_1000_10: You’d better be careful out there, Brendan.
story_07_05000_en.lsd.story_07_05000/2401_1001_1200_10:
It seems that they’re getting stronger than
they were before.
story_07_05000_en.lsd.story_07_05000/2401_1001_1300_10:
I have a feeling something bad might happen.
Hopefully it’s just me worrying too much.
story_07_05000_en.lsd.story_07_05000/2401_1001_1400_10:
Team Break has even got Norman worried now?
That can’t be good...
story_07_05000_en.lsd.story_07_05000/2401_1001_1500_10:
Oh, with all that unpleasant talk, I forgot to give
you your badge.
story_07_05000_en.lsd.story_07_05000/2401_1001_1700_10: Heh heh... This cave seems to be the place.
story_07_05000_en.lsd.story_07_05000/2401_1001_1800_10: Come on! It’s time to pay a little visit...
story_07_05000_en.lsd.story_07_05000/2401_1001_2100_10:
We can’t let them go in there!
That cave is where sync pairs go to rest!
story_07_05000_en.lsd.story_07_05000/2401_1001_2200_10: All of you! Come and help me stop those thugs!
story_07_05000_en.lsd.story_07_05000/2401_1001_2300_10: I can help! Let’s go, Norman!

story_07_06000_en.lsd.story_07_06000/2401_1001_0100_10: Hold it right there, Team Break!
story_07_06000_en.lsd.story_07_06000/2401_1001_0200_10:
We can’t allow you to cause any more harm
than you already have.
story_07_06000_en.lsd.story_07_06000/2401_1001_0300_10: No, no, that was never our intention!
story_07_06000_en.lsd.story_07_06000/2401_1001_0400_10:
You see...we came here for the PML Leader.
In other words, YOU, Norman!
story_07_06000_en.lsd.story_07_06000/2401_1001_0900_10: No! We have to protect everyone, Slaking!

story_07_07000_en.lsd.story_07_07000/2401_1001_0200_10:
I think so...
But they collapsed the exit.
story_07_07000_en.lsd.story_07_07000/2401_1001_0300_10:
We’ll be all right. Even if we can’t get out here,
I’m sure we can find another way.
story_07_07000_en.lsd.story_07_07000/2401_1001_0400_10:
As long as we don’t give up,
the road will reveal itself!

story_07_08000_en.lsd.story_07_08000/2401_1001_0100_10: Hey, everybody, I found a way out of here!
story_07_08000_en.lsd.story_07_08000/2401_1001_0200_10:
Whew, I was just starting to wonder what our
new life as cave dwellers would be like.
story_07_08000_en.lsd.story_07_08000/2401_1001_0300_10:
What did I tell you? As long as you don’t give up,
the road will surely reveal itself.
story_07_08000_en.lsd.story_07_08000/2401_1001_0400_10:
You just have to have the kind of unbending
mental fortitude you need to keep going until
you find it.
story_07_08000_en.lsd.story_07_08000/2401_1001_0500_10:
You’re right. I was in shock from how suddenly
that all went down, but I can’t allow myself to
be overcome by my fears.
story_07_08000_en.lsd.story_07_08000/2401_1001_0600_10: That’s a good point. Well, the exit is right there.
story_07_08000_en.lsd.story_07_08000/2401_1001_0700_10:
I should have expected this from a PML Leader.
To be honest, I didn’t think much of you.
story_07_08000_en.lsd.story_07_08000/2401_1001_0800_10: Team Break! What do you want from me?!
story_07_08000_en.lsd.story_07_08000/2401_1001_0900_10:
If we want to sabotage this loathsome PML,
of course we must also get rid of you!
story_07_08000_en.lsd.story_07_08000/2401_1001_1100_10: There’s no way I’m letting that happen!
story_07_08000_en.lsd.story_07_08000/2401_1001_1200_10:
I don’t care what your ultimate goal is.
I can’t stand by and watch your cowardly methods!
story_07_08000_en.lsd.story_07_08000/2401_1001_1300_10:
[Name:PlayerNickname ], will you give me a
hand with these thugs?
story_07_08000_en.lsd.story_07_08000/2401_0401_1500_10:
I can’t stand people with a sparkle
in their eyes like you have!
story_07_08000_en.lsd.story_07_08000/2401_0302_1600_10:
I won’t let Team Break get away
with this!
story_07_08000_en.lsd.story_07_08000/2401_0402_1700_10:
I can’t stand people with a sparkle
in their eyes like you have!
story_07_08000_en.lsd.story_07_08000/2401_1001_1800_10: I will send all of you into a pit of dark despair!

story_07_09000_en.lsd.story_07_09000/2401_1001_0100_10:
How could this be?!
How could I lose to the likes of you?!
story_07_09000_en.lsd.story_07_09000/2401_1001_0200_10: Don’t get the wrong idea. This isn’t over!
story_07_09000_en.lsd.story_07_09000/2401_1001_0300_10: We did it! What a huge win for us!
story_07_09000_en.lsd.story_07_09000/2401_1001_0400_10:
Hm, it certainly was!
Now I can finally give you your badge.
story_07_09000_en.lsd.story_07_09000/2401_1001_0500_10:
That’s the Patience Badge. It’s given to Trainers
who have unbending mental strength.
story_07_09000_en.lsd.story_07_09000/2401_1001_0600_10:
The Patience Badge suits you well. I’m looking
forward to seeing just how far you can go with
your strong mentality.
story_07_09000_en.lsd.story_07_09000/2401_1001_0700_10:
And one more thing...
Would it be possible for me to join your team?
story_07_09000_en.lsd.story_07_09000/2401_1001_0800_10:
I would like to watch the next generation of
Trainers grow from up close.
story_07_09000_en.lsd.story_07_09000/2401_1001_0900_10:
Huh? Are you really planning to go with
[Name:PlayerNickname ], Dad?
story_07_09000_en.lsd.story_07_09000/2401_1001_1000_10: Of course! I, too, want to grow stronger.
story_07_09000_en.lsd.story_07_09000/2401_1001_1100_10:
That’s my reason for wanting to go. Will you
have me, [Name:PlayerNickname ]?
story_07_09000_en.lsd.story_07_09000/2401_0401_1300_10:
Mmhmm! Then from now on, let’s devote
ourselves to growing stronger!
story_07_09000_en.lsd.story_07_09000/2401_0302_1400_10: I’m excited to learn from you!
story_07_09000_en.lsd.story_07_09000/2401_0402_1500_10:
The pleasure is mine.
Let’s devote ourselves to growing stronger!
story_07_09000_en.lsd.story_07_09000/2401_1001_1600_10:
All right! I guess I’ve gotta get serious about my
training, too, huh? After all, I do wanna beat
you again, Dad!
story_07_09000_en.lsd.story_07_09000/2401_1001_1700_10:
Nice, [Name:PlayerNickname ]. Not only did
you get the badge—you got Norman to
acknowledge your skill.
story_07_09000_en.lsd.story_07_09000/2401_1001_1800_10:
I haven’t forgotten about you, either, Paulo.
Here, take this badge.
story_07_09000_en.lsd.story_07_09000/2401_1001_1900_10: What?! But you beat me in our battle...
story_07_09000_en.lsd.story_07_09000/2401_1001_2000_10:
Victory isn’t everything.
What’s truly important is your mental fortitude.
story_07_09000_en.lsd.story_07_09000/2401_1001_2100_10:
You supported [Name:PlayerNickname ] in the
face of fearsome opponents and didn’t back
down. You’ve earned this badge.
story_07_09000_en.lsd.story_07_09000/2401_1001_2300_10:
I’m going to grow stronger...stronger than
anyone else...
story_07_09000_en.lsd.story_07_09000/2401_1001_2400_10: Huh? I didn’t quite catch that.
story_07_09000_en.lsd.story_07_09000/2401_1001_2500_10:
Nothing. It’s nothing.
Thank you for the badge.
story_07_09000_en.lsd.story_07_09000/2401_1001_2600_10:
I guess this is where we part ways again,
[Name:PlayerNickname ]. I’m off to collect my
next badge.
story_07_09000_en.lsd.story_07_09000/2401_1001_2700_10:
Next time you see me, I’ll be stronger than
ever! Strong enough to blow you and Norman
out of the water!

story_08_01000_en.lsd.story_08_01000/2401_1001_0100_10:
I’ve heard there’s quite a skilled Trainer
somewhere around this glacier.
story_08_01000_en.lsd.story_08_01000/2401_1001_0200_10: But I don’t know exactly where...
story_08_01000_en.lsd.story_08_01000/2401_1001_0300_10:
I wonder where they are... 
It’s pretty cold out here.
story_08_01000_en.lsd.story_08_01000/2401_1001_0400_10:
What are you talking about?!
You get cold too easily, Flannery!
story_08_01000_en.lsd.story_08_01000/2401_1001_0500_10:
My hometown is hot, and I didn’t think to pack
anything besides the clothes I normally wear.
story_08_01000_en.lsd.story_08_01000/2401_1001_0600_10:
I guess I would be pretty cold if I were out here
dressed like that. Wanna borrow my scarf?
story_08_01000_en.lsd.story_08_01000/2401_1001_0700_10: I-I’m OK. Th-thanks for the c-c-concern, though.
story_08_01000_en.lsd.story_08_01000/2401_1001_0800_10:
It’ll be even colder once the sun goes down.
There will be time for chitchat later.
We need to focus on our search for now.
story_08_01000_en.lsd.story_08_01000/2401_1001_0900_10:
All right, let’s hurry up and get this done before
Flannery catches a cold!

story_08_02000_en.lsd.story_08_02000/2401_1001_0100_10:
Well, from the look of you, I bet you’ve come
looking for a badge, haven’t you?
story_08_02000_en.lsd.story_08_02000/2401_1001_0300_10:
The name’s Pryce. I’m a Gym Leader from
Mahogany Town and a PML Leader. If you’re
looking for a battle, I’ll take you on.
story_08_02000_en.lsd.story_08_02000/2401_1001_0400_10:
This old guy doesn’t waste any time!
Let’s get to it!
story_08_02000_en.lsd.story_08_02000/2401_1001_0500_10:
Leave this one to me! I know Torkoal can
really put in work here!
story_08_02000_en.lsd.story_08_02000/2401_1001_0600_10:
Don’t push yourself so hard, Flannery.
I can handle this old guy.
story_08_02000_en.lsd.story_08_02000/2401_1001_0700_10:
I’m f-fine. Just because I’m cold doesn’t mean
I can’t b-battle!
story_08_02000_en.lsd.story_08_02000/2401_1001_0800_10:
Trust me! Leave this one to me—the Gym Leader
of Lavaridge Town!
story_08_02000_en.lsd.story_08_02000/2401_1001_0900_10:
What was that all about?
You don’t have to get all high and mighty.
story_08_02000_en.lsd.story_08_02000/2401_1001_1000_10:
What’s wrong? If you don’t want to battle,
I’ll be on my way.
story_08_02000_en.lsd.story_08_02000/2401_1001_1100_10: Hold on! We’re ready to do this right now!
story_08_02000_en.lsd.story_08_02000/2401_1001_1200_10:
Barry, Flannery—would you two calm down?
You’re being rude to our opponent.
story_08_02000_en.lsd.story_08_02000/2401_1001_1400_10: Have you made up your minds?
story_08_02000_en.lsd.story_08_02000/2401_1001_1500_10:
Well then, I will show you the true harshness of
winter. Come at me with everything you’ve got!

story_08_03000_en.lsd.story_08_03000/2401_1001_0100_10:
Well, that was an easy win!
All right, old man, make with the badge.
story_08_03000_en.lsd.story_08_03000/2401_1001_0200_10:
No. Pryce wasn’t really giving it his all
in that battle.
story_08_03000_en.lsd.story_08_03000/2401_1001_0400_10:
Hmph. There was certainly something dazzling
about your teamwork.
story_08_03000_en.lsd.story_08_03000/2401_1001_0500_10: But can’t you give just a bit more?
story_08_03000_en.lsd.story_08_03000/2401_1001_0600_10:
What are you talking about?!
What’s the deal here?!
story_08_03000_en.lsd.story_08_03000/2401_1001_0800_10:
In the battle with Pryce just now, you did perform
well, but there was still something missing.
story_08_03000_en.lsd.story_08_03000/2401_1001_1100_10:
Think hard about it, you two. You’ll need to find
the answer before we meet Pryce again.

story_08_04000_en.lsd.story_08_04000/2401_1001_0100_10:
For s-s-some reason, it’s even colder than
it was b-before...
story_08_04000_en.lsd.story_08_04000/2401_1001_0600_10:
I’ve been thinking about it, and I guess I was
kind of rushing for no good reason.
story_08_04000_en.lsd.story_08_04000/2401_1001_0700_10:
I thought I could do it all myself,
and I hope I didn’t make you feel bad.
story_08_04000_en.lsd.story_08_04000/2401_1001_0800_10:
At times like these, I wish I could fine myself.
I hope you can forgive me, Flannery!
story_08_04000_en.lsd.story_08_04000/2401_1001_0900_10:
Oh... Well, uh, I was actually about to apologize
to you, too, Barry!
story_08_04000_en.lsd.story_08_04000/2401_1001_1000_10:
I’m the one who should be sorry!
That was all my fault earlier.
story_08_04000_en.lsd.story_08_04000/2401_1001_1100_10:
I was the one who panicked. I was trying too
hard to live up to my title of Gym Leader
and totally missed the mark.
story_08_04000_en.lsd.story_08_04000/2401_1001_1200_10: Oh, you felt that way, too, huh?
story_08_04000_en.lsd.story_08_04000/2401_1001_1300_10:
I guess that’s why we were so out of sync
in that battle.
story_08_04000_en.lsd.story_08_04000/2401_1001_1800_10:
Ah, it seems you’ve found the answer to what
was missing, then. It’s time for us to head back
to Pryce.
story_08_04000_en.lsd.story_08_04000/2401_1001_1900_10: You two can show him what you’ve learned!
story_08_04000_en.lsd.story_08_04000/2401_1001_2000_10:
Oh, it’s you again.
Back to challenge me again, are you?
story_08_04000_en.lsd.story_08_04000/2401_1001_2100_10: That’s right, old man! Give us one more battle!
story_08_04000_en.lsd.story_08_04000/2401_1001_2300_10:
Just you watch! It’s gonna be completely
different from last time! Flannery,
[Name:PlayerNickname ]...let’s do this!
story_08_04000_en.lsd.story_08_04000/2401_1001_2500_10:
Oh, I like that determined expression.
This will be good.
story_08_04000_en.lsd.story_08_04000/2401_1001_2600_10:
I am known as the Winter Trainer.
Let me show you what I’m capable of!

story_08_05000_en.lsd.story_08_05000/2401_1001_0100_10: All right! We finally worked together and won!
story_08_05000_en.lsd.story_08_05000/2401_1001_0200_10:
YES! But hey, old man, you weren’t going easy
on us that time, were you?
story_08_05000_en.lsd.story_08_05000/2401_1001_0300_10:
No, I wasn’t. Your performance in that battle
was a sight to see.
story_08_05000_en.lsd.story_08_05000/2401_1001_0400_10:
There’s nothing more for me to do but give you
your badge.
story_08_05000_en.lsd.story_08_05000/2401_0301_0700_10:
And it’s a badge that we
worked together to get.
story_08_05000_en.lsd.story_08_05000/2401_0401_0800_10: I will always remember what this badge means!
story_08_05000_en.lsd.story_08_05000/2401_0402_1000_10:
I mean, that wasn’t even really
a fight, anyway, right?
story_08_05000_en.lsd.story_08_05000/2401_1001_1100_10:
My sincerest thanks for battling earnestly, Pryce.
We all learned so much from you.
story_08_05000_en.lsd.story_08_05000/2401_1001_1200_10:
Those are some interesting youngsters. They were
more powerful than I had initially thought.
story_08_05000_en.lsd.story_08_05000/2401_1001_1300_10:
Indeed. I’m surprised by how much this new
generation of Trainers is teaching me as well.
story_08_05000_en.lsd.story_08_05000/2401_1001_1500_10:
No, I’m just part of the team. The one running
the show is [Name:PlayerNickname ] here.
story_08_05000_en.lsd.story_08_05000/2401_1001_1600_10:
[Name:PlayerNickname ]... There certainly does
seem to be something quite interesting about you.
story_08_05000_en.lsd.story_08_05000/2401_1001_1700_10:
I think so, too.
I don’t quite know what it is yet, though.
story_08_05000_en.lsd.story_08_05000/2401_1001_1800_10:
Well, how about it, then?
Would you let me join you, too?
story_08_05000_en.lsd.story_08_05000/2401_1001_1900_10:
Hm? I’d never imagined you would want to join
our team...
story_08_05000_en.lsd.story_08_05000/2401_1001_2000_10:
I’ve found I have a desire to learn from the
younger generation as well.
story_08_05000_en.lsd.story_08_05000/2401_1001_2100_10:
We welcome you with open arms! I’m sure
everyone will be happy to have you join us!
story_08_05000_en.lsd.story_08_05000/2401_1001_2200_10: Hey, Norman! What are you guys talking about?
story_08_05000_en.lsd.story_08_05000/2401_1001_2300_10:
Let’s say good-bye to this freezing glacier
and get back to a nice, warm town!
story_08_05000_en.lsd.story_08_05000/2401_1001_2400_10:
Hey! I knew it! You’ve b-b-been cold
all along, too, h-haven’t you, Barry?!
story_08_05000_en.lsd.story_08_05000/2401_1001_2600_10:
Ha ha! I can tell things are going to be
very interesting from here on out.

story_09_01000_en.lsd.story_09_01000/2401_1001_0100_10:
The city seems particularly bustling with
activity today.
story_09_01000_en.lsd.story_09_01000/2401_1001_0200_10:
Now that you mention it...it does seem busier
than usual around here.
story_09_01000_en.lsd.story_09_01000/2401_1001_0300_10:
People must be getting anxious now that
the PML tournament matches are just over
the horizon.
story_09_01000_en.lsd.story_09_01000/2401_1001_0400_10:
Anyway, I was hoping to go for a nice stroll
through town, since I’m here and all... Hm?
Is there something wrong, Rosa?
story_09_01000_en.lsd.story_09_01000/2401_1001_0500_10:
No. I just...I swear I recognize that girl over there
from somewhere... Is that...Iris?
Iris, is that you over there?!
story_09_01000_en.lsd.story_09_01000/2401_1001_0600_10:
Rosa! I haven’t seen you in so long!
I’m so glad I finally ran into someone I
recognize here.
story_09_01000_en.lsd.story_09_01000/2401_0401_0800_10:
Yeah! Iris is actually the Champion of
the Unova region, you know!
story_09_01000_en.lsd.story_09_01000/2401_0402_1000_10:
Yeah! We became friends through Pokémon
battling back in the Unova region. Iris is the
Champion there, you know!
story_09_01000_en.lsd.story_09_01000/2401_1001_1100_10:
Oh! I should introduce you two! Iris, this is
my team leader, [Name:PlayerNickname ]!
story_09_01000_en.lsd.story_09_01000/2401_1001_1200_10:
Team leader? Ohhh, you’re all competing in
the PML together? That’s great! I’ve been
hearing a lot about it.
story_09_01000_en.lsd.story_09_01000/2401_1001_1300_10:
I’m Iris!
Nice to meet you, [Name:PlayerNickname ].
story_09_01000_en.lsd.story_09_01000/2401_1001_1400_10:
I never thought I’d run into you here,
but I’m sooo glad I did!
story_09_01000_en.lsd.story_09_01000/2401_1001_1500_10:
Me too! I feel so much better now that I know
you’re here! Until now, I hadn’t found anyone
here that I recogni—
story_09_01000_en.lsd.story_09_01000/2401_1001_1800_10:
Team Break must be causing trouble again!
Come on! We should go help!
story_09_01000_en.lsd.story_09_01000/2401_1001_1900_10:
Right! I’ll go with you!
Is that OK, Rosa? [Name:PlayerNickname ]?

story_09_02000_en.lsd.story_09_02000/2401_1001_0100_10:
[Name:PlayerNickname ]! More of those
baddies are heading right this way!
story_09_02000_en.lsd.story_09_02000/2401_1001_0200_10:
Wait a sec... Isn’t that the Champion of
the Unova region?
story_09_02000_en.lsd.story_09_02000/2401_1001_0300_10:
Guess today’s our lucky day.
C’mon, let’s nab her Pokémon!
story_09_02000_en.lsd.story_09_02000/2401_1001_0500_10:
[Name:PlayerNickname ], these thugs are
trying to steal Iris’s Haxorus!
story_09_02000_en.lsd.story_09_02000/2401_1001_0600_10:
Wha—? My Haxorus?!
We can’t let that happen!
story_09_02000_en.lsd.story_09_02000/2401_1001_0700_10:
Right—we have to do something about this.
If we don’t stop them soon, even more innocent
people will get dragged into the fray!

story_09_03000_en.lsd.story_09_03000/2401_1001_0100_10:
Hah! I was told that a few Trainers were in
a tussle with Team Break, so I came to have
a look... Turns out it’s just you amateurs!
story_09_03000_en.lsd.story_09_03000/2401_0401_0300_10:
Oh? So you remember me, then!
Yes, it is I, Lear! Owner and creator of this
magnificent island you all stand on!
story_09_03000_en.lsd.story_09_03000/2401_0402_0500_10:
You must be joking, right? That is ridiculous!
No one forgets me, Lear, owner of Pasio!
story_09_03000_en.lsd.story_09_03000/2401_1001_0600_10:
So you’re Lear, huh? Your reputation precedes
you...and not in a good way. To be honest,
people don’t speak very positively of you.
story_09_03000_en.lsd.story_09_03000/2401_1001_0700_10:
Tell me, what’s the real reason you’re here?
I’d hate to think that you’re the one behind
all of this misconduct.
story_09_03000_en.lsd.story_09_03000/2401_1001_0800_10:
Hah! Don’t be ridiculous! 
Me? Promote this foolishness on my own island?! 
The mere thought is insulting!
story_09_03000_en.lsd.story_09_03000/2401_1001_0900_10:
The reason I came here in the first place was
to bring judgment on these thugs!
story_09_03000_en.lsd.story_09_03000/2401_1001_1000_10:
Got it? Now stay out of my way.
Go crawl into a corner with your pathetic
team and leave this to a real Pokémon master!
story_09_03000_en.lsd.story_09_03000/2401_1001_1100_10:
That guy said his name is Lear, right?
You know, I’m sure he must be rich and
powerful and all, but that was just plain rude!
story_09_03000_en.lsd.story_09_03000/2401_1001_1200_10:
You’re not just gonna let him get away with
that attitude, right, [Name:PlayerNickname ]?!
story_09_03000_en.lsd.story_09_03000/2401_1001_1300_10:
We should go and show that snooty Lear
that this team is anything but pathetic!
story_09_03000_en.lsd.story_09_03000/2401_1001_1500_10:
Try not to let yourself get so worked up.
You’ll only tire yourself out.
story_09_03000_en.lsd.story_09_03000/2401_1001_1600_10:
But aren’t you upset that he called your team
pathetic, Mr. Pryce?
story_09_03000_en.lsd.story_09_03000/2401_1001_1700_10:
Sticks and stones, Iris. Words can’t hurt you if
you don’t let them. A Trainer should always
be calm and disciplined.
story_09_03000_en.lsd.story_09_03000/2401_1001_1800_10:
Yeah, I think I know what you mean.
Working together as a team is probably a lot
harder if you’re all worked up and angry.
story_09_03000_en.lsd.story_09_03000/2401_1001_1900_10:
Indeed... It sounds like young Iris here is
already much wiser about these things than
our haughty friend, Lear.
story_09_03000_en.lsd.story_09_03000/2401_1001_2000_10:
Come! I think perhaps it’s time to show him
exactly what this team is capable of!

story_09_04000_en.lsd.story_09_04000/2401_1001_0100_10:
Ugh! What are you still doing here?
I thought I told you to stay out of my way!
story_09_04000_en.lsd.story_09_04000/2401_1001_0200_10:
Lear, you’re wrong! [Name:PlayerNickname ]’s
team is NOT pathetic!
story_09_04000_en.lsd.story_09_04000/2401_1001_0300_10:
Hmph. This is getting ridiculous!
One puny amateur...two, three...even ten!
It makes no difference if you’re weak.
story_09_04000_en.lsd.story_09_04000/2401_0301_0400_10: Don’t talk about my friends like that!
story_09_04000_en.lsd.story_09_04000/2401_0401_0500_10:
Friends? Friends are for fools!
If all you’re going to do is spout nonsense,
do it elsewhere! Out of my sight!
story_09_04000_en.lsd.story_09_04000/2401_0402_0700_10:
Just how foolish are you?!
If all you’re going to do is spout nonsense,
do it elsewhere! Out of my sight!
story_09_04000_en.lsd.story_09_04000/2401_1001_0800_10:
We’re not fools, and teamwork isn’t nonsense!
If we work together with each other, we can
achieve anything!
story_09_04000_en.lsd.story_09_04000/2401_1001_0900_10:
You’re getting on my nerves...
This conversation is over!
story_09_04000_en.lsd.story_09_04000/2401_1001_1000_10:
Rachel! Sawyer! Let’s corner Team Break at
the beach, where they can’t get away.
Don’t just stand there—move it!
story_09_04000_en.lsd.story_09_04000/2401_1001_1200_10: Hold it right there, li’l lady!
story_09_04000_en.lsd.story_09_04000/2401_1001_1300_10:
Thought you could get away, huh?
Well, it’s finders keepers, Iris!
story_09_04000_en.lsd.story_09_04000/2401_1001_1400_10:
Hand over that Haxorus!
It belongs to Team Break now!
story_09_04000_en.lsd.story_09_04000/2401_1001_1500_10:
We’ll put it to reeeal good use, all right?
So don’t argue, and give it here!
story_09_04000_en.lsd.story_09_04000/2401_1001_1600_10:
Argh! Not again!
They just keep coming and coming!
story_09_04000_en.lsd.story_09_04000/2401_1001_1700_10:
Don’t worry, Iris. I’m right here with you, and so is
[Name:PlayerNickname ]. We’ve got your back.
story_09_04000_en.lsd.story_09_04000/2401_1001_1800_10:
Now...let me show you why they call me
the Winter Trainer.

story_09_05000_en.lsd.story_09_05000/2401_1001_0100_10:
Looks like that was the last of them, finally...
How dare those troublemakers drain away
so much of my precious time!
story_09_05000_en.lsd.story_09_05000/2401_1001_0200_10:
As for you—how dare you ignore my wishes!
I told you to stay out of my business, yet here
you are again!
story_09_05000_en.lsd.story_09_05000/2401_0401_0400_10:
ME work together with YOU?!
Just who do you think you’re talking to?
story_09_05000_en.lsd.story_09_05000/2401_0402_0600_10:
Who do you think you’re talking to here?!
I could have wiped the floor with those fools
on my own!
story_09_05000_en.lsd.story_09_05000/2401_1001_0700_10:
Lear, stop being so rude to us!
It’s not nice!
story_09_05000_en.lsd.story_09_05000/2401_1001_0800_10: Would it hurt you to say thank you?!
story_09_05000_en.lsd.story_09_05000/2401_1001_1100_10:
Hmph! Iris, was it?
If that’s what you want...
story_09_05000_en.lsd.story_09_05000/2401_1001_1200_10:
then let’s settle this with a battle—a special
one-on-one battle, just this once.
story_09_05000_en.lsd.story_09_05000/2401_1001_1300_10:
You shall see that you’re no match
for my superior power!
story_09_05000_en.lsd.story_09_05000/2401_1001_1400_10:
And I’ll prove you wrong! 
I’m going to win this for my friends!

story_09_06000_en.lsd.story_09_06000/2401_1001_0400_10:
Hmm... You said Iris is the Champion of
the Unova region, didn’t you?
story_09_06000_en.lsd.story_09_06000/2401_1001_0500_10:
Yep... I can’t believe Lear is neck and neck
with her in this battle!
story_09_06000_en.lsd.story_09_06000/2401_1001_0700_10:
I mean, Master Lear’s a genius...
Plus, he trains suuuper hard.
story_09_06000_en.lsd.story_09_06000/2401_1001_0800_10:
Champion or not, I doubt she’ll be able to
defeat the young master. I’m sure it’ll be the
same next time he faces that kid in the red hat...
story_09_06000_en.lsd.story_09_06000/2401_1001_0900_10: Quiet, you! I told you not to talk about that!
story_09_06000_en.lsd.story_09_06000/2401_1001_1000_10:
And how dare you compare me to this sappy
little girl! All this nonsense about friends and
working together... Don’t make me laugh!
story_09_06000_en.lsd.story_09_06000/2401_1001_1100_10:
You talk like you’re battling all by yourself,
but you’re not alone!
story_09_06000_en.lsd.story_09_06000/2401_1001_1200_10:
What, you mean Rachel and Sawyer?
They serve as my retainers, nothing more.
They may be loyal, but they are not my friends.
story_09_06000_en.lsd.story_09_06000/2401_1001_1300_10:
Well, what about the Pokémon that battle
alongside you? That Krookodile is like a
trusty partner to you, isn’t he?
story_09_06000_en.lsd.story_09_06000/2401_1001_1400_10:
Hah! Pokémon are no different. They’re tools!
Tools used by Trainers who want to rise
to the top! I have no need for friends.
story_09_06000_en.lsd.story_09_06000/2401_1001_1500_10:
Is that really what you think?
The way I see it, Iris has been fighting
neck and neck with you...
story_09_06000_en.lsd.story_09_06000/2401_1001_1600_10:
despite being in a place she’s unfamiliar with...
despite how tired she must be after battling
all of those Team Break thugs earlier...
story_09_06000_en.lsd.story_09_06000/2401_1001_1700_10:
Why do you think that is? If you ask me,
I’d attribute it to the incredibly strong bond
Iris has with her Pokémon.
story_09_06000_en.lsd.story_09_06000/2401_1001_1900_10:
I’m done listening to a bunch of amateurs who
think they can lecture me! Rachel, Sawyer,
we’re leaving!
story_09_06000_en.lsd.story_09_06000/2401_1001_2200_10:
I just want you to know...
I stand by what I said!
story_09_06000_en.lsd.story_09_06000/2401_1001_2300_10:
Mr. Pryce was right. The bond between
Trainers and Pokémon is really important
when it comes to battling!
story_09_06000_en.lsd.story_09_06000/2401_1001_2400_10:
[Name:PlayerNickname ]... Do you think we
could have a battle?
story_09_06000_en.lsd.story_09_06000/2401_1001_2500_10: I kinda want to try a team battle!

story_09_07000_en.lsd.story_09_07000/2401_1001_0100_10:
Wow, that was so cool! Team battling really is
a whole different experience!
story_09_07000_en.lsd.story_09_07000/2401_1001_0200_10: I wish I could do it more...
story_09_07000_en.lsd.story_09_07000/2401_1001_0300_10:
Um, [Name:PlayerNickname ]? Do you think it
would be OK if join your team?
story_09_07000_en.lsd.story_09_07000/2401_1001_0800_10:
With Iris on our team now, I’m even more
excited about what’s to come!
story_09_07000_en.lsd.story_09_07000/2401_1001_0900_10:
Me too! Let’s all do our best, team!
So...what’s next?
story_09_07000_en.lsd.story_09_07000/2401_1001_1000_10:
Wanna head back to the city for now?
Let’s go search for another PML Leader
and earn our next badge!

story_10_01000_en.lsd.story_10_01000/2401_1001_0100_10:
Well, team, it’s been a pretty eventful journey
so far, but I think I’m ready to get back to
collecting badges.
story_10_01000_en.lsd.story_10_01000/2401_1001_0200_10:
The only one we’re missing now is the
Pride Badge. Once we get our hands on that,
we’ll be able to compete in the PML!
story_10_01000_en.lsd.story_10_01000/2401_0301_0300_10:
Can’t wait to meet the next
PML Leader!
story_10_01000_en.lsd.story_10_01000/2401_0401_0400_10:
Hahaha! You really do love Pokémon battles,
don’t you, [Name:PlayerNickname ]?
story_10_01000_en.lsd.story_10_01000/2401_0302_0500_10: It’s been pretty challenging so far.
story_10_01000_en.lsd.story_10_01000/2401_0402_0600_10:
It sure has...but we’re in the final stretch now!
Come on—let’s give this our best shot!
story_10_01000_en.lsd.story_10_01000/2401_1001_0700_10:
Do you know anything about the PML Leader
we’re looking for?
story_10_01000_en.lsd.story_10_01000/2401_1001_0800_10: From what I hear, she’s still a young child.
story_10_01000_en.lsd.story_10_01000/2401_1001_0900_10:
But supposedly, she’s got some serious talent,
despite her age. Rumor has it she’s a kahuna
on one of the Alolan islands...
story_10_01000_en.lsd.story_10_01000/2401_1001_1000_10:
Aha! Interesting... I wonder if she’s a little
like me, then! It sounds like she could be!
story_10_01000_en.lsd.story_10_01000/2401_1001_1100_10:
Maybe we’ll end up being super good friends!
Come on, hurry up! What are we waiting for?!

story_10_02000_en.lsd.story_10_02000/2401_1001_0100_10:
Too bad, my friend! No badge for you today.
Better luck next time!
story_10_02000_en.lsd.story_10_02000/2401_1001_0200_10:
Argh! What gives?
Why can’t I win...
story_10_02000_en.lsd.story_10_02000/2401_1001_0300_10:
Now, now. No use crying over spilled milk.
You have some real strength! 
I can feel it in my bones.
story_10_02000_en.lsd.story_10_02000/2401_1001_0400_10:
Hmm... I think you just need to believe in
yourself more. With a bit of confidence,
you could be great.
story_10_02000_en.lsd.story_10_02000/2401_1001_0600_10:
Hmm... That girl looks pretty young and little...
Um, excuse me? You wouldn’t happen to be a
PML Leader, would you?
story_10_02000_en.lsd.story_10_02000/2401_1001_0700_10:
What’s this? Another challenger?
My, my! Business is booming today.
story_10_02000_en.lsd.story_10_02000/2401_1001_0800_10:
[Name:PlayerNickname ]...
Your badge collecting must be going pretty
well if that’s why you’re here.
story_10_02000_en.lsd.story_10_02000/2401_1001_0900_10:
I’m flattered you wish to challenge me now,
but to be honest, I’m feeling a wee bit
tired from my last... Huh?
story_10_02000_en.lsd.story_10_02000/2401_1001_1000_10: Look! It’s more of those mean, masked people!
story_10_02000_en.lsd.story_10_02000/2401_1001_1100_10:
Well, well! I didn’t expect to find so many
lovely sync pairs here.
story_10_02000_en.lsd.story_10_02000/2401_1001_1200_10:
Today must be my lucky day...
With all of these Pokémon in one place,
I’ll barely have to lift a finger to steal them!
story_10_02000_en.lsd.story_10_02000/2401_1001_1300_10:
Team Break! Ugh, they always pick the worst
times to show up... My Pokémon’s still tired
from that last battle.
story_10_02000_en.lsd.story_10_02000/2401_1001_1400_10:
Don’t worry! You can leave this one to us!
Come on, [Name:PlayerNickname ]! Let’s go!

story_10_03000_en.lsd.story_10_03000/2401_1001_0100_10:
Tsk... Who do you kids think you are?
You have no right to be this good.
story_10_03000_en.lsd.story_10_03000/2401_1001_0200_10:
But don’t worry—my associates should be
arriving any minute now. I hope they
wipe those smiles off your faces...
story_10_03000_en.lsd.story_10_03000/2401_1001_0300_10:
You sure surprised me! The way you
drove off those mask-wearing scoundrels...
Your skills are certainly nothing to scoff at!
story_10_03000_en.lsd.story_10_03000/2401_1001_0400_10:
That was...incredible.
When did you get this strong?!
story_10_03000_en.lsd.story_10_03000/2401_1001_0500_10:
Ah... I guess the obvious answer is that
you’ve been working harder than I have...
story_10_03000_en.lsd.story_10_03000/2401_1001_0600_10:
Well, [Name:PlayerNickname ], I would like
nothing more than to be your next opponent...
story_10_03000_en.lsd.story_10_03000/2401_1001_0700_10:
but according to that lady, there are more
of those Team Break scoundrels skulking
around this area.
story_10_03000_en.lsd.story_10_03000/2401_1001_0800_10:
Right! And we can’t just 
leave them to their own devices!
We should team up and stop them!
story_10_03000_en.lsd.story_10_03000/2401_1001_0900_10:
Say, Hapu... If I beat those guys,
would you agree to battle me again?
story_10_03000_en.lsd.story_10_03000/2401_1001_1000_10:
Well, sure! Of course I would!
But it sounds like they might have us
outnumbered. It won’t be an easy task.
story_10_03000_en.lsd.story_10_03000/2401_1001_1200_10:
H-hey! You’re not thinking of going off on your
own, are you?!
story_10_03000_en.lsd.story_10_03000/2401_1001_1300_10:
I’m just gonna run ahead to scope out the area.
Don’t worry—I won’t do anything stupid.
story_10_03000_en.lsd.story_10_03000/2401_1001_1400_10: Why’s he in such a rush all of a sudden...?
story_10_03000_en.lsd.story_10_03000/2401_1001_1500_10:
Mmm... This is a tad bit worrying.
It may be a good idea to follow him.

story_10_04000_en.lsd.story_10_04000/2401_1001_0100_10:
Argh! We must not have rested enough 
after that battle with Hapu, Rockruff... 
Still, I can’t believe we lost to those goons.
story_10_04000_en.lsd.story_10_04000/2401_1001_0300_10:
Hmm, what have we here? It looks like the boy
has attracted a whole swarm of sync pairs right
into our trap.
story_10_04000_en.lsd.story_10_04000/2401_1001_0400_10:
That one looks like he might be the
leader of the bunch.
story_10_04000_en.lsd.story_10_04000/2401_1001_0500_10:
Your little friend here was too weak to put up
much of a fight, sadly.
story_10_04000_en.lsd.story_10_04000/2401_1001_0700_10: Don’t listen to this foolish bully, Paulo.
story_10_04000_en.lsd.story_10_04000/2401_0401_0900_10:
It seems you’re not one to put up with
foolish nonsense, either...
Mm-hmm! A kindred spirit indeed!
story_10_04000_en.lsd.story_10_04000/2401_0302_1000_10: You’d better take that back, mister!
story_10_04000_en.lsd.story_10_04000/2401_0402_1100_10:
It seems you’re not one to put up with
foolish nonsense, either...
Mm-hmm! A kindred spirit indeed!

story_10_05000_en.lsd.story_10_05000/2401_1001_0100_10:
Hmph. It seems these kids are a bit more
than we can handle at present...
story_10_05000_en.lsd.story_10_05000/2401_1001_0200_10:
Let’s retreat for now. But mark my words...
the next time we meet, we’ll be far stronger!
story_10_05000_en.lsd.story_10_05000/2401_1001_0300_10:
Guess you had to come to my rescue again,
huh, [Name:PlayerNickname ]... Thanks.
story_10_05000_en.lsd.story_10_05000/2401_1001_0400_10:
Tsk! Do you need to have your ears cleaned?
I told you it would be unwise to rush in like that.
story_10_05000_en.lsd.story_10_05000/2401_1001_0500_10:
Oh well. What’s done is done.
At least this allowed me to witness
something great.
story_10_05000_en.lsd.story_10_05000/2401_1001_0700_10:
You got upset when your friend’s pride
was insulted, then fought hard to defend it.
That’s not something you see every day.
story_10_05000_en.lsd.story_10_05000/2401_1001_0800_10:
All right! Now that we’ve chased off those
scalawags, you are free to challenge me
for a badge once again.
story_10_05000_en.lsd.story_10_05000/2401_1001_0900_10:
But you must be exhausted, my friends.
Why don’t you take a rest here and catch up
with me on the road ahead?
story_10_05000_en.lsd.story_10_05000/2401_1001_1000_10:
Hapu’s got a point. We should take a quick
break here so that we’re back to full power
when we challenge her!
story_10_05000_en.lsd.story_10_05000/2401_1001_1100_10:
Sorry, [Name:PlayerNickname ]...
I think I’m gonna go.
story_10_05000_en.lsd.story_10_05000/2401_1001_1200_10:
What? Why?
You didn’t get hurt back there, did you?
story_10_05000_en.lsd.story_10_05000/2401_1001_1300_10:
No, it’s not that.
After my battle with Hapu, she told me that
what I’m missing is self-confidence...
story_10_05000_en.lsd.story_10_05000/2401_1001_1400_10:
and I need to give that some real thought.
Challenging her again is gonna be pointless
until I figure out my issues.
story_10_05000_en.lsd.story_10_05000/2401_1001_1600_10:
I’m not giving up yet, though!
I’ve still got time to work this out before
the tournament matches begin!
story_10_05000_en.lsd.story_10_05000/2401_1001_1700_10:
You’ll see! I’ll continue to get stronger,
collect all the badges I need, then sign up
to compete in the PML!
story_10_05000_en.lsd.story_10_05000/2401_1001_1800_10:
Good luck in your battle against Hapu!
I’ll see you around soon!
story_10_05000_en.lsd.story_10_05000/2401_1001_1900_10:
Wow, he just up and left...
Think Paulo’s gonna be OK?
story_10_05000_en.lsd.story_10_05000/2401_1001_2000_10:
Why are you so worried about Paulo, anyway?
We’ll see him again real soon, like he said.
story_10_05000_en.lsd.story_10_05000/2401_1001_2100_10:
And when we do, I’m sure he will have
grown into a powerful rival for us to
compete against.
story_10_05000_en.lsd.story_10_05000/2401_0302_2400_10:
We’ll grow even more powerful
than that!
story_10_05000_en.lsd.story_10_05000/2401_1001_2600_10:
All right! Let’s head out as soon as this
rest stop is over. Final badge, here we come!

story_10_06000_en.lsd.story_10_06000/2401_1001_0100_10:
Ah, there you are...
Hm? Is that all of you?
story_10_06000_en.lsd.story_10_06000/2401_1001_0200_10:
Yeah... Paulo ran off saying he needed to
get stronger.
story_10_06000_en.lsd.story_10_06000/2401_1001_0300_10:
Is that so... Well, I look forward to seeing the
fruits of his labor.
story_10_06000_en.lsd.story_10_06000/2401_1001_0400_10:
In any case, the rest of us came here to challenge
you to a battle. You’re still ready to rumble, right?
story_10_06000_en.lsd.story_10_06000/2401_1001_0500_10:
Yes, of course I am! But before that...
Here, this is for you.
story_10_06000_en.lsd.story_10_06000/2401_1001_0600_10:
Is that...a Pride Badge?!
But we haven’t even battled yet!
story_10_06000_en.lsd.story_10_06000/2401_1001_0700_10:
I’ve already seen enough of your character
for me to make my judgment.
story_10_06000_en.lsd.story_10_06000/2401_1001_0800_10:
Not only are you proud of yourselves and
your own accomplishments, but you respect
and raise up others as well.
story_10_06000_en.lsd.story_10_06000/2401_1001_0900_10:
Furthermore, you possess the strength and skill—
as well as the camaraderie—that it takes to
defend that pride.
story_10_06000_en.lsd.story_10_06000/2401_1001_1000_10:
In other words, you have proven that you’re
worthy of holding this badge in every way!
So take it! It’s yours!
story_10_06000_en.lsd.story_10_06000/2401_1001_1100_10:
Woo-hoo!
That means we’ve collected every single badge!
story_10_06000_en.lsd.story_10_06000/2401_1001_1200_10:
This isn’t exactly the way I imagined things
would go in the end...but hey, we did it!
Congrats, [Name:PlayerNickname ]!
story_10_06000_en.lsd.story_10_06000/2401_1001_1300_10:
Indeed! Just one more thing, before you go...
A personal request.
story_10_06000_en.lsd.story_10_06000/2401_1001_1400_10: Would you still honor me with a battle?
story_10_06000_en.lsd.story_10_06000/2401_1001_1500_10:
I may be a PML Leader, but I’m a Pokémon
Trainer first! When I meet a powerful opponent,
I want to test my skill against them...
story_10_06000_en.lsd.story_10_06000/2401_1001_1600_10:
After watching your battle earlier, I felt that
it was no longer a badge that was on the
line here—it was my pride!
story_10_06000_en.lsd.story_10_06000/2401_1001_1700_10:
Well, you heard the little lady.
What do you think, [Name:PlayerNickname ]?
story_10_06000_en.lsd.story_10_06000/2401_0401_1900_10: I was hoping you’d say that!
story_10_06000_en.lsd.story_10_06000/2401_0302_2000_10: Let’s do this! No holding back!
story_10_06000_en.lsd.story_10_06000/2401_0402_2100_10: I was hoping you’d say that!
story_10_06000_en.lsd.story_10_06000/2401_1001_2200_10:
Thank you, my friends. Come on, then!
I will battle you with everything I have!

story_10_07000_en.lsd.story_10_07000/2401_1001_0100_10:
Phew... I’ve been thoroughly defeated.
What a grand battle that was!
story_10_07000_en.lsd.story_10_07000/2401_1001_0200_10:
I used every bit of strength I could muster,
but it still wasn’t enough... Sounds like
it’s high time for some more training!
story_10_07000_en.lsd.story_10_07000/2401_1001_0300_10:
Wow, [Name:PlayerNickname ].
You’ve really come a long way, haven’t you.
story_10_07000_en.lsd.story_10_07000/2401_1001_0400_10:
And you’re only getting stronger...
You remind me of Red and Blue when they first
beat me.
story_10_07000_en.lsd.story_10_07000/2401_1001_0600_10: Wh-what’s so funny all of a sudden?!
story_10_07000_en.lsd.story_10_07000/2401_1001_0700_10:
It sounds to me like that battle’s left you aching
for something in the past. You’ve got something
on your mind...about your journey here.
story_10_07000_en.lsd.story_10_07000/2401_1001_0900_10:
Hush, hush. You don’t have to say it out loud...
We both know that battling against
[Name:PlayerNickname ] is a thrill!
story_10_07000_en.lsd.story_10_07000/2401_1001_1000_10:
Whatever you decide to do, it’s your choice.
Just don’t hold yourself back!
That’s never a good choice.
story_10_07000_en.lsd.story_10_07000/2401_1001_1200_10:
Well then! Now that you’ve acquired your
last badge, you’ll be heading back to
Centra City, I’d wager?
story_10_07000_en.lsd.story_10_07000/2401_1001_1300_10:
I shall accompany you.
I’m overdue for a taste of the city air.
story_10_07000_en.lsd.story_10_07000/2401_1001_1400_10:
W-wait! You’re coming with us?!
Can...can you and me walk and talk
together on our way back?!
story_10_07000_en.lsd.story_10_07000/2401_1001_1500_10:
Why, of course! I would like nothing better!
It’s a long walk back, so I hope to hear
lots of your stories.
story_10_07000_en.lsd.story_10_07000/2401_1001_1600_10:
Uh... Say, [Name:PlayerNickname ]...I just
remembered I’ve got this thing I need to do...
story_10_07000_en.lsd.story_10_07000/2401_1001_1700_10:
You guys go on ahead!
I’ll meet you back in Centra City later.
story_10_07000_en.lsd.story_10_07000/2401_1001_1800_10:
I see...
It looks like he’s made up his mind, then.
story_10_07000_en.lsd.story_10_07000/2401_1001_1900_10: Huh? Made up his mind for what?
story_10_07000_en.lsd.story_10_07000/2401_1001_2000_10:
Well, it will be interesting to see how
all of this plays out... Hee hee.

story_10_51000_en.lsd.story_10_51000/2401_1001_0100_10:
Look, [Name:PlayerNickname ]!
The arena’s just up ahead!
story_10_51000_en.lsd.story_10_51000/2401_1001_0200_10:
All we have to do is register right over there,
and we’ll be all set to compete in the PML!
story_10_51000_en.lsd.story_10_51000/2401_1001_0300_10:
Wait a sec... I don’t see Brock anywhere.
He said he would meet us here, right?
story_10_51000_en.lsd.story_10_51000/2401_1001_0500_10:
I’ve been waiting for you guys to arrive...
with my Tyranitar here.
story_10_51000_en.lsd.story_10_51000/2401_1001_0600_10: Whoa... What’s with the outfit, Brock?
story_10_51000_en.lsd.story_10_51000/2401_1001_0800_10:
A fashion designer here on Pasio saw some
new kind of potential in my Pokémon and me
and designed it for us.
story_10_51000_en.lsd.story_10_51000/2401_1001_0900_10:
It’s proof of how much we’ve grown and
accomplished as a sync pair since coming here.
story_10_51000_en.lsd.story_10_51000/2401_1001_1000_10:
Wow, you’ve got so much passion for
this tournament, huh!
story_10_51000_en.lsd.story_10_51000/2401_1001_1200_10:
Up until now, my intention was to watch over
[Name:PlayerNickname ] like a mentor Trainer.
story_10_51000_en.lsd.story_10_51000/2401_1001_1300_10:
But you’ve all grown into incredible sync pairs.
Even island kahunas and other Gym Leaders
have acknowledged your strength.
story_10_51000_en.lsd.story_10_51000/2401_1001_1400_10:
When I see how much you’ve all grown,
I can’t help but want to battle with you myself.
story_10_51000_en.lsd.story_10_51000/2401_1001_1500_10: Not as a teammate...but as another Trainer!
story_10_51000_en.lsd.story_10_51000/2401_1001_1600_10: Brock... I had no idea you felt that way!
story_10_51000_en.lsd.story_10_51000/2401_1001_1700_10:
Well, now you do!
Come on, [Name:PlayerNickname ]! Let’s battle!
story_10_51000_en.lsd.story_10_51000/2401_0401_1900_10:
I had a feeling you might!
Thanks!
story_10_51000_en.lsd.story_10_51000/2401_0402_2100_10:
I wouldn’t want you to!
Thanks!
story_10_51000_en.lsd.story_10_51000/2401_1001_2200_10:
Come on, [Name:PlayerNickname ]!
Show me how strong you’ve become!

story_10_53000_en.lsd.story_10_53000/2401_1001_0200_10:
You did great! Look at how strong you’ve
become, [Name:PlayerNickname ].
story_10_53000_en.lsd.story_10_53000/2401_1001_0300_10:
I’m glad I was able to battle you.
Now I know for a fact that you’re much
stronger than I originally thought.
story_10_53000_en.lsd.story_10_53000/2401_1001_0400_10:
I don’t think there’s anything left for me to
teach you.
story_10_53000_en.lsd.story_10_53000/2401_1001_0500_10:
Huh? What do you mean there’s nothing
left to teach [EN:Gen Ref='255' M='him' F='her' ]?
story_10_53000_en.lsd.story_10_53000/2401_1001_0700_10:
[EN:Gen Ref='255' M='He' F='She' ] doesn’t need anybody to watch over 
[EN:Gen Ref='255' M='him' F='her' ] anymore.
story_10_53000_en.lsd.story_10_53000/2401_1001_0800_10:
I’d like to rejoin the team. Not as a guide or
a coach but as a proper teammate...
Is that all right?
story_10_53000_en.lsd.story_10_53000/2401_0402_1200_10:
Definitely!
Let’s get even stronger together!
story_10_53000_en.lsd.story_10_53000/2401_1001_1300_10:
I’m counting on you to help push this team to
the top. All right, [Name:PlayerNickname ]?
story_10_53000_en.lsd.story_10_53000/2401_1001_1400_10:
Tee-hee! I didn’t think it was possible to be
MORE excited for the tournament!
story_10_53000_en.lsd.story_10_53000/2401_1001_1500_10:
The rest of us will be right there with you!
We’ve all grown sooo much since we
first met each other, huh!
story_10_53000_en.lsd.story_10_53000/2401_1001_1600_10:
I’m so ready! Come on!
Pokémon Masters League, here we come!

story_10_54000_en.lsd.story_10_54000/2401_1001_0100_10:
Ladies and gentlemen, welcome to the
Pokémon Masters League.
Let the opening ceremony begin!
story_10_54000_en.lsd.story_10_54000/2401_1001_0200_10:
I am Lear, host and founder of this tournament.
I expect your undivided attention now!
story_10_54000_en.lsd.story_10_54000/2401_1001_0300_10:
Sync pairs who stand before me...you have
proven your strength by collecting all five
PML Badges!
story_10_54000_en.lsd.story_10_54000/2401_1001_0400_10:
This tournament will decide which team among
you is the strongest of all. I had Pasio designed
and built for that very purpose!
story_10_54000_en.lsd.story_10_54000/2401_1001_0500_10:
So rise, my ambitious Trainers!
Climb the ranks and unleash your power!
Claim the ultimate victory as your own!
story_10_54000_en.lsd.story_10_54000/2401_1001_0600_10:
Or at least entertain the hilarious thought
that you might actually win.
story_10_54000_en.lsd.story_10_54000/2401_1001_0700_10:
Why hilarious? Because you have no chance.
I, Lear, am unquestionably the strongest of all!
story_10_54000_en.lsd.story_10_54000/2401_1001_0900_10:
Sounds like the tournament matches will be
starting soon. I wonder what sort of battles
await us...
story_10_54000_en.lsd.story_10_54000/2401_1001_1000_10:
Cynthia... I should have guessed she’d
be able to get at least this far.
story_10_54000_en.lsd.story_10_54000/2401_1001_1100_10:
I see Blue and Red, too, but I suppose that’s
to be expected as well.
story_10_54000_en.lsd.story_10_54000/2401_1001_1200_10:
If we continue to win, we’ll end up facing
powerhouse Trainers like them somewhere
down the line...
story_10_54000_en.lsd.story_10_54000/2401_1001_1300_10:
Wait...we’re already gonna be competing with
the best of the best, starting right now!
We’ve gotta try our absolute hardest!
story_10_54000_en.lsd.story_10_54000/2401_1001_1400_10:
You’re right. But we went through the
same trials and tribulations that they did.
We belong here just as much as they do.
story_10_54000_en.lsd.story_10_54000/2401_1001_1500_10:
If we unite our hearts as a team, we can
defeat any opponent! I believe in us.
story_10_54000_en.lsd.story_10_54000/2401_1001_1600_10:
Unite your hearts...as a team? *snort*
That is the most ridiculous thing I’ve ever heard!
story_10_54000_en.lsd.story_10_54000/2401_1001_1800_10:
I must say, I never thought the likes of you
would make it this far... I smell Foul Play.
story_10_54000_en.lsd.story_10_54000/2401_1001_1900_10:
E-excuse me?! We’re Trainers of integrity!
We collected our badges fair and square!
story_10_54000_en.lsd.story_10_54000/2401_1001_2100_10:
It seems you made an error when choosing our
PML Leaders. They must have been complete
garbage to have let these amateurs through!
story_10_54000_en.lsd.story_10_54000/2401_1001_2300_10:
Uhh, did you wake up on the wrong side
of bed this morning, Master Lear?
You’re even crankier than usual.
story_10_54000_en.lsd.story_10_54000/2401_1001_2400_10:
Of course I am! All I could see during the
ceremony was that cheeky red-hatted twerp!
story_10_54000_en.lsd.story_10_54000/2401_1001_2500_10:
Ugh... That kid infuriates me!
I shall not rest until I defeat him once and for all!
story_10_54000_en.lsd.story_10_54000/2401_1001_2600_10:
That goes for you, too! Another pip-squeak in a
stupid hat! It’s like you are TRYING to annoy me!
story_10_54000_en.lsd.story_10_54000/2401_1001_2700_10:
Word of advice, Lear: [Name:PlayerNickname ]
is a lot stronger than the last time we met.
story_10_54000_en.lsd.story_10_54000/2401_1001_2800_10:
If you let your guard down, you might be
surprised at the results.
story_10_54000_en.lsd.story_10_54000/2401_1001_2900_10:
You aren’t actually implying that I could LOSE to
[EN:Gen Ref='255' M='him' F='her' ], are you? Hah! When Tepig fly, maybe!
That’s absurd!
story_10_54000_en.lsd.story_10_54000/2401_1001_3000_10:
None of you belong in this tournament!
Just hurry up and lose so I can be rid of you!
story_10_54000_en.lsd.story_10_54000/2401_1001_3100_10: Tsk! Still as pleasant as ever, isn’t he!
story_10_54000_en.lsd.story_10_54000/2401_1001_3200_10:
Are you just gonna let him get away with
saying that stuff, [Name:PlayerNickname ]?!
story_10_54000_en.lsd.story_10_54000/2401_0301_3300_10:
I’ll make him regret it next time
we battle!
story_10_54000_en.lsd.story_10_54000/2401_0401_3400_10:
Good answer. We sync pairs should settle our
scores with Pokémon battles.
story_10_54000_en.lsd.story_10_54000/2401_0302_3500_10:
Right now, I’m more focused on
getting stronger.
story_10_54000_en.lsd.story_10_54000/2401_0402_3600_10:
It’s great to be humble and all...but all of us here
are full-fledged sync pairs. That’s something we
should be proud of.
story_10_54000_en.lsd.story_10_54000/2401_1001_3700_10:
If we keep winning, I’m sure we’ll eventually
have to face him. When the time comes,
let’s show him what we’re made of!
story_10_54000_en.lsd.story_10_54000/2401_1001_3900_10: Hey! Look over there! Isn’t that...
story_10_54000_en.lsd.story_10_54000/2401_1001_4200_10:
It’s good to see you again!
And if you’re here, that must mean...
story_10_54000_en.lsd.story_10_54000/2401_1001_4300_10:
Yep. I managed to form my own team
and collect every last badge.
story_10_54000_en.lsd.story_10_54000/2401_1001_4400_10:
Now that I’m this strong, I won’t let
anyone...anyone...
story_10_54000_en.lsd.story_10_54000/2401_1001_4600_10:
Uhh, are you feeling OK, Paulo?
You look a little pale...
story_10_54000_en.lsd.story_10_54000/2401_1001_4700_10:
Sorry...
I’m probably just a little tired. That’s all.
story_10_54000_en.lsd.story_10_54000/2401_1001_4800_10:
A lot’s happened since we arrived
here, [Name:PlayerNickname ].
We both managed to make it this far.
story_10_54000_en.lsd.story_10_54000/2401_1001_4900_10:
But I worked harder than ever to get to this point.
I don’t plan on losing anytime soon!
story_10_54000_en.lsd.story_10_54000/2401_1001_5000_10: I’ll see you in the finals!

story_11_01000_en.lsd.story_11_01000/2401_1001_0100_10:
Alola!
I guess we’re your first match!
story_11_01000_en.lsd.story_11_01000/2401_1001_0200_10:
My name’s Hau, and this is Sophocles!
We’re buddies from Alola!
story_11_01000_en.lsd.story_11_01000/2401_1001_0300_10:
H-hi... I’m Sophocles...
I’m a Captain back home...
story_11_01000_en.lsd.story_11_01000/2401_1001_0400_10:
