Loosen up, Sophocles!
Just do it like we always do!
story_11_01000_en.lsd.story_11_01000/2401_1001_0500_10:
OK... I’m sorry...
I just g-get so nervous...
story_11_01000_en.lsd.story_11_01000/2401_1001_0600_10:
You’re right, though... How often do you
get the chance to battle against s-so many
different Trainers like this...
story_11_01000_en.lsd.story_11_01000/2401_1001_0700_10:
Yeah! I’m super excited, too!
But since we’re here, let’s aim for the top!
story_11_01000_en.lsd.story_11_01000/2401_1001_0900_10:
That’s the spirit!
I’m gonna go all out, too!
story_11_01000_en.lsd.story_11_01000/2401_0301_1000_10: I’m not gonna just let you win!
story_11_01000_en.lsd.story_11_01000/2401_0401_1100_10: Yeah! That’s what I like to hear!
story_11_01000_en.lsd.story_11_01000/2401_0302_1200_10: That championship is gonna be ours!
story_11_01000_en.lsd.story_11_01000/2401_0402_1300_10: Yeah! That’s what I like to hear!
story_11_01000_en.lsd.story_11_01000/2401_1001_1400_10:
All right, let’s get this started!
Let’s do this, Sophocles!

story_11_02000_en.lsd.story_11_02000/2401_1001_0200_10:
But I still had a lot of fun!
I’m glad I got the chance to compete.
story_11_02000_en.lsd.story_11_02000/2401_1001_0300_10:
I was so focused on the battle that I
forgot to feel nervous at all!
story_11_02000_en.lsd.story_11_02000/2401_1001_0400_10:
You were awesome, [Name:PlayerNickname ]!
I think I got goose bumps... How about you, Hau?
story_11_02000_en.lsd.story_11_02000/2401_1001_0500_10: Yeah, they were really strong. But...
story_11_02000_en.lsd.story_11_02000/2401_1001_0600_10:
Gaaah, we were so close! And we tried
so hard, too. Guess I’ve gotta get even stronger!
story_11_02000_en.lsd.story_11_02000/2401_1001_0700_10:
Yeah... Or, wait a sec! I have an idea!
Why don’t you ask [Name:PlayerNickname ] if
you can join [EN:Gen Ref='255' M='his' F='her' ] team?
story_11_02000_en.lsd.story_11_02000/2401_1001_0900_10:
You can keep battling if you join their team,
and you can keep getting stronger, like you said!
story_11_02000_en.lsd.story_11_02000/2401_1001_1000_10:
Yeah... Yeah, you’re right!
Wow, Sophocles, you really are a genius!
story_11_02000_en.lsd.story_11_02000/2401_1001_1200_10:
Hey, [Name:PlayerNickname ]! I’m joining your
team, OK? Let’s do our best together!
story_11_02000_en.lsd.story_11_02000/2401_1001_1800_10:
I think I’ll just observe for a while.
I want to do an in-depth study of the
way various teams battle together...
story_11_02000_en.lsd.story_11_02000/2401_1001_1900_10:
I think it could be really useful for
my inventions!
story_11_02000_en.lsd.story_11_02000/2401_1001_2000_10:
Yeah? Then from here on out, let’s enjoy the
tournament our own way!
story_11_02000_en.lsd.story_11_02000/2401_1001_2200_10:
All right, then! Let’s do this!
We’re gonna have so much fun!

story_12_01000_en.lsd.story_12_01000/2401_1001_0200_10:
Just when I need him the most, he has to go
and throw out his back!
story_12_01000_en.lsd.story_12_01000/2401_1001_0300_10: I made it so far, and now I don’t have a team...
story_12_01000_en.lsd.story_12_01000/2401_1001_0400_10:
But just when you think my fire’s gonna go out,
it starts to burn even brighter!
story_12_01000_en.lsd.story_12_01000/2401_1001_0500_10:
“The grand tournament had begun at last,
but for the girl, a great challenge remained...”
story_12_01000_en.lsd.story_12_01000/2401_1001_0600_10:
Huh? Who talks like that? Sounds like
somebody reading a book.
story_12_01000_en.lsd.story_12_01000/2401_1001_0700_10:
Phew...
We finally made it to Centra City, Chandelure.
story_12_01000_en.lsd.story_12_01000/2401_1001_0800_10:
Now we just need to hunt for a team...
I hope we can find some nice people to join us!
story_12_01000_en.lsd.story_12_01000/2401_1001_1000_10:
Oh! Hello there, Flint!
I had no idea you were here on Pasio, too.
story_12_01000_en.lsd.story_12_01000/2401_1001_1200_10:
You weren’t thinking of competing
in the PML, were you?
story_12_01000_en.lsd.story_12_01000/2401_1001_1300_10:
What? Oh, yes! I AM planning on competing
in the tournament, as a matter of fact.
story_12_01000_en.lsd.story_12_01000/2401_1001_1500_10: What is it? Is something the matter, Flint?
story_12_01000_en.lsd.story_12_01000/2401_1001_1600_10:
Whooooaaa! I just found the best
possible teammate!
story_12_01000_en.lsd.story_12_01000/2401_1001_1700_10:
Wha—?! Huh?
Am I missing something?!
story_12_01000_en.lsd.story_12_01000/2401_1001_1800_10:
C’mon, Shauntal! You gotta team up with me
so we can burn up the PML together!
story_12_01000_en.lsd.story_12_01000/2401_1001_1900_10: Me?! Form a team with you?
story_12_01000_en.lsd.story_12_01000/2401_1001_2000_10:
I know good and well how fiery your spirit is!
You and I together would be the strongest
team out there!
story_12_01000_en.lsd.story_12_01000/2401_1001_2100_10: I’m flattered that you think so highly of me...
story_12_01000_en.lsd.story_12_01000/2401_1001_2200_10:
but if I compete in this tournament, I’m going to be
competing to win. I intend to take this seriously.
story_12_01000_en.lsd.story_12_01000/2401_1001_2300_10:
Yeah? Well, I will, too! As long as we both
give it our all, nothing is impossible.
story_12_01000_en.lsd.story_12_01000/2401_1001_2600_10:
Can’t you see how she’s
burning up with excitement?
story_12_01000_en.lsd.story_12_01000/2401_1001_2800_10: Now have a look at my Infernape.
story_12_01000_en.lsd.story_12_01000/2401_1001_2900_10: You can see it, right? That same fiery passion?
story_12_01000_en.lsd.story_12_01000/2401_1001_3000_10:
Sure... But I don’t understand what any of
this has to do with winning the tournament.
story_12_01000_en.lsd.story_12_01000/2401_1001_3100_10:
Don’t you see? Pokémon battles are all
about how hot your spirit burns!
story_12_01000_en.lsd.story_12_01000/2401_1001_3200_10:
Just like our fiery hearts, our Pokémon’s bodies
and minds are flaming hot!
story_12_01000_en.lsd.story_12_01000/2401_1001_3300_10:
I don’t think anybody can stop us if we team up.
We can definitely win this whole thing!
story_12_01000_en.lsd.story_12_01000/2401_1001_3400_10: You really think...we can win this together?
story_12_01000_en.lsd.story_12_01000/2401_1001_3900_10: I’m still not sure I understand your logic, Flint...
story_12_01000_en.lsd.story_12_01000/2401_1001_4000_10:
but I do think we have a chance at victory!
With your fiery spirit and my keen observation,
I believe we can win!
story_12_01000_en.lsd.story_12_01000/2401_1001_4100_10:
Yes! Let’s form a team, Flint—a team of flames,
igniting our passion for Pokémon battling!
story_12_01000_en.lsd.story_12_01000/2401_1001_4200_10: That’s what I’m talkin’ about, Shauntal!
story_12_01000_en.lsd.story_12_01000/2401_1001_4300_10: Let’s burn the competition down to cinders!

story_12_02000_en.lsd.story_12_02000/2401_1001_0100_10:
Oh, so we’re up against you, huh?
I’ve heard a lot about you—and how
you’re supposedly the new up-and-comer!
story_12_02000_en.lsd.story_12_02000/2401_1001_0200_10:
Let’s give it all we’ve got and have a burning-hot
battle! With Shauntal and me together, you’re up
against two fiery Elite Four members!
story_12_02000_en.lsd.story_12_02000/2401_1001_0300_10:
“A fervent, hot-blooded pro, ready to charge...
and a fresh, young talent, poised for battle...
Flames of determination danced in their eyes.”
story_12_02000_en.lsd.story_12_02000/2401_1001_0400_10:
“The teams were well matched in power and 
skill...but only one could claim victory in the end.”
story_12_02000_en.lsd.story_12_02000/2401_1001_0500_10:
Oh, I do hope it’s our team that triumphs
at the end of this story!
story_12_02000_en.lsd.story_12_02000/2401_1001_0600_10:
No need to hope for anything, Shauntal.
We’ve definitely got this!
story_12_02000_en.lsd.story_12_02000/2401_1001_0700_10: Let’s show ’em just how hot we can get!
story_12_02000_en.lsd.story_12_02000/2401_1001_0800_10: Right! We’ll give it everything we’ve got!
story_12_02000_en.lsd.story_12_02000/2401_1001_0900_10:
All right, [Name:PlayerNickname ]!
Let’s see how fiery your passion for battles is!

story_12_03000_en.lsd.story_12_03000/2401_1001_0300_10:
Oh, Flint... Your flame can’t have been
snuffed out that easily.
story_12_03000_en.lsd.story_12_03000/2401_1001_0400_10:
But I’m done for...
Burned right down to cinders...
story_12_03000_en.lsd.story_12_03000/2401_1001_0600_10:
This experience has given me so much to be
inspired about! I feel like I could turn it into
a spectacular novel.
story_12_03000_en.lsd.story_12_03000/2401_1001_0700_10:
I guess it’s not as easy to succeed
in the PML as I thought.
story_12_03000_en.lsd.story_12_03000/2401_1001_0800_10:
We did have a burning-hot battle
thanks to you, though, Shauntal!
story_12_03000_en.lsd.story_12_03000/2401_1001_1100_10:
Um, [Name:PlayerNickname ]? Would you be
willing to let Flint here join your team?
story_12_03000_en.lsd.story_12_03000/2401_1001_1200_10: Huh? What’re you talkin’ about, Shauntal?
story_12_03000_en.lsd.story_12_03000/2401_1001_1300_10:
Flint, you and Infernape have a fire within you.
Your flame burns brightly, and you have the
potential to burn even brighter still!
story_12_03000_en.lsd.story_12_03000/2401_1001_1400_10:
It’s time to use that flame to shine a light
on [Name:PlayerNickname ] and [EN:Gen Ref='255' M='his' F='her' ] Pokémon.
story_12_03000_en.lsd.story_12_03000/2401_1001_1600_10:
Well, I’m an author as well as a Pokémon
Trainer. Sometimes it’s better for me to take
a step back and observe the bigger picture.
story_12_03000_en.lsd.story_12_03000/2401_1001_1700_10:
What do you think, [Name:PlayerNickname ]?
Will you let Flint join your team?
story_12_03000_en.lsd.story_12_03000/2401_0301_1800_10: I’m ready to feel the burn!
story_12_03000_en.lsd.story_12_03000/2401_0302_2000_10:
All this fire and passion might be a
bit too much for me...
story_12_03000_en.lsd.story_12_03000/2401_0402_2100_10:
Aww, c’mon! You can never have too much heat!
Let me on the team. I promise you won’t regret it!
story_12_03000_en.lsd.story_12_03000/2401_1001_2200_10:
Oh, and in case you didn’t catch my name,
I’m Flint, a Fire-type user who specializes
in burning-hot battles!
story_12_03000_en.lsd.story_12_03000/2401_1001_2300_10: I’m looking forward to teaming up with you!

story_13_01000_en.lsd.story_13_01000/2401_1001_0100_10:
So...you’re sure you don’t want to join our
team, then?
story_13_01000_en.lsd.story_13_01000/2401_1001_0200_10:
Yeah, I’m sorry...
I really love the team I’m on already!
story_13_01000_en.lsd.story_13_01000/2401_1001_0300_10: You guys do look awfully strong, though.
story_13_01000_en.lsd.story_13_01000/2401_1001_0400_10:
I hope we get to battle someday! I’ll be looking
forward to it! Bye for now!
story_13_01000_en.lsd.story_13_01000/2401_1001_0700_10:
Hmph... Sooner or later, she’ll learn she made
a mistake turning down my invitation.
story_13_01000_en.lsd.story_13_01000/2401_1001_0800_10:
Though I have to admit, the girl has guts.
She opposed me, knowing full well that I’m
the greatest dragon master in the world!
story_13_01000_en.lsd.story_13_01000/2401_1001_0900_10: I’m not sure if she agrees with that last part...
story_13_01000_en.lsd.story_13_01000/2401_1001_1000_10:
Well, no matter. Where do we go from here?
I know you’ve taken a liking to the girl,
even if you won’t admit it.
story_13_01000_en.lsd.story_13_01000/2401_1001_1100_10:
Should we look for a new member?
We don’t have that much time left.
story_13_01000_en.lsd.story_13_01000/2401_1001_1200_10:
I don’t think so. We don’t need anyone else.
We should use that time to train.
story_13_01000_en.lsd.story_13_01000/2401_1001_1300_10:
After all, I’m the greatest dragon master ever!
And you’re as elite as they come—one of the
Indigo Elite Four, like my cousin Lance!
story_13_01000_en.lsd.story_13_01000/2401_1001_1400_10:
Our team is more than strong enough with
just the two of us. If we were any stronger,
we’d simply be unbeatable!
story_13_01000_en.lsd.story_13_01000/2401_1001_1500_10:
You just wait and see, Iris! You’ll regret choosing
another team over ours... I know you will!
story_13_01000_en.lsd.story_13_01000/2401_1001_1700_10:
Clair still has so much of that boasting, youthful
overconfidence, doesn’t she... I suppose that’s
where she and Lance are different.
story_13_01000_en.lsd.story_13_01000/2401_1001_1800_10:
Then again, maybe that’s what makes her
so fun to watch... Good luck, Clair.
I’ll be right there with you.

story_13_02000_en.lsd.story_13_02000/2401_1001_0100_10:
Ah, [Name:PlayerNickname ]! There you are...
I’m Clair. I’ve been looking forward to this battle.
story_13_02000_en.lsd.story_13_02000/2401_1001_0200_10:
Step right up and witness the might of our
team of dragon masters! Your streak of
good luck ends here.
story_13_02000_en.lsd.story_13_02000/2401_1001_0300_10:
I’m Lorelei. I’m not exactly a Dragon-type
Pokémon user, but that’s no matter.
story_13_02000_en.lsd.story_13_02000/2401_1001_0400_10:
We’ve trained hard, too.
Watch out, or I’ll put your Pokémon on ice!
story_13_02000_en.lsd.story_13_02000/2401_1001_0600_10:
It’s time for you to learn a lesson in strength
from a world-class master of dragons and a
queen of ice!

story_13_03000_en.lsd.story_13_03000/2401_1001_0200_10:
I can’t accept this...
There must be some mistake.
story_13_03000_en.lsd.story_13_03000/2401_1001_0400_10:
You’re all really strong, aren’t you.
Even my Lapras’s Blizzard couldn’t
put out the fire in your hearts.
story_13_03000_en.lsd.story_13_03000/2401_1001_0500_10:
But now that you beat us, I expect you to keep on
winning! You owe us that much, right?
story_13_03000_en.lsd.story_13_03000/2401_1001_0900_10:
Well? How was your first taste of the
strength of a dragon master!
story_13_03000_en.lsd.story_13_03000/2401_1001_1100_10:
You felt it, didn’t you? The energy that my
presence brings to this competition!
We can’t let that end here!
story_13_03000_en.lsd.story_13_03000/2401_1001_1200_10: So...I suppose I can lend your team a hand!
story_13_03000_en.lsd.story_13_03000/2401_1001_1500_10:
S-say something!
You’re not actually thinking of refusing, are you?!
story_13_03000_en.lsd.story_13_03000/2401_1001_1600_10: You really are fun to watch, aren’t you, Clair.
story_13_03000_en.lsd.story_13_03000/2401_1001_1700_10:
That does sound like an interesting idea, though.
What do you say? Could you take Clair along
with you?
story_13_03000_en.lsd.story_13_03000/2401_1001_1800_10:
She might be a little...eccentric, as you can see,
but you can count on her. I guarantee it.
story_13_03000_en.lsd.story_13_03000/2401_1001_2000_10:
You don’t have to shoulder this alone, Clair.
Aim for the top together, with a new team.
story_13_03000_en.lsd.story_13_03000/2401_1001_2100_10:
That is...if you ever want to be as strong as
Lance, of course.
story_13_03000_en.lsd.story_13_03000/2401_1001_2300_10:
O-of course I do... And besides, I already
surpass Lance when it comes to battle skills!
story_13_03000_en.lsd.story_13_03000/2401_1001_2400_10:
You’ll see! Now that you’ll be in the crowd,
I hope you watch me more closely.
story_13_03000_en.lsd.story_13_03000/2401_1001_2500_10: Thank you. I’ll do my best for the both of us.
story_13_03000_en.lsd.story_13_03000/2401_1001_2700_10:
Don’t worry, [Name:PlayerNickname ]! You can
rest assured with Kingdra and I on the team.
story_13_03000_en.lsd.story_13_03000/2401_1001_2800_10:
I, the greatest dragon master of all time,
shall tip the scales in our favor!

story_14_01000_en.lsd.story_14_01000/2401_1001_0100_10:
A boy with innocent eyes...
and a Beedrill with a poisonous stinger...
story_14_01000_en.lsd.story_14_01000/2401_1001_0200_10:
The contrast they create is simply sublime.
Fantastic! Just fantastic!
story_14_01000_en.lsd.story_14_01000/2401_1001_0300_10:
Um, e-excuse me...Viola?
How much longer are you going to be
taking our pictures?
story_14_01000_en.lsd.story_14_01000/2401_1001_0400_10:
Just a bit longer! I think I can get exactly the shot
I’m looking for if I just take a few more...
story_14_01000_en.lsd.story_14_01000/2401_1001_0500_10:
But the PML tournament matches are starting
soon! I still have a lot of training to do...
story_14_01000_en.lsd.story_14_01000/2401_1001_0700_10:
Tomorrow’s the day you win all your battles and
show the world the true strength of Bug-type
Pokémon, right?
story_14_01000_en.lsd.story_14_01000/2401_1001_0800_10:
Exactly! I’ve studied Bug-type Pokémon more than
anyone else. When we fight, it’s majestic!
story_14_01000_en.lsd.story_14_01000/2401_1001_0900_10:
A lot of people are afraid of them because of the
way they look, but I’m gonna show those people
how awesome Bug-type Pokémon really are!
story_14_01000_en.lsd.story_14_01000/2401_1001_1000_10:
Oh, you looked really determined
just now! Fantastic!
story_14_01000_en.lsd.story_14_01000/2401_1001_1100_10:
I was just thinking...I dream of being a
Bug-type Pokémon Professor one day...
and you’re a photographer.
story_14_01000_en.lsd.story_14_01000/2401_1001_1200_10:
We’re both Gym Leaders, but we’re about as
different as two people can get, huh?
story_14_01000_en.lsd.story_14_01000/2401_1001_1300_10:
All right, I finally got the shot I wanted!
Wanna start training?
story_14_01000_en.lsd.story_14_01000/2401_1001_1500_10:
You wanna show the world how cool Bug-type
Pokémon are, right? I think I can give you
a hand with that.
story_14_01000_en.lsd.story_14_01000/2401_1001_1600_10:
With you and me together, Bugsy, we can show
the world how fantastic Bug-type Pokémon are!
story_14_01000_en.lsd.story_14_01000/2401_1001_1800_10:
Bug-type Pokémon are our best friends!
Now let’s get ready to smile for all the cameras!

story_14_02000_en.lsd.story_14_02000/2401_1001_0100_10:
You must be the sync pair I’ve been hearing
about—the one they say can’t be stopped!
story_14_02000_en.lsd.story_14_02000/2401_1001_0200_10:
Ooh, and such a photogenic face, too!
Perfect for a picture! Let me go ahead
and take one right now.
story_14_02000_en.lsd.story_14_02000/2401_0401_0400_10:
Nice! Even that confused look on your face is
fantastic! Just fantastic!
story_14_02000_en.lsd.story_14_02000/2401_0402_0600_10:
What a cooperative subject you are!
And that expression is just fantastic!
story_14_02000_en.lsd.story_14_02000/2401_1001_0700_10:
Viola! You shouldn’t take people’s photos
like that without asking their permission!
story_14_02000_en.lsd.story_14_02000/2401_1001_0800_10:
Sorry about that, [Name:PlayerNickname ].
Sometimes Viola gets excited and starts
snapping photos without really thinking...
story_14_02000_en.lsd.story_14_02000/2401_1001_0900_10:
All right, the shoot is finished! Time for me to
transition from being a photographer to being
a Bug-type Pokémon Trainer!
story_14_02000_en.lsd.story_14_02000/2401_1001_1000_10:
My lens is always focused on victory.
I won’t let anything ruin this shot!
story_14_02000_en.lsd.story_14_02000/2401_1001_1100_10:
Hey...Viola? After the match is over,
can you do me a little favor?
story_14_02000_en.lsd.story_14_02000/2401_1001_1300_10:
I was wondering if we could take a victory
photo with Beedrill and Surskit! Pleeease?

story_14_03000_en.lsd.story_14_03000/2401_1001_0100_10:
You and your Pokémon make the best sync pair
around! Just fantastic!
story_14_03000_en.lsd.story_14_03000/2401_1001_0200_10:
We lost... But...for some reason, I don’t really feel
all that bad about it.
story_14_03000_en.lsd.story_14_03000/2401_1001_0300_10:
That must be because you gave it everything 
you had! You did great, Bugsy!
story_14_03000_en.lsd.story_14_03000/2401_1001_0400_10: You and Beedrill were both really cool!
story_14_03000_en.lsd.story_14_03000/2401_1001_0500_10:
Hey, Viola...
Can I ask you a favor?
story_14_03000_en.lsd.story_14_03000/2401_1001_0600_10:
I’d love something to remember this battle by...
Do you think you could take a photo of me and
[Name:PlayerNickname ]? Pleeease?
story_14_03000_en.lsd.story_14_03000/2401_1001_0700_10:
What a fantastic idea!
How about it, [Name:PlayerNickname ]?
story_14_03000_en.lsd.story_14_03000/2401_0401_0900_10: OK, everybody get in the frame!
story_14_03000_en.lsd.story_14_03000/2401_0402_1100_10:
What a lovely subject you are!
OK, everybody get in the frame!
story_14_03000_en.lsd.story_14_03000/2401_1001_1200_10:
All right, I got the perfect shot of your smiling
faces. That expression looks good on you, Bugsy!
story_14_03000_en.lsd.story_14_03000/2401_1001_1400_10:
You’re probably right. I’m really glad we got
to battle each other today!
story_14_03000_en.lsd.story_14_03000/2401_1001_1500_10:
You made me want to learn even more
about Bug-type Pokémon!
story_14_03000_en.lsd.story_14_03000/2401_1001_1600_10:
That sort of got me thinking, actually!
There are tons of other Trainers here on Pasio
that use Bug-type Pokémon like me...
story_14_03000_en.lsd.story_14_03000/2401_1001_1700_10:
Now is the perfect time to go out and find
them all. It’s my chance to study how they
battle with their Pokémon!
story_14_03000_en.lsd.story_14_03000/2401_1001_1800_10:
Fantastic idea, Bugsy! And...maybe I could go
along with [Name:PlayerNickname ].
story_14_03000_en.lsd.story_14_03000/2401_1001_1900_10:
The way you made Bugsy’s face light up like that
was so lovely, [Name:PlayerNickname ].
story_14_03000_en.lsd.story_14_03000/2401_1001_2000_10:
I think if I hang around you, I’ll be able to take
tons of pictures of smiling Trainers and Pokémon!
story_14_03000_en.lsd.story_14_03000/2401_1001_2100_10:
How about it, [Name:PlayerNickname ]?
Can I join your team? Pretty please!
story_14_03000_en.lsd.story_14_03000/2401_0402_2500_10:
Woo-hoo! Wait... That does mean yes, right?
I’m looking forward to being a part of your team!
story_14_03000_en.lsd.story_14_03000/2401_1001_2600_10: Well, I guess it’s good-bye for now, Bugsy.
story_14_03000_en.lsd.story_14_03000/2401_1001_2700_10:
I guess so. But I hope we get to team up
together again someday!
story_14_03000_en.lsd.story_14_03000/2401_1001_2800_10:
Oh, that tearful look in your eyes at the thought of
leaving my side! Fantastic! Just fantastic!

story_15_01000_en.lsd.story_15_01000/2401_1001_0100_10: So, are you our match for today?
story_15_01000_en.lsd.story_15_01000/2401_1001_0200_10:
Whew, this one looks really tough, Grimsley.
This might be the end of the road for us.
story_15_01000_en.lsd.story_15_01000/2401_1001_0400_10:
Remind me...who was it that completely
overpowered our last opponents after saying
that very same thing?
story_15_01000_en.lsd.story_15_01000/2401_1001_0500_10:
Heh, sounds like something you would do,
Mr. Elite Four.
story_15_01000_en.lsd.story_15_01000/2401_1001_0600_10:
Besides, I was only able to make it this far thanks
to you.
story_15_01000_en.lsd.story_15_01000/2401_1001_0700_10:
Surrounding yourself in a blanket of smoke,
keeping your cards close to your chest...
Typical Nanu.
story_15_01000_en.lsd.story_15_01000/2401_1001_1000_10:
I get the feeling those same tactics won’t work
on our newest contenders, though.
story_15_01000_en.lsd.story_15_01000/2401_1001_1100_10:
These Trainers are earnest—I can see it in
their eyes. They’re not the type to fall for
cheap tricks or bluffs.
story_15_01000_en.lsd.story_15_01000/2401_1001_1200_10: Please. I’ve never done such a thing.
story_15_01000_en.lsd.story_15_01000/2401_1001_1300_10:
Well, as you can see, kid, we’re just a couple
of oddballs.
story_15_01000_en.lsd.story_15_01000/2401_1001_1400_10: Let’s see how you handle opponents like us.

story_15_02000_en.lsd.story_15_02000/2401_1001_0200_10:
You said you’re [Name:PlayerNickname ], right?
You sure are something.
story_15_02000_en.lsd.story_15_02000/2401_1001_0300_10:
Seeing how strong you are, I’m guessing you’ve
had your fair share of run-ins with Team Break?
story_15_02000_en.lsd.story_15_02000/2401_0401_0500_10:
You didn’t even hesitate to answer, did ya?
I appreciate that.
story_15_02000_en.lsd.story_15_02000/2401_0402_0700_10: Sounds like I was on target.
story_15_02000_en.lsd.story_15_02000/2401_1001_0800_10:
I may not be a zippy young Trainer like you
anymore, but I still train hard to get stronger.
story_15_02000_en.lsd.story_15_02000/2401_1001_0900_10:
What would you say to having somebody
like me on your team, kid?
story_15_02000_en.lsd.story_15_02000/2401_0401_1100_10:
You might be a little too earnest for your
own good... But I appreciate it.
story_15_02000_en.lsd.story_15_02000/2401_0402_1300_10:
Don’t worry. I might prefer Dark types,
but I’m a good guy.
story_15_02000_en.lsd.story_15_02000/2401_1001_1400_10:
Guess that’s that, then.
What about you, Grimsley?
story_15_02000_en.lsd.story_15_02000/2401_1001_1500_10: I think I’ll pass for now.
story_15_02000_en.lsd.story_15_02000/2401_1001_1600_10:
There’s only room for one wild card in any
good deck.
story_15_02000_en.lsd.story_15_02000/2401_1001_1800_10:
Well, guess it’ll just be me, then.
Looking forward to working with you kids.

story_15_03000_en.lsd.story_15_03000/2401_1001_0100_10:
Guess this is the end of the road for
our little team.
story_15_03000_en.lsd.story_15_03000/2401_1001_0200_10:
And it was me who bugged you about teaming up
in the first place, wasn’t it? Sorry about that.
story_15_03000_en.lsd.story_15_03000/2401_1001_0300_10:
It’s fine. All par for the course...
Game aficionados like myself are used to
diving into competitions on a whim.
story_15_03000_en.lsd.story_15_03000/2401_1001_0400_10:
Besides, I think I know what your
true aim is here, anyway.
story_15_03000_en.lsd.story_15_03000/2401_1001_0500_10: It’s a pain in the neck, but I can’t let this slide.
story_15_03000_en.lsd.story_15_03000/2401_1001_0600_10:
I know there’s something lurking beneath the
surface with that Team Break gang.
story_15_03000_en.lsd.story_15_03000/2401_1001_0700_10:
I can’t nap in peace until I find out what that
something is.
story_15_03000_en.lsd.story_15_03000/2401_1001_0800_10:
You think the kid’s the best way to get to the
bottom of it, huh?
story_15_03000_en.lsd.story_15_03000/2401_1001_0900_10:
I’ll admit, [Name:PlayerNickname ] does have
a way of drawing out the passion in others.
A born leader.
story_15_03000_en.lsd.story_15_03000/2401_1001_1000_10:
I mean, [EN:Gen Ref='255' M='he' F='she' ]’d have to be if [EN:Gen Ref='255' M='he' F='she' ] managed to
impassion a jaded guy like me.
story_15_03000_en.lsd.story_15_03000/2401_1001_1100_10:
That’s reason enough to make [EN:Gen Ref='255' M='him' F='her' ] a target...
So you decided to follow along to protect [EN:Gen Ref='255' M='him' F='her' ]
and [EN:Gen Ref='255' M='his' F='her' ] team. That’s what this is all about?
story_15_03000_en.lsd.story_15_03000/2401_1001_1300_10: Heh, you can think what you want.
story_15_03000_en.lsd.story_15_03000/2401_1001_1400_10:
Well, why don’t you just do what you want
and let me do the same.
story_15_03000_en.lsd.story_15_03000/2401_1001_1500_10:
Who knows? The next time we meet, we might
be fighting on opposing teams.
story_15_03000_en.lsd.story_15_03000/2401_1001_1600_10:
Cut me some slack here. I wouldn’t stand a
chance against you.
story_15_03000_en.lsd.story_15_03000/2401_1001_1700_10:
But if you’re gonna find yourself another
teammate, you might want somebody that uses
a different type Pokémon than you.
story_15_03000_en.lsd.story_15_03000/2401_1001_1800_10:
Hmph. I still can’t tell what’s going on in that
head of yours.
story_15_03000_en.lsd.story_15_03000/2401_1001_1900_10: I think it’s time I took my leave...
story_15_03000_en.lsd.story_15_03000/2401_1001_2000_10: Oh, before you go, I forgot to tell you.
story_15_03000_en.lsd.story_15_03000/2401_1001_2300_10: Let’s get some Sushi High Roller. My treat.
story_15_03000_en.lsd.story_15_03000/2401_1001_2400_10: I’ll think about it, old man.

story_16_01000_en.lsd.story_16_01000/2401_1001_0100_10:
Here they are, Father!
It’s [Name:PlayerNickname ]’s team!
story_16_01000_en.lsd.story_16_01000/2401_0401_0400_10:
I like your spirit!
But this will not go as you hope!
story_16_01000_en.lsd.story_16_01000/2401_0302_0500_10:
You never know.
We haven’t even battled yet.
story_16_01000_en.lsd.story_16_01000/2401_0402_0600_10:
We can already see the results, for the battle
has already started!
story_16_01000_en.lsd.story_16_01000/2401_1001_0700_10:
We are modern ninjas, living in the shadows.
We have mastered the art of espionage.
We already know everything about you!
story_16_01000_en.lsd.story_16_01000/2401_1001_0800_10:
You should be flattered. Father only prepares like
this for opponents that he considers formidable.
story_16_01000_en.lsd.story_16_01000/2401_1001_0900_10:
Some would say that we rely too much on
underhanded tactics...
story_16_01000_en.lsd.story_16_01000/2401_1001_1000_10:
But that is not the truth. A true ninja masters
many strategic techniques!
story_16_01000_en.lsd.story_16_01000/2401_1001_1100_10:
Don’t think that your conventional strategies
will work against us!
story_16_01000_en.lsd.story_16_01000/2401_1001_1200_10:
Allow us to show you that there are battles
you cannot overcome with strength alone!

story_16_02000_en.lsd.story_16_02000/2401_1001_0100_10:
Fwahahaha!
A splendid display! We concede!
story_16_02000_en.lsd.story_16_02000/2401_1001_0200_10:
You stuck to your earnest and straightforward
tactics, and we stuck to our ninja tactics.
We may have lost, but we have no regrets!
story_16_02000_en.lsd.story_16_02000/2401_1001_0600_10: I’m not a child. I know why we lost that battle.
story_16_02000_en.lsd.story_16_02000/2401_1001_0900_10:
Listen to me! Right now, we are not just father
and daughter, but equals on the same team.
story_16_02000_en.lsd.story_16_02000/2401_1001_1000_10: This defeat is shared. Do not blame only yourself.
story_16_02000_en.lsd.story_16_02000/2401_1001_1200_10:
You can’t spoil me like that!
If you really consider me an equal,
you should be more strict with me!
story_16_02000_en.lsd.story_16_02000/2401_1001_1400_10:
Besides, I don’t want to take your kindness for
granted! I have to become stronger so that
I can proudly call myself your equal.
story_16_02000_en.lsd.story_16_02000/2401_1001_1500_10: That’s why I’m going to go on a journey to train!
story_16_02000_en.lsd.story_16_02000/2401_1001_1700_10:
I understand. Do what you must!
Be diligent in your training, Daughter.
story_16_02000_en.lsd.story_16_02000/2401_1001_1800_10:
I guess this is good-bye for a while.
I promise I’ll come back stronger.
story_16_02000_en.lsd.story_16_02000/2401_1001_1900_10: So when I do, let’s battle together!
story_16_02000_en.lsd.story_16_02000/2401_1001_2100_10:
My apologies. I am sorry you had to witness
our familial squabbles.
story_16_02000_en.lsd.story_16_02000/2401_0401_2300_10:
I would love to.
But even if I did, I know she’d send me away.
story_16_02000_en.lsd.story_16_02000/2401_0401_2400_10:
Moreover, she is an accomplished ninja herself.
I must respect her wishes.
story_16_02000_en.lsd.story_16_02000/2401_0402_2600_10:
Perhaps. But as a parent, I sometimes wish
she would depend on me more.
story_16_02000_en.lsd.story_16_02000/2401_0402_2700_10:
But then again, I also know that it is my duty
as a parent to respect her decisions.
story_16_02000_en.lsd.story_16_02000/2401_1001_2800_10:
To see my daughter act with such resolve...
I must continue to find my own strength as well.
story_16_02000_en.lsd.story_16_02000/2401_1001_2900_10:
[Name:PlayerNickname ], forgive my sudden
request, but...may I join your team?
story_16_02000_en.lsd.story_16_02000/2401_0401_3100_10:
Indeed! I cannot allow myself to be weaker than
Janine when she returns!
story_16_02000_en.lsd.story_16_02000/2401_0302_3200_10: It’d be great with you on the team!
story_16_02000_en.lsd.story_16_02000/2401_0402_3300_10:
Fwahaha!
Leave anything poison related to me!
story_16_02000_en.lsd.story_16_02000/2401_1001_3400_10:
You may have beaten me, but don’t forget
that I am a member of the Indigo Elite Four.
story_16_02000_en.lsd.story_16_02000/2401_1001_3500_10: I will definitely be of use to your team.
story_16_02000_en.lsd.story_16_02000/2401_1001_3600_10:
As long as we can watch each other’s back
and try to cover each other’s weaknesses,
we can surely surpass our current limits!

story_17_01000_en.lsd.story_17_01000/2401_1001_0100_10:
We’ll be facing quite the formidable
opponent in our next battle.
It’s [Name:PlayerNickname ]’s team.
story_17_01000_en.lsd.story_17_01000/2401_1001_0200_10:
They may not be the most experienced, but they’ve
got a lot of momentum. An opponent like that can
be tough to handle when they’re on a roll.
story_17_01000_en.lsd.story_17_01000/2401_1001_0300_10:
OK, so what we gotta figure out is how to
mess their rhythm up.
story_17_01000_en.lsd.story_17_01000/2401_1001_0400_10:
Oh, don’t worry, girls!
We’ll beat that team to smithereens, no problem.
story_17_01000_en.lsd.story_17_01000/2401_1001_0500_10:
We ARE the Elite Four, after all!
Or, well, three members of the Elite Four
from different regions...
story_17_01000_en.lsd.story_17_01000/2401_1001_0600_10:
Don’t let our individual titles get to your head.
This is a team battle, after all.
story_17_01000_en.lsd.story_17_01000/2401_1001_0700_10:
If each of us doesn’t focus on her own strengths
and support the others in battle, we may end up
losing what should have been a winnable battle.
story_17_01000_en.lsd.story_17_01000/2401_1001_0800_10:
I know that. And like I said before, I don’t think
we have anything to worry about!
The three of us can do this!
story_17_01000_en.lsd.story_17_01000/2401_1001_0900_10:
Well, well, well.
I suppose confidence is a good thing.
story_17_01000_en.lsd.story_17_01000/2401_1001_1200_10:
Oh, sorry!
You just reminded me of my grandma.
story_17_01000_en.lsd.story_17_01000/2401_1001_1300_10:
She would teach me all sorts of things just like
that when I was a kid.
story_17_01000_en.lsd.story_17_01000/2401_1001_1400_10: How rude! Comparing me to your old granny!
story_17_01000_en.lsd.story_17_01000/2401_1001_1600_10:
I suppose I forgive you. I know you meant it as
a compliment, so I’ll try to take it that way.
story_17_01000_en.lsd.story_17_01000/2401_1001_1700_10:
There’s one thing I wanted to say to you girls
before this next battle.
story_17_01000_en.lsd.story_17_01000/2401_1001_1800_10:
We came together because we thought we had
some kind of connection, but this team of ours is
really not half bad.
story_17_01000_en.lsd.story_17_01000/2401_1001_2000_10:
Then let’s give it our all out there and show
everyone the strength of Ghost-type Pokémon!

story_17_02000_en.lsd.story_17_02000/2401_1001_0100_10: This is it—the real thing. Are you girls ready?
story_17_02000_en.lsd.story_17_02000/2401_1001_0400_10:
That’s what I like to hear.
[Name:PlayerNickname ], was it?
story_17_02000_en.lsd.story_17_02000/2401_1001_0500_10:
As you can see, we are a team of
Ghost-type Pokémon Trainers.
story_17_02000_en.lsd.story_17_02000/2401_1001_0600_10:
We’ll show you just how strong a team full
of ghosts can be—and win while we’re at it!
story_17_02000_en.lsd.story_17_02000/2401_0402_1000_10:
Ahahaha, perhaps this will be over
before the battle begins?
story_17_02000_en.lsd.story_17_02000/2401_1001_1100_10:
Enough with the formalities! Let’s get started.
After all, Pokémon are—

story_17_03000_en.lsd.story_17_03000/2401_1001_0100_10:
Oh my! I can’t believe we lost.
You’re quite the Trainer!
story_17_03000_en.lsd.story_17_03000/2401_1001_0200_10:
It seems that you all have a better grasp
on what it takes to truly battle as a team.
story_17_03000_en.lsd.story_17_03000/2401_1001_0300_10: Darn it! We were so close, too!
story_17_03000_en.lsd.story_17_03000/2401_1001_0400_10:
Aw, this stinks...
I know I could have done better!
story_17_03000_en.lsd.story_17_03000/2401_1001_0500_10:
As long as we understand what we did wrong,
that’s enough. Reflecting on our mistakes makes
us stronger as people.
story_17_03000_en.lsd.story_17_03000/2401_1001_0600_10:
I have to thank you, [Name:PlayerNickname ].
This defeat will make these girls stronger still.
story_17_03000_en.lsd.story_17_03000/2401_0402_1000_10: Ahaha! I appreciate you saying that!
story_17_03000_en.lsd.story_17_03000/2401_1001_1100_10:
This may seem sudden, but could I ask you for
a favor, [Name:PlayerNickname ]?
story_17_03000_en.lsd.story_17_03000/2401_1001_1200_10:
I’d like you to let these girls join your team.
They need more experience battling.
story_17_03000_en.lsd.story_17_03000/2401_1001_1400_10:
They could experience many kinds of battles and
encounter many kinds of Pokémon with you.
story_17_03000_en.lsd.story_17_03000/2401_1001_1500_10:
And also meet many new friends.
If you’d let them be a part of your team,
I’m sure they could do all those things.
story_17_03000_en.lsd.story_17_03000/2401_1001_1700_10:
I need to start from scratch. I’ll sit back and
watch the tournament and try to learn more
about team battles.
story_17_03000_en.lsd.story_17_03000/2401_1001_1800_10:
Once I’m satisfied, I’ll make a team again. Who
knows—maybe someday I’ll face you in battle.
story_17_03000_en.lsd.story_17_03000/2401_1001_1900_10:
OK... If that’s what you think is best,
I’ll gladly join [Name:PlayerNickname ]’s team.
story_17_03000_en.lsd.story_17_03000/2401_1001_2000_10:
I’ll get stronger and stronger, and then someday
I’ll beat you and your new team, Agatha!
story_17_03000_en.lsd.story_17_03000/2401_1001_2100_10: That’s the spirit. Keep doing your best.
story_17_03000_en.lsd.story_17_03000/2401_1001_2200_10: Sorry... I don’t think I’m gonna join.
story_17_03000_en.lsd.story_17_03000/2401_1001_2300_10: Oh, you have a problem with my suggestion?
story_17_03000_en.lsd.story_17_03000/2401_1001_2400_10:
No, it’s not that! I just want to take some time to
learn more about team battles, too.
story_17_03000_en.lsd.story_17_03000/2401_1001_2500_10:
I was thinking I might stick around with you
and hopefully pick your brain a bit...
What do you think?
story_17_03000_en.lsd.story_17_03000/2401_1001_2600_10: Hmmph. I guess I can’t stop you.
story_17_03000_en.lsd.story_17_03000/2401_1001_2800_10:
Well then, do me a favor and take good care
of Acerola, [Name:PlayerNickname ].
story_17_03000_en.lsd.story_17_03000/2401_0401_3000_10: That’s what I like to hear. Thanks!
story_17_03000_en.lsd.story_17_03000/2401_0402_3200_10: You bet! I’m giving this everything I’ve got!
story_17_03000_en.lsd.story_17_03000/2401_1001_3300_10:
Ready when you are, [Name:PlayerNickname ]!
See you around soon, Agatha, Phoebe!

story_18_01000_en.lsd.story_18_01000/2401_1001_0200_10:
Hey, Cheren.
What’s with the long face?
story_18_01000_en.lsd.story_18_01000/2401_1001_0300_10:
Well, you went on a massive journey around
the Unova region...
story_18_01000_en.lsd.story_18_01000/2401_1001_0400_10:
and I followed a similar path right there
along with you. Now I’m a Gym Leader.
story_18_01000_en.lsd.story_18_01000/2401_1001_0500_10:
Honestly, I think we make a pretty strong team,
and I’m totally confident in our battle skills.
It’s just that...
story_18_01000_en.lsd.story_18_01000/2401_1001_0700_10:
We might have to go up against Champion-level
Trainers from here on out.
If we’re lucky, we’ll be evenly matched.
story_18_01000_en.lsd.story_18_01000/2401_1001_0800_10:
In some respects, we’re here as challengers.
There are probably going to be some rough
battles up ahead.
story_18_01000_en.lsd.story_18_01000/2401_1001_0900_10: Yeah. I’ve been thinking the same thing.
story_18_01000_en.lsd.story_18_01000/2401_1001_1000_10:
Moving forward in this competition is going to
require more strength and power than we’ve
ever had to use before.
story_18_01000_en.lsd.story_18_01000/2401_1001_1100_10:
And...seeking victory for victory’s sake won’t
be enough. We’ll have to battle as a team—
use our strength to help one another...
story_18_01000_en.lsd.story_18_01000/2401_1001_1200_10:
That’s the sort of battling that’s going to be
expected of us from here on out.
story_18_01000_en.lsd.story_18_01000/2401_1001_1300_10: Use our strength to help one another, huh?
story_18_01000_en.lsd.story_18_01000/2401_1001_1500_10: Hm? What are you laughing at?
story_18_01000_en.lsd.story_18_01000/2401_1001_1700_10:
I just remembered how you were
before we started exploring Unova.
You really have changed a lot since then.
story_18_01000_en.lsd.story_18_01000/2401_1001_1800_10:
I don’t know whether to take that as a
compliment or an insult...
story_18_01000_en.lsd.story_18_01000/2401_1001_1900_10:
I’ll admit that I’ve had tunnel vision in the past
when it comes to winning. I didn’t really know
what I wanted back then.
story_18_01000_en.lsd.story_18_01000/2401_1001_2000_10:
But the experiences I had and the people I
met along the way helped me figure that out
for myself.
story_18_01000_en.lsd.story_18_01000/2401_1001_2100_10:
You got that right. I want to use everything
I learned during my journey to triumph in
this tournament.
story_18_01000_en.lsd.story_18_01000/2401_1001_2300_10:
I think I might know someone who’s in the
same boat as us!
story_18_01000_en.lsd.story_18_01000/2401_1001_2500_10:
Cheren! I’m talking about somebody who might
wanna join our team for the PML!
Come on, follow me!
story_18_01000_en.lsd.story_18_01000/2401_1001_2700_10:
Hey, Cheren! Hilbert told me everything.
If it’s about Pokémon battles, leave it to me!
story_18_01000_en.lsd.story_18_01000/2401_1001_2800_10:
I’ve always wanted to team up and battle with
you two. We’d be like Team Unova!
story_18_01000_en.lsd.story_18_01000/2401_1001_2900_10:
You’ve seen firsthand what an awesome Trainer
Hilda is, right, Cheren?
story_18_01000_en.lsd.story_18_01000/2401_1001_3000_10:
And all three of us have gone through similar
journeys across Unova, right? I was thinking...
that might help us really get in sync as a team!
story_18_01000_en.lsd.story_18_01000/2401_1001_3100_10: I see... That sounds like a great idea!
story_18_01000_en.lsd.story_18_01000/2401_1001_3200_10:
Hilbert’s right. I already know for a fact that
you’re passionate about Pokémon battling.
It practically radiates off of you.
story_18_01000_en.lsd.story_18_01000/2401_1001_3300_10:
So you’ll join our team then?
I look forward to battling together!
story_18_01000_en.lsd.story_18_01000/2401_1001_3500_10:
All right! Now that we have a full team,
let’s train! Victory or bust!

story_18_02000_en.lsd.story_18_02000/2401_1001_0100_10:
Good luck, [Name:PlayerNickname ]...
It looks like we’re your opponents this round.
story_18_02000_en.lsd.story_18_02000/2401_1001_0200_10:
You and your team have built up quite the
reputation for yourselves—defeating Gym Leaders,
Elite Four members, and other famous Trainers.
story_18_02000_en.lsd.story_18_02000/2401_1001_0300_10:
But I guarantee you, our team is more in sync
with each other than anyone else you’ve
faced in this tournament!
story_18_02000_en.lsd.story_18_02000/2401_1001_0400_10: We’re all Trainers that explored the Unova region.
story_18_02000_en.lsd.story_18_02000/2401_1001_0500_10:
But not just that! We trained together on Pasio,
strengthening our bonds!
story_18_02000_en.lsd.story_18_02000/2401_1001_0700_10:
Let’s give this battle everything we’ve got!
No regrets on either side!

story_18_03000_en.lsd.story_18_03000/2401_1001_0100_10:
Wow, [Name:PlayerNickname ]...
Thanks for such an incredible battle.
story_18_03000_en.lsd.story_18_03000/2401_1001_0200_10:
It stinks that we lost, but we did everything
we could.
story_18_03000_en.lsd.story_18_03000/2401_1001_0300_10: Yeah, truth be told, I feel really relieved.
story_18_03000_en.lsd.story_18_03000/2401_1001_0400_10:
You and your team earned that victory.
All we can ask is that you keep moving
forward, for your sake and for ours!
story_18_03000_en.lsd.story_18_03000/2401_1001_0500_10:
I’m looking forward to seeing all the things
you’re capable of from here on out.
story_18_03000_en.lsd.story_18_03000/2401_1001_0600_10:
Until then... Hilbert? Hilda?
You ready to go?
story_18_03000_en.lsd.story_18_03000/2401_1001_0700_10:
Pause, Cheren.
What are you acting out of character for?
story_18_03000_en.lsd.story_18_03000/2401_1001_0900_10:
It’s written all over your face. You want to see
[Name:PlayerNickname ]’s growth firsthand.
story_18_03000_en.lsd.story_18_03000/2401_1001_1000_10:
You can’t hide it from us, Cheren.
We’re a team, after all!
story_18_03000_en.lsd.story_18_03000/2401_1001_1200_10:
You two saw right through me, huh...
Well, I guess there’s no harm in asking.
story_18_03000_en.lsd.story_18_03000/2401_1001_1300_10:
I know it’s a little sudden, but would it be OK if
I joined your team, [Name:PlayerNickname ]?
story_18_03000_en.lsd.story_18_03000/2401_1001_1400_10:
Thanks to my friends here, I’ve already gotten
so much stronger since the PML began...
just like my journey back in Unova.
story_18_03000_en.lsd.story_18_03000/2401_1001_1500_10:
If you let me join, I think we can learn from each
other’s experiences and bolster this team’s strength
as a whole. What do you say?
story_18_03000_en.lsd.story_18_03000/2401_0401_1700_10: Thank you! I’ll do my best.
story_18_03000_en.lsd.story_18_03000/2401_0302_1800_10: Let’s help each other win this!
story_18_03000_en.lsd.story_18_03000/2401_0402_1900_10:
Absolutely! In fact, I think that moving forward,
teamwork is exactly what’s going to separate the
winners from the losers!
story_18_03000_en.lsd.story_18_03000/2401_1001_2000_10:
Personally, I want us to win this!
So let’s put our hands and our hearts together
and make it happen as a team!

story_18_51000_en.lsd.story_18_51000/2401_1001_0100_10:
Looks like the tournament matches are
ramping up!
story_18_51000_en.lsd.story_18_51000/2401_1001_0200_10:
That being said, I’m still amazed that you’ve
gotten this strong, [Name:PlayerNickname ].
story_18_51000_en.lsd.story_18_51000/2401_1001_0300_10:
Hehe! You’re right, Brock!
It’s pretty amazing how fast [EN:Gen Ref='255' M='he’s' F='she’s' ] been growing.
story_18_51000_en.lsd.story_18_51000/2401_1001_0400_10:
If we can keep this up, I think our team
might really be able to do it!
story_18_51000_en.lsd.story_18_51000/2401_1001_0600_10:
Bwahaha!
Careful, someone might overhear that utter
nonsense you’re spouting over there!
story_18_51000_en.lsd.story_18_51000/2401_1001_0800_10:
You should save that sort of talk for bedtime—
the only tournament you stand a chance at
winning is the one in your dreams!
story_18_51000_en.lsd.story_18_51000/2401_1001_1000_10:
I AM impressed, however, that you somehow
managed to get even this far.
story_18_51000_en.lsd.story_18_51000/2401_1001_1100_10:
You must have some seriously good luck... I’m
curious to see how far it will actually take you.
story_18_51000_en.lsd.story_18_51000/2401_0301_1300_10:
It’s our teamwork that’s 
gotten us this far!
story_18_51000_en.lsd.story_18_51000/2401_0401_1400_10:
Teamwork? Hah! Pure nonsense... 
Relying on others does NOT count as winning!
story_18_51000_en.lsd.story_18_51000/2401_0302_1500_10:
We’re gonna win this 
together as a team!
story_18_51000_en.lsd.story_18_51000/2401_0402_1600_10:
As a team? Hah! Pure nonsense... 
Relying on others does NOT count as winning!
story_18_51000_en.lsd.story_18_51000/2401_1001_1800_10:
You heard [Name:PlayerNickname ]! We’re a
team! We all worked together to make it this far!
story_18_51000_en.lsd.story_18_51000/2401_1001_1900_10:
Yeah! And all of our opponents up until now
have had amazing teams, too!
story_18_51000_en.lsd.story_18_51000/2401_1001_2000_10:
If you keep up that attitude, you’ll never know
what true teamwork feels like, and I bet you’ll
never be able to win... I feel sorry for you.
story_18_51000_en.lsd.story_18_51000/2401_1001_2100_10:
Excuse me?!
Did you just say YOU feel sorry for ME?
story_18_51000_en.lsd.story_18_51000/2401_1001_2200_10:
How dare you speak to the young master
that way!
story_18_51000_en.lsd.story_18_51000/2401_1001_2300_10:
Ugh, why don’t you just disqualify them?
I’m sure you could, as the founder and all...
story_18_51000_en.lsd.story_18_51000/2401_1001_2500_10: Y-young Master? Are you all right?
story_18_51000_en.lsd.story_18_51000/2401_1001_2600_10:
Ridiculous! Pure nonsense!
Bonds, teamwork, sync pairs—all of it!
story_18_51000_en.lsd.story_18_51000/2401_1001_2700_10:
You’d have to be a complete fool to believe
any of that nonsense will make you stronger!
Surely, you must be joking!
story_18_51000_en.lsd.story_18_51000/2401_1001_2800_10:
The ONLY way to attain true strength is to train
yourself hard—without relying on anyone else!
You and you alone!
story_18_51000_en.lsd.story_18_51000/2401_1001_2900_10:
You have seen how powerful I am firsthand—
isn’t that proof enough? Is your weakness not
proof enough?!
story_18_51000_en.lsd.story_18_51000/2401_1001_3000_10:
Say whatever you like—you shall never be strong
enough to overcome the massive difference
in power between us!
story_18_51000_en.lsd.story_18_51000/2401_1001_3200_10:
A battle—right here, right now!
If you refuse, I shall revoke your right to compete!
Lose the battle, and you’ll be just as gone!
story_18_51000_en.lsd.story_18_51000/2401_1001_3300_10:
Watch! I shall beat you to a pulp,
just like last time, and you will be out
of this competition for good.
story_18_51000_en.lsd.story_18_51000/2401_1001_3400_10:
And let this be a lesson to you! 
Bonds and teamwork are nothing 
but a ridiculous load of garbage!

story_99_00010_en.lsd.story_99_00010/2401_1001_0100_10:
Konnichiwa! Bonjour! Pleasure to meet you.
I’m Professor Bellis.
story_99_00010_en.lsd.story_99_00010/2401_1001_0200_10: I’m doing research on sync pairs here on Pasio.
story_99_00010_en.lsd.story_99_00010/2401_1001_0400_10:
Aha! Brock and Misty mentioned that they’d
teamed up with a promising young Trainer.
That hat of yours fits their description.
story_99_00010_en.lsd.story_99_00010/2401_1001_0500_10:
So, how are you liking the team battling style
of the island so far?
story_99_00010_en.lsd.story_99_00010/2401_0401_0700_10:
Eccellente! 
I hope you continue to have a great time here!
story_99_00010_en.lsd.story_99_00010/2401_0402_0900_10:
Don’t worry! You’ll get the hang of it, mi [EN:Gen Ref='255' M='amigo' F='amiga' ].
I can tell you’re passionate about growing
stronger. That passion is key!
story_99_00010_en.lsd.story_99_00010/2401_1001_1000_10:
We already know that sync pairs have incredible
potential, and there’s still so much we’ve yet
to discover!
story_99_00010_en.lsd.story_99_00010/2401_1001_1100_10:
Next time my research yields some exciting
results, I’ll be sure to let you know, OK?
story_99_00010_en.lsd.story_99_00010/2401_1001_1200_10:
Oh my. Is that the time? I need to do some
shopping and hurry back to the lab!
story_99_00010_en.lsd.story_99_00010/2401_1001_1300_10:
By the way, the shop here has all sorts of handy
items in stock. Why don’t you go have a look?
story_99_00010_en.lsd.story_99_00010/2401_1001_1400_10:
I suppose I’ll leave you to it for now!
I’d better be off. Do svidaniya!
Good luck!
story_99_00010_en.lsd.story_99_00010/2401_1001_1500_10:
Welcome, welcome! Today is our grand opening,
so feel free to stop by and browse through our
stock any time!
story_99_00010_en.lsd.story_99_00010/2401_1001_1600_10:
You can make changes to your team right
over here. Why don’t you try doing it now?
story_99_00010_en.lsd.story_99_00010/2401_1001_1700_10: Perfect! You successfully edited your team.
story_99_00010_en.lsd.story_99_00010/2401_1001_1800_10:
Feel free to use team editing to your advantage
whenever you meet new sync pairs!
story_99_00010_en.lsd.story_99_00010/2401_1001_1900_10:
Thank you for stopping by.
I look forward to your next visit!

story_99_00030_en.lsd.story_99_00030/2401_1001_0100_10:
Welcome! Since you’re a first-time customer,
we’d like to offer you a Training Machine
free of charge!
story_99_00030_en.lsd.story_99_00030/2401_1001_0200_10:
By the way, you can use Training Machines to...
you guessed it! Train with your partner
Pokémon to improve their strength!
story_99_00030_en.lsd.story_99_00030/2401_1001_0300_10:
Why don’t you try using this Training Machine
to teach your Pikachu a new move!
story_99_00030_en.lsd.story_99_00030/2401_1001_0400_10:
Wow! Nice work!
Your Pikachu looks stronger than ever!
story_99_00030_en.lsd.story_99_00030/2401_1001_0500_10:
Yep! That Training Machine sure seems to have
done the trick. I’ll have to keep plenty in stock!
Come again soon!

story_99_00040_en.lsd.story_99_00040/2401_1001_0100_10:
Hey you. You, in the shoddy hat.
You have got some serious nerve, 
waltzing in here wearing an eyesore like that.
story_99_00040_en.lsd.story_99_00040/2401_1001_0200_10:
Hang on a minute... You’re Lear, right? 
I don’t appreciate you and your cronies ganging 
up on my friend, [Name:PlayerNickname ].
story_99_00040_en.lsd.story_99_00040/2401_1001_0300_10:
Ugh... Apparently, I was wrong. It’s not
just [EN:Gen Ref='255' M='him' F='her' ]—the whole group is a dingy eyesore.
story_99_00040_en.lsd.story_99_00040/2401_1001_0400_10: You certainly don’t belong on any island I own!
story_99_00040_en.lsd.story_99_00040/2401_0401_0600_10:
Did you just—?!
I can’t believe there are still people 
on this island who don’t know who I AM!
story_99_00040_en.lsd.story_99_00040/2401_0402_0800_10:
Did you just—?!
I can’t believe there are still people 
on this island who don’t know who I AM!
story_99_00040_en.lsd.story_99_00040/2401_1001_0900_10:
I am Lear! It was I who created Pasio, the
magnificent artificial island you now stand on—
and I who founded the Pokémon Masters League!
story_99_00040_en.lsd.story_99_00040/2401_1001_1000_10: And it is I who shall be its champion!
story_99_00040_en.lsd.story_99_00040/2401_1001_1100_10: You would do well to remember my name.
story_99_00040_en.lsd.story_99_00040/2401_1001_1200_10:
Uhhh, not like anybody asked, but I’m Rachel.
See ya around.
story_99_00040_en.lsd.story_99_00040/2401_1001_1300_10:
Sawyer.
Anyone who disrespects the young master
will have to answer to me...
story_99_00040_en.lsd.story_99_00040/2401_1001_1400_10:
Hah! Don’t bother. I doubt these amateurs will
be around long enough to cause us any trouble.
Hahaha! Bwahahaha!
story_99_00040_en.lsd.story_99_00040/2401_1001_1500_10:
I can’t believe he just insulted us like that
out of nowhere... Don’t let jerks like him
get to you, all right, [Name:PlayerNickname ]?
story_99_00040_en.lsd.story_99_00040/2401_1001_1600_10:
You’ve already shown me that you 
and your Pokémon have got some promise 
in this tournament!
story_99_00040_en.lsd.story_99_00040/2401_1001_1700_10:
So c’mon! It’s time to take our next step
toward competing in the PML!

story_99_00060_en.lsd.story_99_00060/2401_1001_0100_10:
Ah, [Name:PlayerNickname ]!
I was hoping I’d run into you!
story_99_00060_en.lsd.story_99_00060/2401_1001_0200_10:
I’ve made leaps and bounds in my research on
sync pairs lately. If my new hypothesis is correct,
you should be able to grow even stronger now!
story_99_00060_en.lsd.story_99_00060/2401_1001_0300_10:
I believe you and your Pokémon can unleash
an even greater power together! Why don’t we
meet up here—I’d love to test out my theory!

story_99_00061_en.lsd.story_99_00061/2401_1001_0100_10:
Velkommen! Show us what you’re capable of! 
Prove your strength against this tough young man!
story_99_00061_en.lsd.story_99_00061/2401_1001_0200_10: I won’t go easy on you!
story_99_00061_en.lsd.story_99_00061/2401_1001_0300_10: Whoa! You guys are seriously strong!
story_99_00061_en.lsd.story_99_00061/2401_1001_0400_10:
Fantástico! You’ve truly proven your
strength today—and my hypothesis as well!
story_99_00061_en.lsd.story_99_00061/2401_1001_0500_10:
Congratulations. May you and your Pokémon
continue to grow and unlock even greater
potential as a sync pair!

story_99_00070_en.lsd.story_99_00070/2401_1001_0100_10:
Congratulations! From now on, you’ll be able to
participate in any events that are going on!
story_99_00070_en.lsd.story_99_00070/2401_1001_0200_10:
Events only last for a limited time, though.
Act fast, or you might miss your chance at
exploring the new areas!
story_99_00070_en.lsd.story_99_00070/2401_1001_0300_10:
Feel free to check out the news for a list of
all the events currently going on.

story_99_00090_en.lsd.story_99_00090/2401_1001_0100_10:
You’ve done a fantastique job so far
improving your strength as a sync pair!
Very impressive!
story_99_00090_en.lsd.story_99_00090/2401_1001_0200_10:
But did you know there’s a way to push that
even further? Beyond your current limits?
If you’d like to find out...meet me here.

story_99_00091_en.lsd.story_99_00091/2401_1001_0100_10:
Ah! I had a feeling you’d come and find me.
Now then, step right up and show us all
how strong you’ve become!
story_99_00091_en.lsd.story_99_00091/2401_1001_0200_10:
I’ll be the judge of that!
And I won’t go easy on you!
story_99_00091_en.lsd.story_99_00091/2401_1001_0300_10:
Total defeat?!
You’ve got some real power!
story_99_00091_en.lsd.story_99_00091/2401_1001_0400_10:
Très bien! You’ve certainly earned a prize
for yourselves today. I would love for you
to have this!
story_99_00091_en.lsd.story_99_00091/2401_1001_0500_10:
If you equip this, your team will be stronger
than ever! Brilliant, don’t you think?!
story_99_00091_en.lsd.story_99_00091/2401_1001_0600_10:
There’s a whole range of equipment out there
with all sorts of different perks. Try searching
for some the next time you go exploring!

story_zako_battle_01_01_en.lsd.story_zako_battle_01_01/3701_0101_0100_1:
Come on, you guys know the rules, don’tcha?
If two Trainers’ eyes meet, they hafta battle!
story_zako_battle_01_01_en.lsd.story_zako_battle_01_01/3701_0101_0200_1:
We fight who we want!
If you get in our way, we’ll fight you, too!
story_zako_battle_01_01_en.lsd.story_zako_battle_01_01/3701_0501_0100_1: Psssh! It was just a bad matchup!
story_zako_battle_01_01_en.lsd.story_zako_battle_01_01/3701_0501_0200_1:
It’s gonna take a lot more than that to
keep us from battling the Champion!
story_zako_battle_01_01_en.lsd.story_zako_battle_01_01/3801_0101_0100_1:
Now scram! We came here to fight Cynthia,
and we’re not leavin’ till we do it!
What are you gettin’ in our way for?!
story_zako_battle_01_01_en.lsd.story_zako_battle_01_01/3801_0101_0200_1:
These blockheads won’t even be a good
warm-up, but if they want a whoopin’,
a whoopin’ they’ll get!
story_zako_battle_01_01_en.lsd.story_zako_battle_01_01/3801_0501_0100_1: Graahhh! We missed our opportunity thanks to you!

story_zako_battle_02_01_en.lsd.story_zako_battle_02_01/3801_0101_0300_1:
Sync pair alert! Sync pair alert!
If we take your strong Pokémon, 
we will get stronger, too!
story_zako_battle_02_01_en.lsd.story_zako_battle_02_01/3801_0101_0400_1: You there! Hand over your partner Pokémon!
story_zako_battle_02_01_en.lsd.story_zako_battle_02_01/3801_0501_0100_1:
Did we not prepare well enough?
Retreat!
story_zako_battle_02_01_en.lsd.story_zako_battle_02_01/3702_0101_0100_1:
I feel eyes on me...
Could it be?
story_zako_battle_02_01_en.lsd.story_zako_battle_02_01/3702_0101_0200_1:
You must be those meddling kids I keep
hearing about!
story_zako_battle_02_01_en.lsd.story_zako_battle_02_01/3702_0101_0300_1:
Whoa, hold the phone...
You got yourselves some mighty fine Pokémon
there, don’t ya.
story_zako_battle_02_01_en.lsd.story_zako_battle_02_01/3702_0101_0400_1:
I’ll take all of you out—and take your Pokémon
while I’m at it! Get ’em!
story_zako_battle_02_01_en.lsd.story_zako_battle_02_01/3702_0501_0100_1: Darn it! You’ll pay for this!
story_zako_battle_02_01_en.lsd.story_zako_battle_02_01/3802_0101_0500_1:
Hmm? Somebody’s in our hideout!
What was the lookout doing?
story_zako_battle_02_01_en.lsd.story_zako_battle_02_01/3802_0101_0600_1:
Well well, it looks like we have some fine
specimens here!
story_zako_battle_02_01_en.lsd.story_zako_battle_02_01/3802_0101_0700_1:
Thank you for raising your Pokémon
with so much love and care...
We’ll be taking them now!
story_zako_battle_02_01_en.lsd.story_zako_battle_02_01/3802_0501_0400_1:
Strategic retreat!
We’ll steal some stronger Pokémon 
and get you next time!
story_zako_battle_02_01_en.lsd.story_zako_battle_02_01/3703_0101_0200_1:
I got this ripped after I gave up being able
to float!
story_zako_battle_02_01_en.lsd.story_zako_battle_02_01/3703_0501_0100_1:
Not even my glorious muscles could help me
overcome this?!
story_zako_battle_02_01_en.lsd.story_zako_battle_02_01/3803_0101_0100_1:
Aw, jeez, this is the pits!
Our eyes just met!
story_zako_battle_02_01_en.lsd.story_zako_battle_02_01/3803_0101_0200_1: You wanna get past me? Be my guest.
story_zako_battle_02_01_en.lsd.story_zako_battle_02_01/3803_0101_0300_1:
Well, I’d like to say that, but I should at least
do my job, right? Hand over your Pokémon!
story_zako_battle_02_01_en.lsd.story_zako_battle_02_01/3803_0501_0100_1:
Well, I did my job as well as I could.
Nobody can say I didn’t try.

story_zako_battle_03_01_en.lsd.story_zako_battle_03_01/3701_0101_0100_1: I just won a battle, so I’m in a great mood!
story_zako_battle_03_01_en.lsd.story_zako_battle_03_01/3701_0501_0200_1: Forget this! My mood is ruined!

story_zako_battle_05_01_en.lsd.story_zako_battle_05_01/3801_0101_0100_1: Aww, more cute little sync pairs!
story_zako_battle_05_01_en.lsd.story_zako_battle_05_01/3801_0101_0200_1: If you want to move on, you have to get past me!
story_zako_battle_05_01_en.lsd.story_zako_battle_05_01/3801_0501_0200_1: The afterglow of defeat is welling up inside me!
story_zako_battle_05_01_en.lsd.story_zako_battle_05_01/3702_0101_0100_1:
O Wise One...
Is this person perhaps...
story_zako_battle_05_01_en.lsd.story_zako_battle_05_01/3702_0101_0200_1: Hey, let me take a look at your face a bit...
story_zako_battle_05_01_en.lsd.story_zako_battle_05_01/3702_0101_0300_1:
Oh snap!
[EN:Gen Ref='255' M='He' F='She' ] has a really bad fortune waiting for [EN:Gen Ref='255' M='him' F='her' ]!
story_zako_battle_05_01_en.lsd.story_zako_battle_05_01/3702_0101_0500_1:
We must save [EN:Gen Ref='255' M='him' F='her' ]!
It’s OK. Just leave everything to us!
story_zako_battle_05_01_en.lsd.story_zako_battle_05_01/3702_0501_0200_1:
Meh, it’s not that big of a deal.
[EN:Gen Ref='255' M='He’s' F='She’s' ] free to believe what [EN:Gen Ref='255' M='he' F='she' ] wants.

story_zako_battle_06_01_en.lsd.story_zako_battle_06_01/3702_0101_0100_1:
And that is why it is imperative to carefully
think of the best roles for each pair and...
story_zako_battle_06_01_en.lsd.story_zako_battle_06_01/3702_0101_0200_1:
All in all, I’m just glad I was able to be on
your team!
story_zako_battle_06_01_en.lsd.story_zako_battle_06_01/3702_0101_0300_1:
Me too. I’m happy to be on a team with you...
Maybe we can become even more than... Hm?
story_zako_battle_06_01_en.lsd.story_zako_battle_06_01/3702_0101_0400_1:
Trainers! Perfect timing!
I can show her how cool I am if we win!
story_zako_battle_06_01_en.lsd.story_zako_battle_06_01/3702_0501_0100_1:
Aw, shucks. We lost. But that was so much fun!
...Maybe it was so fun because I was with you.
story_zako_battle_06_01_en.lsd.story_zako_battle_06_01/3702_0501_0300_1:
Have you two forgotten that I am a part of
the team, too?!

story_zako_battle_07_01_en.lsd.story_zako_battle_07_01/3701_0101_0100_1: This is the right way to the gathering spot, right?
story_zako_battle_07_01_en.lsd.story_zako_battle_07_01/3701_0101_0200_1:
Aaah, jeez! What a pain in the neck. Why’d you
have to make eye contact with me, huh?
Seriously, give me a break.
story_zako_battle_07_01_en.lsd.story_zako_battle_07_01/3701_0101_0300_1:
Hey! What’re you doing?!
Turn around before they notice you! Jeez!
story_zako_battle_07_01_en.lsd.story_zako_battle_07_01/3701_0101_0400_1:
Well, hello there! Fancy meeting you here...
Would you be interested in a Pokémon battle?
story_zako_battle_07_01_en.lsd.story_zako_battle_07_01/3701_0501_0100_1:
Team Break? I’ve never heard of them, so I can’t
help you there. But I really appreciate you
battling us! Thanks!
story_zako_battle_07_01_en.lsd.story_zako_battle_07_01/3701_0501_0200_1:
Ok! Hurry along home, now! I can only
put up with a pain in my neck for so long...
story_zako_battle_07_01_en.lsd.story_zako_battle_07_01/3702_0101_0200_1:
Finally, some new servants to wait on me!
I do hope you come along... Who knows what’ll
happen to your precious Pokémon if you don’t!
story_zako_battle_07_01_en.lsd.story_zako_battle_07_01/3702_0501_0100_1:
Oh... Are you sure you don’t want to be
my servant? Final answer?
story_zako_battle_07_01_en.lsd.story_zako_battle_07_01/3702_0501_0200_1: No matter! I already have plenty!
story_zako_battle_07_01_en.lsd.story_zako_battle_07_01/3703_0101_0100_1:
Oh? What’s this? Welcome to my cave.
Are you lost?
story_zako_battle_07_01_en.lsd.story_zako_battle_07_01/3703_0101_0200_1:
I looooove Pokémon!
But I hate people....
story_zako_battle_07_01_en.lsd.story_zako_battle_07_01/3703_0101_0300_1: You know what I’m trying to say, right?
story_zako_battle_07_01_en.lsd.story_zako_battle_07_01/3703_0501_0100_1: It’s only natural that I like and dislike things...
story_zako_battle_07_01_en.lsd.story_zako_battle_07_01/3703_0501_0200_1:
But whenever I say that I don’t like something,
some people yell at me...
That’s why I’m going to stay in my cave.
story_zako_battle_07_01_en.lsd.story_zako_battle_07_01/3803_0101_0100_1:
Found ya! Ha ha!
Team Break baddies, comin’ atcha!
story_zako_battle_07_01_en.lsd.story_zako_battle_07_01/3803_0101_0200_1:
I was bad back in school, and I’m still bad now!
Who cares about math when bein’ bad feels
so good!
story_zako_battle_07_01_en.lsd.story_zako_battle_07_01/3803_0101_0300_1:
Yeah! Can you count how many girls are on
this team? That’s right—one!
The same as my average test score!
story_zako_battle_07_01_en.lsd.story_zako_battle_07_01/3803_0101_0400_1:
Bet you think we’re going down the wrong path
don’t you? Well, think again! ’Cause we’re the
aces of bein’ bad!
story_zako_battle_07_01_en.lsd.story_zako_battle_07_01/3803_0501_0100_1: We’ll let you off easy this time!

story_zako_battle_08_01_en.lsd.story_zako_battle_08_01/3701_0101_0100_1:
I don’t even feel the cold here...
Could this be my special talent...?!
story_zako_battle_08_01_en.lsd.story_zako_battle_08_01/3701_0101_0200_1:
Get ready for the power of a hiker that the cold
never bothers!
story_zako_battle_08_01_en.lsd.story_zako_battle_08_01/3701_0101_0300_1:
Battling was never one of my talents! But even
then, everybody has something they’re good at!
story_zako_battle_08_01_en.lsd.story_zako_battle_08_01/3701_0501_0100_1:
From today on, I will be an ice hiker!
Using my talent to its fullest!
story_zako_battle_08_01_en.lsd.story_zako_battle_08_01/3701_0501_0300_1:
No one knows where the ice hiker went after that.
They say that he and his Pokémon still roam the icy
mountain glaciers to this day...
story_zako_battle_08_01_en.lsd.story_zako_battle_08_01/3801_0101_0100_1:
Brrr... Mas-s-ster!
It’s t-t-too cold for swimming lessons out h-here!
story_zako_battle_08_01_en.lsd.story_zako_battle_08_01/3801_0101_0200_1:
Oh, come on.
I know you can keep going!
I mean, look at me!
story_zako_battle_08_01_en.lsd.story_zako_battle_08_01/3801_0101_0300_1: I don’t feel cold at all!
story_zako_battle_08_01_en.lsd.story_zako_battle_08_01/3801_0501_0100_1:
N-no! Don’t leave me behind, M-m-master!
I can’t handle this cold! Waaait!
story_zako_battle_08_01_en.lsd.story_zako_battle_08_01/3702_0501_0100_1:
You coulda gone a lil’ easier on me!
I’m just a lil’ kid!
story_zako_battle_08_01_en.lsd.story_zako_battle_08_01/3702_0501_0200_1: You wait! I’ll beat you when I’m all growed up!
story_zako_battle_08_01_en.lsd.story_zako_battle_08_01/3802_0101_0100_1: Weird, we’re usually all pretty in sync.
story_zako_battle_08_01_en.lsd.story_zako_battle_08_01/3802_0101_0200_1:
Hey, four-eyes!
Stop holding us back!
story_zako_battle_08_01_en.lsd.story_zako_battle_08_01/3802_0101_0300_1:
We’re supposed to be a three-person team!
And look at you two, always just... Hm?
story_zako_battle_08_01_en.lsd.story_zako_battle_08_01/3802_0101_0400_1:
This is a good opportunity for me to show you
that you need me, too!
story_zako_battle_08_01_en.lsd.story_zako_battle_08_01/3802_0501_0100_1:
Do you see now? The reason they won is because
they properly operate as a team!
story_zako_battle_08_01_en.lsd.story_zako_battle_08_01/3802_0501_0200_1:
Sorry. I shouldn’t have said those things.
Your glasses are really nice.
story_zako_battle_08_01_en.lsd.story_zako_battle_08_01/3802_0501_0300_1:
We had forgotten that we needed all three of us
to win. Let’s wipe the slate clean and start over.
This time, together!

story_zako_battle_09_01_en.lsd.story_zako_battle_09_01/3701_0101_0100_1:
Hahaha!
This town belongs to us now!
story_zako_battle_09_01_en.lsd.story_zako_battle_09_01/3701_0101_0200_1:
Ma’am! These are those brats that we were
telling you about!
story_zako_battle_09_01_en.lsd.story_zako_battle_09_01/3701_0101_0400_1:
Very well, I shall purloin your Pokémon as well,
and they will join my pretties!
story_zako_battle_09_01_en.lsd.story_zako_battle_09_01/3701_0501_0100_1:
Ma’am, you lied about how strong you are!
Wait...why did I agree to be your servant?
story_zako_battle_09_01_en.lsd.story_zako_battle_09_01/3701_0501_0200_1:
We got tricked by her boss-like vibes!
I mean, if you really think about it,
who even says “my pretties” anymore?
story_zako_battle_09_01_en.lsd.story_zako_battle_09_01/3801_0101_0100_1:
Argh! I went through all the trouble o’ stealin’
this little guy, and now...
story_zako_battle_09_01_en.lsd.story_zako_battle_09_01/3801_0101_0200_1:
It’s too darn cute... I can’t use it for battling!
I...I can’t do it.
story_zako_battle_09_01_en.lsd.story_zako_battle_09_01/3801_0101_0300_1:
Hey! Your Pokémon look pretty strong!
Lemme just take ’em off your hands for ya!
story_zako_battle_09_01_en.lsd.story_zako_battle_09_01/3801_0101_0400_1:
Wait! Stay back, lil’ bud!
I can’t have you getting hurt!
story_zako_battle_09_01_en.lsd.story_zako_battle_09_01/3801_0501_0200_1:
I guess it was pretty stupid of me to steal other
people’s Pokémon... I’ll go give this little guy
back to his Trainer now.
story_zako_battle_09_01_en.lsd.story_zako_battle_09_01/3802_0101_0100_1: Hnnnggg! I can’t take it off!
story_zako_battle_09_01_en.lsd.story_zako_battle_09_01/3802_0101_0200_1:
I didn’t want to put this mask on!
Why would anybody put glue on the inside?!
story_zako_battle_09_01_en.lsd.story_zako_battle_09_01/3802_0101_0300_1: Oof, you look like you’re in a bind.
story_zako_battle_09_01_en.lsd.story_zako_battle_09_01/3802_0101_0400_1: Hm? What’s this? My body is acting on its own!
story_zako_battle_09_01_en.lsd.story_zako_battle_09_01/3802_0501_0100_1: I did it! I got it off! I’m free!
story_zako_battle_09_01_en.lsd.story_zako_battle_09_01/3802_0501_0200_1:
Hmm... I feel like you lost your single
defining characteristic.
story_zako_battle_09_01_en.lsd.story_zako_battle_09_01/3703_0101_0600_1:
Ooh! What nice-looking sync pairs!
I’ll beat you and take your Pokémon!
story_zako_battle_09_01_en.lsd.story_zako_battle_09_01/3803_0101_0100_1:
Pokémon Ranger en route!
Wee woo wee woo!
story_zako_battle_09_01_en.lsd.story_zako_battle_09_01/3803_0101_0200_1:
Ambush successful!
You must be members of Team Break!
story_zako_battle_09_01_en.lsd.story_zako_battle_09_01/3803_0101_0300_1:
Now, send out your Pokémon!
We’ll be having a Pokémon battle now!
story_zako_battle_09_01_en.lsd.story_zako_battle_09_01/3803_0501_0100_1:
Training is complete!
How was that? Realistic, huh?
story_zako_battle_09_01_en.lsd.story_zako_battle_09_01/3803_0501_0200_1:
That was a good workout before fighting
Team Break!

story_zako_battle_10_01_en.lsd.story_zako_battle_10_01/3801_0101_0100_1: I’m an Ace Trainer... I can’t lose...
story_zako_battle_10_01_en.lsd.story_zako_battle_10_01/3801_0101_0200_1:
H-hey! I’m an Ace Trainer. One step away from
the main tournament matches of the PML!
story_zako_battle_10_01_en.lsd.story_zako_battle_10_01/3801_0101_0300_1:
There’s no way I’ll lose against a few random
sync pairs!
story_zako_battle_10_01_en.lsd.story_zako_battle_10_01/3801_0501_0100_1:
H-how? I... Is this how strong the other teams
heading to the tournament are?
story_zako_battle_10_01_en.lsd.story_zako_battle_10_01/3801_0501_0200_1:
Nah! I’m probably just having a bad day!
I would have been able to beat you normally!
story_zako_battle_10_01_en.lsd.story_zako_battle_10_01/3702_0101_0100_1:
How many more badges do you need?
Oh, just one? 
You’re pretty good at this, aren’t you?
story_zako_battle_10_01_en.lsd.story_zako_battle_10_01/3702_0101_0200_1:
If I ever want something, somebody either gives
it to me or I take it from them.
story_zako_battle_10_01_en.lsd.story_zako_battle_10_01/3702_0101_0300_1:
I want everything you have, so I’m going to
take it from you!
story_zako_battle_10_01_en.lsd.story_zako_battle_10_01/3702_0501_0100_1:
I wonder... If I’d worked harder, could I be
competing in the PML right now, too?
Maybe that was a path I could have taken.
story_zako_battle_10_01_en.lsd.story_zako_battle_10_01/3702_0501_0200_1:
All the grownups ever taught me was to
take what I get and steal everything else...
story_zako_battle_10_01_en.lsd.story_zako_battle_10_01/3802_0101_0100_1:
I love your Pokémon...
Waaay more than you do...
story_zako_battle_10_01_en.lsd.story_zako_battle_10_01/3802_0101_0200_1:
I can spend more money and time on them than
you can...
story_zako_battle_10_01_en.lsd.story_zako_battle_10_01/3802_0101_0300_1:
Your Pokémon would be so much happier with me
than with you!
story_zako_battle_10_01_en.lsd.story_zako_battle_10_01/3802_0501_0100_1:
I would buy them everything they want!
I would give my everything to them!
story_zako_battle_10_01_en.lsd.story_zako_battle_10_01/3703_0101_0200_1:
I have arrived! Prepare to fight!
Right here! Right now!
story_zako_battle_10_01_en.lsd.story_zako_battle_10_01/3803_0101_0200_1: You were lookin’ at me weren’t ya? Let’s battle!
story_zako_battle_10_01_en.lsd.story_zako_battle_10_01/3803_0501_0100_1:
Hey, thanks for havin’ that battle with me!
I appreciate you not runnin’!
story_zako_battle_10_01_en.lsd.story_zako_battle_10_01/3803_0501_0200_1:
I’ve got a bit of a mean lookin’ face, so most
people run away before battlin’ me.

tutorial_general_talk_01_en.lsd.tutorial_general_talk_01/2701_0701_0100_:
Did you know that every sync pair has a type
that it’s weak against? It’s a scientific fact!
tutorial_general_talk_01_en.lsd.tutorial_general_talk_01/2701_0701_0200_:
Before you depart on a journey or task, I highly
recommend that you check the area’s weakness
type and edit your team accordingly!
tutorial_general_talk_01_en.lsd.tutorial_general_talk_01/2701_0702_0100_:
Using attacks of that weakness type will inflict
even greater damage than normal, you see!
tutorial_general_talk_01_en.lsd.tutorial_general_talk_01/2701_0702_0200_:
They’re super effective! Remember to adjust for
weaknesses. You won’t regret it! The results
will speak for themselves.
tutorial_general_talk_01_en.lsd.tutorial_general_talk_01/2704_0701_0100_:
Pssst! I’ve got a tip that’ll help you take down
tough opponents! It’s about switching targets...
tutorial_general_talk_01_en.lsd.tutorial_general_talk_01/2704_0701_0200_:
The more opponents you have battling against you
at once, the harder it is to defeat them, right?
tutorial_general_talk_01_en.lsd.tutorial_general_talk_01/2704_0701_0300_:
Well, if you target the weaker sync pairs first,
you can take them off the board faster!
Once you do that, winning is a breeze!
tutorial_general_talk_01_en.lsd.tutorial_general_talk_01/2704_0702_0100_:
Then again, sometimes it’s better to go for the
strongest sync pair first, depending on the
situation. Use your best judgment!
tutorial_general_talk_01_en.lsd.tutorial_general_talk_01/2704_0702_0200_:
Either way, switching targets can be a
superhelpful strategy!
tutorial_general_talk_01_en.lsd.tutorial_general_talk_01/2706_0701_0100_:
Oww! That s-stings...
I was petting my friend’s Infernape, and I
accidentally burned my hand...
tutorial_general_talk_01_en.lsd.tutorial_general_talk_01/2706_0701_0200_:
Did you know that Pokémon can get burned, too?
They can also be poisoned, paralyzed, frozen,
and put to sleep.
tutorial_general_talk_01_en.lsd.tutorial_general_talk_01/2706_0702_0100_:
We call these status conditions. Switching out your
Pokémon isn’t enough to heal them, so be careful.
tutorial_general_talk_01_en.lsd.tutorial_general_talk_01/2706_0702_0200_:
Ow-ow-ow! Man, this burn really does hurt...
If only it would heal automatically after a battle,
like my Pokémon...
tutorial_general_talk_01_en.lsd.tutorial_general_talk_01/2709_0701_0100_:
“After you use a sync move, the amount of
damage your team inflicts will increase...”
tutorial_general_talk_01_en.lsd.tutorial_general_talk_01/2709_0701_0200_:
Oops! Sorry...was I talking out loud?
I’m trying to memorize everything I’ve learned
about sync moves, but they’re so complicated!
tutorial_general_talk_01_en.lsd.tutorial_general_talk_01/2709_0702_0100_:
Apparently, the opposing team in a battle can use
their own sync moves, too.
tutorial_general_talk_01_en.lsd.tutorial_general_talk_01/2709_0702_0200_:
Man, it’s tough memorizing all of this! It might
be better to go out and do lots of battling to
build up muscle memory instead!
tutorial_general_talk_01_en.lsd.tutorial_general_talk_01/2710_0701_0100_:
The abbreviation “PML” gets thrown around 
quite a bit, doesn’t it?
Do you remember what it stands for?
tutorial_general_talk_01_en.lsd.tutorial_general_talk_01/2710_0701_0200_:
It’s short for “Pokémon Masters League”—
the tournament currently being held here on Pasio.
tutorial_general_talk_01_en.lsd.tutorial_general_talk_01/2710_0702_0100_:
“P” for “Pokémon,” “M” for “Masters,” and “L” for
“League!” See? It’s quite simple to remember!

tutorial_quest_01_en.lsd.tutorial_quest_01/0601_0701_0100_10:
Hey! Brock and Misty were telling me
about you. It looks like you’re getting
the hang of Pokémon battles!
tutorial_quest_01_en.lsd.tutorial_quest_01/0601_0701_0200_10:
I’ll teach you more advanced techniques.
You’d better not blow me off!
tutorial_quest_01_en.lsd.tutorial_quest_01/0602_0701_0100_10:
There you are!
All right, let’s get down to business!
tutorial_quest_01_en.lsd.tutorial_quest_01/0602_0702_0100_10:
Hey, not too shabby! But then again, I’m the one
teaching you, so it’s only natural!
tutorial_quest_01_en.lsd.tutorial_quest_01/0602_0702_0200_10:
Maybe you can become as good as me someday!
Don’t let that get to your head. You gotta keep
training for that to happen!
